1b1(rnying rgyud): rgyag skadad+ha/ dpyi la mA thA ma yA k+Shan+tum/ bye dang/ !mAm+b+ha 'du ba chen mo zhes thab rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po la
1b2(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis gsungs pa nyid du gyur pa'i tshan bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor chen po dang / rnal
1b3(rnying rgyud): 'byor ma chen mo dang / shin tu mos pa chen mo dang / mos pa dang bcas pa srung bar byed pa/ rab tu rnam par srung bar byed nye ba mo dang bcas pa nye bar zhi ba chen po dang zhi bar mdzad
1b4(rnying rgyud): pa chen po mdzes pa dang mdog tu ldan pa/ shes pa dang skyabs su ldan pa ni 'di lta ste/ gtso bo rnal 'byor 'khor lo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje nyid du 'dus pa zhes
1b5(rnying rgyud): bya ba dang / rnal 'byor chen po btang snyoms zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor chen po dbang du mdzad pa zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor shin tu rnam par rgya gram gyi tshul 'dzin pa dang banas
2a1(rnying rgyud): pan rnyer yang nyon pa'i gzugs kyis kha dog bzhi dang ldan te 'jug pa'i chu lugs kyis cod pan lnga dang ldan te/ ma bsdebs ma sleb bslab pa mi 'grog sgrib tu med pa'i dbyings nas yang
2a2(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i gzhal yas chen po na mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rjes su ma bkag pas mdzod pa bsam gyis me khyab pas gzugs so// de yang 'di ltar so sor gsal bar mnyam pa chen po dang 'khor dang bcas pa mnyam pa/
2a3(rnying rgyud): chen pos yo byad chen po ni kun gyi gdung 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa ni brten pas phyin ci ma log pa dang gnyis su du ma med pa ni gzungs rnal 'byor ma chen mo ste/ byang chub chen mo nam mkha' zhes bya ba dang / byang chu
2a4(rnying rgyud): chen mo nam mkha' 'dzin mo zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mos srung ma zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo rlan par byed pa chen mo dang / byang chub chen mo rnam par khengs pa spang ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo las grub/
2a5(rnying rgyud): par mdzod ma zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo rdo rje rab tu chags pa chen po 'dzin zhes bya ba dang / rab tum chags pa gsod ces bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo rab tu rmongs sel zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo gsung
2b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor la ma zhes bya ba ste/ de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ shin tu ut+pal lta bu'i mdog dang / shag kra dang / bai DUr+ya dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / A sma gar ba la sogs pa rdzas kyis sngags pas 'phags par 'tshor ba ma sbyin pa med par bzhugs pa ni rnal 'gyor ma dran
2b2(rnying rgyud): bzang po 'khor dang bcas pa'o// de yang gus pa chen po gsang ba dang / gus pa chen po sna tshogs pa'i dri dang / gus pa chen po dbang sgyur ba ni gsang ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba dang / gsal ba 'dzin byed ma dang / rnam par dri yi gnas su gyur pa dang / rnam par sgra byed pa'i
2b3(rnying rgyud): zug 'dzin pa'o// de nyid mthong bar byed pa'i dbang po dang / nyan par byed pa'i dbang po dang / bsung byed chen po'i dbang po dang / btang ba chen po'i dbang po dang / shin du gtong bar mdzad pa dang / shin tu rtog par mdzad pa dang / shin tu 'dzin dbang chen po dang / shin tu grub par mdzad pa dang / cha lugs
2b4(rnying rgyud): mi gtong ba'i btsun mo dang bcas pa'o// yod pa rnam par rtog par mdzad pa dang / med pa sel bar mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'du shes rgyal ba yin par mdzad pa dang / shin tu 'grog pa rnam par 'joms pa chen mo dang / mngon spyod kyi las kyis gnyis su med par 'a khril nas cho
2b5(rnying rgyud): gyi dbyings mnyam pa chen po'i gzhal yas na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gas ba men mo'i rnal 'byor ma gzhal yas su dgyes nas ma skyes pa'i dbyings shes rab kyi tshogs chen mo mu khrud kun dang ldan pa/ bla rgyas lte bu'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dbus med par khyab pa/
2b6(rnying rgyud): rin po che kun dang ldan pa/ grwa dang ngos dang kha dog dang dbyibs rgyu khyon dpag tu med par gyur pa/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa cha lugs kyis rnam par mdzes pa/ yid bzhin chen po'i rgyun gyis rnam par smras pa/ sna tshogs pa'i bye brag gis rgyal ba rnams kyi gdung 'dzin pa/
2b7(rnying rgyud): glu 'phrul chen po'i sgo bzhi deng ldan pa/ theg pa phyi'i rnal 'byor rnams kyi theg pa chen po 'bab gzhol dge sdig chen po'i mchog shin tu gsang ba chen mo dang bcas pa/ pad+ma chen po'i dbus na lce kha dog bzhi'i bye brag gis mdzes par gyur pa/ phyogs bge bre ba ma/
3a1(rnying rgyud): pa gsum gyi cha lugs kyis gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor sgrib pa mchog tu sol ba ste le'u dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po gdung ba mchog tu sel bar ma nga
3a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te/ 'dzum pa chen pos rab tu chags pa chen po la dbang sgyur bar dgyes te/ gsang ba chen mo'i mkha' la pad+ma dbang gi mdog gis rgyas par mdzad de/ oM su ra hA swa khe zhes brjod pas rdo rje rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa btsun mo dang bcas par gyur
3a3(rnying rgyud): to// de nas rab tu 'di brjod par mdzad do// bzhi pa kha dog dkar la 'tsher// btang snyoms kun+da gyi spro baspu yis// gsum pa rdzogs par gsal ba dang // phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog de dag las// rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du dgyes// phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// bcu gsum pa yicha
3a4(rnying rgyud): lugs kyis// tshe chung med par gsal bar bsgom// dbul gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan// gsal ba nyid kyi dus dag tu// cod pan lnga yi rin chen las// rgyan gyi rigs ni gsal ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang brgyan dam pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gsum
3a5(rnying rgyud): pa mthing 'bar yi ge che// rigs kyi rin chen sgo baspu las// phyag rgyar gsal bas skur gsal pa// rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du dgyes// sgrib pa kun spangs sdig med sdoms// gnyis pa yi ni yi ge las// cod pan lnga ldan yi ge ragasal// thams cad glo sbyangs yid ba'i
3a6(rnying rgyud): gter// mnyam pa 'brel ba'i tshul 'dzin pa// rin chen rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal// las thams cad kyi mchog rtsal mo rnam par rol pa'i phyag rgya'o// baiR+Ye d+hag 'dri ba'i mdog/ chos su zla tshes dang ldan pa// gsal ba'i kha dog mdzes pa ni// thams cad ma lus dbang
3a7(rnying rgyud): mdzad// sbyar dad bskyed dang bsdu ba yis// phyag rgyar gsal bar dbang gi sku// btsun mo dge dang mnyam du dgyes// gnyis su med par 'khrel ba yis// dbu ru yi ge gnyis pa ldan// rin chen rigs kyi spobasru las// cod pan rigs lnga kha dog ste// ji bsre
3b1(rnying rgyud): mas nga man kyis/ phyag rgya bzugs rdul bdu drug// mnyam par bsamapas dkyil 'du'o// ma 'byed pa ya ting 'don gyis// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor kun 'dus mchog/ btugs kyi phyag tu gas pa// mun bsol ba'i mang dru na/
3b2(rnying rgyud): gsal dag pad ga tas med pa sgom// rje skyes 'dzum pa'i 'od du ldan// skyeg dang smod pa'i rol ma yis// dbyes shing mnyam pa'i mtsho par bshus// 'di ltar gsal bas dpung yang rtogs// thams cad sdud pa rnaMs su bya// de bzhin kyi
3b3(rnying rgyud): rnalas thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// dus gsum pa yi mdzad pa tshe// rigs kun 'dus pa bde gshegs las// mnyam pa ji bzhin teng 'don te// yi ge 'brug cig kun gyi mchog/ bshad pas khyad par las kun rdzogs// chu skyes gas la
3b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'dab ma steng // gnyis su med par gsal ba ni// rnam pa gnyis kyi bye brag gis// 'dus pa gsal bas sgrar gyur pa// 'dod cing chags pa ma yin zhing // sgro la yid gnyis med pa dang // phyag rgyar gsal bas rgyal ba'i sku// rgyal mo dang
3b5(rnying rgyud): mnyam du dgyes// dbuganyis pa yi yi ger ldan// sbyin pa rgya chen khengs pa na// rang gi 'dod pa'i gnas su bsgre// bor tshod lo grangs khyad par med// gnyis su med par 'khril par gsal// dus kun du ni mnyam ldan pas// gsang ba'i
3b6(rnying rgyud): mchod pa rab tu rdzogs// b+hU n+yas lta bu'i gtso bri bsgom// chags pa med par 'dod spyad byu // yu ma dang lhan cig bsgom pa ni// A li kA le byed pa'i don// phyag rgya lus kyi bye brag gis// bde ba chen po rje dz+wal gnas pa// rgyal ba klan kya
3b7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin mthun// phyag lag snol mar gnas pa yi// kun kyang sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro// phyag rgya thal mo rdo rje ni// kun kyang yum gyi rgyab tu bsno// zhal gnyis mi dzes par rab rgyas nas// zlagam pa yi ljags gnyis mdzes// dung gi phrar
4a1(rnying rgyud): zas mthar mas la// nga rdzobs pa'i thas du bathugs// btsun pa te 'asbyin dbang dag smrapa// thal bdun byas pas// bshA d+hang 'jam pa gtsuganas // / rgyan pa das/
4a2(rnying rgyud): gsadra ba spyod la shin tu dgyes// gsang ba nyid du sems can 'dren// thams cad kun gyi mongs pa sel// yum gyi las kyi khyad par ni// sa yi rim pa kun stong zhing // zas la bzho la dbang med pa// nyan thos 'gog pa la sogs pa// bya
4a3(rnying rgyud): chub sems kyi tshar chen rdzis// dam por bcings pa tshor gcod mdzad// dam chog chen po sdom pa ste// rgyal bkun gyi dkyil 'khor yin// phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs mchog na// dag pa 'on gyi rigs mchog yin// lung bar rtag tu la yengs na/
4a4(rnying rgyud): gdon mi za bar 'grub pa ni// 'dod khams b+hA yI tin byed kyis// gas rab kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ba mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i drug rgya'o// kun tu bzang po rnal 'byor mchog/ gsang nyid kyi mkhang dbyed sa nas/
4a5(rnying rgyud): ya~M ge a ldan chog tshig brjes// rdul byor bang chen thugs ce sa// gzugs 'ams la rdzogs byin brlabs nas// \u0f7f/ mtshan 'khor bar gsal ba dang // ba ban pa byor de bzhin gshegs// da mig sa kyi nas/ nyim
4a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin du// gsal ba 'tsher ba bcom ldan 'das// dbu ru yi ge gnyis pa las// rin chen myu gu lang dpa 'bar// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu lhun gyis// legs par brgyan pa mtshan rnams rdzogs// tshogs pa chen po'i bzhugs tshul dang //
4a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin mthun pas 'gro la dmigs// badz+ra ga sar dbus gnas pade// thig bzhigs ba bzhi dang ljin// mdun du lha mo chags pa ro// lo grangs kyi shu ma ngas dang ldan// ma hA swa ka'i gnas la dgyes// mangs pa'i lag pa gang /
4b1(rnying rgyud): sa sum dpa' bathags rdul na// gsal bad pang thul du ba zugs// rtswa na mams rgyan ma// sangs rgyas brten par mdzad rgyal gyis// thal mom 'dzin pa su brtan pa// sun du drug rngu dmang su// sangs rgyas ga dang don chags
4b2(rnying rgyud): pas stong // 'dod chags can la mthun par mdzod// g.yas su zhe sdang gdul ba mo// rdo rje pad+mor sbyor la dgyes// ma dad pa rnams dbang med par// drag por skyod mdzad zhe sdang sel// chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// gnyis
4b3(rnying rgyud): med par spyod pa yis// gtor ba med par bstan pa'i tshul// sngo bsangs mdangs ldan khyad par che// khru tshod bcwa lnga chags pa can// dus mtha' med par sbyor la degyes// steg dang ldeg pa na lugs kyis// sems can kun gyi sag bas
4b4(rnying rgyud): 'gre// rab tu skams pa 'gog pa rnams// rling nas rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur// yu mA la'i phrin pas kyis// thams cad byung chub chen por mdzad// mig gnyis 'joms dang drim po yis// dbang ma ldan par byas pan// gtam
4b5(rnying rgyud): med per spyong 'ad yin// sA ya~M ste mo mtheng zhing 'dzin// ma btang bzhugs pa cin zlos pa'o// so rnams bskums nas la n+deg// dus la bab ces bya ba ste// ting nge rin gas la bar rgyu gyun// dus lwab ba ces bya ba yin// 'di skar bya
4b6(rnying rgyud): ldan tengad 'dzin la// dam tsa ni bud med me 'dud pa// dngos grub mi 'gyur dam tshig nyams// tshe rabs kun du brlag par 'gyur// 'di lhur rte nA par byed pa na// g.yan pa bslang ba rnam bzhi yis// skyes bran chung tshul bzhin du/
4b7(rnying rgyud): sa ngas spyo ldan dus// da 'bru 'i tha~Ms ga drug dang // dpazus rje rab tu 'phrul/ ma sa sa phun/ byang chungs ma gyi drungag / ma pa 'dzi na sa
5a1(rnying rgyud): kyis blangs te gtsol mchod// te ba'i bsnyen pa la sogs pas// bsnyen pa che chung rdzogs par bsgom// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor las// mchod pa brgyad kyis bstod par mchod// de ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang // gnyis
5a2(rnying rgyud): su med par lung bzhin du// mnyam par 'khril pa'i tshul du bstan// dus gsum kun du gdung 'dzin pa// g.yon phyogs brten pa'i skal dang ldan// bong tshod lo ni bcu dgu pa'i// sdong po dul ba dag la dgyes// g.yas par bribu ba'i spyan gyis gzigs//
5a3(rnying rgyud): dril bu sgra stan 'khrol la brtson// rdo rje rab tu spogs byed ma// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan chen// mngon du sbyor la rab brtson pa// brda dang bcas pa'i gar gyis ni// sangs rgyas kun la slong mdzad ma// byang chub sems kyi sprin chen gyis// mchod
5a4(rnying rgyud): pa chen pos rab mchod mnyes// sprul pa bsam yas mtha' klas pa// dus gsum 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// ngo sor chags pa'i mdangs kyis ni// mnyes dang bcas pa'i gar gyis mchod// gru chad bzhi yi rim pa la// thos byed gsal
5a5(rnying rgyud): byed gsung ba che// dri dadang ldan pa la sogs pas// btsun mo dag dang thabs cig tu// gnyis su med pa'i tshul du bzhugs// par khyams bzhi la gnas pa ni// thos byed dbang dang nyan byed dbang // dri mchog dbang du lta byed dbang //
5a6(rnying rgyud): dus ni bzhin mas lha mr-i pazhi// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// zhe sdang 'joms byed la sogs pas// sgo rnams kun du gnas pa ni// snying rje'i yum dang bcas par gnas// nyi ma thab pa d+ma mchog/ rin chen du drang bcas
5a7(rnying rgyud): po ste// drangs pa 'irgya byin gnyis gnyis kyis// teg pa'i khrel rab tu bzhugs// rdzogs pa chen por kun+da kyang gnas// sems dpa' chen po'i bzugs tshul du// kun kyang rab tu gnas par bstan// zhal ni kun dus la le ba/
5b1(rnying rgyud): gas ni gnas ga// sgrub par gsapa// sbom ma pa 'gag ma chag/ em mas la ma len mchog/ skyem tsam ma thag shul spyod// em gshegs pa'i thabs dang bcas// o sa ma than ma sel bar sbyan// ma
5b2(rnying rgyud): gsung rab rgya ma tsho sgrogs// e ma byol song spob bskyed// e ma sprul pa bsam yas mchog/ e ma mya ngan 'das par mdzad// e ma gsang brades don mdzad// e ma gzungs dang mnyam par sbyor// e ma ci yang mamamachog
5b3(rnying rgyud): mtshar smin las 'di dag gis// sa yi rim pa 'byongs par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas pa nyid mngon par sangs rgyas pa la gleng ste mnyes par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba rnal 'byor bde ba chos kyi
5b4(rnying rgyud): lo zhes bye ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun du bzung mo rnal 'byor ma la 'jug par dgyes te rab tu 'dres pa chen po dgongs pa dang / kun du bzang mo rnal 'byor myas/ zhal 'jam pa dang bcas pa/
5b5(rnying rgyud): ma sems dpa' thig la che// bag chags kun gyi gnyen por gsungs// 'di las 'jug pa'i chos 'ga' med// zhes brjod do// de nas gsang ba chen mo dang gnyis su med par 'khrel bar gyur te/ g.yon pa bskyed pa rnam pa mang pos mnyes
5b6(rnying rgyud): pa dang pad+ma sbam pa la sogs pa 'byung ba spel bar mdzad nas rab tu dgyes te glu 'dri blangs so// e ma bAde ba mchog las skyes pa phyag na rdo rje can// chos kun dngos po med par gsal ba la// 'byung gnas chen pos ya mtshan 'byung bar mkhyen pa em
5b7(rnying rgyud): ngo ma tshar che// rgyu nyid stong pas 'bras bu btsal med pa'i// rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyang kyal bas yong mi rnyed// stong pa nyid la dgang ba'i chags pa'i tshe 'phrul pa// de phyir skye 'gag med ces rgyal ba rnams kyis 'di la brjod// chos kun
6a1(rnying rgyud): med ma rnangs pa nyid las// kun gyi dga' ba 'byung brgyal ba kun pas shin tu 'phags// zhes brjod pas gas pa'i mtha' la kun du bzang po rnal 'byor 'jug pa mdzad de shin tu rnam pa'i zla gnang paso// mya
6a2(rnying rgyud): las 'phags pas dbyer med rnam par 'phrul byed pa// kun du bzang po rnal 'byor de ni bder gshegs yum chen kun gyi gsos// sdug bsngal kun spong bder gshegs yum la 'jug bzugs dam yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs//
6a3(rnying rgyud): 'gog ji yang mdzad pa nyid ni mi mdzad mnyam pa yin zhes rgyal pas gsungs// 'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis// mya ngan 'das kun 'gro ba'i mgon// stong pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor lo// dka' thub chen po thob par 'gyur// zhes gnyis su med
6a4(rnying rgyud): par glengs so// de nas snying po mchog gi yi ge ni// dang po'i gnas su bsgom par bya// de nyid yi ge bzhi pa ste// rdo rje chen po gsal bya mchog/ yi ge a wAn thig le che// chos kun 'dug par rnam par bsgom// dang por me long lta
6a5(rnying rgyud): mnyes pa'i kha dog shin tu 'bar// phyag lag 'khyud pa smon 'a yos// thams cad de dang 'dra sar gsal// oM Sh+Ta~M su ra ta su ke dz+nyA nadam+b+ho ts+tshi r+g+haM/ bder gshegs rgyal mo myakha' dbyings su// gsal dug las rnams 'gug par bcwo
6a6(rnying rgyud): skyes pad+ma 'dab ma stong // bshad pa'i sgras ni rnam par brgyan// de sted chos kyi sku ru gsal// zla rgyas d+hi bu'i mkha' dbyings nas// thams N+yai badz+ra pagra sum gyis bsdus// oM su ru tra su khe d+har+m+ma d+hA tu swa b+hA byA oM AHhUM/ gnyis su med pa
6a7(rnying rgyud): mchog/ mi skye ba ni a dang ldan// byin brlabs rgyal ba kun gyi gnas// mchod pa brgyad dang gsal bar ldan// so sor gsal pa mkha'i dbyings la// hU~M gi zer gyis reg par mdzod// oM su ra tA su le na par b+hak+Sha na lA
6b1(rnying rgyud): smra/ / na rgyun / na na
6b2(rnying rgyud): du sa san / na
6b3(rnying rgyud): sa/ sa mas bshi sa / / nanag she ma kyi nga sa
6b4(rnying rgyud): na zhe
6b5(rnying rgyud): ba skam sbyin ng+tha sa la/ rdul pal gas/ nga ba kA zla
6b6(rnying rgyud): zhu pa na// gcig pa ngas gang rdzog+sa/ mad+hI dza~M/ / thal mo ba sa la shes kyi/ ci ngas myu gyu / gar gyi phyug rgya shing bas// gdu du byas
6b7(rnying rgyud): sa bral ba // 'jug tud ngul pa'i tshus kyis blo dgang kyi phyog rgyalas// rgya ga ma gas pas ga / nyid gnan dung thogs parargya drug gyi byeg rgyalas// dag ba ma song
7a1(rnying rgyud): g.yas su 'dud pa'i tshal gyis ni// g.yas pa yi ni thags kar bsgreng // g.yon pa gsung nyan 'khrul pa'i tshul// rdo rje gar gyi t+tag rgyu las// mdzes pa'i mtha' nas gar byas shing // gzhan nas bsdus nas g.yas g.yon 'jog
7a2(rnying rgyud): rje gar ni de dag las// lag pa g.yas pa 'degs pa dang // dbul ba'i tshul du rnam par brtag/ rdo rje gar ni de dag las// sman dang dbu ni g.yon du 'dung // cang te'u thogs pa'i tshul gyis ni// mchod pa byed par rnam par nga sngags/
7a3(rnying rgyud): gar gyi phyag rgya las// lus ni g.yas g.yon bsgyur ba dang // gang las lag pa phral bskyed pa'o// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las// g.yon pas g.yas pa'i gru mo gzung // g.yas pa nyag pa'i tshul du bya'o// de nyid rdo rje gar dag las// da ma tshig phyag
7a4(rnying rgyud): rgya 'thor bar bstan// rdo rje gar gyi phyag tu las// dam tshig phyag rgya ste nga bsgyur// de nyid g.yon pa'i nang ngag las// g.yas pa'i dam tshig zug rgyas gtor// de nyid g.yas pas drangs par ldan// de nyid gnyis pas gzung ba yin// nga ting ga
7a5(rnying rgyud): ka thal mo bsdam// de nyid dril bu 'dzin par bsgom// oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ mu ka ka ra su khe na oM/ oM sarba tA thA ga tA sa ma hA ga s+t+waM su khe na hU~M/ oM sarba ta thA gra ta dz+wa la ya nA nA ma ma hA su khe na trA~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga tad+harma b+ha shra su khe na hA hA r+tha/ de nyid gtso bo'i
7a6(rnying rgyud): phyag mung bcas// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba bud+ha lo dz+nyAn At+ma naM/ su ra tra pu khe na muta pA pA dza ya pU dza ya/ oM oM a~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA d+ha / oM su ra t+na su~M len b+hiR+tha b+had+ha/ pA dza~M ya pA dza yaM/ hU~M hU~M hU~M A/ oM su ra t+na sA khe na/ mAn sha bo ha/
7a7(rnying rgyud): ya pU dza ya/ hri bI tri/ oM sr-ing thA mu kha~M na sarba ta~M thA ga~M ta d+harmA n+ta/ sAd+ha ka nad he ho/ oM sarba ta d+h+r-i ga ta shrI badz+ra lA s+ye/ badz+ra gar+b+he su khin pU dza ya pU dzA ya/ oM ts+tshihU~M hrI/ sarba ta thA ga tA shrI 'dzi da s+the su kha~M nai pA~M dza ya p+ta dza ya/ rje pra a/ oM sarba ta thA ga
7b1(rnying rgyud): brda bad+hAs lan/ d+ha bad+hi ba/ blang ma b+hang ya/ dzadzAg+sas/ oMs nata thAg ta thA brje nir te bdug tsam kI la gas kan pA dza la prA dza ya/ yA a ma/ oMd+h+ma/ oMs rba thAg+sa ta ga ba dru / bajug tu sule na phung labyung ba/ ya ta ta tu chu/
7b2(rnying rgyud): tig tu s+t+rai badz+ra spA\u0f89\u0fa4 badz+rag ces len pA~M dza ya pU dza la/ hU~M hU~M maM/ oM sarbata thA ga ta hU~M badz+ra mA loka d+ha na muN+Da la ti ya kaM/ pradz+dzamr-i khe na dza ya pA dza ya/ oM pra br-itra~M oM AHhA/ oM sarbatan+ta ka ta m+me badz+re bAr+b+he/ bajug tum maN+Da la ti ya ka Ta len pa ya
7b3(rnying rgyud): dzapa/ a a aM/ oM AHhUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes pa'i mchog las gar gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen mo dang bcas pa dam tshig bla na med pa'i rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
7b4(rnying rgyud): par zhugs so// thams cad sdom pa pa gnas par mkhyen no// dam tshig chen po 'dridi dag gsungs// so sngo'i byeg pa bsamA yas pa// so sor nyes pa med na bde// 'jig rten pa la chang mdo btsan// 'dul ba 'dzin la gsungs na bde// ga
7b5(rnying rgyud): spyod la gtsang sbrar spyad// mi dge bzlog na dge ba bcu// spyad pas lhag pa'i 'jig rten 'dzin// rang gi don gyi ting 'dzin gyis// byang chubs la gnas pa'i rnams// nyams pa med de ma bcol na// nyams pa med de las kyang 'grub// rnal byor
7b6(rnying rgyud): smad pa spyod pas 'grub/ tshig cis goms pas theg pa 'joms// gtso mchog bshes gnyen mi spong zhing // bkur sti rim gro mchog kyang bskyed// ting 'dzin goms par cha lugs bsgom// tshig gi bzlas pa bar mi gcad// dam tshig mched la
7b7(rnying rgyud): gdung ba bskyed// sku yi dam tshig bsam mi khyab// gsung gi dam tshig bsngags pa yin// thugs kyi dam tshig lhag par gsungs// rigs lnga bsrungs pa'i dam tshig rnams// nyams na shin tu bskang bar dka'// sdud pa'i dam tshig rdzas
8a1(rnying rgyud): rnams ni// nyams na myur bar bslang ba yin// nyams pa ma bskangs le lo yis// sangs rgyas kun dang gcugs chen te// 'khyam pa rnam pa bcu por ni// myur bar skye bar nges pa ste// de bas rigs kyi bu mchog ni// mchog dang tha ma 'bring
8a2(rnying rgyud): gi rnams// rab kyis bar chad med par spyad// 'bring gis lo zla dus drug ste// tha mas lo mtshams mi bzla zhes// rgyal ba rnams kyis shin tu gsungs// rdo rje dri dang byang chub sems// rak+ta dri chen tshe chen po// dag pa'i snod dang rab ldan pas// byin gyis brlabs
8a3(rnying rgyud): te 'thung byed pa// dam tshig sdom la gnas pa ste// 'das na brlag pa chen por 'gyur// mnyam par bzhag pa'i chos thams cad// mnyam par shes pas spyad pa dang // mnyam pa nyid du gsal ba na// rnal 'byor sems dpa' yin zhes gsungs// rnal
8a4(rnying rgyud): 'byor snod du bya ba gang // rdzas kyi bsngags pa yod pa rnams// rab tu bkru zhing byi dor bya// ka la ping ka'i mdog bzhin du// gzhong bu phur bu snod kyi rnams// dri ma bkru zhing mdzes par bya// dus gsum du ni sman sbas pa// dang por dngal gyi gzhong par
8a5(rnying rgyud): sbyar// de nas ra gan gzhong pa ste// zings kyi gzhod par sbyar ba ni// srang de sbyar ba'i sman rnams las// zangs dang dngul dang ra gan nam// gse dang lcags su rab bsres la// rnam rtog nad la snron sbyar ba// min dA ra ba'i mdog bzhin sbyar// man dang
8a6(rnying rgyud): par ma gyur tshe// nam yang sbyar bar ma gsungs te// nyi zla dus gcig shar ba ni// de nas rdzas kyi bsngags pa las// spyan gyi sbyor ba rab tu brtsam// shin tu sman rnams 'byor pa na// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsam yas su// kra la ping ka'i mdog tu brtag/ 'di
8a7(rnying rgyud): la gang zhig mi brtson pa// dam tshig mi btsun sdom pa med// rdo rje spun las dben par gdon// lha dang rdo rje slob dpon la// bag med par ni brnyas pa dang // rmongs pas ma mthong g.yel ba dang // dam chos srog la mi lta ba// sangs rgyas kyim la
8b1(rnying rgyud): bdun la brnyas// dkyil 'khor ba yi las byas pa// sems can dmyal ba chen po ste// tshe thang nad kyis btab pa dang // 'dzin rten 'di ru gnod pa mang // shi nas dmyal ba ngan song skye// de bas sdom pa 'di dag las// 'da' bar mdzad pa gang yang med/
8b2(rnying rgyud): 'di las 'das par mi byed pas// tshe 'di nyid la rgyal ba'i sku// lhun gyis grub pa'i sa la gnas// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid la nyid dam tshig chen po'i sdom pa 'dis shin tu bsnyengs par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
8b3(rnying rgyud): da kyi gsang ba'i bde bsgom pa thams cad kyi mchog gi le'u zhes byi ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po rnal 'byor ma dang bcas pa dgongs pa gcig tu gnas par mdzad do// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po snang
8b4(rnying rgyud): dur ldan pa'i spyod pa ma lus pa nyid dang zab mo'i don yin par mkhyen to// mkhyen nas sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i thabs 'di gsungs so// e ma chos dbyings rnam dag spyod yul las// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ston ya mtshan 'phrul chen yin// de yang ye shes
8b5(rnying rgyud): tshogs las sna tshogs snang mod kye// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma las ni rab tu sbal te 'char// bden gnyis so sor sdang ba nyid kyang yum gyi mkha' zhes rgyal bsreg snyengs// ma nor lAm chen skom na kun du bzang mo bsgoms pas lame nga zhags pa yin// sangs
8b6(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa kun shes rab bud med las ni mchod cing bsnyen pas ye shes chen por 'grub po// dkyil 'khor gdon pa'i las kyi dngos grub mchog gi la rdo rje glu'i don de nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'i dgongs pa la gsal bar gyur te/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
8b7(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid dpal kun du bzang pos thabs dang shes rab kyi longs spyod 'di gsungs so// mngon spyod las kyi 'jug pa ni// phan tshun du ni dag 'aspyod pa// nal 'byor sdom la gnas pa yin// de la mchod pa dam pa ni// kyang ba rab tu sbyor ba ste/
9a1(rnying rgyud): kun du khyab pa kun du sbyor// rjes su chags pa dam tshig mchog/ de phyir kar sham mdog dang ldan// bcu drag por tshad ring ba las// lugs su blags pa lta bu ste// lus legs mdzes dang ldan pa dang // dpral bar byes che kos kom// num
9a2(rnying rgyud): zhing son mo ring // yid tsam bzur la mig dkyus ring // dka zhing rtsa dmar mdangs su chags// so dkar thags bzangs 'tshams bung zhing // skad sbom gdangs dang ldan pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas mchog ste// 'di la rtse bar byed pa ni// rigs kyi
9a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gdon mi za// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// gnas rab dben par rab brtag ste// shad kar mdangs ldan mdog dang ldan// lus 'bring zlum pa cha byad can// so dkar thags dam mig dkyus zlum// skad phra mdog dkar spro ring ba// dpral dbyes la
9a4(rnying rgyud): sogs bzang gnas pa// rma dag gnas pa la sogs ni// rtag par chos la 'dud pa yin// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi rigs can te// 'di la brtson byas bsgrub pa yis// de bzhin rigs kyi ting 'dzin la// phan tshun du ni dga' sprad na// tshangs pa'i snga
9a5(rnying rgyud): gcig tsam gyis// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor sbyor ba dga' ba ni// spyong ba brtson pas 'grub par gsungs// bud med cha lugs legs pa ni// phyong tshod mi ring lus phra zhing // rkang lag rgyang zhing skad gsal ba// mig legs ngo zlum
9a6(rnying rgyud): dmar che// lhun du chags la mi shes med// lus la mtshan gyi mu 'dras brgyan// tshig gsapa rmi la mo nyung ba dang // so dkar mchu legs dad par ldan// chos sems pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// gsang ba'i myaba' la nyi zla'i 'od// rdo rje pad+mar
9a7(rnying rgyud): ldan byas te// phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na// 'dod khams kyu yi skang cig gis// 'dub par 'gyur ba gdon miza// lus zlas brgyan dang brgyal btsas// kho na tshig rnon sems pa 'dzin// bya bar dran la mi gtong ldan// bslab pa rmo dul shadus
9b1(rnying rgyud): tshe// mdangs bkrag brtags na phye phyir che// sprin la dga' zhing chos la dang // rin chen rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// bag chags yi ges rtsad gcod cing // ting 'dzin blo la gsal ba na// bsgrub pa dus la bab pa ste// de tshe rab tu brtson pa yis/
9b2(rnying rgyud): yum gyi pad+ma baphye ste// bde ba thugs kyi 'du 'gro yis// phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na// rigs kyi rin chen 'grub pa ni// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// thugs rje mdzad spyod bye brag gis// 'jig rten dag na dman pa'i rigs// rab tu bkug ste dag 'asngo
9b3(rnying rgyud): snying rje mchog dang thabs ldan pa// rnal 'byor spyod pa chen por gsungs// shin pa rigs ngan slad 'tshong ba// ngan pa'i rigs dang longs spyod rnams// 'joms pa po yis ting 'dzin gyis// myur du spya na 'grub par gsungs// yi dwags gnod sbyin byol song
9b4(rnying rgyud): dang // khyi dang rus sba la spre'u la sogs// mi dang lha yi gnas mchog kun// so sor 'tsham par dga' spyad na// dregs pa can la zhi ba che// brtson la dga' ba brtson par mdzad// thabs kyi mdzad spyod kun gyi mchog/ sems can 'di dag don gyi phyir// phyin
9b5(rnying rgyud): ci log tu gang spyod rnams// 'dul ba'i mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis// mi mdzad pa ni ci yang med// shin tu gtum pa'i cha lugs kyis// gtum po thams cad dbang du mdzad// shin tu zhi ba'i cha lugs kyis// dregs pa can rnams dbang du mdzad// shin tu mdangs
9b6(rnying rgyud): ldan cha lugs kyis// chags pa'i yid rnams dbang du mdzad// e ma shin tu ngo mtshar che// ci yang yin pas cir mi dgongs// zhes gsungs pas thams cad rab tu brtson pa chen po dang ldan par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis
9b7(rnying rgyud): yi khyab pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa rdul phra mo'i rdul snyed rab tu 'dun pa'i thugs kyis mnyan pa brtson par mdzad do// rdo rje chos kyi mchog la sogs pa rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu mnyan pa dang gus pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su gzung ba'i le'u mdzad/
10a1(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen mos rab tu brtson pa mdzad/ rab tu brtson pa'i phyir gyis spyod pa dang 'khyud pa dang gyar gyi dgyes pa dang mgub bla med pas phan tshun du dga' baspyad do// de nas de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas su dang gsung dang
10a2(rnying rgyud): thugs rdo rje las 'di gsungs so// oM hU~M ye shes rnal 'byor mchog ldan pas// skal bzung mchog gi dngos grub stsol// rab tu rmongs pa bsal phyir 'gog pa kun spong ba// rnal 'byor po mchog gnyis su med pa 'di dag shin tu ngo mtsho /
10a3(rnying rgyud): na ming bden gsus ni kun ci dbang ldan pa/ tshangs ma'i sangs ldan gargyangs mangs nyid ston sa// zlab pa kyang ba di la dga'ablod mam// gaun ces pa de dag dpas 'thab par gsus pasas la gnas pa ldan pa
10a4(rnying rgyud): 'phags// rgyal ba kun gyi nang na kun du bzang po rgyal ba kun pas 'phags// de yang kun du bzang mo yin zhes sngon gyi rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs// mtshan ma kun bral rab tu dga' sbyor mi gtong bas// sems dpa' rdo rje nyid kyang de yin rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs//
10a5(rnying rgyud): tshangs pa mchog gi glu 'di dag/ brtson par byed cing len pa ni// dka' thub rnal dbyor ting 'dzin te// tshangs pa mchog gi dro gcig gis// gdon mi za bar 'grub par gsungs// zhes brjod do// de bzhin pashegs pa thams cad rab tu brtson pa chen
10a6(rnying rgyud): pos gcig gi rang brten du gyur par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas dus gsum gyi ston pa thams cad bde bar gshegs pa'i rang bzhin te rab tu mchod pa chen po sa
10a7(rnying rgyud): mnyes shing ma rig pa brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dul bar mkhyen to// mkhyen nas ma rig pa grol bar mdzad pa dang zhe sdang rnam par grol bar dgyes te/ de dag mnyam pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyis 'dul ba'i thabs su grol ba dang / dbang gi
10b1(rnying rgyud): pas rab tu bsrungs shing bsrung ba mdzad do// bdag gi rnal 'byor kun du bzung // mtshan nyid kun brtags gnyis skye med// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam skyor na// mnyam pa'i sa la gnas pa yin// rang sems bcus dbus gnas pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i dung 'dzi ga
10b2(rnying rgyud): de rtogs gsul bden pa yis// rab pas pa bachen po/ sgyog gas pa ga rjid // A oM trA~M sa ldan sa// nas ga tan pazhan da// thugs kyi mdza pa/ gas dang rdzas/ nga 'dzin 'dig gsal ba mas// ngoms ga
10b3(rnying rgyud): bsngal sbyang ba'i phyir// gnyis su med par gsal ba yis// dzaHhU~M ba~M hos bsdu ba mdzad// mngon spyod las kyis sgrol ba mdzad// gnyis su med par 'grub par 'gyur// rtags dang shes pa phun sum tshogs// byams pa mdzad pa rnal 'byer thugs// gzungs
10b4(rnying rgyud): kyi mchod pa mnyam ldan pas// rgyal ba mnyes par sbyor shes na// mnyes pa chen pos bdag nyid mchod// bden pa'i tshul du dbyer med pa'i// sems nyid rtogs pa nas spyang phyir// ting 'dzin thugs kyis kun bsgral te// mngon stod las kyis sgrol bar mdzad/
10b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i mkha' la kun tu sbyor// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad spyod bsam gyis mi khyab pa las mchod pa de kho na nyid de le'u bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor rab tu skyong ba la dgyes te/ slob ma mchog dang 'bring dang tha mas yod kyi
10b6(rnying rgyud): dbul ba mang po byas hUM dkyil 'khor du gzud pa mdzad do// bgegs tshar gcad pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gdong bar bstan rin po ches lag sor bkang ste snying po 'di zlos su gzhug go// oM sarba ta thA ka ta pU dzi d+hi d+hA tiSh+Tha hUM/ oM ma hA maN+Dal de
10b7(rnying rgyud): bkar pU dza ya pU ya hU~M a/ zhes brjod de me tog 'thor du gzhug go// gang la bab pa'i bshes gnyen bstan// sngags dang phyag cang mchog bskrun// de nas ngas chog tu bru~Mng cing // tshig 'di rab tu go bar bsgo// sems can gyi ni gzugs chen po// las
11a1(rnying rgyud): pa sogs te dbang bskur ba// rgyal ba'i sras su dbang bskur yin/ ni ring phan chad bu khyod kyis// dmachog gnyen po 'di dag ni// srog gi phyir yang mi gtong zhing // slob pon ma btang grogs la mchod// bka' la gus par mnyan par bya/
11a2(rnying rgyud): gal te dka' las 'das sbyar na// gzhom dang gcig dang deman pa dang // dang thaMr dang rtsal ba ste// sems sa chu 'di gnas pa ni// phrin las rnam pa ni 'tsham par bya// zhes brjod nas/ rno thob dpon kyil 'byor dang // kun du pa
11a3(rnying rgyud): mched la sogs// zhangs la gtugs dang thos par bya// rmad kyi mnyan pa thams cang gyi// bcwab pa gzugs la brten pas 'jun// de nas gas kyi zla tsug pa// gsang ba'i ming gi dbang 'ang bdur// gus par ldan pa'i bu mjog sa/
11a4(rnying rgyud): pa nga slo la bzung // dadu lus panas dang 'khror shupa nga // rlung gras na dang // dang la sa/ 'di sbyin ched / nga shing pozhi gang // banyid kyim yong rnams// de ga nga me
11a5(rnying rgyud): pa// sems la rje tshom med pa yis// bkud sti rim tho mchog bskyed la// phulan ts+tsha ba mnyes par 'gyur// de nas ba mno thed pa'i tshod// rim pa bzhin du nod par bya// mnyan pa byab pa la sogs dang // las dang shing nga rgyal 'dzib dang //
11a6(rnying rgyud): spyan dang rdo rje tshang 'dzin pa// bye brag ma ngag pa la sogs rnams// gsang ba'i dbang rnams gang nod pa// nye shu'um bcu gnyis lon pa la// gos dang bu rgyan bza' btang dang // rgyab rngu dril bu la sogs pa// dkyil 'khor 'di ltar gsal bsgoms te/
11a7(rnying rgyud): ban gyis byin gyis brlabs// mngon du sman pating dga' spyod cing // rgyal pos dbang bskur na// gdon mi ze bar dngos sung bye// tshig gi legs pa bstod bya// de napa rigs kyi bumacho gdes// gangasal gtugs te gtang gto
11b1(rnying rgyud): na dang gzungs ma yis// rgyal ba'i rgyal ba yin zhes brjod// dub gsum kun gyi sras chen po// dus gsum kun gyi sdud pa spyod// khams gsum kun gyi sgrol ba po// sgrol pa mchog gi spyad pa spyod// shin tu rnal 'byor skal ldan pa// dam tshig sdom la
11b2(rnying rgyud): gnas pa dang // mtshan ma med pa'i chu 'thung zhing // ji ltar bsgo ba'i las byed pa// kun la phyed par rab grags yin// phyi rabs 'dren pa'i gdung 'dzin pa/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i sa la gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba de
11b3(rnying rgyud): na nyid las mchod yon dam pa dang snying rje'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcos ldan 'das gsang ba rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin po snyoms par zhugs te gnas par mdzad do// mdzad nas snrel zhi dang babyed yan nan mang po
11b4(rnying rgyud): 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas yang las la ltos pa dang tha~Md kyi sdug bsngal rnams mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'jog par mdzad do// de nas yang mu stegs rtag par lta ba ther zug pa la rtag pa ther zug gi cha lcags kyis 'dul bar mdzad do// chad pa
11b5(rnying rgyud): phyis mi 'dod ces bya ba la cha lugs des mnyam pa la 'dzud par mdzad do// mdzad nas rab tu 'gog pa'i dka' thub kyis myur ba bde ba la gnas par mi ster ba rnams la dka' thub 'gyur ba chen po'i tshul gyis 'dul dbang chen po mdzad de// drag shul gyi btsan
11b6(rnying rgyud): thabs la dga' ba de thags zangs ris kyi cha lugs kyis 'dul bar mdzad do// gzhan la snying rjer ma gyur pa'i phyogs gcig pa'i sa rgyal rnams la yid bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dul bar mdzad do// gling bzhi'i dge sdig cha yi shes pa la 'khor los sbyang ba
11b7(rnying rgyud): chen por mdzad nas 'dul bar mdzad do// sleb pa pa chen po dang gtub pa chen pa dang / btso ba dang ba tus tham rnam che cung rnams gnyen po dang blangs pa dang / gshed po chen po'i tshul gyis 'dral bar 'dza // de dag kyang cos mnyam pachen po kyang
12a1(rnying rgyud): rgyab kyi tshul rdo rje theg pa kun gyi mchog dang bzhin gyi rgyal gyis gnas pa thabs dang shes rab dbyor med de rol pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas par mdzad do// thabs kyi mdzad pa khro bo rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas bcom ldan
12a2(rnying rgyud): 'das kun du bzang po chen po bdud 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad do// de nas bdud zhe sdang chen po zhes bya ba de bskal pa stong gi dus na sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa blangs pas byang chub tu sems ma bsred
12a3(rnying rgyud): pa/ rab tu gdug pa/ spyi bung ba/ bong che zhing tshor sang che ba/ mtshon cha dang khrag gi gdug pas sems can la gnod pa/ mtshon gyi mche ba dang bcas pa dpag tshad nas dri tshor te rab tu gsod gcod za 'brang byed cing me dpung gi dkyilan gdug pa'i mda' 'phen/
12a4(rnying rgyud): thing g.yo ba chen pos bsngo ba drag po dang tsham ngam du gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das cad mi gsung bas kun du bzang mo la 'dzum pa mdzad do// yab yum gyi byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin las/ oM d+ha d+hA d+had+har d+ha ra d+ha ra ho ho/ hrI hrauM hraM/ dzaM bo'o//
12a5(rnying rgyud): ho zhes brjod pas tshangs pa'i chung ma dang / dbang po'i chung ma dang / khyab 'jug gi chung ma dang / tsakra'i chung ma dang / de bo'i chung ma dang / ru tra'i chung ma dang / ga ru Da'i chung ma dang // yul 'khor srung gi chung ma dang / rna me shos kyi chung ma dang / 'phags
12a6(rnying rgyud): chung ma dang / mig mi bzang gi chung ma rnams rab tu chags pa'i 'du shes rang dbang med par skyes te 'du bar mdzad do// de yang byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ satwa badz+ra he ru ka/ ma hA sa ma ya sarba sid+d+hi/ hUM ha~M hU~M/ ho ho ho zhes brjod pas de bzhino gshegs
12a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzugs mang pos mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur te bzhugs pa la tshangs pa'i chung ma la sogs pa 'dus pa thams cad kyis so so re re shin tu chags pa chen po'i yid skyes te 'khril bar gyur to// 'khril nas kyang rol pa'i byang chub kyi sems las chu'i dkyil 'khor
12b1(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jig rten 'khru zhing 'jig par mdzad do// ma dkyil 'khor mang pos 'jig rten rab tu sreg par mdzad do// rlung gi dkyil 'khor mang pos 'jig rten sems can gtor bar mdza da // dri nas byang chub sems kyi sprin gyis rigs nges
12b2(rnying rgyud): par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// de nas gnyis sa med pa las bzhedas te/ oM a~M sarba bi si du shA b+ha dzAdza dza zhes brjod pas tshungs pa dang thab 'jug gi chung ma la sogs pa/ gzungs las bran mo dam mnos te slar gnas su phyin par gyur te//
12b3(rnying rgyud): sgra'i tshe lugs de las mnyam pa chen po la gnas par mdzad de/ i b+han mra d+ha ma hA na nA trar yog nam N+Da la porta ta la nya la du du tshul cis brjod pas so po'i chung ma dang bu sri de rje gsod byed ma chen mor gyur te/ bdud gdug pa ched po zhes can
12b4(rnying rgyud): sogs pa la jo bo dam mnos bzhengs zhes smras te/ bdud gdug pa'i lus la khrag bzhibs nas gnas so// 'on kyang dam nyan par ma btub ste g.yo bag med par shan tu sngo bar gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das sprul pa thams cad
12b5(rnying rgyud): gcig tu sba ba mdzad de dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi tho ba dang rdo rje dang / rnge'u chung dang / mda' gzhu dang / zhags pa dang / sdigs pa'i mdzub mo dang / b+han d+ha 'khrug pa'i rol pas kun tu bzang mo dang 'khril nas dbu gsum gsogs te/ sarba
12b6(rnying rgyud): b+haSh+Ta sar+b+ba thA rbahU~M hU~M phaT phaT ces brjod pas skyabs kyi 'og du bdud bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang ba rgya byin lo sogs pa rgyal rkyen thos stong bsdus te/ khAk+ki hrI b+h+yaH phaT n+ya wA ru wA n+ya k+sha hU~M hU~M zhes pas bsngal te/ b+har+d+ha R+sha bAk+Sha nas gsol te mi gnas par
12b7(rnying rgyud): mdzad do// ying zhabs g.yas pa'i then cing 'bring spyor kyi tshul ts+yaima~M/ oM sabatwa thA ga ta ma hA tA na gar thA hU~M hU~M hU~M ha~M rmA N+Dal b+ha la ma hU~M hrIn+da hU~M/ hU~M ts+tshan+da/ hA/ \u0f7f/ phaT phaT pha na rjes brjod paseMs po'i chung mabums dang dbang med par
13a1(rnying rgyud): bteg ste phyin to// de nas bdud zhe sdang chen po de yang dregs pa'i chung mas bteg ste phyin to// phyin nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan chen pos/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma ya shrI he ru ka du d+ha kA ha nA/
13a2(rnying rgyud): da ha da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa/ hA Sh+Tha hA hA hA zhes brjod pas rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo rnal 'byor ma skul byed ma dang / rnal 'byor ma gsod byed ma dang / za byed ma dang / rnal 'byor ma gtum mo dang / las la grub pa chen mo dang / dza rje sreg byed
13a3(rnying rgyud): ma dang / dbang sdud chen mo rnams yum gyi gsang ba'i mkha' las byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin las 'thon nas gdug pa'i tshogs bdud mgro nas bzung ste mtshon cha dang phral nas bsgral te lha sug phral nas bsnams shing bstabs so// de nas bcom ldan
13a4(rnying rgyud): 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dpal rdo rje khrag 'thung chen pos 'gro ba gnod sbyin bdud kyi rigs kyi 'khor dang yi dgas kyi lus rta'i lus can gyi srin mo chen mo dang / bug pa mo chen mo dang / dur b+ha rmen mo dang / sta ga dang / seng ge ba blang / wa dang / khyi dang /
13a5(rnying rgyud): wang dang / spre'u dang / bya rog dang / b+ha rgod dang / rnga mo dang / phag la sogs pa ma tud ru tra dang chas te gnas pa la mtshan mA ra ma chags pa'i sbyor ba mdzad nas/ te he he he he/ hU~M hU~M hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT ces brjod pas byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin
13a6(rnying rgyud): las seng ge skyabs chen po dang / stag gi cha lugs chen mo dang / myos byed nya mgo chen mo dang / 'ug pa'i mgo can dang / bya dog dang / bya rgod dang / mchu rings lnga sogs pa srin mo'i cha lugs dang ma thal ba'i mdog gis 'thon nas/ phaT phaT phaT tsa
13a7(rnying rgyud): ma hA maN+Da la hU~M phaT zhes brjod pas gdug pa'i tshigs bsgral par mad de bya dang / mche ba can dang / sder chags kyi za stangs kyis 'phrog cing gsol ba mdzod do// / de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sgyu 'phrul chen mos yang phyis bstan pa la mi sgrib par bye ba'i
13b1(rnying rgyud): ched du las kyi 'das pa 'di bka' stsal to// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu ru// khor yug dur khrod chen po ste// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal 'gyur nas// drag po 'dul ba'i don ched du// dkyil 'khor 'bar ba de dbus su// khrag 'thang ye
13b2(rnying rgyud): shes chen po ste// dbugasum phyag du ga zhabs bzhir bkrag// ser nag 'jigs pa chen po'i su// sangs rgyas khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // ma hA pa kha'i tshul du gzil// rnam par thar pa'i zhal gsum gyis// khams gsum ma sus rngu ba cing bsol/
13b3(rnying rgyud): thugs dam snying rje chen po yis// hU~M li dkyil 'khor chen por bsdus// rdo b+han d+har ldan pa yis// / drag chen po dag 'khrug cing gsol// 'jigs pa'i ral pa gyen du 'khyil// bskal pa'i me dbung chen po'i dbus// gshog/ sa drag po
13b4(rnying rgyud): grasam g.yo// rkan s+yA d+hag pos srog chags brgyal// spyugs pas bsod nams lhas 'jig cing // l+h+wam rkyen me dang mnyam par sbyor// sdig pa rje barmAng rdzi rgu zhing // phyagan bsdams shing ril me mdzad// stabs bla phyag rgya sngags chos
13b5(rnying rgyud): gres// zhing btu gsod cing tshul bzhin du// hu ha ha sa nI dgyes par mdzad// he ho has ni yum dang ro'o// hU~M hU~M hU~M gis char chen 'bebyas// phaT phaT phaT kyis ni byed ci// zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi grol zhing gnon// gzhal yas mthing nag chen pos
13b6(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten khams gsum gyur pa ste// klu chen rgyal po mang po rnams// khyad par chen po'i sku lnga brgyan// srog chags chen po'i pags chen yang // tsham ma chen po'i na bzar gsol// ci yang gyur yang gzugs can te// 'jigs
13b7(rnying rgyud): byed su tshe 'phrul ba// drig bral gsung gi ro mas// gsod cing 'thubyung ba'i chags chen po// snying medan sems khrag chen 'thung // gisong kying gyur ba'i mcho dpal// shin tu ces pachen pa du hU~M/ na/
14a1(rnying rgyud): Sh+TA he/ ta ha ha sa/ ru ru raH/ ka ka kar ma/ yo g+na ni/ rba ku tsa s+ya su sra r+tha/ rdo rigs chen ma bstod thugs// rlom khrag 'thung chen po ste// zla gsum phrag drug zhabs bzhir ba zang // keng chen gA zhib pa'i gdan tu 'as na/
14a2(rnying rgyud): zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi rab tu gnon// smug nag 'jigs pa chen po'i bu// rdo re khros pa'i tshul myo dang // ma hA swa pa'i tshul du 'khril// rnam par thar pa'i rnal gsum gyis// khams gsum mgris du cing gsol// thugs dam snying rje chen po
14a3(rnying rgyud): yis// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bsdus// nying rje nan d+har ldan pa yis// khrag chen po dag 'khrug cing gsol// 'jigs pa'i ral pa gyen du 'khril// bskal pa'i me pung chen po'i dbus// gshog bla drag pos stong gsum g.yo// rkam
14a4(rnying rgyud): sgras rigs kun brgyal zhing 'grub// spags pas bsod nams lus 'jig cing // yu ma chen mod dang mnyam par spod// sdig pa'i ri rab tri shUl zhing // / ga na bsdams shing khrag 'thung ba// sangs rgyas kun du bzang mo dang // rol pa'i tshul gyis
14a5(rnying rgyud): mnyam sbyor zhing // stabs klu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// zhing chen gsod cing lung mdzad pa// ha ha ha sa ni dgyes par mdzad// he he hes ni yum dang ro la// hUM hU~M gi sa char chen 'bebs// phaT phaT phaT gyis za byed che// gzhal yas stag nag chen
14a6(rnying rgyud): ste// 'jig rten skyong gsum mur+yA pa ste// thu chen rgyal po mang po rnams// khyad par chen po'i yul bag+h+nAn// srog chags chen po'i sngags rjen yang // maH mtshon po na bzar gsol// cir yang sbyar ba'i gzugs chen po// che'i dpal chen mo
14a7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas skye yang che mtshe ma gsol// srog chags gzhan lta spos ci dgos// 'jigs byed sku skye tshe 'phrul pa// drag phul ga sung gi ro yis// gsod zhing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po// snying rje mngan sems khrag chen 'thung // gsong ci sbyor ba
14b1(rnying rgyud): mchod pa la// shan tu dgyes pa chen por ston// thag 'brang 'bar ma ma gtogs par// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas// gsad pa'i rgyal shan tu byas// d+hItAM/ ta ta ha haha/ shAti 'ani tad tu/
14b2(rnying rgyud): tata sa/ rba rba rak+ta/ ka ke kar ma/ yo gi ni/ su su rba lu ru lu du lu ru lu d+h+waM/ rin chen rigs chen yon tan sra// rin chen khrag 'thung chen po ste// dbus sum phyag drug zhabs bzher bgrad// spyir tshe chung gdan la bzhugs// bdud pa
14b3(rnying rgyud): steng du brkyang bskam pa// nyon mongs lnga dag tshur gcod cing // mthe'u chung srin lag rtse gnyis kyis// a mr-i ta la sogs pa yi// bdud rtsi zil dang ra chen dro dag/ dung ba'i sku la rab brgyan cing // sngo gnag 'jigs pa chen po'i sgra// rin chen khos
14b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyal mo dang // ma hA mra pa'i tshul du 'khril// rnam par thar pa'i zhal gsum gyis// khams gsum mA lus rngub cing gsol// thugs de ma snying rje rdzun pa mas// yon tan dkyil 'khor chen por bzlas// dod+hA D+yan rnar ldan pa yis/
14b5(rnying rgyud): blag chen po dag 'khrug cing gsol// 'jigs pa'i ral pa gyen du 'khyil// bskal pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus// gshog sgra drag pos stong gsum g.yo// rgan skas yon tan rigs kun brlag/ skyugs pas bsodadran pas lus 'jig
14b6(rnying rgyud): cing // sum chen mo dang mnyam par sbyor// spyi ra'i glo sted 'byin rnying gsol// dgra s+yA t+ye shUl rgyu 'dren zhugs// phyag nA bstims shing khrag 'thung ba/ rin chen kun du bzang mo dang // rol pa'i tshul du mnyam sbyor zhing // stabs klu phyag
14b7(rnying rgyud): rgya sngags tshig gis// thams cad thams cad gcod par mdzad// rol pa chen po'i tshul bzhin du// brag chen po yang zhil gyis 'jib// ha ha ha sa ni dgyes par mdzad// he he he sa ni yum dang rol// d+hudz+dza hUM gos char chen 'bebs//
15a1(rnying rgyud): phaT phaT phaT kyis za byed che// gzhal yas sngo nag chen por ni// 'jig rten stong gsum gyur pa ste// klu chen rgyal po mang po rnams// khyad par chen po'i sku la brgyan// srog chags chen po'i pags pa yang // tsham dam chen po'i
15a2(rnying rgyud): na bzar gsol// ci yang sbyar ba'i gzugs can te// che'o che'o dpal chen po// sangs rgyas sku yang chem chem gsol// gzugs khams lha tshogs mang po yang // mgo yi phreng bas rgyan du byas// 'jigs byed sku ste cho 'phrul ba// drag shul gsung
15a3(rnying rgyud): gi nga ro yis// gsod cing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po// snying rje ma ngan sems khrag chen 'thung // gsod cing skyong pa'i mchod pa la// shin tu dgyes pa chen por ston// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin
15a4(rnying rgyud): thugs dam nyid pas na// gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// hU~M hU~M hUM/ ha ha ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ ha ha ha sa/ ru ru rak+ta/ ka ka kar ma/ yo gi ni/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM/ drag po 'dul ba'i don ched du// dkyil 'khor 'bad ba'i
15a5(rnying rgyud): phyogs dag tu// khrag 'thang padri chen po'i// mtshungs pa med pa'i byed par mdza// dasngags mthag dug babus pa zhing 'bring // dbang dag dgas pa chen pa rje// d+hi ba'i phyi'i byes ba // s+yAng+yas 'i tshul du 'phrul// rnam par dang pa'i
15a6(rnying rgyud): zhal gsum gyis// khams gsum ma lus rngub cing gsol// thugs dam snying rje chen po yis// gsung gi dkyil 'khor chen por bsdus// rdo rje b+han d+har ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang dkrug cing gsol// 'jigs pa'i ral pa gyen du 'khyil//
15a7(rnying rgyud): bskal pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus// gshog sgra drag pos stong gsum g.yo// rkan sgra drag pos srog chags brgyal// sprugs pas bsod nams lus 'jig cing // yum chen mo dang mnyam par sbyor// tri shwa rnge'u rdung rgya 'dren zhags//
15b1(rnying rgyud): na bsdams te sha khrag gsol// gzugs khams sna tshogs mang po dag/ dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa' yis// mgo yi phreng bas rgyun du byas// dgongs nges btsan thabs chen pos myos// 'dod chags bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa yis// gzug
15b2(rnying rgyud): can byed med lus kun sdud// nga rgyal bsnyengs pa'i mthu yis ni// bsod nams can rnams thams cad gnon// phrag dog bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa yis// gzugs kun kun bsdus 'phrog cing sbyor// gti mug bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa yis// dbye
15b3(rnying rgyud): bsal mi mdzad nges pa'i thugs// mchod do mchod do stobs chen po// bdag la bdag mchod mnyes pa che// khro mo pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// 'jigs pa'i stabs dang gar mdzad pas// mi bzad mkha' 'gro'i klong chen 'byung // stabs klu phyug
15b4(rnying rgyud): rgya sngags tshig gis// zhing bcu gsod cing tshul bzhin du// dngos la longs spyod chen por mdzad// ha ha ha sa ni dgyes par mdzad// he he te sa ni yum dang rol// hU~M hU~M hU~M gis char che na 'bebs// phaT phaT phaT gyis za byad che// zhabs bzhi
15b5(rnying rgyud): bdud pa ni sgrol zhing gnon// gzhal yas dmar nag chen por ni// 'jig rten khams gsum gyur pa ste// klu chen rgyal po mang po rnams// khyad par chen po'i sgra la brgyan// srog chags chen po'i pags chen yang // tshom ngam chen po'i na bzar
15b6(rnying rgyud): gsol// cir yang sbyar ba'i gzugs chen te// 'jigs byed sgra ste cho 'phrul ba// drag shul gsung gi nga ro yis// gsod cing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po// steng rje mngan sems khrag chen 'thung // gsod cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa la// shing
15b7(rnying rgyud): tu dgyes pa chen por ston// hUM hU~M hUM/ ha ta ha ha ha// b+hU ti ShA hi ShA hi/ ha ha ha sa/ rba rba rak+ta/ ka ka kar ma/ yo ge ni/ rba lu ru wa ru lu dra lu ru lu hU~Mb+h+yo hUM/ drag po'i dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa// dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i phyogs dag tu/
16a1(rnying rgyud): klub 'thung las kyi gag kyang rnags// lkug+sas drug drug na shAr shA// lung nag du gsu pa rdzun pa'as// las rgyas pa mas padag/ ngan su na la dul ba// rnam pa ba pa'o lag samams// dang /
16a2(rnying rgyud): gsum ma lus chub cing gsol// thugs dam sbyi rje chen po yis// sbyor khams rnam pa mang bu rnams// sde yi dkyil 'khor chen por bzlas// rdonathun dur ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang 'jug cing gsos// 'jigs pa'i ngal pa gyen du 'byi/
16a3(rnying rgyud): bskal pa'i sred dpur chen po'i dkyug// gshog bla drag pos stong gsum g.yo// rkan+da rje rdzag pas chog chags brtsal// skyugs pas bsod nams lus 'dug cing // yam chen mor du mnyam par spyor// sugram dbyug pa rde'u chung dang // the sha'i
16a4(rnying rgyud): rgyu zhugs 'dren// tshems rnon ster za byed che// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// zhing bcu gsod cing tshul bzhin du// phrin las dkyil 'khor nyid la mchod// ha ha ha sa ni dgyes par mdzad// he he ho sa ni yu ma dang rol/ zhes
16a5(rnying rgyud): tshong chen 'bebs// phaT phaT phaT kyis rba byed che// zhabs bzhi bdud ba'i sgrol zhing gnon// gzhal yas d+ha nag chen por ni// 'jig rten khams gsum gyur pa ste// ku chen rgyal po mang po rnams// khyad par chen po'i thul brgya/ srog chag
16a6(rnying rgyud): chen po'i bkas dz+nyAn yang // tshe meng ma chen po'i na bzla gsol// cir yang sbar ba'i gzugs chen po// che tho che'o dpal chen po// sangs rgyas skra yang chem chem gsol// srog chags gzhan lta spos ci sa// 'jigs te waM cho 'phrul
16a7(rnying rgyud): drag shul gsung ging ro yis// gsong kying 'thung ba'i tshogs med do// hU~M mngan soms chag chen dang // gsod cing sbyor ba'i myo pal// shin tu byas pa rjod par koH// khrag 'thung 'bar ba gas par// pa/
16b1(rnying rgyud): da// da nan thags sa pasan// gas pa' las pa gan ngas/ NA r+tha/ dz+nyAH \u0f7f/ / sa// kA sa/ ga/ dmyangs du lanas ts+tshaH/ sanganams
16b2(rnying rgyud): ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// kro rti sha ri de bzhin rigs// dbug sum thug drug zhabs pazhir bzad// khrog nyer spyan gsum mche gtsigs shing // dbu sra mu Sh+Ta rgya cings te// tha~Md rnon mang pos rgyan du bya so// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i snga
16b3(rnying rgyud): mig can// ser nag gyad kyi 'dod tshul du// b+hAn+d+har k+Shar ldan pa yis// 'khril pa'i rgyal gyis gcol stobs// dur khrod 'bar ba'i mechen dbus// zhabs bzhi ba rkyang ba skum gnon tshul du// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan li bzhugs//
16b4(rnying rgyud): gshibs pa'i gshog rkyong zhing // srin lag mthe bong rtse gnyis kyis// a mr-i t+pa la sogs pam+b+ha// blangs te thugs dam sprul bar mdzad// dgyes pas ngo rje pad+mar 'dog/ rol phyir stan mchog kyang mdod// ka la gyi la dgyes pas rol// rdong byug rdzi
16b5(rnying rgyud): shUl s+thir ba// a oM hU~M hi gad mos 'gengs// thugs dam sku yi dkyil 'khor du// 'jig rten rdo srid thams cad skad// khams gsus kun gyi dbang slar mdzad// sangs rgyas kun gyi sum chen mo// pags rkyen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol//
16b6(rnying rgyud): dpal chen 'bar ba ma gtogs par// spyan kyang thal ba bzhin du rnyog/ zlos pa'i snying rje g.yos pa na// thabs chen po yang ches che ma gsol// zhe sdang chen po'i dgyes rkyen yang // rol pas dbang du bsdus nas ni// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du
16b7(rnying rgyud): stongs// zas pa phrag chags kunags pa 'o// mdums sa slo ba rgya cing // thugs mdzad pa chen tha mas// thag 'phru chen pa 'dum pa di// yid du 'ang ba'i zugs sbyin zung // nyims ni gyi brnas par mdzad // rnas rgyang
17a1(rnying rgyud): drug rtenam// dmamag can pa dang sa thab sten// / khyams pas sa 'ag+sa ba da // rlu na sta/ la dugaslog// dras sa ga ba zung ba rnams// rgyumachom mam myos phul du gsol// sang cig sang cig dpas
17a2(rnying rgyud): yum// choms shig choms shig dpal gyi yum// gtogs shig gtogs shig dpal gyi yu ma// sregs shig sregs shig dpal gyi yum// chings shig chings shig dpal gyi yum// gnod par byed pa'i bdud rnams kun// rab tu drongs pa
17a3(rnying rgyud): rdul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stsongs// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzod de// de bzhin thags dam nyid pas na// gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// tatwa nA// shAna~M khA ti/ Sha ti/ A sa
17a4(rnying rgyud): ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA/ sid d+ha rA be dza/ l-i hI nA lA sha ta tsa ra na a khi ya me hu b+ho ga yo ka sa ma yo b+ha be/ ta tsa la sarba yo gi ma hA na ra r+the/ rak+Sha dzA ya/ so khya ma nu bi la si/ ka ba sa ma le ma ku d+ha/ tri shU la rak+Sha b+ho ga yo ga ni/ ma hA sa twa ma N+Da la ti la
17a5(rnying rgyud): na/ al la na// rdo rnam chin rgyal gcig sa// kroN+Di shA'i dpal na/ yum// sangs rbas k+Sha yid bkur can// nyis 'bris skyeg marnam// gang dus 'bram cu gangan la bzhugs// swA nag nyid kyi 'dor tshul du// na d+ha/ @
17a6(rnying rgyud): stobs// gdug bu'i tshogs nan mang po rnams// mnyes byed phyir na m+b+ha la ba khrel// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs h+la nir bgrang // sgyo gA ti spen bathang mcho gtsigs shing // dang grA m+le Sh+Ta n+ya bcings te// tha~Mng rnon meng pas rkyen du byas// smanas
17a7(rnying rgyud): jigs pa'i sdang mig can// tsi d+he'i glo snying mang po rnams// zhal du gsol nas 'khril zhing bzhugs// chags pa'i gar thabs chen po yis// gadrug pa chen po'i spyan 'gro zhing // las su gsod la shin tu dgyes// dur khrod 'bar ba'i chen du
17b1(rnying rgyud): du ldan byags// dug sa na da // kun shAn sa smo na// ma sa // da // sa na na ldan ma rnam na/
17b2(rnying rgyud): ki las rol pas dgyes// rdo rje rde zung rdung ba dang // d+hI shul 'phen cing stir za// a a ti hi gad mos 'gengs// thugasu dam sgra yi dkyil 'khor du// 'jig rten ji srid thams cad sdung // khams gsum kun gyi dbang sgrar mdzod// sangs rgyas kun
17b3(rnying rgyud): yum chen mo// pags chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// dpal chen 'bar ba ma gtogs par// kun kyang thal ba bzhin du d+hog/ khros pa'i nying rje g.yos pas na// thabs chen po yang rjem che ma gsol// zhe sdang chen po'i bgegs chen yang // rol
17b4(rnying rgyud): bas dbang du bsdus nas ni// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// se re la kha yi tshul dag tu// kha T+wA~M ga la rgyab brten byas// rol la rngam pa'i cha lugs kyis// bka' las 'das pa 'phrog cing gsol// zas sna srog chags kun gsol pa/
17b5(rnying rgyud): bla mesas sku brgyan cing // zla ga ma mchod pa chen pos ni// khrag 'thung ba yi mdog skyed cig// yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs ston cing // nyams na rab tu brlag par mdzad// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo ste// dmachog can la dngos grub sbyin// khams
17b6(rnying rgyud): gesum khrag tu bsgyur nas ni// rgyab rtsub chub kyi sa zhal du gsol// keng rnas rdul gyi go na rnams// chem tshom gyis ni zhal du gsol// sid cigasod cig do rje yum// tshoms shig tshoms shig rdo rje yum// gtogs shig gtogs shig rdo rje
17b7(rnying rgyud): ma// grags shig sregs shig rdo rje su ma// chings shig chings shig rdo sum// gnod par byed pa'i bdud rnams kyang // rab tu rmongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'byung chen po'i nal dru stobs// drug 'thung 'bang ba mu gtugs pa// gcig
18a1(rnying rgyud): kyang gson par me mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsang pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// au d+h+waMs na kar rA ba// rak+ta ng+ka la se par+b+ba tA thA ga ta sidar+d+ha kA ya rA ba/ pany+tsa tsita tA thA ga ta r+N+Na ba/ ta thA ga ta b+hags tu/ ya ga yog
18a2(rnying rgyud): dz+wa laH/ ha na bar d+ha na A la la la to// rkyen chen khros pa'i rgyal gcig ma// tshad med pa ni yi yon tan dz+nyAn// bkres rlom mongs la gter sbyin mdzad// rang bzhin rnal 'byor yid bzhin gter// mi zang mdzong du gyur pas na// rdul 'byor ma zhes
18a3(rnying rgyud): mtshan du gsol// ye shes khro mo blo rgyal gtso// dag pas mtshon rdzogs rgyal ba'i yum// mthing nag khyed kyi 'dod tshul gyis// nyan d+ha rak+ta gcol stobs// nyi ma 'bram gyi gzi ldan ma// gdug pa'i tshogs chen mang po rnams// mnyes pa'i phyir ni sprul
18a4(rnying rgyud): 'brel// nu 'bur stod smad dbye zhing 'gyir// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir 'grad// g.yon du 'gying stabs sbyong ba yis// thal zla drag pos gdug pa gsod// khro gnyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs shing // rab sgra sa grwa bcings shing //
18a5(rnying rgyud): na mang pos shA rnaMs// stan ga gas 'a sa pa'i bang sho cing// na lags ca gcu zlal nas kyang // nam dragasal nas chags pas 'byung // chags pa'i gar bab sun pos // bcwag de'i nga /
18a6(rnying rgyud): gsod la sbyin tu s+t+wa~M ste// du ro khyod 'bar ba'i me chen dbus// zhabs ni brgya gsum chen pos ni// zhing chen ga shibs pa'i gang nal 'azhugs// man gzhibs na shog sbyong zhir // srin lcag skar gyis khrag chen 'thung // skye
18a7(rnying rgyud): rib jog/ rol bye sa ni mchog kyang mdzad// kal ki las da kyis pas ral// dbyug pa dzin chung ba 'dzin// oM byung yin gsunags la nang // ma ban chos 'gangs// rol la da nas tsha tha~M gas
18b1(rnying rgyud): pas dgyes mdzad pa'i// thugs dam sku yi dkyil 'khor du// gsad pa'i drang khrod kun gsol mdzad// khams gsum kun gyi dbang mdzad ma// sangs kyus kun gyi yum chen mo// pags chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// dpal chen 'bar ba ma
18b2(rnying rgyud): gtogs par// kun kyang thal ba bzhin du rlog/ khros pa'i snying rje g.yos pa na// thabs chen po yang che ma tshe ma gsol// zhe sdang chen po'i bgegs chen yang // rol pas dbang du bsdus nas ni// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du skyobs// rol
18b3(rnying rgyud): brkam pa'i yum chen mo// bka' las 'das pa 'phrog cing gsol// zas su srog chags kun gsol ba// ma hA maM sas sku brgyan cing // zla gam mchod pa chen pos ni// khrag 'thung ba yang 'dzum par mdzad// yid du 'ong ba'i
18b4(rnying rgyud): gzugs ston pas// nyams na rab tu brlag par mdzad// rdul 'byor yum chen chen mo ste// dam tshig can la dngos grub sbyin// khams gsum khrag tu bsgyur nas ni// hung thub kyis ni zhal du gsol// steng che chung mang po rnams// che ma chem
18b5(rnying rgyud): kyis ni zhal du gsol// sod cig sod cig rin chen yum// choms shig tshams shig rin chen yum// gtogs shig gtogs shig rin chen yum// sregs shig sregs shig rin chen yum// chings shig chings shig rin che nu yum// gnod
18b6(rnying rgyud): par byed pa'i bdud rnams kyang // rab tu rol la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par// gcag kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsang pa'i las la shin tu
18b7(rnying rgyud): dgyes// oM hU~M sangs rgyas kun gyi mi zad rgyan dang ldan pa rang bzhin te ru dpal// dur khrod bdag po za byed yum chen mo// kyal ba kun gyi yon tan gter ldan ma// byang chub snying po'i dgongs pa res sngon bsdams shing gsol// rmongs pa log pa
19a1(rnying rgyud): dang ldan rnams drongs la tshul bzhin stobs// kun gyi dbang mo dbang dang ldan pa'i yum chan kun rol cig/ sems dpa' khrag 'thung nyid kyang sku la thim par rol// khrag chen bsnol zhing glo snying za la brkam pas rnal 'byor kun gyi las mdzad
19a2(rnying rgyud): cig/ bdag dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad rdzogs pa yin// a la la li ho// sku gsung thugs ldan rnal 'byor ma// pad+ma'i gsung gi sangs rgyas yum// chags pa'i pad+ma rmA cig ma// yum chen gro d+hi shwa ri ste// sangs rgyas wa yi dbu
19a3(rnying rgyud): rgyan can// dmar nag sku yi cha lugs ma// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// rdo rje b+han d+har ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol// chags pa'i thal mo brkyang nas kyang // khrag 'thung pad+ma'i sku la 'khril// glog stong 'gyur ba'i
19a4(rnying rgyud): 'od mnga' bas// mun pa nag po thibs po sel// skad mig mche gtsigs tshems rnon gsod// dza 'u chung rdung zhing stir chen za// sha khrag 'dzag cing ro la brkam// bya byed mang po'i nus mthu yis// lha chen po yi mgo yang 'grems// tshangs pa chen
19a5(rnying rgyud): bo'i pags chen yang // yum chen mo yin bzar gsol// muny+dzu rjod pa nar la ba can// gdug pa tshogs chen mang pos bskod// zong rnon rgyan gyi phreng bas brgyan// brkyang bskum sti 'i gdan stengs na// gyad kyi dgyes pa'i 'dor tshul gyis// sman
19a6(rnying rgyud): byed cing rol brnam// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// bgegs chen kun+da la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po zhal du stobs// bskal pa'i me dbyung chen po'i dbus// tshogs pa do lA la tshul bzhin du// dang ba'i sgra la can du byas/
19a7(rnying rgyud): ngam drag shul sder tshogs dang // dur khrod las la shin tu dgyes// 'di dag dgongs pa'i dam tshig ste// de bzhin ma byas nyid sgrol zhes// rnabang phyug rgyal pos rab tu gsungs so// oM pan+d+ha rU pe b+hI ta drA pe b+hi ta rU la pad+me ma mgro d+ho shA ri sa ma pa
19b1(rnying rgyud): nag/ // tu
19b2(rnying rgyud): sa byung sde 'ad bas sa/ sa la // rdul chen tan rlol panas/ khon shA yi no// dbugasam thag tu pas pan bzang // tha shir nga mig macig nyi shing/ ma 'jam
19b3(rnying rgyud): bdag pa rdzog na ma pa rnams/ tshul / sde thang ba myed kyi cing // gaslon pa gying sa su myong ba yis// ga thos gdug pagang // da na ngas shing // zang tu meng bas cad
19b4(rnying rgyud): gsusu 'jigs pa'i skang mig cen// yan lag nang grol drings nas byung // zhal du gsi la nas chags pas 'khril// rdzogs pa gar thabs rnon po yis// gdug pa chen po'i sprin 'gro dang // las su gsod la shin tu dgyes// drang khrung 'a
19b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i mi chen nas// 'bus pazhi brgyad bsram dzA lus yang // mtshig chen bdun la bkrugs// badrug shisas pa'i ga shig tsang shing / khyim pa zlar gyis zhag rten jing / darjes pas rdo rjeb 'jog/ tha~Mng stan na
19b6(rnying rgyud): mdzad// kAm+ba ki las dgyes pas ran// de lA~M g-i d+hag tu na rgyang zhing // 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis b+hagan pa rnams/ b+h+ri dgas pa na cing gsol// A m+b+ha tI bzhid rnaMs kris// da ba'i marnams sto gas pa/
19b7(rnying rgyud): gas pa pa kyis // gas sa na sa du su
20a1(rnying rgyud): chen 'byar ba ma gtogs pa// kun kyang thal ba bzhin du rnyog/ khos pa'i snying rje g.yos pa na// thabs chen po yang chemachem gsol// zhe sdang chen po'i bgegs chen yang // rol pas dbang du bsdus nas ni// khrag 'thung las
20a2(rnying rgyud): kyi zhal du stobs// ro la brkam pa'i yum chen mo// bka' las 'dis pa 'phrog cing gsol// zas su srog chags kun gsol ba// ma hA maM sas sku brgyan cing // zla gam mchod pa chen po stobs// yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs ston pas//
20a3(rnying rgyud): nyams na rab tu brlag par mdzad// rnal 'byor yum gcig chen mo dang // dam tshig can la dngos grub sbyin// khams gsum khrag tu bsgyur nas ni// thub tub kyis ni zhal du gsol// snying che chung mang po rnams// chem chem gyis ni zhal
20a4(rnying rgyud): gsol// sod cig sod cig las kyi yum// mas shig choms shig las kyi yum// gtogs shig gtogs shig las kyi yum// rtings shig sdoms shig las kyi yum// sregs shig snyoms shig las kyi yum// gnod par byed pa'i
20a5(rnying rgyud): bdud rnams kyang // rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs pa// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// ha ha
20a6(rnying rgyud): khA hi khA hi// oM hU~M las suM gsod la dga' ba'i rnal 'byor ma// bde gshegs las kyi rigs kun k+ta la rdzogs par rab snang yum chen mo// tsham ngam brlang ba'i tha stangs glar dang bcas te gtso la stobs// kun gyi dbang dang ldan pa bsod nams lus
20a7(rnying rgyud): la dbang sgyur ma// sder chags mang po'i tshogs dang bcas te rol cing dgyes par mdzod// sha khrag dmar chen mchog la dga' bas dang du kun long la// rnal 'byor dam tshig can la byin gyis rlobs// a la la to// dpal chen 'bar ba'i
20b1(rnying rgyud): brags kanas// rnam par bsgyur ba'i gzugs byung ba// tsi yang 'gyur ba'i sku mnga' ba// rdul 'byor rje gnag kewa na ma?// khro gnyar stan bgrad mcho ga zugs shang // ral pa 'khyil ba'i mu lA pa// bung na tshogs kyis rnam par bcad// dbugasam
20b2(rnying rgyud): phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// mi grags rlan pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// stir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sgra yi rgyan d+ha thAs// 'jig rten sreg pa'i me dkyil nas// tsam ngas gzugs kyu chen po mas// zhing chen gshegs pa danas
20b3(rnying rgyud): na// bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rdo rje D+yan tu ldan pa yis// wazla chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol// rdzid chen mo b+h+ri dren tshul du// khrabru 'thung chen po'i zhal du stogs// zla' pa nga chur phyag na bsnams// na
20b4(rnying rgyud): skra da // dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se grol sngol mar gtogs nas ni// wI bcu drangs nas tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs kyu b+ha ga r+b+ha sngags tshig gos// log pang
20b5(rnying rgyud): skye ba'i bdud rnams kun// tsam ng+yam smras ni tshul bzhin du// dbang du bslab ma nas ni// de la brnam pa'i stangs kyis su// thAg 'thung chen po'i zhalaM d+ha rmobs// rol thig lba la ciganal 'byor ma// snod cag ljongs kyi gan pa byor ma/ gan
20b6(rnying rgyud): sun byepa// niTIm ga sa smyigs pa sa/ 'dzin nu skye nyid pa 'a/ madrwa ba'i na na sa/ kyi sa dang / su ni ga yongs she // rdzongs gas rims shig tu/
20b7(rnying rgyud): rol cig rol cig phaT phaT// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ sgra yi dkyil 'khor mdzod sbyong ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// rnal 'byor ser na gtso rI ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs 'chang ba// khro ga nyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs
21a1(rnying rgyud): nga na nan ga / ma nga rdzun// sa na sa// na sa ga duganogasas sa nan sa la
21a2(rnying rgyud): byas// 'jig rten theg pa'i med kyi lan pa// mam ma bkyang 'brum chen po ni// zhing chen gshegs pa'i gdon gangs de// bdu pa'i gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rdorje snyed d+ha ldan pa yaH// thag chen po yang la gsam
21a3(rnying rgyud): dzin // 'ang+gal buM chen po sbyin la su byas// dza ga shul mdang 'dzin dgangs pa yis// dpal chen bar ba'i thugs gang gas// de zhing ni shAl phyagan pa rnams// 'jigs su ru bzhin na dang // des pa chen
21a4(rnying rgyud): sa// / ni 'a la ma tog sa da de/ dring dra pa te dril bzhin du// 'drang bang 'i tshul / ngas ba na kyi mam chen / sa ga mchags/
21a5(rnying rgyud): bdun nas pa / ga na // dang btsun dang / 'ag rdung bar ba sto // rangs sa / ba pa pa
21a6(rnying rgyud): gsung sa
21a7(rnying rgyud): ngas sa sbyi da 'a na khrig na dus zhen du
21b1(rnying rgyud): cag nga// dbazhinam thas pa nyid brtag/ son pa ra dmar dgas// khrog ter sman pa blang mche gtsigs shing // 'dugs sa drang ba bapung mig rlu// das bas bcings shing // blad rje mang bang cod pan can// d+ma'i phreng bas dang /
21b2(rnying rgyud): sbyi me badzin pa par gas pa// mi lags g.yang gzhags pabs chen// dbugs ma thag drug gams zin bzad// gsung gi dkyil 'khor yang du gto ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// rnal 'byor can mo pra maH/
21b3(rnying rgyud): skrong mang pa'i tshogs dang ni// bsung chen sreg pa'i mtshan dbus// tsam dam bcung bskam can pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan spongs na// bdud pazhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs// ngadza thAn+da dang ldan pa yis// khrag zhan po dag 'arjid kyi
21b4(rnying rgyud): stso// ster chen ze nying 'dren tshul du// khrag 'thang chen po'i zhal du stobs// mu srin rgyal mtshan de'u chung dung // 'jigs su rung ba'i rgan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i sprugs pa las// sa~M hU~M pa dz+wAl ma gtogs nas te// rnying brda dngas
21b5(rnying rgyud): te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung 'brar ba'i zhal du stobs// khams gsum za byed zhal du stobs// pad+ma gsung gi yum chen mo// gzhal yas dmar nag chen po nas// stobs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen
21b6(rnying rgyud): kun// dzam dam spus ni tshul bzhin du// dbang du bsdu ba mdzad nas ni// gar mkhan chen mo'i stobs tshul gyis// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khro mo rnal 'byor khyod kyis rol// khro mo rnal 'byor khyod kyis sod// khro morna la
21b7(rnying rgyud): 'byor khyod kyis ni// longs shig rmongs la tshul bzhin du// gtogs shig sbyongs la bsdams su gsol// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ ha ha ha// bA hi khA tiSh+Tha hi/ rnal 'byor khro mo mthing nag
22a1(rnying rgyud): swA// snying chen za ba'i ba tA rI// lkog nyer lhan bgrangs na gtsigs shing // 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ral bA 'khyil ba'i sram+b+ha la// rngad tron tshogs kyis rnam par brgyad// grag sam b+ha gadrag dngas bzhi
22a2(rnying rgyud): babrang // mi lpags rlon pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// snyir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// btus nas sgra yi kun du byas// 'jig rten sreg pa'i me dkyil na// tsham rim brkyang bskul chen pos ni// zhing chen gshengs par gdon stongasad// brdung ba'i
22a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rdo rjes gdug pa'i glang chen 'gams// 'khril bas kyad kyi 'drar yul du// b+hin d+ha rak+tas zhal du stogs// snying chen mazhing rnge'u chung rung // ra chen blo sted 'drem tshul rnga// khrag chen sa/ 'ja
22a4(rnying rgyud): su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i sprugs pa yis// se gol snol mur gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'drang chen po'i zhal du stobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs klu phyag rgya sngag gis//
22a5(rnying rgyud): par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun// tshwam ngam skyes ni tshul bzhin du// dbang du bsdu ba mdzad nas ni// ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// rol tsog sprul cig rdul 'gyur ma// snod sdig yongs shi rdul
22a6(rnying rgyud): 'byor ma// gtor cig spongs shig rnal 'byor ma// choms shig snyoms shig rna 'byed ma// de bzhin thugs dam nyid bas na// gsad pa'i las la shing tu dgyes// drongs shi drongs na/ tshangs shi zhin
22a7(rnying rgyud): sdoms shig sdoms shig ha ha ha/ cig skab cig pa / gas/ nga byeng srugatsigs nga/ 'dzim
22b1(rnying rgyud): ral pa 'thal pa'i brtul// rbad du phyogasasas rnam par brtan// dag gsum phyagadrug dpas pazhing bzad// ma dzags rngon pa'i g.yang gnags la// da rmad du mang pa tshogs// brgyus nas thu rkun du byas// dung zad ngan par mdzan
22b2(rnying rgyud): chen po'i zhal du stobs// tri shUl 'phen tshul rnge'u chung zhags// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan skra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i sprugs pa dang // se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i napa du
22b3(rnying rgyud): stobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// log par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// ro la brkam pa'i tha stangs kyis// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// rol cig
22b4(rnying rgyud): sprul cig rnal 'byor ma// sod cig longs shig rnal 'byor ma// gtogs shig spongs shig nal 'byor ma// choms shig tshams shig rnal 'byor ma// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gras dra pa'i las laM shin tu dgyes// drongs shig rdungs
22b5(rnying rgyud): shig dzaH dziHdzaH/ tshangs shig mings shig hU~M hU~M hU~M// snyoms shig sdoms shig ha hA ha// sgrol TIg krol cig phaT phaT phaT// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ hU~M hUM hU~M hU~M/ Sh+ye ti/ khA d+hi ShA ti khA ti ShA ti/ rnal 'byor khro mo ser nags// sbyi
22b6(rnying rgyud): chen za ba'i tsaN+DA lI/ gtum mo chen mo zhe sdang 'joms// tha gnyerare spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing // 'jigs su rung ba'i sbrang mig can// spyir chen nang khrol 'byon cing gsol// ral pa 'khyil pa'i mum+b+ha la// thong rnon tshogs kyis
23a1(rnying rgyud): rnam par brgyan// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// zhing lpags sar pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// ster chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// bzlas nas su pi rdzun du byas// drar khrod chen po mi chen dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskam chen
23a2(rnying rgyud): pos ni// rin chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na// bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rdo rje b+han d+har ldan pa yis// khrag chen po dag 'khrug cing gsol// tri shU la rnge'u chung phyag na bsdams// 'jigs su drang ba'i rkan sde dang /
23a3(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa chen po'i skyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du spobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs klu phyag tu sngags tshig gis// log par
23a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdud rnams kun// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// ro la brkam pa'i zla stangs kyis// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// rol cig sprul cig rnal 'byor ma// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsad pa'i las la shi
23a5(rnying rgyud): dgyes// drongs shig drongs shika dzaHdzaHdzaH// chings shig chings shig hU~M hU~M hU~M// sdoms shig sdoms shig hA ha ha// sprol cig sgrol cig phreMT phaT phaT// de bzhin ma g+has de nyid brlag/ rnal 'byor khro mo mthing nag s+tha// sri chen
23a6(rnying rgyud): za ba'i yum chen mo// chags pa chen mo sme shA nA// khro gnyer spyan bathang mche gtsigs shing // 'jigs su rung ba'i sdong mig can// rol pas ster chen 'dren tshul du// khrag 'byung chen po'i zhal du stobs// ral pa lagyis pa'i murga la/
23a7(rnying rgyud): thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// zhi lpags sar pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// stir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brkus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus
23b1(rnying rgyud): ram brgyar bskum chen po yis// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na// bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rdo rje b+han d+har ldan pa yis// khrug chen po yang dkrug cing gsol// sgra gri 'debs shing rnge'u chung rdung // 'jigs su rung ba'in
23b2(rnying rgyud): sgra dang // degyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// gzhal yas mthing nag chen mo nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stobs @
23b3(rnying rgyud): phyag gya sngags tshig gis// phog par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun// ro la brkam pa'i tha stangs kyis// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// rol cig sbrul cig rnal 'byor ma// sod ci gsod cig rnal 'byor ma// gtogs shig sbreng sa shig rnal
23b4(rnying rgyud): 'byor ma// choms shig choms shig rnal 'byor ma// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas ni// gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// drongs shig drong pa shog daHnga \u0f7fdzaH// chings shig chings shig hrI ts+tsha hUM// sdoms shig sdoms shig ha hA ha// sgrol
23b5(rnying rgyud): cig sgrol cig phaT phaT phaT// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ rnal 'byor khro mo dmar ser sku// gsod byed snying chen zab mo// rolnga pa'i rnal 'byor puk+ka sI// khro gnyer spun bgrang mche gtsigs shing // spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig
23b6(rnying rgyud): can// rol pas stir chen 'dren tshul du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// ral po 'khyil ba'i muny+dza la// thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// ma hA rak+tas sku brgyan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgyud// ye shes
23b7(rnying rgyud): spu yi cha lugs kyis// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// ste chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// bgyis nas sku yi rgyan du byas// srin lag mthe bong rtse sprad de// a mr-i ta la sogs pa lnga// sngags lam dbang por sku brgyan cing //
24a1(rnying rgyud): a \u0f7fsra kas dgyes shing 'ahrIlA// dur khrong can ma rnam kyil dngas// tsham dam btud bsgom dus // zhing madrug shibs pa'i gangad du byungs na// bdud bzhi gnon pa'i rdul na ba zhugs// bya sa 'a
24a2(rnying rgyud): thugs dam sgong // 'das na lha yang brlag pa'i phyir// lha chen mang po'i klad 'grems shing // bsod nams sgra yang chematshem gsol// rdo rje b+han d+har ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang dkrun cing gsol// zangs kyi rnon pos yan lag gcod
24a3(rnying rgyud): rda'u chung rdung zhing kha T+wA~M 'phen// sha khrag za ba'i rnal dpyor ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan skra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i skyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'jung chen po'i zham
24a4(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas dmar nag chen po nas// sangs rgyas sku yi yum chen mo// stobs glu lhag rgya sngags tshig gis// log par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun// po la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis// rab tu drangs pa tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du
24a5(rnying rgyud): stobs// rol cig srul cig nal 'byor ma// oM cig longs shig rdul 'byor pa// gau trogs shig sbyongs shig rnal 'byor mA// rtogs shig tshoms shig rnal 'byor ma// khrag 'thung 'byung ba ma ga rtogs par// gcig kyang gson par mi ma ra
24a6(rnying rgyud): rmi mi sa
24b1(rnying rgyud): kUnga? Sh+Tika/ myahA stsa len/ bzang su khye nas mA pa log dA la a sA yA/ bag yog gi/ a la la hoH/ chu khrug sang byad seng ge'i mag// ser nAg kyang gyu gying stabs kyis// phyag gi rnal ma bsngol nas te// ngag dbyung chen pa'i da du
24b2(rnying rgyud): stobs// khro gnyar sun bgrad mche gtsigs shing // sun gsum 'jigs pa'i sngar mig can// mche tshogs mang po'i 'khor du byas// zhe sdang 'joms ma'i ze byed ma// ma hA dkyus su can cing // dbu gsum phyeg drug zhabs paskor 'greng// mthing dag
24b3(rnying rgyud): seng ge'i ral ba phyar// thod rnon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// ye shes sku yi cha lugs na// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// s+thir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brkus nas sku pa can du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil nas// tshim ngam
24b4(rnying rgyud): brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs bzhugs// bka' las mi 'da' phrugs dam skong // srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing // bsod nams lus byo che mtsho ma gsol// b+han d+ha dak+tas zhal du stobs// rdo rje klang
24b5(rnying rgyud): 'gems rnge'u chung drung // zhing chen za ba'i mu khA ste// 'jigs su rung ba'i rgan sla dang // dgyes pa chen po'i sngags pa yis// se gol sgrol mAr gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du nyo bste/
24b6(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma// stabs kyu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams// ro la brkam pa'i tha stangs kyis// rab tu drongs lnga tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de
24b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu khA gsod byed stag gi mgo// dmar nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can// phyag gnyis bdud rtsi thal sbyar zhing // shin tu dga' ba'i mdangs kyis 'khril// khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing // spyan
25a1(rnying rgyud): bam da ga / gas du // ma pa gyur pa// saSh+Ta ste// brgya // dbyags sa phyag na badz+ra// sas rnam pa ga
25a2(rnying rgyud): yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i ga yang gzhi gsol// se ra la kha le tshul dag tu// thod rnon phre bas lus brgyan cing // dur khrong chen po'i me dgyel dbus// tsha ma ngam brkyang btu mchen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs/
