25a3(rnying rgyud): bka' las mi 'dra' thugs dam stong // srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing // bsod nams lus kyang zil the ma gsol// b+han d+ha b+haka le bu spobs// dgu sas thad 'gems lcag sa hAs 'dren// rde'u rdzang rdung zhing snying chen za// 'jigs su rung ba
25a4(rnying rgyud): nanu sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i sprugs pa yis// se gol sgrol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag thung chen po'i zhal du skyobs// khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma// skyabs gre cag tu sngags tshig gis// bang
25a5(rnying rgyud): gcod pa'i bgegs chen rnams// ro la brkam pa'i tha stangs kyis// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen pa'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma bras de nyid brlag/ mu khA gsor byed dung rkun mgo// sngo gnag cad kyi 'gying stabs kyis// steng rlung
25a6(rnying rgyud): nide gtso la stobs// khro gnyer spyan bgrad mtsho gtsigs shing // spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sngang mig can// mche tshogs mang po 'khor du byas// 'dod chags 'joms ma'i za byed ma// thal len dgrus skra brtan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs pa zhi
25a7(rnying rgyud): bgrang // grod rnon tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan// ye shas kyu yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor be g.yang gzhi gsol// se la kha la rdul dag tu// thong rjo mang po'i phreng bas brgyan// dur khrod chen po mau tso la dbyar// tshim ngas brgyang btu mtshan
25b1(rnying rgyud): do// nga zin gzhabs pa'i gad pa 'anugs// bkang las pa dang thugs dang blang// srog cags can po'i dzin cing// bsod nam su du ga bam rnamagasapa// sa cag gso du jung byed// 'a sa tu nga // sadang/
25b2(rnying rgyud): dgang nga'i bu ltag// zhags pas 'ang por du' 'grom// 'jigs su rung ba'i nan d+ha dang // dkyis gyid pa'i phyogs pa yis// migo sgrol ma gtogs nas s+ho// rdzas kyi kyis kyi mnas cig gis// nga byed pa'i da sa da /
25b3(rnying rgyud): rdol panam pa'i bsungs gis// rab tu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du spobs// de bzhin mo gyis de tid badrug/ mu lde gsod byed shAna'i mgo// mA ping nag kyang kyi 'gyeng stang sa can// glo sting 'dren cing gtso stongs//
25b4(rnying rgyud): Sh+Te k+Sha ba zad mchog tsigs shing // sprin gsum 'digs pa'i bud pag na n+te// mA ma tshogs mang po'i 'khod du rgyas// zag 'joms pa'i bskyed pa// chen khrag gis skye na// dbyug sam phyagadrug 'bas bzhir bzang
25b5(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// ye shes sgo yi cha lugs ni// mi 'arigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// sbyor chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// btus nas sku yi n+dan du byas// du raro khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus// rjem dam bcang brtsam da sa
25b6(rnying rgyud): rno// ning byin ga shibs pa gdan la zugs// bka pas mi 'du thugs dem rkyong // srog rdzogs myeng po'i sbyi 'dren cing // bsod na mas lus rgyu zis rgya ma gsal// byed rje skye la du myos// khaM n+d+ha bre rjeng rje thung drung //
25b7(rnying rgyud): chen dbang du // 'digs sri nga nad spya dang // dbyas pa chen po'i skyes pa bris// sa nos tshul ma ga togasan // bzhenas pan drungs te tshul bzhin du// phrag gyi bye na ladu na/ byin pa'i ma /
26a1(rnying rgyud): stabs klu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams// ro la brkam pa'i tha stangs kyis// rab tu drongs pa tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thu chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brtag/ mu Sha ga sa
26a2(rnying rgyud): phyed bya rgod mgo// dmar nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can// zhing chen rgyu 'dren zhal du stobs// khro gnyer spyan bgrad zhal gdangs shing // spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdad mig can// gshog tshegs mang po'i rgyan du byas// gti mug 'joms pa'i za byed
26a3(rnying rgyud): ma// thal chen khrag gis sku brgyan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bsad// zod rlon tshogs kyis ba rtsa brgyan// ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor gyi'i ga ya t+ta gzhi gsol// ster chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// bkrus nas sku
26a4(rnying rgyud): yi rgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus// tsham dam brkyad bsdum chen pos ni// zhing tshon gri shibs pa'i gdon la bzhugs// bka' bas mi 'ad 'dzugs dam skyong // srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing // bsod nams lus cang chem
26a5(rnying rgyud): che ma gsol// b+han d+har 'thung zhing rnge'u chung rdung // zhing chur ril mid zangs kris 'debs// zhing chen za ba'i mu khA ste// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen
26a6(rnying rgyud): drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du skyobs// khrag 'jung chen mo mkha' 'gro ma// skyabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// po la bdam pa'i za stangs
26a7(rnying rgyud): kyis// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du skyobs// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brla// mu khA gsod byur sngar mgo dang // ser nag kyar gyi dbying stobs can// zhing chen lag gis gtso la sbyongs// khro gtod spyan bgrang zhal gdangs shing // spyan ga su
26b1(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// gshog tshogs mang po'i rgyan du b+h+yas// bka' las 'das pa za byed ma// ma hA rak+Shas sku brgyan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bkud// zod rnon tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan// ye shes sku pi cha lugs ni// mi
26b2(rnying rgyud): 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// spyir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas spu yi rgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus// tsham ngam brgyar 'brum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bka' las mi 'ad
26b3(rnying rgyud): thugs dam skong // srog chags mar po'i snying nas 'dren// bsod nams lus kyang che mchi ma gsol// b+han d+ha rak+tas zhal du stobs// dbyug pas klad 'gems rdelnga chung rdung // zhing chen za ba'i mu khA ste// 'jigs su rung ba'i rka sgra dang // dgyes
26b4(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i sngags pa yis// sde go la sngo pa m+b+hir gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha'i 'grol// sgrubs klu phyag kyi rdzogs rtsig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs
26b5(rnying rgyud): chen rnams// ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag da thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu khA gsod byed bya ka mgo// mi thing nig byed kyi 'gying stabs can// rdo rje klad 'gems
26b6(rnying rgyud): sgra gris gcod// b+hUd d+hur khrag chen gtsul skyobs// khro gnyer sbyin barbad zhal gdangs shing // 'drigs su drang ba'i sgrad mig can// gshog tshogs mang po'i rkyen du b+hU // zhing bcu gsod cing zla byed ma// ma hA g+has sgra brgyan thaMng // dbu
26b7(rnying rgyud): gsum phyag drug zhabs pazhi'ir bgrad// grod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yeng gzhi gsong// snying chung ngu med po'i tshogs// bkrus nas sku yi rkyen du byas// drung khrod chen po'i
27a1(rnying rgyud): !// mam dus la sa ma na/ na gnas ba sa/ sa shA/ gas na dus du du rju// sa/ sa ma rnag
27a2(rnying rgyud): re'u zung drung // 'jigs sa rung ba'i gan sgra dang // dkris pa chen po'i sngags pa yis// so gol sgrob mad gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul btsun du// drug 'thung chen po'i gal du Sh+Tas// khrag 'brung chen po'i mabar 'gron// spangs
27a3(rnying rgyud): klu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams// ro la brkam pa'i tha stangs kyis// rab tu rmongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thud chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma byas de nyid badrag/ mu khA gsod byed 'ug pa'i mgo// ser
27a4(rnying rgyud): ga gyed kyi 'gying stabs kyis// lag gnyis g+han d+ha// khrag chen stobs// snying chen glo snying 'dren krol du// khrog nyer spyan bzad mche gtsigs shing // 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang min can// gshog tshogs mang po'i rgyun du byas// sha khrag za ba'i mkha
27a5(rnying rgyud): 'grom// ma hAr nyis su brnyan rnying // dbug sum thug drugag pas bsnying ba tha~Mng // rdod sbyin tshogs kyis rab tu btsun// yo shes su yi mkhrugs ni// mi 'jigs spong ba'i g.yeng gzhi gsol// tIng klung ngu mang po'i rmugs// pa dang lnga yi rkyen ba
27a6(rnying rgyud): dud+has// dzu srid chen pa'i me rjen dngas// tsame ma btung bskum rkun pas ni// zhid chen gshibs pa'i gdon la zlugs/ bkA las mi 'du' thugs rlom rgong// sog chags chen pa'i spyor 'dzin cing // bsong na phus rdzas
27a7(rnying rgyud): gsum/ gas kyis badren du nga la// 'gas su thong ba'i ga sa dang / sang rkyen pa'i gas pa'i'o// sa sro grol mong gtog nus // nas ngas te tshul sa/ nga na 'bral sa/
27b1(rnying rgyud): 'brung blun pa 'amakha' 'grum// skabs kra zug rgya sngags tshig gis// bar byed byed pa'i bgags chen rnams// rol ba ma pa'i mastangs kyis// rab gradangs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'brang chen po'i zhal du rmongs// de bzhin ma byas da pyod bajug
27b2(rnying rgyud): a ti khA hi/ rdo rje bka' yi pho nya nams// rdo rje bran mo gtum bag can// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can meng po ste// sna tshogs las rnams grub par byed// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i ljang mig can// dmar ser mi srin chag
27b3(rnying rgyud): pas 'gying // dbu gcig pa la phyag drug gzugs// bAn d+has khrag tshon gtsol stobs// g.yag chen mgo yi zhal gdas shing // skra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// zhing za lcags kyus tri shUl 'phen// spu gris gsod cing rgya 'dren zhags// thod
27b4(rnying rgyud): rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis ning chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs ga phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i srang mig
27b5(rnying rgyud): can// dmar skya tshangs ma chags pas 'gyid// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// b+han d+has khyig chen gtsol stobs// sbrul gdug mgro yi zhal gdangs shing // skra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin pyod// rtse lnga rdo rje zhing chen za//
27b6(rnying rgyud): 'phen cing lcags kyu zhags// thod rnon g.yung gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskam tshul gyis zhi chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin byed// stabs klu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod// dbang phyug tshogs
27b7(rnying rgyud): kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ser nag khro mo chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyog drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dril lo khrel dbyug to stor chen za// b+han d+has khrag chen gtsol spobs// gzig chen mgo yi zhal gdangs/
28a1(rnying rgyud): shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// lcags byas 'dren rgyal su gres 'debs// zod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskam rkang shes zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs grwa phug kya
28a2(rnying rgyud): sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdad mig can// dkar dmar khyab 'jug chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// bAn d+ha sa khrag chen gtso la
28a3(rnying rgyud): stobs// d+ya bang mgo yi zhal gdangs nas// spra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// ste ra khrag chen kha nAM re 'u// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stangs sa phyag
28a4(rnying rgyud): rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'drigs su rung ba'i spyad myig can// ser nag gzhon nu chags pas 'gying // dgra ga cig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing chen rgya 'dren gtso la stongs/
28a5(rnying rgyud): pho sring mgo can zhal gdangs shing // skra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// b+han dmar kha T+wAM 'khor lo 'dril// drod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du myos// brkyang bsgom rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhini du// stabs ga rtag rgya
28a6(rnying rgyud): sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// da mar ser dbang mo chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhi rdzum
28a7(rnying rgyud): gtso la stobs// dred chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // skra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// tan dmar dbyug chen lpag pa kyis 'dril// thod rnon g.yang gnyis rgyan du byas// brkyang bsku ma rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi
28b1(rnying rgyud): bka' bzhin du// stabs kyu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar mo 'phrog chen chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs//
28b2(rnying rgyud): zhing chen rgya 'dren zhags pas stobs// dom chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // skra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dril 'khrol lcags kyu dung dmar dbyug/ thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bsum rkang gis zhing dzin gnon// rnal 'byor
28b3(rnying rgyud): yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs klu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// sngo nag bdud rtsi chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag dug 'jigs pa'i gzugs//
28b4(rnying rgyud): b+han d+ha sa khrag chen gtso la stobs// chu srin mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// kha T+wAM mda' 'phen rin chen yum// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka'
28b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin du// stabs gru phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// sngo sgo zhi ba chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// klo snying 'dren
28b6(rnying rgyud): cing gtso la stobs// sdig chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dril 'khrol rtse lnga dung dmar dang // rin chen bum pa khros pas 'dzin// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rkyen du byas// brkyang bsgom rkang gis zhing chen
28b7(rnying rgyud): gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i ldang mig can// nag mo be con chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig/
29a1(rnying rgyud): phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// snyir chen glo snying 'dren cing stobs// khwa chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // skra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// khrag chen dung 'thung kha T+wAM 'phrin// gris 'debs mya zhags dbang phyug ma// zod rlon g.yang
29a2(rnying rgyud): gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs g+ha phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan mo// 'jigs su rung ba'i sngang mag can
29a3(rnying rgyud): ser nag khro mo chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// b+han d+has khrag cher gcol stobs// wa chen mgo pi zhal gdangs shing // sku dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// zhing chen rgya 'dren sti ra'i rje'u// rab tu gtum pa
29a4(rnying rgyud): khA T+wAM 'phen// thod rlon grwa yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnoni// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs kyu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/
29a5(rnying rgyud): 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// mthong nag za byed chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyug drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// stir chen snying 'dren gtso li stobs// stag chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// rung
29a6(rnying rgyud): dmar dril 'khrol khA T+wAM gris// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug chag
29a7(rnying rgyud): bka' nyen ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar mo khag 'thung chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// bgegs 'dul lcags kyus zhal du stobs// rgod chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang
29b1(rnying rgyud): bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dung dam zhing dbug lan+d+ha 'phen// tha~Md tron g.yang gzhis can du byas// bzang bskum nang gis zhing men gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// phubs m+b+ha phyag cha sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byas//
29b2(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar mo// khrag 'bung chags pas malding // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// b+han d+ha sa khrag chen gci la skyobs// rgya chen mgo yi zha la gdangs shing // sti dang bca
29b3(rnying rgyud): pas bka' bzhin byed// rtse lnga dril dbyug kha T+wA~M 'phen// zhing chen za ba'i dbang phyug ma// tha~Md dron g.yang gnyis kun du byas// dkyang bsdum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs spu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/
29b4(rnying rgyud): 'dod las de grub par byas// dbang phyu/ tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dkar dmar gcig pu chags pas 'gying // dbug cig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// d+ha na b+has khrag chen gtso la stobs// phyi chen mgo yi zhal gdang
29b5(rnying rgyud): shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// rdo rje ti shul dril dbug zhing // bod rnon g.yang zhes rgyan du byas// brgyad bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ stabs su phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod pas de grab
29b6(rnying rgyud): par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ 'jigs su rung ba'i snad mig can/ de mang zhig yid 'jog chags pas 'gyid// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// sting chung za zhing gtsol stobs// sbrang chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing //
29b7(rnying rgyud): dang cas pas bka' bde byed// brje dam byags kyis/ thod drun ga par gnas rgya du byas// brkyang bskum da shes ning tsu gnas gdung 'byor yongs ma pa 'dun du/ srubs kyizu mas sags/ yod
30a1(rnying rgyud): 1//
30a2(rnying rgyud): sman mas pa na byed/ da dus shag/ da pa na du phyu sa
30a3(rnying rgyud): grub par byo'o// dbang byu ga tshogs kyi ga 'arjod mAM// ng+tha 'i/ sa sa ga'i blanags// rgyun tu gadrug na col rto / kyi na mgo rnalas
30a4(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pasmra bka bzhin byed// rdo zhwa drug laN+DI gyi 'drebasan / zod rta da ge pa gnyis can dri byas// brgya bstan nang gi sa zhi cin gan no// 'byor grongs kyi nga rtsagan sde/ byig gis
30a5(rnying rgyud): nga byag thogs ma/ 'gas pa ga ta/ dam padas gsod zhin rtag na
30a6(rnying rgyud): pas byig shin byed// rdo rje la 'i rje rdung // rjod don ga yang gnas rgyan dus// badz+ra bsum nang shes zhing rten pa dang / bas/ 'ad la
30a7(rnying rgyud): gas na no// ga can/ tshogs sa
30b1(rnying rgyud): bka' bzhin byed// dung dmar ShA T+wAM lcags kyu d+hil// khyod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor phongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ stabs gru phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug
30b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi bka' nyan me// 'jigs su rlung pa'i snang mag can// ljang ser pog mo chags paso 'ching // dbug cig phrug drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// b+han+da d+has khrag chen gtsol stobs// phrag chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // rmya da la bcas pas
30b3(rnying rgyud): bka' bzhin byed// rtse lnga zhing za kha T+wAM gr-i// thod dz+nyAn g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor longs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs klu phug+sa rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par pos// dbang phyug
30b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs kyi bka' rten sa// 'jigs su rung ba'i snang mug can// ljang nag sde chad chags pas 'dabug ga kyis drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// bdud rtsi drung dmar zhal du stobs// rnga rkyen mgro yi zhalnga gdungs shing // sra dang bcas zas pa
30b5(rnying rgyud): basbyin byeng // brnA rangs kyi zhags pa mdzod// zod dz+nyAn ga yang gnyis rgya du byas// brgyad bsgra ma nang gis zhing po ni gnon// nab 'byor po sa kyi bkA bzhin du// skyabs ga tu sngag kyi rgyag sa// 'dod las da par byos// da
30b6(rnying rgyud): gas kyi bkang nyin ma// gas su rlu ba sgyu myig can// b+ham+b+ha du mchags pas 'gyu// dbug ci na 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gle na po skye 'dzin cing sa// phyi rag/ san smin pa da// spyad+ma
30b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin kyang // dza dam dril 'grol kha d+h+wi gr-i// zod rnon g.yang gnyis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rga gis ni gnan// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// sbubs glu phyag bya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las da grub par myo/
31a1(rnying rgyud): smran/ smra / smra na
31a2(rnying rgyud): dmazas pas nas/ da slongasaci// bod don ga // tham ded// / dal ma
31a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs ga/ na// 'gas rnaM bI ba// dag dag patshogs
31a4(rnying rgyud): na la/ sa ba byang srog da// na mig chags pas byed// 'jigs sa slo rten rdzun sa bzhi ni mgro ban na/
31a5(rnying rgyud): rdung 'amar kha dril chen zhags// thod rmo ga yang gzhis kun du byas// brkyang 'grem rkang gi bzhing rjen de non// rdul 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin no// stab rgya glang+gas d+ha sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las thu la rgya // da
31a6(rnying rgyud): bka' nyanam// 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra mig can// dmar mi thom na chags pas byung// dbu kyi rjeg 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ tan tus khrig can natu du pag smra'u chen mog pa zhal gang na @
31b1(rnying rgyud): shing chen la rgyu 'ben tshul du// lcags ldog kun 'dzin zungs bris 'debs// thor rlon g.yang gnyis rgyan du byas// prad+hang ba skam dang grig zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi dka' bzhin du// rlabs thu phyag tu phyugs kyis gang // ci du las de slab par bya/
31b2(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' ny+dzan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ljang nag gsus 'dzin chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing chen gro snying gtso lha stob sa// sngar chen mgo yi zha la gdangs shing // dang bcas
31b3(rnying rgyud): bas bka' bzhin byed// dril chen sgra sgrogs dung dmar 'thung // kha T+wA~M 'phen cing rnge'u chung za// shod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs gru phyag rgya sngags tshig gis//
31b4(rnying rgyud): 'dod las de grub par byos// pho nya rdo rje dbang phyug ma// cir yang 'gyur ba'i gzugs can rnams// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mang po yis// dam bcas bzhin du las kun byos// de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i sprin rnam par smos pa bdud btul ba
31b5(rnying rgyud): le'u ste dgu pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje he ru ka khrag 'thung chen po rnams byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin las// oM ma hA tsit+ta maN+Da la/ kro d+ha ha ha ha/ he he he/ phaT phaT phaT/ tsa tu ra yo gI na hri tI hI la~M/ tIng tri tring / mi phreng mi
31b6(rnying rgyud): kIng kring kring / ha ha ha zhes brjod pas/ rdo rje he ru ka sU bAs ma gyis mi khyab pa khros pas rngam par gnas so// rat+na he ru ka sbyin pa'i khro ba mdzad do// chags pa'i he ru ka dang sru dbang gi tshul gyis shin tu khro ba mdzad do// las kyi he ru ka kun du me mdza pa med pa'i tshul
31b7(rnying rgyud): gyis gdug pa'i khro bo chen po'o// de dag kyang rdo rje 'dzin ma khro mo dang // rin chen dbyug to ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang // pad+ma b+han d+ha 'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang // las kyi dbyug to ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang bcas pa rnams brkyang bskum gyi stabs kyis dpal
32a1(rnying rgyud): khyu na na ma tam gnas sa na dan ma // gyu na dang / dun da pa dang / sa byo dang / gnas myed pa
32a2(rnying rgyud): 'byor ma las grub par byed ma dpa/ rdo rje rigs byed ma dang / dbang sdud chen mo dang / drag po'i rgyas kyi kheg dang shing dus kyi kyi ldan zhabs gnyis byabs dang shis pa dz+wal ts+tsha rgya btsun tshul du gnas so// de'i sri min dzin phra men chen mo dang /
32a3(rnying rgyud): ge mgro chen mo stobs dang ldan ma dang // stag mgo chen mo stobs deng ldan ma dang / myos byed rgya mgo chen mo dang / drug pa'i mgo can dang / bya god mgo gsod byed skyebasuM rkyen lo dang / mar+g+ha rings mgo canA gcod kyad chen mo dang / wa'i mgo can
32a4(rnying rgyud): la byed pa'i rtogs seMn mo dang / 'dzin kyi ma na tsam dang / rna sa kyi med mdzad kyim mag tsun men mo dang / migatang gsung ma pag gi mgocan de snang rkyen mo rnams dpa ga / pasnyen da
32a5(rnying rgyud): gnas par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba las rnam par bskur ba'i yeshes kyi 'khor lo ste le'u badru pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gtum pa chen mo dang / rnam par sbyar ba'i cho gas rmongs pa snyid
32a6(rnying rgyud): sa dpes pa sa na drug pa na pa ma hrI / dub tsam hA/ ma// @#
32a7(rnying rgyud): chu su su
32b1(rnying rgyud): Sh+Ta 5\u0f7f/ A ba / rdzas/ sa / na /
32b2(rnying rgyud): la/ la ma dang / ta sa na / midu gyur/ sangs ma amra /
32b3(rnying rgyud): tsaN+Da la/ // na sbyi d+ha/ d+hU ma ma skem/ spyan tAdrA hA na/ tra susakades hin+te/ ga te/ phyir ka/ teste/ s+yai hA na/ byin ti te/ e thang bgang rje/ bdu dam
32b4(rnying rgyud): ga taka ba tum / pa/ ma 'al
32b5(rnying rgyud): m+b+ha du lu dra la du lu na ludu wa ru wA Sh+Ta/ d+hi mr-i Sha d+hi/ ben paT phaT/ sal pa sam pA/ yog yog ni ba phaT/ dUR+Sha sa rjon pas rnam mtsha rab tu brgyal/ ra tu dang mA~M/ sa pa
32b6(rnying rgyud): shing gi so la nas mi gnas par mdzad do// de bzhi dgra shegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mnyes pa las sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs rngam pa'i stabs kyis dzaHdzaHdzaHhUM hU~M hoHhaMHzhes par mdzad do//
32b7(rnying rgyud): smo kyi las kyi sbyor bablo ba chen po mdzod de// gas ba rje rje'i mdzod nas gsang ba'i yum gyi pad+ma yongs su yongs pa'i na'adu sems can gyi tshogs byang chub sems su mdzad nas ma'i ba ste zas su brjod par mdzad de mdzo ni po dran pa rnyed do//
33a1(rnying rgyud): kyi skabs ma gyis mi khyab pa me dpung bsam pas mi khyab pa mtshon cha dang dbu dang zhal mang zhing spyi bung zhes byed pa dngangs shing gsod par mthong ste spras pa/ rab tu 'jigs pa'i khro bo rnams// shin tu bde ba'i gnas shi gnas// bton bskal ba dang
33a2(rnying rgyud): chung // da ni ci mdzad la gor mdzod// lha cig rje cig 'on zhes smras pa'i tshig gis sems can gyi mtshan mo dpyongs par gyur par mkhyen to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos rang tu spros la gnor long shig/ rje la gus par dmanos la// na la
33a3(rnying rgyud): gnas par skal med pas// phyi yi dkyil 'khor sa la 'dug/ ces bka' stsal bas dngangs partas par gyur te/ rdo rje bran mo'i mna' bor nas smras pa/ skyes mchog lha rjes su zhig lags// 'bangs dang bka' stsal bdag cag nyan// phyi yi gnas
33a4(rnying rgyud): su gnas su bgyi// ma sring bran g.yog 'khor lug rnams// 'jigs pa'i sgras ni gzhes su gsol// ci mdzad khyod mkhyen gzhes su gsol// yun du sbrul ldan gzhes su gsol// bdag cag 'jig rten skong ba'i rnams// di ring dam mdzes
33a5(rnying rgyud): smon chad du// 'khor rnams skyong bar mi bgyid dam// dka' bzhin las kun me sgrub pa ma// theg pa 'dzin la mi stong dumo// bzhugs pa'i dkyila'akhor mi zin na// da lta bzhin du 'jigs pa dang // shi nas dmyal bar shog ces smras te
33a6(rnying rgyud): man 'byor ro// de nas khragu 'thong chen pos cang mi gsung bar bzhugs pa las rab tu gsod byed ma dang // tshangs pa mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dbang mo drang / grub mo dang / bskyod chen mo dang / rdo rjer gdong chen mo dang / me mo rlag par
33a7(rnying rgyud): byed pa chen mo dang // phag mo gsod byed ma dang / gtum par mdzad ma dang / brlan par mdzad ma dang / phag chen mo dang / nag mo ral pa chen mo dang / rdo rje 'dzin ma chen mo dang / rdo rje nag mo chen mo dang / rdo rje rgan byed chen mo dang / rdo rje yang
33b1(rnying rgyud): 'phrog par byed ma dang / rab tu gcig tu za mo dang / rdo rje srin mo'i cha byang chen mo dang / sngo gnug chen mo dang / ljang nag chen mo dang / bye con chen mo dang / zhi ba bum ste chen mo dang / las la grub pa mo dang / bka' nyan par byed ma dang / chum ngam gyi
33b2(rnying rgyud): gzugs dang / drag shul ma dang / nyal ba mor tshul ston ma de drag la sogs pa ma dang srir mo bu mo rnams rab tu gus par bka' nyan te/ rdo rje thun mor bka' nyan te// rdo rje bran mor dam blangs nas// ci 'dod las rnams bdag cag bgyid// ces mna'
33b3(rnying rgyud): bor te 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang / mtshon cha dang / gnas pa'i gzhir bcas te phyi'i snam bu la gnas pa'i las byed par gnas so// de dag gi dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa bshad de/ dkyil 'khor phyi rol gru bzhir bcas// dbus su b+ha ga ma~M dkar bcas/
33b4(rnying rgyud): bA su ta yi maN+Da la// dri chu dak+ta'i tshom bur bri// hrIHlas dbus su bcwa brgyad gzugs// ya na dbu gsum phyag drug pa// thod pa b+han b+ha dmar chen bkang // brgyad dam nyi shu dku ru ldan// yang na lnga dang ldan pa la// lAM pa'i yi ge sa byin gyis bzab//
33b5(rnying rgyud): za 'phro phud dang ldan pa la// uts+tshu l-I yi sngags kyis bzlas// thod pa dmar thugs btung bya zhing // mi pangam b+h+yo 'o ma ru lu yis// mngon sum phyin par bos nas ni// kha nas rak+tas rab gtor te// he ru ka yi las rnams kun// gong nas 'byung ba'i las
33b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin bya// sgeg mo na chung de drag la// dbang dgri chags pas 'dod spyad de// ta ma lA yi phur bus gdab// ci 'dod las rnams grub par stir// chags dang gsod dang rgyags pa che// mnyam pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin gyis// tsau ri ka ri'i 'khor rnams kyang /
33b7(rnying rgyud): yi las la 'jug par no// ming tsam 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bsngal na rtse gcig las rnams 'grub// de nas kun du bzang po chen mos ming tsam du chos thams cad gnas par mkhyen to// gsang ba sgyu 'phrul chen po 'di bsdu ba chen pa mdzad de/
34a1(rnying rgyud): ngas sems dpa' dul 'byor ba'o// ban kyang sem sung pa 'anas / dus sun ma pan 'thong ba// pa nas myong ma ga pang // sdoms dpa rnal 'byor 'gang yang med// denyid dus gsum bya /
34a2(rnying rgyud): kun du bzang mo mchag/ sgyu 'phrul dri ba'i rlung dag las// sems ma dzon de dag las// gsang ba'i des don gang+gA yang med// ces chos thams cad 'dus pa chen mo mkhyen to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi he zug 'dus pa chen mo'i dkyi pa la
34a3(rnying rgyud): le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// // a hoHrgyu nyid stong pas 'bras bu mngon sum pa// byin gyis brlab tu med pas byin gyis brla pas 'grab// sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyid kyang sems can yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ da mi mdzad med par shes pa kun
34a4(rnying rgyud): dngan rab tu bsngags// chags pa mi gtong chags pa mngon sum dgo sa pa ben pas dkyil 'khor gong ma grin gyi // su la dag bgrub tu srid rdzi du skabs pas dgra che sAchag pas rab tu gsungs// ma mra dpyir sa ma snang la dga' ba
34a5(rnying rgyud): brtson rgyal bas 'grub ces brngub pa kun gyis gsungs// stong par rtogs la rjod la gre la rnal 'byo min zhes hAHbyas gsungs// mi la ga spyod cing dge sdig 'tshol baji ga can yin par ya tu ga la// dge sdig yo gyi rtson pas 'grub ces cheg
34a6(rnying rgyud): pa kun las 'byung // bag dang mi ldan rang bzhin med par gnas pa la// gtso mchog mi bkur khungs phyin chos la mi brtson sems can yin par mngon sum gsapa bar snang // de bas sgyu 'phrul gsang ba mchog 'di su rnams gang zhig tan brtson pas/
34a7(rnying rgyud): 'grus pa bslabs pa bag dang ldan pa lobs pa dang por ngo shes bya// skad cig gzugs la 'bangs pa med par gus ldan gsang ba'i sdud pa yin// rdo rje slob dpon mchog la dad pos sangs kyis ma lus kun la mchod chen po yin// lam la
34b1(rnying rgyud): ga sa dag nan na/ nam na nas ga
34b2(rnying rgyud): ma sa/ sa
34b3(rnying rgyud): myod sa na/
34b4(rnying rgyud): sa
34b5(rnying rgyud): pa ma ma
34b6(rnying rgyud): chu ma ma
35a1(rnying rgyud): khong sa nan ku ma da gtug pa la sa pa ra/ na da/ la sogs parnam papad dang man par gyur
35a2(rnying rgyud): sngags pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa/ ye shes rin po che bla ma'i phred pa dang / thun 'byung dang / shar bu'i rgyan dang / gzugs drang sa dang/ rje rdo dzin byal sogs pa mi sgrib par gos la ba ra byung la/ gsal ba'i rkyen khyad par can rnams 'thubs pa/ rjonamed pa/
35a3(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i sgro nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyad can/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa/ phyi dang nang med pa na yang chen pon du gyur ba/ shin / srang bya bas khyab 'dal pa'i nga mdzin po'i gzhal las pang nang rol tu phyin pa lnga'i khI/ mi 'jigs pa
35a4(rnying rgyud): seng ge'i khri dang / stobs glang po che'i khri dang / rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri dang / dbang rma bya'i khri dang / thogs pa med pa nam mkha'i lding go zhi dang / rong bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba tri zla'i dkyil 'khor dang / gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan brtsegs
35a5(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ ye nas gsang ba bla ma'i phyir// yum gyi gzhal yas phyogs bcur 'brar // ye nas pha rol phyin pa'i phyir// thogs pa med pa'i khri rkang brtan// rang bzhin saM nas 'od gso phyir// nyi zla brtsigs pa'i rkang myi 'bar zhing // gdod nas dri
35a6(rnying rgyud): ma med pa'i phyir// rnam par dag pa pad+mo gdan// re ba yid bzhin smod pa'i phyir// yid bzhin rin chen gter gyi gdan// mra bsags lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i phyir// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor chen po'i chan// yon tan chen po'i gdan sngangs
35a7(rnying rgyud): na// sku mdun dang rgyab med par thams cad tu zhal bla ma tha le bar gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pas thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sku ga sung thugs yon tan phrin las sna tshogs par snang de/ thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i
35b1(rnying rgyud): brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo grang du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi phyag ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i phyag rgya can/ sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po tha ma dang /
35b2(rnying rgyud): btsun mo dam po sra ba'i dbyings kyi zam dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mo dam pa sdang ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mo dam pa mnyen pa'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang / de bzhin
35b3(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mo dam pa dro ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po bla ma dang // btsun mo dam pa bskyod pa'i dbyings kyi bla ma la sogs pa ye shes rgyal po stangs dpal kun kyang mthi ga dang / gag
35b4(rnying rgyud): po dang / ser po dang / laM btsun dang / lja su'i mdog bla mar 'tshor ba ste/ gnyis su med par 'khril bas rdo sl-i kyi dbyings kun tu mtha' yas par b+h+ra ma chen po'i skrod pas khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi ga dbu'am mdang rtsi snga ma thu bzhin kun du bde
35b5(rnying rgyud): ba chen pos khyab par bzhugs so// de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong dbang rje ma dang / btsun po gzigs par bya ba'i bla ma dang / byang rtsub chen po rdo rje thos dbang bla ma dang / btsun mo gsan par bya ba'i bri ba dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje sdom dbang bla ma dang /
35b6(rnying rgyud): btsun mo mnam par bya ba'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje mang dang blamra dang / btsun mo myong bar bya ba'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje sogs shes zum dang / btsun mo smon pa'i bla ma da / chub chen po rdo rje gcod zhes bla ma dang / btsun mo gdug
35b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje 'jug shes bla ma dang / btsun mo char 'bebs bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje 'dus pa'i bla ma dang / btsun mo rgyas pa'i bla ma dang / 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg g.yas bla ma dang / btsun mo rtag par ma yin
36a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i bla ma dang / 'joms pa chen po rdo rje rig g.yon bla ma dang / btsun mo chad par ma yin pa'i bla ma dang / 'joms pa chen po de ji reg gsang bla ma dang / btsun mo bdag tu ma yin pa'i bla ma dang / 'joms pa chen po rdo reg 'dus blam
36a2(rnying rgyud): dang // btsun mo mtshan mar ma yin pa'i bla ma dang / de lta bu'i rdzogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par gsang pa dgyes pa'i dkyis rma ma na bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor tha ma de nyid
36a3(rnying rgyud): gyi gsang ba bla ma 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo // e mA'o de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dbang sgyur dkyil 'khor bla ma'i ngang // ngang nyid rnam dag bde mchog gsang ba'i dbyings// dbyings nyid mnyam sbyor bde mchog rin
36a4(rnying rgyud): chen gter// mi zad gter ldan bdud rtsi gsang ba'i bla// bla med byang chub thig le ya mtshan dkyil 'khor snang // rad snang ba nyid ting 'dzin gzugs brtan rnam dag snang ba ni// sku gsung thugs yon phrin las spel med pa'i yid bzhin rin chen mi zad
36a5(rnying rgyud): par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo bla ma rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do// rdo rje gsang bzhi pa'i nges don du'o// gsang ba'i snying po dri kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma las dbyis dang ye shes gseng ba'i bde ba'i bla ma nges pa'i gle dang / shrI'i le'u sted po'o// / de nas
36a6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'ongs yid byed pa bla ma rdo rje kun du 'azang po thams cad ma lus pa'i tshul rdo rjes btsun mo bye ba mo kun du bzang mo'i skam la 'ag par gyur to// gsang ba'i bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do// oM chos kyi chos nyid bye ba'i srings// kun du bzang ma
36a7(rnying rgyud): bde ba'i yum// ma g.yos rang bzhin rdorjel 'khor ni// bdag yin bdag gi spyod yul bamo// phyag rgya'i tshogs so sor gsal// rdzub phyogs 'og min gnas mchog tu// ma chags pa 'i gdan bting ba// dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas
36b1(rnying rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi la// phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag ldan// dbang med sa/ mya ngan 'phral ba'i ting// na ga tan gyi mkhrugs dang lhan// rgyal ba yongs kyi lngas pa'i chog// sras kyang gting dngag dka' bste// kud du bzung ba nyid kyis gzigs// rto
36b2(rnying rgyud): nas btsun mo b+ha bdun du bzang mos gsang ba bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do// oM sems kyi sems nyid byed pa'i gaH// kun du bdang po rdo rje yid// ye shes brgyad kyi rang bzhin te// shar phyogs mngon dga' bas ma yas nas// nI la lta bu'i gter byin pa//
36b3(rnying rgyud): 'dus 'phrul gyi lde mig gis// rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye ste// byang chub mchog gi nar gtan bkrol// ma chags pad+ma'i kudan la bzhugs// 'gro dron byang chub sems bskyed de// 'gro lnga skye bzhi dbang du bsdus// sku gsung thugs nas dbang bskur // zhes
36b4(rnying rgyud): ngo // de nas bya ba mo kun du bzang mos gsang ba bla ma'i mchod pa 'di ched du phul lo// oM rin cher pad+ma'i dkyil 'jam 'di// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bul lags kyis// bla med 'phrul gyi lde mig ste// dgyes mchog rdo rje gsor nas ni// bad rtsi char chen
36b5(rnying rgyud): dbab tu gsol// zhes tshad du gleng ngo // de nas yang yi dbyed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang pos bdud ci bla ma'i char pas sdod bgyid kyi 'dzam bu'i gling tshim par bya ba'i phyir gsung ba bla ma'i tshig 'di med du brjod do// oM rdo rje bla ma'i dgyes rab 'di// gsong nas bdud rtsi
36b6(rnying rgyud): dab 'byor// 'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i gnas su gsod// mi dmigs pad+mo dang spo ba 'di// kun du bzang mo dbyings su bsgyel// zhes ched du med ste// gnyis su med pa las nyid kyi spyod yul thams cad gasrung ba'i dkyil 'khor zla ma kyang bar du sngags pa N+Dal
36b7(rnying rgyud): mo nying 'dod dpa 'i'i tshe'i rdul chen po ngas pa kyis mi khyam par mdzad pa'i yel nigs 'bri ba'i kyil 'khor du tsugs te yad la gzims cad du byin kyisarjo/ la 'i gro drug 'a pa don ba men ga tu drugs pa'adi /
37a1(rnying rgyud): na smra/ da// ma ba / zung ba da ma na
37a2(rnying rgyud): la la khrum sa thugs la bltams// pa la tshul 'byung rab tu byung // phal brten rdzogs dka bu ba byed// la la dam pyod 'gro bskol// la la bcu ga sa la badz+rad// la la mer 'brar chur yang 'brug/ la len ma ma 'a spu ru 'byur// phy-i lad+da
37a3(rnying rgyud): zug tus// pa 'i gso gsod 'pham rgyal byed// pa l+la tshod b+h+yol 'gug rgol byed// la la bdud 'dul ngan song spong // le la dkyil 'khor mchod sbyin 'dzi'o// kun can chos gyi 'khor gyi'o// de ltar rtag tu chos kyi 'khor lo 'thor ban
37a4(rnying rgyud): ma/ theg ba snga'i ba sa stod/ pa'i byudrung // gdum pa bdu sa nges par bya / di byani ma dri lta sun/ 'thob padris
37a5(rnying rgyud): la/ na pa ga phyogs ni kyi la ni / glang la bral bas dra ba'i de/ myong sbyin bus gsang pa'i don// theb pa 'i mju// nas tshe dang phreng kyi/ snod pa rjid kyi 'ang
37a6(rnying rgyud): la ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang bar gnas sbyar ba dang / phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba tha ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to// de nas snod bcud kyi 'jig tan thams cadaskyibs ma med par gas
37a7(rnying rgyud): 'i dkyi pa 'khor du mngon par sangs su sogs ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o rdo rje phung po'i yan lag no// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// bye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyim 'khor teng // sa
37b1(rnying rgyud): ng+yas s+t+wa~M// mo la gas dkar sgrol ma ste// nam mkha' ngas kyi dbang thug sa// sred susum 'o nas sangs kya zhing // ma sa cag/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma byan// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan gra chos// sangs kya rgya
37b2(rnying rgyud): rnyed do// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyun to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun po'i tshogs thams cad kyis med du brjod pa 'di gsungs so// e ma'o phyogs bcu'i stong khams ge nas dben// srid pa gsum nyid dag pa
37b3(rnying rgyud): zhing // snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas// phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas// thams cad mchog gri snying po pus// gzhan du rtul bas chos mi // nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do// zhes brjod pas chos thams cad
37b4(rnying rgyud): ye nas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// de nas dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa las ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o yin pa gsang ba'i chos// sgra tshogs snang ba rang bzhin gsang // gsang mchog snying po bla na
37b5(rnying rgyud): med// thams cad gsang ba'i dbyings su nges// bla ma mchog gi snying po las// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med// ces brjod pas thams cad dbyings su nges pang mkhyen to// de ltar yin na yang 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pas 'gro ba'i rigs
37b6(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi tshe bya'i ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir rdo rje bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do// e mA'o bde gshegs snying po las// dang gi rnam rtog lus kyis sprul// snga tshogs lus dang longs snod dang // banas
37b7(rnying rgyud): dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i// bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin// sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de// bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis// rten gyis mkha' lo mdud pa bor// bcings med rnam par grol
38a1(rnying rgyud): da // gas// na nga
38a2(rnying rgyud): sems kyang ba bskyen pa'i byer/ gi sring ba 'idi med du // 'de na pa sems nyidan// rigs dang dog ni rjo // brang med lacing meng da // sde khyod bye'i sa la ba
38a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor che bya bamam// yom batshul bzhin byed// na du ga mas kun/ til 'i nang du rla / shin pa/
38a4(rnying rgyud): byad can gyis brgyan smras pa'o// nges pas bzhi bcu rtsa lnga ba sgom// dbyis dang ye shes stangs dkyil gnyis// dkyil 'khor bu mi byed pa sa/ jug pade/ nadu /
38a5(rnying rgyud): sprul mas gsum byams mal bya'o// 'du shes sdang ba mtha' bas te// yul lan bza' dkar mo ha~M/ don spyod pa ste// yul la dram gyig spel // dam shes rlo sems dpa' // la ba yangs ldan nam hoH// mgal
38a6(rnying rgyud): po// / yul ba dgang mdag can no toH// skul nam mkha'i nyir po // yul la me tog dpeng phreng kye la spyan rnaMs dang drug ste// yul / narang gyi do // phul la la ma par ga
38b1(rnying rgyud): tog// ngadan // 2 nan gas ma du da// rgyal la gdun pa na// 4/ gas la ma dang shA //
38b2(rnying rgyud): na mad babs so// gas pa gnyis stobs che rdzob / pa'i lagadong pa'i shas/ g.yon sa sa gzhan mo gshed po ste// phul pa snar 'gro dzinas rgyal to// gsang brta ma da dpa' da// rdul la par
38b3(rnying rgyud): 'tshal ba ste// phul la gtum mo y-i du \u0f7f// rkyed dug 'khor ba gnas gaH// mjug sa na pa la/ du sla dang na du gsung // // sung bde yi de bzhin to// / sems nyid myu la
38b4(rnying rgyud): 'du brems/ du la ba 'i sa/ nga dkyi sa palag// nga bar su ma na// sa brjod ma rnathamasaca ma so gru sa sa bzhin gnyisas pathams cad dang bya med
38b5(rnying rgyud): bad+mag ces te mnyam pa nyid kyi nga ba bzhugs// gas gA d+hI myo len ted ngas pa'i thA ma las sh-i sa dang shes gAnyi sa sa med pa'i rang du khrims kyi dang bzhin cing yang pa'i lce 'u ste gnyis pa ni/ de bzhin ga/ shegs pa thams cad nga/
38b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin gcig dang du mar dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la nyid kyi maba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma 'di dbyung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so// oM ye shes bla ma rol pa yis// phyogs bzhi dbus dang
38b7(rnying rgyud): brtags na// dkyil 'khor bas pa yas lhun gyis grub// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// kun 'byung dkyil long chen por spyod// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhis brgyan rdo rje'i khyams// kun du gru bani sgo rgyud ldan// rol
39a1(rnying rgyud): sa rten sa zhen// kyil 'khor dugan/ sgra can gyu// du na da da gyug// 'khong largyal du rgya dzad/
39a2(rnying rgyud): gapas nas mtho thos mnam pa dang // myong dang btsun mo tshogs su bcas// rgya zad sani gcod byed dang // byed 'jug byed rnams// btsun ma tshogs dang nas pa ga nas// bdu rnams la ts+tshi ga // gyad dug spong ba'i phyag
39a3(rnying rgyud): gnas// de bzhin thig le chen po dag/ mdun dang chub tu byed pa zhug/ gyu dag ni gnas par bstan// skyo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa dag // btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+hi la gri nor rdzu bang // ut+pal klu shing la gas
39a4(rnying rgyud): mtshan// mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin// rdza thing ga dkar po s+yer+ya la bzhin// ldeng dgu la sogs sna tshogs mdog/ mnyen lug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// smras pa 'tsher ldan sug ga'i byin rabang // snod zeng 'gro ba'i tshigs chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng
39a5(rnying rgyud): ba 'khrigasa~M pa ste// mtha' dbus med par khyab ba yi// dkyil 'khor bsdam las lU ni sris kubA hoH/ Sh+T+r-is rjod pa sna 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yAs mu med pa sems can du ky-i pa khor bla ma chen po brjod kyis mi 'ang zhi gi rdul snyed du klasal bar
39a6(rnying rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor da na nyid kyi gser bu bla me 'di sgra gsung thugs yon tan zin las 'di dgage phyung ngo // a hoH/ bde mchog ngo mtshad byang chub sems chen no// a la mnyam sbyar rtswa 'phrul ba
39a7(rnying rgyud): ma'i dbyings// rnam dag thig le byang chub sems kyis rol// ngo mtshar rmad byung bla ma chen po'i dbyings hoH// dmigs bya dmigs byed mi dmigs gsang ba'i dbyings// ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor bla ma bsam mi khyab// mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab gsar
39b1(rnying rgyud): pags nags ma 'as rlos me shA 'i rdzogs rnam ga/ rna pa margyan pa mas pa // gsu na/ dranas pan par thA du na
39b2(rnying rgyud): mer par gyur nas/ bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems rim par gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa rtser cheb nas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa phyogs bcu ngus pani dgos par bzhed nas sku gsung thugs bla ma'i dbyings nas 'di dag phyung ngo // dang po bla ma'i lung bstan pa/
39b3(rnying rgyud): mtshon du med pa'i byang chub sems// ye shes snying po gsal ba dang // bsgom pa rnam gsum dus gcig rdzogs// byang chub sems kyi thig le la// ma bkag lhun gyis rdzogs pas na// de ni thig le chen po'i don// de ni de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// de ni kun
39b4(rnying rgyud): d+ha stAr ba'i da // d+ho n+yAN+Da m+b+hi des par ldan to// gsangs zla ma'i rtag tu'o// gasteng bad+hA m+bu'i dis don las// gsang ba gsung gi kyil 'khor grags/ sh+tsa hU~M badz+ra p+tAH/ hU~Md+hI d+ha badz+ra ma~M/ n+da/ oM A i pan+d+ha pa ti sa ma pa oM/ hAbay-i/
39b5(rnying rgyud): g+h+r-i d+hI rba I shA'i/ au dzaM na dzi kA/ l-I drAShA ra ti// sA rAt+na d+h+r-ika/ mAM mo hi ra tAM/ A~MHa ro lika/ bI gar t+taM/ ha prad+b+ha d+h+r-i ka tAM badz+ra ra ti/ k+Shi hi d+hadz+ha la/ auSh+TasraM sa mA p+tAstAM/ NAM a gar+b+he bau/ d+h+r-i mAM l+le sa ma yA hoH/ d+hI ha ta pad+ma bar+d+hama?/
39b6(rnying rgyud): ho dze ku ru pa nA hrIH/ IHdruM t+yAH sa yA mi/ mi dzA ri NI sI hI/ dzaHpU ba pra be sha/ g+h+r-i ni sa ra ma pA ya swA hA/ hU~M puSh+pa a bai sha/ hUM sa rA ShA pa sI d+hA/ bi d+hu baM puk+Shi Ne/ mr-i hrI A r-i kA pa s+yA hAM/ hoHgin+d+ha tsit+te/ ai mu ne k+ko s+t+rai ts+tsha/ oM munr-i rbu d+h+we sA hr-i/ or+tha
39b7(rnying rgyud): naM pr-i s+yA / oM brane suM swA ng+ge/ o m+ban hA/ oMmr-i na paM swAt+ma/ hUM la mAn+ta ba ta paT/ oM ma hA d+ha ram pro d+d+ho shwa dral nI hUM phaT/ hUM n+do kr-i tA bar+tha/ oM ma hU~M d+hA d+ha ra mr-i nr-id+d+hi h+la raM dz+wal ni d+hu Ta/ hUM d+mA ts+tsha t+yai trUM phaT/ oM me dri ba N+Di ta ma
40a1(rnying rgyud): nan tu tu na / ga sa sa na
40a2(rnying rgyud): badz+ras ma pa/ badz+ra sa ma ya/ oM A~MHhUM swAhA/ oM ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan dzin las mang po rje// sgron thal byang chub sems chen po// de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba // phyab kyi bla ma bdag sbyor TIg/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM
40a3(rnying rgyud): sa ma ya s+t+waM/ badz+ra sa ma ya hoH/ dzaHhUM ba~M hoHzhes gsungs pas gsung gi dkyil 'khor bla ma chen pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du zhugs/ rab tu phrags/ kun tu grags so// grags pas snod brjod kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyi dkyil 'kho
40a4(rnying rgyud): bla ma chen pos khya par gyur to// de nas yang ye ges rgyal po stangs dmyal drug gnyis su med par rol pa mdzad pa b+h+ra ma la nyam par gyur te/ de nas ye shes rgyal po de nyid dung byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung bu bas rdo rje la dbyung ngo // AM chos dbyings mdam
40a5(rnying rgyud): chen po lngas// ye shes gsal ba rnam par dag/ chos kyi byidus kyi ye shes kyis// spyi med chos la dbang sgyur shog/ oM ma hA bu h+ya ma thuru d+ha d+ha madz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+mako&hUM/ hUM dag cing gasngal bu'i rang bzhin te// skyon med sems nyid rin po che/ mye longs
40a6(rnying rgyud): bu'i ye shes kyi ste// srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur shog// oM ma hA ku t+ya mA hA Adad+ya dz+nyA dz+nyAn padz+ra pa thA ba Sh+T+r-ihaM/ hUM khams ga ba~M ste// ye bzhin rin chen gter rtse mchog/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis// 'gro bar song
40a7(rnying rgyud): por shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya ma hA sa man+ta A be shaM dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM nyes pa'i skyon zil dri ma med// skye 'gag med pa'i dngos grub ste// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis// srid gsum nyes dmigs sel bar shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya ma
40b1(rnying rgyud): mnas su / pa / bla sa/ dun can na nas sa da nga
40b2(rnying rgyud): stong pa'i spyod gnyis// dab pa la yang mi gnas shing // rtong pa can // me 'byor dbyas la dbang snar // oMmra hA pra ma sa shA pa na ma / 'ad ma / sog
40b3(rnying rgyud): tshul ba'i gtso// sngags dang phyag kyang ldan pa yis// rdo rje phreM pi gtso bor sho// oM maN+Da kut+ya sa rbata thAg N+Da kA ya badz+ras b+hA pa A t+ma ho&ha~M/ oM bdi gshegs gsung ga ngo bo las// sa shrig rlom gyi ljongs// sa sa dang da ldan pa
40b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gsung gi ngo bor shog/ uM mA hA bu d+hA r+b+ba ta thA ga ta thAkA bA dz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&trAM/ hU~M bde dag/ shegs thugs kyi gtso bo las// mi shigs rdo rje rdo rje'i thugs// sngags dang phrag rgyang ldan pa yis// rdo rje thugs kyi byin rlobs shog/ ma hA swA \u0f7f
40b5(rnying rgyud): thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ swaM mi 'gyur ba yi zhing khams nas// mAM bskyed pa yi 'bras bu lags// ma bsags pa yi longs spyod 'byung // cir yang grub pa'i ye shes kyis// rang dbang thabs kyis sbyar bar shog/ sr-i ma hA guM h+ya sarba
40b6(rnying rgyud): thA ga ta mAhA prA dza ba dz+res b+ha bA Am+mu Sh+T+r-iH/ zhes gsungs pas gsal la ba bas tshi mapor gyur to// aM mra ngo mtshar bya byam gyi// dro mtshang la ma tshan gsang ba'i chos// sgra dang snying ci gdun las 'das// dzA phyogs dbyings su gsom/
40b7(rnying rgyud): gsung gcig yin lag dkyil 'a'ar// bsam gyis mi khya khyab mchog dbyings// thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya mchog te// gsang pa'i snying po sa pa'i blam chen po las dkyil 'khor bsdu ba deng gsang thugs kyi'i bzhi pa'o//
41a1(rnying rgyud): ye shes rgyal po de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yan lag thams ca da kyil 'khor bla mar spyan gyis thub pa'i 'gags pa rtser cheb nas rdo rje zla ma chog 'ang chad du gsungs te// sku 'phrul drabs mdzan rdzogs pa'o// thams cad byang chub
41a2(rnying rgyud): mchog gi rgya// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi// snying po phyag rgya 'da' dka'o// mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge// lnga gnyis zur du spros pa las// sbyar ba'i phyag tu 'byung ba'i rgya// hU~M dang mu gnyis rtse sbyar te// 'bru brgyad bsnol
41a3(rnying rgyud): nas thugs kar bkan// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kAr bkan// hU~M bsgreng rtse mor rdo rje 'bar// zla bathul 'bru sbas dril gsil Ning // 'khril pa'i tshul gyis chas la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas
41a4(rnying rgyud): thugs kar bkan// mu~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bu lngas las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lha/ 'khor lo 'bur ba'i lte dbus na// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' dag/ yum mchog yangs ma'i stan dang ni// gnyis med dbyings
41a5(rnying rgyud): kyi ngang du 'khril/ 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// oM bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar/ zla ba rtul 'bru sbas dril gsil cing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// le bsgred rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma
41a6(rnying rgyud): lngas las su 'khril// btung de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lha// shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs nas// bde gshegs rnam par sdang mdzad dag/ yum mchog kun du bzang mo dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// 'bru bzhi skas nas thugs ka
41a7(rnying rgyud): bkan// sA rtse 'bar ba rin po che// zla btul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru lngas bzhi nas thugs kar bkan// maM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// bdud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs
41b1(rnying rgyud): thos k+ta// zugs 'khor po byabs stong sa nan// bdang gshegs pa rdzun 'grang ldan dag/ yum mnag 'ams gsum bums pa dang // gnyis med stongs gro dang dul la// 'arlos d+mo thags na// stod pa ma pa 'bur// /
41b2(rnying rgyud): 'brubras dril gsal zhing // 'thil ba'i tshul gyis chos la btan// 'thung 'i smras nas thugs kar bkan// pi bsgred rtse mor rngal gsal 'bar// ti ma 'bralas las su 'grel// bad de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis !// nub thugs 'khor lo'i dra bas tengs
41b3(rnying rgyud): nas// bde gshegs snang ba mtha' yas dag/ yum mchog na bza' dkar mo dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// ha bsgreng rtse mor rdal gri 'bar// zla brtul 'bu sras dril gsil zhing // 'khril pa'i
41b4(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis chos la brta na// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// tAM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril/ btad de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta// byung rtogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs nas// bde gshegs don yod kub
41b5(rnying rgyud): pa dang // yum mchog dam tshig sgrol ma dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi dang du 'khril// rin chen myu gu g.yas phyogs na// sgeg cing 'gying ba g.yon phyogs na// sa snying dkar po rdo rje'i rigs// yum mchog dkar mo sgeg chen dang // dkyil 'khor bar
41b6(rnying rgyud): khyams shar phyogs na// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// ral gri 'byin pa g.yas phyogs na// phreng ba bgrang ba g.yon phyogs na/ dkyil 'khor bar khyams lho phyogs na// nam snying ser po rin chen rigs// yum mchog dpal gyi phreng ba dang // gnyis
41b7(rnying rgyud): mau dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// pad+ma dkar po g.yas phyugs na// pi bar 'gyed pa g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor ba re khyams nub phyogs na// spyan ras le brgan pad+ma rigs// yum mchog chon kyi dbyangs mkhan dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi dang du 'khril// rdo /
42a1(rnying rgyud): ga/ bang brtsong pa chags byags na// dmyal 'khor bar kham zung blugs na// rgyug su ma gnas grus/ ga gang mchod par dang // gnyis mau dang bris myo nga 'gro// mangs pa tu na
42a2(rnying rgyud): na/ bdug spos 'dren pa g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams shar sbron// byams pa dkar med pa der gshegs rigs// yum mchog bdug pa'i sprin 'gro dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi dang du 'brel// gser gyi 'khor lo g.yas rdzogs na/
42a3(rnying rgyud): tog 'thor ba g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams lho dub na// sgrib sel dmar ser rin chen rigs// yum mchog me tog char 'bebs pa// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// rin chen snye ma g.yas phyogs na// sngon ma 'dags pa
42a4(rnying rgyud): dkyil gabar 'du ma pa sa/ gas// ma pa sa sa du da
42a5(rnying rgyud): na// dkyil 'khor bar khams byung shar na// 'jam papal dkar sna rdo rje rigs// sum ma ga tsad+hanA rmar 'babs dang // gnyis med dbyung radu 'thil// thub dag theg mchen po ni// sring drug gan rjes 'dzin pa ste// gsheg par ba
42a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pas// rlob ser po'i mi rnams 'an// ra rgyag kyi tshul 'dzin pas// sra ma dog dkar po lha rnams 'dzin// #sa// waM mdzag mad dag lta ma 'dze// ri d+hAr 'byu ba'i zu rgyayas//
42a7(rnying rgyud): pa rigs 'dzin// ba ta brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yis// sgra mdog ser ga rgyal sang 'dren// ma 'bang rgya pas phyag rgya yis/ // sleb phyag tu tshul gnas pa/ rdo rje rjong pa g.yos sgrogs na// lpags
42b1(rnying rgyud): 'phen pa g.yon phyogs na// ngas chen tho ba chen po yang // yum mchog so lcags kyu dang // gnyis med dbyangs kyi dang du 'khyil// rna mgo gdengs pa g.yas thugs na// zhags pa 'ben pa g.yan rdzogs na// chen ga shin+darje gzhung po yang // rnga ma mchod
42b2(rnying rgyud): dmigags pa dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi dang du 'jil// sbal mgo ga dngas pa g.yas phyogs na// lcags sgrog sdom pa g.yon phyogs na// wa chen ta mgrin dpa' bo yang // yum mchog rdo rje lcags zlog dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi rang du 'khril// rgya lam
42b3(rnying rgyud): gnon pa g.yas phyogs na// dril bu 'khrol ba g.yon phyogs na// khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang // yum mchog rdo rje dril 'khol dang // byang gi sgo nas dbyings su 'khril// kun bzang mnyam bzhag ye shes 'phro// yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+ma'i dkyil//
42b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis med dbyings kyi gsang chen spro// bde mchog ngo mtshar thugs kyi dkyil// spro bsdu rdo rje thal mo dag/ bskyar bas rang sems ye shes gsal// de nyid shes rab thabs su rdzogs// sgyu 'phrul dra ba nges pa'i bla ma chen po las phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste
42b5(rnying rgyud): lnga pa'o// // de nas ye shes rgyal po de rdo rje 'akod pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig rgyan rnam par spros pa'i dgongs pa la cig char bzhugs te/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di brjod do// shin tu phra bo'i ting 'dzin mchog/ dpe dang tshad du me gzung zhing // gzhal yas
42b6(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya la sogs te// mtshon du med la snang bar bsgom// shin tu thabs rnam sbyangs te// rig pas rgya byon tshad med pa// gzhal yas phyag rgya la sogs pa'i// mtshon du med la snang bar bsgom// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang // tshogs chen gnyis las
42b7(rnying rgyud): ba pa yi// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan rnams// nam mkha'i mtha'i dang mnyam rdzogs te// rags dang phra dang 'bring la sogs// ji ltar 'dod pa rang gar bya// tsa ka le dang tshoni rtsi dag/ bya dang mi bya med pas na// de la dgag par ma gsungs so//
43a1(rnying rgyud): 'gro don 'tsham pa de bzhin te// sna tshogs mchod pas byas par mchod// bdag nyid chen pos mchod pa yos// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus maHsa// srid gsum 'gro bya ma lus kun// dga' ba chun pos tshim pa yan// 'phrul
43a2(rnying rgyud): dra ba'i dgongs pa yis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus dang // rigs drug 'gro ba mngon du 'gyur// lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad// gang na'ang yod pa ma yin te// rnam dag ye shes sbyor ba yis// dbyings la dbyings nyid sgom pa yis// kun byas
43a3(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug rig pas 'dug/ de nas dang ldan gus 'jug pa// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog res// kyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// snying yang yon gyi mchog yin te// tha ma mnyes phyir gus
43a4(rnying rgyud): ldan dbul// dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na// dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes pa yin// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor spos ci dgos// skyon rnams ma lus nges par 'byung // dang lder brtson 'grus bskyed byas na// phan pa'i dbang nong theg tshang
43a5(rnying rgyud): sbyin// des na dbang phyug rgyal po yis// dbang gi rim pa rnams bstan to// 'gro la phan myur las rnams sbyin// grub pas 'dzin rgyal po sbyin// mi 'gyur rab 'byam bde chen no// gang 'dod rim gyis byin par bya// blo dang ldan pas theg tshad rjod// yang
43a6(rnying rgyud): na sras kyi dam pa ste// chud ma zlos par rdzogs dpung sbyin// sems kyi rnam pa nyid gu gyud// gro 'byed byeng bris gyen du 'askyil// de nas dbang phyug chen po des// mi 'gyur smon mar sku bskyod cing // sems kyi thig le sgo phye ste// tshangs pa men
43a7(rnying rgyud): dbyings bzhid nas// go 'byed rdo rje'i sngags brkyang ste// dad ldan skyes bu dbang bskur / rdzogs pa chen po'i bded badzinin// tshe mchog gong na med pa na// gsang ba'i dbu kun gyi dbang dang // thabs mkhas byin parlabs che bas na// las rnam
43b1(rnying rgyud): na nga ba dang // khams gsum dpung nga bsgrum pas na// nga rgya pan kyang ba // dngas subs zug sa bya ba byos// gas ma gang ba bdu byor// gsang pa dbyas na 'a bcangs pas// ga sa na ma gdong ba //
43b2(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten rje bkun gyi zla// che ba'i tshe bzil gyis gnon// sangs rgyas che ba'i mchod gnas ni// rnal 'byor chen po khyod nyid yin// oM sarba ta thA ga to bu h+ya badz+ra tA ma ku Ta d+hitrA~M/ badz+ra gu h+ya sid tihU~M/ hUM nabs mapas byin brlabs chen po ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi grags yin te// byin pa rlabs rtsa
43b3(rnying rgyud): rnam bzhi po// dbang bskur gnang phyir gtad pas na// rigs kyi bu mchog deng phan chad// sems can kun la snying brje phyir// mu stegs rtag cha de yan chad nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad spyod la// khyod kyis mi bya gcig kyang med// rdo rje sems dang 'drung
43b4(rnying rgyud): pa yis// sems can kun gyi bskod// oM sa ma ya grAHa ba~M ma ya a/ slob dpon rnal chab kyi dbadu ni khams gsum kun la dbang yid bzhin du sbyar te/ hU~M da ni rdul ba kun gyi b+ha// thig le byang chub sems chen pa// nga ni khre rgyal kun sa dza// 9
43b5(rnying rgyud): shes rol pa'i 'byung gnas gter// de ni sde dang la thun med// ston tha la thabs kyi tshul po yin// sems kyid dkyil nas drangs pa'i rtsa// grong kyi spel phre'i di// snying gi dkyil du gzung bar myos// rigs kyi bu khyod deng phan chad// rdo rje sems dpe'
43b6(rnying rgyud): thugs mchog zung // sangs gas kun gyi gtso bo yin// byang chub sems dang mnyam pa'i phyir// sems dpa' kun gyi mchod gnas yin// rigs kyi bu khyod deng phran chad// phyi dang nang dung gsang ba yi// bathun pa phyi nang zab mo kun// sems kyi dkyil
43b7(rnying rgyud): du bsdus nas kyang // rdo rje lce yis sgo phyi ste// bdud rtsi spyan mchog dam pa 'dis// dang ldan gyis bu ngoms par byos// sems kyi thig le dkyil 'khor du// zhi khro 'byam pa'i gter sgoms la// srid pa gsum la dbang // / dbang can tham
44a1(rnying rgyud): rung bzhol bar byos// 'phyob na la byung bar 'gyur// gdul ba'i phyag tu 'di yang stod// drag gsum rtsa bags par byas// b+ha dang slong bya nga rnam par dag/ nam dag rten pa nyid kyilag+sa/ khyod spyod rnab rdzogs gan ma rdzogs pa/
44a2(rnying rgyud): 'brang byung chub sems par cig/ du nga bya sa/ snying shi hU~M// gas kyi // maurnaMs pa 'di de 'i gas // rigs na nga chung gsangs// snying gang kyil du ma
44a3(rnying rgyud): g+ha/ ts+tsha bas marnams gyur // nga ba po zu // ga ga sams shing/ ma sgyu pas byu // dmi ga sa thas shA rten gter/ byung ba mags ces/ la ma
44a4(rnying rgyud): shrI ma hA sa khya rdub ston to// oM AM/ mi 'gyur ba yi ye shes gnas// ma btsal gyinapas pa pa mag/ pa brta sa gsas pas kyi shes smra// gong na med pa'i mun ts+yai ni// ye shes rang gnas bdul pa la// mi 'gyur g.yung drangs tha
44a5(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f// oM mai t+ma kra n+ya gr-i d+ha na maN+Dal// dag rgya sa~Md d+hi swA thA ga A // gzungs dang ting 'dzin stobs dang mi 'jigs pa// 'gyur po med pa'i na 'jog miga'i // mdzin ma ga rtogs pa chen pos lus brgyan cing // oM sas tu c-ig pra \u0f7f A yaSh+T+rI
44a6(rnying rgyud): skye gzhog ga na sa sa pa pa da / dgas pa sa pa la/ 'i
44a7(rnying rgyud): rgyan ga ti ma sa cu su te// rlo' babar po'i riganasas// seMs zhes rgyal ba kyi la rje/ rje 'i me pa pa po du rtsig/ dab pa gas btu 'dzungs/ khye gro 'bas 'dzin pa gan/
44b1(rnying rgyud): rtagata brjes b+ha pa da/ ko& to// dbyings nas nyi shang mkha' la rdzogs pas 'gyur// rgyu 'phrul dbatha mchen po las rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig dang dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po des thugs rje chen pa
44b2(rnying rgyud): gdung ba'i dam tshig lu gu rgyud la snyoms par zhugs nas dmachog stan chen po'i phrin las mdzad do// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsod // zhing bcur ldan pa'i longs spyod la// gsung gi 'gro 'dra rnam spangs te// rdza
44b3(rnying rgyud): chomatha yang dag gsal// oM lnga byin rnabs 'dzin pa'i mchog/ ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i lam// gtsug tu ljang mdzad sems dpa' che// skur skyed byin rlabs mad po che// pa nya mang po'i 'gro 'dra yis// zhing bcuganas nas blangs nas su// haM Tha nyid du
44b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhag ste// shes pa gsum po dbyings su bstim// rang rgyud 'khor ba'i sa bon las// ljang gu ni ru 'phang bstod de// ni ljang hU~M du gnas bsgyur nas// yas 'dus mas 'dus hU~M la 'dus// hUM ni bde gshegs ye shes lnga// dkar la gsal bar skur bskyed
44b5(rnying rgyud): de// bde chen 'od zer 'phro bas brjid/ rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa// yab yum bcu yi byin rlabs nyid// li brgan hU~M ni dbyings su sbyor// kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i mkha'// sangs rgyas sems can gnyi ga'i yum// rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas gtso//
44b6(rnying rgyud): sras su gyur pas bde ba'i mchog/ zhi'agyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams// gnas ni kun bzang yum gyi mkha'o// sa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sa// mi ldog nyi zla'i gdan stengs su// mkhas pas sku yi phyag rgyar bskyod// mtshan dang dpe byad yang
44b7(rnying rgyud): dgra ldon// rtag tu skye mchog gsung dru byid/ tordo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// de nas ye shes rgyal podes// gsang mchog bde pa'i mtshad smin gyis// phyogs be cu'i zhing khams rdul byed na// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor dul phran snyed// de kren
45a1(rnying rgyud): gsang macig sanyis bya gyur// da migs pa'i thal med// 'dum pa'i mngangs kyis grangs sa byas// 'grol nas gsung ba dug su byu // ga sa rtogs pa/ nga turgya gtsug tu 'byor// 'dun
45a2(rnying rgyud): rnam bzhi yang dag ldan// rigs bzhi lha mo rnam smos te// stong khams bkang nas mchod pa byed// la la gsang mchog dbyings su 'khril// la la 'dod lnga'i mchod pa byed// rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang // bla de rgyal mtshan 'phyan gdugs dang // rin chen
45a3(rnying rgyud): do shal se mo do// dbyebs legs rin chen phung pos mdzes// bsam rdzogs rin chen sdong po yis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod// la la 'gro pa'i bskod// la la bdud 'dul nga ni pong skyong // kun kyang gsung ba'i mchod 'grol byed/
45a4(rnying rgyud): gsang pa'i rdu nga ba// gnyis sa myed par 'grel rgyasas// 'a nas gan ma pa byed// stong shAm stsu sa 'bru ga zug tshul na// gna'i mchad pachen pa yi// thams cad mnyes pa can par byar// de nas ye shes byapa pa nying kyigs
45a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgyal mo dang gnyis su med par 'khril nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o bde gshegs spyod pa'i mchog/ sna tshogs spyod la rang bzhin gsang // me chags pa yi ngo bo las// chags pa chen po'i spyod pa 'byung // spyod pa chen po rnam gnyis la//
45a6(rnying rgyud): togs nas chags pas su spyod pa// yang dag chags pa chen po ste// 'di ni tshangs mchog rgyal po yin// sems kyi spyod pa rnam pa gnyis// zhing bcu mnyes pa'i las bya'o// zhes ched du gsungs so// de lta bus phyogs parje dus 'ani'i de bzhin
45a7(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i zhing khams kyis bsdus pa thams cad mnyes pa chen pos thim par gyur to// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las thugs rje gdung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po de mchod pa bla ma'i rgyan bkor
45b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la thams par zhugs nas 'dig/ dgasungs so// b+hU 'phrul drabs mang 'ardzogs pa'o// dkyil 'khor tha ma dgongs pa'i mchog/ br-i gAr 'du 'phro'i phyag rgya bas// 'jal lam nam mkhar 'gro bar das// glu chog thA la phyag rgya yis// dzo
45b2(rnying rgyud): kyi sems dpa'i dngos grub len// bza' dang bzung bar phyag tu yis// yid bzhin sems dpa'i dngos phub le// rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'od 'bar bla ma'i dngos grub len// A li kA lo'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad grub cing rdo rje ngos// chu dras/
45b3(rnying rgyud): dbyings su sbyor shes shing // tha ma'i dgongs pa gang sbyor ba// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du nges// skye ba rnam bzhi rgyud sbyangs nas// mtshan rdzogs sa la gdon mi za// zhes gsungs pas tshogs chen po rnam pa gnyis rdzogs par gyur to// de nas nyid
45b4(rnying rgyud): grAma'i mjed skyong yang gyes pa chen pos klu 'di blangs so// oM gas bcungs pa nardzogs pas// ye shes dkyil 'khor zhig ste// bsod rnams dkyil 'khor zla ya tshogs// shAng nga pog lesan rdzog ste / ud tha bsod rnams theg la na// nga
45b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rjes chen mtha' yas pa// rdo rje rgyal po bag laH/ na/ oM me dmigs sgra 'brel mnyam pa'i dbyings// mtha' yas spyan nas sna tshogs 'gro// mtha' yas kun nas sman gyis thim// sna tshogs su gsung thugs chen po/
45b6(rnying rgyud): oM sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che// yon tan zin lhas kun tu rdzogs// ye nas spyan rdzogs kun tu bzang // badz+ras pa'i rdzogs chen thig le me// ho/ oM phyogs bcu 'jig rten rdul skyed du// rgyal bI'i don rnams dul zan snyested// sbrul po rdul phran ba sam
45b7(rnying rgyud): yas kyi// skad cig yung la lhun gyis grub// ho/ oM thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// sku ga srung thugs kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsung thugs kyi kun tu khyab// sku gsung thugs kyi thig la che ha~M/ oM thams cad thig le bla ma 'don// sgra 'phrul bla mthig
46a1(rnying rgyud): 'o gyis kyis nyid byang chubs mas nan bathomangs pa'adun/ tshig gtos las gsos bcad / sgra rgal napa mtshan padam chag can pa rnam pagatus zhes pa'i mi mya papadan du
46a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po de sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po'i 'jigs pa chen po'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'du mdzad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag tu lta ba dang / rmongs pa'i dbang gis gab pa'i gsang ba chen po na ma rtogs/ sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon
46a3(rnying rgyud): pabazhin pas chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don no rgyal bar por// bram tha'i ngan sngags mang pon thor gdeng du blangs nas snang rje chen po'i las dang ni bral gnas su ming btags nas zhe sdang sgrol ba'i las ni kun du byed/ thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med pa'i don ni ma
46a4(rnying rgyud): rtogs/ 'dod chags spyod pa'i las dang skad cig tsam yang ma bral/ rang rig pa'i ye shes ni grol nub/ don dam pa la kun du gti mug pas ni rgyun du khebs/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan ni mya rtogs/ nga rgyal khengs pa'i dregs pa'i las ni rgyun du byed/
46a5(rnying rgyud): tshad med pa bzhi'i las dang ni bral/ sgeg dog gi tshub mas ni rgyun du khrid de/ bdag tu rmongs pa dang rtog pa la zhen te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bral ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs te/ srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba rdo rje dmyal
46a6(rnying rgyud): ba chen por bskal pa chen po stong phrag drug cur skyes so// de las thar nas nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen por bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so// las kyi sgrib 'drub mo de las thar te sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas yi dgas srin po chen po lus gcig
46a7(rnying rgyud): mgo bo brgya pa mgo bo sna tshogs pa/ lus de rgyab mgo gcig pa lus dang yan lag mang po 'dug pa mtshan cha sna tshogs pa rdzogs shing gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul mang po ston pas klu'i nges nas 'bras bu chab man chad dbang du bsdus nas sa ban nub tus mang po 'dabam
46b1(rnying rgyud): de nas sngon legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bus bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis sku'i dbyibs legs par brgyad pa ye shes phyin ci ma log pa'i spyan gyis gzigs te/ las ngan pa'i sbyin pa de nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spang ba dang / khams gsum
46b2(rnying rgyud): gyi sems can bde ba la gzhag pa'i phyir thugs rje chen po'i ye shes skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen po ye shes kyi rgyal po de nyid 'jigs byed chen po rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po
46b3(rnying rgyud): sprin rnam par spro ba sgyu 'phrul bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin nyid kyi bla ma chen po'i dbyings nas nyid kyi gsang ba'i bdag mo khro mo'i rgyal mo chen mo mngon du phyung ste/ hi hi zhes dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis pad+ma rgyas par mdzad de/ gnyis su med
46b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dgyes pa chen pos thim nas gsang ba bla ma'i sprin las/ hUM hU~M hU~M badz+ra dz+wa bi Sho/ b+ha badz+ra dz+wa la maN+Dal phaT phaT ha la ha la hU~M zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad dur khrod bdal ba chen po'i rang bzhin khrag gi rgya mtsho dpa' rlabs 'khrug pa'i
46b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil na/ keng dus chen po ri dab kyi steng na don me dbang du 'chil po'i dbus na 'og rdon rgyagam mig mangs ris su bris pa/ rdzogs bani ngos bzhi 'brar bar thams gsum rdo rje rin po 'i klo/ 'brar du mdzes pa/ sgo bta ta babs mA k+Shan du bcas pa/ rdo rje dzi
46b6(rnying rgyud): po che rgya gram mthing ga 'bar ba'i rtsig pa dra ba ris su brtsigs pa/ steng yid bzhin gyi rin po che 'bar ba/ rdo rje rgya gram 'bar ba'i bla re mig mangs su bres pa/ rtse mo dbyibs bla mas 'og min gyi gnas na srid pa'i rtse mo man chad bum pa'i tshul du dbyibs rdo rje rgya
46b7(rnying rgyud): gram mig mangs gcig tu 'khyil pa/ ye shes rdo rje rgya gram gyi cho 'phrul bla ma'i 'od 'bar bas phyogs bzhir 'phros shing 'khrugs pas khams gsum thams cad bdal ba/ rgyal mtshan bla ma chen po dang / ru mtshon bla ma chen pos phyogs bzhi grwa bzhi
47a1(rnying rgyud): rnas bsgreng // gsang ba tha ma'i ci gangs kyi ma bskor pa/ rdo rje rin ba rje'i rgyu ros kyi shing ljon pa rnams phyogs mtshams gtibs pa/ phyi dang nang med pa kun du yang tham chen po'i nang du gyur pa/ khams gsus thams kyang myong par
47a2(rnying rgyud): rtsig pa 'chor ba med pa'i gzhal yas khang na khro bo dang khro mo'i rol pa'i phyag rgya stong gi 'jig rten rdul phra mo snyed 'thon par gyur to// de nas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'u 'ur dang chem tsham dang / shig shig dang / thor thor dang /
47a3(rnying rgyud): gtogs shig dang / choms shig dang / sod cig dang / drol zhig dang / sbyongs shig la sogs pas 'jig rten na dbang che zhing dpa' brtul che zhing brtul zhugs can rnams brgyal bar gyur to// de nas dgyes pa chen pos ye shes kyalu po de nyid
47a4(rnying rgyud): dur khrod bla ma chen por dgyes nas khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil keng rus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng na rdo rje me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na rdo rje ye shes kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa la nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang mchod pa bla ma chen po mdzad de gnyis su med pa'i
47a5(rnying rgyud): dbyings nas 'di byed do// hUM badz+ra du dzinan swar+b+ba tsat+pa pad+ma maN+Da la de btidz+nyA na zhes brjod pas ye shes rin po che'i 'khrur lo cigs bzhi pa 'od 'bar ba'i steng du ngar khrod gdug pa'i rgyags seng ge la sogs pa tham chen pong khri bcugs te/ gang ma zhes ti nA
47a6(rnying rgyud): dang padz+ra sbal bar bting ba'o// de nas cho 'phrul brim chen pos brgyal ba/ bsam gtan snga mu chen po sngags pa tshad med pa/ dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ye shes bla mchen pos dregs pa thams cad dus gtsug tu btul ba'i bla ma rnam men po la
47a7(rnying rgyud): mtshon pa dang / dmigs pa'i yul las 'das pa'i phyag rgya bra ma 'ong 'bar ba bzhugs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po chen po sku mthing nag cing yang 'gyur ba/ ji ljags kyis gsung 'brug stong gi sgra sgrogs pas sto bems thams cad dus
47b1(rnying rgyud): gcig tu 'jig pa/ ye shes me'i thugs kyis snang srid kyi bud shing dus gcig tu bsregs pa/ steng 'og med par kun du rtsi bung zhes byed pa/ dpu dgu phyag bcwa brtsa pa/ zhabs rnam pa brgyad du gtams pa/ phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs pa rnams/
47b2(rnying rgyud): dur yod kyi rkyen gyis brgyan pa/ sta 'ab rab te shus bdun mang zhing rigs lha'i na h+ya kyis btsun pa/ rdo rje mthing gi gi gsheg pas 'jig rten gyi khams yog par gasgrub pa/ khros pa'i rtsal ma mthing naga'abar ba dang gnyis su med par bzhugs
47b3(rnying rgyud): so// gnyis su med pa'i dbyings nas shar phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsi bas stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i steng du ma hA de ba dang / 'dod pa'i lha gan rgyal du brtul ba'i steng du nyid kyi gzugs kyi phung po du bcom ldan 'das bud+d+ha he ru ka/ swa mdo gser nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs
47b4(rnying rgyud): DUr myur ba dun khrong kun gyi snang can par// phyag na mtshan ma sna tshogs bsnams papa// bde gshegs thos pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril brtson pa'i phru du ba zugs so// / rgyags kyi khyer lo rtsibs rje yul khrid pa 'i gdan nyes zug shin rje gnaHla
47b5(rnying rgyud): bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi tshor ba'i phung po las bcom ldan 'das rid+d+ha he ru ka sku mdog sngo nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril pa chen mo'i tshul gyis
47b6(rnying rgyud): bzhugs so// nub phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi shrI'i steng du chu bdag gi rgyal po dang 'khor lo nag po b+hung gi rI ti gar+b+ha rgyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du shes kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das pad+ma he ru ka sku mdog dmar nag dbu gsum phyag drug
47b7(rnying rgyud): zhabs bzhir gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// pad+ma khros pa'i rgyal ma dang 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i gdan stengs su gnod sbyin stobs bzangs gan
48a1(rnying rgyud): rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du byed kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das karma he ru ka sku mdog ljang nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad par gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ las mchog khros pa'i rgyal
48a2(rnying rgyud): mo dang 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// de nas dreg pa chen po la sogs pas gdug pa'i sems kyis gtum pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pas mgrin gcig tu 'dug pa'i dngos gtum pa'i brlang tshig tu smras pa/ thong zong snying rje'i bdag po ci 'di ltar
48a3(rnying rgyud): byed dam zhes zer zhing shin tu gtum pas rngam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos ye shes rgyal po de nyid sku gzi badz+rod chen po'i mdangs su gyur te/ thugs rje chen pos 'dul ba 'thabs kyis sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gsang sngags bla ma'i rngam pa'i gdangs skad
48a4(rnying rgyud): chen po 'di dag phyung ngo // hU~M hU~M hUM/ ha ha ha/ A hi khA hi khA hi/ zhes brjod pas dbang phyug cher mo la sogs pa'i gdug pa'i tshogs de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun gyung nas nad til kun drangs yan lag kun bcad btubs te sha zos/ khrag 'thungs rus pa kun
48a5(rnying rgyud): 'chos so// de nas 'jigs byed chen po de nyid kyis hU~M hU~M hU~M b+h+yo a a ra li tsA dzA zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas pa yangs 'bru gcig tsam du chung par bsdus so// de nas 'byung po marungs pa thams cad kyi rje bo'i yang
48a6(rnying rgyud): rdo bo// dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung mo thams cad kyi ri mo'i yang rje mo// srin mo chen mo mi srun mo dang / tshangs ma dang / khro mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sreng mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dmar po dang / bdud rtse mo dang /
48a7(rnying rgyud): ba mo dang / be chen mo dang / srin mo dang / zab mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / ra ro khrag 'brang mo dang / gcig pu spyod ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlung mo dang / gsod byed mo dang / me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byed mo dang / bA
48b1(rnying rgyud): mdang / rdza l+h+wam dang / nag mtshan mo dang / ramag dmar ser chen ma dang / bum sna snganag chan ma dang / gsus 'dzin rje nas chen ma la sogs pa dang / yang bran dang / g.yog dang / yung gamag la sogs pa 'khor zhing gi rdul kyang bsgru sa/
48b2(rnying rgyud): dngas yang sa na pa ma smras pal ba da kyis rjes ga 'i me pa kun 'ang ba zhe de 'i ma dag / ma ldas 'dus gyu // / bad rgyas pa ga rjem lal thas
48b3(rnying rgyud): nga ba ma smras pajams dang shin chags pa'i yi ga ras nas gas brtsas par gyis nas dang me mang la jugs pang sa ba maldan 'as mi zhes bre sla mi thun ma lasags pa na 'tshal na// bam ldan 'das ser dang rjed pa
48b4(rnying rgyud): ma la gas pa la dis // som ldan sa na rkyen pa du bdu rnam lamagasupa lnga 'khrim la// com ldan 'das dmar nag chen po'i thul khrigags rgyas ma la sngags pa lnga 'phrul la// brjes ldan 'das nga dge ng+ge
48b5(rnying rgyud): la mo mo la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo// de nas dgyes pa chen po de dag gis hU~M zhes brjod pas pad+ma'i tshogs bsdus te shin tu brtsam par gyur to// de nas dgyes te hA ha zhes brjod pas nyid kyi shes pa'i tshogs rnam par shes pa brgyad las dkar po la
48b6(rnying rgyud): sngags pa brgyad rang gi leg cha dang nga mtshar du chas te 'thon par gyur tAM// 'dzin nas kyang 'khor la 'bar ba'i phyi rol shir phyogs nas 'khor bar khro bo'i gzugs kyis snying nge 'jigs tshul gyis stan la gnas so// de nas dgyes ti s+t+waM zhes brjod pa pa
48b7(rnying rgyud): shes pa'i yul brgyad las song gdong chen mo la sogs pa brkyang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas te 'thun nas yang 'khor lo 'bar ba'i bang khyams su snying rje 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis stan la shin tu dam pa'i skabs kyis gnas so// de nas dgyes te
