49a1(rnying rgyud): phaT rjes phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus par bsregs pas phyogs bcu'i zheng ma lus pa na 'gro ba rnams kya don ma lus par mdzad pa thub pa chen po drug bcom ldan 'das drug 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzang cing 'gro ba drug 'dul ba dang / yad chas
49a2(rnying rgyud): dbyings nas rol te spror byed nyi zer zhags pa can la sogs pa brgyad du gyur te/ 'bar ba'i bar khyams gsum pa la zhing skam gshe ba spel pa'i gdan stengs su rang gi lag cha dang shin tu rngam pa'i stobs kyis shar phyogs nas 'khor bar gnas so// de nas dgyes
49a3(rnying rgyud): phaT ces brjod pas nyid kyi phyin ci log bzhi las rdo rje srengs 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du rmas nas dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po'i sgo bzhir snying rje te jigs tshul gyi stan la shi/ tu rngam pa'i gzugs kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du
49a4(rnying rgyud): gnas so// de nas dgyes pa chen po'i sprin las/ bud+d+ha rol pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dus gcig tu phaT ces brjod pas thams ca khros nas 'byung mo thams nad steng rang gi gnas su yud tsam gyis phyin par dkyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag
49a5(rnying rgyud): 'thung chen po de nyid thugs rje chen pos bdud rtsi dbyung ba zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa cig char zhugs te sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo // oM badz+ra a mr-i ta ma hA krod+he aM a~M zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das
49a6(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung chen po'i snam logs nas 'thon to// 'dam khu blud de dran pa rnyed do// de nas khrag 'thung chen po dri dag kun ya mtshan chen por gyur te cho 'phrul chen po mdzad pa mthong ngo // de dag gi dus su 'jig rten drug na gnas pa'i dregs pa chen po rnams
49a7(rnying rgyud): dus gcig tu brtul bar mthong ste/ shin tu zhum zhing breng nis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ 'bangs su mching bangs su mchi// 'bangs sunan tan ma 'gyes na// mgo dang lus kyang brgyar 'gas shing // snying ya gas shing gzungs gyur cig/ rung
49b1(rnying rgyud): lcags chog nas rlag pa dang // dmyal bar lhung nas 'byor bar shog/ tsas 'bangs su mchi bar rang rang gis da mod btsugs so// de nas de dag kun dkyil 'khor gyen na du bzhag go// de nas yang de thams cad kyis maman gcig tu smras pa/ rang
49b2(rnying rgyud): gi chung ma dang / bu mo dang / rang rang gi ma dang / sring mo rnams dkyil 'khor rngu thul te/ bdag cag rnams kyi mdzes thang dang // ma dang sring me bu monams// dkri la bar chen por ba zhes su gsol// dbang po sgra rjes pades su gsol/ @
49b3(rnying rgyud): cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis// 'bar bya'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di// ming tsam 'dzin par su bgyid pa// nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar// de yi dgos pa rdzogs par bgyid// ces dmod 'dzugs so// de nas de'i ma dang / sring ma dang
49b4(rnying rgyud): ma dang / bu mo rnams yung tsam gyis phyin par 'ongs nas las kyi dngos grubasgol ba las// de nas khrag 'thung ye shes chen pos ming btags/ lag tu rdo rje byin nas rdo rje bran dang po nyar dbang bskur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po'i ngo
49b5(rnying rgyud): phyogs brgya dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gsal zhing dbar bar b+ha ba'i phyir ye shesas pa po de nyid kyigs ba'i rgyal mo dang gnyis sa med par gyur nas spags/ rdzogs rdo rje tha ma las daM ny-i dag spyang // e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos// ma
49b6(rnying rgyud): dbyings gnyis su med pa las// mtha' la rje ma'i dkyil 'khor shar// rje btsugs nyid dkyil gangan spangs sa// de la lha tshogs gdan du btig/ trA~M khor po ni 'i ste dwangs su// khri ba shams nyid kyil ma bdud gdon// de ma steng du ngas
49b7(rnying rgyud): bya ba// byang chub sems las sku bskyed pa// dpal chen bla med he ru ka/ dbu dgu phyag kyang bcwa brgyad de// spyan yang 'bar ba nyi shu bdun// dbul rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gsol// zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du gtams// rdo rje mthing ga khrung gi
50a1(rnying rgyud): gshog/ 'jig rten khams kyang log par bkag// sbal nag 'jigs su rung ba dang // ngur 'od can gyis brtan pa'o// dbu blasram dang la byung ba ni// g.yas dkar gson dmar dbus mthing zhal// rnam par thar pa'i dbu gsum gyis/
50a2(rnying rgyud): khams gsum mya ngan zlo ba'i zhal// dbu gsum par nas rngam pa ni// g.yas sngo g.yon ljang dbus mthing zhal// thabs dang shes rab sems kyi dbu// srid gsum dbyings su rdzogs pa'i zhal// dbu gsum mtha' nas rngam pa ni// g.yas mthing g.yon mthing
50a3(rnying rgyud): dbus mthing zhal// khams gsum re bskong pa yi// lung dang man ngag sems kyi dbu// 'gyur ba med pa'i mthing nag zhal// skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshems// dbu dgu rol pa'i byin brlabs las// g.yas gsum glog stong lce 'byin cing // g.yon
50a4(rnying rgyud): gsum 'brug stong sa sgrogs pa// dbu gsum rdo rje ser chen 'beb// spyan dgu dang la gzigs pa ni// chos dbyings kun du bzang po dang // kun du bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings la// 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis gzugs// spyan dgro bar nas gzigs
50a5(rnying rgyud): pa ni// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyis// srid pa'i sems can thams cad la// byams mgon snyoms pa'i spyan gyis gzigs// spyan dgu mtha' nas gzigs pa ni// g.yas gsum zhe sdang khros pa'i spyan// gzigs pas bdud deng mu steg
50a6(rnying rgyud): sgrol// g.yon gsum byams mgon snyoms pa'i spyan// gzigs pas mdza' yas bde la 'jog/ da pe gsum ye shes rol pa'i spyan// gzigs pas skye 'gro gnas su stobs// dgra dbu rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dgu// lnga dgu bzhi bcu rtsa lnga yang//
50a7(rnying rgyud): bzhi bcu rtsa lngas brtson// stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyis// khyab bdal chen po'i rtags su bsnams// bcwa brgyad phyag na rol pa yis// spyong pa bcwa brgyad dbyings su sbyor// zhabs brgyad nga rgyal dregs pa 'joms// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa
50b1(rnying rgyud): rje dag gsog pa brgyad// sa brgyad ldakun partsams pa 'os// spyod po chung gsas// rgyan sa ngan gam// dpa dag kyis can galas// rgyan du shA brjod// rdzog
50b2(rnying rgyud): chung dang rin chede'i rang g.yon// yon tan bcwa brgyad dbyings su rdzogs// dang po rdo rje bu chen ni// khams gsum dang du bsdus nas kyang // bdud de ste stegs kun 'drims pa'o// gnyis pa spyir chen po nyid ni// srid pa'i sems can thams cad
50b3(rnying rgyud): sman// dam tshig stan dbyings su thol// gsum pa stir chung ril med ni// drag gsum rnam par sgrol ba'i rtags// bzhi pa snyir chen nang zhags ni// kyad wa'i sems can dbyings su 'dren// lnga pa nyi zla zung du 'dzin// byang chub sems las g.yos pa
50b4(rnying rgyud): med// drug pa khyung dang 'ug pa ni// mkha' 'gro thams cad 'khol ba'i rtags// bdun pa me dpung rlung gis 'thor// srid pa'i bag chags thal bar rlog/ brgyad pa ri rab rgya mtsho rnams// thams cad ma lus g.yeng gnas shing // dazung ba
50b5(rnying rgyud): lha mnga' byirnas phyi// gru pa rjin da// sa tha stsal pa 'byung ba'i rtags// degra ga nyis rba dri med pa las// ting pa pan brgyad kyis ma rdzogs// dza ma nga kun rjes brgya pa'i// thang rnam 'da' 'thong pa yis// de bzugs gzug
50b6(rnying rgyud): mngon par rdzogs pa'i su brgyas pa'o// thod rnon 'bar po'i phreng ba 'od// khams gsum dbang du bsdus nas su// sprul pa'i sku la mnga' brnyas pa'o// thod pa phyed tshul phreng bas ni// drag lnga bdud rtsir sbyor bste// los spyod sba la mnga' brtes pa'o//
50b7(rnying rgyud): zhing chen rnon pa'i rnabaza' ni// ches dbyings mnyam pa chen po ste// chos kyi sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// stag lpags g.yang gi ni ga ma thabs ni// drin las rnam bzhi'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje'i sbrul mda' dgyes pa'o// sbrul nag tshun 'phyang mang po /
51a1(rnying rgyud): naya shes thams cad 'byung ba'i rtags// rtags can yul yang banas pa'o// zhabs brgyad brgyad bang sna pa ni// dAm+b+hal can rnams mar gcod pag/ sangs/ sa mas pa'o// la can tu 'a shAn stug// bang drug 'ang
51a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i ral pa can// rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang mthun// 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su// b+han d+ha raka gtso la stobs// 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs na// khri dang nye dkyil nyi zla'i gdan// de yi steng du bas
51a3(rnying rgyud): bya ba// gzugs kyi phung po gnas gyur pa// khrag 'bud but+tA he rAka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bzang // g.yas ljang g.yon sgo dbus sar zhal// phyag drug mngon par rol pa las// 'khor lo dgra ga zhags pa g.yas// nyan te rnge rdza
51a4(rnying rgyud): kha T+wAM g.yon// ser nag dur khrod rkyen gyis brgyan// bde gshegs khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // 'khril ba chen po'i tshul drabasam// sgo phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs spangs na// khri dang nyi dkyil gshin rje'i gdan// dri yi snying du bas ma pas// ra brje
51a5(rnying rgyud): sad pa gnas gyur ba// khrag 'thu ts+tsha rbaka/ dbu gsum thug drug zhabs bzhir bzad// g.yas me ga yan dmar dbus rjen // phyag rngub mngon par ril pa las// drin che ga shI li dang gcan shing g.yas// tanA~M ta rba c-i
51a6(rnying rgyud): g.yon// sngo nag dur khrod kyin gyis brgyan// rin chen thos pa'i rgyal mo dang // 'khril bu chen po'i tshul du bsam// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs glengs so// khri dang nyid kyil klu yi ga na// de yi gang du 'asam bya ba// 'dzinas tha~M mig
51a7(rnying rgyud): gyur pa// thig 'thung pa R+Sha ha suM// dbu gsum phrag drug zhabs pazhir bzang // g.yas sngo g.yon dmar debus sdang zhal// phyag drug mngon par rol pa las// pad+hi rje'u chung su gri g.yas// nyan d+ha kha T+wAM so srang g.yon// dmar nag dung wan
51b1(rnying rgyud): rgyan gyis brgyan// pad+ma thos pa'i rgyal mo dang // 'khril ba chen po'i rgyal du bsam// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stangs na// khri dang na dkyil gnod sbyin gdan// de yi snang du bas ma b+ha ba// 'du byed rung pa gnas gyur pa// khrag 'thung kan te r+ya
51b2(rnying rgyud): dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dmar g.yon ser dbus ljang zhal// phyag drug mngon par rol pa las// dal gri zhags pa rnge'u chung g.yas// b+han d+ha thod dbyug kha T+wAM g.yon// ljang nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// las mchog
51b3(rnying rgyud): zos pa'i rgyal mo dang // 'khril pa chen po'i tshul du bzhugs// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyi rim na// me dpung 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na// mkha' dbyings gnyis su med pa las// mkha' los skyes pa'i phra men ma// shar phyogs su ni bsam bya
51b4(rnying rgyud): sa bdag 'grel ba'i gdan glengs su// kun gzhi gnas kyar phra men ma// rnal 'byor skyon ga g+ho 'a rim// ral pa lam nAg sngon du 'khril// mche gtsags rgan bdabus g.yang gzhi gsol// skyugs par gla grangs hA has bzhad// ster dbyug pa
51b5(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha ra TI g.yon phan// skye shi ma la brkyang bsum bzhugs// lho phyogs ngos su bsam bya ba// gsod sbyin bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// rnam shes gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor ser nag tse'u ri ma// ral pa 'am nag
51b6(rnying rgyud): gyen du 'khyil// maT+wAM gtsigs rgan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol// srugs pas klu blangs ha has bzhad// thabs kyi mda' drangs g.yas pa nA// shes rab bzhu ba rungs g.yon pa na// yA mya ye la brkyang bskam bzhugs// nub kyi phyogs smra bsam
51b7(rnying rgyud): nyim bsgyel ba'i gdan myo sa // na mongs gnas kyur phrayinam// rdul 'byor dmang nag bra ma hA// ral pa las drug byin du la gyi/ ma rtse gtsigs rkyen pa sa nga byon// sngags pas grwa slongs ha nas pad// su srin
52a1(rnying rgyud): mtshan g.yas pan// b+han d+ha rag gson pa na// sman le rkyang bsum bzhugs// zung giphyogs su bsam b+hag// zlab brtul ba'i gdan sangs sa// reg bla gnas gyur tha man ma// rnal 'byor mthong na kar ta // ral pa kham nag kun
52a2(rnying rgyud): du 'khyil// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi ston// skabs pas d+ha blangs hA has bzhad// rdo rje rje lnga g.yas pa na// snyir chung mgo gcod g.yon pa na// tsan+da ye la brkyang bsum bzhugs// shar lho mtshams su bsam byab// me lha
52a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i gdan stengs su// lha byed phra men gnas gyur pa// rnal 'byor dmar/ ga puk+ka si// skra 'bar mtsho gtsigs rgan brdabs shing // dur khrod g.yang gzhi skrag pa gyon// spags pas glu grangs ha has bzhad// sI ra chen po g.yas pa na// choms
52a4(rnying rgyud): bar chu 'dren g.yon pa na// ak+She ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs// lhon/ mtshams su bsam b+ha ba// bden bral basbrel ba'i gdan stengs su// nyan bye gnas kyar tha min ma// rnal 'byor mthe nag sA sha ni/ sba 'bar mche gtsigs rgan
52a5(rnying rgyud): brdabs shing // srog chags chen po g.yang gzhi gyon// skyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad// spyir chung ngu g.yon pa na// tsit+ta ltung ba g.yas pa nA// ni ri ti la brkyang bskum pa zhugs// nub byang mtshams su bsam bya ba// rlung lha bsrel pa'i gdan
52a6(rnying rgyud): stengs su// sdom byed gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor saur nag tsaN+DA mi// skra 'bar mche gtsigs rgan brdabs shing // 'jig su ShAng ba'i skrag pa gsol// rmugs pas klu klung sa nya nya ya bzhad// stin chung ngu g.yas pa na// b+han ta bcad
52a7(rnying rgyud): pa g.yon pa ni// ba ya baM la brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang shar mtshams su bus me bya ba// dbang ldan bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// myong byed gnas bu ra phra men ma// rnal 'byor ldeng nag g+has ma ri// skra 'bar mche gtsigs rgan bdams shi
52b1(rnying rgyud): chen po'i shun pa gsol// lkugs pas kra blangs ha has bzhad// than d+ha ra thA g.yas pa na// rtse gsum 'khrug pa g.yon pa na// i shwa ra la brgyad bskum bzhugs// dkyil 'khor du yi b+hi ri ma dra// smug nag 'bar ba'i bar khyams na// kang
52b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i mkha' las sbrer bskyed pa// shid kyi stsogs sa bsam gru ba// dri na bsnol ba'i gdan gdus su// kun gzhi yul las gnas gyur ba// tha men thogs med sang ge'i gdong// rnal 'byor ser nag sing ga ma~M// mche gtsigs rgan brdabs gang
52b3(rnying rgyud): kon// b+hag gnyis snol nas shin tu 'phreng // skyed chen pa sdug ci gsol// s+yen+d+ra ya~M la brgyang bskum bzhugs// hU~M mi galas pas mabyag// bral bum bsngal gA'i gdan stengasas// rnam gas yul paganas thar pa//
52b4(rnying rgyud): bdug gi gdang // rnal 'brir dam nag hU~M thAm// mcho gtsigs na ni bdag sa ga yang gag kyini/ phyag gnyis kyin kyi 'di tshul gyis// steng chung bsgyur dus 'brutshugs sa// ra tri'i gdan me rgya ba babyugs// nub kyi tshogs spangs ma tha'o//
52b5(rnying rgyud): ye dgas bskul ba'i gdan sangs su// nyon mongs yul la gnas gyur pa// tha men rtog 'dul la yi gdang // rnal 'byor dmar nag si ka ma~M// mchog tsigs rkye na brdabs g.yang gni gyon// phyag gnyis stir chen nang po la 'dra// rje 'di gdanaH/
52b6(rnying rgyud): btud bskum bzhugs// byang gi phyogs su bsam b+ha ba// gnod sbyin bsgyel TA'i gdan stangs su// reg bya yul la gnas gyur pa// phra men btang snyoms spyad mo'i gdong // rnal 'byor mthing nag shA na ma// mchi gtsigs rgan brdebs g.yang gzhi ston//
52b7(rnying rgyud): gas pa su skye ma cwas gag ga na ma byang sum su di ga da byes / 'a las gas bla ba/ kha'i dgeng //
53a1(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor dmar nag kri ta ma// mchu brdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// zangs gri rnan po g.yas pa na// rgya zhags drang ba g.yon pa na// rak+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho nub mtshams su bsam bya ba// srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan
53a2(rnying rgyud): stengs sa// nyan byed yul la gnas gyur pa// tha men gsal byed dur bya'i gdong // rnal 'byor rna la ma kad ma// mchu brjir rgan brdabs g.yang gzhigasol// spyir chung snyid slad g.yas g.yon na// rngam pa'i tshul gyis zag la bkal// dbus la
53a3(rnying rgyud): brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub byang mtshams su bsam bya ba// srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// snom byed yul la gnas gyur pa// phra men sa le bya rog gdong // rnal 'byor dmar nag kha khwa ma// mchu brdar rgan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon//
53a4(rnying rgyud): zangs gri dmar po g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha raD+ha g.yon pa na// rak+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang shar mtshams su bsam bya ba// srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// myod byed yul la gnas gyur pa// phra men rdzogs byed thug pa'i gdong // rnal
53a5(rnying rgyud): 'byor ljang nag tu lu ma// mchu brdar rgan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol// rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas pa na// stir chung su 'joms g.yon pa nA// rak+Sha sa la brgyad bskum bzhugs// 'bar ba'i bar khyams tha ma la// thod skam 'bar ba'i gzhal yas
53a6(rnying rgyud): na// zhing chen bsnol ma'i gdan sbyangs su// shar gyi phyogs su bsam b+ha ba// nyul byed yul la gnas gyur pa// sgor byed chen mo mi zad ma// sku tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog ma// zhing chen rol pa'i skrag pa gsol// ral pa kham nag
53a7(rnying rgyud): dri 'bar// sngags pas klu blangs srid gsum 'bar// ha ha gad mos ye shes rol// nyi zer zhags pa g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rag g.yon pa na// rdo rlon steng du brkyang bsgom bzhugs// lho yi phyogs su bsam bya ba// maM mgon thub pa gnas
53b1(rnying rgyud): kyang nga // dor byed rkyen mo mdung byung 'beg// rnal 'byor sar nagatul man na// ral pa kham nag rkyen du byeg// me yig yang gzhogs sa son// lhags pas byu gangs sridagasu ma sbyangs// haha gdums med pa mthor// dong pang ba
53b2(rnying rgyud): na// tan d+ha da ga g.yo pa na// de tron steng du bcing bkram bzhugs// rlub kyi phyogs su bas ma thub// chos kyi dbyings las gnas gyur pa// sngor byed rdo rje rjel 'jol ma// rnal 'byor mtshan du med pa'il// dwer khaman ga nyen du bar/
53b3(rnying rgyud): dbyings kyi na bzang gsol// sngags pas thu grangs stong khams spor// ha ha'i gad mos dbyings su sbyor// gsung bsgrags dril bu g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha ra b+ha g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bcugs// byang gi phyogs su bas ma ga//
53b4(rnying rgyud): pa gnas gyur pa// mor byed thaMd phreng skar mda'i gdong // rnal 'byor sngo nag nyul chen ma// srog chags chen po'i g.yang gzhi gyon// ral pa khwa mu nag gyen du 'bar// sngags pas glu blangs khams gsum stangs// ha ha gad mos lha men spor/
53b5(rnying rgyud): skar mda' gsas byud// tan na de g.yon pan// rnyed skyeng du rgya 'i rnam bzhugs// shAng sgrom rnams srabs pa zlab// phyaganas myur pa// gror byed byung zig sa gnod sbyi ma// rnal 'byor mthing nagardul nanapa//
53b6(rnying rgyud): byed g.yang gzhi gos su lon// ral pa lam nag gyen du 'bad// lcags pas klu blangs sto khams grags// ha ha gad mos lha rnams smod// rdo de khyud chen g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rag g.yon pa na// ro tshon sted du btung 'phrum brdegs// myo
53b7(rnying rgyud): mtshams su bas ma byab// yi dgas thub pa gnas gyur pa// spor byed me khyer klog phreng 'dzin// rnal 'byor dmar nag nyul chen ma// yi dwags mgrin rings g.yang gzhi gyon// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// spyugs pas glu blangs sdang srid spangs//
54a1(rnying rgyud): stos na ma / sa sun na na du mas na na smra / na na man na /
54a2(rnying rgyud): po rmos grong gsum sru hA// ha hA ga mos dmyal brjod// rdo rdo pa gi gi yos pa na// rkyen d+ha rta gsan par// ro rnor snying du brjing bkram pa rtsegs// 'drar ba'i dkyil 'khor gro bzhi la// na gyi lag pa'i gnas gyur ba// shAng
54a3(rnying rgyud): lag sa/ na mang gi meng na ni gsapa// dang rdzogs rgyag na/ yin pan/ ma 'dun pa// bas rnam mi mi ma pa dang // 'tha
54a4(rnying rgyud): sa ska ni bas na na / yang san khyor// lcags kyi ba zhugs g.yas pan/ rlon pan sbyin /
54a5(rnying rgyud): gdo bangs pa// mi zed gshin ga shed po dang / khril ba chen pa rji du/ ngakyi 'gyis // spyos mabyu/ bram tshod po'i ga kyi la// byed gang man log yang dag cing / chags rdzogs ba
54b1(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa na// thun tu rlon pa g.yan pa na// srin po bumana' bdan sbyangs su// kho chen ta mgrin chen po dang // 'khril ba chen po'i tshul rdzas smra// rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bzlas par// byang gi skar na bsam thang// gsus po che yi gdan stengs su// b+ha nga/
54b2(rnying rgyud): chen mo g.yang gzhi gyon// dril bu thal chen g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rlon pa g.yon pa na// gsus po che yi gdan stengs su// khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang // 'khril pa chen po'i tshul gyis su// rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o// ho badz+ra gu h+ya tshig tu'o//
54b3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i snying po'i de kho na nyid nges pa sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po las bdud btul ba dang nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi che ba'i yon tan phyogs bcur gsal ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di
54b4(rnying rgyud): yang dag par grags shing dam tshig rjes su 'dzin pa'i dgongs pa rtser chib nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo // buM bi shwa kro d+ha badz+ra dz+wa la maN+Da la tsakra hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ ha yU ha la du tri tsakra nAn/ sUr+ya tsan+ta pad+ma de ba tiSh+Tha nA na/ hU~M hU~M ha ha hU~M hUM badz+ra ma hA
54b5(rnying rgyud): shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha nA da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ hU~M badz+rA d+hA ra ma hA kro d+ha~M shwa ri da la nA~M hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba tu thAg tA mad+h+ya shrI hi ruka ma hAHta sarba duSh+TA nAt+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsaM hU~M phaT/ oM sarba twathA ga tA br-it+te/ muhU~M br-id+d+ha tsA ra dz+wa la ni hU~M \u0f7f/ oM d+h+r-i rid+ha ma hI shrI hi ru ka
54b6(rnying rgyud): ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ trAM s+phar+b+ba rAt+na ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa li ni hU~M phaT/ oM hrIHpad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA na ta ka ha nA da ha pi tsa hU~M phaT/ hrIHshA pad+ma ba mu ka ma hA kr-i d+hI shwa rI rA la ni hU~M phaT/ ha karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA na
54b7(rnying rgyud): ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa~M hU~M phaT/ karma ma hA kr-i d+hA shwa ri trai la ni hU~M phaT/ bidz+ra ka we reta/ badz+ra tsatra ri haM/ badz+ra pra mo hI ha/ badz+ra bo tA pi ha/ badz+ra pun si ha~M/ badz+ra b+hUs+phA ri ha/ badz+ra s+sa sha nI hA/ badz+ra tsit+pa li ha/ badz+ra sid ha mu kha he/ badz+ra d+d+hi b+h+r-i mu Sha ha~M/ badz+ra sr-i la~M mr-i
55a1(rnying rgyud): 8\u0f7f/ badz+ra sran rgya Sha \u0f7f/ mra Sha he/ bad+ma gan b+ha kha te/ badz+rAHka rbA Sha te/ ba bra lu ka m+b+ha kha ta/ badz+ra mAHta \u0f7f ta \u0f7f/ badz+ra a mo sh+tsan+sa/ badz+ra A lag pa/ bar+Nab+hAd+ha bla sa yu ta.A
55a2(rnying rgyud): sa pan/ ba ma sogs te ma / ma / na an sa ba ni sa/ na la legs shi / ba kyi ni A ga
55a3(rnying rgyud): a pra ti Ad+ha ni pa shi ka ra phaT/ badz+ra mA ni a du pri ti a ni pa shi ka ra phaT/ e hwe hi A na ya ho/ oM ru lu ru lud+d+ho d+hI tAM/ dzaHhU~M ba~M ha~MHbadz+ra krod+ha sa mA ya hU~M phaT ces gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyis stong gsum gyi dkyil 'khor khyab par dus gcig khyab par
55a4(rnying rgyud): grags pa dang / dam nod pa bka' nyan sna tshogs ma'i sbyin mo la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang so so'i srog gi snying po phul lo// badz+ra ma nu rASh+Ta si/ badz+ra pA ma ni/ badz+re hri/ badz+ra bad pe/ badz+ra pi dag laM/ badz+ra ka mA ri/ badz+ra iSh+Tha na/ badz+ra swa ra ya ta/ ba
55a5(rnying rgyud): pAd+ya a mr-i ta/ badz+ra da na te/ badz+ra rAk+Sha si/ badz+ra bak+Sha si/ badz+rA ra hi ha~M/ badz+ra drA ti haM/ badz+ra yai tatsid+hi/ badz+ra ma no ha rI/ badz+ra sa nad+hiha~M/ badz+ra pa ya b+ha/ badz+ra mat+te ma ra ma nAM/ badz+ra ma g+ne ya/ pra dzAhrI/ badz+ra pra \u0f7f/ badz+ra ba rba Ne/ bad+ha ma hA kAH/
55a6(rnying rgyud): po ma pas rnam / thugs de thong pas nam 'i tshogs ma yan/
55a7(rnying rgyud): phaT/ a li u li ta bi ta pa l+r-i de ste kho na ro d+hi Sha re yo ga ni la ga shesas ces brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs pa ldan/ gting 'bang ba thams cad khrag/ gsung ni tshogs chen po mas// kun du khyab cing
55b1(rnying rgyud): dngas na pa sags ma tha rgyad kyang drug ga pa lab bstan pa phying par bad pa da do// dbang ba / nga ma bas ts+tsha// tha chu nas brtan par thams dang // thabadug kun du dz+ran// na
55b2(rnying rgyud): khrims gsum gyis mdzes// thod sbrul snga sogs te bas brjir// 'bang ba'i phreng ba mang po 'khrug/ l+h+wa mchog ma nyi gcig dang stug/ gtum pa dom gyi spang bas ni// dbang ga lha chen la sogs pa// dregs pa chen phyog ma chags mdang/
55b3(rnying rgyud): du byas te sku bzhugs pa// spug nag sngon ga ser nag dang // dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dbu dgu phyag ni bcwa brgyad dang // das gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bzad// rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs// stag khrag sbrul dang
55b4(rnying rgyud): nyi mar chas// stir che chung rlung zhags dang // khyung dang yid bzhin nor bu dang // stong gi 'jig rten khor yug bcas// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // ral gri dgra stagashol la sogs// rang gi lag cha sna tshogs dang // btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang
55b5(rnying rgyud): na na sa sa smyi
55b6(rnying rgyud): nI brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi spyan dang lag n+d+ha chas// tsaM bkye des ni chas te gnas// zhes gsangs pa dang / 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du/ wa gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis gang zhing zab par tha
55b7(rnying rgyud): te// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po de nyid don yod pa'i 'bras bu chen po dam tshig chen pos gzung ba'i phyir 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig rdo rje 'di gsungs so// bla med me spong bla ma bkur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gtsang// yang dag lam
56a1(rnying rgyud): du zhugs la byams// gsang ba'i don phyir sma mi bya// rtsa ba'i dam tshig chen po ni// gdong chen bcu yi don rtogs kyang // rtsa ba gsum po mi 'da'o// yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis ni// gti mug 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // nga rgyal phrag
56a2(rnying rgyud): dog mi spong ngo // dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chu// dag pa'i snod bcud mi dor ro// spyi dpal bcu yi mnga' brnyes kyang // yan lag bcu po mi dor ro// gzhan yang yan lag dam tshig rnams// 'da' bar mi mdzad rdo rje dam// sa ma ya ni rdo rje rje// mi 'da'
56a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba nyid kyi dam// bsam rdzogs lhun grub che mthar phyin// srid gsum dag pa dbang chen sbyar// mi 'jigs kun tu bzang por spyod// theg pa mtha' yas 'dul ba'i thabs// ji snyed sdom pa mtha' las pa// ma lus rnam dag lhalhun gyis rdzogs/
56a4(rnying rgyud): nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang // tshwa thung bsam pa log pa dang // mya ngan sdug bsngal chen po dang // dmyal ba nyid ni rdo rje byed// dgu rdzogs bcur ldan gsum gyis sbyangs// bskang ba la sogs mtha' yas mchog/ ces gsungs pas de bzhin
56a5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ro// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las 'jigs byed chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig rdo rje'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal
56a6(rnying rgyud): po de nyid chos thams cad man ngag bla ma chen po'i snying po byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i ngang du snyigs ma med par zung btab 'i phyir sku gsung thugs bla ma chen po'i thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas man ngage bla ma chen po'i snying po 'di byur /
56a7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi bde chen la// rgya rkyen rten dang len bcas pa'i// skyon med thig le chen po las// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang // rang bzhin gsang
56b1(rnying rgyud): rnams te// lag chag la rab ban te// bong nas gabanas dran 'aldan pa// rtun pa nga thugs la gnas// daHla 'bar ldan pa dasal 'bar byas// dpal 'byung la da \u0f7fla 'bar bsgyur// dasal 'khor dpal 'khor 'a zung ba// chags
56b2(rnying rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i thig le dbyings// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// byed pa rigs kyi gtso bo ste// byang chub sems kyi rdo rje'i tshogs// dbang po yul dus rig pa'i rnams// bdag nyid chen po lhag
56b3(rnying rgyud): par rdzogs// thugs kyi ye shes lngas blta zhing // snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba'i ye shes chen por rol// ye shes dgyes pa mchog tu 'bul// zad med zag pa med pa yi// bsod nams ye shes sku mar rol// rol mo'i
56b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsung ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa'i dbyings// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// ma lus bdag gis dbang sbyar ngo // dbang byar ye shes rol pa
56b5(rnying rgyud): yis// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor rdzogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rdzogs chen rtogs pa chen po yis// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ma
56b6(rnying rgyud): lus 'byung // phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor ma lus sgrol// bya ba med pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam bsgom pa'i mnyam sbyor bas// rang 'byung kun nas lhun
56b7(rnying rgyud): gyis grub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// rgyu rkyen rten dang ldan pa yi// thams cad byang chub sems kyi dbyings// byang chub sems kyi bde chen gyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad dbyings su thim/
57a1(rnying rgyud): thig le chen po bla ma las// sgra ma byang chub lam du bstan// skyon dang yon tan thams cad kyang // byang chub zig le nyid kyi dang // smod pa rnam pa nyid kyi yang // thig le chen po'i lam du nges// sgyu ma rol pa'i dkyil 'khor yang // thig pa
57a2(rnying rgyud): chen po'i dbyings su sbyor// sdom pa rnam pa bcu gsum dang // spyi yi dmatshig mtha' yas pa// thig le chen po'i ngang du gsal// snod bcud 'jig rten ma lus pa// thig le nyid kyi rol pa'i dbyings// tshogs chen rnam pa gnyis po yang // byang chub
57a3(rnying rgyud): sems kyi dbyings su nges// gzhal yas khang dang rgyan rnams dang // cho 'phrul byang chub sems su thim// khro tshogs bad 'dul rol pa yang // byang chub sems su nges pa yin// 'gro drug sems can gsum po yang // ye shes drug dang sku gsum
57a4(rnying rgyud): ru// nges pa'i thig le chen po yin// lnga yi rten dang rkyen bzhi yang // dbyings kyi ma dang dus kyi srid// thig le chen po'i ngang du 'dus// lnga phyi gsum dang yod med khams// sku gsung thugs su nges bstan pa'i// thig le byang chub sems su nges//
57a5(rnying rgyud): phung po khams dang skye mched kyang // phyag rgya bzhi bcu gnyis po yang // thig le nyid las gzhan na med// bzhi yi las dang gcig po yang // thig le sems kyi dang du gsal// 'gro ba'i don du 'byung ba yi// dgu dang stong phrag brgya bcu bzhi// byang chub
57a6(rnying rgyud): sems las gzhan na med// bde skyid sdug bsngal mang po yang // rtogs pa bde chen dbyings kyi don// ye shes ye shes rol pa yang // rdo rje snying po'i dbyings su nges// kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' dang // dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams// nyag gcig
57a7(rnying rgyud): yab tu nges par rdzogs// thar pa'i lam mchog dbyings kyi yum// kun du bzang mo la sogs kyang // thig le ma yi ngang du gsal// gzhal yas khang dang dkyil 'khor dang // bzhugs gnas khyad par mang po yang // ye shas chen po'i gnas su ba/
57b1(rnying rgyud): mchod pa'i sman dang longs spyod gan// rigs pa'i byang chub sems chen po// cho 'phral chen po'i rab du 'dus// rgyu 'bras gnyis kya ngo bo dang // chos so cog gi rang bzhin rnams// byang chub sems su nges pas na/ dkar nag las kyis ma gsungs so//
57b2(rnying rgyud): rgyu sems bar bye ma/ ci yang mad las kyi // sa mang mya ba sdug thang d+hA \u0f7f// ra mi ma nga la ba mas cu rnor// dmigs pa med par phun pa wA'o// ma banas la pa yang dag pa// masbyangs myigs tha baH// ma ma
57b3(rnying rgyud): cig car don nyid rdzogs// ma bsgrubs rgyal ba kun gyi gtso// ma sbyangs skyon dang yon tan med// tshig dang yi ges mi mtshon te// sangs rgyas nyid kyis rnyed par dka'// kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' yis// rnyed nas rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor spod/
57b4(rnying rgyud): spyod pas 'gro bsgral // de sa zhes pa gyu pa mang nga / rjes gdangs pas phyogs brdungs pan nga ya ga gags pa thams cad byung med pa nas dus khyen pa'i rgyun / phral ba rnas n+de
57b5(rnying rgyud): man ngag snying po byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang ye shes rgyal po de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dgongs pa yang dag pa'i phrin las chen po 'di ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ched du
57b6(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo // e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba sa tu ma chen rngam pa la// khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig/ bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma mi
57b7(rnying rgyud): du bcas par bya// bkug nas rdo rje'i phur pas gdab// dul du byas nas tshogs la 'gul// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du spel bsdams nas// bcings gyur bskyod nas phyogs bcur g.yos// myos 'gyur gas te tshig
58a1(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// baM kyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i gzi brjod lhan chen la// chags pa'i yid kyis mchod ston bya// rdo rje gsum yang dbang du 'gyur// bdud hU~M lnga 'am zas lnga la// margyan ma mang du banas par bya// rdo rje rmugs
58a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i phur pas gdab// chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul// bau gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du spel bsdams nas// ci 'dod de bzhin byed par 'gyur// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i 'du 'gro'i
58a3(rnying rgyud): la// dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas sA la// yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtag/ nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pas gdab// rdo rje gzi brjid 'phel bar brtag// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil
58a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du spel bsdams nas// gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen po// yid bzhin nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la// dang pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// gtum chen
58a5(rnying rgyud): rngam po 'dra lha ner 'gyur// bdud rtsi lha'am zas lnga la// gtum chen 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag/ lhan ner gsal ba'i phra ra pas gdab// 'bar ba lha ne'i tshogs la 'bul// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu hud du spel bsdams nas// 'bar ba
58a6(rnying rgyud): ne'i byin gyis khyab// thams cad g.yo ba med par 'gyur// a/ thams cad rdzogs pa chen po ste// las su ma gyur gcig kyang med// las kyi khyad par rdzogs pa yi// srid pa gsum du bsdus pa rnams// byin gyis ma brlabs gcig kyang med// rdzogs pa
58a7(rnying rgyud): chen po'i phrin las kyis// sbyangs pas bsam rdzogs lhun gyis grub// ho/ sbas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// lhag ma kha chu 'dod pa sbyin// rang gi dam tshig rab bsgrubs te// gang 'dod las de byed par bsgo// khrag 'thung chen po la sogs te// bro gar glu tshig
58b1(rnying rgyud): na mos ni// da ltar 'dad pa thams cad kun// thams cad ma lus byed pa yin// mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs te// blo gar klutshig rman mos ni// 'dra bar 'dod na 'dra bar byed// 'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed// sbos mo chen mo la sogs te// tho gar
58b2(rnying rgyud): glu tshig chen mos ni// rmongs par 'dod na rmongs par byed// myos par 'dod na myos par byed// seng gdong chen mo la sogs te// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la za bar byed// rdul cha tsam yang med par byed// bzhad gdong chen mo la sogs te//
58b3(rnying rgyud): tho gar gla tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la 'byin par byed// kun la rab tu nyams par byed// ya/ spod byed chen mo la sogs te// zhal byed chen mo brgyad rnams pa// tho ga klu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la thal bar byed// ma las ga
58b4(rnying rgyud): nas spor bar byed// sbas dang gyi mo bran mo'i tshogs// tho gar klu tshig chen mos ni// spad cing gtad bar bya ba ste// thams cad ma lus byed pa yin// ljon shing dang ni lkug phran tshal// spyod gcig dang ni me reg tu// dang bdaga' ba chags pa dang // khros
58b5(rnying rgyud): pas ka li rab tu bya// zhes gsungs pas phrin las rnam pa bzhi sti ra'i rnga dang bcas par phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams 'dul bar gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po 'jigs byed chen po de nyid dam tshig sti ra'i rnga bla ma rdung zhing stir rngam
58b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i mdangs 'di phyung ngo // e yi tshogs chen 'byam pa ru// sti ra'i rnga chen sgra bsgrags pas// hU~M ha he phaT sba 'byin cing // yig 'bru brgyad kyi byin brlabs kyis// ru lu dz+dzi b+h+yo'i gsung sgrogs pa// khro bo rngam pa'i sgra skud kyis// srid pa gsum char
58b7(rnying rgyud): bshig nas kyang // stong gsum bskal ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o// stir rnga chen 'di brdungs pas// gnod sbyin srin po kun bsgral te// mu stegs kun gyi snying yang 'byin// snying 'ang chen 'di bsgrags pas// stong gsum khro bor tshogs kyis bkang // kun kyang
59a1(rnying rgyud): rnga brdung do ri// rnga sgra chen po sna stong gas ma bshig/ na chen pos bdud dpung bskal// rnga sna chen pos srid gsum sbyangs// rbasgra chen pos dgra bgegs 'dul// rnga sgra chen pos ngan sor sbyangs// rngasgra 'brug ga sgra bsgrags pas// rda
59a2(rnying rgyud): dmyal khams stongs par byed// rnga s+tha drug che ma ri rab N+DIl// sti ba chen sgra byung bas// phyin ci 'og rnams snying yang 'byin// ra chen 'jug gi sgra spogs shing / rnga thabs glog stong 'gyur ba bzhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskang // ma
59a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig bslang // rnalnga 'byor rnam lnga'i dam tshig bskal// spyir rnga chen 'di brdungs pas// nyan thos mdo sde gnas nas sbyar// rang rgyal lta ba dbyings su skol// sti ra'i rnga chen 'di bsregs pas// lha dang mi yi theg pa yang // bla med the
59a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyings su btsud// stir rnga s+tha 'di bsgrags pas// stong khams ste 'i rwa skas bkang // kun kyang za brdung di ri ri// rnga thabs zlog stong gyi 'byin cing // rnga skad 'brug stong sa sgrogs pas// kye rje brnabs lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs/ stong gsum
59a5(rnying rgyud): 'khrug cing srid gsum 'dzur// rnga thabs ga yab myor bor ba dang // kha dang kA yi bu mtshon gyis// thams cang gnas lcags chen pos btabya// kA pa chen po la phyogs te// ngo rje rgyags 'og rdzogs pa'i rnams// dus gcing tsun cid+ha 'byir/
59a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i du yis// sring bzhag gi samatshor bgyib// de gcig ni nga 'jog/ nga den byin 'a ba rgyags// bas mardzogs kyi la dbang byung thob/ gsag po brjod par byed/ chos ga 'a ldan pa phyi
59a7(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa rdzogs// byang chub sems ltang de mthag ces gsungs pas de 'azhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhir gshesas gyi spong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa rnon po ya shes la
59b1(rnying rgyud): mun ngag ga snang ba dang bzlas pad+ma la shin kyangam pa'imadangs kyis dkyus pa can pa khwa 'ad thangs so// b+hagaH mtshon dus mtha' mo ltar 'bar// 'od par nyi ma 'byam g+hi ga 'i/ khro ga nyar thog spyong 'gru ba bzhin// mcha bzung yug za byed/
59b2(rnying rgyud): b+h+rUMdam pa'i spyo brag spyong nir/ ga ma hU~M ngas N+Da la phreng // Al la phyag // spyugs pa ra byung na nga ba rtse// d+ha pa'i shes rab 'o pa che// ye shes dkyil 'khyod kun du gsas// 'bang ba'i ye shes
59b3(rnying rgyud): 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes thig po \u0f7f/ ho/ ha~M oM rgyal po sbyin chen po/ khros pa'i das la 'ar cher chen 'dags/ dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gat+ta // sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che/ ho/ hUM bdud rnams kun gyi 'du ma /
59b4(rnying rgyud): bdud kyi bdud ste bdud rnams 'joms/ 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs byed chen po bdal ba che// hU~M rdo rje brag tshon sra ba po// rdo rje chu mo sdang chen po/ rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che// rdo rje rlung ste 'jor rlung che/ ho/ hU~M stong gsum khro bo'i dkyil
59b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor rdzogs/ 'jigs byed maston du med pa'i rtsa// rnachogs gsung dang sna tshogs thugs// 'jigs byed rngam pa'i ye shes gter// ho zhes blangs pas stong gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs byed chen po rnams dbyer med pas mnyes
59b6(rnying rgyud): par gyur to// sgra 'phrul drab bram chen po las spyan gyis grib pa'i min las deng yongs su mnyes pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'i don// gsang ba kun gyi tham te// sgra 'phrul za ba'i rgyal po yin// des don chos
59b7(rnying rgyud): kyi skyong po las// 'dul ba mdi rje chos mngon dang // da mchog smrab de grub pa dang // zla dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// sgyu 'phral drab las 'bros te/ sde sdod kun dang blang kun yang // 'byung nas gtan la dris par 'bebs// 'gro drugs
60a1(rnying rgyud): nagasas pa du na gan/ shA bas rdzun/ gnan na / ba dag myu pa nga/ @
60a2(rnying rgyud): chen po'i lam du bstan// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di// rtogs nas sba bar gang byed pa// de nyi dang yin dbang yang rdzogs// rtag tu byang chub sems la gnas// tshe 'di nyid kyis mngon sangs rgyas/
60a3(rnying rgyud): nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar// bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin 'grub/ ces gsungs pas lcogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes te/ mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyangs na sman
60a4(rnying rgyud): stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i rgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po las/ gdeng chen po'i le'u lte bcu gsum pa'o// / rtogs pa'i rgyal po su 'jal tra
60a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ lung gi spyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma chen po'i le'u las/ thams cad ma lus par 'phros pa de dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog
60a6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad d+ha/ TI grA d+ha gan+d+ha ta ta bi ni d+ha ya/ bod skad du/ dpal / sang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rnam par nges pa/ bcom ldan dpal kun tu bzang po la phya
60a7(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs kyis bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su dang /
60b1(rnying rgyud): gsung dang / chags rdo rje'i bdag nyid ma lus me lus lus pa med pa thams cad dang so som phyin+da tha mi dang zer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ 'og min gyi gnas pas 'ang dbus med pa na gzhi tshad med pa'am
60b2(rnying rgyud): shwasra k+She 'khor lo gsal ba la ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / chu phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/ yon tan dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phying mu bzhir gyur pa/ lhag pa'i ye shes
60b3(rnying rgyud): rin po che'i gro 'bur gyis mdzes pa/ rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad dang / so so ma yin ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes kun tu 'khyil pa/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab
60b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes rin po che'i dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa/ spags pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa/ ye shes rin po chesna tshogs pa'i phreng ba dang / zung 'ang
60b5(rnying rgyud): dang / shar bu'i rgyan dang / gzugs snga tshogs dang / grwa snga rdzogs dang / dzaM sna tshogs dang / ro lnga tshogs dang / reg bya sna tshogs kyis phyogs bcur 'khrigs par rang byung la mi sgrib par
60b6(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i canA bsam gyis mi khyab par bklubs pa/ rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i rdo khyud can/ nam par thar pa brgyad kyi ta babyas dang ldan pa/ spyi dang nang med pa/ kunad+ha ya
60b7(rnying rgyud): nang du gyur pa na mi 'jig pa seng ge'i khri dang / stobs glang po che'i khri dang / rdzu 'phrul ta'i khri dang / dbang ma bya'i khri dang / thogs pa med pa nam mkha' lding gi khri dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od
61a1(rnying rgyud): gas pa pa ti thong dpel khor dang / gas pa med pan rlon po ma'i gdan pa su mdun dang zla' meg pa rnams cad pa zhal skal lo bar gas pa zhing macan rang ba ca dang ldan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ thams cad du lku gasdang thugs
61a2(rnying rgyud): sa par ba tud 'dang / rabasdu 'i shes pang rtogapas gnyis mi ma bya ba ma thugs kyi phyir mthang dra zhugs pa/ ye shes dag ga / mi gas ngon po'i phyo 'i ba shA / thug su dgas
61a3(rnying rgyud): dang na na dzin ga pa 'dren pa nasas da
61a4(rnying rgyud): pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang / de dag kun kyang mthing ga dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / le brgan dang / ljang gA'i mdo tu/ badzin mo ma ba spong ba'i dbying ba dang / sre da'i dbyings dang / mnyan sa dang / dro ba'i dbyings
61a5(rnying rgyud): bya'i dbyings la sogs pa btsun 'i tshogs dang gnyis su med par chos kyi dbyings kun du mjal yas par khyab pa ni 'di wa ste/ dper 'akyil gyi gang zla bzhin du gang nas khyab bya chags so// de nas byang rgya chen po rdo rje mthong ba dang / byang na
61a6(rnying rgyud): sa pa dang / byang chu mi ba rngom pa dang / da//
61a7(rnying rgyud): da/ bya / dag / na
61b1(rnying rgyud): 'joms brtson po dag shes dang / btsun ma rtag par du yin pa dang / chad par mngon pa dang / bdag tu ma yin pa dang / mtshan mar ma yin pa la sogs pa de sa zla tshogs du rjod rjes mr-i lang ba dang gabyas su rnyed pa ba 'gasas// de na zhan gshegs
61b2(rnying rgyud): na pa rdzogs dang gshes pa med pa gas de dpal 'khor dag nyid cigs 'dzi nyid dang / gsung nga/ thags dang / yod na dung / byed pa'i rdu lam byung ngo // mi me // de bzhin te grong tsho sa la
61b3(rnying rgyud): thugs rje dang // rang d+ha dang tid ting de 'dzin// gzugs brtanas mangs mer dag/ gsal ba ni sra gsung thugs yon tan ldan las se mya med pa'i yon tan yid bzhin rin po 'i mi zad par ldan pa rnyan gyi 'khor lo rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i
61b4(rnying rgyud): ga tu'o// gsang ba'i rnyeng ba de 'on tu dngas pa las rlung gzhi las ste dang pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa pa do rje ya ban du bang blos thams dang lhas da dang bsnyen pa tshwa pa durje rgyar mo rlung ma nyis pad nga bdang pol 'jug par byung /
61b5(rnying rgyud): zhugs pas phyogs bcu dus bzhi de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin dbyer med pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa po badzod ngo // e ma'ordo rje phung po phan lag raM// rdzogs pa
61b6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu sman dang mA mA kI// me rlung gos dkar sgrol mya ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing /
61b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi brnyes so// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to// de nas brtson mo
62a1(rnying rgyud): pa mo chos kun tu bzang mos/ bcom ldan 'das yid kun du bzang po dang gnyis su med par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// kye ma phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye nas dben// srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing // snyigs ma lnga nyid bde
62a2(rnying rgyud): ldan gnas// phung po lnga nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas// thams cad mchog gi snying po bas// gzhan du rgyal ba'i chos mi btsal// nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi brnyes so// zhes brjod pas/ thams cad ye nas sangs
62a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas par// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// de nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i snyems ye shes su bskyed pa 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // skye ba
62a4(rnying rgyud): med las thams cad skye// skyes pa nyid na'ang skye ba med// e ma ngo mtshan rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/ 'gag pa nyid na'ang 'gag pa med// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i
62a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // gnas pa med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid na'ang gnas pa med// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs// dmigs pa nyid na'ang
62a6(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa med// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi kau snang // 'gro 'od med las 'gro dang 'ong // 'gro 'od nyid na'ang 'gro 'ong med// ces brjod pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / btsun mo'i tshogs thams
62a7(rnying rgyud): cad kyang mnyes pas khyab par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsu na mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos// sna tshogs sdang la rang bzhin gsang // ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gsang
62b1(rnying rgyud): gzhan du min la shin tu gsang // zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams can dang / chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas dbyer med na'ang / 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa las 'gro ba lnga'i ras
62b2(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mo khyab par smin pa la thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po skyes nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma bde gshegs snying po las// rang gi rnam tog las kyis sbal// rje tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas dang sdug bsnga
62b3(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa// bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin// sras kyang ma bcings bcings med de// bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin// rnam tog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis// nAnA g+ni sa mkha' la mdud pa dor// bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i// ye nas wan
62b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas chos// bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad// ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems ye shes su bskyed pa
62b5(rnying rgyud): le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs zhes bya ba'i rigs pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las 'thon to// 'thon nas kyang las kyi
62b6(rnying rgyud): dbang gis snrel zhi dang yan man gyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po de re thub pa bcom ldan 'das raM res 'jal ba rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba lnga'i don mdzad de/ bsnams pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / dka'
62b7(rnying rgyud): thab mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas pa dang / bdud btul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / tshe 'phral chen po ston pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs par ston pa'i thab pa drus pa'i kun du mkhyen pa dang / thams cad kyi sems kyi chung dran/
63a1(rnying rgyud): du mkhyen pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis thams cad kun du gzegs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stan gyis kun du gsan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rdzogs kun du don spyod pa dang / zag pa med pas kun du bzang po'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i mngon par
63a2(rnying rgyud): shes pa chen po ga dang / kun du skabs mgyis ma khyab pa dang / kun du zhugs pas ma gro su 'i khyab pa dang / kun du zhal bsam gyis me khyab pa dang / sred du gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ bsam mos mi khyab pa'i grangs med pa sogs
63a3(rnying rgyud): bcur snang bar gyur to// thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis lha dang / mi'i theg pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / bla na med pa'i theg pas ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog
63a4(rnying rgyud): pa nyon mongs pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por chos stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad kyang gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa'i phyi nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / 'dzin pa dang /
63a5(rnying rgyud): 'phrul pa las 'dogs pa dang / las dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang / las dang las kyi 'bras bus mi gos/ gos par mi 'gyur/ gos su med par ston pa'i mthar thug go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa
63a6(rnying rgyud): 'di brjod do// ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos// ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis// phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis su 'khor// mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur// rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med// yang dag tu ma'i tshul gnyis su/
63a7(rnying rgyud): bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de// rnam dag dbyings nyid tshul gcig go// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// log par rtog pa tsam nyid las// phra nyid zab pa'ang yod ma yin// log rtog nyid la tid spod de// na du g.yo ba
63b1(rnying rgyud): med// log rtag chu 'bras rgyan nyid kyang // gan rtsa med byings nad cig mu// rnam par dag pa dbying gnyid na la// nyid la dbang gyu ny-id spod rdzir// 'dag dang bzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyad// rnam dag blam theg pa'i mjug/ zag par na
63b2(rnying rgyud): yis nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas// yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// rang bzhin med las cing yang 'grub// sangs rgyas mya ngan yod mi 'dang // chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// ma rig smin mdzad 'bul ba'i
63b3(rnying rgyud): phyir// byung nas mya ngan 'da' bar stor// 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang // dam tshig slab dang grub pa dang // d+ha dang gsung dang thugs kyi rjed// phyogs bcu rnams su rab grags pa// gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros te// rang bzhin gsang
63b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i snying po 'di// sde snod kun dang chud kun gyi// 'byung gnas gtan la nges par 'bebs// chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam// ston pas don dang mthun rdzogs su// ming dang tshig tu btags nas bstan// ston min tshig la dngos po med//
63b5(rnying rgyud): ces ched du brjod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan dang / phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo // a to/ srid rtsa nyes dmigs bdag tu rtog las
63b6(rnying rgyud): 'phros// rgyud drug skye 'gag lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas dang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa// log rtog nyid las gzhan g.yo ci yang med// stong nyid bdag med ye mkhyen dang rlig thugs// dmigs bya dmigs byed med par dran
63b7(rnying rgyud): dbang sgyur// ro mdzar sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las zhing khams las// gzhan na med de de nyid de ltar yin// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o zhes brjod pas/ thub pa drug gi sprur pa grangs med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
64a1(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa yang de dag tu 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// gsang ba'i snyid po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos thams cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu
64a2(rnying rgyud): gyur nas mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje'i dbyings su chos thams cad yenas sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo bar/ chos thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi bye phreng ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // a rab tu brtan
64a3(rnying rgyud): gyur a dkar las// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams s+ho// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal gyur nas// bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par bstan// de las ming tshogs gsal 'bar kun// spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi// brtan byang
64a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes rgyu yin no// a A/ ka kha ga g+ha da/ dza tsha dza dz+ha nya/ TaHDA D+ha Na/ ta thad d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya wA ra la/ shaSha sa ta/ k+ShaH/ oM I/ u A/ e ai/ o au/ 'di dag bya bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos/
64a5(rnying rgyud): rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos nas/ chos thams cad ming ge mtshan nyid tsam du gyur to// hoH/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// a ni spyod dang me stong gi// dbu ma'ang dmigs su yod ma yin// thams
64a6(rnying rgyud): cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun// yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas// a haMd sna tshogs par snang ba'i// ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// sgra yi ming gis thams cad bsdus// mngon rdzogs rgyal po de nyid des// e ma ngo ma ra ya mtshan gyi// 'phrul chen bzhi
64a7(rnying rgyud): bcu rtsa lnga'i ming // tshig rnams ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas// sna tshogs don chen smra zhing ston// dngos med yi ge'i gang bzhin sems// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang // dbyibs dang kha dog ming tshogs kyis// rol pa cin yang sprul cing ston// phyog
64b1(rnying rgyud): bzungs pazhing gshegs pa 'o// ye shes sems dbyu sgra ga sung rdugs// dkyil 'khor ban bzas Nad// yig pa gnas// la rdzogs// sems kyi dang bzhin po ga ste// bgro dngas po yod pa yan// dmags ma nyid du sogs pa //
64b2(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs kyi 'khor le che// sra gsung thugs ni ngo mtshar gyi// ngo mtshar 'phrul chen rab 'gugs pa// dbyings la dbyings kyis bris pa ste// yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod// mgo ni ma nor lam yin te// tig ni shes rab ming du sba// shad ni thabs chen
64b3(rnying rgyud): tshogs su gcod// a ni skye med de bzhin nyid// A ni thog mtha' stong pa nyid// thA ni rdzu 'phral rdo rje nyid// Ta ni sdang ba'i sgyu 'phrul nyid// Da ni stu nga phul yid bzhin nyid// d+ha ni sgra 'phrul snang bdag nyid// NA ni kun du zhwa 'phrul nyid// dza naM dra bas mngon
64b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs nyid// ta ni dra bas brtan pa nyid// da ne dra bas lhan ne nyid// d+ha ne dra bas 'khril ba nyid// dani dra bas kun du 'gyur// ka ni spyan gyi thugs kyi mchod// kha ni snyan gyi thugs kyi mchog/ su ni shangs kyi thugs kyi mchod// g+ha ni ljags kyi thugs kyi
64b5(rnying rgyud): mchog/ da ni thugs kyang 'jig byed pa'o// tsa ni spyan gyi sku yi mchog/ cha ni snyan gyi sgra yi mchog/ dza na shangs kyi sku yaM mchog/ d+ha ne ljags kyi sku yi mchog/ nya ni sgra 'ang 'jig byed pa'o// pa ni lhun gyi gsung gi mchog/ pha ni snyan gyi gsung gi
64b6(rnying rgyud): mchog/ ba ni shangs kyi gsang gi mchog/ tha ni sngags kyi gsung gi mchog/ ma ni gsung yang 'jog par byed// ya ni skye ba rnam par dag/ wA ni gnas pa dag pa yin// ra ni 'jig pa dag pa ste// la ni stong pa dag pa'o// sha ni rtag pa
64b7(rnying rgyud): med pa ste// Sha ni chad pa'ang yod ma yin// sa ni mtha' bral bdag med pa// ha ni mtshan ma med pa nyid// k+Sha re ye shes thugs kyi thugs// e ri rdul snyed lha rnams su// I ni rdul snyed lha ma yin// u na rdul snyed mi rnams su// A
65a1(rnying rgyud): ni dul stong \u0f7fla so rnams// can dum snyed yi dgas sa// man dul nyid rgyal rnams// an thams cad 'jog par byed// can thams cad zhag pa yan// yig 'khang myaHga can 'di// nags zugs nga
65a2(rnying rgyud): brdzus// zhes brjod do// maho// nas de bzhin gshegs pa pa yo rtogs dang / pa yi pa kyil 'khor de dag nyid kyis gsang ba 'di nyid pa dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan ldan las dang las kyi'o// ma
65a3(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshogs kyu 'khor lo// 'bras bu rgyal ba smin grub ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis// 'dus mthu sa nyid 'dus byas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byin pa'i dam/ 'da' bar mi mdzad dbang med chu rkyen tshogs pa'i mthu
65a4(rnying rgyud): chen yin/ hoH/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge 'khor lor gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo bkod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yi ge 'khor
65a5(rnying rgyud): ma khyen bkod pa las sgyu 'phral rnam par 'grog 'di med du 'arjod do// rnab med pa'i sem pa nyid de// chos rnams sartsa ba yir// sems cad la ge'i rang bzhin te// ga yod bsngon na ldam/ phral dkyil 'a sa ba/
65a6(rnying rgyud): ba dkyil 'khor yang ni rdzogs pas// rdzobyas bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// oM lnga 'khor naseM dang 'grub par 'gyur/ 'ang rje 'gyur ming snang ba dang // bzhi bcwa rtsa bzhi nad mol ci pa// long gi slo nga thung bar na song kyar /
65a7(rnying rgyud): gzhan du 'gyur ba 'grub// nam mkha' rdo rje sra 'asbyor zhing // 'bar nas me yang 'amig pa dang // zur 'gyur 'bab pa 'ang de bzhin te// 'jig rten khams 'dor ba dang // thams cad stongs shing spang bar 'gyur// dgug dang btang dang bcing
65b1(rnying rgyud): grol// gso dang gsad dang pha ma dang rgyal// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// de nyid ye shes rang sdang ba'i// ming tshig gzugs sogs yid bzhin gyis// mun la snang 'byung ji bzhin du// 'gyur bas gser 'gyur sman gyi tshul// ston pa mchod brtson
65b2(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa gsal// dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams// ma nyams shes shing yo byad ldan// 'grub 'gyur mi ldan med cing brlag/ dus gsum rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i// dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni// zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod// 'phe
65b3(rnying rgyud): 'grib med par 'byung ba ste// dngos po med las dngos po sprin// sna tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur// dngos rnams nyid na dngos med par// rtog pa'i dbang sgyur ting 'dzin yin// gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa// de yis chos kyi dbyings mi shes//
65b4(rnying rgyud): de phyir dngos dang dngos med pa// 'jigs pas dmigs med shes par gyis// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni// pho mo ma yin ma ning min// mtshan med ma yin rigs rgyud min// kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin// gnas su ma yin gang yang min// de bzhin
65b5(rnying rgyud): nyid dbyings ye shes te// thabs kyis phyag rgya kun gyi chu// thabs las thabs 'byung thabs bsam yas// tha dad med la tha dad pa'i// nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi// dkyil 'khor bsam ya sa ye shes rol// 'jigs med kun bzang phyag rgya'i mchog/ gang
65b6(rnying rgyud): gis glang chen myos 'dra'i sems// mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su// sngags dang phyag rgyar rab bstan na// dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po
65b7(rnying rgyud): de kho na nyid nges pa las kyu 'phrul bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa'i bdag nyid chen po thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcwa thams cad la nyid kyi che ba dkyil 'khor
66a1(rnying rgyud): 'byung bar bzha nas med du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ye shes stsogs pa ni dbus brtags te// dkyil 'khor bsamA yas spun gyis grub// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'gror pas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod// 'khor lo rtsa'as
66a2(rnying rgyud): bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chang bzhis brgyan par khyams ldan// kun du gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan// rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// seng ge klung chen rta dang khyung // nam mkha' snying gi khri chen la// nyi zla pad+ma rin
66a3(rnying rgyud): po che// gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang // g.yas na mthing thos sdom pa dang // myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas// gru tshad la ni mthong byed dang // zos byed sdom byed myong byed rnams// bcom ma
66a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs dang bcas par gnas// bad+ma khyams la ni thub d+hag dang // mdun dang khyab na byed pa dang // bya ba dgra ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyad bzhi la 'joms pa ni// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma
66a5(rnying rgyud): ral gri dril bu 'bar// ut+pa la kla shir la sogs mtshan// mdzes tshul mnyos pa'i yo byad 'dzin// mthong ga dkar po se raraM lo bskrun// ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i// mnyen lhag 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// gsal 'tsher ldan
66a6(rnying rgyud): skrag gzi byin 'bar// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng bsdu 'khrigs pa ste// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor bas ma yas lhun gyis grub// sgra yi phyag rgya che mchog ni// de bzhin dbyings las
66a7(rnying rgyud): gi yos kyang // yang dag thar pa'i gzugs sgra dang // 'grob ma zas 'dral ba'i phyir// mthu byas spyan snga tshogs stor// seM nyid sgra maM mag yor tshul// tshul nyid dbyings las gsos pa zed// ma gsos bzhin du sa tshogs pan
66b1(rnying rgyud): de cho mi mthun snga rtogs la// sa so 'dra bar snang ba ni// de bzhin nyid kyis ma bcos kyang // las 'gro'i dbang gos sa sor snang // dper nam long rna zla bzhin// do tsho 'ag drug thams nang la// sdig lhung gzugs su rnam par bstaran// dag rgyal
66b2(rnying rgyud): rnams la dgra bcom gzugs// rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i gzugs// gzhan yang theg mchog rim pa bzhin// 'og min gla med gnas mchog tu// sgra ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la// de bzhin
66b3(rnying rgyud): gsang mchog sas ste// rna me po sa rnams mngal bar spyod// myong bad+mad pa'i tshul bzhin du// ga kyi myeng ga dran thams cadasal// 'khong kyis de bzhi su pazhesas// byang chub sgrib pa btang pag sang // deyang bzhin du ga la
66b4(rnying rgyud): de nas sa bcur ma gyis 'byung // bla med byang chub yang dag 'thob// chos skad pab med 'jod du med// longs spyod zad med rin chen gter// sprul ba bye ba bsam mi khyab// mtshan dang dpe byud thams cad rdzogs// spyod yul kun du maN+Da la// chags
66b5(rnying rgyud): cheni gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// thabs dang shes rabs kyi mchog/ de la sogs te bas ma yis mchog/ kyi sh+ye med pa'i ga'adung na/ na mongs kun gyi zhing du gnas// da ma shes pa'i gtur du 'gyur// rdo rje 'di bri rig pa'i phra
66b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad dbyer myed mnyam pa'i sku// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// de tshe sna lnga kun kyang rdzogs// zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten thog gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas ma med pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba zhing gi dul snyed gcig
66b7(rnying rgyud): gsal bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sgra dang / gsung dang / thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo // a ho// dmigs pa dmigs byed
67a1(rnying rgyud): mi dmigs dpag zeng byasas ni khyab// ye shes rang rag dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod ma 'ang // mata bu dang me tam thun bya' thub rnyeng khyab pa'i dbyings// ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor nama' ma smos pa myong // // rdo rdzags /
67a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po kho na nyid nges pa la sad dkyil 'khor ltos pa'i le'u b+hi drug pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dz+dza Sha las 'di phyung ngo // b+h+rUM ba swa bi hra
67a3(rnying rgyud): badz+ra d+h+r-ika/ oM dza na dzIka/ swai rat+na d+h+r-i ka/ I A ro le ka/ hi prat+to d+h+r-ika/ b+h+r-in+dad+b+hi shA rI/ l+r-i dwe She ra ti/ mo ta ra ti/ bI rA gA ra tI/ tr-i badz+rar te/ g+h+r-i ti rA dza ya/ tr-I A gag+hA ya/ hU~M he d+h+waM/ pad+ma ba da ma/ dI ku ru pA Ni hrIH/ sIl+yA s+ye saM ma yA stAM/
67a4(rnying rgyud): gyi sa mA ya hoH/ hrI gI tI ra go&taM/ oM nar+d+harA gA yA myaM/ me d+h+ye ra Ne sA hA/ b+h+yo ni sA raM b+hA ya swA hA/ dzI sa rA dzA ya swA hA/ mr-i shrI ai rA gA ya sA tA/ dod+d+hi d+hU pa pra bi sa/ hUM pra Sh+TaM a bIs/ bau dI pa swa khIn/ hoHgar+b+hats+tshiH/ d+h+r-i ya mAn+mu kr-ita phaT/ hU~M ngi d+ha
67a5(rnying rgyud): n+de/ te mi d+hAg/ med+ha ba t+ta 'a/
67a6(rnying rgyud): oM sa a a 'a oM ni AhU~M/ srin t+tha/ srin / na sa/ thag zunas hA kA // sam ma/
67a7(rnying rgyud): bibababab/ pababapa pa/ dza dza dza dzadza/ pa pa bab pa/ saM sems so/ pi pib pa pa/ ma ma mam ma/ pi pi pa po paM/ ya ya la~M ya~M ya~M/ pabapa pa / oM AHhrIswAhA/ ye shes rgyal po srag zung thugs// dring pos rmang paH/
67b1(rnying rgyud): tam stor bar// byug mtshan par 'dag slor ba/ ma bas pa ma d+ha/ oM bangs ma ma ste/ a badz+rasam sa toH/ hoH/ zhes brjod pa sa gsung ga dmyal 'khor 'di dag gis 'dag rten drug ga stsogs bcwa thams nang pa rgya' dang
67b2(rnying rgyud): so// rab tu grags so// kun du grags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje dang / bya ba mo rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par mdzad do// de nas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid chen por padag
67b3(rnying rgyud): nyid chen po'i ye shes dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra bA las phyung ngo // oM ma hA shA n+ya tA d+hon badz+ra swa b+hA bA At+ma ko&hUM/ oM ma hA Ad rba dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA pa At+ma ko&ha~M/ oM ma hA pra t+ya bek+Sha d+ha sta nA badz+ra swa pA ba A d+ya
67b4(rnying rgyud): baSh+Ta sa ma hA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA pa At+ma nan te/ oM mahA kr-i tu an+tany+dza na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba~M At+ma ko& haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga d+hA ma hA kA yai badz+re swab+hA ba At+ma ko&ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga te ma hA bAka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&tsa~M/ oM sarba tra thA ga ta me hA tsat+ta badz+ra swa b+hA pa
67b5(rnying rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA i nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&ha~M// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+mako&haM/ zhes brjod pas thim par gyur/ gsal bar gyur/ 'bar bar gyur to// oM ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs kyis kr-i
67b6(rnying rgyud): gsung // skra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// sna tshogs sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung // gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni// bsam gyis mi khyab kun du khyab// sgra dang ming cho ga so sor grags// thams cad gsung gi phyag ma'i mchog/ rgyud mchog
67b7(rnying rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ bde ldan gsung gi don 'ab+h+ring ba'ang // thams cadapa ng+gA'i dang gyur na// grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra// ji skad brjod kyang gsung mchog yin// theg pa mthong man thams cad dang // log 'gro ma lus thams cad skad// bu
68a1(rnying rgyud): grub rdo rje'i gsung du bsdus// bsdus nyid phyogs bcur rnam par grags// grags nyid ma chags dang du gsungs// gsung ba nyid na brjod du mang // brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra// kun la grags shing so sor 'jal// dper na de bzhin
68a2(rnying rgyud): stede sangs bzhin// gsung gcig sgra mis thams cad go// 'di ni gsung mchog rgyal po yin// theg pa mthong man thams cad kyang // de bzhin nyid las ma gsungs te// 'dul ba'i thabs su so sor thos// ji ltar gsung rab kun brjod kyarang // de bzhin
68a3(rnying rgyud): nyid las gsungs pa med// yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung // ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang // thugs rje gsung gi byin brlabs kyis// 'gro don sna tshogs so sor gsal// gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje mchog/ de bzhin gsung gi 'gro don rnams/
68a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin dang las ma yos kyang // dper na brag ca'i sgra bzhin no// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor bsdus pa dang gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yan lag thams cad dkyil
68a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor du lhun gyis grub par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi// snying po phyag rgya 'da' dka'o// mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge// rim
68a6(rnying rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil yi ge// lnga gnyis zung du sprad pa las// sbyar bas phyag rgya babyung ba'i rgyu// oM dang hU~M gnyis rtse sbyar te// 'bru brgyad bsnol nas rtse sprad pa// rgyal bkun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar
68a7(rnying rgyud): bkan// hU~M bsgreng rtse mor rdo rje 'bar// klu brtul 'bru spos dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// suM bsring rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi mo 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i
68b1(rnying rgyud): dngas kyis palta// 'bru bzhi spras nas thugs kar bkan// a bsnyed rtse mor 'khor lo 'brar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos pa brtan// dbru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// k+ShiM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil
68b2(rnying rgyud): dbang// nyil bru lnga las su khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// dbu bzhi smras nas thugs kar bkun// sna bsgreng rtse mor rin chen 'bar// thang rtul dbru sbas dril gisil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyi 'chos la brtad//
68b3(rnying rgyud): sbas nas thugs kar bkan// b+h+yo bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khripa// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bklan// oMHbskrad tse mor pad+ma 'bar// zla brtul 'bru spa 'dril gas dang //
68b4(rnying rgyud): 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// b+h+rUM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis paste// 'bru ba ni sbas nas thugs kar ba kan// hUM bskang
68b5(rnying rgyud): rje mor ral gri 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi smras nas thugs kar bkan// tA~M bsgred rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khrib// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs
68b6(rnying rgyud): kyis bak+ta// ut+pa la klu shing laM sogs madz+nyAn// rin chen lha gangal gri 'bar// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar// chos kyi gakhor lo rin chen ste// gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang // pi wang glarang me khe na maN+Dag tid de// mai ts+tsha ga zung sa
68b7(rnying rgyud): mchog dang // mar me byug pa la sogs pa'i// las la 'khril zhing chos la brtan// dbu rnams 'phyo zhing 'dud pa'i tshul// gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// sgo bzhi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// dri mgo gdangs
69a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ / nas bya // gas nan / zlab gan pa gca// pa // rdzun//
69a2(rnying rgyud): drug seM / ni cig pa dang pa 'ang dang // ci pa rji bye zlos// me dang ni t+yA shAs/ de gnyis cing rdzob kyid kyi // gan pa nga mnyam pa nag mi shes so// sam 'gyur ba mardzogs pa 'i dkyis// gzhan pa
69a3(rnying rgyud): tshogs te// nga dade bzhin ga sheg sad deso// nga ba mad/ rgyag ca ni 'tshigs man na/ smra nga shes partson byo / u ba ma brgyal thams na na// phyag na ma po'i dang banas/ yang las
69a4(rnying rgyud): dag sa nag zugasas thong nga/ na sa
69a5(rnying rgyud): sade ma sa ma pa dang / khye la da/ gyu / nga ga
69a6(rnying rgyud): bI bkod pa sogs s+hon// mau ngan phyag tu thams cad ni// 'di zhes gzigs rjes yong du med// gnyis dang ga sum phung ma par 'phyo// bskyeng dang bloba'ang de bzhin nyid// mad na bsngal bskyed thams cad gun// phyag 'tshon pa'i dang draganas// gan
69a7(rnying rgyud): mi gnas gnas pa min// de skang dag 'chog nyid kyis bshad// gsang ba'i snying po kho na nyi dnges pa las/ yang la gi dkyil 'khor du rkyen kyis brngubs nas phyag tu spros pa'i le'u ste bkyang ba'o// / de nas ngo bzhin gshegs par byas bcad pa
69b1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dmatshig bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs nas med du brjod pa'ang brjod na// shin tu zla ba'i dmatshig mchog/ phrug ma chen po'i myug bil na// thugs sa dkyil 'khor dam paH// mngan bzhi phyi tshang drubya// 'bras smos lda na rjer pa/ nga/
69b2(rnying rgyud): po lnga dang sman lnga dang // bdud rtsi lnga ni rab bsnyams la// rig pas thig ni gdab par bya// lte brtsibs dang ldan pa yi// rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas// gru chang bzhi dang grwa ba nI yi// bar khyams sgo khyud ldan par bya// sen zla ma tsas kyi ti zla la/
69b3(rnying rgyud): tsana'i 'bru tsam pa dA'i gdan// yungs 'bru tsam gyi yi ge la// phyag rgya tal 'bru tsam du ba// bcos bu ras ni sna tshogs dang // rgyan phreng bro ba'i bdung bas bskor// grwa tshig zo gar rol mo yi// sprin dpung tshogs kyis rab tu mchod// yum dang 'jom sems ma/
69b4(rnying rgyud): yis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bzhin mchod// dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ldan par// nyal du gyur pa'i mi byas la// brtud+ma 'du bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis// las bzhi'i mchod pa rab tu sbyin// khro ba'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin ta// shin tu bral
69b5(rnying rgyud): byungs pa TIs// ba ma las dag la'ang de bzhin bya// rig pas dpag pa tsam du'o// mtshang pa'i phyag tu min pa na// sems kyi yid bzhin smin chags ces// phyogs pa thabams cad sangs rgyas zhing // mnyan 'ang la ga na 'de ba yi// tshogs
69b6(rnying rgyud): po che yi gzhi// mdzes par bris shing sbas pa dang // kun 'byung rin chen phung por 'bar// dbyibs legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil// rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang // rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal// grwa dbyings tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra/
69b7(rnying rgyud): re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs// do shal dpung rgyan so mdo// bza' dang bzung ba'i mchog rnams dang // rang la mdzes par brgyan pa yi// lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyis// bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis// phyogs bza nam mkha'i khams ba
70a1(rnying rgyud): nas// dkyil 'khor kun la rmas par dbul// skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis// rim yis yang na cig car dra// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor ba'o// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por brkon// gsal ldan ma 'am rgyar
70a2(rnying rgyud): brlabs la// stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul du// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod// mnyes nas grub pa'i dam tshig mchog/ bdag nyid chen po mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes// sred gsum 'gro ba rnams
70a3(rnying rgyud): da la// dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur// 'phrul dro ba brten pa yis// phyogs bcu dras bzhir gshegs pa yi// sangs kyis dkyil 'khor ma lus dang // khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du 'gyur// lus dag sems dang cos
70a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad// gang na'ang mi gnas mi dmigs pa// mig yor tshu lA du sbyar ba yis// nam mkha' lani num mkha' sgom// kun pas dbyung phyug reg pas 'dug// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// bral zing
70a5(rnying rgyud): gags// 'dung smra gyu shA/ 'dugacan du mi bang dpal// dab stan 'angs spyod ma gyi/ stsal bar thams cad pazad pam kyim pa'i sa gas// sa pathams 'dang
70a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// dang brtsor brtul zhugs rab rtog nas// phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i dbang // rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya// snying rjes chung ma zos par gzung // yang nathal mo ba bsnol nas// phyag rgya chen po'i 'phang du// dkyil 'gro ma bag
70a7(rnying rgyud): tshad du bya// mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya// yang nas gzhi rab mnya ma la// dkyil 'khor khru gang ched dra bya// yang na lus gang tshad du ste// yang na lus ni gsum gyi tshad// phung bu srad bu tshon gyi dang // gos rgyan mdzes pa'i ya
70b1(rnying rgyud): grogs// thig gang ba chog phun sum rdzogs// mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrims te b+ha// padad+ma na khwa ni bcu drug dang // d+hi sh+tha 'am nyi shu rtswa ljang bya// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom// sku gsung thags ldan gzugs kyang dgod// yang dkyang grangs
70b2(rnying rgyud): dpag tshad tsam// nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom// ma mthong rmongs la bsnyen phyir mtshon// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'am// lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya// 'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du bgyi// ting 'dzin
70b3(rnying rgyud): rol mo mtha' yas mchog/ yi ge 'am brda' ma snying po'am// phyag rgya'am sku gsung thugs ldan par// byin brlabs ya mtshan mad po che// 'grub 'gyur sangs rgyas kun gyi dam// sa la sogs la phyag rgyar byas// rnam grol rim pa thob par 'gyur/
70b4(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs na// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// ma dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo // rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan
70b5(rnying rgyud): nyid mnyam sbyor bas// phyogs dras kwin+da nas gshegs pa yi// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi// rin po che dang 'byung bkun// de dag rdzas yod ma yin te// rang sems
70b6(rnying rgyud): briso na myas pan nu pa sbyin// ngo ma tsha 'phrul mang po 'i// gzhan sa song 'ongs ma yin te// 'bras la bat+ten pA'i shes ra byed/ d+he p+ta thAm+b+hi d+hA ng+gA byung // shes rab bye kyi bzhi nyid// byabs kyi sdug car zlar pa'i phyir// ye shes lani/
70b7(rnying rgyud): ye shes rol// ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog/ rgyal ba mngon byung skyob pa dang // byin brlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te// bya byed nus pa'i gzi byin gyiso// sgyu mardo rje btsan po mchog/ cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing // yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan//
71a1(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi yan lag pa rdzogs pas// many+dza masna 'jug la rab brtson pas// zhag na sum tsa phrag drag byas// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu dag gas// dbang bltar rigs kyi dam pa 'brug/ dacha bcu drug tshun chad kyis// p+lasa?
71a2(rnying rgyud): sgrar gyis rdzogs pa na// ye shes thig lo de nyid la// ye shes thig lo nyid sdang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ phyogs bcu ngas bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas pa// rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang /
71a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo'i rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun// mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang // rgya chen gsung las don 'byung ba// mthun pa'i shes rab sdad pa'o// gcig dang du mar thal ba yi// mthanga' dang dbus med
71a4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te// rang 'byung ye shes gnas med sdang // log par rtog btags rngam dag cing // ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'brel bas na// 'gro drag dus gnas ma wa
71a5(rnying rgyud): snang // bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor na// stangs dpral gnyis sam yang na lnga// byas te dad ldan rab zhugs na// 'dod pa'i yid 'ong mnyam par 'gyur// skal ba mnyam pa'i ye shes de// gnyer na nye bar 'byung ba yin// ya mtshan chen po
71a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung bar nges// dad med nyams na phung bar 'gyur// zhes ched du brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam chog gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos rgyal po ra
71a7(rnying rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las// bde ba'i 'bru tsho gas gsal ba'i rgyun// rdo rje'i lam nas pad+mor bkrol// rtsa nas bstim cing dkyil 'khor bskur/
71b1(rnying rgyud): byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas sa// gsapa bzag mo'ang ba nyid// d+h+r-i ga phyag rgya 'tshogs mchog pas// na rten dgral 'khor bsal gardza la// gsang ba gsang man gsang mchog las// gasmad pa da lha mnyan par bya// gsang ba'i dod ting na
71b2(rnying rgyud): bapas// gzhan du smra bar tha ba med// gsal pa'i 'khor lo gzhal yasas// gsal ba'i zag yang btad// ma gzung pa'i tshogs mchog las// dgras c-ing pA' khor bsal smra dz+nyAm// mangs pas partsal ba'i sgras dang /
71b3(rnying rgyud): gsung zags kyi rdo rje byung // rtul ba thams cad mnyes mchod la// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// lag pa'i 'khor lo gzhal las sa// gsal ba TIg pa nga ba nyid// hUM gi phyag rgya tshogs mamyog pas// las kyi dkyil 'khor bya
71b4(rnying rgyud): nyi man / na pa sa // g.yang ba 'du / nga gyi dgas pargyad palas/ ma gyung bar bya la / sa pa thugs
71b5(rnying rgyud): phyogs kyi dkyil 'khyod gsal stonam// oM tsho sa kyi bdud rje ba med kyis// dang ldan ste sa mas par thos// ras 'bring zla man po can la// mthun pa'i gsang bzhugs kyizhan du men// bstod man 'khor lho'i gzhal pas su// ga
71b6(rnying rgyud): ba theg nga ba nyid/ min rnaMms las// dkyilang khor lnga dang zang // phyogs bcangs smra'i bams padapa/ lugasung rgyags nga/ khor bar bzad pa'o// dpal 'khor da ba da 'i
71b7(rnying rgyud): son meshes par ma bya da / badri mi'i thong par mthos par/ nyan pa ma mags com parnams/ 'bram bu mang cu drug par 'byur / ngab tu byengad bar thong ba dang / byeng rgyal ma drug kya dang // grangasas dang bya po po
72a1(rnying rgyud): nga ba ltams dbang bslus/ dus 'di rgyan cad thal ba mas// nganas thams cad myed pa dang // ma nga bar byud dun sum myags// sa pa pa bdag par 'gyur// zhes // gsung ba'i byung pa kho na nyid ngas pa la dang
