72a2(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dkris pa chen pos/ smyu bul dra ba'i rgyal po sbyar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// mu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// kyis sa
72a3(rnying rgyud): dang mngon sum par// rab tu rtogs pa nam bzhi yis// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgya po// yan lag dbang ponam shes kus// nam smin oM du shes par bya// rdzogs pa'i dkrol 'khor nyid du bsgom/ yang na khros pa'i dkyil 'khor ban// gzugs
72a4(rnying rgyud): d+hi raM rig la sogs// nam smin+da mA~M du shes par bya// yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yadun khro mo'i dkyil 'khor klob// gos sbyin bza' ban+d+ha \u0f88\u0f90 chog/ tho gar tshogs kyi sprin phung gis// hUM ru shes pas rab kyang na// ngo mtshar 'anang
72a5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor mnyes// lA ma ma rigs ngan mo// dbye'am yang na mi dbye bar// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen po// sgrub pa dang ni grub chen po// bram b+hi paMng+ge dkyil 'khor du// bang bathu gas kyi dkyil 'kho sngo// sangs rgyas na tshogs ma lus la
72a6(rnying rgyud): kyis mnyam tshogs kyi sbyin pas bstim// bslab pa'i nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor de// dkyil 'khor rdo rje lI yis blang // mkha' 'gro gsal 'bar tsho la sogs// yid bzhin sprin gyi bdag par 'gyur// zhing 'brar mchog/ dang sog bran rnangs/
72a7(rnying rgyud): snyed du mkhas pas bzhag/ nga rgyal lag gi 'du byed bsgom// spring gyur pas rnam par dag/ dbyings su thim nas phyag kyang 'bar// sur 'gyur 'od zer 'gro bas brjid// gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba sros// ngo mtshar ngad 'gro thar pa'i thebs// ma sa
72b1(rnying rgyud): skye med de bzhin nyid// sgyu mar snang ba mig yor tshul// sgor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang // rdul cha tsam yang gos pa med// snod brdud rgyun mas dag rtogs shing // mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis kyis// dkyil 'khor kun du bzang ngo zhing
72b2(rnying rgyud): byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis gyur nas// yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan// cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yis// rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub// lnga dang lnga yi sbyor ba yis// tshem pu lba yi lha brko
72b3(rnying rgyud): ba btu dang gro slob // 'khar ba'i tshul nam pa bcoM gan gas dang do gsarigs te grags byas// mi ba rdzogs dang thun pa'i// rnam gragasas rnams bstes// gas ti ba byed
72b4(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog// khro ba'i rtogs dang ldan pa yi// tshem bu gcig pa'i lha rnams bsgom// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen dang // pho nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshogs// ci bkyi la sogs tshogs rnams kyis// dngos grub pas rnams rdzogs par
72b5(rnying rgyud): byed// rnal 'byor sngags 'chang dngos grub ni// mnyam rdzogs lhun grub dang gnas shing // spyod pa ci la yang thogs med pa// thams cad ye nas dbyer med pa'o// rdo rje rigs su thams cad dkyil// 'od 'phro 'bad par rab tu bsgom// chags med//
72b6(rnying rgyud): tshul du bstim par bya// gnyis med gyur nas phyag rgya che// yang na sku gsung thugs nyid de// thams cad ma lus su gsung zhugs// ting 'dzin gsal bar 'od zer 'dro// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// rig 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// dkyi
72b7(rnying rgyud): 'khongs lus 'bar bar 'grub// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed// de rje rigasas skye ba'i gnas// sngags 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni// thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor lde dang khro phreng banos// chag sang med pa'i
73a1(rnying rgyud): gyis su// 'od zer rnam pa mang po 'phro// gnyis su med par bstim par bya// dngas grub mchog gi snying po 'grub// rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis// de bzhin gshegs dang yum du bskum// sems dpa' sems ma nyid du brkos//
73a2(rnying rgyud): so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang // ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal// gnas dang longs spyod ci bde dang // mnyams bla ni rab ldan pas// dang po dam mnos bzhin du bya// le lo skyed snyom med pa yis// the tshom med par bsrub byas na// dkyil 'khor
73a3(rnying rgyud): rnams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang mchog dam pa thob// bsgrub pa'i zhag dang chos grangs ni// rgyud las smos pa bzhin du bshad// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la med du gleng ngo // gsang
73a4(rnying rgyud): de'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bcu gajig pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de gyes pa chen pose rol mo'i sbyin rnam par spros te/ kun dkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mas par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa
73a5(rnying rgyud): 'di brji na// skra 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor brtan po'i ting nge 'dzin// dra gar phyag rgya'i 'du 'gro las// 'dul laman ma mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur// klu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis// chos kyi dngos gru bathob par 'gyur// ca nga
73a6(rnying rgyud): bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub// bza' dang btur ba'i phyag rgya yis// yid bzhin su dang bdud rtsi 'grub// A lI kA li'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i
73a7(rnying rgyud): gzugs// 'bras bu sprin byed rgyu dang rgyan// rjes mthu can du gang gyur nga // rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing bu grags// mi dang sgra dang zangs ro// skye ba nam dag 'dzin mod byung // zad par selagasas 'gyur yin// zer mo bye pa kun pa
73b1(rnying rgyud): bas dang shes pa bas tha cag/ shas ba sa chagags cag 'byu ga/ sa mthad par bcu da gas/ 'bras pa dun/ nas rnags// sab 'das la dag pa'i stod // bags pa' ba sa rdzu// ma pa
73b2(rnying rgyud): da sa /
73b3(rnying rgyud): lngal kha mams cad 'bru ra 'gyur// nagags ma nyid dag nyas pa da/ dang stod pa'i de ma dzin gyi shes par gyung / sa 'a skye pa la nyid das sa ba
73b4(rnying rgyud): nags sung kyi ga na ga pa sa di N+DI 'gyur ba / pa smra dzugs da
73b5(rnying rgyud): ga cu gsu basbyin pa da shA / da Sh+T+ri pa // rtags pa nga lag tsug+sas sa/ 'a bya ngas pa shA /

73b7(rnying rgyud): khrir dro dus rmi la'i kyi gying pa'i byu ba ma kyi kyil labar kyilas sa / ma ga pa ci 'a'i su ba she du su sa sa sa su da bye
74a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i tshogs// dbang po yul dus rig pa rnams// kun du bzang po'i dkyil 'khar la// bdag nyid byin po skrag pa yas// thugs bya la shes lngas bltas shing // snying po thag la mnyam sbyar ba// bad ba'i ye shes ral ma yis// ye shes
74a2(rnying rgyud): dgyes la mchod pa dbul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu mar rang snang ba'i// rol mo dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i/
74a3(rnying rgyud): gagasung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba'i// dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thog ma// rdzogs
74a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam stong las// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung // phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mchog/ sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yis// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos
74a5(rnying rgyud): bsam bsgo sa la mnyam sbyor gyis// rang byung kun do ma ldan gyis grub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ glang zhig 'di la los 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// phyogs dus kun nas tham
74a6(rnying rgyud): cad du// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi// nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur// bskal bzhing gi rdul skad du// shin tu spangs la ra'i gnas ma'i// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi// 'bras bu gas tshan 'di yin te// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
74a7(rnying rgyud): btsun// 'das dang da ltar byung ba yi// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// nga rnyes nas sgra lnga lhun gyis rdzogs// 'byung dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun// 'di yis ldan gyis grub par 'gyur// 'din gsang can pa pa sa// 'bras bu m-i ru
74b1(rnying rgyud): ba yin// rgyab pa'i dkyil 'khor ma gus pa// 'di las gsang ba'angs don med// bcal kyang rgyal bas ma brnyes so// kun gyi phyag rgya chen po'i mchog/ thos bsam bskum la rab sbyangs pa'i// shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis gzung // snod Sh+Ta
74b2(rnying rgyud): ngang tshul ban la brtan// lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin// gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya// mongs la phyung bas gal te byin// dus min par ni srog zad nas// bsregs dang slebs par yun ding gnas// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid da btsun
74b3(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa nyid la rgyad du brjid de// gsang pa'i byung ba na da nges pa'os shin kyi sa ba'an dag gi la na sde bcug smram pa'o// denas de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la dmam pa can pa'i bu 'di thangs /
74b4(rnying rgyud): thugs pan+d+ha smra pa 'i rdzogs paso// ye shes dkyi la 'khor bgal na// bar dun ma sa kyil khor su ma chags// d+ha thig 'a kren rdzog rje ma nam zhig 'an/ rdurje la shes kyil 'khor ldan// da ston namapar yas pa/
74b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal sas/ oM rbugs sa rdzog // yon tanaldan la rdzogs/ yangs rgya rdzogs na dbyung // 'du pa rgyags kyin ga // mam dmigs sgra thum mnyam pa 'i cings// mtha' ba na
74b6(rnying rgyud): tshogs 'gro// mtha' mam ngan nas sbyin ces tham// rdzogs skrags thugs d+hA bi tiH/ ma rdzogs parda'i jig tan rgya rnyed du// thal ba'i dun mas dul b+hU n+d+he// rdul bcwa la phrin pasam pas seMs// sma ji gi s+yAd la lca gas nga ts+tsha/
74b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid ce// sku gsu thugs kyi kun du khyab// skugasung thugs kyi thug 'i tshoH// zhes kyang drang srugs so// gsang ba'i snying po dzin nyid nges pa las mnyes pa'i le'u ste bcub ni 'o// / nonas de bzhin
75a1(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyar ba nyid kyis khra bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par du mdza na/ cing gyur zhen/ bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pa dang / brtags pa la mngon pa ga pas yang dag pa'i dang
75a2(rnying rgyud): dadabral ba dang / gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par spras pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chel nas/ klu dang 'bras bu la rmongs pas med pa'i sa bon nub mos tu langs nas mtshams med pa'i rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar zhes pa// de rang tu ma pa'i sdug bsngal
75a3(rnying rgyud): drag pos bdus pa dang / 'dibs shin tu grang yang tsa mA rung snyam pa'i mo la rab tu slebs pa rang // pad+ma sa dgas pa'i sdug bsngal drag pa dag gis rab tu rten pa/ dIm bu'i sdug bsngal rab tu zab pa sogs pa brgyang dang / shin tu grang ba la sogs pa
75a4(rnying rgyud): brgyad du 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad cing bskal pa chen po song phrag bcu gnyis su nyams su myong ngo // de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang ye dwags stsogs pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang / 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams yid du ma 'ong ba dang / gdug
75a5(rnying rgyud): cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su gyur pa dang / yod med par yang gyur cing shin tu da ci skams pa dang / lus dang yan lag dang / dbang po mo 'tsham par gyur pa/ bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so// de nas las kyi sdig pa rtsub mo'i rnam par smin pa'i khar
75a6(rnying rgyud): bslabs pa dang sngon gyi sred pas mtshams sbyar nas// yi dwags srin po rab rtsa gdug pa gnam po lus gcig pa mgo bkra pa dang / mgo lnga tshogs pa dang / lus brgyal mgo gcig pa dang / lus sna tshogs pa dang / yan lag mang po dang / yan lag snga
75a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs pa dang / gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa dang / 'khor rab tu mang po dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dang / 'jigs pa'i nga ro sa ska sna tshogs pasgrogs pa dang / gzugs dang / re dze dang / dri dang // brlangs kyis thams cad lci bu zhes byad
75b1(rnying rgyud): pa dang / rab tu 'jigs pa'i rlung nag dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i dbugs kyis phyogs bcu kun du khams 'khrug par byed pa/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs par byed pa/ myos shing nyams par byed pa'i mthus klu'i rigs dang / lha ma yin gyi ris dang /
75b2(rnying rgyud): lha'i ris dang / tshangs pa'i ris dang / 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba man zad dbang du bsdus so// de skyon bsten pa'i stobs kyis thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs nas thugs rjes 'dul bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chen po'i
75b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje bkod pa/ sgyu 'phrul drubs 'jig rten drug gi/ phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsum ste bdag po 'dul po'i ri grul chen po gzi brjid chen mo bstan pa'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ska dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i gdug po bcomaldan
75b4(rnying rgyud): 'das dgyes pa chen po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'byung ba chen po rnam par spros pa'i// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings las khro mo dbang phyug ma chen mo mngon du phyung ste/ hi hi dgyes pa'i gzi
75b5(rnying rgyud): mdangs kyis pad+ma rgyas par mdzad nas ni gnyis su med par dgyes pa'i 'khril bas thim nas/ byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ hU~M hU~M hU~M pi shwa badz+ra krod+ha dz+wa la maN+Dal phaT phaT phaT ha la ha la ha la hu~M hU~M phaT/ ces brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa
75b6(rnying rgyud): khyab par gyur to// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs stong gsum gyi 'jig rten tsam phyogs bcu'i rdul phra mo snyed 'then par gyur pas/ 'jig rten drug gis phyogs bcu thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du g.yos so// 'ur thar// rab tu 'ur ngur/ kun
75b7(rnying rgyud): du rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// chem chem/ rab tu chem che ma/ kun du rab tu chem chem mo// shig shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun du rab tu shig shig go// gtor gtor/ rab tu gtor gtor/ kun du rab tu gtong ga tor ro// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i sto
76a1(rnying rgyud): khams na gnas pa'i dbang che ba dang / gzi brjid che ba dang / mthu che ba'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad brgyal rab tu brgal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po nyid 'jigs byed chen po shin tu rngam pa skye bung zhes
76a2(rnying rgyud): byed pa 'bar ba chen po'i khrag 'thung / sku smug gnag cir yang 'gyur ba/ dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul skyed mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa de dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur te/ dur khrod chen por dgyes nas khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil na keng
76a3(rnying rgyud): rus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng / 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i klong dkyil na dbang phyug chen po dang / dur khrod kyi bdag po dregs pa khyo shug gi gdan la brkyang bskum du bzhugs so// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprin phung gi tshogs thams cad de dag kyang la la ni dpal khrag 'ja
76a4(rnying rgyud): chen po rdo rjer gyur te shar phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin bre zhing gyur te lho phyogs su bzugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'jung chen po pad+ma d+har te nub phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrug 'thung chen po kun du las su
76a5(rnying rgyud): byang phyogs su bzhugs so// de dag kun kyang 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs dang / ngam pa'i nga ro dang / 'bar ba'i glong na dbu gsum phrag drug zhabs bzhis dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gshin je la sogs pa gyo shug gi gdan byas pa la bzhugs
76a6(rnying rgyud): so// btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams kyang so sor sku la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// rigs lnga'i he ru ka las gcig tu bstim sde bslus nas/ gcig gis mang po 'dul ba'i ngo mtshor bstan te/ de nas dregs pa chen po la sogs pa gtam po'i sem
76a7(rnying rgyud): kyis gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po sna tshogs pa bstan nas mgrin gcig tu gdug pa'i nga ros glang po'i gtum tshig tu smras pa/ thong thong snying rje'i bdag po ci de ltar byed dam zhes 'dzer cing shin tu gdug pa'i sems kyis khros nas rngam mo// de nas bcom ldan
76b1(rnying rgyud): 'das dgyes pa chen po dbu dag phyag bcwa brgyad zhabs brgyad du gnas nas thugs rjes 'dul ba'i thabs kyis shin tu khros nas rngam pa'i skad kyis/ hU~M hU~M hU~M ha ha ha khA hi khA hi khA hi zhes brjod pas/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa chen po'i tshogs chen po de
76b2(rnying rgyud): dag gi snying dang dbang po kun gyur/ nang grol kun drangs yan lag kun bcad gtubs nas khrag kun 'thungs nas rus pa kun 'chos so// de nas hUM hUM hUM b+h+rUM e A ra li dzaH dzAH zhes brjod pang / phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas par yungs
76b3(rnying rgyud): 'bru gcig tsam gyi nang du chud par bsdus so// de nas 'byung po ma lus pa'i thal po'i yang rgyal po dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo srin mo chen mo mi'i srin mo dang / tshangs ma dang / 'khrub mo dang / dbang
76b4(rnying rgyud): dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu ma dang / dmar mo dang / bdud rtsi mo dang / zhi ba mo dang / be con mo dang / srin mo dang / za ba mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / ra ro khrag 'thung myos pa dang / gcig pur spyod ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang /
76b5(rnying rgyud): rlung mo dang / gsod byed ma dang / me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byed ma dang / sta chad mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / da mgo dmar ser chen mo dang / bum sna sngo nag mo dang / gsus 'dzin ser nag chen mo la sogs pa/ bran dang yang
76b6(rnying rgyud): bran dang / g.yog dang / yang g.yog dang / 'khor zhing gi rdul snyed bsdus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen pos 'dul ba'i 'bras kyis yang rigs lnga'i 'jigs byed chen po snang bar byas nas/ de dag kun
76b7(rnying rgyud): dgyes par rol pa'i dkyil gyi 'khor sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag byung ngo // oM iHhU~M badz+ra pra be sha a la la toHzhes brjod pas 'byed me'i rgyal mo rnams shin
77a1(rnying rgyud): chags pa'i yid g.yos nas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sdud cing rgyas par gyur nas/ dper na khab len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rje'i sku la srin me chen mo me'i srin mo dang / dam ma
77a2(rnying rgyud): dang / dga' ba mo dang / gsod byed ma dang / nag mo chen mo dang / dmar ser chen mo dang / sngo nag chen mo dang / ser nag chen mo rnams 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rje'i skul tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug
77a3(rnying rgyud): srid mo dang / gzhon nu sa rnams 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin po che'i yu la bdud ci lo dang / zhib mo dang / betson mo dang / zab mo dang / srin kon mas 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po pade'i skul
77a4(rnying rgyud): khrag gis myos ma dang / gcig pur sprod ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlung mo rnams 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun du las kyi sbal me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byed ma dang / sna chung mo dang / chu lha mo rnams
77a5(rnying rgyud): 'khril lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de dag gis hUM zhes brjod pas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs bsdus nas shin tu bcum par gyur to// de nas dgyes te ha ta zhes brjod pas byang chub sems kyi sprin dag las dkar mo'i
77a6(rnying rgyud): gus dang / kun mo'i tshogs dang / mongs mo'i tshogs dang / thal byed pa'i tshogs dang / spos mo'i phyogs dang / gzum mo'i tshogs dang / spyi sha can gyi tshogs dang / mtshogs ma'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi lag che dang ngo mtshar du bcas nus 'dzin to//
77a7(rnying rgyud): 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs nas 'khor bar 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis rang rang gi lag cha dang bcas nas 'khod ngo // de nas shin tu dgyes te te he zhes brjod pas seng gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / stag gdong
77b1(rnying rgyud): dang / wa gdod chen ma tshogs dang / khyi ga dang zan ma'i sogs dang / bzhad gdong chen ma 'tshogs dang kAng ka'i grwa dang chen ma chags dang / drung ba'i gdang chen ma tshogs dang / 'ug pa'i gdong chen ma 'tshogs rnams rang rang ga lag cha dang ngo mtshar
77b2(rnying rgyud): chas nas 'thon par gyur to// 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol shar gyi phyogs nas 'khor bar rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod do// de nas shin tu dgyes pas phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus par khyab par byas nas phaT zhepa brjod pas/
77b3(rnying rgyud): srid 'gro ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gdong mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'jig rten ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ro langs ma'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du ches nas 'thon par gyur to// 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgor shin tu rngam
77b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzugs kyis gnas so// de nas dgyes pa'i sprin las phyogs bcu nas phaT ces bsgrags pas thams cad khros nas/ ma mo thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas ga la ba der yud tsam gyis phyin par brtse'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal
77b5(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun thugs rje chen po bdud rtsi chen po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs nas/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // oM badz+ra mahA a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+ha oM oM A~M zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa
77b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po de dag gi snam nas bton nas/ mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi rgya mtsho chen por thud pa las/ snam nas khro bo ur+d+ha s+t+ra krod+ha srung nas 'dam khu kun 'thungs pas drin pa slar byed de/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad
77b7(rnying rgyud): nga rab dgra brgya/ phyag stong brgyad brgya/ zhabs brgyad brgya/ sku 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil na bzhugs par mthong ngo // de'i dus su 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i sred pa gsum kyi bdag po dregs pa'i dbang phyug thams cad 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs pa
78a1(rnying rgyud): kyis mi khyab par so sor snang bas dus gcig tu btul lo// de nas de dag shin tu 'dar zhing rab tu bred cing zhum pa'i nga ros smras pa'i tshig/ 'bangs su mchi/ 'bangs su mchi/ 'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na// mgro dang lus ni 'gyu
78a2(rnying rgyud): 'gas shing // snying lang 'gas shing gtugs 'gyur cing // rul myags tshig nas brlag pa dang // dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par shog/ ces 'bangs su mchi bar mnas bor nas dkyil 'khor gyi gdan du bzhag go// thams cad kyis mgrin gcig
78a3(rnying rgyud): tu spras pa// bdag cag rnams kyi mchis bring dang // ma dang srid me bu mo rnams// dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol// dpa' bo lha rjes bzhes su gsol// bdag cag so so'i 'khor bcas kyis// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di// ming tsam
78a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin par byed pa yang // gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba ltar// g.yo sgyu med cing gus ldan pa'i// sems kyis blangs te spyi bo yi// gtsug tu bzhag ste bkur bar bya// de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag sgrub// gal te dpa' bo'i
78a5(rnying rgyud): spyan snga 'drir// smras pa bzhin du ma bgyis na// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying // bkas gtubs dum bur rul bar mchi// zhes smras so// de nas de dag gi chung ma'i tshogs dang / sring mo dang ma dang bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dkyil 'khor du
78a6(rnying rgyud): yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kun// dpa' bo chen po'i 'bangs su mchi// dpa' bo chen po bdagra cag rnams// lus kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// zhes smras so// de
78a7(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos lag tu rdo rje byin nas ming gis dbang bskur nas dkyil 'khor kyi phyi rol du bkod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sprin rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//
78b1(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dkris pa can pas dpal 'khor gyi tshogs chen po 'di dag dam tshig gis grub par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa khro ba khrag 'thung chen po btsun ma chags dang bcas pa dag gas/ su dang gsung dang / thugs dang la nas
78b2(rnying rgyud): rngam pa las gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag phyung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shI he ru ka many+dza tsaHs+'un+na dush+man+ta ka ha nad ha patsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA shI ti ru ka ma hA tsat+ta sarba puSh+Ta d+ha ka ta na da ta bats+ya d+huhU~M hU~M phaT/ oM rat+na mar+d+ha shI ti ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Thany+dza
78b3(rnying rgyud): sa su na sa
78b4(rnying rgyud): nI hU~M phaT/ oM ma~M hA sUr+ya rat+na ma hA kr-i d+hi shwa rI bi da ma hU~M phaT/ oM ShI shi ti sa man+ta pad+ma oM ma hA sA ra swa ta ma hA pad+ma/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI khi hU~M phaT/ oM sarba a mo g+ha kA ma ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI bi shwa hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra gI rI ye gau r-I ha~M/ badz+ra tsi rI ha/ badz+ra pra mo n+da ha/ badz+ra bad+ha hrI ha/
78b5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra tsaN+Da sIha/ badz+rI puk+ka sI ha/ badz+ra g+hasma rI ha/ badz+ra s+sa shA nI te/ badz+ra sid+d+ha mu Sh+NI te/ badz+ra b+hA g+h+ra mu khI taM/ badz+ra sr-i gA la~M mu khA te/ badz+ra shA nA mu khI he/ badz+ra gr-id+d+ha mu khI he/ badz+ra kang+ku mu~M khI he/ badz+ra k+Sh+Na ka mu khI he/ badz+ra u lU ka lu khA he/ badz+ra Ar+yA te dza tir
78b6(rnying rgyud): badz+ra.asaka ts+tsha/ bcwol ba/ bye ba sgris ma la baSh+T+rI k+Sha/ hAhrI/ b+h+yathA/ / oMdu sa la sa d+d+hi/ \u0f7f spyan pa/ oM badz+ra'i d+his mA yad+hi/ oM oM bya sa bus ts+tsha
78b7(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa// thugs rnga khro dpal dzam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmed tshe// de nyid du ni bdag la stsal// oM ba~Mdz+raM kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+wa~M// oM badz+ra kro d+hi sa ma ya hoH/ oM badz+ra kro d+hA sa ma ya phaT/ a li u li tA li ta pA la~M d+na/ gnar rmi bar/ yo ga ts+tsha
79a1(rnying rgyud): khA hi hoHhU~M ha he phaT b+h+yo/ zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad kun tshig/ rab tu tshig/ kun tu rab tu tshig go// 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar ro// thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyis gang
79a2(rnying rgyud): rab tu gang / kun du rab tu gang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i tshogs chen po'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor spos pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor ba
79a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// gru chad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// gru bzhi sgo khyad bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// thod srul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid// 'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang pos
79a4(rnying rgyud): 'khrug/ khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag/ gtum pa dom gyi spang ba yis// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bzung // skrag nag sngo nag ser nag dang // dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// ko rlon gos ni sna
79a5(rnying rgyud): tshogs gyon// rngam pa'i sgra skad 'jigs par spogs// sbrul dang thod phreng nyi zlas brjid// stong gi 'jig rten khor yug bcas// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // ral gri dgra sta gshol la sogs// rang gi lag cha sna tshogs bsdams// btsun mo 'jigs
79a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshogs dang nga khril// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang // sgo bzhi phyag rgya rab mdzes shing // slas dang b+hi mo bran mo'i tshogs// bcu gatris dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi stan dang lag cha dang // ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas// zhes brjod pas/ 'jig
79a7(rnying rgyud): rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun du gsal bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen mos mnyes pa'i
79b1(rnying rgyud): mchod pa chen po 'di ched du brjod do// de la mchod sbyin dam pa 'di// thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral// de nas gnyis med blo yis ni// blo ngan 'jig te snying re rje// gnyis su med par bskal bar bya// 'khril pa'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas//
79b2(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya// mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la dbul// bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim// phyogs bcu dus
79b3(rnying rgyud): bzhir gshegs pa yi// bde gshegs yon tan rmad po che// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te// lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos// rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis// phyag rgya chen por rdzogs gyur cing // gsal ba yid gnyi med pa na//
79b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po 'bar bar 'gyur// zhes brjod pas mnyes pa chen pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mchog sbyin dam pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// /
79b5(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos sngags 'chad rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig chen po 'di ched du brjod do// bla med theg pa rab nges na// nyon mongs 'dod lnga ku ni spyad kyang // byas la mi sog tshogs 'gyur te// tshul khrims sdom pa phun sum tshogs
79b6(rnying rgyud): bla med mchog gi dam tshig tu// 'dul ba'i dbang gis tshul khrims dang // ji snyed sdom pa bsdam yas pa// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ yod med dbu ma'ang mi dmigs shing // sgyu ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul// srog med srog gcod bcad du med// srog kyang
79b7(rnying rgyud): skyes bu'i log rtog tsam// bden pa gnyis ga ra dbyer med pas// 'phrul dga'i tshul te tha dad min// gzhan dang ma byin med pa'i phyir// blangs med thams cad nyid kyi dbyings// chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu la// ming dang tshig tu brtags pa brdzun// brdzun nyid la ni ba
80a1(rnying rgyud): stsa smra smra ga smra na tu na na sun smra du/ kun na su
80a2(rnying rgyud): ga
80a3(rnying rgyud): ni/ sa shi nyes pa ngasas bya /
80a4(rnying rgyud): mig par 'gyur// yid kyi la natshogs pagro// bras su dod pa'i bu ra// sa bya/ 'bral pa bre cing 'i slong dang / dum tshig ma // sa kyi du byed yin// rgya ba'i dum rgyag yang na/
80a5(rnying rgyud): pa'ang gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum// nan la gdam rtsib lnga gnyis la// gcig pa nga rgya phrag gnyis srad kyi// dmatshig 'di nga po ci// 'jig rte rje gagakyigs btsun// srid gsum 'gro ba 'i skyed pa// rtog 'dul dam tshig de sto /
80a6(rnying rgyud): nga / dus /
80b1(rnying rgyud): gshegs nyid kyi yul la bzhugs// 'jigs med kun du bzang por sbyor// ji bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs// ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa// ma lus nam dag ldan gyis grub// nyams na bskangs pas rdzogs pa dang // de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ ces brjod pas
80b2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'dul bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos lhun gyis thub pa'i dam tshig byin gyis
80b3(rnying rgyud): rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// me yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba gtum chen rnam pa la// khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig/ bdud rtsa lnga'am/
80b4(rnying rgyud): zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya// bkug nas rdo rje phur bas gdab// rdul du byas nas tshogasA la dbul// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu gyur du sbrel bsdams nas// bcings 'gyur bskyod na phyogs btur g.yo// myos nas gal te 'tshig par
80b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// pi mi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'brar ba'i gzi chen lhun chen la// tshogs pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin pa// rdo rje gsung yang dbang du 'gyur// bad+mod co lde'amathas sbru lA// mA tshan ma meng du bcas par byas// rdo zags pa'i phung bas gang // rdza
80b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul// ba~M gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyung du sbrel bsdams nas// 'gug 'gyur rdo rje'ang byi bzhin 'brang // ci 'dod de bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i 'du 'phro zi byin la// dga'
80b7(rnying rgyud): yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga le// mtshan ma'i ming du bcas par bya// yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtang // dkyil dga' 'gro'i phur pas gdab// rdo rje gzi byin 'bar bar 'gyur// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil
81a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa sa sa / sa nga/ na ma ba// ma shA
81a2(rnying rgyud): thun parnam pa stan na thar/ ngas byas rgya'o// gzusangs 'khrug pa rlo ba / skab mye gdul ba'i pas gang // nga sru // gas byung kyipa 'khyu du// na chung du thel nas brnams/ 2
81a3(rnying rgyud): bstan nan byin gyis kyab/ thams cad gal ba med par byed// thos du kyi ma grin pa'i tshogs// mug ma'i mtshan rten 'dzid pag/ rang ging mchog dpa bklag na// rjod la ni zung pa / tu dpa 'i ca /
81a4(rnying rgyud): gtum bag can// thams cad ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i// dbang dang byin brlabs mang pon// na chen la sogs dbang bsdus nas// 'khor rnams dbang thug sas su byas// so so'i las rnams bskos pa de// ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa//
81a5(rnying rgyud): myur du ma ngon pa d+ma byung // dam panas bzhin du ma byas na// dri ltar dang gim nas pa ba // sngamagyis dal pa 'a nga med// byas de las 'das kyang na// me g.yos nga yang thal pa bdun// yak+Sha khribs gtubs par 'gyur// de bas nas 'byang sa
81a6(rnying rgyud): 'ardzing gis// ji ltar brtsal pa bzhin rgyas// las dumangon dum byas na// rang gi sa lus sa man par bzhin// rdul rgyags TIg nas dkyim par 'aH// rnala'i byung dpal gangs byung ba'i// las rnams yongs su tha ba dang // 'khar rnams pa
81a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin du myos// sgra le ma lang ngas kyi jug/ 'acol ba'i lasungasas phyo// sa 'o// pa pa las kyi sa sems ga sa/ mas nga /
81b1(rnying rgyud): thams pang thams pang byed pa sa// ma can pa masags pa'o// thogar gyu gcan pa sa/ thams kyad pan la ba bar gyus// da pa yang sma par byed// ngad+ya ba dru dun 'du byung ba// la ba dan 'bral bar byud/
81b2(rnying rgyud): mo chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gAr zla tshig chen pos ni// lhan ner 'dod na lhan ner byed// rmugs par 'dod na rmugs par byed// seng ga dang chen mo la sogs pa'i// thog zla chag chen mos ni// khrims cad kun la za bar byed// rdul tsha tsam yang med pa
81b3(rnying rgyud): bzhad gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar bla tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la 'byin par byed// kun la rab tu nyams par byed// sgras dang b+hI mo bran mo yi// bro gar bla tshong chen mos ni// blud cing gtang bar bya ba ste// thams ched thams cad byed pa yin//
81b4(rnying rgyud): ljon pa dang ni lhag phran tshal// gdong gcig ma dang me rig drug// dad pa'i dga' bas chags pa dang // khros pas ka lI rab tu b+he// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sbyor bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po kho na nyid nges pa las ldan gyis grub par
81b5(rnying rgyud): zin las byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u pa nyi shu pa'i// / da nas bcom ldan 'das dbyas patsun pa chags kyi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu ngam pa'i gdangs kyis tha 'di blangs so// hUMb hU~Ms kyin dus mtha'i le ltung dbar// 'ang ra nyis 'jam smrig gi/
81b6(rnying rgyud): gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin// mche bzang yug za byed che // hU~Mngam pa'i ngaro 'brug skyong lding// gtum chen ri rab 'bum bskyil spyad// a A hA la'i gdu sbyangs // dbyug pa'i 'dzor dang g.yeng ba hU~M hoH// hrIn po shes rab 'ang po che/
81b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor bar drugs pa// 'brang ba'i ye shes rje 'joms gi tshogs pa gos srin // spel ba'i rgyal po sbyi // myos pa'i dkyis 'a ma byen 'dung // dbye'i 'khor yid bzhin ngar / gis tho pa
82a1(rnying rgyud): mamats+tshaH/ hU~M ba dang na srin bdas ldanapa// byung kyi bya du byu na pas 'dams// 'dugs pa'i chags ca 'jigs zad pa// 'dags byed kun pa thas maNak+Sha/ du thugs su p+na // dz+hama.um lda papa// da A.A 'ab //
82a2(rnying rgyud): 'brur rdzu/ rjerje 'di sas// dasang ba'i sbyi de'idi nyidangos pa las khri mal brjod 'i tsug so// de nam bcom ldan 'das dgras pachen pa sring bzhin gshegs pa nyid la thugs kyi rgyal po bdun pa 'a
82a3(rnying rgyud): 'chi da/ thogapa pazhi'i rang bzhin 'dri// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba myed// gze dzin su ma la ba sa// rten gas pa khrimam da byin// sams cad par dag dpa yang // gsang pa'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam// ye shes ma/
82a4(rnying rgyud): rab 'thas kun// dan du sa 'gyur rang ma gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// thug grags cheni ras pa 'di// rtags nas smab dgang byed pa// de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs// de btsun ga shegasu pa thams cad la// gzung ba 'di las gzhan sa
82a5(rnying rgyud): mnga'// klu dang sbyarang bzhi pa yi// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na// nyid de nges pa'i dbying sa nas snang // de ni nges pa lung bstan te// pras ni sngags lus skyes pa yin// sa rab rig pa 'dzin la gnas// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dbus nas
82a6(rnying rgyud): bzhim nyam dri nyid kyi dbyings su gsung thugs kyi lhun sdug po bkod pa'i rkyen nyid du lugs so// 'phags pa rtog pa'i rgyal po rlung bu le dra ba'i la'i stong phrag 'gyub las mtshan nyid dang rlung thams cad kyi lung bri ste/ de 'byin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gas pa/ gsang pa'i snying ba
82a7(rnying rgyud): khron nyid nges pa'i le'u las thams cad ma lus pa'i spros te 'khor lo bskur di dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog go// gsang po'i snying po de so nyid nges pa las mnyes pa dang yongs su gzung ba'i le'u nyi shurtsa gnyis pa rdzogs
82b1(rnying rgyud): rba gar skadang / badz+ra sarba mA yAng lugra h+ya sarba Adarban+t+ra mA tAn+ta/ bad skad du/ rdo rje sems dpa' rtswa 'phrul dra ba gsad pa thams cad kyi me long zhes zla ba'i rgyud// ma rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// la bsrud pa la
82b2(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// oM snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje'i'achang // rgya las kun gyi gsang ba'i bdag/ kun gyis dbang bskur gter 'dzin pas// dgyes shing spyan gdangs gus bcas pas// rgyal ba kun la bstod bskor nas/
82b3(rnying rgyud): spyan sngar gus bdug 'di skad gsol// e ma ho sangs rgyas spyan gyi gsung // rtog pa kun gyi rgyal po ste// cho ga rgyas par bstan pa'i rgyud// dri med zab mo brtag dka' ba// 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang // dam tshig bsgrub dang grub pa dang // skugasu
82b4(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi cho ga'i rgyud// ma lus gtan la 'bebs pa 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' dri ltar lags// sgyu 'phrul gang gis bstan pa de// dra pa'i rgyud de gang phyir bstan// lung ni gang phyir brjod pa nyid// gang gyir s+thi zhes bya bar bshad// gsang ba zhes ni ji lta
82b5(rnying rgyud): bu// snying po'i don ni ci yi phyir// de kho nyid ces ji ltar brjod// nges pa zhes pa ci yi phyir// mtshan 'di gang zag gang la gsungs// mtshan gyi dri ba dris pa'o// thun mong khyad par tshul nyid kyi// ston pa zhes ni ci yi phyir// gnas dang 'khor ni ji lta bu/
82b6(rnying rgyud): dus dang sdud pa ji lta bu// mi bskyod pa ni ji ltar bya// rnam par snang mdzad ji ltar brjod// rin chen 'byung ldan gang gi phyir// snang ba mtha' yas gang gi phyir// don yod grub pa ji lta bu// spun dang nam mkha'i dbyings ma dang // gos dkar mo dang m+bA pa kI/
82b7(rnying rgyud): grol ma zhes pa gaji ga byer// so mi snying po co yi phyer// nam snying spyan ras gzigs dbang dang // phyag ni rdo rje gang pyir brjod// sreg mo phreng dang klu gar ci// byams dang sgribasel kun bzang dang // 'jam dpal zhes pa ci yi phyir// dus bzhi bdug kyis
83a1(rnying rgyud): dang // mar me dri chub gang phyir brjod// nam N+Dal gshin rje gshad po dang // rta mgrin bdud ci 'khyil pa ci// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu zhes pa gang phyir brjod// yid dang chos bzang gnyis ci phyir// gca zas bdag la ngas par
83a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs// gang phyir mthun mong ma yin pa'i// nang dang gsang ba'i gleng gzhi las// ston pa bstan pa gnas dang 'khor// dus dang sdud pa ji ltar brjod// grags pa thun mod gleng gzhi las// ston pa 'khor gnas dus ji ltar// bstan pa sdud pa ji lta bu// skyes bu
83a3(rnying rgyud): chen pos bshad du gsol// 'di ni gleng gzhi'i dri ba tshigs su bcad pa'o// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// gleng bslang gnyis su ci phyir 'gyur// gang gis gang la gleng bslang zhing // thabs dang 'bras bu ci yin ston// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// sems lnga
83a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes lnga yi rim// gang dang 'brel pa bshad du gsol// 'di ni gleng bslang ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o// skyes bu chen po ston pa'i gtso// sgyu 'phrul dra bar mnga' brnyes shing // phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi rje// gzi brjid phung po phun sum tshogs// blta bya ga
83a5(rnying rgyud): ci yi phyir// gang gis rtogs pas ji ltar 'gyur// rtogs dang me rtogs khyad par ci// rtogs pa'i sgo ni du ru gsungs// gtan tshigs tshul dang 'bras bu ci// 'di ni lta ba'i dri ba'o// thun mong spyod pa ci yi phyir// thun mong thun mong gang ci'i phyir// shes rab
83a6(rnying rgyud): thogs dang thugs rje dang // rtogs dang phyogs gcig spyod pa dang // 'brel dang rig 'dzin spyod pa ci// gang gis gang la ji ltar spyad// de yi 'bras bu gang phyir 'gyur// gang du de dang mi ldan pa'i// spyad pa'i skyon nyid bdag la gsungs// 'di ni spyod
83a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i khyad par gyi dri ba'o// thun mong spyi dang khyad par gyi// rang bzhin nyid dang lhun grub kyi// dkyil 'khor zhes pa gang ci'i phyir// de nyid phyi nang gsang ba dang // 'dul thabs gnyis su ji ltar 'gyur// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rim gsum gang // lhag pa
83b1(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin zhes bya ba// gnyis la sku gsung thugs sbyor dang // phyi nang gsang ba'i rim pa ci// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor ji lta bu// gang phyir gzugs brnyan zhes brjod cing // gang gi gzugs brnyan gad la snang // phyi nang gsang bar ji ltar 'gyur//
83b2(rnying rgyud): lhag pa zhes pa gang phyir te// gzugs brnyan zhes pa ji lta bu// gnyis dang gsum dang drug bstan cing // don dam kun rdzob byang chub sems// phyi nang gsang ba ji ltar sbyor// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis ci zhig/ gang gis gang du gang tshogs nas// ji
83b3(rnying rgyud): spyad pas ci zhig 'grub// 'di dag bstan pa'i dgongs partse// gnas skabs gang dang 'brel par 'gyur// yan lagartsa pa gang dang 'brel// dkyil dang 'khor du ji ltar brtag/ gsungs shig skyes bu mchog chen po// gang dang nges pa ma rnyed par// kun
83b4(rnying rgyud): spyod par ma gyur pa// legs par gsungs shig rgyal mchog che// 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi dri ba dris pa'o// gang gis gang la gang dag tu// ji ltar dbang bskur phun sum tshogs// bdag gis ji ltar shes par bgyi// gang dang gang du ji ltar 'grel// skye
83b5(rnying rgyud): dang yon tan ji lta bu// 'bras bu rim pa bshad du gsol// 'di ni 'jug pa'i cho gA du// las kyi rim pa ji lta bu// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol//
83b6(rnying rgyud): ni dbang gi don mtha' dag la dri ba dris pa'o// gang la gang gis brten pa yi// dam tshig ces pa ci yi phyir// rtsa ba dam tshig du zhig bstan// gang phyir rtse bar brjod par bya// yan lag du zhig bstan pa gsungs// 'di dag la ma dang bsnyen bslab dang // gang zag ga
83b7(rnying rgyud): sa dang 'das pa'i sngon yon ci// phyi nang gsang bar ji ltar gsungs// lha dang spyod dang sgrub pa dang // shes bya ting 'dzin dmachog tu// grub dang mi spong bsrung ci zhig/ rgyal mchog skyes bus bshad du gsong // tho po jan mo yin

84b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// / degs gamang bdag rdo rje 'chang // sras thams da dpe nga ldan cing // dpas med rgyal pas rab bamar zhing // rang 'byung da pa'i gzha pa las na// thabs dang shes raba'i khrel sbyong zhing // rkyen pa de dang mdun /

84b6(rnying rgyud): thugs su zung ci na de/ tigs pa// rgya nang gsang pa'i sems dang rlob sha // rang bzhin zabapa dang 'bras zu byin/ sa pa'i rin pa sprul pang bya// thabs dang shes dab 'bral pa'i dag// u 'phra nas bzher bshad do// rdza nga na las pa dad pa
84b7(rnying rgyud): bas dang bdag nyid dang // byin brlabs shugs kyis 'brel pa ni// drang ba'i don zhes pasha dang yin// ma brjod grags pa'i bstan pa nyid// glo slar med dang zhal nas gsungs// dris mang po'i phreng nyid de// las dang ye shes pa nyid dang // rdzogs pas rdzogs
85a1(rnying rgyud): phyir lung nyid de// bstan pa spyi yi bdag nyid ni// thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid pas// gcig dang du ma mi gnas kyang // so so'i bstan pa rgya mtsho'i rgyud// 'di ston 'dis ston 'di phyir ston// don kun 'di la yongs rdzogs pas// lung gi spyi zhes
85a2(rnying rgyud): bshad pa yin// gang phyir gsang ba zhes bya ba// sku dang gsung thugs bdag nyid de// rang bzhin ye nas ngo bo dang // thabs dang 'bras bur gyur pa nyid// gsang ba'i sprin du 'di brjod do// ngang gis dman dang ma sbyangs dang // dbang dang dam tshig bral ba dang // rang brtags
85a3(rnying rgyud): bsgribs pas sa'i khyad par// de dang de yi dbang gis na// ro myang bral phyir gsang bar bshad// rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu yi// chos rnams TIg le chen po'i don// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa// ma lus ro gcig dbyer med pa// ji snyed theg pa'i khyad par dang /

85a5(rnying rgyud): brlabs rab snang ba// bsam kyis mi khyab che ba rnams// 'di las ston pas snying po ste// snying po dang ni 'od bzhin no// rgyu dang 'bras bu bcud 'dus pas// snying po zhes ni bshad pa yin// gang phyir thams cad byang chub sems// mtha' dbus yongs su ma chad
85a6(rnying rgyud): pa// dngos po gsum gyis khyab gyur pa// yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu yin no// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// de bzhin nyid du rdo rjes rig/ bdag dang gzhan don nus pa rdzogs// 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid do// gadra phyir dngos gnyis tha dad par// log par

86b1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi sgra gzugs te// gdod nas theg mchog mdzod nyid phyir// sgrib pa mtha' spangs gdul byal// skad cig gcig gis spang bar mdzad// zos rnams sna tshogs ji snyed pa// dngos po tha dang med phyir thum// khyab dang sngags dang tshad med dang // ye shes pani d+h+r-i
86b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo bstan// chos dbyings 'du 'bral med pa'i phyir// mu khyad thum por kun nas bskor// sku gsung thugs dang byin brlabs dang // thugs rjes ma khyab med pa'i phyir// yon tan rgyas pa'i dbyibs su bstan// rang 'byung ye shes mtha' bral bas// phyogs bcur 'ag
86b3(rnying rgyud): 'odas gnas pa'o// chang dang bral ba sems kyi byer// gan tu chang mye la bar spyor ba rtan// gad nas byin 'arla'as ze phyir// ma bsags lhan rdzogs mdzod nyid de// 'gro bar 'dod stong pa'i phyir// rin can 'bar ba'i gzhal las khang // tshogs dngos dang
86b4(rnying rgyud): med pa'i// chos gan ba rarang gnas te// bdag gzhan gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyir// gyi dang nang bral slab pa med// thun mang la brten thabs kyi 'bras// ye shes thabs kyis lags pa nyid// gdul ba'i bral don snang bas// blo 'byung bani ni lha ga par mdzas//
86b5(rnying rgyud): thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// gdul bya'i rim pa mthong man kun// stong sngon mtshan med 'od gsal 'jug/ de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir shar// thabs mang bsam gyis 'o khyab pas// lam brgyad rim par bgrod pa yis// 'bras bu yon tan kun rdzogs pas/
86b6(rnying rgyud): babs chu 'bras bcu drug bstan// zhon dang skrod pa'i lam bral bas// 'dod yon ye shes lnga rol te// bdag mchod ku na mnyes las byung bas// 'dod yon lha mos 'khrigs par bstan// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// ma chags thabs dang ldan pa dang //
86b7(rnying rgyud): yotan ldan rdzogs pas// te zlang d+ma rin pa che// las dang thugs rje smon lam gyis// byang chub sems dpa' mthu ba zo// smon lam dbang gis de dag tu// thos pa rgya mtsho bas ga phyir gnas// de tshe dus kyi tha bral yang // ngo bongs bzhi mnyam pa'i dus// dus
87a1(rnying rgyud): mtha' la mngon rtogs pas// thun mong min pa'i dus su bstan// de tshe phyogs bcu rgyal ba yis// bskal pa bye bar lung bstan pa// 'dul ba'i dus bab gsang ba'i bdag/ lag na rdo rjes bsdu ba mdzad// dus gsum rgyal bas byin
87a2(rnying rgyud): brlabs phyir// 'khor gyi nang na skal mchog ldan// gsang ba'i rdo rje 'chang bsdus nas// 'dul ba'i 'khor la bstan par mdzad// 'das dang mabyon da ltar gyi// sku gsum sku gsung thugs nges pa'i// de bzhin nyid du thabs gang gis// gshegs shing
87a3(rnying rgyud): gshegs dang gshegs gyur pa'i// thar pa gsum dang ye shes dang // pha rol phyin pa drug ldan pa// zhing khams yon tan bsam mi khyab// bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa'i// rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun gyi mtshan// gang phyir rdo rje thugs chud pas// las dang /
87a4(rnying rgyud): spyod pa dka' thub dang // srid pa'i ri bos mi bskyod pas// de ni mi bskyod mchog tu gsungs// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis// ji snyed sku gsung thugs snang ba// mos dang thabs kyi khyad par gyis// rnam par snang stir snang mdzad mchog/ rgyal ba kun gyi
87a5(rnying rgyud): yon tan ni// tshogs rnams 'dus pa'i ngo bo ste// yon tan rin chen ltar 'byung bas// rin chen 'byung bar gsungs pa yin// dpag tu med pa'i gsung gi sgo// dbang po thabs kyi bye brag gis// don rtags gsung ding yi ge'i sgo// mtha' yas snang phyir
87a6(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas mchog/ dbug med thugs rje mdzad pa yi// 'gro 'od med pa'i thugs rje yis// 'gro ba skyob pa'i don mdzad pas// don grub c+doMs ni rnam par bstan// rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dag kyang // zam la lnga nyid gnas dag cing // de las thabs nges mngon byas
87a7(rnying rgyud): pas// der dbang gyur te nyid snang ba// rgyal po nyid du 'arjod pa yin// ting 'og gnyis las mngon gyur pa'i// sgo dang 'dra 'a ga ga/ gang dethangs las mngon gyur pa'i// bde ba'i gzugs dang tshar ba dang // du shes dang ni bya / #
87b1(rnying rgyud): med bde ba'i ros// dbang sgyur ye shes rgyal por bshad// gang phyer snang dang bsgoms dang bris// phyag rgya rtsa bcud thig le'i mdog/ dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // sngo dang ljang dang rims ldan pa'o// rgyal ba kun gyi bde srid cing // spyod dang de las 'byung ba'i yum//
87b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad de las skyed pa lnga// tha mal zhen pa dag pa dang // dbang sgyur rgyal mo lnga rang bzhin// sra dang gsher dang drod dang bskyod// nam mkha'i khams kyis gang phye ba// steng 'og thabs las mngon gyur pa// yul dang shes pa dbyer med cing // thugs rje shes rab 'brel pa
87b3(rnying rgyud): yis// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// gnyis med gzigs pa sbyin gyi mchog/ zag med stong pa'i klong chen gyis// skyed dang sdud dang gnas pa'i phyir// mtha' dbus bral ba'i de bzhin nyid// nam mkha'i dbyings zhes gang brjod pa'o// thun mong dun mod ma yin pa'i//
87b4(rnying rgyud): las dang lta ba nyon mongs dang // shes bya'i dri ma mtha' yas pa// rtogs pas skyong zhing sreg pas na// gos dkar ma ru brjod pa yin// gang phyir las dang ting 'dzin dang // ye shes thugs rje bar med chus// gang dag 'khrud dang tshim byed pas// chu ni mA ma kI ru
87b5(rnying rgyud): bshad// gang phyer rtogs dang thabs dag dang // ting 'dzin thabs kyi rlung dag gis// bgrod pa med pa'i zhing khams su// sgrol bas sgrol ma nyid du bshad// snying po rang 'byur ye shes nyid// kun brten gnas dang khyab pa'i phyir// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin
87b6(rnying rgyud): la// sa ye snying por brjod pa yis// rang 'byung snying po byang chub sems// nam mkhang lta bur bsam brjod med// mtha' dbus sgo sgrar gang 'das pa// de ni na mkha'i snying po nyid// gang phyir thugs rje dpag med pas// 'gro ba chu bo rgyal gyi bar// skyo ba med par
87b7(rnying rgyud): gzigs pas na// spyan ras gzigs dbang pad+ma'i gtso// rtogs dang dbyer med rdo rje yis// mamang mi bdag rtogs mtshan ma dag/ 'joms pas phyag na rdo rje ste// thun mong nyid dang khyad par gyi// gsang ba'i rnam par shes pa bzhi// thun mong yul dang khyad
88a1(rnying rgyud): bAr ni// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las// mtshon dang rtogs dang bsgoms pa yis// lha mo bzhir ni mngon snang ba// byang chub sems dang ngadab dang // thabs kyi bde bas rab skrag pas// lha mo 'di ni sgeg mor bshad// go la dang
88a2(rnying rgyud): ma grol 'khor ba yi// gyi nang sgra yi bye brag kun// brag ca lta bur brjod mdzad pas// bar chad med pas phreng ba ma// tshim pa'i ngo bo gang bstan pa// dri dang ldan pa'i khyad par nyid// dbyangs nyid tshim zhing yid bde bas// de nyid rdo rje gI taM ma// ro yis khyab
88a3(rnying rgyud): cing gar sbyar ltar// bde ba chen po bzhi yi gar// khyab dang mdzes dang tshim pa dang // mi gnas bkrol bas gar mkhan ma// rgyan dang chags pa'i sgra dag dang // yid kyi phreng ba bde ba'i gar// lha mo bzhi yi rang bzhin no// ma rtogs 'gro ba mtha' yas la
88a4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin thugs rje mdzad pa yis// yongs la phan 'dogs skyob pa ni// 'di ni byams pa zhes bya'o// rtogs goms mthar phyin khyad par gyis// las dang nyon mongs lta ba'i rim// sel ba 'di ni sgrib sel lo// thabs dang shes rab gnas rtogs na// gang
88a5(rnying rgyud): phyir spong len mi gnas pas// phyi nang snod bcu dam lus pa// dbye ba med pas kun du bzang // bdag dang gzhan du 'dzin pa kun// zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyis// lta ba'i dra ba gcod pas na// zag med shes rab 'jam dpal sba// dbang po yi ge thig lar
88a6(rnying rgyud): bcas// gnas dang rtogs dang bsgoms pa yis// mngon du snang phyir brjod pa yin// dus bzhi rim pa gnyis brgyad de// de nyid dgrol dang brod skyed dang // khyod yul dag phyir brjod pa ni// dri dang bde bas dag tshim zhing // yid ldog med pas rdo rje dri// phyi nang khya
88a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khar la// me tog thig le bde bkod pas// rdo rje me tog bla na med// byin sems la gnas bcas pa'i// mun pa bsa' phyir shes rab dang // ye shes spang ba glan med// rdo rje gsal ba'i mar mam// byin dkyil 'khor ma lus la// rang
88b1(rnying rgyud): 'byung ting 'dzin bde ba yis// thams cad khyan par gnas pa'i phyir// khyab byed rdo rje dri chab ma// de bzhin nyid la dgongs pa yis// 'khor ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa// byang chub snying por tshar bcad pas// rnam par rgyal ba zhes su brjod// gzung 'dzin bral
88b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i ye shes ni// gnyis 'dzin rtogs pa'i gnyen po ste// rtogs goms de yis 'joms pas na// ya mAn+ta kr-ita gshin rje gshed// gang phyir 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las// thabs dang bcas pa'i rdzu 'phrul las// 'joms dang sgrol bar mdzad pas ni// rta ma
88b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal por de bshad do// 'khor ba'i bdud kyi dug lnga la// ye shes lnga ru gsal goms pas// gnyis med rtsi ru gang 'khyil ba// sgrib zad bdud rtsi 'khyil par bshad// gang du lus dang bcas pa yi// dbang po yul dang rnam shes reg/ rang rgyud bcad pa'i
88b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes nyid// sgo ba rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// rang rgyud rtag chad bzlog pa dang // gzungs dang lha dang bde ba dang // thig le rig par bcas pa nyid// gang phyir gnas nas dgug pa dang // gang du'ang 'gro bar mi nus dang // de las 'da' bar dka' ba dang /
88b5(rnying rgyud): bstims nas bde bas dril bu ma// gzung dang 'khyud dang bsdam pa dang // gnyis su med pas bde chen po// rang lus sdang srid brtan g.yo la// rtogs dang goms pa'i tshul gyis sbyar// de dag ma lus dran byed pa// rig pa'i rgyal po kun dbyer med// kun ga
88b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje mi phyed pa// kun du bzang por de bshad do// ma lus 'dus byas ma byas chos// ma lus zag med khyab pa'i dbyings// rtogs dang shes dang gang gyur pa// kun du bzang mor de bshad do// mi shigs thog le bde chen po// ye shes lnga ldan dngas ma'i bcud//
88b7(rnying rgyud): rang 'byung lus can kun gnas pa// ston pa rig pa'i gsung can nyid// d+harma tsakra chos kyi gnas// 'od bzhi e sogs tshul du ni// lus sbas pa yi tshul dag gis// lus can kun la khyab par gnas// rang 'byung thugs kyi bde ba nyid// rgyu ba bral ba'i snying
89a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ dang// da nga/ na// nga gad 'ang dgas/ 'a nam
89a2(rnying rgyud): yangs rnamam smras pa'i tog nga // sa'ab pa'i pa'i// 'i khyed gru 'du zungag// rnamapa'a'i ye shes dbyang bang Ta// ngas ga mdun ba dag ma/ @
89a3(rnying rgyud): bar bstan pa'i// ma gas pani pa nas te// dang nga chub sa gdo ga ba // gabyung ba'i tshig mir kyang rdzogs pan// ga pa bya gyis slos pa ring // da kya bya napa mang byed/ rkyen brgyangs dang chen partag pa/
89a4(rnying rgyud): bsdang bar mdzad pa'o// ma nim nu ma ta ste// rnam byed du rtog yad med // las can nam shes de ga gis// gas rang rigo bar 'khor du brjon// chos rnams kun gyi nga ny-i // thig la bcu drug sems lnga'i ngo // mchog tan cig sas nga ngam
89a5(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs mngon sum tshul gyis gsal// rngubs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// jig la zag med kyis pa'i dus// bas pa med lhan cig zlas pa'i tshe// bde ba chen po'i dus su 'dod// shes pa rten dang rten par bzlas// thungs kyi rim par
89a6(rnying rgyud): shAng sa nadagashegs
89a7(rnying rgyud): byang med pa shes gcig ga dang // rnam me thang b.ring // tshogs pa ni dpa / rnam thams cad ngo// 'di 'ongan nyid ba
89b1(rnying rgyud): dngul mdzad pa// yi dgas drag pos gdung ba sel// dmyal ba sdug bsngal chos kyi rgyal// gdul ba'i sbrul sbyang bar shar// pal lha las 'pho ba dang // la lar lhums zhugs bsnyam pa dang // dka' thub bdud brgyal sangs rgyas nas// 'khor
89b2(rnying rgyud): te mya ngan 'das// gnas la nges pa yod min te// dmyal ba yi dwags byol song dang // mi dang lha dang lha min te// so so'i gnas te gang yin pa// 'gro ba 'dul ba ston pa'i gnas// lha rnams dang ni mi rnams dang // lha min yi dgas dud 'gro dang // dmyal bas
89b3(rnying rgyud): po'i 'gro ris dka/ rang rang mos dang las dbang gis// 'dul tshul tha dad dbang gis 'khod// rang rang mos pas phrad pa'i tshe// rang rang brda skad tha dad pas// rtogs dang grol bar gang gyur pa// rang rang ji bzhin ston pa'i dus// bstan pa'i theg pa sna tshogs
89b4(rnying rgyud): te// rang rang zhen pa mthA' yas phyir// dz+wal dang mas pa'i dbang gas na// theg pa sna tshogs tshul du snang // theg gcig mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul// gnyis dang gas ma dang bzhi dang lnga// dbyu nga bsnang khre las gas pa// 'grib 'dul ba'i chung zas snang // skye dang
89b5(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs las dag gis// 'dul dbang thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de tshe 'grib sa so yang // rang gi gzhi mya ngan rig nas// rim palnga'am thabs gcig gis// rig 'dzin sangs rgyas sa la gnas// rang rang zla 'dzin spel pa'i
89b6(rnying rgyud): lus// sar gnas 'khor gyi dang po yis// de dag zhus pa'i rim gsungs pa// blo dang tshig dang yi ger bsdus// rgyud ces bya ba rgyun du grags// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// lha spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dam dang // sgrub 'a phrin las lam rim ni// phyi dang nang da
89b7(rnying rgyud): sbas pa ste// rang bzhin gnas dang mngon byed pa// thabs kyi rgyud ni gsum du gsungs// phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'o// mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa dang // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// bskyed rdzogs thabs rim gang bstan pa// sgra 'phrul dra bar
90a1(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'o// dAb+ha thags pa'i thas rnams pan// rtag pa chog kun ba shad pa la// bud can zla thul drabs// sangs rgyas pan sa gsung nam cag/ rdzogs par dang ma bar dag ga/ sugs mthal brtan kyis gtungs// rdo rjemams dab
90a2(rnying rgyud): sgra 'phrul du ba gsang ba ma yong gi d+had can pa las gleng gni rnam par bshad pa'i de gyi gnyis ma/ da ma gzhan yang bshad b+hag// gang zag thabs ni thun mongs// blo la lu dug byung ba// de ni thun mong yul zhid de// gang zag thabs dang ston pa
90a3(rnying rgyud): dpe bul mthur bye // thangs can gas ba dang ldan pa// den tha mong mo yin pa'o// de nyid thu ba la kha gnyim don// rnam sa rdul du snang ba ma // rang gi khams dang rnam cad nyid/ rgyal ba sa mams ma sa pa' nga // sems mnyid du rnam
90a4(rnying rgyud): skyes grub// gsang yul dbang po rnam zhes ngag/ ma lus 'dzams kyir khra ba d+ha// rtags sogs mtshan ma las skyes phyir// yum skye las kyis mi gnas shad// yid chos bzang po bzung mo nyid// chags sogs nyan mongs drug po nyid/ thub pasgral ba drub tu bshad
90a5(rnying rgyud): de nyid phyogs bcu dus bzhi yi// phung po 'byung ba rnam shes yul// dbang po dus dang lus chos bzhi// martan ma nyon 'ongs yum nyid de// de nyid sems phyir ma skyes pas// lhag pa'i bden gnyis 'bral ba las// byang chub sems lnga rnam par 'gyul// dngas ma
90a6(rnying rgyud): snang grags chos thams cad// skye ba med dang 'grag med dang // gnas pa med dang dmigs med dang // 'gro 'od med pa nyid du snang // bdag phyir ye shes gsal snang yang // gzhan phyir de dag ma rtogs pas// rang bzhin ngo bo ye nas gsang // shin tu gab sbas
90a7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i don// de nyid legs par bshad pa'i tshe// ye nas mnyam nyid gsarab la// ma rig log rtog rkyen dbang gis// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de bor snang // de nyid bde gshegs snying po ste// dngos med dngos po'i snying po can// 'gro ba rnams
90b1(rnying rgyud): smin bya'i phyir// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin pas// sprul pa rnams ni rnam par 'phrul// sku dang gsung thugs sna tshogs kyis// chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bskor// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang // ston pa 'khor gyis gtsug lag cig/ yab
90b2(rnying rgyud): dang yum dang gnyis meng dang // gang la gang gis gleng bslang ba// brda dang dgongs pa'i tshig gis te// bstan pa'i tshogs ni sdang bar 'gyur// 'phen pa rlung gi sbyor ba yis// thabs des yum la gang bskul pas// gnyis med 'brel ba'i chags pa'i 'od// sa
90b3(rnying rgyud): ya bcu gsum sku gsung thugs// bde chen lha ru gsal byas shing // nam mkha'i ye shes mngon phyung nas// bde ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i ro// skye dang dga' dang gnas pa dang // 'gro 'ong nyid las shes par 'gyur// gang gis gang la gang bslang pas//
90b4(rnying rgyud): ga
90b5(rnying rgyud): dbab dang gzung dang bskyil ba dang // zlog dang gzung dang sbyar ba yis// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs chen po// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// mthar thug rim pa las byung ba'i// kun kyang sems lngar snang ba ste// thabs las byung ba'i thig le dang // shes rab
90b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i thig le dang // gnyis med bde ba las byung ba// sems lnga rim par snang bar 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor zhing // sku dang gsung thugs las byung ba// bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te// sku gsung thugs
91a1(rnying rgyud): dang ye shes lngas// thabs dang rang bzhin 'brel pa las// 'gro ba kun la rgyas btab par// snod brgyad bdabang rang bzhin gyis// ma byas / naHga rgyas par gnas// nas snang skyon 'jug gnas mthar ldan// bya ba'i gzha dang thabs dag dang /
91a2(rnying rgyud): skyes nas mthar phyin ye shes lnga// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas// 'gro ba mos pa'i khyad par gyis// gzugs dang kha dog sngags dang 'od// dkyil 'khor lo sogs so sor gnas// gang zag blo dang 'tsham par bstan// rten dang
91a3(rnying rgyud): nang dra bcud kru gsung drugs// maltas sbyor bgasam las byung // cha dang rgyu dang thig le dag/ rim par bsnyen dang slong ba dang // 'dren dang spyad pa rlung gi ta// dAng sa mar ye shes rlung gis 'jug// ting dang 'og lam byung ba yi// 'di sa mtheg lo rim pa dag
91a4(rnying rgyud): ga sa gi khud pa sa/ 'du ba'i 'an / naci rlab pa ma pathar// gagi ga rnas pam sa dang / ga 'a na ni/ mi ma nan 'ang/ dul ma dang / nga na
91a5(rnying rgyud): phyir med dang rjes pa med// d+hangs dang 'ag ba'i rnas mthu mas// rang lus 'jig dang drug 'ardal zhing // dbang nga macad man par gyu// gang rjer ldanam ma na// rims lnga'i shing sgra bsnyen pa// ra da /
91a6(rnying rgyud): rigs lakhyen bcas pa'i// sems lnga yun ring thung bcas pas// bdag gzhan tsas rnams malus pa// sman chen zlas pa'i lags te// ma thams da za pan// bdag gzhan gnyis gang nyis med min// rang 'byung ba kyar sbyi nyid// rdo rje rtarnapa
91b1(rnying rgyud): ba// ye shes sgyu ma ldan gyis thub// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las gleng bslang ba bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// kun gyi shes bya yul bshad pa// chos rnams ma lus thams cad
91b2(rnying rgyud): kun// gcig dang tha dang kun bral ba'i// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// b+ho sbyar kun bral mnyam pa las// rtogs dang ma rtogs khyang par las// sna tshogs ches ni rnam par 'phrul// g+hazhi dang rtsa ba las 'das pa'i// rang bzhin dbyer med de bzhin nyid//
91b3(rnying rgyud): dngos med dngos po yul 'das la// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// ra ba sna tshogs rang snang ba// gnyis med thabs chen rdo rje nyid// a mdo gnyis med bang chen las// sna tshogs gnas dang longs spyad dang // rigs dang kha dag na tshad dang // bdi sdug dang
91b4(rnying rgyud): bag dag/ rang bzhin sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul// sgyu macu zla 'ja' tshon ltar// byang chub sems snying por gnas// las dang byin gyis gang snang ba// rang rang zhen pa'i tha rad gis// dbang po khyad par sna tshogs pa'i// rtog pa'i rnas pa sna tshogs mthor// rang bzhin
91b5(rnying rgyud): gzhi rtsa med pa'i dbyings// lhan cig skyes dang kun brtags pa'i// ma mthong lo gzhan nyes pa yis// 'khrul 'khor log pa'i stobs su srung // 'khor ba ma bsal dag pa yi// zhing dang sprad yul longs spyod dang // ting 'dzin dbang stobs rdzu 'phrul dang // mngon
91b6(rnying rgyud): shes ye shes dpag med pa'i// sna tshogs sku dang gsung thugs dang // yon tan phrin las rang snang ba// bdag gzhan spyan gyis grub pa'i don// sna tshogs yid bzhin nor bu ltar// ma bas gas lhun gyis grub pa'i sgra// sku tshogs kun 'a dbyer med pa'i// kun
91b7(rnying rgyud): yid bzhin mthun par snang // kun gyi rang 'gyung byang chub sems// bden pa dbyar med don du steng // gang byar nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar// gang la de ltar srung ba las// yang dag gcig tu gzung du med// ma bcos rang 'byung zhi ba nyid// rnam par das

92a2(rnying rgyud): yul 'das pa// dang mkha' nga ba dang // rdzogs la 'angangs dag dang // gang gas gang la khob bsar/ mkha' sogs rdul thas 'byung ba'i brjid/ 'ag med pa/ na thaM nga po dang // da
92a3(rnying rgyud): bar gang sdang yang // mdzang ba lag pa'i stobs kyis sbyar// bdag gzhan ma dpa'i rang snang yin// mgus thams ca da byer med pa'i// thangs dang shes rababatud gA'i rgyan// longs slong thabang sra banas pashar// 'gro babla da ma thang par gnas// da ya
92a4(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab gyi// sgra 'phral dra ba'i rang bzhin da// rang bzhin dbyer med byang chub sems// 'dab chen po nga bo nyid// 'das de dang ltar mthon kyi// bral bcig 'dzin mthang yas dang // ma rus kun gyis rtags zab// phyogs meng chub pa'i 'tshur gnas/
92a5(rnying rgyud): gang snang ma lus de bzhin nyid// ma btsas ma byas zhi ba ste// gcig dang du malas 'das pa// sangs rgyas kam gyi rang bzhin nyid// mtha' bral nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar// malus gnas pa de dag zer// rtogs pa'i khyad par dang po la// mthong tshul dag
