92a7(rnying rgyud): zhugs can// shes rab byeng pa gang ldan pa// dbang dang da cig sa nang ga dang / rgyu rgya 'dril ba bdus pa // 'a bags pa ba martag su rgyas chu ma chogs par 'byur
92b1(rnying rgyud): thob // / kyi nang bdag gzhan ma lus pa// thams cad dbyar med de bzhin nyid// thabs bral kun la rgyas btab pas// mun pa'i chags su gyur pa yin// mun d+hang drug dang gsar 'thar ci// zabs mkhas dang bzhin ngas bskur snang // gang da'i gaslong cib /
92b2(rnying rgyud): de ma thag tu de bzhin 'gyur// dbyer med nam mkha'i rang bzhin du// kha dog dbyibs dang rdzas la sogs// ma lus tha dad med pa ltar// thabs mkhas ma lus de bzhin 'gyur// tha mal pa dang log pa dang // dka' thub can dang rkyen rtogs dang // d+hi nang can dang tha dad
92b3(rnying rgyud): can// gtsang sde can dang phyogs rtogs nyid// mnyam nyid lta las gang 'das pa// ngo bo nyid dang thabs dag dang // dbang po la sogs log pa yis// de nyid gnad pa'i stobs su 'gyur// gang la gang gis zin pa'i nang // thabs dang brtson 'grus legs pa yis// de ltar
92b4(rnying rgyud): brtson pa'i khyad par gyis// de nyid ma spangs rnam par dag/ gang phyi rang nyid nges pa la// rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par gyis// tha dang chos su gang snang ba// dngos la de ltar gnas pa min// rdo rje skye med shes rab ste// me long thabs nyid sna tshogs snang // gnyis med 'brel
92b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i mnyam pa nyid// ma lus dbyer med dam par bshad// de nas rtogs skyob shad bya ba// gang la gang gi don med pas// lha dang sprod dang la mi 'bras dag/ 'di nyid don gnyar gzhan med pa'o// gang gis dag dadon du// tshig dang sngags rdzas dka' thub kyis/
92b6(rnying rgyud): gang bstan de yi byin brlabs kyis// bdag gzhan lan par glang 'dod pa'o// gang las gyur pa de zhig pas// lus sems 'byung ba'i bag la gnas// phyin cad phan gnong tshas mad pas// dka' brab 'bang tsal mi dgos so// gang phyi bya nga'i rgya bzhi dag
92b7(rnying rgyud): dang dag pas bde bya'i phyir// las dang dka' thub drag shul gyis// grol zhing thar bar 'dod par snang // 'den bzhi bcu drug tha dang lam// khams gsum mthong bsgom spang tshul gyis// rang don zag pa kun bral nas// rang don thar pa mya ngan 'das// rkye rtogs
93a1(rnying rgyud): bag chags sa dpa las// 'thang myod bcuganas rang brtags nas// ma ga la thub 'khor na 'bras dang // yod pa non padab ba tshogags// thadang mang pa'i dog pang sems// bdan rnam kya pa ra bags pa// gsan la 'i rtog
93a2(rnying rgyud): banyid// bdag ga zhan nus pa'i stobs sa sang // chos rnams su ma thAg yar dang // brag rgan 'drab sa// de tang mtha' da ngas bral ban// bad dganyis dbral bdagra ma'i rdul// rdon dam pa gsum pa dang // dngas bsgyur pas gral nas// dag pa na
93a3(rnying rgyud): 'thal la brten nas// ye shes snyam mngon sum shar// gang mir la maM dang bya ba dang // khrus dang gcad sba la brtan nas// sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthu skabs kyis// sgrogasumadzan 'dzin pa'i sa// de dag las mthun khyad par nyid// de kho na nyid bzhi rtogs
93a4(rnying rgyud): nas// las dang ting 'dzin 'brel goms pas// rdo rje 'chang ba'i sa la gnas// ting 'dzin rig pa gtsor byas nas// sngags dang phyag rgya bsam pa yis// cha lugs ji bzhin mngon sbyar te// goms pas bdag gzhan don grub pa'o// thabs dang grol ba'i khyad
93a5(rnying rgyud): par gyis// dbang po yul dang rnam shes dang // snang srid gyi nang sdod bcud kyi// spyod yul ji ltar 'gyur ba kun// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// gsang ba'i thabs kyis rgyas btab pas// ma lus rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// spang sri dpa' bo zabs zan de/
93a6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin dbyer med dag pa yi// sna tshogs 'phrul pa rang snang bas// ma lus gnyis mang ye shes yin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'o// thabs dang rig pa gang zin pa// gzhan gyis dor ba'i 'khor ba'i chos// ye shes bdud rtsi'i dbor 'gyur// mgus
93a7(rnying rgyud): gcig dang thabral ba'i// ji ltar mthun pa'i byung po la// sa sa dzin gyur mi gnas pas// babyung ba / dang ga'al yas dang // rdzogs par dam mkha'i ye shas dang // ma pa stan ci gazlas padra// snang ba can gyis sbyar bltar// ma lus pa yang bar 'gyu
93b1(rnying rgyud): de dag bltas pa'i khyad par gyis// rang re'i mos dang bsam pa dang // nus pa'i rim pa cir snang yang // nam mkha' dang ba'i rang bzhin las// nyi zla gza' skar sprin khu rlangs// rang 'thung rang drangs 'gyur med ltar// ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// dngos
93b2(rnying rgyud): dbang ngan las ma g.yos pas// de dag de ltar nyid snang bas// de nyid nam mkha'i khongs su 'du// de nas gtan tshigs bshad par bya// ma lus 'gro ba thams cad la// byang chub snying pos kun khyab pas// kun gyis mthong goms kyi dgos pas// so so thun mong
93b3(rnying rgyud): gtan tshigs dang // thun mong ma yin la sogs pa// rgya mtsho klong dang chu bo ltar// ma lus 'dul shing 'byung ba yin// thun mong bzhi sogs gang yin pa// log lha phyogs 'dzin dgag pa dang // dngos dbang thabs dang 'brel mtshon phyir// thun mong gtan tshigs brjod
93b4(rnying rgyud): pa yin// gang por gtan tshigs thams cad kyis// rang las 'phrul phyir ma lang nyid// ma lus gcig dang tha dad min// gang gi mtha' las yongs grol ta// dbus sa gzung ma gtan la phags// gci gang dadu mabral ba'o// rgya dang rkyen dang 'bras bu ste// thabs
93b5(rnying rgyud): de gad nas dag pa gsub// ma gras rang snang rtogs pa nyid// mtshan nyid nga ye mtshan nyid do// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa// ma lus rtogs pa bzhir shAr te// de nyid rtogs pa bzhir snang ngo // maspras dang lus gang
93b6(rnying rgyud): ba// chu dang rlabs bzhin gcig pas na// de dang der gcig dbyer med pas// dngos po lo gas nyid kyis shes// 'khor dang mngan 'das pa yi// rtsa ba chags sdang lnga nyid de// gzhi rtsa ma bcos skad cig ma// de nyid rang spyir gang sdang ba// rtogs pas sde dang rang
93b7(rnying rgyud): mtshan shes// snod bzung rgyud rnams mtha' bas dang // mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis kyis// dngos po snang grags chos rnams kun// ma bcos de bzhin nyid dru gnas// ma lus snying po thig le dang // lnga bdag brjid cu rtsa gnyis rgya// sau ya bcu
94a1(rnying rgyud): sa na sal// lag / pas ga tu / sa su sa / da sa su
94a2(rnying rgyud): pa nga // nungs chu ba dang / gas dang // ba da ngas / thas pa zhid pa dang pa gas ma gas/ 'byed da /
94a3(rnying rgyud): shes chen por gtags pa yin// gsum dngos bcad rdzogs bajog grangs// bzlas pa gang y-i nang snad de// sa so bzung gi/ khang dang pus// byang chub sems nyid gsal bar snang / tron dmu dzu ba dbyang dadapa'i// bden pa zhing byer med dpa tshe nyid/
94a4(rnying rgyud): mus khyab pa'i tshul gyis snang // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thig le gcig dang du ma nyid// dz+wal pa'i ye shes zin pa nyid// gcig dang du ma las grol ba'o// brgyad 'dres theg le gnyis ro nA// rlung dang gdams ngagacon ldan pas// 'bras bu lhan
94a5(rnying rgyud): ga skyes par snang // rang la gnas pa rngubs kyis gsal// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i ro// rtsa yig bcas pa bcud 'dus pas// thabs dang rlung gi gdams pa las// ma lus ldan skyes mngon sum gasngal// bde dang stong nyid mi byed pa// rang rag
94a6(rnying rgyud): bde rkyen ma skyes gzugs// ma lus 'od dang rnam pa ltar// dbyer med tshul dang rang snang ba'o// bde bas bskyed pa'i rtog pa lnga// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa nyid// ma lus ye shes chen po ta pA/ ye shes lnga yinas btab pa // dbang po spong bgrang #
94a7(rnying rgyud): bras pa 'khyil par 'byas pa'i bzung // sems su'i rgyud dri rang snang ba// parnam pa po ni ye hU~M drugs la// dug sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i// skunang gsang ba mthar thug pa'i// gtan tshogs mthang yas pa shad bde/
94b1(rnying rgyud): bshad pa'i rgyud// gang gis rtogs pa de nyid ni// ma lus rang snang sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rang snang ba// zag med rang 'byung dang las 'char// chos rnams 'bras bur ldan rdzogs pa'i// bdag dang gzhan don lhun rdzogs pa// ma bcos ji bzhin dang
94b2(rnying rgyud): bzhag las// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung // gang dag gang la gang brten pas// lhun gyis grub pas 'bras bu nyid// ma bcos sgyu ma ldan grub nyid// dus bzhi rdzogs bcu ma lus par// spun lung 'bras bur dang snang ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i lha 'phrul
94b3(rnying rgyud): dra ba gsang ba ze long gi rgyud chen po las lta ba ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u sna bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// g+ha 'bu li dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// smod pa'i khyad par ma lus pa// 'di dag bshad par bya ba ste// rang bzhin thabs dang blangan kya rapas/
94b4(rnying rgyud): da pa pangasu ny-i/ ma gad lta/ 'a gags dang sa nga/ dudu bdug pas/ la nga jugs pa te/ yang dag la 'ams / dpa nga
94b5(rnying rgyud): la lar phrag dog snang ba yin// la lar ser sna 'thab rtsod de// la lar 'chal dang bya ba btang // rtsol dang mi rtsol la sogs pa// de la sogs pa mtha' yas rnyed// chos dbyings mtha' yas mu med pa'i// nam mkha' dbyings ni mtha' yas par// spyod pa'i khyad par
94b6(rnying rgyud): de nyid do// rang 'byung thabs kyi spyod pa nyid// ji ltar bsam zhing brtags pa ltar// rang bzhin dbye ba med pa'i phyir// sgo gsum byed spod bsam mi khyab// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis// ma lus sangs rgyas gnas gyur kyang // ma rtogs thabs dang dral ba'i phyir//
94b7(rnying rgyud): bde sdug sna tshogs bsam mi khyab// thabs chen dag dang ldan pa la// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog chen po dag// byang chub la mdu bde bar bshad// thabs dang mi ldan skye bo yis// thabs dang bya ba sna tshogs kyis// mdzad sprod dka' ba sna tshogs pa// mi dang lha las thar pa med//
95a1(rnying rgyud): dper na dug dang ldan pa la// thabs kyi khyad par ji bzhin du// rtogs pa'i khyad par ji bzhan du// bad dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs rgyun// rang bzhin gnyis med dag pa las// brtags pa'i bye brag khyad par gyis// mi mthun pade sdug sna tshogs myong //
95a2(rnying rgyud): ma bcos dbyings las g.yos pa med// gang dag thun mong po dag las// las dang bya bsgo nas ni// spyad dang spyod dang spyod 'gyur phyir// 'di skad spyod pas spyod par gsungs// rang bzhin rgyal ba'i spyod pa yis// chu dang rlabs ltar khyab gyur kyang // spong len bya ba sna
95a3(rnying rgyud): tshogs las// spyod pa thabs kyis zin pa med// gang gyir thabs dang shes rab dang // sgra dang rtogs pa sna tshogs kyis// thun mong yul du ma gyur pa// thun mang ma yin thabs spyod de// la lar thun mong nyid du ste// thar pa dang ni ma thar pa// kun du Sh+ya dang mu stegs
95a4(rnying rgyud): dang // bud med dang ni ma rabs dang // sbrul po dpa' bo dkang rtsab can// byis pa la sogs tha dad de// la lar dgod dang drag po dang // ga sha dang 'jigs dang zhi ba dang // la la ra de bzhin chags chen po// g.yo sgyu snod dang g.yem par ston// zhe dang bu dang
95a5(rnying rgyud): phrag dog spyod// 'dod dang longs spyod gzir ba dang // glu bro gang dang 'jo sgeg dang // de bzhin 'jigs dang sdigs pa dang // ma rungs pa dang rnam par 'tshe// zhing khams rdzu 'phrul spyod pa dang // ngo mtshar cho 'phrul du ma dag/ gang dang gang gis mdzad pa
95a6(rnying rgyud): dag/ skye bo ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// mdzad pa mtha' yas rnam par ston// zhi la tshangs dang khrol khro// phar za na chung mdzes dang rol// gdung dang rmongs dang sdug bsngal ba// rang rang ded dpon mtha' yas pa'i// sku yi rol pa mtha' yas ston// byir
95a7(rnying rgyud): gyis brlabs dang rang snang dang // brda dang rig pa ting 'dzin dang // tshig tu chags sdang rmongs pa dang // shin tu rgyal dang phrag dog dang // 'jam dang dal dang snya na mi snyan// rtsub dang drag dang sbom phra dang // ring thung rol mo lha klu dang // mi dang me min
95b1(rnying rgyud): 'byung po'i sgra// khyim bdag dbang chen lags dpon dang // chags can gtum po la sogs pa'i// sna tshogs rol pa mtha' yas pa// ngag dang ma dag tshul gyis ni// gsung gi ros pa mtha' yas sngang // la lar byams dang sdang ba dang // g.yer dang migayeng rmong
95b2(rnying rgyud): dang ri// sbud dang mi sdud yal ba dang // grol dang ma grol rdo tul dang // ma rig ye shes la sogs pa// thugs kyi rol pa mtha' yas pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gyis sdang // mtha' yas dbyer med dam pa nyid// lung dang rigs pa man ngag gi// tshad ma dag
95b3(rnying rgyud): gis gang rdul ba// shes bya 'di du chud par 'gyur// de nas pas rnams ma smras pa// bdag gzhan gyi nga byung med pa'i// blangs me byen pa na la skyes rlung// mabar yis dbyer med dum pabyed// sprin dang zhes pazhin btan pa las// sa gsus rna mchog
95b4(rnying rgyud): snang rang rgyud dngos med de// sgyu ma mig yor brag ca dang // smig rgya chu bur la sogs pa// gong ma'i stobs dang 'di nyid stobs// mnyam par sbyor bas bsgom par bya// gang la ma bltas mngon byas dang // ting 'dzin rim pa gnyis med pas// kun la snying rje'i spyod pa dag
95b5(rnying rgyud): dam pa 'di ni sdud par bya// rang bzhin ched du dmigs pa dang // khyab dang shugs las gang byung ba'i// snying rje'i spyod par rnam par spyad// de nas sgyu ma lta bu nyid// rang nyid phyogs med snang ba yis// cir yang bsgyur du rung ba'i phyir// rig pa dbu mar gang gsal pa//
95b6(rnying rgyud): thabartsegs pa'i gdan du 'bar// si ba ni gang las thabs chags// 'bri 'dra bla nas pa ni gyur pa// rdo rdza gsum gyi bor du'o// de nyid gcig dang sdigasum smros// brtan 'bar mangs par gas la gyur // / mdun dang gnan du pas dag slong // gcig
96a1(rnying rgyud): ded med rim pa dang // 'khor lo zhes bya bzhi ru gyur// bang gis gang de ma brten par// 'phrong du bsgoms pa don medade// skyon bral gsal brtan 'dris pa yis// gang bsgoms gsal bar mngon du 'gyur// nga mal zhen tog zlog pa dang // lam gyi
96a2(rnying rgyud): 'brel bar bya ba dang // dngos grub 'bras pa myur 'jug pas// rtags kyi lha ni bsgom par bya// de ltar brtan 'gyur gsal ba la// bdag gzhan gyi nang ma lus pa'i// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs gsal bas// thun mong spyod pa rnam bcad la// sgo gsum mnyam
96a3(rnying rgyud): bzhag rjes thob med// gang gis de ltar gsal bya'i phyir// rdzogs gceg spyod pa brtsam par bya// de nas rtsa ba goms pa dang // bslab bya khyad par mthar phyin ltar// gang de rim par bstan 'phel phyir// yan lag sngos pa rnam par sgom// lhag pa bcu gcig
96a4(rnying rgyud): rnam tag pas byas pazlas pams// mabar pa ba ra// rabatha banas po gsa' bang ba/ dag zhug pa tu bu ba / 'dapa sas pa na pa
96a5(rnying rgyud): pa 'dul// b+ha dang zhal phyag dbu grangs kyang / rtsa ba yan lag tshwas tshul gyis// dkyil 'khar grangs dang gang sbyar ba'o// rim par spros shing bsgom par bya// grangs dang grangaso med tshul dag gis// dpag zad phud thags mkha' ba kyis // zhi dang waM
96a6(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa yi// sangs rgyas smin tshogs sna tshogs bsgom// deng po'i bar dang tha ma'i bar// dag pa'i ting 'dzin gsol brtan nas// sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa yi// chos bu rim par bsgom par bya// dgon pa'i rim pa 'am nags tshal dang // chu 'gram
96a7(rnying rgyud): ri rtse dur khrod dang // skyon bral yon tan rdzogs pa ste// dgra dang phyogs mtshams skyon med pa'i// brtag pa'i rim pa ldan pa yis// shis deng 'thad pa'i sa phyogs su// gzhal yas rim brtsegs mdzes ldan pa// sman dang bcas pa ldan byas pa// ta
96b1(rnying rgyud): dadzin mnyam pa'i shes rab thabs// mi ldan gong ma'i 'od kyis srud// bdag dang gzhan gyi nus pa yis// mnyam nas tshogs la 'jug par bya// yo byad lnga ldan thogs med par// cho ga'i rim pa ji bzhin brtsam// tho b+ha gar dang ting 'dzin bcas// bar
96b2(rnying rgyud): tshad med par bsgrub par bya// gal te 'dod pa ma rdzogs par// sgyu ma'i lus de ma brtanan// yid kyis rdo rje gsum gsal bas// rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin de// phyin cad 'jigs bral khyad bzhin no// de bas 'brel ba'i spyod ldan na// dbang sbyang zag med
96b3(rnying rgyud): sa thob sa// brgya dang stong sogs 'jig bral zhing // gling dang 'jig tan bar+b+ba stong du// 'dul ba'i cha 'phrul mtha' yas snang // 'jigs pa med cing mi rdzogs// dpa' bo rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gzhan dan spod pa'i khyad par dag/ 'dul ba'i dbar /
96b4(rnying rgyud): sa/ la sa/ gas rgyu pa / du da ga/
96b5(rnying rgyud): mngon bshad de// de dag rgyu dpa lam 'bras dang // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// bde ba chen po sbed par byed// gong dang 'og gi rang bzhin pas// spyi dang khyad par kha sbyor 'byung // sa bon khyab byed 'khor lo yis// thams cad khyab cing 'dzag pa'i rtsa//
96b6(rnying rgyud): snyigs rlung dang 'brel pa yis// gang de pho mo'i bcud rkyen gyis// zag dang zag med bang ba skyed// lus kun khyab par gnas pa nyid// dwangs mthur gyi rlung dang 'grogs// gang na sgra sbyor 'khor lo can// des kyang kun khyab rgyab can// 'khul zhing 'khor bas
97a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo ste// gsung gi 'khor lo ngag gi rten// rdzogs dang mardzogs gang migs pa// sgra sgor dag dang ma dag gyur// bdadang snyan dang mnyan dang // bya dang dri bzung ba dang // chags pa'i dra ni// tshogs kyang // mdog dmar lus khyad kA la sogs//
97a2(rnying rgyud): tha'i rlung dang 'grogs te gnas// d+harma tsakra srog gi rten// ma lus gzhi rtsa kun gyi srog/ rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad dang ldan// dngas ma lnga 'dus kuni TI ga tso// phyi ri marin chen la mad 'dra// mi shigs thig le bde chen po// rin chen phung po za ma tog// sna tshogs ye shes
97a3(rnying rgyud): bdag/ b+ha bum yi rang bzhin can// srog gi rlung dang 'bogs te gnas// phyi rimang d+ma 'dababargyad de// chos nyid ye shes yon ten dang // rang klung bzhi pa yan lag brgyad// thun mong gyi yi rim pa yin// 'di la rtsa gsum rim pa ste// zag pa'i rtsa dang mngon zhes rtsa// rdzas
97a4(rnying rgyud): nyid rim pa gsum du gnas// rlung yang gcig gam gnyis yin te// de las bye brag dpag med pa'o// gnas pa dang ni gru ba'i rlung // gnas pa srog dang ye shes te// rgyu ba bzhi ni mngon par brjod// rtsi nang can dang rkyen thur can// ra re'ang dngas stegs khyad par gyis
97a5(rnying rgyud): rim pa brgyang du mngon skadang yin// gtid dang 'gro ba 'is bon gyis// chags snang ngan rtog kun gyi gzhi// gang du gnas dang gnar ma na// b+hA zheng 'a ba rlung bris te// 'di du rtag bsngal ji snyed pa// slong zhing snyed pa 'byed pa yin// 'din gnas dang mi gangs kyis
97a6(rnying rgyud): dbang dran pa dbang sgyur bas// gnas dang 'pho ba pha rol dang / gnas pa srog gi rlung can no// gang du 'khrul ba 'dod pa na// ma lus 'a nga spo ba yi// rkyen gyur lajug cing 'bebs 'byung ba'i// sgo gnyis lus kun khyab pa'i rtsa// dug cu rtsa bzhi snang pa can
97a7(rnying rgyud): rim bzhi yi rgyan du 'khyir// dbus nas 'khyil pa theg pa'i \u0f7f// 'phen pa 'di ba'i rlung dang 'grogs// gar du dang 'khrung cing sprul pa'i phyir// sprul ba'i 'khor lo shes rab nyid// de 'og zu gsum 'bar ba'iH// rkyen du 'bar dang rdung du 'gro// 'od byas
97b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i sa bon can// rtse mo'i 'og mas reg pa'i khams// gtum mo lte 'og 'bar ba'i rtsa// skyes bu chags pa slong ba ltar// 'di dag bde ba bskyed pa ste// gnas sa tshad dang bcas par gnas// de 'og g.yo ba rlung gi rten// 'byed dang 'dzums pa'i las can nyid/
97b2(rnying rgyud): de dang de gnyis gang ldan pas// lus kyi dngas snyigs 'dis 'byed pa// bye brag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis rtsa// 'dus pas sku gsung thugs yin te// lte ba thur du 'dzag pa'i rtsa// rtsa gsum 'dom pa'i bde ba'i grwand// ku badrung ni thig le'i rten// 'gyed cing
97b3(rnying rgyud): 'dud pa g.yas g.yon te// bcu drug 'dus pa'i srog rtse gong // rtsa gsum mgrin par 'dus pa ni// skra sbyor 'khor lo dag gi gnang // de nas dwangs ma'i thig le la// ma lus 'dus pa'i tshul du gnas// rig pa'i rtsa la bcud 'dus pas// thogs med
97b4(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i mngon shes 'byung // phyi rol zag pa'i rtsa nyid la// bde ba chen po'i bcung 'dus pas// rang chen nyams nyid skye bar 'gyur// chos nyid thig le mi g.yo ba// dwangs ma 'dus pa'i bcud thim pas// ye shes lnga dang ldan pa yi// zag med pa
97b5(rnying rgyud): shes bdeb ze// nam ma'i dbyings ni mche ba// thog mtha' med par khyab par 'gyur// 'odi nyid rtogs dang matogs las// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa ste// spyod pa sna rdzogasu 'thung bar 'gyur// thabs kyi khyad par phyag kya la// bskyod pa rdung dang
97b6(rnying rgyud): ba me// thig le chu dang 'dzin pas// 'di tshan nam mkha'i rtag rgya gsal// 'debs bde ba'i don mthong bas// ca dang thig pa rlung dag dang // bad ba rang rig ma skyes pa// de nyid ze can mi rtag pa// rang byung bra labs zab pa med// rang rgyung med pa'i
97b7(rnying rgyud): banyid// dngas ma'i thag las kun byab bas// rkye na dbang por bcas pa las// nga da ba sbyar 'i rang ba'i na 'drar// mthus padang chen po nyid// nga la de 'is kyis btabapas// ba ba mi tog stan cig smras// phyag rgya gcig tu gsal bar gnas/ gang la
98a1(rnying rgyud): po rtsa bcud ldan// sa ban yi byed de ba dang // khams lngam shas ranan zhing // spyod dang ba dpa'i tshig 'i 'drag// rtag tu dran par ga su pa nyid// ro shAng de ltar gnas par phyir// 'khor lo rtsa bcud zag par bcas// pra dang ya shas grags
98a2(rnying rgyud): bab// dbrang dang bdod zed bya// 'dus c-ig shA gang// rgya pa sa she da/ kyi rjo // ma 'das kyi // dung brag mas dag la
98a3(rnying rgyud): ma lus bde chen mngon dugs pa// de nas bde ba chen po nyid// gar thabs rlung gis dbang bsta nas// ma lus bde ba'i rig pa 'char// gtsang dang 'dzem pabral gyur nas// bshung ba lnga dang 'dod pa lnga// jig rje bzung dang drangs mar bcas// thig pa chen po rang dras pas
98a4(rnying rgyud): na// mi 'gyur 'chi med tshe la gnas// rang rig bde chen po nyid// thog ma tha ma med pa gr-i nas// thig le rgya ba rlung dang bcas// zag med drangs ma'i snying por thim// mngon shes lnga ldan zag pa med// dngas ma'i snying por lam mthar byin// de nas gsang nga bshad bya ba/
98a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dag/ thabs dang shes rab kha sbyor ba'i// bden gnyis nyi zla'i khyad par las// ma lus thams cad gsal bar sba'i// gang du thabs dang bral ba yi// gnas dang 'di sdug btang snyoms dang // longs spyod tshe dang kha dog dang // bdag dang bdag
98a6(rnying rgyud): bIr zhen bcas pade// gzugs dang skra dang dri dang ro// reg dang dran pa sna tshogs kyis// zhen dang 'ching ba'i rang bzhin gyis// rang bzhin bzhi ni gsal bar 'gyur// de las tha mal 'khor bang lam// thog ma med nas lus gnas pa'i// ngade cher nam mkha'i ste
98a7(rnying rgyud): shid// lus gnyis sa brgyang pa smras pa// thangs dang shes ba gang byabyas/ thal gyunas pa ma she shes dang brel gdas/ ngapa da can gathun pa yis/ ngal rigs rdzu dang tham pa dang // das sangan rgyas ma
98b1(rnying rgyud): ma// rdol man tshang ma nyid dang // ma dang stug mo sring mo dang // mthar skrag lus 'tshang ma la sogs// dngos grub sna pa'i zhing du bshad// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug dang // barba ba kyang bcung ldan pa yin te// ti shu la sogs 'brang du bshad// rdzas
98b2(rnying rgyud): tshad yin te// gzhan la dngos grub med par gsungs// las dang bya ba ma lus pa// cho ga'i tshor ba rab tu brtsam// gnas pa 'byung ba'i bcud bzhi pa// 'byung bzhi gsal chen gang phrad pas// nyi zla 'dras pa'i gang thabs las// lhan cig skyes pa gsum gzag
98b3(rnying rgyud): las// nyams su ye shes lnga shar ba// ma lus bde ba chen por 'gyur// gnas bzhi rtsa bcud thig le las// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// phyag rgya bzhir ldan mnyam skor bas/ da sbyin rlung gis ngos bzung nas// dngos po lhan cig skyes pa dkra
98b4(rnying rgyud): bdag po gdung can sba rab yi// 'phro 'du btang dang bzung ba dang // bzlog pas nyi bla dbyed med myong // dang po 'jig pa la sogs nas// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang bdag par// lam lnga sems snga mapa zin pas// stobs kyi khyad par gsal bar 'gyur// rnab
98b5(rnying rgyud): ba gnyis med pa'o// 'og min nam mkha'i shar skra nas// nyi bla ngas gcig shar ba la// dus tshad gzu' yis gang bzung ba// ti na mtshan med pa'i ye shes nyid// 'phen pa rlung gi spor bas 'byung // rnal 'tshar rig par snang ba yi// khyab pa nam mkha'i 'jig rten na/
98b6(rnying rgyud): bde chen mdzes pa'i me tog la// bcud kyi khyad pa gang gnas pa// rdzang sA dang shes rab 'brel pa yi// shel dang byu ru'i bung bsdus nas// rnal 'gro dngabargyad kyis rgyas 'gyur nas// bcu gsums la lhun gyis grub// 'khyud pa'i gang thabs las byung ba'i/
98b7(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po mi rtog pa// skad cig cha las byung ba'i// zag mad ye shes snang po ste// ma lus dngas mang zla snang ba// zhen bral stong rtog mi gnas pa// dngos po lhan cig smras pa ste// me lus khyab par gnas pa yin// 'du shes zad pa'i rang bzhin
99a1(rnying rgyud): skye dang 'grib pa'i thig le nyid// bco lnga rdzogs pa'i tha ma nyid// sgor ba kun zang stong pa'i ngang // de nyid byin brlabs las gyur pa// phyogs dus snod bcu dang po nyid// thig le rngub bral zhan pa meng // sgyu ma gzugs brnyan drag casogs
99a2(rnying rgyud): ma lus bad chen rang bzhin du// thun mong dran rtag rang 'gags nas// bde chen lha ma mngon sum sdang // bde ba chen po'i sku gsung thugs// bcud lnga khu ba'i ye shes ro// thams cad rtse gcig dran pa nyid// dbyer med thabs dang shes rab ste// dran pa gcig
99a3(rnying rgyud): tu myong ba nyid// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis// sa ya bcu gsum grangs med pa'i// theg po bde ba nyid snang ba// rang ring ma 'dres thig le la// sku gsung thugs dang dran pa dang // ye shes lnga yi chus btab ste// ma lus thig po'i tshogs su snang // rang 'byung
99a4(rnying rgyud): bde chen rig pa'i lha// gcig dang grangs las 'das pa yang // nyi zla gnyis kyi gdan la bzhugs// khyab pa thig le'i gur nang nas// bzhugs nas bdag po rten bdag can// rtsa btud 'brel pa'i rgyun dang bcas// ka ba gsum dang pho brang bzhi// lde mig
99a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis la 'gyed pa bzhi// sgo bzhi gye bas gzhal yas khang // lha dang bcas pa mngon du 'gyur// dgon pa dur khrod ldan pa yi// gsad pa'i 'og min 'bar ba nyid// rim pa phyi nang par ldan par// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs nas// dus gsum thig ler ro gcig
99a6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// bde chen gnyis su med par bzhugs// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// tshom bu'i tshogs kyang de bzhin te// thun mong dam tshig ting 'dzin dang // byang chub shes rab steng rje lnga// gzhan du thabs dang shes rab dang // srung dang glu gar rgyan dang bcas/
99a7(rnying rgyud): mgrangs ral par langs spyod pas// ye shes te rgyun 'char ba// rlung sems ye shes bcas pa nyid// zlab med pas zag pa bral// nam mkha'i mthar thug par nyid dra// zag ming ba pe rgyun mi 'chad// nyid cad pa dkyil 'khor te// rang med mngon du gang
99b1(rnying rgyud): bar snang // de dag la ma la grags pa ya// phra na dra gas ba ma lus pa'i// sdod pa 'khyad par thams cad kun// 'dir nigs par bstan pa yin// thabs dang shas rab ldan gyur pas// sbyin du gsang ba la sogs pa// skabs la bab pa'i rnal 'byor ba// gang yang rung
99b2(rnying rgyud): bas spyod par bya// dang po rtogs nas mthar thug pa'i// gyi nang gsang ba'i lam spyod la// skad bya yul zhes gang 'dod de// thams cad blang dor med par stong // thabs kyi lha stong ting 'dzin gyis// pad+ma la ni 'das bzhin nam// mun snang gser 'gyur thabs bzhin
99b3(rnying rgyud): du// zabs la mkhas pas sdud par bya// skyes mchog thabs dang ldan pa yis// zhing dang spyod yul dag pa la// chags bral bde bar gang spyad pas// nam mkha' dbyings kyi longs spyod la// bde ba chen por longs spyod cing // lhun gyis grub pa'i bdag por 'gyur// gang
99b4(rnying rgyud): dag thabs dang mi ldan zhing // don med/ ma la ma 'brel bar// sgra dang tshig la brtan pa yis// gsang ba'i spyod pa gang brtsams pa// gang bsgrubs snang bar me 'gyur gyi// nus med g.yul du zhugs pa ltar// bdag gzhan gnyis ka brlag pa dang // mthong ba'i
99b5(rnying rgyud): chos la sdug bsngal zhing // ngan 'gro log pa'i gnas su 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' lta 'phrul dra ba gsang ba ma long gi kyang chen po la sna stong pa rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rang bzhin tang 'dzin gzugs brtan
99b6(rnying rgyud): dang // lhag gnyis ting 'dzin gzugs brtan dang // byang chub sems dang tshogs nyid kyi// dkyil 'khor don ni bshad par bya// gang phyir dbang yul rnam shes kun// gzhan sdang tha dad ma yin pa'i// ma lus rang rig byang chub sems// ma bcos rang bzhin 'od gsal
99b7(rnying rgyud): ba// ma lus kun gyi snying po ste// phyogs bcu 'das dang mabyon pa'i// rgyal ba rnams kyi rang bzhin yin// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// sna tshogs rang bzhin dbyer med pa// de nyid rang bzhin chos sku yin// de nyid 'jig rten
100a1(rnying rgyud): brtanagasaH// da ltar dang grags thams cad kun// ngas pa'i rang bzhin bzhi bcug s+ho// rang bzhin yang sa blang rdzogs myur bshad// rbad drug tu ma chags// / shang srungad nga gsung dang thugs// yan tad ldan las bsam rnas
100a2(rnying rgyud): mjug/ 'ang la smra bas ma maN+Da// rnyed 'grabyam mas // rdzas sa myed gang gA 'aM// rang 'byung rag me mo gi sa g+sa gas shegs cig ma 'de dag/ ba lta ba khang // me gnas rgyas skye ltang bzhin men/
100a3(rnying rgyud): de nyid rtsa ba'i rang bzhin lam// mjus rnyed brgyad ring bzhin can// rtag pa ma lus dkyil la bar te// longs spyong rdzogs pa'i rang bzhi nyid// decing thog sa gra dgas par// snang ba'i mdzad pa bsam ma thab// da mis da dul snang ba'i g+ha/ 5/
100a4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin nas bshad do// gang 'dir thung ba 'byung ba dang // rnam shes dbang po yu lang+yas dang / 'or mongs rtag zad med ces bcas// gang la mngon par mi snang yang // rang bzhin ma bathos dkyil 'khor te// kun la khyab par snang ba yin/ sted dru
100a5(rnying rgyud): pa lngar ldan pa// dngas ma'i phung po 'byung ba dang // dbang ba'i yul du bcas pa yi// rtsa bcud cig lang bcas pa nyid// sku gsung thugs su rang snang ba// ma lus kun la rdzas btab bo// brgyad 'das thag la tshon pa nyid// nyi zla 'dres pa'i rang bldan
100a6(rnying rgyud): nyid// bde ba'i thig le rang snang ba// ma lus 'dus pa'i tshul dag gis// thabs kyis mngon du gyur na yang // gnyis med thig la 'de ba'i ro// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin snang // de dag yang yum sku gsung thugs// rtsa ba da thig ler 'azlas pa nyid//
100a7(rnying rgyud): 'du 'bral med par ye gnas par// gang phyir tshul pa thams cad kyi// zag mad ye shes rang snang ba// dpag med yon tan mam tshanyid// ye shes 'og min lo brang ste// thig med yon tan rgyan ldan po'i/ ra 'bar ba'i pha phreng dbus// ri 'dzegs
100b1(rnying rgyud): nga byad na// na la shAr ma panas// gang ngams tha ga// yang bsta jugs// ga tu gas du sa sa/ nasasug sa na du byas chu na/
100b2(rnying rgyud): rgan po / na sa bathogs bcu da pa ny-i/ sa 'bye pa'i rgyal thosags/ dang byang ba 'arlabs ma shes kyang// nga rdzogs nyis kyis byung ba// rnamam kha 'amis da kyimanyam pa'o// ngagatan gas ya ba
100b3(rnying rgyud): da pe phran sumatshogs par gnas// gang de zag ma ma shes pa// Thab dang shal dang thabs ldan pas// zhal ma byu rigs pa dbang gyur bas// rdorje 'dzin pa chen por car// rgyal bad dag mthus pa'i// gsung badzag pa dang ba dang nying // da pa 'gras
100b4(rnying rgyud): ga pa// pa sa // rnams gsapa// rlu nga na mas/
100b5(rnying rgyud): ga / / pa bstan/ spyar lam+b+ha/ Any+dza/ thaM bags// thugs bcu gnan khams babs pa'o// rnam 'a da dang // sha dang ldan pa nga/
100b6(rnying rgyud): nga kA mtsho brgyas// de na gnas pa'i 'grub rnams// rang rang yengs spyod ba sdug bcas// phyi ning snad bcud bcas pa rnams// ma lus g.yi nang sgeg par byed// pra rba yang sngags par byed// de dag srungs nas mI gnas par// gsung ga nga bar byin byarnangs
100b7(rnying rgyud): de dag stong nyid la thib pas// ma lus stong pa nyid du 'gyur// a ni stong dang mi stong ga/ dbu ma da migs su'ang yod ma yin// ji snyed srung grags chos rnams kun// yi ga phreng ba nyid la gnas// gang phyir de yi rang bzhin yang // rang bzhin po 'phrul
101a1(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin dang // gsang babris par gang snang ba// rig pa'i khyad par snang ba yin// rtsa bad ni kun zhes dang // lha yi yi ge mngon spa bas// rang bzhin sku gsung thugs nyid de// khyab pa'i bral gyis ma lus snang // gang du thugs byin
101a2(rnying rgyud): brlabs dang // ting 'dzin rig pa'i cho 'phrul te// rang dang khyad par mngon snang yin// 'di dgra rang bzhin sna tshogs pa// gang du ji ltar gnas pa kun// yi ger ma gyur med pa de gnas// rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes rgya mtsho'i gsang ba'i thugs//
101a3(rnying rgyud): mthar thug med pa'i nam mkha' bzhin// zag med rgyas pas kun khyab can// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa// gcig dang du ma med tshul gyis// ye shes ma bsgribs gsal ba yis// nam mkha' dbyings lhar gsal mkhyen pa// dus gsum chos dang
101a4(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba dang // zhing khams rgyal ba dpag med dang // ri dang rgya mtsho rdul bcas pa// snga phyi ma bsgribs da lta nyid// me long lta bur mngon du snang // dpal ldan nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du// ye shes lnga yis kun khyad can// kun mkhyen stobs bcu mtha' thug
101a5(rnying rgyud): med// nam mkha'i dbang phyug bde chen po// mngon shes rgya mtsho pha rol byon// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// sad dang sangs pa'i bdag nyid can// thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ bde ba chen po sgyu ma nyid// rang 'byung thugs las gzhan pa min// 'di ni
101a6(rnying rgyud): kyal pa thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te// gdul bya gang gi ngo dag tu// sna tshogs mngon par 'phul ba yin// gang du khro gtum gdug ldan pa'i// srid gsum dregs pa'i bdag po dag/ thugs rje khros pas gdul ba'i phyir// khro bo'i de bzhin
101a7(rnying rgyud): gshegs par mdzad// skyon re rang lte bu nyid// zhabs dang phyag ni rdul snyed de// gang de gdul ba'i khyad par gyis// zhal gsum phrag drug zhabs bzhi deng // dbu dgu bcwa ba kyang phyag la sogs// nyi shu rtsa gcig dbul sogs// de bzhin g.yodul migazo ba'i//
101b1(rnying rgyud): na sung du dag/ na tu chag 'dzin pad// byad byas pa rag tu // tha'athu bsas pags pal/ nga 'bung thab sa rnam ga smras// gas par dad du blag dang / sa pazla pa ga/ 'a na dang /
101b2(rnying rgyud): ga shin rje gnod sbyin bcas// gdug pa'i ngarnal ng+gA 'bras can// rtswa 'bras cad nas bcad pa'i phyir// malus pa dag ma btang bar// dkyil khro ga tum zhum pa yis// ngi skad smras yang rang rang gi// nyin mongs rgyal tshom skams par// thugs rjen la man
101b3(rnying rgyud): la gyis// de dag mngon du brtul bar mdzad// la lar dpal chen khrag 'thung ste// la lar rdo rje khrag 'thung nyid// la lang rin chen khrag 'thung ste// la lar pad+ma de bzhin gshegs// la phar sna tshogs las su bcas// rang rang btsun mo tshogs dang kyil
101b4(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin// mdog dang cha lugs de bzhin te// de bzhin sras dang bka' nyan dang // pro nya yang sbrul la sogs pa// rdo rje balnga bu gnas// pho nya bye ba drug cu dag/ phyogs bcu kun du byas bkye ste// nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa
101b5(rnying rgyud): yaM// gdug pa'i tshigs ni de dag kun// dza lus dus gcig btul nas ni// phyir mo ldog pa'i sal bad// de dag gsung yang snardzogs te// sprul po 'byed pas gsung ga rtog // khacos gsus sas gang bar mdzad// \u0f88\u0f90bi shA kle N+Di rnaM mA~M parnam
101b6(rnying rgyud): phaT phaT phaT/ hA la ha lA ta lA d+h+r-i phaT/ phaT phaT phaT/ t+yAta trata tata/ kroT kroT kroT/ nya la hA la ha la/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ tin+na tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+ta bir+d+ha/ da had ha da ha/ gr-ih+Na br-iH gr-ir+b+ha/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa/ \u0f7ftihrIH/ gadz+ra gardza gaN+Di// d+he dz+hirmA/
101b7(rnying rgyud): phaT dz+wa la ri/ zhes pa'i sgra yis thams cad gang // ji srid nam mkha'i mtha' thug par// ri dang gling dang rgya mtshar bcas// 'khor yug stong gsum 'jig rten bcas// ma lus g.yo zhing spras bkang ste// gdug pa'i tshogs de 'khor bcas pa// gong
102a1(rnying rgyud): dbang du ma btang bar// gdug pa dus gcig btul bar mdzad// de tshe de yi 'khor g.yog kyang // zhum pas spras shing gsol btab nas// rang snying phul nas dam mnos te// dmod btsugs rang gi lam la bzhag/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'a
102a2(rnying rgyud): de dag kyang // la lar gti mug rmugs par mdzad// la lar chags la chags chen po// la lar g.yem la g.yem par ston// sdang la drag shul spyod pa ste// nga rgyal can la ri bos gnon// zhi las slong dang zhi ba nyid// gsal dang zhe la gnon pa dang // chag
102a3(rnying rgyud): khrod nga ni srung khro dang // rmongs khro byinan/ la sogs pas// brgal ba zhing gdul snyed du// rang gi babyen pa'i ye shes kyis// gangam pa'i thabs ni tshogs su// sgra 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// thugs kyi sgrub bldang bar 'dzad// gang bye slo groms
102a4(rnying rgyud): nyid// de nyid ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor te// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// ji snyed phyogs bcur gnas pa kun// rang rig rgyal por gnas pa nyid// 'di nyid pho mo ma ning dang // mtshan med la sogs gang yang min// dngos dang dngos med las 'das pa'i// de bzhin
102a5(rnying rgyud): nyid dbyings ye shes te// reg pa skye ba med pa'i ngang // 'di nyid gsal bar bsgom par bya// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba A t+ma ko&haM/ skyes dang ma skyes la sogs pa'i// tha snyad ming la mi gnas shing // blo yi sbyor ba las 'das pas// 'di ni de bzhin nyid ces
102a6(rnying rgyud): bshad// 'di la rim pa med pa ste// skyes bu mchog gi yul du gsungs// ma lus rang rig rdo rje nyid// khyad pa'i tshul gyis nam mkha' ste// rnam dag rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// dam pa'i ting 'dzin chen po nyid// gang gis ma lus mngon gsol nas// phyin
102a7(rnying rgyud): chos rnams thams cad kun// goms nas spos med de bzhin nyid// de dag ting 'dzin thun mong nyid// mi shigs thig le dngas ma'i bdag/ bzhi 'dus lnga bdag gnyis su med// rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid// thabs dang bcas pa'i ting
102b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gyis// ye shes lnga yang dang bcas// bad can skya ba med pa 'don// zag meng khyab pa mngon du yin// sa shes rnams pa'i gzugs rgan nyid// byi nang med pa'i nga 'byung ste// gas la dang bad pa'i rang bzhin can// thabs dang 'ag las dbang phyur nas// lus
102b2(rnying rgyud): can kun pa gsal bar skye// gnas bzhi 'byung ba'i dngas mnyed// rten can brten par bcas pa nyid// rang 'byung thig le bde ba nyid// phyogs cha med par gsal khyab pas// bde ba chen po'i lus su 'gyur// rang 'byung snying po dngas ma'i lus// 'byung ba zag med kyi
102b3(rnying rgyud): par byas// dig pa med pa // thams cad sa sus kya par dang // dang lda rtsa bdud kyidang na// gas mdangs sar smi byas te// dngasamal shes rnying par gsal// de nyid kya med pa yi// rang 'byung thog ma ldas pad// dang 'a mye
102b4(rnying rgyud): sa snang // gang gyi'i phyis dang sprul pa dang // gags pa'i gzungs la zung ba// dbang po gnyis rnaM ba bas blanas// da kyig ba ga man mam/ na sa pa gang thabs las// da mang ldan gyi/ skyes pa gasngal/ rdzo pa
102b5(rnying rgyud): nyid// brjod med dang snang bstan pa nyid// ma lus su gsung thugs banas pa// 'khyud pa'i gang gsum bslab pa yis// gnas dang 'byung ba ma lus pa// rang rig ye shes gzugs su spar// thabs dang shes rab byer med pa'i// byang chub sems kyi ga re hi/
102b6(rnying rgyud): rten dang brten par bcas pa nyid// rang nyid gsal bar byin brlabs nas// ji ltar snang srid chos thams cad// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor gsal// ma lus bde ba chen po'i rigs// dam pa'i sbyor ba snang bar 'gyur// 'di ni phyi nang gsang ba yi// ting 'dzin da
102b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor nyid du bshad// gang phyir mtshon ma'i rnal 'byor pas// dngos dang dngos med na mi spangs pa'i// rang rig phye med de bzhin nyid// ma bcos rang rig 'od gsal ba// de bzhin nyid de dang por bsgos// de nas snying rje nams pa'i ltar// gsal la spyod pa'i rnal
103a1(rnying rgyud): 'byor bsgom// yang na sgyu ma brag ca dang // chu zla'i tshul du bsgom par bya// de nas rang nyid yi ge nyid// gsal la brtan zhing goms pa yis// mdag pa ni spyad byas te// dag pa'i sakha' lnga bsam par bya// e yau baM su l-i/ sa chu me rlung nam mkha' das
103a2(rnying rgyud): rig pa rang snang tshul du bsgom// de dbus rin chen khang pa dag/ mdzes pa'i tshul dang ldan pa ste// rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo lte bar bcas// mu khyud zlum po thog mtha' med// gru chad glo 'bur bar khyams dang // sgo bzhi rta pabs them skas dang // lnga brtsegs pha gu dra khyed dang
103a3(rnying rgyud): 'dod yon ka ba zar tshags// mi sgrib gsal ba'i rgyan dang ldan// mi dmigs la sogs lnga dbus gdan// nyi zla pad+ma la sogs pa// lnga dang gsum dang bzhi gcig go// rim pa 'tsham pa'i gdan stangs su// sa bon cho ga las byung ba// gtso gzungs mthing ga
103a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// 'khril sbyor 'dzum pa'i byin brlabs te// dbang bskung cho ga lnga ldan pas// sbyor bskul sras bskyed so sor dgod// chos dbyings dkar po 'khor lo 'dzin// mnyam nyid rin zhen ser po lho// sor rtogaka pad+ma dmar po nus// phya bu ral gri ljang gu gyang
103a5(rnying rgyud): btsun mo rigs mthun dril 'dzin la khril// 'khor lo'i rtsibs mtshan shar lho nas// sa snying dkar po myu gu 'dzin// sgeg mo dung mdog me long 'khril// nam snying sngon po ral gri 'dzin// phreng 'dzin mA len ma mkha' mdog/ spyan ras l-i brgan pad+ma dkar// gI ti pa ma
103a6(rnying rgyud): dmar mo mdog/ rdor 'dzin ljang gu las kyi rigs// phyag gnyis brkyang nas gar mdzad ldang // gru chad bzhi la rim pa bzhin// byams pa dkar ser bu shing 'dzin// sgrib sel dmar ser glegs pa ma bsnams// kun bzang dmar ljang rin chen ste// 'jam dpal dkar lja
103a7(rnying rgyud): ut+pal bsnams// btsun mo rigs dang mthun pa ste// spos dang mar me me tog dri// 'khril zhing 'dzud pa tshul bzhin bzhugs// sgo bzhir rim pa ji bzhin du// stobs men gshin rje gshed po dang // rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bzhi// lcags kyu zhags pazugs
103b1(rnying rgyud): sprog brel// mthing nag sang nag dmar nag dang // ljang nag rdorje tho dbug dang // zod sbrul rdo rna rma gram dang // yum yangs so'i phyag mtshan bcas// sgo ba zhir ngan tshul laSh+NI pa snor bzhugs// khyams kyi mdun dang rgyab tu ni// dran bcung yab yum nam mkha' mdas/
103b2(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya mnges sna tshogs te// mnyam bzhag ye shes 'phro ba'i steng // rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan pa'o// thub drug dkar ser mthing ga dang // dmar na gser nag du dka ste// phyogs bzhi steng 'og shar nub tshul// pi wang go cha gseg par spos// pi ti me chung shes par bya// mi
103b3(rnying rgyud): bskyod byed po la sogs pa// rdo rje 'chang bas rnam par brgyan// gzhan dag rang rang gis yin te// ya mAn krita rtag pa'o// bub drug kun bzang brgyan pa nyid// sku gsung thugs 'bar byin brlabs ldan// rdo rje 'phro 'du snying por ldan// cho ga'i rim pa shes par
103b4(rnying rgyud): dngas su brgyad ldan ye shes nyid// ma baHsna bzhi tad yin te// ye shes rnam sa pa dang dang 'phrul// ngan la khyam pa'i sgyi rnga yis// zhwa byu pa pa'i byung po nyid// bamal rtog pa gang dag nas// 'di ba chen de'i byin gyis rjog// dang
103b5(rnying rgyud): dngas me'i snying po nyid// thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu yin te// d+ha ma tsakra chos kyi dbyings// mi shigs thig le kun gyi gnas// nus pa'i khyad par phra rags bzhi// thig le'i gzugs dang tshor ba dag/ 'du shes 'du byed rnam shes nyid// ye shes lnga yi rang
103b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin nyid// rgyal po lnga ru bshad pa yin// 'byung lnga dwangs mar bcas pa ni// dgyes pa bskyed phyir btsun mo ste// mig sogs bde ba'i rnam shes dang // de yi ngo bo yul bcas ni// gnas pa rtsa bcud thig ler bcas// nang gi sems dpa' yab
103b7(rnying rgyud): yum nyid// so so'i rtsa bcud gnas pa'i rten// dbang po dus bzhir bcas pa nyid// phyi yi sems dpar bshad pa ni// gnas dang dus kyis kyi bying ngo ro// gang de dang sams bskyed pa yis// lus kyi chos bzhi rtag chad bcas// sgo bzhi yab yum shes
104a1(rnying rgyud): bar // na nga ya nga gang // na bad na// napa sa ga ga byan pasas// ma pa'adun 'a nga ba/ 'dum pa dag pas nam nga bya// ma pa 'a' pa bas ma thag// cang das
104a2(rnying rgyud): pas// ye shes lnga yir ldan pa// gnas dang ngo ba lngas btsun pa// ye shes la yis rdzas btab bo// sa bon sgra ste yig gang // bde sngags sgra gsung dkyil 'khor ldan// 'phro 'du rtsa ba'i ga ler bcas// ma lus kun la 'di gnas pas// yan la
104a3(rnying rgyud): dra 'di shes bya// stong nyid rdo rje la sogs pa// sngon byas rang rgyud med pa yi// rigs brtags gzungs ma blang bar bya// rang rgyud ni gsum dag byas la// lha yi rnal 'byor lus suH// rdo rje snying po gi sar nyid// phrad pas dang gshe rab cu// drod me bgrod pa
104a4(rnying rgyud): de/ bde ba'i dang sa man mamakha' nyid// bruM byings b+ha ga ba de 'i'i gnas// rna chags dbu pa'i gzhal yas khang // nyi TI ba nus pa'i gdan// che ba'i yon tan rdzogs par sman// thebs dang shes rab 'bral ba'ir// mu lung 'thung sa dag pa sa//
104a5(rnying rgyud): de dang mnyam sbyang bas// ye shes phyu gas glenyis su med// thabs drang shes ni 'brel pa yi// dbang po stsal ngas nam shes bcas// rang rang pa byar gyes pa'i wa// spyan cig skyes pa'i ye shes nyid// zangs dang shes rab gnyis med cing // du ba'i drang la dang
104a6(rnying rgyud): thob nas// thabs lam bde ba'i gnyer dag gis// btags pa rang gi rtog pa zlog/ dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo la// bzlog byangs kyang mi dmigs so// bde ba'i thig le sa bon la// thabs bzhi rlung gi gar thabs kyis// dga' ba'i tshad ldan nus pa bcas/
104a7(rnying rgyud): dngos 'di lhad cig gyes par brtan// bde ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// 'de ba chen por ro gcig phyir// ma lus lhan cig skyes par gnas// bcud 'dus bde ba'i thig le ni// yon tan kun gyi ngo bo bas// che ba'i yon ta kun rdzogs
104b1(rnying rgyud): pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor gnas// de nas rgyal ba rdo rje 'thung // rdul ba kun gyi rgyal po yis// ma lus lhag pa'i lhar brlab phyir// gsung gi snying po brjod par mdzod// hU~M bi shwa bi shwa d+he/ b+h+rUM badz+ra d+h+r-ika/ oM d+hi Sha dzi ka/ smr-i dA d+h+r-i ka/ AHA ra phig

105b1(rnying rgyud): dbang myur gnyis med gang yin pas// yab yum 'brel pa'i ngo bor bshad// rtsa bcud thig mer bcas pa'i rten// so so'i nus par bcas pa nyid// gang la de dbang de yi phyir// 'di ni gyi yi rim par bshad// gang de khams lnga'i bde ba yis// mnyes dang thig
105b2(rnying rgyud): bkod pa dang // nam mkha'i ye shes gsal ba dang // de nyid khyab pa'i rang bzhin te// zag med bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mnyes par mdzad// dgug dang bcing dang mnyes dang gsal// thabs lam bcud du 'brel par gsungs// gang
105b3(rnying rgyud): de thabs chen gsal byas pas// lus kyi chos bzhi rtag chad spangs// bde ba'i thig le rang snang ba// ma lus 'joms las khro bo'o// bcud las 'das pa'i hUM gsum nyid// byed pa bral ba'i ngo bo nyid// yul gsum bral bas chos kyi dbyangs// ma lus rnam dag
105b4(rnying rgyud): kun du bzang // dwangs snyigs snying por 'brel pa yis// nyon mongs sa bon drug bcas pas// thig les btul nas bstan pa 'chad// srul pa'i sgra ru bshad pa yin// kun kyang ye shes lnga yi ro// khyab par gnas pas rgyas btab cing // sdang srid bde chen sku gsung
105b5(rnying rgyud): gas// dran pa rtag tu gsal bzung ba'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// gsang rtse sna tshogs 'dus pa'i dbus// phyi nang rim pa'i dbu rtse can// ngo bo byin brlabs 'phags pa ste// yon tan byin brlabs kun gyi gnas// gsang ba'i pad+ma'i rang bzhin du//
105b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gnyis med thig ler blta// nyi zla zil pa'i thig le nyid// phan dz+nyAn 'dres pa rlung gis phye// gsang ba'i khams lngas ye shes rol// snyigs ma'i phung po lnga dag nas// dngas ma lnga yi rang bzhin gsal// rgyal po de bzhin gshegs par gsal// gsang
105b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'byung ba lngar bstan pa// dbang yul phrad pa'i skabs las shes// rigs mchog yum gyi phyag kya lnga// snyigs ma bral ba'i dus na blta// thig le thugs kyi bde ba rnams// rang rang thig le bde bar gsal// ye shes rnam shes dngas ma rnams// bde ba chen

106b1(rnying rgyud): 'bar// dz+wal bu pad+ma ran pa cha// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rimya bu shud pa'o// gzhan gang banas su don shes// dang po thugs dang g.yon 'khrud pa'o// ran can ma grwar lagrwa 'bar// bad+ma kar ba rda dzan// AH la k+ka/ shang ba ta ste// gzugs padas rin can zla
106b2(rnying rgyud): ba dang // baM wang gar ltar sog ma dang // thAg byas sor rim shes \u0f7f// nr-i mgo rdo tha~Md ma gram// grags rgya zhags pa stoT hoH// 'od 'groman ma bzhig rdo rje thal// ye shes hU~M lnga tshas khams dril// thugs la brtan pa nying dri gsungs// thab chen
106b3(rnying rgyud): nges par phyag gnyis shes// gseg par go mtshon pi lgang brdab// sgom stob pa te chos 'chad tshul// me dpung bum par shes par bya// gzhan yang mthun pa skabs kyis brtag/ mi mthu na khyad par rgyas par bstan// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // rgya gram dril
106b4(rnying rgyud): bu brgyad shes bya// rdo rje lcags kyu mda' se gal// rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan so// pad+ma 'khor lo rol gri gyi// rgya gram khu rgyar go cha mche// gzhan yang skabs dang mthun pa ste// rang rang don nyid rtse gzig pa'i// thugs kyi rtags su shes par bya// dwangs ma'i

107a4(rnying rgyud): gakhrug pa dang // gti mug ro dang dmyal ri// zhe sdang mo nyid bsgom par bya// mdog kyang ring par shes bya ste// las dang rang bzhin shes bzhin brtag/ b+h+rUM las gyu na khrod gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo rtsabs bzhi yod phreng dang // bar khrims gnyi ni sgo dang bcas
107a5(rnying rgyud): bar bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// cho ga las byung rim pa yis// gnyis med gsal bas de brtan gyur// dbang bskur byin brlabs rim bzhin bya// skor ba'i thig le 'phros pa yis// gdug sum lus btul nas ni// rang rang rim pa gsapa kur nas/

108b5(rnying rgyud): gdul bya'i bsam pa'i khyad par gyis// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par// rdo rje khro bor snang gyur te// bskyed cing gdug pa 'dul ba yi// drag po lha yaM sngags dag dang // de la gzhal yas snang bar mdzad// b+h+yo bi shwa sh+tsaH/ spyan lnga pa rat+na pa
108b6(rnying rgyud): sa hA de pa s+thir baM/ sAr+ya tsan+da maN+Da la hUM/ de snying so so'i sgra nyid dag/ gsal ba'i rim pa dgod par bya// oM bud+d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sar+b+ba dratrAn+ta ka ha nad ha patsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra mahA shI he ru ka mASh+TA tsaN+Da sarba dutaN+Da ki ha na da ha pra tsit+ta hU~M d+hA phaT/ oM rAt+pa
108b7(rnying rgyud): ha ru ka ma hA tseN+Da sarba dut+tAr+b+ha ka ha na dan bi tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma ma hA thA ni ru ka ma hA tsata sarba d+ha d+had+haka ta na ha baHhU~M hU~M hU~M hriM/ oM kam+bi ma hA shrI na~M ka ma hAtsata sarba dr-id+hIn+ta ka ha na da ha pats+yai hUM hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma bAkra d+hA shwa ri sa ra du dz+nyAn d+ha ra/ a maH
109a1(rnying rgyud): ma ma na nga / oM ga tam ma nga pa ldan samams /
109a2(rnying rgyud): sa / 'a byab 'a ba
109b1(rnying rgyud): rab 'thor kun du 'thor// 'gul zhing ldeg pa de bzhin te// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gang ba yi// sgra bo che yang thogs par byed// phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus pa// thul zhing dmyal nas rdzus gyur te// de dag bangade bas bslang byas te// 'dab zin pa dkyus
109b2(rnying rgyud): gar// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug par// rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs kyis byed// rdo rje gsang ba rang bzhin las// thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgyur// gdod nas thig le'i rang bzhin nyid// ma bcos thig ler gnas pa nyid// ma lus thag le
109b3(rnying rgyud): rgyas btab pa// nam mkha'i gzugs can de bzhin nyid// ma lus bde ba'i thig pa nyid// khyab pa chen po'i rang bzhin te// mthang dbus bral ba bden rtse// snyi chen par brjod pa yin// kun gyi rgyun jig pa ste// ma lus sa por rtsa ba nyid// mi shigs pa nga
109b4(rnying rgyud): na // mags chags pa'i gzhapa las nga // rnam ga tshan da // sbrul bdun gyi ba zugs gnasas// na mongs gdug pa'i gdam tid// gangs bya ba nyid du brtan// rang ba ma dang gra ga pa// thalang thaMng rang
109b5(rnying rgyud): rang snying dwangs mar bcas pa nyid// dbang phyug lnga ru brjod pa nyid// rnam shes yul du bcas pa nyid// rten dang brten parwa bcas pa yi// bde ba phra men bcu drug nyid// phyi lta nang lha dkyil 'khor nyid// dgug dang 'dzin dang thig les bsdams// thig ge'i
109b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin gnyis su med// dbu ma'i thig le bcas pa'i lam// dbang phyug nam mkha'i dbang mo tshogs// dbab pa nye ba'i tshul bzung nas// thig le dbab pa'i thabs bzhi yis// phab pas rang rgyud dngos po bsreg/ dran 'byung rig pa'i 'phro 'bu tshogs// bde
109b7(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i don la 'jug/ gnyis med thim pas dkyil 'khor 'bar// sku gsung thugs su kun gsal bas// gnyis med thim pas mnyes par mdzad// rang bzhin bde ba'i dkyil 'khor kun// reg pa nyams myong dbyings la thim// dran rtogs 'byung ba ton
110a1(rnying rgyud): songs can// nag pa gsum du shes paraH// ma shes padab can btad// 'bar ba gsum du shes par bya// byang chub sems kyi ba ba pas// malus gang shid khyab par gyur// sa la gang dag pa gnyi// ga lagadus kyang 'gaH// raganan /
110a2(rnying rgyud): stang dra 'bar// gcig gnyis lus kun khyab par 'thor// lus dang rtsa rabacas 'gul ba dang // rdeg cing 'bar ba'i 'debs gang // bde bas dbang sgyur tshim pa'i sgra// ma lus khyab par rdzogs par byed// bla ga sung thugs kyi ga nyid// bdeb min pa rnams pa'i ngas//
110a3(rnying rgyud): 'byung bzhi rdo rje pad+ma nyid// reg pa 'dus pa'i bde ba nyid// ro dogs rgyu ba zang pa nyid// de bzhin nyid du blta bar bya// thig le 'dres pa'i bde ba yis// sa yang bcu gsum khyab pa'i yid// ma lus mkha' ltar dri med pa'i// rang 'byung phyogs med kun du snang // thabs
110a4(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab bde ba yis// 'byung bzhi rim pa'i dngas ma ste// sa bon bde ba'i rgyu zhes grags// b+ha gang dra'i snying po nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// bzhugs gnas 'ad ba chen po'i rten// sangasar+b+bas rin po che yi sdong// phung po lnga dang nyon mongs lnga/
110a5(rnying rgyud): ye shes lnga yis zil gyis mnan// ti zla pad+ma'i gdon la bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po ni// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid// thig le phrad pa'i dus nyid na// ye shes lnga yi dang ldan// gardul bya 'joms pa'i khro bo dz+ra// 'thung lnga dbang lhag rnam par bstan//
110a6(rnying rgyud): dang skya ba sa du / gas la ga sa / dweng zlag dang gas par bya/ ga ba da/
110a7(rnying rgyud): sprin drangs pas// rtog pa'i ba 'dibyel khar 'dug/ pa gnyis meng ba dmang pa ma byeg// sngagasung zugs sa // gnyis su meng par tham par mdzad// rnal 'byor dbang phyug tham phung// ba ba chen po nyes
110b1(rnying rgyud): ngal// 'dus pa dang rung ba na jus// gsag sa dang ga/ sogs na ga nga/ da du du da/ 'phyas 'a mnga' du // byas pa 'ag thas 'as// nga cigasus pas
110b2(rnying rgyud): bAr 'gyur// sa ya ban+d+ha gsum gnyis 'dus pa'i// thig 'dza dzang rang bzhin nyid// gnyis me dang rdul ba zhes b+ha// rang rig 'dibaca 'dor rnam// sangs rgyas rin can ya c-ig/ sno snying po za ma tong// sku gdung thugs kyi bzang las
110b3(rnying rgyud): phyog pa gnas par ma // sgragasung thugs kyi zad kyi/ rdzun pa'i gnas nying // dza rdza gang bcwa dang 'bral// gnyis 'dang dgang thog 'angaganas// gsang ba'i thag 'i ldan pas// 'dus 'das pa'i ba cad rted na// gsang pa man
110b4(rnying rgyud): gas pa sa pags / / y-i rna sa byu gang gas mnas
110b5(rnying rgyud): thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// bde 'chen po bar bar 'gyur// de nas don khraga'adu / 'ang ra thugs kyid dkyil 'khor nyid// gdul gA'i ngal dgongs mdzad na// rtags kyi dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad// rdo na mdza dral bu dang // rdza
110b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor yug bcas pa 'dogs// de bzhin khor yug bcas pa 'dags// de bzhin 'khor lo dgran dang // ban+d+ha rab tu 'khrul ba // ra bar du rten gyi zhugs dang // nAn dgrak+Sha rabartan pas// tshigs mchog pad+ma can pa dang // dril
110b7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pas/ bas na 'a greb sa pa dang / ga tu byung ma ba ba 'i/ bar marjerje dus chu byung zhib dus sa 'i mi phyag ba bya ma gan bya bas sa ting sa
111a1(rnying rgyud): rgyag na ni// rdzas dbug mda' ga cu rgyal mtshan dang // kyis spyang rdo rje brtag rgyal// byis rnying da da nga mar byis m+b+ha dang // mgo lus 'brel ba rdul du gnas// steng 'ag phyi nang du rdol ba dang // byas rdzag khog pa dang dang ste// kyu ga zhang khur d+ha rma
111a2(rnying rgyud): dang // rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// lpags bu zhags pa lpags zlog dang // dril bu 'khrol bas spong bar byed// smras dang bya ma bran pa 'a chags// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad ces mdzes// rang gnyen dang ga rgya dang // rjebartse zhes ni zas te gnas// kun pa da 'dzas
111a3(rnying rgyud): dang bya dang bcas// zhal 'dzum rtag cig 'khril tshul can// dngu sbya ral pa spang po bcings// shad pa yi gla lan cing // dmar la dral rje ma chags pa'i tshul// blam zhing zi la gang pa sa// nA 'brur snod spad bya nga 'ching // dmar la ldan zhing 'dra tshang rdzan
111a4(rnying rgyud): gus dang lhag pa'i ngang tshul 'azang // so so'i gdan la 'khod pa ni// sbyin ma stug nagazod tron 'chang // tshangs mi dmar ser pa zla bsdams// zen dkar sngang rje thA la// gtogs 'dod ldan mo 'khor lo 'char// gzhan du dmar mo mdung thang 'dzin// gtu byin
111a5(rnying rgyud): dkar mo ir+g+ha gardungs// rdo rje ser mtshan+dan 'thung // bdud rtsi dmar mo pad+ma bsnams// zla ba dkar mo pud+ha rI// btson ljang gnag dbyug to 'phyar// srin mo dmar mo dung khrug 'thung // za ba ldang nag pas 'dren// dga' ba dmar mog tar nga // rtabs
111a6(rnying rgyud): rkyen dpar mi ga sho la 'danam// dzAHsiram sum gcad// 'ad pa d+ma 'i mameda' gzhu 'gongs// zhing srung ba/ ma tham pa 'dzin// rang ste sngon ma bdun 'gyur// gsong byed dgar ma la thos// ma mo dang phyogs pa she 'dang // rag mnag sa
111a7(rnying rgyud): zhags can// rgan gyi dadamar mo zhing zung na// sna tshogs dkar mthod khrag 'thung // chu lha dmar sar skul zhags 'dzig// rdo rje na ga ra lcags kyu 'dzin// rdo rje sar maur phrag zhugs// rdo rje dmang po phyogs rdzo bathob// ngor spong banas
111b1(rnying rgyud): dbyung // saso brji nga tabs pan par// da nas gzhan yang bshad paH// rnam par smra ba'i smras pa'i khyer// sgra dang gsang dang thugs rked dang // yan tan ldan pas khra ba phying// pra bdu bcung ldan pa brags// thags dang sdug d+ha'i ting 'angan dang // !
111b2(rnying rgyud): mdog bzhugs tshul rim pa dag/ rigs rnams ji ltar 'gyur ba btag/ de ltar bsams dang bris pa dang // brjod dang mos pad+ma stong ba yis/ d+hu rA 'tsham par bsgom par bya// de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen pos// rngam pa'i zhal gdangs lhan zlog

112a1(rnying rgyud): mar gnas// 'khor la rnam gadza ster// dang srong 'bar bar bcas pa dang // gshin rje'i danang brdu zhing dbyug 'gyur// ral gri bden thal ste byugag shag/ bdun brgyang thugs par spyad // ga can rnamag gsum gyi dbyug/ rdo rje rdzogs
112a2(rnying rgyud): mgo dang // zong gshol gtan shing g.yas g.yon rdzogs// yang na zhal gsum phyung drug ste// oM ldan rnam par bsams nas ni// bgegs dang gdug pa rnam par 'jig/ pho brang 'khor dang rnam par bsgom// de nas gzhin yang bshad bya ba// rang lus rten
112a3(rnying rgyud): yid// dkyil 'khor nyid du gsal bar brtag/ lte snying ste sku gsung thugs// thig gi chen cha chung bcas// gnas bzhi rdzas ma 'byung ba ste// log pa dung khrod gzhal yas khang // ka ba gdung dang rta babs dang // bla br-i rdo rje rab dang // 'khor lo badz+ra byed
112a4(rnying rgyud): zla skar khung rdzing bu dang // bskyed shing g.yas g.yon 'khor lo brtsegs// rnyed pan nyi pad+mar bcas// rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gzhal yul khang // rang bzung tsita'i 'khor lon// thig le ye shes lnga pa~M ga nyid// ma lus thig le 'dus pa'i ros// choyul
112a5(rnying rgyud): dang gdug pa 'dul// so sor 'khor lo dgod pa yi// ting 'dzin rdzogs pa'i tshul du bsgom// 'byung bzhi dang sa ma yum nyid de// bde ba'i dngas ma nam mkha'i khams// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rang bzhin khams lnga'i rang bzhin bcad// sla ba nyim
112a6(rnying rgyud): pa yin/ shrI ra tsi ta'i thig le la// nang gi gdug pa 'joms pa dang // spyod yul bde bar sbyar ba dang // thig le so sor dkod par nus// phye bas rim pa'i 'khor lo ste// bsdus pas thig le chen po nyid// thig le ye shes lngar ldan pa// dngasam
112a7(rnying rgyud): nam shes thig lo nyams myong nyid// tha ma la 'joms pas khro mor snang // gnas kyi gi le mar bcas pa// phra len nyi du shes pa bya// gnas bzhi 'jug pa'i rwa nyid de// 'tshigs la rten bde ba'i bcud// 'phro zhing med pa nga phyug ma// da na
112b1(rnying rgyud): le la// 'joms pa'i rang bzhin gsal bar byed// nyams myong skye dang rnam pa med// spyod yul dag pas nang du bshad// zla ba nyi ma la brten te// sku gsung thugs kyi labargyad de// thig lug mo dang 'bar ba dang // ri dogs med dang rnam par dang // bde ba'i yams
112b2(rnying rgyud): bzhi ru 'gyur// 'khyung pa gar kyi phyag na bzhis// rdo rje snying po'i pad+ma 'brel// pastodang rlung dang mnyam skyo ngas// nyi mtha ba dus gcig 'char// de nyid kun du khyab bapa las// ma lus lhan cig skyes par 'gyur// bde ba chen po gnyis med pa// bgyur baphrab
112b3(rnying rgyud): zabs lang rgyas// thabs las byung ba'i gsang thig le// ma lus 'dus pa bcud kyi ro// rten la brten can nyams myong ba// lhag pa'i ye shes thabs las skyes// chos dbyings la sogs ye shes lnga// thugs nyid mtshon phyir mtshan ma ste// gang la rten dang 'bar nga
112b4(rnying rgyud): 'jug/ bde ba'i rlung dang nam mkha'i khams// de bzhin btsun mo dgyes skyed pa// mi gyed gnyis med lhan cig pa// gang thabs las byung ba yi// dngos gnyis yul dang dbang po'i tshogs// lhan cig skyes pa'i thig le nyid// ma lus bde bar rang sdang ba
112b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis med 'dus pa'i stobs las gyur// gnas yul phyag rgya'i thig lerare bstan// dgug dang 'khyud dang bsdam dang 'bebs// ye shes 'jug pa'i sgo yin te// skal tshigs brgyud pa thig le'i rgyun// dbang phyug mar ni shes par bya// baspu thig le 'brel
112b6(rnying rgyud): pa nyid// phra mi bsam mi khyab snang ba// grangs las 'das pa'i phyag rgya ste// bsam byas nam mkha'i zhing du sbyar// sku bzhi las byung gsang thig le// khams gsum bcud 'dus bde chen po// yungs kar lhung med brtan pa las// ma lus grub pa'i
112b7(rnying rgyud): rgyal kyis snang // thig le bde min thabs sbyor ba// thab dang gos pa da pas// dran pa'i 'bru 'gyung bas// nga nga byed pa'i rtags pa // nga shing pan na pa'i chog bya// klung dngo rig pa tshogs kyi// ba byed du //

113a4(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i thig le las// ma lus sku yi dkyil 'khor snang // ji snyed rab 'byam ma lus pa'i// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dang // zid dang mazhin gnyis ka'i sgra// nges pa dang ni ma nges pa'i// 'khrul dang ma 'khrul sna tshogs pa// brjod dang bas ma dang 'phrul pa dang /

113a6(rnying rgyud): mtha' klas par// bskal pa mtha' thug med pa'i bar// nam mkha'i char dang rba bur dang // sprin dang chu rlabs phung po ltar// ye shes pa der sdug bsngal dang // nges dang ma res dam pa dang // dmanadang chags pa gas bral dang // zin dang khren dang mazhen dang // rnam pan
113a7(rnying rgyud): med brtags pa'i chos// dran rtog rig pa gang yang rung // cha lus rig pa dang spong ba// sku ma dran pa'i rnam pa'am// ci lams pa'i nyams rgyor zhing // sna tshogs snang yasas gyud min// ga ya rgya kun bral ba'i// ma lus dkyil 'khor bshad pa rnams
113b1(rnying rgyud): rang rgyud med pas gzugs brtan te// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor ldan gyis grub// rang 'byung ye shes skye 'gag med// ma lus mi phyed rdo rje'i gzugs// rnam pa mthar thug med pa nyid// yon tan ldan grab rang snang bas/
113b2(rnying rgyud): de yi brnyan ma rang bzhin 'char// mtha' bral rang 'byung dkyil 'khor ni// cir yang snang la mi dmigs phyir// yang dag brtan par mi gnas pas// ma lus gzugs brtan dkyil 'khor shar// bde chen rang 'byung ldan grub nyid// yon tan rdzogs pa'i nor bu lar
113b3(rnying rgyud): dpag med chos su snang ba'i phyir// bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan te// skye bo dag dang ma dag pa'i// gdul bya mtho dman rim pa la// rig spyad slob bskyed pa'i phyir// dang po nas bzung mthar thug par// rang rang bsam pa de bzhin du// de dag ngo la de ltar

113b6(rnying rgyud): snang // ma lus 'khor lo'i snying po nyid// thig le 'bar ba bde ba'i gzugs// rtsa yi ge bye brag bcas pa ni// bcud 'dus thig le ros gang ba// ma lus rten can dkyil 'khor nyid// ma lus snod bcud kun du snang // thabs chen gser ba'i rim
113b7(rnying rgyud): pa nyid// khams bzhi las brten thig le nyid// g.yo dang 'dzag cing gnas dang thim// bye brag gsum las rgyud pa yis// gru dang sgyu ma'i 'khrul chu la// zhugs dang 'thungs pa'i spyod yul lam// me long dang po'i ri bo yi// rtser phyin ma lus bltas
114a1(rnying rgyud): paltar// bde chen gzugs brnyan nyi dudu ldang // rim pa bcwa ma thag la nyid// bad pa'i 'du byed gang bskul ba// gnas bzhi' thag sa 'bya brag gas pa// mun gzung ba bkyus pa ltar// 2nga gdung 'bar ba rags /
114a2(rnying rgyud): smin pa ltar// ma lus til gyi phung ltar// thig lo'i lces su gnas pa yin// nyams myong gsal ba dang bar ba'i tshe// 'drar dang rdul dang pa// ljang // 'phar dang sgra 'byin dpa' bo'i ga ro// rnam par rol pa'i tshogs pa snang // srid pa
114a3(rnying rgyud): nyid// rnga ma la nub cing brtan gyur na// thig le nam mkha'i stobs kyis snang // ni gcig nam mkha'i mthong stobs kyis// thig le stong par thimag na// ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs su nges// snying srid snod bzung ma lus kun// bad chen dag pa
114a4(rnying rgyud): brnyan du// rgya mtsho mdzings nas bltas pa ltar// ma lus de ltar snang ba yin// rig pas nyams su myong ba dang // spyod yul dag pas nang du bshad// rang 'byung bde ba chen po nyid// gsang ba'i gang zag/ gdul ba dang // gsang ba'i nyam myom
114a5(rnying rgyud): phyir// thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa yi// rdo ga'i bya ba kun ldan cing // dpung bsrung byin brlabs spang ba dang // bcu phrag gsum dang drug cu dang // drug cu rtsa bzhi rdzogs pa yis// chu skyes snying po rdo rje can// nyis me she pa 'od 'byung ba// ra
114a6(rnying rgyud): phyag rgyas bskyod// nor bu chu 'dzeg rang dbang med// ma lus rig pa'i TIg ler bslus// chu ba'i rlud ni chad pa na// rig pa stong pa'i thig ler thim// a ta la rten thig le'i rim// rgyu dang mi gu'i rang bzhin las// 'khor dang mya ngan 'ad pa dra /
114a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i thig le la rten pas// ma lus bde chen 'khor lo sgyur// lus kyi thig le dang por to// de nas rig pa'i thig le yin// de nas ye shes thig le nyid// tha ma chos nyid thig le thim// de nas dus gsum 'du 'bral med// bde chen nam
114b1(rnying rgyud): khams nyid de// zab cing rgyu ba med pa yi// rang rgyud zhen chags kun bral ba'i// bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan shar// ma rtogs khyab pa'i gzugs brnyan te// rtogs pas nyams myong gzugs brnyan nyid// mthar phyin ye shes gzugs brnyan 'di// dman dang
114b2(rnying rgyud): yan lag mtshang dang // dbang dang man ngag med pa dang // dka' thub can dang ma smin dang // skal med yal ba'i yul min pas// gsang ba'i gsang chen dam pa nyid// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// lhag pa gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor nyid// tha mal brod pa
114b3(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa'i phyir// cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor chen po rtogs 'od kyang // ji bzhin mngon du ma gyur la// lhag par 'di yis rtogs 'gyur bas// lhag pa zhes ni bstan pa yin// gang gis gang la gang mtshon pas// lhag par mtshon par nye la
114b4(rnying rgyud): dang // gang la brten te gang bsgrubs pa// lhag par myur du 'grub pa'i phyir// 'dis ni lhag pa nyid du brjod// gang las gang de thabs 'di yis// mngon par lhag pas lhag pa'o// rgyal ba kun gyi sgra gsung thugs// thabs de gang gis mngon ston cing // dngos
114b5(rnying rgyud): gzhi nyid ma yin pa'i phyir// gzugs brnyan nyid du bstan pa yin// gang la brten pa'i thabs nyid kyis// de nyid 'dra bar snang ba ltar// ma mthong mos pa'i gdul bya la// de dang 'dra ba'i thabs nyid de// dngos min 'dra phyir gzugs brnyan no// rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin
114b6(rnying rgyud): no// dpag med ye shes ldan rdzogs pa'i// ye shes rang 'byung lnga yi gzugs// zag med gdul bya'i ro la snang // de yi yon tan gzugs brtan gyis// zag bcas mos pa'i gang zag la// sku gsung thugs kyi rnam pa nyid// 'dra bar mtshon phyir gzugs brnyan no//

115b5(rnying rgyud): myo
115b6(rnying rgyud): ga na pa 'dul ba kyi dza // grong sa lagasas
116a1(rnying rgyud): srul dang thod pa'i phreng ba nyid// dra ba dra phyed rnam par sbas// phyi nang rgyu 'bras gdug pa dag/ gdul phyir rta babs bzhir bshad de// sor phreng thod pa'i phreng ba dang // dbang po nyi zla'i phreng bas sbas// khro mo sha lnga bdud rtsi dang // drang khrod 'dod
116a2(rnying rgyud): yon ldan pa'o// dur khrod sa gzhi khrag dang bcas// skyes bu gsal shing phyogs mtshams brgyad// rak+ta'i mtsho brgyad rba rlabs 'khyil// thod tshal brgyus pa dur khrod rlung // 'jigs pa'i sgra dang me 'od ldan// zhing 'phan phyogs mtshams brgyad dang bcas//
116a3(rnying rgyud): lha chen thod pa sgrub stengs na// tsit+ta'i tog las 'od zer 'phro// he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor nyid// ma lus bri zhing bsgom par bya// ma lus 'gro ba'i re skong bas// rin chen phreng dang rgyan du ldan// mi 'jigs stobs sogs kun ldan pas// stobs ldan theg par gnas pa
116a4(rnying rgyud): yin// spyod la skyon gyis ma gos pas// pad+ma 'bar bas mdzes par snang // thabs dang shes rab gces med pas// nyi zla mdzes pa'i gdacul bzhugs// bde chen don las mi 'da' bas// 'khril stor dgyes pa'i tshul du bzhugs// sku gsung yon tan phrin las
116a5(rnying rgyud): thugs// yongs rdzogs sku yi rgyun du gnas// lam dang byang chub yani lag rnams// rdzogs phyir phreng ba la sogs tshul// thugs rje 'khor ba mi gtong bas// d+ha srin klu phrag dazung ba bzhin// thugs rje bang chad mi mnga' bas// 'bral ba bar chad med pa gnas/
116a6(rnying rgyud): brtson 'grus 'khor ba spong ba'i phyir// ri dgas dag ni mnyam par gnas// zag med spyan gyis kun gzigs pas// dge sdig stan gyis gzigs par bstan// ma lus kyis gnon skyabs rdzogs phyir// bya khyung dag ni gnas par bstan// chos kyi 'jor
116a7(rnying rgyud): bskor byas shing // nyon mongs chad pa'i gdung sel bas// thugs rje gdugs kyi 'khor lo bstan// malus gcig tu 'dus pas na// tog stong 'od zer 'bar ba ste// gdul bya'i bsam pa'i don phyir bstan// lce rnams so so'i rnam pa ni// sa mdog sna tshogs
116b1(rnying rgyud): bzhugs tshul dang // gdan dang phyag mtshan rgyan du bcas// pho mo'i tshul dang bcas pa rnams// de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa dang // gdul bya gzigs pa'i tshul nyid kyis// gtso 'khor phyi nang lha tshul gyis// bzhugs thabs rim pa so sor brtan// rang ra
116b2(rnying rgyud): po gang yin pa// kha dog so sor phye nas ni// gsung gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir// rim pa bzhin du gsal bar bya// rang rang thugs mtshan gang yin pa// kha dog dbyibs dang bcas pa nyid// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir// rim pa ji bzhin danod
116b3(rnying rgyud): bar bya// gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor yang // dung chen ras chen la sogs pa// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo nyid// rim pa bzhin du gsal bar dgod// de bzhin nyid la dmigs med de// stong zhing mi dmigs rig pa nyid// gang la rtog dpyod mi gnang
116b4(rnying rgyud): pa// chos dbyings de bzhin nyid du bsgom// bden gnyis dbyer med mnyam pa nyid// yanas khyab kyang me rtogs pas// phyogs med snying rje nam mkha' ltar// rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom par bya// dang 'byung ye shes rnam pas ni// yig 'bru rnam pa gsal ba las/
116b5(rnying rgyud): zhen 'dzin skyongs nas yig 'bru yi// 'phro 'dus 'byung lnga rim gyis bskyed// bruM gyis gnyis med 'od sbyangs nas// gzhal yas khang ltar yin par bsgom// rnam pa'i gang yin de dag dang // rang rig sa bon gnyis med las// 'dris pas gang yin gtso bo nyid//
116b6(rnying rgyud): bskyed cing dbang bskur byin brlabs nas// 'khor yang me phyed 'dres par bsgom// yongs rdzogs sbyin cing rtas pa la// dzaHhUM baM hos gnyis med de// 'dod pa mthar thug bar du bsam// las kyi bya ba kun zin nas// thun mong mchod pa sna tshogs dang // kun bzang
116b7(rnying rgyud): mchod pa la sogs pa// lha mo brgyad dang bcu drug gis// mchod pa'i rim pa brtsam par bya// rin chen sna lnga rta glang dang // 'bru dang bang mdzod khang khyim dang // bu dang chung ma bran khol dang // gnas dang zhing dang na bza' dang // rgyan phreng bza' btung longs spyod
117a1(rnying rgyud): dang // rdzing dang chu mig 'bab chu dang // mtshe'u dang khron pa lum dang // ri dang de'u dang skyed mos tshal// khar yug dang lhun po dang // skye bo mang po bro glu dang // nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa yi// mchod pa sna tshogs rgyas par mchod// dpa' bo
117a2(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga// bcud dang rol mo snang ba dang // sna tshogs dri dang byug pa mchog/ drag cing legs par dbul bar bya// thar pa lnga sogs zhing gi mchog/ dngos dang lha spyod ting 'dzin gyis// bsgrub bya ma lhas kun bskal te// rdo rje zhing du bsred par bya// ma ma
117a3(rnying rgyud): pa mo// cho ga'i sbyor ba rang rtog bzhin// dngos dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// bde ba chen po rol mo yis// phyi nang nam mkha'i khams bkang ste// rin chen lha mo yo byad dang // reg pa nyams myong bde ba yis// rgyal sras zhing gi rdul snyed la// gnyis med dag pa'i
117a4(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis mchod// rol mo glu dbyangs bcas pa yis// dkyil 'khor rim pa bstod par bya// rdo rje gsum gyi bzlas pa yis// mtshan ma legs par snang ba na// slang dang byin brlabs dbang bskur dang // mchod dang brtan pa'i cho ga dag/ rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa
117a5(rnying rgyud): kye// dkyil 'khor de yi phyogs bzhi ru// rnam bzhi las kyi me za bral// dus bzhir rang rang rdzas dag gis// lnga bzhi tshul gyis mchod par bya// de nas gnang thob dbang phyug nyid// dkyil 'khor zhugs shing rus ldan nas// rjes 'khor ba bsla
117a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyir// skal ldan slob ma gzhug par bya// dpal lhan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che// mngon du mthong thugs bsod nams gang // 'dir zhugs pa nyid de bzhin no// gang nasu gsung thugs ldan pa// gang du mos pas
117a7(rnying rgyud): spro bskyed phyir// rgyal ba kun kyang 'phrul mdzad de// sgo gsum byin gyis rlob par mdzad// rnal 'byor cho ga rdzogs pas kyang // gdul bya zhi dang khro ba la// so so'i mtshan ma nyid bstan phyir// sku gsung thub kyi rnam pa dang // mes dang brdza sa dang
117b1(rnying rgyud): pa dag/ so so'i gnas su legs par dgram// ma lus sku gsung thugs dkyil 'khor// 'di las ma gtogs lha gzhan med// gang du dbang dang 'brel pa ni// bco lnga'i rim pas byin brlab phyir// bzhi dang brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor la// yab yum bas
117b2(rnying rgyud): brgyad gnas par bya// bcu gnyis bcu drug dkyil 'khor la// bzhi bcu gnyis dang ldan par bya// nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lnga la// rgyas pa'i cho ga rim par dgod// 'di dag lugs dang 'bur dang pazo// bri dang bsgom pa dag kyang rung // 'di ni gyi yi dkyil
117b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor ro// zab mo'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// sor bzhi mdzub gang la brten te// phyi rol rnam pa'i rjes 'brang min// mthong dang brtan dang goms pa ni// rim pa bzhin du gsal bas 'byung // brgyad pa lam ste ras pa yas//
117b4(rnying rgyud): mthar phyin nyams su myong bar 'gyur// dbang bsgyur thabs kyi rim pa yis// byin brlabs man ngag yid ches bya// 'di ni dbang gi dkyil 'khor te// de bzhin gnas skabs gzhan du yang // thun mong tshogs la sbyad pa'i phyir// 'byung lnga rgya dang bdag nyid dang // mkha'
117b5(rnying rgyud): dag byin brlabs so sor gdon// rang gi cho ga'i sbyor ba yis// ji ltar brtsams pa 'grub par 'gyur// bsod nams tshogs zhes bya bar bshad// gzhan yang stobs ldan rnal 'byor pas// gang 'dod mngon du bsgrub pa'i phyir// 'chi med tshe yi dkyil 'khor dang //
117b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma pra yi dkyil 'khor dang // dug 'joms bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor dang // cho 'phrul ro langs la sogs pa// gang bsgrub don gyir gang bshad pa// de nyid bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// las bzhi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// rigs dang mthun pa'i sa gzhi
117b7(rnying rgyud): thab khung so so'i mtshan ma can// phrin las dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad// slob dpon nus pa stobs ldan pas// rdo rje lus su brtan bya'i phyir// rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs pa// sku gsung thugs su mngon gsal ba// rnal 'byor skal ldan spyod yul
118a1(rnying rgyud): te// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mtshan ma rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyis// mthong bya don la sgrib pas na// de dag sbyang ba'i cho ga bshad// tha ma la zhen pas brtags pa'i don// lhag pa'i bden gnyis
118a2(rnying rgyud): rtogs bsgoms pas// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// sku gsung thugs kyi ngang du bsreg/ dkyil 'khor lha yi mtshan ma dag// rnam pa ji snyed gnas pa dang // rang rig rnam par 'phrul pa nyid// mtshan mthig le'i ngang du sbyangs// thig le rim pa'i sdang tshul te/
118a3(rnying rgyud): nadang med pa'i byang chub sems// dngos dang dngos med kun sbyangs te// rang rig byang chub sems kyi me// phyogs bcur 'bar zhing dbyings la sdud// rnal 'byor las rung goms pa yis// 'gran don rtsom pa'i don byed na// dang por nyes byas gsum sbyang phyir// rnam
118a4(rnying rgyud): gsum khrus kyi rim pa brtsam// gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// bar chad bgegs dang dpral byas la// bkug bcings bstims la rnal du gzhag/ bsrung dang byug padug rgyan gyis btsun// 'khor ba'i sa bon kun bkod do// las kyi tshe
118a5(rnying rgyud): thim pa dang // dkyil 'khor 'phro du rim pa yis// 'khor ba'i sa bon sbyang bar bya// de tshe sdong bu gnas bkod de// sdong bu ri la lha rnams kyi// snying po tshang bar gdags pa dang // gsol ga dpag nad byin sras su bskyed// 'jug dang dbang bskur las
118a6(rnying rgyud): nas// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te// las bzhi me yi las byas nas// rtog tshogs lha gsum dbyer med pa'i// rang dang gnas su dag pa la// sbyin sreg glu bro gar gyis mchod// las kyi bya ba kun zin nas// thig le chen po dpal brtse// de na
118a7(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang bshad bya ba// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te// ma lus byang chub sems nyid de// de rtogs bya phyir bshad par bya// chos rnams ma lus thams cad dang // dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad kun// tha dad dbye ba mi gnas te/ byang chub sem
118b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor nyid// rang 'byung mtho dman med pa yi// sku gsung thugs dang lus ngag yid// ma lus gzhi rtsa snying po ste// rang 'byung byang chub sems la 'dus// de nyid rang rig 'od gsal ba// dngos po ma yin dngos med min// gnyis ka ma yin gnyis med mid//
118b2(rnying rgyud): mtha' dbus cha shas kun bral ba'i// zab cing yangs la rgya che ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te// tog ge rnams kyi yul min pas// gsang ba'i gsang ba byang chub sems// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
118b3(rnying rgyud): med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid las skye ba med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsangapa// 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/ 'gag pa nyid na 'gag pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sa
118b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi gsang // gnas pa med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid la gnas pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs// dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med// em
118b5(rnying rgyud): ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong // 'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med// ma skyes rig pa'i byang chub sems// dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin du// rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid// g.yo dang mi g.yo ba
118b6(rnying rgyud): pa yi// phyi nang stod bcud ma lus la// rang 'gyur sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// radra bzhin gnas dang rtogs pa dang // bsams dang dmigs dang goms pa yi// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dang // lha dang lha min gsang ba dang // sha za 'byung po ma 'a
118b7(rnying rgyud): ci// phul bum yi dwags klu rnams dang // chu bo'i srogs chags ma lus dang // rtse shing gel pa 'bras bu dang // phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa// ma bcos don gyi lha nyid de// byang chub sems su khyad par med// lnga zhes gzhan du bstan pa yang // tshig
119a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ zla skud tsam du byung // byang chub sems la gnyid med par// rtogs pa'i don la gcig tu bstan// snyid rje chen po'i dang bzhin ga // gnas pa'i don dad ma phrad pas// mthus sA+e rje'i gnas gyur pa// b+hang rdzab chub sams canan/ ba
119a2(rnying rgyud): 'gal don du rab sbyor ba// kun rdzob byang chub sems su brjod// ji snyed rnam par bcas pa'i chos// ma lus mtha' yas bstan pa kun// byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul te// nam mkha'i cho 'phrul de bzhin du// sna tshogs snang bzhin dngos po med// de dag
119a3(rnying rgyud): ji ltar gnas kyang rung // byang chub sems las gzhan min yang // thu ni mong yul phyir phyi ru bshad// rang lus phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la// rang 'byung 'khor lo drug gnas pa// g.yo ba yaM gis spyod drud pa// 'gro ba kun gyi wam la gnas// 'phen
119a4(rnying rgyud): blud pa'i rang bzhin can// snyigs ma'i dus su'ang bde ba 'char// sbyin pa gru gsum spyad na gnas// rnamathar sku gsum rtswa mdud can// 'brar zhing thig le 'bebs dang gnas// rang lus bde chen sprin byed pa// de la glang rten bde ba'i gnas// sa
119a5(rnying rgyud): rgyas rin chen ga' tsa la// thung ngu a snying lte bar gnas// 'khrul zhing 'dzag dang gnas pa'i rtsa// rdo rje dbu ma'i las dang 'brel// khyAn rnying rgyas pa'i snying po can// sum cu gnyis gnyis rtsa yis lam// snying po'i gnas// rtsi n-i 'an
119a6(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyi dngos// dngas snyigs shes pa brgyad kyi rten// rna ba bzhi mis shes par bya// dngas ma 'dus pa'i thig le nyid// al brten pa'i d+h+r-i gis srung// ye shes lnga pi rang bzhin can// bde ba mngon nam chos nyid la// rim pas
119a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// bcu drug sgra sbyor thig le can// 'dab ma A li ldan pa yis// ma lus sgra skad bdag nyid can// khyab pa gsung gi bdag nyid can// snga tshan bcu dang ldan pa nyid// 'gyur 'jug gnas pa'i lam yin te// thabs dang shes rab bskal pa yis//
119b1(rnying rgyud): na / smra sa na/ na sa
119b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzus pa'i snying po napa// margyal gsong ba'i gnas yang med// sra gsung thugs kyig pas bzung // snod brjid chud rnams rang bzhin bdud// dngas snyig 'dres pa thabs kyis 'byed// ga lhang smon 'jug gnas mthar sten// sang rtseg nga pa
119b3(rnying rgyud): khams la 'dus pa'i de ma stobs// sems lnga bapas shes par 'byer// 'di nyi dag sum du bshad pa ste// sebs kyings pas blang ba nyid// sadang thig la bde ba yis// phyin gsang ba'i tshul du ba shad// de nas rgyal rigs rje ga dang /
119b4(rnying rgyud): gdol dgrar pa drem// med 'dzin maud dang pabab// rnas dang thugs papa pa dang // bka' gro de shing yid po'i byug/ sras ngan ga pa nga sang / radapar byed// gang d+ha dran pas mi 'tshags// ngan brgyang bdu drug banang zhi dang // bang ga ta
