119b5(rnying rgyud): byung bca teg/ byung nas/ smra pa'i byung bams// seM pa sa / da dus pa'i 'dusam sa// gas 'byung ban nga drangs pabyung // thangs dang na mad nga/
119b6(rnying rgyud): phrad pa'i// ma lus 'dus pa'i rje 'khor lo// 'byung 'jug gnas pa rlung dang 'grogs// ldang bas tha ma la shes pa 'gag/ g.yo bas nyams nyid rtse gcig pa// spen pas yid gtsug 'dres pa ste// 'jug pa dzaHd+hA tsaHste// shes pa bde
119b7(rnying rgyud): nga// gan sa sheng ga byed 'as ga phyi / du byas pa nga du bya/ la byang sa/ na rdzu nga ga zum rdzogs brgyal ba sa ba
120a1(rnying rgyud): gzi ldan phyag rgya ma// mthong bas lus sems bde ba dang // phrad pas sdug bsngal nyams par 'gyur// 'dris pas bde ba brtan po 'byung // thabs dang ldan pas spyad gyur na// bskal par sbyangs pas mi 'byongs pa'o// rnam tog zhan pa log sbyar nas/
120a2(rnying rgyud): da lta bde ba chen por smin// thob pa brtan 'dod rnal 'byor pas// mthong dang thos dang lhan cig gnas// 'khyud dang phrad dang sbed pa yis// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes skye// dbang dang mi ldan skal ngan dang // dman pas mi rtogs yul min pas// gsang bzhes
120a3(rnying rgyud): shad pa yid// denas gzhan yang bshad b+h+ya/ / mu nasuM dang zugs ldan 'o// chob bya ga sum pa ldan pas// sa rgya dkyil 'khor brnam par bya// mas pa 'ad 'a ras/
120a4(rnying rgyud): kun 'dus pa'i// tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya// gang du gdug pa 'dul ba yi// dkyil 'khor rim pa de bzhin te// rim pa bsgyur ba'i khro bo na// rim pa ma 'dres tsam du bsgom// rnal 'byor yo byad tshogs pa yis// dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin spyod
120a5(rnying rgyud): pa// ma lus tshogs pas tshogs zhes bya// dang por dang dang brtson 'grus dang // dam tshig lta sogs sngon song zhing // rim bzhin ting 'dzin mthar phyin pas// nus pa yod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// sbrul ldan dong mod mnyam pa'am// mi ldan 'gro 'dus
120a6(rnying rgyud): pas 'grub// rab tu dben zhing yid 'ong ba// ri rtse gsang 'dab chu gling ngam// dur khrod ri 'od nags 'dab ste// skye bo 'dus dang rnam bral zhing // bar chad bral ba'i sa phyogs der// rnal 'byor rgyal po lta bu'i phyir// rin chen yid 'ong mdzes
120b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor khar phyi nang par ldan pa// 'chag sar bcas par brtsam par bya// rnal 'byor lo mo grangs mnyam pa// lha sprod ting 'dzin dam tshig tshang // bro gar 'du 'phro yo byad dang // klu tshig bla yi yo byad dang // bza' dang btung ba'i yo byad dang // rgyan dang bgo
120b2(rnying rgyud): yo byad dang // A li kA li mnyam sbyar zhing // nyi zla brtsegs pa'i ra bor bzhugs// lha dang mi dang mo byad dang // gnas dang spyod pa kun tshogs pas// de dag tshigs su bshwad pa yin// thabs dang shes rab 'brel gyur nas// yab yum gsal ba'i ting 'dzin pa
120b3(rnying rgyud): mtha' thug med pa'i rgyal ba rnams// nam mkha'i char bzhin kun bkug la// yab yum gnyis med 'dres pa la// dbang bskur byin brlabs rgyan btags te// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang // bza' btung lha la lha rol zhing // 'od kyis ma lus tshim pa dang // 'dra
120b4(rnying rgyud): mang bde ba thob par bya// grol gar lnga stabs tshig lnga// blo gar rtse 'o'o brjod pa yis// rigs kyi 'od zer 'phro 'dur gsal// 'gro ba'i phyi nang mun bsal te// rig 'dzin sa nas sa ru spang // glu lnga chog lnga rigs lnga yis// phyogs phyogs bltas te brjod pa ni
120b5(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba kun gyis bde thob cing // chos kyi dung chen ma yang sgrogs// phyi nang rgyan gyi yo byad ni// rin chen ze'u srog rnaM cha dang // lag gdub rkang gdub mgul do dang // na bza' rgyan gyis gang brgyan pas// yid 'ong ting 'dzin gsal ba dang // 'gro bas blta ba'i 'os
120b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// rlung dang nus pa'i stobs ldan zhing // sgo gsum bag chags zad 'gyur te// byin brlabs rlung la dbang thob pas// A li kA l-i mnyam sbyar ba// bcu drug rdzogs pa'i dus sbyar bas// bdag po gdung can phrad pa'i tshe// tri zla dus gzig shar ba'i tshe// thun mo
120b7(rnying rgyud): ma yin pa'i// spyod yul nus pa kun bzlog nas// mthong lam rang gi mtshan nyid phyi// za ba'ami bla phyed dus mtshams sogs// bdi tshon nyams myong rgya ma 'chad// mthong po'i don la mnyam bzhag pas// brtan ni dngos pos gder du gyur//
121a1(rnying rgyud): chen ba rtse// bde chen zag med ting nge 'dzin// bskal pa bcwa phrag stong du yang // bdab can po nyan mi 'chad// sprul pa'i langs spyod mdzad pa yis// 'jig tan khams mang 'tha ba dag/ de rje 'gro ba'i dbyings su sbyar// rdo rje lus thob de kyis ca// b+han
121a2(rnying rgyud): med pa'i g.yung drung yin// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang sbyar rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun byed kyis// ye shes thig le de nyid la// ye shes thig la nyid snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ gang zag rim par 'dug
121a3(rnying rgyud): dang por dngos don mthong ba yis// tshe 'dris sa la bzod bya zhing // bsam byas ldan grub nyid rdzob phyir// lha spyod ti 'dzin rim 'brel bas// bar chad med pa'i lam la 'bang// gnas skabs rim pa ji snyed kyang // tha mal pa dang log spyod dang // mos pa la son
121a4(rnying rgyud): yul min te// nus dang grub pa thob pa yis// gsang ba lam dang 'brel bar bya// rnal 'byor chen po lnga la gnas// rim nas rim par brtan gyur te// gsal ldan mi g.yo thog pa la// nyam pa med pa'i stobs ldan pas// pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin te// spyod pa so
121a5(rnying rgyud): gnas pa yis// rtsa ba spos bcas rnal 'byor te// bslab pa dus kyi tshogasngal gnas// yan lag tshogs kyi spyod par gsungs// gang phyir dkyil 'khor nges bsnyen pa// dang rig mtha' dbus med pa dkyil// ye shes bzhi 'phros 'khor lo'i tshul// 'jig rten
121a6(rnying rgyud): 'das pa dkyil nyid de// 'jig rten sna tshogs 'khor du bshad// rig pa'i don nyid dkyil nyid de// cho 'phrul dang 'byung 'khor du gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil nyid de// rigs bzhi lha dang lha mo dang // khro bo khro mo 'khor du bshad// lha yi ting 'dzin
121a7(rnying rgyud): nyid de// spyod pa yo byad 'khor du bshad// gang la gang gis rgyas btab pa// goms dang rtas pa'i dbang gis na// ji ltar sdang grags chos thams cad// de dang de yi ngo bor 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dkyil 'khor ma lus
121b1(rnying rgyud): na / smra dang na/ sa na na ga pags// tug ga/ tham /
121b2(rnying rgyud): kun gyi ste gzugs te// 'khor tshogs ye shes bya mtshal// rang bzhin kyil lakhor chen cig tu// sre shes lha mol brten nas// ye shes chen po'i dbang bsgyur bas// gsang bdag rjerje na chen 'gyur// ye shes rgya makyang bang blag gi// 8 nas
121b3(rnying rgyud): bzung bcu ba'i bar// ting 'dzin 'brar ba'i dkyil 'khor // rig pa'i lha mo la brten nas// ting 'dzin nu pos dbang bskur bas// sa dang ye shes zhing khams dang // rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa'i rim par 'phel// mthong la mngon sra thob pas// de
121b4(rnying rgyud): sa/ dag sa byu// gas na na 'gyo pas/ la gyur pa// ga pag
121b5(rnying rgyud): kyi mdzes mal// dbang bskur byin pa rnabs brten byas nas// rgyog thabs kyi bang bskur zhing // badz+ra pe dbyeng gi ma ga gis// sgo ba nyams ldan rnal 'byor thob// ye shes na nga // thug rgya mche 'gro ba s+ho/
121b6(rnying rgyud): dbang dang rig pa'i dzod// rim par brgyad pa'i dbang thob cing // dgongs zab don lam khas pa dang // rkyen thabs bon ga brjid me// las dang byab ma mongs shing // ma spangs brtson 'grus pa nang med// ri dgas rtul ba mang ge ltar// gan ca gzhan
121b7(rnying rgyud): nyamang med// byin brlangs 'dus pa'i rnas pa can// sa gdang bden pa'i byin brlabs 'gru// da yis dbang bsgre chog brtsam// dang da du ma cho// nA pa dang // rje tshal sleb la brtson// brtson 'grus shes rab phun sum tshogs/
122a1(rnying rgyud): gi rdul skyed du// zos bsam bsgoms la rab gnas pa'i// 'gyur med brtan pa'i bsam pa yis// tha mal bsam pa spang byas te// tha ma la ni de bzhin gshegs// 'dul dbang thabs mkhas bsam par bya// bla ma sangs rgyas des rgya
122a2(rnying rgyud): ni// steng rjes nad pa bzhin bsam zhing // skyon dang mnar dang sgyu sems spang // rang rang nus pa ldan pa dang // bdag gzhan don nus brtson 'grus ldan// brtul zhugs gsum dang rab ldan zhing // dngos grub don du gnyer ba yi// gsar chen rigs su nges
122a3(rnying rgyud): pa dang // gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur na// dbang dang man ngag sbyin par bya// ri bo'i phyogs sogs 'byor pa mod// ljon shing me tog rgyas pa'i tshul// tsan+dan dri bsung ldan pa'i ri// bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i gnas// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi// ri bo dkon
122a4(rnying rgyud): pa yon tan gnas// ma lus 'dus pa'i dgon pa der// rnyed dang der ni gnas par bya// sa bcu mthar phyin gang zag la// zhing khams mtha' thug med gnas su// rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// ye shes lha mo la brten te// skad cig ye shes dbang bskur
122a5(rnying rgyud): bas// bcwa brgyad yon tan lhun grub pa// skad cig nyid la lhun rdzogs te// pad+ma spyan gyi sa la gnas// yi ge 'khor lo sa la smin// bdag gzhan 'byed pa med pa yi// bde chen phyogs ris med par dgongs// 'phel 'grib med pa'i rang bzhin pas//
122a6(rnying rgyud): gzhan don yid bzhin nor bu bzhin// sa thob goms brtan skyes bu la// ting 'dzin rigs pa'i pho brang du// rgyal tshab skyes bu mtha' bdag gis// rig pa'i lha mo na so med// rigs bral ting 'dzin stobs las grub// de la slob mas des brten nas// ji ltar tshul
122a7(rnying rgyud): ji bzhin du// ting 'dzin byin brlabs dbang bskur bas// rnam pa dang bral dbang rnams ni// nyams myong dbang du rang shar te// thob dang brtan dang goms pa yis// 'jig rten brgya dang stong phrag bcu// 'bum sogs bdag gzhan don rdzogs te// skad cig nyi
122b1(rnying rgyud): la rag lus pas// rgyal tshab chos kyi rgyal por bshad// lam zhugs rigs phyed rtags thob la// slob dpon mthar nye lam gnas pas// rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs par// rdo rje thig tshad sbyor brjod pa'i// phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gsal ldang ba// sna tshog
122b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsungs// sna tshogs rig pas dbang sgyur ba'i// sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor du// stobs ldan bu mo la brten te// thabs dang ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas// rdo rje tshel dbang thob cing // cho 'phrul mngon shes ldan par 'gyur//
122b3(rnying rgyud): po yon tan kun ldan pa'i// rigs su nges pa'i bu mchog ste// dad brtson brtul zhugs ldan pa yi// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i rigs can la// drod ldan gnang zhing dbang thob pa// rgyal po lta bu bla ma yis// lhag pa gzugs brnyan byin ldan du// dad mos brtson
122b4(rnying rgyud): 'grus 'jug pa'i sems// mi ldog dang brtan tshul gyis bzhugs// dbu tshan cod pan phreng ba dang // gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang // go cha phyag rgya rgyal mtshan dang // snying po lnga yis dbang bskur ba// rang bzhin ngo bos gnas tshul la// rdzas thabs ti
122b5(rnying rgyud): dzini dbang bskur bas// nus pa'i byin brlabs mngon shar nas// theg chen rdo rje rigs su 'gyur// de nas skal ldan slob ma de// tha ma la 'du shes kun bzlog ste// rang rang lhar byas gsal ba la// nus pa'i tshad dang nyams sbyar nas// nyan pa'i dbang dang bsgom pa
122b6(rnying rgyud): dang // 'chang dang phrin las byed pa dang // rdo rje rgyal po slob dpon dbang // rang bzhin ngo bos gnas pa la// ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang // thabs dang ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas// mi nus nus pa thob pa'i tshang // mi nus pa la bskur ba min// tshad ldan rnams la
122b7(rnying rgyud): rim pas bskur// rig ma las kyi phyag rgya mo// bcu drug bcwa brgyad ldan pa yi// dri zhim yon tan ldan pa la// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rgyal ba kun gyi bcud 'dus pa'i// rdo rje pad+ma'i rtsa 'khor lo// ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pa// thabs dang
123a1(rnying rgyud): na du// nan tu smras so// gas sa na su // su / sa las kus ldan pa gangs sa/ na
123a2(rnying rgyud): sa sa
123a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sa / la di la ga /
123a4(rnying rgyud): na pa // hU~M na // // 'a zhen pas pa// sa
123a5(rnying rgyud): ga
123a6(rnying rgyud): na su smra tu su sa
123b1(rnying rgyud): man// shes pa nam mkha' dang la gtad// dbang po shes rab che chung gas// lan gsum brtan par gyur pa'am// mthob bar du sbyin par bya// rdo rje zla 'od mdzes ldan ma// dpan dang rags ngan rnam par spang// rdorje dbang pos maphog cing // gzhan dad
123b2(rnying rgyud): smod ma byas pa// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bco lnga'ang rung // thabs dang zas dang spyod lamagyes// bsnyen pa'i cho ga gzhung bzhin bya// rdo rje lho dang srin lag dang // srin lag bcos ma la sogs pa// thabs dang byu ga pa'i yan lag gas// gsang ba'i pho brang rgyas par /
123b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba zil gnon rtsa rnyed nas// bdag po gdung can rnam par sbyar// thig le myur bul rtags byung nas// rgya ba rlung gi tshad du zung // nyi zla dus gcig shar ba la// 'khor ba zil gnon thabs chen po// myong bas chu rgyun ting 'dzin thob// gal te rtsa dang bral ba na// 5
123b4(rnying rgyud): dang ldan na 'phro bar 'gyur// dngas rlung mnyam pas zin par 'gyur// bzlog pa 'dren pa'i hU~M gis shes// sdud pa'i hUM gis bsdams gnas pa// thig les lus la khyab par byed// dang por sa bon 'jog pa ste// gnyis pas nus pa bskyed pa yin// gsum pas
123b5(rnying rgyud): nyams myeng bskyed pa yin// bzhi pas de nyid brtan par byed// lnga pas brtan pas nyams blangs pas// mchog gi dngos grub tshe 'dis 'grub// rdo rje slob dpon gnang thob pa// nus ldan rab gnas cho ga brtsam// de nas slob ma tshul bzhin gzhug/ sgo gsum nyes pa
123b6(rnying rgyud): na bral ba'i// sdom pa'i dam chog phog byas la// dbang bskur rim pa phyin par bya// dbang gi nyams myong brtan pa'i phyir// gdams ngag rjes mthun sbyin par bya// gdams dgra nyams brtan lam rim ste// lam mthar phyin pa 'bras bu nyid// drid mthar
123b7(rnying rgyud): phyin deng sa brkyad dang // grags chen sangs rgyas sa dag la// rang rig rtags dang thugs rje yis// 'dren stobs mkha' 'gro gsum du sdang // mkha' dang sgra dang gzugs can gyi// pad+ma can zhes grags pa yi// sbyor dang glu dbyangs snang ba dang // gzugs
124a1(rnying rgyud): tsam brtan pas grol bar 'gyur// dbang bskur rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// mu bac+doMs rdo rje dbyings dkyil 'khor// khro ba'i dkyil 'khor yan lag ste// bsgrub dang gdug pa gdul g+hir yin// dung la rtsa ba'i dbang thob nas// phyi ma'i dkyi
124a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor dbang thob bya// gdul bu mos pa'i dbang brgyan la// thun mong tsam du nges pa med// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur yin// bzhi pa dang rdo lnga pa nyid// he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor ro// dus gsum rgyal bas byin pa rnams par/
124a3(rnying rgyud): mnor lam ston slobang pon la// nyes dang bkur bur ni byed cing // dang nga rjes shing 'dreg pa la// dbyung bcu gnang bas byin par // gsang ba bshad dang nyan pa dang // bzhi pa dang krab pra la sogs pa pa// 'argal ba bye ba dpag mi du// 'bras bu thob par mi gyur
124a4(rnying rgyud): gyi// dmyal ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur// de ni dam pa kun brnyas pas// nad dang sdug bsngal mang po dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon gyis 'tshe// de nas nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// byin brlabs ldan pa'i bla ma yis// dad brtson brtul zhugs rab ldan pa
124a5(rnying rgyud): rigs nges skyes bu mchog nyid la// thabs kyis dbang bskur byin brlabs na// rgyal ba dang ni mkha' 'gro dang // rig 'dzin grub pa pho mo yis// tshe 'dir bsam pa kun skongs shing // byin pa rlabs dbang dang dngos grub gyi// phun sum tshogs pa'i 'ad
124a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// gang gis gang la dbang bskung bas// tha ma pa zhen pa dag pa dang // bde chen lam la mngon zhugs pas// dngos grub gang la thogs med de// las rnams gang brtsams 'grub pa dang // 'dod pa'i don la rol pa yis// sa bcu rim pa mthar
124a7(rnying rgyud): nas// pad+ma spyan gyis thob ste// yi ge 'khor lo sa la gnas// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// nyi shu rtsa lnga lhun grub pa// dbang gi 'bras bu rang las shar// thabs chen 'di dang gang bral na// bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du// brtson pas 'bras
124b1(rnying rgyud): la byed pa// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu stongs par 'gyur// gang phyir slob dpon slob ma dang // dkyil 'khor rim pa ji bzhin du// las dang ting 'dzin byin brlabs kyis// 'jug pa'i cho ga gsum du bshad// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// srub
124b2(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi gsang chen po// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lam chen po// ma lus cho ga rgya chen po// dpal ldan rdo rje me long gi// 'jug pa'i rim pa ji bzhin du// gas pa ba kun la shes par bya// rdo rje bla ma de nyid kyis// cha byad dgus ldan mdzes pa yis// me tog ldan pas
124b3(rnying rgyud): lo nyid// mngon byas sku gsung bskul ba yis// dam tshig dran te dgongs par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du// gsal dang rig pa'i stobs kyis ni// rdo rje slob ma byin brlab phyir// slob dpon dag kyang 'jug par bya// de nas slob ma 'jug bya ste// khrus byas
124b4(rnying rgyud): zhi ma gos bzang gyon// dad dang gus ldan rin chen bcas// gus bcas snyan pa'i tshig gis ni// lus dbul dag pa'i sems kyis gnas// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sbyor ba yis// bar chad sbyor bas la bsrung ba bya// cho ga gang yin lhar bskyed la// mtshan mjogs par nam
124b5(rnying rgyud): na bya// rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig lnga// 'bru gsum sku gsung thugs ldan sbyin// snying gar rdo rje brtan byas la// dam tshig legs par dbog par bya// tsan+dan dkar dmar byin brlabs chu// lan gsum blud la snod dor ro// de nas rang gis dam bsgrags te// gsang
124b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i don la nges par bya// rang rang 'brel pa'i lha nyid la// rin chen dor te brtag par bya// sngags dang phyag rgyas de bkug la// bsti ma la dbyer med gnas pa la// rtag tu phyin brlabs gnas pa'i phyir// legs par brtan pa'i cho ga bya// mi shes rab rib bsal
124b7(rnying rgyud): byas la// 'khor lo mngon pa'i nga rgyal bya// de nas lha dang dkyil 'khor gyi// dag pa rim gyis bstan par bya// de nas bla ma sangs rgyas la// ma lus ci yod dbul bar bya// byin brlabs cho ga dag pa yi// dkyil 'khor mchod dang bsgoms pa dang // grags pa'i yon/
125a1(rnying rgyud): tan bsam mi khyab// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur// des na rigs su nges pa yis// dang por 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan// rba ba yan lag kun zlab nas// rim pa bzhin du dbang bkur ra// de nas bla ma'i bka' mnas lnga// 'dor ba'i dngos srab bslab par //
125a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dbang bskur ba ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshar bya ba// rdo rje dmachog bla na med// sdom pa brtan po dam bcas pa// 'di dag legs par bshad par bya// dus gsum
125a3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'das dang ma byon dus gsum du// rgyal khrims tha tshig bkas bcad ltar// rim pas dmod por bkas bcad pa'i// byin brlabs rang bzhin 'ad 'daka' ba// kun gyis bsrung bya yin par bshad// gang phyir dam pas byinang rlabs pa'i// dam
125a4(rnying rgyud): tshig chen po 'di nyid la// 'das dang da ltar mabyon pa'i// rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa dang // rig 'dzin rnams dang mkha' 'gro dang // lha rnams dang ni mi rnams dang // klu dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs// mu 'phrul ldan pa'i lha chen kyang // dam pa 'das pas 'ag pa
125a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// dam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di// rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa la// sgra bzhin spyod pa'i gang zag rnams// log par spyad pas tshig par 'gyur// dam pa rnams kyis bka su bcad cing // byin brlabasad mod por rang bzhin srung // dam pa 'di las gang 'da'
125a6(rnying rgyud): ba// rdo rje can yang tshig par 'gyur// dam pa rnams kyi dgongs pa la// dbang dang byin parlabs thob pa yis// dam pa'i tshul bzhin des skud na// mi mthun phyogs rnams 'tshig par 'gyur// de phyir dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis// de ma tshig ces ni rnam
125a7(rnying rgyud): bsgrags// bla na med pa'i dam tshig ni// ma lus rang rig byang chub sems// mtha' dbus 'gro 'ong las grol ba// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid de// gang gis don rtogs gnas gyur pa// don dam byang chub sems su brjod// ma skyes byang chub sems
125b1(rnying rgyud): skye ba'i rang bzhin nyid sdang ba// rang lus rgyal+ya ba'i phyag rgya ste// ma lus dang snang nga po gcig/ dang ltar sgo/ gsum gas la rtogs pa// kun rdzob byang chub sems su bshad// gsang ba bshad dang dbang bskur dang // mAn dag lung dang nyams chags da /
125b2(rnying rgyud): dang thun mong la sogs pa// dngos grub steng zhing grol byed pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas mnyam pa'i phyir// skad cig gdung ba nyams mi bya// rang gi lha dang gnyis myed nas// phyag rgya bzhir gsal rnal 'byor pas// rang gi sgo gsum ma nyams par// chub rtsa
125b3(rnying rgyud): par rjed med// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang bya ni// thrig chen gsang ba nyid yin pas// snod med dman sogs ldog pa la// gsang bcu la sogs brjod mi bya// dang po gsang bar sreg gcig pas// byang chub snying por mi 'bral bas// rang srong
125b4(rnying rgyud): rang gis gcod kyang sla// brtse gdung dam tshig bral mi bya// lam dang bslab pa'i rtsa ba dang // dngos grub kun gyi rtsa pa dang // 'di dag nyams na kun nyams pas// rtsa ba zhes su bstan pa yin// yan lag thun mong dam tshig dang // thun mong min
125b5(rnying rgyud): bshad par bya// dang por gsang ba'i lung thob nas// nus pa mngon du snang bar du// bdag dang gzhan phyir thun mong gi// 'gal dang sgro skur kun 'das shing // kun dang bsam pa dga' byed pa// thun mong dam las mi 'gal ba// thun mong dam tshig yi
125b6(rnying rgyud): bshad// thun mong ma yin gang zag gis// thabs chen thun mong ma yin pa// nyon mongs lnga drang smyon pa lha// bdud rtsi lnga dang shes pa lnga// grub pa lnga yi chos rnams nyid// skyes bu rigs phyed spyod yul te// thun mong rnal 'byor yul min pa
125b7(rnying rgyud): bran ming ma yin zhes su bshad// dang po nas bzung rtags thob par// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yi// lus sems maM yongs kyi gcig pas// rnam pa dang bcas dang du blang // sa rbab gamos dang mthar phyin par// ting 'dzin don la gnas pa'i tshe// 'ag
126a1(rnying rgyud): sgo gsum mi 'byung bas// ting 'dzin rgyan gyi dam tshig la// rnam pa'i dam tshig ma lus 'dus// don las langs tshe snying rje dang // rtsa ba yan lag shugs ldan yin// sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa na// 'da' ba med pa'i dam tshig ste// rgya mtsho
126a2(rnying rgyud): rlan bzhin thob spangs med// bsrung med ye shes dam tshig ste// dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che// bsnyen pa rtags dang ldan par du// spyi yi dam tshig bsrung bya zhing // bsgrub pa gang yin 'grub pa na// khyad par rang rang rtog pa yi// dam tshig med par 'grub mi 'gyur//
126a3(rnying rgyud): gang zag gang la dga' ba la// dam tshig dka' thub sgo nas ni// gsang ba'i don la dgod bya'i phyir// dam tshig rnam pa mtha' yas bstan// dang po las can rnal 'byor la// rtsa ba thun mong dam tshig bstan// brtan nas nyams ldan gang zag la// thun mong yin
126a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dam tshig bstan// rtogs pa'i 'jigs med gang zag la// 'da' nyams med pa'i dam tshig bstan// sa thob goms mthar phyin pa la// ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig bstan// dngos grub rtogs pa kun dang 'brel// dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas kun
126a5(rnying rgyud): gyis byin brlabs pa'i// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa 'di// thob nas dam par gang bsrungs pa// yon tan chung yang 'grub par bshad// mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa// dngos grub rtog pa ma lus pa// cho ga gang dang ting 'dzin gang // bsgrub pa gang dang gang
126a6(rnying rgyud): yang rung // ma nyams tshul du rab brtson pas// myur du 'grub pa nyid du 'gyur// gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na// rdo rje 'chang nyid brlag par 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan nyid// dam tshig rdo rje las byung bas// dam pa 'di la gang brten pas// yid bzhin no
126a7(rnying rgyud): lta bur gyur// dus gsum rgyal po thams cad kyi// sku gsung zhugs dang yan lag gi// bsrung bye dka' thub dam pa 'di// kun gyis 'da' ba ma yin zhing // gnas pa dam pa nyid yin te// las dang skal pa dman pa dang // rigs dman le lo che ba dang
126b1(rnying rgyud): pa gling bgags// thur pa gang zhag du byung da// dasu thab ga sul tu babyugs nas// das pa rnams ladas byung pa// stanas na sa thas nas pas// rdzu rgyal na// bdu ca pa nag pa da dang // sang
126b2(rnying rgyud): 'gram dung reg 'dzin dang // kha'ab ga tum 'khrug rnam pa'i tshogs// de ma thag tu srog bcad nas// dmyal ba'i gnas su bye bar 'gyur// gal te 'jig par gyur na ni// 'jig tan gzhan du skye 'byung zhing // ji sri namamakha' 'dzag pa'am//
126b3(rnying rgyud): 'dapa'i rgya// thad te gzhan du dum yang men// dam pa'i rnam spong ba dang // rdo rje batshangs 'khru da // byang chubasamapa nyid med dashing // sngags dang phyag rgyalal ba dang // snod minags ba bshad pa dang // gsang ba'i don la spang ba ni// 'dir yang sdug
126b4(rnying rgyud): brdal myong 'gyur zhing // skad cig 'gags pas de ma thag/ ba ma'i lus dang thal gyur pa'i// rdo dmyal bar zla bar 'gyur// gang du rtsi ba yan lag bcas// bsrung dang dbrog par bru ba'i tshaste// thun meng dbang dang 'brel bcas pa'i// thun mo sgra
126b5(rnying rgyud): yul gyur pa// de ni thun mang bsrung bya ste// 'din gyi yi dmatshig go// thabs dang shes rab skur ba'i sems// thig le'i sems pa'i lam gyi rim// rig pa mu lus gsal ba'i tshe// thig le gnyis med nyams su byung // bde ba'i thig le'i bathang bsgyur sa/
126b6(rnying rgyud): sa drug dang snang thig le'i grogs// ma lus thig les byin brlabs pas// thams cad byede chen phyag rgya gsal// thig le rig pa khar dbyung min// 'khor lo kha sbyor bde ba yis// tha ma la bde bar dbang por bsgyur// rgyal ba'i dgongs spod thabs kyis
126b7(rnying rgyud): stong // za ma la zhen pa rnam par bzlog/ thabs ldan don la gsang ba'i don// rang snying 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lnga// 'char dang nub pa'i rim pa yis// thabs chen gsang po'i thig le ltar// shes nas srang du med par gnas// rang 'byung gnas pa'i bcud lnga
127a1(rnying rgyud): ni// rang lus rten gyi don ltung ba// khyab par rgyu ba'i tshul dag gis// dngas snyigs gnyis kyi tshul du gnas// rang lus rtog pa drangs snyigs dang // kha dog yan lag ting lag gis// bde ba'i ye shes lngar shes dang // bde rgyan ma nyid du
127a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs// khams lnga brgyad las skyes pa yi// ma lus thig lo'i rang bzhin te// ye shes lnga yo ldan pas// rgyal ba lnga ru yang dag gsungs// thabs dang shes rab rdo rje dril// hrI zla'i ram pa'i 'od gsal ba// dems lngas mkha' la gsal @#
127a3(rnying rgyud): tsan+da rten dang gnyis med pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes snang // ma zin rdo rje lce yis blang // gnyis kyi rtog pa ma lus pa// bde chen ro gcig byin gyis brlabs// skad cig bral med bde ba'i sems// dus gsum mi 'bral brtan par gnas// rlung
127a4(rnying rgyud): le'i bzlas pa yis// thams cad bde chen phyag rgyar gsal// bde chen thabs dang nyams kyis te// brjod dang tshig gis phebs pa min// gnyis sbyor phrad pa'i bde ba yis// tha ma la zad dang bde chen spyor// gang gis sbyin par mi nus pa// da ltar nus pa
127a5(rnying rgyud): rang gis myong // gzhan gyi brdzun pa'i don 'di ni// thabs kyis bden par mngon du bstan// tha mal zhen pa spang ba'i phyir// kha na ma tho brag tsha bral// skyes dang nus dang gnas pa'i tshe// rang bzhin lnga ni shugs kyis grub// rang gi rtsa bcud so so las//
127a6(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi bral ba med par gnas// 'byung lnga dbang po gzugs sogs bcas// thabs ldan sbyor ba'i byin brlabs kyis// bde chen lhan cig skyes par shes// nyi zla rlung gis zin pa yi// mtshan ma bral ba ngo bo las// zhen pa med pa'i thabs chen po
127a7(rnying rgyud): lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin las// ye shes lnga yi ros gang bas// ma lus rgyal ba lnga ru grub// 'di ni phyi nang gsang ba yi// rang bzhin dam tshig chen po yin// dam tshig rnam pa mtha' yas pa// shin tu bsdus pa rnam pa gnyis
127b1(rnying rgyud): 'bring du rtsa ba lnga nyid dang // yan lag bcu ru shes par bya// shin tu rgyas pa'i dam tshig ni// spyir ni sum brgya drug cu ste// rang bzhin 'od gsal ba nyid dang // nyid kyi dkyil 'khor sbyang ba dang // dus bzhi rgyal mchog nyid dang ni// bsrub med mnyam par
127b2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa nyid// lhan grub bde gnas dam tshig dang // rnam dag byang chub gzung 'dzin bral// rtogs nas don 'dzin dam tshig dang // sems la gnas bcas dam tshig dang // ye nas ma btsas dam tshig dang // 'dus byas rnam dag dam tshig dang // chos rnams dbye
127b3(rnying rgyud): 'ad pa / rlung // thams cad 'dags med dmatshig dang // gdung drung 'ab lda mtshig dang // thams cad bad du med pa te// 'di dag lta ba'i das rdzog yin// thams cad sbyong ba'i dam chog+sa dang // su rdzus bskal ba'i dam jig dang // mthun
127b4(rnying rgyud): len pa'i dam tshig dang // brdzun du smra ba'i dam tshig dang // thams cad spyod pa'i dam tshig dang // dam rdzas spyod pa'i dam tshig ste// 'di dag spyod pa'i dam tshig yin// bskyab pa'i dam tshig rnam gsum ni// rdo rje skye gnas dam tshig dang // 'dren byed gnas
127b5(rnying rgyud): stobs dam tshig dang // lam la ston byed dam tshig dang // rab tu rtogs byed dam tshig dang // sbyar byed byang chub dam tshig dang // thams cad dbang sgyur dam tshig dang // rig 'dzin gnas stobs dam tshig ste// bsgrub bya rtogs pa'i dam tshig yin// yum gyur
127b6(rnying rgyud): dbyings phyug dam tshig dang // thabs nyid shes rab sbyor dam tshig/ shes rab thabs su sbyong de bzhin// glang po brjid gnon dam tshig dang // thams cad mi chud dam tshig dang // thams cad bsrung ba'i dam tshig dang // ting 'dzin phyag rgya'i dam tshig s+ho/
127b7(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa thabs kyi dam tshig yin// tshogs kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig dang // tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang // tshogs kyi phrin las dam tshig dang // phra min tshim byed dam tshig ste// bsgrub pa'i phrin las dam tshig yin// yang dag don ston dam tshig da
128a1(rnying rgyud): gsung mchog mtha' yas dam tshig dang // thams cad skad mjal dam tshig dang // yi ge med mjal 'am tshig dang // stong gsum kun grags dam tshig dang // ye shes gsung mchog dam tshig dang // bsam yas rdo rje gsung dam tshig/
128a2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur rdo rje'i dam tshig ste// bdag gis shes bya'i dam tshig yin// shes bya ting 'dzin dam tshig bzhi// nam mkha' snang byed dam tshig dang // rten byed sa yi dam tshig dang // sreg byed me yi dam tshig dang // 'khrug byed chu yi dam tshig dang // g.yengs byed chen
128a3(rnying rgyud): basbyin te// suM na ma mcheg dang // 'a ste na med pa tshig // rdzangs ma rtag sa sa ma chag yam/ kyis rnams gathags rten du ma ga dang/ ma cheg dung bricig dang / shes pa'i
128a4(rnying rgyud): reg ltar shes pa'i dam tshig ni// gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig yin// kha dog lnga yi dam tshig dang // phyogs lnga yi ni dam tshig dang // dbang lnga yi ni dam tshig ste// gsum po spyir khyab dam tshig yin// bde ba'i ngang nyid dam tshig dang // lhan grub ye shes dam
128a5(rnying rgyud): tshig dang // mi 'jigs rgyal mchog dam tshig dang // mnyam rdzogs lhun grub dam tshig dang // phyogs dus dbyer med dam tshig dang // nyid kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang // chos la skyon med dam tshig dang // brjod med spros med dam tshig dang // phyogs dus
128a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis med dam tshig dang // gnyis med byang chub sems dam tshig/ 'dus ma byas pa'i dam tshig dang // thams cad rgyas 'debs dam tshig dang // thams cad mi dgog dam tshig skye// de ba ti 'dzin dam tshig yin// grub par bya ba lnga bstan pa// rjes kyi 'khor
128a7(rnying rgyud): ma'i dmatshig dang // rin chen 'byung ba'i dmatshig dang // pad+ma chags mod dam tshig dang // don rnams grub pa'i dam tshig dang // 'jigs byed rdo rje dam tshig dang // de bzhin sgra nyid dam cig dang // thams cad 'byong ldan dmachog ste// hUM yi dmachog bdun du/
128b1(rnying rgyud): bshad// yang dag dan skyon la sogs pa// gsung gi dam cig brgyad pa nyid// dang 'dzugs par shes byaste// 'bras bu'i bsrung bas bsgrub pa yin// rang rig dbang gyur dam chi ba dang // rna mchog nam dag mchag dang // rang bzhin 'ad gas la dam ci nga
128b2(rnying rgyud): byang chub sdom byed dam tshig dang // thams cad dbang sgyur dam tshig drug/ thugs kyi dam tshig nyid du bshad// byang chub zhing bkod dam tshig dang // ye shes bzhugs gnas dam tshig dang // gzhal yas khang bstan dam tshig dang // sna tshogs kun myang dam
128b3(rnying rgyud): dang // zad med gted ldan dam tshig dang // bsgrub pazad med dam tshig dang // zad med gtor chen dam tshig ni// yon tan dam tshig bdun du bshad// thams cad byin rlob dam tshig dang // bdud sde tshang gcod dmachog dang // sems can don byeng dmachig
128b4(rnying rgyud): phrin las dam tshig gsum du bshad// spong ba rdo rje dam tshig dang // chags pa'i ye shes dam tshig dang // gti mug chen po'i dam tshig dang // phrag dgu chen po'i dam tshig dang // nga rgyal bdi mchog dam tshig dang // nyon mongs lnga yi dam tshig ste/
128b5(rnying rgyud): mi spyong ba yi dam tshig yin// gtan du ma yengs bsrung ba ni// mnyam pa lnga yi dam tshig dang // bden pa dbyer med dam tshig dang // sku gsung thugs sbyor dam tshig dang // lam lnga rdzogs pa'i dam tshig dang // thams cad bde spyong dam tshig dang // rdo rje log
128b6(rnying rgyud): 'jams dam tshig dang // 'khor ba zil gAnon dam tshig dang // ma bcos lhun grub dam tshig dang // d+h+ri ga le bde spyod dum tshig ni// lta ba rgyun bsrung dam tshig yin// ting 'dzin rkyen bsgom dam tshig dang // bcing nga phyag rgya'i dam tshig dang // bzlas pas
128b7(rnying rgyud): snyan dam tshig dang // sgo gsum mnyam pa'i dam tshig dang // shes rab de sbyor dam tshig ni// ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig yin// za skyed zil gnon dam tshig dang // spyod lam bde 'byor dam chog dang // rig pazod rgal dmatshig dang // ma bcos gan
129a1(rnying rgyud): dag dmachog dang // rang 'byung gnas bral dam tshig ste// cig car gnas pa'i bsrung thabs yin// thams cad snyed byed dam tshig dang // rgyud drug sbyor byed dam tshig dang // rtogs pas tshim byed dam tshig dang // khyad pa nam mkha dam tshig da
129a2(rnying rgyud): gzhan don shugs grub dam tshig ni// dam tshig che ba bstan pa yin// dmyal chen dmyal ba phal pa dang // yi dwags byol song srin po dang // gnod sbyin mngal srin kha 'bad lce// lha dang lha min ru dra dang // rtsangs pa la sogs 'khor ba ste// chad pa'i skye gnas
129a3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa yin// bsrung ba'i dam tshig chen po yin// gal te stong pa'i don rtogs na// bskang dang nyams pa'i tshul med de// chad pa'i yul las 'das pa yin// gang zag 'ga' zhig spyod yul yin// gal te rtsa ba'i dam nyams na// bla ma grogs po brgya dag la//
129a4(rnying rgyud): bshags pa stong phrag brgya ru bya// bzlas pa bye ba phrag bdun bya// gtor ma 'bum phrag bdun du bya// sbyin sreg 'bum phrag bcu gcig bya// de nas slar yang blang ba 'am// bla mas gnang nas gnas par bya// gal te yul de mi gnas sam// lo gsum phan cha
129a5(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'am// gal te bshags pa'i tshul mthong bas// ma dang 'dod pa'i sems skyes nas// bskang ba'i tshad las 'das pa ste// bskal pa chen po brgyad khri'i bar// bshags kyang dag par mi 'gyur te// rdo rje dmyal ba zhes bya bar// mi bzad sdug bsngal
129a6(rnying rgyud): myong nas ni// ji srid nam mkha' gnas pa'i bar// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bzhin du 'khyod// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// zla ba bdun du smra bcad bya// sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad du bya// bzlas pa bye ba tshad 'bum gcig/ gtor ma khri phrag gcig tu btang /
129a7(rnying rgyud): de nas slar yang blang ba dang // dag dang tshangs par bsgrags par bya// dag pa'i snong dadeng mi ldan par// gsang ba stan cing 'chad pa dang // dbang ma thob par bka' 'gam dang // bder gshegs bka' las 'das pa dang // tshad dang ldan pa rjod min la// gas
129b1(rnying rgyud): batshad du sgrogs pa dang // gsang ba nyams su mi len par// 'phyar bas kun la spel ba ni// tshad las 'das pa'i gang zag ste// sangs rgyas kun la brnyas byed pas// dus gsum sangs rgyas khros pa yas// bdun rgyad tshun chad brlag par mdzad// bla ma dang ni grogs/
129b2(rnying rgyud): rnams dang // pha ma gnyen bshes rgyal blon dang // rgyal 'bangs nyes med sdang ba ni// dam tshig nyams pa'i rtags su bshad// zab mo dag la gegs 'byung dang // bsgrubs pas 'dod pa mi 'byung zhing // bsrung ba'i lho rnams g.yel ba dang // mamAnyes yal 'byung ba
129b3(rnying rgyud): dag/ dam tshig nyams pa'i rtags su bshad// dang por bla ma'i lung thob nas// rang gis nyams pa mchong zhing // bde legs bsam pa 'grub 'gyur zhing // bdag gzhan bsam pa'i khyad par dag/ sngon du yid bzhin nor bu bzhin// 'grub cing bsngags pas
129b4(rnying rgyud): thob pa ni// ma nyams don dang ldan pa'i rtags// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po yin// gal te ma nyams rtags byung na// bskang gso'i cho ga myur du brtsam// gal te nyams la rtags med cing // legs par snang na mi rung ste// bdag gi sa bon tshig pa ste// bde
129b5(rnying rgyud): ba zad byas gtan du sdug/ ma nyams rtags byung myur bskangs na// sngon gyi bag chags zad par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dam tshig ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya
129b6(rnying rgyud): ba// mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa// bsgrub pa'i khyad par ji snyed pa'i// rtog pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus bshad// rgyud kyi rgyal po ma lus las// thun mong dag la mos zhugs pas// thun mong yo byad ting 'dzin dang // sngags dang phyag rgya 'bral goms
129b7(rnying rgyud): pas// rtags dang nus pa mthar phyin pas// gang ltar dmigs pa 'grub 'gyur te// zag bcas thun mong dngos grub yin// de las gzhan pa bshad par bya// gang du mchog gi rnal 'byar pa// dbang dang dam tshig ting 'dzin dag/ phyi nang gsang ba'i rim
130a1(rnying rgyud): thob na// mi ldog brtan pa'i rnal 'byor thob// mthong nas bsgom lam ma nges rigs// ting 'dzin gang bsgom par chad med// tshe 'dis dbang sgyur 'jigs bral te// de nas sku sna'i bdag nyid thob// mchog ldan mchog gi sa mchog thor pas/
130a2(rnying rgyud): gi dngos grub thun mong min// ded dang dam tshig shes rab dang // brtson 'grus brtul zhugs bzod pa thob// brtan cing snying brtse dbang rdzogs shing // bsgrub dang lam gyi sbyor ba shes// yid thub mi ldog brtan pa can// nyams thob dang du len pa ni// gcig dang lnga
130a3(rnying rgyud): gang zag gis// ri bo ri sul gsang bar dang // chu gling ngam grog brag rdzong dang // dur khrod ri phug chu mdo dang // yid 'ong bkra shis nyams dga' bar// cho ga byin brlabs rdzogs pa nyid// las kyi cho ga gang yin pa// bdag gam gzhan gyis byas pa ni// bdag dbang
130a4(rnying rgyud): bkra shis phun sum tshogs// dam tshig dbang dang lta ba dag/ sngon du bye ba rdzogs pa yis// sngon du rnal 'byor gsum thob bam// dang po yid brtan gang yin kyang // gang la yid kyis dmigs pa de// cho ga ting 'dzin 'brel pa nyid// rang dang rtog pa ji bzhin
130a5(rnying rgyud): tha mal pa dang le lo dang // the tshom dad pa'i stobs kyis te// gal te de dag mi ldan na// sa thob kyis kyang ma yin no// gang zag skye bos smos ci dgos// gal te dgug pa'i lus bya na// bdag nyid dbang dag khro bo ste// dmang thag dud ka'i mdog 'a
130a6(rnying rgyud): gong ltar gnas pa'i 'phro 'du ni// zhags paM lcags kyu sha stag ste// dmigs pa brtan cing rtags thob nas// mngon du gyur gyi bar du ni// rang sngags brjod pa de yi mdzang // rje ga ma zhig dzaHhUM zhes// dgra dang bgegs dang lha dang gzungs// mthung
130a7(rnying rgyud): 'phrul ldan yang rung // tha ma la dbang med bzhin du dgug/ gal te de yi dgos pa dag/ myur du grub par ma gyur na// de dag legs par grub kyi bde// gang yin mkhas pas bcing bar bya// ngag dang thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis// 'grub par 'gyur ba
130b1(rnying rgyud): gdon mi za// bdag nyid dbang drag gsal ba yi// lce la dbang gi 'khor lo bsam// yi ge gsum ldan dgu bkod nas// 'od kyis nam mkha'i khams bkang zhing // pad+ma rA ga zhu 'dra bas// gang thim bdag gi dbang gyur zhing // bden pa bdar zhing ngag gis bcing //
130b2(rnying rgyud): yang na gang la gang chags pa'i// rdzas la ring du 'dod pa ltar// 'dod pa grub na dam bcas shing // yid 'ong 'dul ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// dga' ba'i thabs kyis bstan byas na// gal te 'gro zhing 'phro 'dod na// dbang drag phyag rgyas bsdigs bcing gzir//
130b3(rnying rgyud): dga' ba'i thabs kyis yid 'phrog nas// rol mo skya mkhan dag de yis// 'dus pa'i gang zag chags pa can// bya ba thabs kyis bral ba ltar// bral ba med par gnas par 'gyur// ting 'dzin brtan pa'i nus pa yis// gang yang rung ba'i sems can de//
130b4(rnying rgyud): tshegs khro bo khro mo yis// 'od dang phyag rgya 'bar ba yis// bcings nas mdun du gnas par blta// dga' dang bsdigs pa rdzas kyi mtha'// ting 'dzin brtan pas nges par 'grub// med las dngos por des grub cing // mi mthun brgyad sogs nges 'grub na//
130b5(rnying rgyud): yod dang snang ba'i 'gro ba dag/ dbang pos bsgyur ba smos ci dgos// gal te gso ba'i las byas na// las ni gnyis te brtsams pas 'grub// bdag nyid rtag par skyes nas ni// dbang bskur byin brlabs kun bstims nas// mdun du shel gyi bum pa ru// thugs
130b6(rnying rgyud): las chu yi lha mo bskyed// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba der gyur nas// bum par lha mo 'od du zhu// nad dang sdug bsngal byang par bsam// dmar ser ba yi 'o ma dang // sman dang rin chen spos dang 'bru// bdud rtsi snying po che rkyen la// mA ma kI yi sngags kyis gdab// oMH
130b7(rnying rgyud): ma kI sarba pa paM du ru du ru swA hA// nad dang sdug bsngal ldan pa'i lus// bkrus pas 'tsho bar the tshom med// bdag nyid brtul zhugs bde ldan pas// sngon du bya ba sngon song bas// dgon pa bas mtha' rab dben pa // ma smas ma rul tshad ldan pa'i// dur khrod zhing
131a1(rnying rgyud): chen mtshan ldan la// khrus dang thug bdug kun byas nas// pho mo la sogs yin pa yi// las de nges par 'grub par 'gyur// de dag maN+Dal gtsang ma yi// dbus su legs par bzhag nas ni// bdag nyid khro ba gang yang rung // gas pa bas mongs pa
131a2(rnying rgyud): byin rung // rang sngags srog snying dza yis dgug/ phyag rgya bzhi yis dbab par bya// gal te 'dar dang rgod pa dang // ngu dang 'jigs pa'i sgra byung na// dam tshig phyag rgya bstan par bya// dam chu byin la mnas bsgrags te// gang 'dod las nga mngag par / gal
131a3(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten the tshom zos// de yis zos dang brgyal ba dang // 'phral du bdag nyid 'chi bar 'gyur// gang zhig ting 'dzin brtan pa yis// bar chad med par bslabs pa'i tshe// mdangs ldan yid 'ong dang po ste// dri zhim 'od chags gnyis pa yin// dga' ba
131a4(rnying rgyud): gsum pa yin// bkrag dang gzi mdangs nyams song yin// zhing tshon kha nas dri byung na// ting 'dzin rdo rje so yis bcad// ro langs brdabs na gser du 'gyur// lce yi ral gris de bcad na// cis kyang mi tshugs go mtshon te// lha min g.yul yang pham byed
131a5(rnying rgyud): dpa' bo stobs ldan smos ci dgos// de yi dbang po lnga dag la// mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub yod// rang gi rtog pa ji bzhin du// mkhas pas bslabs na 'grub par 'gyur// gal te bcu bdun bcwa brkyang ma'i// zhing mdzes bkru zhing zugs byas te//
131a6(rnying rgyud): dang gos kyis legs par gdags// dri zhim dbang po dag pa la// bdag nyid dbang dag rnal 'byor gyis// ye shes 'jig rten gang rung ba'i// lha mo yid 'ong 'od 'bar ma// sngags dang phrag rdzas bkug bcings nas// rtags chung bar du bstim pa
131a7(rnying rgyud): dang sgra dang 'od dag dang // 'dir dang 'gul dang dgod pa dag/ dang po'i rtags ni yin par bshad// lha dang gtam dang gnyis pa// dngos su langs pa chad yin pas// dam bdang mnas bsgrags dbang du bsdu// sbyang du sad pan/
131b1(rnying rgyud): zhing log ston na// dbang drag nga rgyal chen po yis// dbang du bsdu dang zil gyis mnan// de dag chags pas rol spyad na// skad cig cho 'phrul bzhi thob ste// skye shi med par gnas pa dang // ma lus bde chen 'bar ba dang // zhing khams kun du bgrod pa
131b2(rnying rgyud): dag/ thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// gtsang ma byis pa rma med pa// yid 'ong legs pa btsal blangs nas// dag cing bdud rtsis dri byugs la// 'da'o hA ma te sa legs byugs la// kha dog lnga yi gzungs kyis gdags// tshangs pa dang ni brgya
131b3(rnying rgyud): byin dang // lha mo gang rung snying pos dgug/ rtag tu phyag rgya bzhi sa bstim zhing // bdag nyid ha ya grI ba 'am// ya nAn+ta ka la sogs pa// gang rung khro bor gsal bsgoms la// drag tu dgug cing bstim par bya// rtags byung mthar thug mngon gyur
131b4(rnying rgyud): nas// legs nyes de yis smra bar 'gyur// gal te 'drar zhing mi brjod na// oM gyi 'od dang a mr-i tis// lce la thabs kyis dbang bskur zhing // ha ya grI bas gad mos bsdigs// legs par smra bar the tshom med// gal te gsang ba'i las byed na/
131b5(rnying rgyud): gsal la brtan thob rnal 'byor pas// dur khrod shing gcig bzhi mdo 'am// lha 'dre mngon du gnas pa'i slar// bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste// dud ka nag po 'od 'bar ba// spyan bzlog mtshon cha me ltar 'bar// sprul ba'i char ltar 'khrug par bsam/
131b6(rnying rgyud): mdun du hom khung khru gang tshad// gru gsum dur sol khrag chen byug/ nang du ling+ga bdud rtsi lnga// chags pa'i rgyu dang tsha ba dang // shis pa chags pa'i rten la byas// pho nyas ming rus bcas bkug la// bstims la phyag rgyas bcing bar bya// lcags sam nag
131b7(rnying rgyud): po'i shing las byas// drag po'i phur pas gnas gsum gdab// hriHSh+T+rIHdrag pos g.yas g.yon nas// khros pa'i sems kyis bsreg byas nas// de nang drag po tsher ma can// nam phyed gcer bus bsregs byas nas// lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur
132a1(rnying rgyud): gal te dbye ba'i las byed na// bdag nyid yam+ban+ta ka ste// rngam zhing gdug gtum nga rgyal can// shin tu 'jigs shing bsdigs par bsgom// nyi mas 'jigs pa'i dang rung dang // mun pas 'jigs pa'i gung rul// gang yin de nyid gras
132a2(rnying rgyud): la bla na// lha dang lha min gnyis la gtad// rlung gi phyogs su de yis bskyod// sprul pa pho nyas g.yul 'gyed cing // 'thab cing rtsod par rnam par bsam// bar du khwa dang bya rog 'thab// me chu rlung gis 'bud bsams na// de ni gang yin su yang rung // 'bral
132a3(rnying rgyud): zhing 'thab pa nyid du 'gyur// rgyal po bram ze blon po dag/ gdug pa gnod pa can gyi rigs// mi gnas bskrad par bya ba'i phyir// bdag nyid a ba ra tsit+ta ste// drag po khros pa'i tshul du bsgom// dgra bgegs gang yang rung ba yi// 'og tu rlung snying bcas pa bri//
132a4(rnying rgyud): steng du ming rus bcas bskyon la// mdun na gnas pa'i gdul bya de// rlung lha rnga mo'i steng du zhon// pho nya sprul pa mtha' yas kyis// 'khrid cing 'tshog par rab bsams la// gshin rje'i drung du khrid par bsam// 'dis ni dbugs med brgyal ba yang // gzhan du/
132a5(rnying rgyud): drag pos phyin 'gyur na// srog dang ldan pas smos ci dgos// gal te dag dpung pham 'dod ni// bdag nyid mi g.yo mgon po ste// ji ltar gnas par rab tu bsgom// de yi gzugs brnyan bris nas kyang // tshogs de du byin brlabs la// sngags ni bdun 'dum
132a6(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa// lcags sna bdun las bcu gnyis chad// ral gri snying por bcas pa la// gsal bar de dag rtags byung bzlas// 'od dang ska dngas g.yos dang // ral gri skad ni 'don pa na// phyung bas g.yul las ldog pa drang // 'dor bas dmag
132a7(rnying rgyud): dpung 'bros par 'gyur// bdag nyid rgyal zhing che 'dod na// bdag nyid gsapa zhing brtan gyur nas// zhe sdang rdo rjer gsal byas la// dung khrod nges la ming dus zla// sngags dang phyag rgyas bcug snyoms la// nges par brten pa'i lta zung nas/
132b1(rnying rgyud): yin pas kyis gnon// rta mgrin gad mo drag pas bsdigs// khrung gshog phyag rgya zil gyis gnon// bdag dang khyi yi sgoms nas gdon// bdag nyid them pa'i 'og tu gnan// yang na bdag gi 'og tu gnan// rdo rje rgya gram phyag rgya yis// steng nas
132b2(rnying rgyud): non cing bden pa pad // bdag nyid de yin la bar 'gyur// dbul pa gtad dang phrad 'do dang // bdag nyid pas la goms pa yis// rigs la lhag pa'i lhags la nas// so so'i phyag mtshan sa 'bruHma// dbang po mching ga bar du na/ @
132b3(rnying rgyud): zhing sngags bzlas bden pa bdang // mtshan ma brtan po gsal ban// gang na yod pa'i phyogs deng dong // bden pa ting 'dzin sngags bcas mthus// 'dug gim smra' ma mthong ba'am// phra mo dang ni lcang por 'gyur// de nas gter dang phrad bya
132b4(rnying rgyud): dbul ba kun las thar bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor pas// mngon shes mig dang ldan 'dod na// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor pa// rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// mig sA lnga dang bdun pa'i zhog/ de yi zhun mang rung par bcas// 'phrul
132b5(rnying rgyud): 'o ma dag gis sbyar// rdo rje pra yis zhag bdun bsgrub// nyams dang drod rtags thob pa na// mig la legs par sngags kyis byug/ skad cig stong gsum bcas pa yi// phyogs bcu mngon par shes pas mthong // gang zag chud ni brtag pa dang // sug 'asnga
132b6(rnying rgyud): drag pos zhen bzlog cing // so so dag pa'i zhing khams kyis// yid bde grub par bya ba'i phyir// mngon shes mtshan mas legs par bsgrub// rkang mgyogs thob par 'dod pa yis// bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms nas// brtan zhing bar chad
132b7(rnying rgyud): med thob nas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te// skad cig dpag tshad brgyar 'gro ba// de la gnas bsam ma yengs pas// rlung gis khyab pa ji lta bar// dpag tshad brgya phrag du ma yang // skad cig tsam
133a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ kyis bgrod par 'gyur// gang te rdzu 'phrul bzhi dag gis// ngag 'dzin ga'ang 'gro 'dod na// spun du dag pa'i dran thob nas// phyag rgya gsal bar gyur pa'i tshe// nam mkhang ldo zla ba la// dz+halas nan tshig gsum// dam nga
133a2(rnying rgyud): brtan pa'i dbang thob nas// dngas ma'i phyag rgya la brten pas// rdo rje zlar bcas rlung brten pas// gang 'brangadra zhing du bskyod pa'i sa// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yis// zhing khams dag pa'i bya ba 'grub// mdun gyi nam mkhar zla ba la// oM la cho ga'i tshul gyis bsgyur//
133a3(rnying rgyud): brtan pa'i 'khor lo zla rlung gis// dngas ma'i stobs kyis lus gnas pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rige 'dzin pa// zhing khams so sor bskyod byas nas// rang gi bsam pa bslab par bya// nam mkha' dbyings kyi zla ba la// rdzilas skyes pa'i cho ga yas// rin tshan
133a4(rnying rgyud): brang bcas pa yis// ting 'dzin drag po bskyod pa'i shugs// dngas ma lus yid bcas pa yis// dag pa'i zhing khams kun bskyod de// lhag pa'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+mar bcas pa'i zla ba bsgom/
133a5(rnying rgyud): las sna tshogs chos mchog sems// gsal brtan rlung gis stobs bstanu pas// dang sa ma'i lus yid gang yin pa// zheng bskyod bsdam pa bre bamar 'gyur// nam mkha dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// gsal byed sna tshogs bcas pa bsgom// a ma ha lus pa nyi/
133a6(rnying rgyud): las kyi phrag tu goms par bya// btan nas dngas ma rlung sgrubs kyis// zhang khams gang du mngon sams pa'i// 'dod pa'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// 'dis ni 'byung zhing dbang med cing // 'gro ma nang ba dbang tho nas// 'phrul bzhi yis ning
133a7(rnying rgyud): nas// mngon shes gdag pa 'dul po ma// ma mi grib gcig kyang med// de nas gzhan yang chags ldan ngas// skal bas dman dang skyeng pas zang // bde ba'i dzin 'did dkyang chub can// 'dre dag na la thabs kyis dag // sa
133b1(rnying rgyud): nga ngal/ nga du ga da byas ldan na// bden glang thabs rnamags pa/ rnam pa ma rdu mas rgyu// rnams su kyog nas// tshul ba'i jog la bdad // ma lus ma pa ma dang bzhin gyig// rang sum ma bcos panas nyid dad /
133b2(rnying rgyud): la thugs thig le gas sa zang das// rgyog ma da thog me dang // gdas nga sa ga 'dzin gyis// TI ga brgyang gdun dus pa'i// thangs kyis mtshan pa las byung bas// dam tha tshig tu tshogs 'thag// ba tsun thog li ngacas pa sa// das ma
133b3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin khyab gnas pa// bskul ba thabs kyi stong ba yis// ma lus bskyod cing 'gugs par byed// dngas snyigs rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i// rlung gi thig les dbang sbyar nas// 'gro zhing 'dzag pa'i byig le nyid// rlung gis 'ching banyid yin te// thig le stegs mar
133b4(rnying rgyud): mas gyur pa// thabs dang drung bcud stobs ldan pas// pad+ma la ni chu bzhin no// rang 'byung thig le'i rang bzhin las// rten dang zag pa snyogs ma dang // 'khor ba'i rtswa dang sa bon dang // log rtog thig le zhen bcas pa// rang byung nam mkhanga'i zhig les 'jig
133b5(rnying rgyud): dang lus pa chen rnying pa la// nAm m+bu'aM dzin myur kyi byung nga / ma seMgs byud pa'i rang bzhin nyid // ga rgya dang ma dang // nas nga sbyin rgyabs kyis// das snyigs kyi pa dngas m+ba hA Sh+T+rI // rang snying mas la 'du snang ba // phyin dang rnas
133b6(rnying rgyud): ma lus pa// rlung sogs 'khor lo'i 'phyen stobs kyis// der mi gnas pAr goms par bya// gang dus bon snyigs bcas pa// nam mkha'i ye shes lnga 'bang bas// gang du rtsu bar bcas pa'i yid// de ma thag par rnam par brlag/ rlung dang rtswa dang thig
133b7(rnying rgyud): ler bcas// thabs kyis bskul ba'i ro ldan pas// ma lus thig le'i rang bzhin pas// mi mthun zhen pas rnam grol bas// rang sems rten bcas thig le ni// dngas ma'i ye shes blo ldan pa// kun khyab bde 'byung snying po can// gsang ba'i rig
134a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i gratang kha 'byud// rgyanang rgya ba thog lang bcas// stang nang byu bar 'bar gyung nas// dang lus rtags su 'di tshon 'brang// mngon shes ran chen rtsal phag/ dag pa'i mngan shos la du 'char// de nas mi 'gyur snang pa'i ma// 'byur
134a2(rnying rgyud): kun snang drung pa 'is// dam khrus pa 'greg khyad pang thangs// gsung ba TIg ba zhin gyis// rtswa bdud ti 'dzin 'brel pa'i sgrubs// bskal padu ma'i stobs 'gags te// dngas ma'i ye shes rlung du grub// phyin pa med par mthar
134a3(rnying rgyud): song ba// dede chen goms pa'i stobs lngas gyur// bcudu lta 'dus pa'i thig len// ro rje 'dres pa'i byed chen de// bsgom dang mthar sbyin khyad par gyis// bde ba chen po dgas mchog gnas// de nas gang yin brjod bya ba// zab mo na rdzogs brtul
134a4(rnying rgyud): zhugs can// dbang po dUr zhing sbyin pa yi// tshogs can nyi zla 'dzin nus pas// spyi gtsug zig le'i 'khor lo dang // gseng ba'i 'og sbyin nas ldan pa// 'byor pa'i rten can 'di nyid gnas// thabs dang rol pa'i khyad par dang // ting 'dzin rlung gi
134a5(rnying rgyud): dbang thob ste// 'byung bzhi snyigs phye dngas dus su// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gang thabs kyis// lha mo rnams dang lhan cig tu// ril pa'i thabs kyis gang rtsen pa// bye brag brgyad cu gnyis 'dus pa'i// badz+ra'i snying po kun bkug ste// thig le dpa' ba l-I yi
134a6(rnying rgyud): stobs// mi ldod 'phro ba'i rang bzhin nyid// thabs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bcings la gzung zhing gnas par bya// de dang rtse phrad gnyis bzlog pas// bde ba'i myu gu gso byas pas// tha mal zhen pa kun bral nas// rtog dang lhan cig gang skyes
134a7(rnying rgyud): pa// dngas snyigs phye ba'i nyams dag gis// snyigs ma bag chags zhon bcas pa// de yi stobs kyis gnas mi 'gyur// gsang ba'i thag le stongs ldan pas// rigs ngan tha mal zhen chags dang // dran rtog ma lus pam byasate// rkyenang stong pa
134b1(rnying rgyud): lus pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du// ma lus dbang btsugs rgyal bar mdzad// rdo rje pad+ma'i snying po la// dga' ba'i rol pa'i bdag nyid kyis// thabs dang shes rab gsal ba'i ro// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba 'dus pa'i tshe// zag med yon tan gter chen da/
134b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba thabs kyis stobs las grub// bde chen snying po thig le'o // dbang dang gzung ba zlog 'byings pa yis// rtsa gsum gang zhig thim pa'i tshe// bar chad med pa'i bde ba dang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i mngon shes dang // shi meng pa'i tshe 'phru
134b3(rnying rgyud): chos sku thig le la// rgyu ba spangs pa'i tshul gyis gnas// bde chen cho 'phrul dpag med pas// gsang ba'i zhing khams dag byed cing // gsang ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// bde chen nyams dang dga' ba'i gar// chags pa'i sprin sna tshogs pas// ji srid nam mkha'
134b4(rnying rgyud): mthar thug par// glu ni sna tshogs len byed cing // mdzes dang ngo tsha spangs pa'i tshul// mdog dmar rlan dang ldan pa yis// rol pa'i tshul ni sna tshogs kyis// rdo rje bcud chen zlar bcas pas// nyi ma chags pa dang bcas pa'i// pad+ma'i snying po'i spongs mdzad cing /
134b5(rnying rgyud): dga' ba'i 'od dang 'khyud pa'i gar// rlung kyi snying po rjod byed cing // srid pa'i myu gu 'gog par mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba'i me long gi rgyud chen po las/ bsgrub pa ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad
134b6(rnying rgyud): bya ba// rtog pa'i rgyal po ma lus pa// bya ba las kyi rim pa dang // bzhir ni gsal dang gsungs pa yin// dang por zhi ba'i rang bzhin te// de 'og rgyas pas rgyas phyir ro// rgyas pas dbang du bya ba dang // dbang mi 'du ba bskal phyir te// thun mong khyad par yon tan rdzogs
134b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i las la ma rmongs shing // nus pa brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyis// rim pa ji bzhin brtsam par bya// gangs dkar 'dab dang yid 'dang ba// zhi ba'i ljon shing me tog tshal// 'bras ldan rgyas pa'i rang bzhin no// sum mdo ngam grog gting zab pas// dbang du bsdu
135a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i gnas su bshad// dur khrod mtshan gcig rgya gram gnas// 'byung po 'du sar drag po shis// zhi la sa gzhi dkar ldan pa// zlum po sum rim i dang bcas// 'khor lo 'od dkar dang bcas pa// zhi ba'i zab kyi rang bzhin no// chus la ser po
135a2(rnying rgyud): tsan+dan bcas// gru bzhi rim gsum traM dang bcas// rin chen 'od zer 'phro bcas pa// zab ni rgyas par gsungs pa yin// dbang las dmar chags 'od can// zla gam gzhu 'dra pad+mas mtshan// rim gsum gri dang bcas pa ni// dbang du bya ba'i thab yin no// drag
135a3(rnying rgyud): swa nag ngur sol can// gru gsum rdo rje rtse gsum gdeng // thod phred 'od nag rim gsum hU~M/ drag po thab kyi rim pa yin// 'o ma can dang gser can dang // chags pa can dang tshing ma can// phrin las bzhi ni so so yi// yam shing bsreg shing nyid du bshad
135a4(rnying rgyud): ping+ga kha dog so so ste// gnas kyang thab khung bzhi dang mtshungs// mar dkar 'bras dkar til dkar dang // nas dkar chan dang 'o ma'o// dngul phye gtor ma dkar por bcas// zhi ba'i bsreg gtong rdzas su bshad// mar rnying bu dam sbrang rtsi dang // 'dra
135a5(rnying rgyud): dang chen rnams ldong ros dang // me tog gser dang tsan+dan bcas// gser phye gtor ma ser por bcas// 'di dag rgyas pa'i rdzas nyid de// dpal dang gzi byin rgyas par 'gyung // cha ba'i mar dang char sbyar dang // ram bu pad+ma dak+ta dang // 'bras dmar tsan+dan zangs
135a6(rnying rgyud): dang // gtor ma dmar po dbang rdzas yin// tshil chen mar dang tsha ba gsum// klung chen sha khrag sran chan dang // dug gsum thal chen tsha ba'i mar // ske tshe phye gsum mi khrag dang // ming rus snrel ma bcas gtor mas// bsgral ba drag po'i rdzas su bshad//
135a7(rnying rgyud): dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo rgya mdud rtsi zlum po// logs la zhi ba'i lha bkod pa// de bzhin gshegs par gsal bas gdab// gser ngam ser po'i shing rnams la// mgo rtsa rgya mdud gru bzhi bcas// legs la rgyas pa'i lha bsgoms
135b1(rnying rgyud): rin chen dargyal bcas pas gdab// zangs sam b+ha ru dmar shing rnams// mgo bo rgya mdud rtsi zla gram// logs la dbang gi lha bkod la// chags pa rdo rje gsal bas gdab// lcags sa ma nag pa'i shing rnams la// mgo bo rgya mdud rtsi zur gsum// logs
135b2(rnying rgyud): 'drag pa'i lha bkod de// zhe sdang rdo rjer gsal bas gdab// oM dang rdo hU~M da las// 'thung lnga'i rim pa gsal snyings su// oM bi ma ya b+h+rUM las bskyed// gzhal yas zlum po gru bzhi dang // zla ga ma grwa gsum ji bzhin dbyibs// kha dog rang gi tshul bzhin bskyed//
135b3(rnying rgyud): radang rang sa bon gdan stengs la// 'od bzhi 'phro 'du'i cho ga yis// las bzhi gtso bo las bzhi ni bskyed// 'khor mang gtso bo'i cha 'dra ba// phyag mtshan rang rang thugs rtags la// las bzhi rtags kyi mtshan ma ste// kha dog las kyis dbye bar bshad// dab
135b4(rnying rgyud): brkur las bzhi rigs kyis brgyan// las bzhi 'od kyi 'phro 'du can// tsho gas gsal bar bskyed byas la// spyan drang bstim stsogs las rdzogs bya// las dang ting 'dzin bzhi nyid kyis// las bzhi rtse gcig ting 'dzin bya// gang du dmigs pa rtse gcig pas/
135b5(rnying rgyud): las bzhi bya ba'i cho ga dag/ ma lus pa dag 'grub 'gyur na// phra mo'i las rnams smos ci dgos// shar phyogs su ni kha bltas te// dad ba'i yid ni mi g.yo bas// rdzogs pa'i skyil krung la gnas te// ma rungs gdug pa zhi bar bya// lho phyog
135b6(rnying rgyud): su ni kha bltas te// dga' ba'i 'du shes rtse gcig pas// rin chen skyil krung la gnas pas// dpal dang gzi byin 'phel bar bya// nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas te// chags dang zhen pa rtse gcig pa// pad+ma'i skyil krung la gnas te// mA lus dbang
135b7(rnying rgyud): bsdu bar bya// byang phyogs nyid du kha bltas te// khros pa'i sems kyis so bca' zhing // rus sbal dang ni gyad stabs kyis// gdug pa bsgral te lam du gzhung // so so'i sngags kyi rim pa dag/ snga dro zhi ba'i las byas te// gung la rgyas pa nyid du bya//
136a1(rnying rgyud): dgangs ka dbang gi dus byed de// drag ba nam gyi grang la bya// nam blangs pazhing bsgrubs pas na// nges pa gas pani 'grub par 'gyur// seMrbe g+sa hA/ ra.AH/ swA ga rgya gangs ta/ tshig sa pa sha ga ru sarba/ tshogasam
136a2(rnying rgyud): yaH/ ling+ka'i gnas kyang las bzhi'i dbyibs// dgug dang phung bu ga btab la// ril bu'am lhag ma gtubs 'dre// so so lha yi nul du bsti bas// rtse mo ni byed yi la ga rgyas// sdong po dab la rtsi ba drag/ kha dang mang phyur che ba'i gang /
136a3(rnying rgyud): mchod pa de bzhin te// rgyud bzang rgyal po smad 'tshong ma// shan pa'i khyim nas me blangs te// las dang mthun pa'i ra skyes mnan// sa bon bzhi las rim pa bzhin// pa pa ka dang dbang chen dang // gzi byin can dang 'joms byed bzhi// sku mdog las ba
136a4(rnying rgyud): phye ba ste// gun d+he sgom dang zhags pa dang // rtse gsum g.yon pa bgrang phreng nyid// rigs bzhis las bzhi byin brlabs dbu// spyan drang mchod ston las rdzogs nas// lto bar b+h+rU~M las gzhal yas su// las dang mthun pa'i lha bskyed la// rang dang rtog pa'i
136a5(rnying rgyud): ga bzhin// bsreg dang bro gang las byas pas// gang yang 'grub par the tshom med// zhe sdang can dang nga rgyal can// sdug bsngal gdug sems nad gzir ba// de 'dra zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// zhi ba'i lus ni rtsom pa yin// tshe thung nad mar dpal longs sdod/
136a6(rnying rgyud): phongs dang nyam nga 'jigs pa dang // dngas snyigs zad nas snying por thim// thig le mi shigs bcud 'dus pa// stong nyid thig le'i ngang du 'gag/ rgya ba'i rlung la dbang thob cing // mngon shes skye 'jig thob bral bas// bde chen nam mkha'i ye shes nyid//
136a7(rnying rgyud): rje thig le 'gyur 'jig med// steng dang 'og las gang sbyar bas// sku gsung thugs kyi pho brang dang // bdi tshen til 'bru bcud bzhin du// nyi zla gnas pa'i bar du 'bar// 'bab pa thig le zla ba'i gzugs// kha bcad rlung gis gzung bya zhing // 'og gis phu bzhing /
136b1(rnying rgyud): steng gis drang // ma lus bde chen khyab par gnas// mi rtog gsal ba mthang phyin pa// seng phrag zla ba rdzogs pa ltar// thabs dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i ye shes chen po la// ma lus yan tan rdzogs par gnas// chags can brtul zhugs bral ba
136b2(rnying rgyud): yaM// lus dang dran rtogs bag chags bcas// rigs dang rigs min gang yang rung // / gsum ma lus bcas pa dag/ snying sgo'i gr-idul bya des 'dul yin// dang por gsang ba'i rim thob pas// rlung dang thig pa'i la sna goms nas// bde nin byang chub
136b3(rnying rgyud): sems kying // srams pa'i tshul gyis gang snang ba// gam rdzob brtan pa'i nyams nyid kyis// lus dang bye nang dran rtogs bcas// nemam 'ang gzugs can nyid du // lus dang snang ba bcas pa yi// rnam mapa'i mtha' ltarang mi byed pa// bde chen rig pa yang
136b4(rnying rgyud): gnas// dag gi snang pa'i dum // gsos ba gsupa tu sa sa napa shi byud na ldan na// nga kyigs pa stsu sa 'ju/ 'dab na mog // da pa spyong bas byed sa/ bas
136b5(rnying rgyud): bo mnas thung ngu ben// rig pa'i ye shes gnas pa'i rlung // stong nyid rnamamapa'i dbyings su rnam// phyi nang rgyu ba ched pa dang // rig pa zhig lce'i dru la gnas// bde ba'i rtags ni 'byung 'gyur to// 'ad dang rjel dang bsdu ldeng // sgra dang lus
136b6(rnying rgyud): rtag pa dang // dorgod dang bcwam sags gang byung ba// ban dang b+h+ring bang tshig bya// sumathun lag pa'i chos brtags ni// thams kyi mtho chag yis// gdan dang sas dang gnon pa dag/ ste rigs par brgyug byed ste// de lus zi'i pa'i
136b7(rnying rgyud): ba rtsed ming bi rigs pa 'jug pa// tham pa zhen pa sgying bdang / khring ba drang chug sbyin pa dang / dri rtsigs srungs gas 'i 'dang // dri rgya rgyas pas khyab pa nga / rlung ning bring ba rdal 'byor gyis/ thams cad dbang nga srung ba //
137a1(rnying rgyud): dran rtag a yi ngang du gnas// 'di ni nang gi rim pa yin// de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// thabs dang shes rab 'bral pa las// gsang ba'i phrin las bzhir 'byung ba// dka' thub can dang tham la dang // thun mang la ma las bzlo/ phyir ro//
137a2(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags zhen cing dbang po smin// tshad ldan yum dang bcas pa yi// bde chen dgon pa thig le'i gnas// yon tan khyad par kun du rdzogs// gnyis med 'khril pa'i ngo bo ni// bde ba chen po 'byung ba'i gnas// gsang ba'i b+ha ga rgyas pa ni// zhi rgyas dbang phra
137a3(rnying rgyud): tshul bzhin dang // nus pa byin parlabs gang ldan pa// gsang ba'i thig po'i tshul la gnas// pad+ma gsang ba'i thab khung du// gsang ba'i sbyin sreg gang phul ba// me dang zla ba ma yin par// myung du 'di chen lus su 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab las zung bar
137a4(rnying rgyud): dngas snyigs bcud dang bag chags dang // nyi zla khu bar bcas pa ni// bde chen gsang ba mchod pa'i rdzas// gdung dang bde ba bral ba dang // zhen rtog de nyid chags pa yi// rang gi ling+ga de nyid la// gsang ba'i phur pa bzhi rdzogs pa// gsang ba'i yul la
137a5(rnying rgyud): btab pa yis// lhan cig skyes pa'i ting 'dzin la// las bzhi ma btsal rdzogs par ldan// rol pa'i tshul dang thig le gnyis// pad+ma rdo rje snying po'i rtsa// nyams dang lhor tshul gang yin pa// gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i dus su blta// gnas pa rtsa yi tshul dag ni//
137a6(rnying rgyud): kha dog dbyibs sogs tha dad pas// mchod rdzas te zlar bcas kun la// gzar bu gnyis bcas thab phul bas// thig la chen por 'bab par 'gyur// gsang ba'i don la dga' ba dang // rig pa'i brtul zhugs sdod pa dang // dbang po dang cing smin pa dang
137a7(rnying rgyud): thig le'i don la mos pa dang // rlung dang bcud la goms pa yis// rnal 'byor pho mor bcas pa kun// dran rtog phyi ma bcas pa'i yid// gdul bya'i don du de bshad do// gang dag thabs la mkhas pa dang // dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yis// thab pa
137b1(rnying rgyud): b+hu byul brtson zhing // nya tu stong byung bad nas// gzu zlog 'as pa gang thabs byas// dngas pad cig nas pa 'don// sanas 'i tshul mas gsal bar s+ho// zhon pa'i du 'dral dang // rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob pas// khams pa'i
137b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i stong ba las// bde can thog la martog pa// thabs kyis de ltar ba snad// thabs dang nal pa'i sla pan gyis// skam mi las kyis pa la// dbyang dang brdung pa bral ba yis// tshig dang rigs pas ci brtan kyang // rags pa zulas bdag
137b3(rnying rgyud): d+hAr// bdag phung gzhan ba drug 'jig par 'gyur// gang du gsang ba'i thig la nyid// gsang ba'i lam spar nyams skyes pas// zag med pade ba'i dkyil 'khor du// mkha' 'gro gsum la gang brten nas// ye shes thig le chu dpag med// rim pas mazar
137b4(rnying rgyud): ga gnasas 'gyur// gang shig 'di la 'dus gams pas// rtsub theg leng byi pa dang // dran gnam ma pa gas pa 'dung // bad min pad du rnyed pa yis// ngaci meng sadus nas sa la snang // 'jigs pakun las grol bdung // myim chogs kyis
137b5(rnying rgyud): brlabs nas// rol rje sna tshogs sbyar byed cing // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med cing // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i zhal mthong zhing // rdo rje dbang gis mtshams sbyar nas// yi g+ha 'khor ma tshogs mchog mnyes// nam mkha'i mdzar thug bar du ni//
137b6(rnying rgyud): chen ye shes zag pa med// ye shes rgya mtsho byin brlabs can// nam mkha' lta bur dpag med pa// rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bor 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las srin las mtha' yas pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bzla pa'o//
137b7(rnying rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i lam la gang dga' bas// thun mang mgyur gsang ba'i lam// rim pa nyid du bshad par bya// dad dang btuli zhugs che ba dang // theg pa chen por rags nges shing // snying brtse dbang dang dam tshig ldan// sgrub pa
138a1(rnying rgyud): brtson pa'i gang zag gis// lus dang longs spyod 'tsho ba dang // bu dang chung ma rgyal srid kyis// dang por bla ma mnyes byas la// thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa byung // phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// rang byung ye shes rang sdang ba// gcig dang
138a2(rnying rgyud): du ma med tshul gyis// bden pa gnyis med 'brel ba nyid// byin brlabs sgra dang gtan tshigs kyi// rang 'byung ye shes mngon du snang // rang gnas 'khor lo bsam mi khyab// rtog ge'i spyod yul ma gyur pa// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// 'phel dang
138a3(rnying rgyud): dga' bde longs spyod phyir// rgyas pa'i las la 'bod par bya// dbang chen gzi byin che ba dang // rgyal rigs blon po bram ze dang // gdug pa dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// rjes dgug dbang gi las brtsam mo// dgra dang bgegs sogs ma rungs pa// gang gis 'du
138a4(rnying rgyud): bar mi nus pa// gzir zhing 'du shes bsgyur ba'i phyir// drag po bsgral ba'i phrin las brtsam// gang yang rung ba'i dngos po la// dang po mi mthun zhi bar bya// de nas yon tan rgyas par bya// de nyid dbang bsnga las la sbyar// gal te dbang du ma gyur na// drag pos
138a5(rnying rgyud): byung bya// ga nga sa// 'ag na garnam nga / ngas pa 'a / rgyu sa pa ste// sa pa rgya smras
138a6(rnying rgyud): thogs pa med pa'i phrin las 'grub// zag med lam la goms sbyangs pas// tshe 'phrul bzhi dang phrin las bzhi// gdul bya zhing drang nus mthu dang // byin brlabs rtsal gyi khyad par 'phags// mthar phyin sku lnga'i zhing thob pas// ma N+Da la chu dang rlabs bzhin du/
138a7(rnying rgyud): dpag med yon tan ngo bo'i phyir// lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las yin// las dang nyon mongs gdug pa dang // sdug bsngal rtog pa ji snyed pa// cho ga thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis// lhan ne lhang nger zhi bar 'gyur// nga rgyal rin chen gzi brjid kyis// dpal dang long
138b1(rnying rgyud): spyod 'phel ba dang // tshe dang lang tshe stobs ldan zhing // yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// 'dod chags rdo rje ting 'dzin gyis// bdud dang gdug pa rgyal po dang // lha dbang srin po mkha' 'gro ma// phyag na rdo rje'ang dbang du 'gyur// zhe sdang rdo rje ting
138b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gyis// cho ga rdzas dang sngags ldan pas// chos sku rdo rje'ang 'jig 'gyur na// gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos// rang lus bde chen kun gyi dbyings// rang lus thig le'i thabs mkhas pas// skyer ba rlung gi goms stobs can// dkyil 'khor
138b3(rnying rgyud): nang la gnas gyur pas// nyams kyis las bzhi gsal gyur te// rim pa ji bzhin 'gyur ba dang // rang gi mngon par gsal gyur pa// nus pa brtan pas mngon du 'gyur// gzhan min 'khor lo pho brang nyid// gnas dang 'jug dang gzung ba dang // bstim
138b4(rnying rgyud): zhing gnas pa gang yin pa// de dag nyid du bshad pa yin// d+harma tsakra gzhal yas khang // rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad dkyil na// oM bi ma ya las bzhi dbyibs// kha dog las kyis gtsor gyur pa// bag chags sa bon snyigs ma dang // rtog dang tha mal zhen
138b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdzas// nyams myong 'gyur med bzhir gnas te// thig les de nyid zhi ba dang // rang lus phyi nang thig les rgyas// rlung dang thig le rtog par bcas// nus pas dbang du 'dus pa dang // thig les ma bcos nam mkha'i ngang // srog dang thig ler bcas
138b6(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa// a yi dngang du thim 'gyur de// rgyu ba drangs shing 'phang ba gnon// mi 'gyur dbyings la gnas par bya// rang lus thabs kyi ngo bo las// 'khor lo bzhi dang me rlung dang // bskyod pa rlung gi sa las rung bsra// nam mkha'i ye shes cing yang gsapa//
138b7(rnying rgyud): thig les rgyud dang lus rgyas pas// bde chen dbang thobazhin chags bral// ting 'dzin skyong bas gang bskul na// rim pa'i rtags dang nus pa byung // kha dog grangs dang snying po dang // dbyibs dang tshad dang thig le yi// khyab pa la sogs mtha' yas pa/
139a1(rnying rgyud): bzhugs tshul de nyid de bzhin no// 'khor la bzhi yi thag khung du// gtum ma byin za'i las bskul bas// dngas snyigs rtog pa'i bag chags dag/ me shigs thig ler mchod pa phul// phyi nang rgyab ma lus pa// rang 'gyur 'khar
139a2(rnying rgyud): thig le mchog/ spyod yul thun mong ma lus pa// phyi yi rnam pa lam byed pas// thun mong phyi yi lam du bshad// de nyid nang du rtsi 'khor lo// thig les nang du nyams skyed pa// rim pa 'di ni nang du bshad// dbang thob sbyangs pa ma rtogs pa// skal ngan
139a3(rnying rgyud): rigs chad yul min pa// gsung bas gsang ba zhes bshad do// dang por blo ldan gang zag na// ma lus bden pa dbyer med la// rang bzhin rig pa'i gtan tshigs kyiso// phung po khams dang skye mched la// thabs dang shes gnyis med pa'i don// yin
139a4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas rdzogs pa nyid// de nyid dus gsum ma skyes pa// gang la brten nas rtogs pa la// lam gyi yan lag kun rdzogs te// sa bcu rim par ma bkod rdzogs// ma lus yon tan rang shar bas// thams cad ma lus ma 'da' la// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i
139a5(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu nyid// dbang po cig n+d+har spyod yul yin// gangasu blo dang myos pa dang // rtogs chung mtshan ma dga' ba la// thun mong ska mthun khyad par can// rim pa'i rnal 'byor bslab par bya// dang por gyi nang snod bcud kun// rang sa nyid na mi dpags pa// ma bcos
139a6(rnying rgyud): ma bsal myi gnas pa// dngos po ci la'ang mi brtag cing // de nyid la yang mi rtog pa// 'dzin rtog zhen pa mi gnas par// bsam dang bsam bya med tshul gyis// bdag gzhan gyi nang ma lus pa// gang gi ngo bor ma grub pa// ci la'ang mi gnas sbyor ba yis//
139a7(rnying rgyud): rang sar mi rtog ngo bo nyid// bcos pa med pa'i tshul du bsgom// gal te mtshan ma'i rgyu ba dag/ chu las rnyog pa'i tshul byung na// ma bcos rang bzhin bzhag pa yis// ma lus rtog med de bzhin nyid// rang bzhin bzhag pas dag par 'gyur// nam mkha' dag
139b1(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur ba'i chu// sbyin kyang dang 'byung dag pa ltar// khrung tsharang dran rtog ma lus pa// chos nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin no// gang du sbyang srid ma lus pa// phyi nang med pa'i sems nyid de// de nyid stang pa'i rang bzhin du// goms shing nus pa brtan pa che// de nyid
139b2(rnying rgyud): rdul dbyer de nyid ni// stong pa chen po rnal 'byor yin// sgo gsum byed spyod ma bcos pa// ma brtags mi rtog cir mi gnas// 'di ni rnal 'byor rtse gcig pas// bya ba spangs pa'i spyod pa yin// de nas de las langs pa'i tshe// sgyu mchu zla smig rgyu dang // 'ja'
139b3(rnying rgyud): chen dbu ba chu bur ltar// snang yang dngos por gnas ma yin// rig pa phyi nang ma lus pa// stong pa'i cho 'phrul snang du zad// ma lus rig pa'i ngo boste// de yang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ltar// zhon chags med pa'i tshul du bsgom// ye shes sgyu mo'i cho 'phrul ni// dpag med pa/
139b4(rnying rgyud): bo rang snang yang // byin brlabs cho 'phrul dang snang ba// de ltar ma rtogs dman pa la// rang 'byung snying rjer 'chang ba'i phyir// snying rje chen po rnal 'byor yin// 'gro ba gang dang gang dag las// snying rje chen po gang gzigs pas// sna tshogs mdzad pa'i tshul nyid kyis// de
139b5(rnying rgyud): snyed spyod la mtha' yas te// don dang mthun pa 'ba' zhig ston// tha mal pa dang thabs nyid dang // lus ngag yid kyis ci 'tsham par// den 'gyur spong pa bsam mi khyab// gang du byams dang snying rje yis// ma khyab ming gi rnal 'byor te// theg pa chen po'i rigs
139b6(rnying rgyud): chud cing // dman pa'i rigs su gyur pa yin// rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ste// nam mkha'i ris dang dbyer med ltar// ma lus rang rgyud bral ba yi// ngo bo bden min brdzun pa min// chos rnams ming tsam dngos po med// sgo gsum
139b7(rnying rgyud): di yang brtan pa ni// thugs rje chen po spyod pa yin// de nas sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid// rang bzhin gnyis med rig pa ni// yi ge hU~M du gsol 'ar bsgom// phyi nang stong bcud ma lus pa// 'gro 'dus hUM du gsal bar bya// rdul phran de snyed 'dus pa las// thig le tshe
140a1(rnying rgyud): dmigs stong bar nga // ma dpas las nyi zla'i gdan// gang bsgril nu ba cas gsal bar bya// dang rang gsung yang 'gal ba mad// sgril mdza skang ba ldag mtshan ta// 'gro 'du mdu dang bzhin su// gas pa la sgron dang bral bar banas/
140a2(rnying rgyud): nas rang rang tshad gyur pa// rigs pa'i phrag rgya chen po nyid// zhi dang khro ba skabs nyid du// ji ltar 'thad par bsgom par bya// yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// yang na zhal gsum phyag drug bsgom// gnas gcig gnas gsum gnas ldang yang /
140a3(rnying rgyud): lag g+ha ni tshang bar bsgom// sems nas bstims te spyod yul kun// de ltar gsal bang brtag par bya// rtsa ba gcig pa'i lha bsgom pa// phyag rgya gcig pa'i rnal 'byong yin// sgo gsum bsgom la rab 'bad pas// rnam par g.yeng ba'i chos nyid 'das// ma
140a4(rnying rgyud): lus rtse ba'i spyod pa ste// rdzogs gcig pa yi spyod par gsus// de nas rtog pa'i yan lag dag/ gnyis gathabs dang shes rang bya// brtags tu de ltang brnam par bya// rad byer 'grob 'brug sum nyid// yang na legs la nyid de// gnas gcig mi nga sa
140a5(rnying rgyud): par bya// de bzhin gtso gtsom dang // sems da dra dang ni sems ma dang // rgun zhwa pAskal pa dang // 'ad myos dgag 'du shes par bya// zhale dang phyag dang lha grangs dang // chom bu smras pas smyos pacas yid// sku gsung thugs dang yodan tan las/ chom du
140a6(rnying rgyud): khra bcas bsgom// yang nas gsung thugs ldan pa'i// tshe mthug su ma dang bcas pa 'i// sa khro ma kha dang bskum// rigs TI ga tu ste thugs kyimachog/ khro bachags dang bzlas pa yi// myos pa'i dz+wal dang snang ba yis// tsho mabu gcig pa'i rna
140a7(rnying rgyud): bskum// slob dpan mthar nyo'i pha ma gnas pas// kyang grags depag tshad la sogs pa// rdo rje thig chad por tsam gyis// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal ldan pa// sna tshigs dkyil 'khor mchog tu bsungs// dang rgyang grabs dkyi la rang to// de nas
140b1(rnying rgyud): dpag tshad dkyil 'khor nyid// nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom// de nas yo byad lnga ldan pas// ting 'dzin mos pa spyod mthun pa'i// skye bo tsam du grangs mthun pas// tshom bus 'dod pa'i don bsgrub bya// thabs dang /
140b2(rnying rgyud): shes rab 'brel pa yi// pho mo 'dus pa'i grangs mnyam par// yo byad 'dus pa'i tshogs ldan pas// dgon par 'khor khang rab brtsigs te// rang rang thabs dang shes rab tu// brtags te yo byad longs spyad cing // rdo rje glu bro gar thabs kyis// zhag ni sum cu phrag
140b3(rnying rgyud): drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// tshe la dbang sgyur zag med thob// de nas brgya phrag bcu drug gis// sku lnga lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// skye bo mdza' ba kun tshogs pa// rnal 'byor 'dus pa'i tshogs zhes bya// 'byor pa'i longs spyod tshang bani
140b4(rnying rgyud): bde ba'i longs spyod tshogs su bshad// lha dang dam can kun 'dus pas// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs su gsungs// thams cad spyod pa mi 'dzin pas// tshogs gnyis rgyun du rdzogs byed pas// tshogs chen po ru nges par bshad// bar chad med pa'i lam rdzogs
140b5(rnying rgyud): pas// rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa med// lha ma cha byad 'dzin mod kyi// 'byung lnga cho 'phrul dbang sgyur thob// zhing dang longs spyod dag pa yis// grong nas gong du mnyam par sbyor// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin gyi sgra// zhing khams kun la gnas par byed// gal te mtshan mang zhen
140b6(rnying rgyud): dbang gis// rtogs pa'i stobs ni chung gyur na// byang chub phyag rgya rdo rje sku// mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa// cha lugs mngon du byung na yang // zhi ba de nyid mthong ba min// gang du sbyar ba'i yum rnams kyang // thun mong lam dang skabs gnyis su// nus pa'i khyad
140b7(rnying rgyud): par che chung gis// phrin las bzhi ru bshad pa ni// dkar mo bong chung skad che la// bzhin lus gzug phud g.yas su 'khyil// yan lag phra 'jam skad gsal zhing // rlung khar lci bas zhi ba bye// zla dang yan lag mang ba dang // phra zhing bshan la gzangs su ring //
141a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin lus ser zhing gru bzhir gnas// rnam 'phyangs sha dang num rgyas// 'phel ba'i dus su 'di dag gzung // bzhin mdog pad 'dra sog ka la// sprin dkyus ring la stod smad phyed// lus dang chu rlung dri zhim zhing // bde ba ldan zhing yan lag med
141a2(rnying rgyud): 'di ni sdud pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// nag mo gru gsum rtsid mgo ma// khro gnyer byis pa'i lus ldan zhing // gtum zhing brlang tshig 'dzem pa med// gtsang ste'i rtog bral gsod par bshad// gang du nus pa brtan thob pa// de dag sa nas sngar skyong ba// rig pa'i
141a3(rnying rgyud): bu dam pa nyid// rnal 'byor rim pa'i lung ldan pa// ma skyes mnyam la dbang sgyur zhing // ma lus gsal bar mthar phyin pa'o// rang rig ye shes rgyud don phyir// rang snang rig pa mngon byas pa// rig 'dzin mchog ste lhun grub pa'o// ting 'dzin nus pa'i mthu
141a4(rnying rgyud): med kyang // sa skyong sems dpa' bskyed du med// bder gshegs nyid dang spyod yul gcig/ rig pa'i skyes bu'i lung thob pa'o// gal te 'byung ba'i lus 'jig na// bdig nyid sgo gsum lhang lta zhing // 'byung ba bsags pa'i lus las grol// ting 'dzin phya
141a5(rnying rgyud): rgya chen por smin// khyad phrug sbubs dang bral ba ltar// ma lus phyag rgya sgyu ma'i mchog/ rnam par smin ces de la brjod// zag pa zad pa rdo rje lus// phyin cad 'gyur 'jig chos dang bral// bde ba chen po lung thob pas// zag bcas bslab pa'i chos
141a6(rnying rgyud): bral// zhing la dbang sgyur sprul pa'i lus// ting 'dzin longs spyod dpag tu med// bsgrubs pa'i nus pa gang brtan pa// rdo rje lus g+har 'jig pa med// 'jig pa lnga phral zag pa zang // dbang sbyar gsum la dbang thob pas// bde ba longs spyod dang
141a7(rnying rgyud): tu med// grangs med bskal par don byed cing // mthong bas de bzhin gnyis med rigs// rgyal tshab skyes bus skyong ba// phyi nang snod btud ma lus pa// nam mkha'i lta bur dpag med cing // mtha' dbus bsam pa'i rgyun las 'das// 'ji
141b1(rnying rgyud): bla dbugs phyen mya ngan 'das// rang stang dpag med zhal mthong bas// gzhan du blta ba'i yul dang bral// ting 'dzin rig pa goms pa'i mthu// mtshan ma lhag po yul las 'das// 'jig rten stong phrag dbang skyer zhing // gnyis med phyag rgya chen po'i
141b2(rnying rgyud): rigs// nam mkha' mthar thug med pa ltar// bsgoms dang nus pa'i rtsal stobs kyis// bag chags mtshan ma'i tshang tshing la// ting 'dzin rig pa'i me byung bas// zhing khams rgya bral dpag med du// ting 'dzin rig pas gang sbyangs pa// bsgoms dang tang
