141b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rig pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lung thob pa// phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin yin// de nas rig pa'i rtsal rdzogs shing // ye shes lha mo rol dbang gis// mthar phyin rig pa'i skyes bu ste// zhing khams bye ba'i dbang thob cing // rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyisras// dab
141b4(rnying rgyud): dang tshe 'phrul kun thob pa// nam ma pa'i mtha' ltar dgongs pas khyab// mnyam bzhag rjes thob khyad par gyis// rgyal ba'i lung mnod bka' la gnas// zhing khams dag par dkun spyod kyang // rmad 'byung gsang ba'i rang bzhin la// spyod kyang lta ba'i rang bzhin gyis/
141b5(rnying rgyud): phyugs bral nam mkha' mi mthong bas// dbang deng dgongs pasas pa sbyin 'gyur// dbang dang dam tshig brtul zhugs te// dang ba bslab pa mthang sbyin cing // bik+ka rtags par 'dod pa'is// gsang ba nang gdon la snang // phun ming bya ba mthar min nas// lu dang /
141b6(rnying rgyud): spyod yul bcas pa dang // lha yi rnal 'byor ma lus pa// bde chen thig le nyid du blta// lha dang bde bar mnyam sbyor bas// thig le bde bar snang po nub// sku bzhi dkyil 'khor khams thig le// dngas ma lnga ru mnyam sbyar bas// ngo bo dang ni rkyen dag gis// thabs kyi
141b7(rnying rgyud): rim pa bskul pas shes// bde ba'i thig le nyams myong ba// mi rtog bde ba cha shas med// mi shigs thig le kun gyi bdag/ stong nyid 'brel pa'i ngo mo can// tha mal bya ba kun bral ba// spyod pa nyid du bstan pa yin// thig le bzhu bi'i rang bzhin gyis// 'dzag 'dar
142a1(rnying rgyud): thim ga bang+gA shAng+ga// smra yang bzhugs sa dade bas bcwaH// ba na pa ga pa shus// til thu rba kyis khyab pasgyur// ma lus byan pa 'a rnas glang ba// mthas 'di dang snying ba ltar// snang srid thog la min pa rgyang // bad+ma chen pos bya
142a2(rnying rgyud): bdags pa// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig ldan// khams sde 'dres pa'i snying po ste// me shegs thig le bde ba'i brdud// malus bde pa'i rgyas btab pas// rnamam pa'i la shes cing yang gsal// rjes ga ma ba'i dgangs pa ste// jig la gcig gis sun b+ha
142a3(rnying rgyud): sa/ nga/ ma sa #
142a4(rnying rgyud): bcas// sa bon thig la bde bas brgyan// mi tog thig le rdzogs mchog ste// rang lum smin nas snang bar s+ho// gang nas gang lagos byung ba// de srid theg pa'i phyag tu ste// bde ba'i thig 'a grangs las 'das// ye shrIs ste dang / gsung thugs// mi myed pa
142a5(rnying rgyud): gang khyab pas// grangs 'das bde chen tshogs rdzogs nas// ma lus bde ba'i phyag kyar snang // gang de de yis rgyas btab pas// de nyid bde chen thig leng ljin// rnam pa phye nang snyigs mar bcas// bde chen thig po 'ang bar smin// snyigs ma 'byung brje lus
142a6(rnying rgyud): las 'das// snying po bar chad med pa'i lus// thig les bla ma'i snod gang bas// ma lus bde ba chen por smin// de nas thabs dang ting 'dzin dang // rlung gi 'dren pa'i stobs ldan pa// rin chen lung gi thig ler zhugs// skad cig mngon shes lngar smin cing /
142a7(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba ris dang thar par 'gyur// mi shigs a la thig le thim// babyung 'jug med pa'i rlung 'job cing // 'gyur 'jig med pa'i lus la gnas// 'phel 'grib med pa'i bde ba nyid// snang ba thig le nyid du ste// thig le chung ngus du bim// gnyis med pade
142b1(rnying rgyud): cha shas bral// 'di ni zag med rang byung ba// rkyen dang bral ba'i bde chen nyid// dper na me dang tsha ba 'am// rgya mtsho dang ni dran bzhin no// rlung dang thig le rig pa dang // tshe dang longs spyod 'byung ba dang // 'dod lha kun la dbang sgyung thob// bde ba'i phyag rgya
142b2(rnying rgyud): chen po ni// ma lus zag med thig le ste// rgya bral rig pa'i thig le nyid// snyigs ma'i zag pa rlung zad pas// ting 'dzin bde chen thig ler gsal// rig pa bde chen ror gsal bas// ci mthong bde chen phyag rgya nyid// 'du bas sgyur ba'i spyod yul lam/
142b3(rnying rgyud): mun 'gyur dug rtsi ji bzhin du// rgya dang bral ba'i zhing khams dag/ bde chen phyag rgya chen por 'gyur// gang dag bsgoms pa'i skyes bu ni// tha mal pa dang brkam chags pa// rnam pa'i spros pa ma lus pa// bsgoms dang ched du ma byas par// bde chen thig ler lhan
142b4(rnying rgyud): gyis grub// dper na chu dang rlabs bzhin nam// rgya mtshor phyin pa'i 'du shes ltar// goms pas bde chen gsal mthar phyin// rkyen dang gnod pa ma lus pa// reg dang mthong thos dran pas kyang // bde chen thig le nyams su 'bor// bskal pa du mar gnas gyur/
142b5(rnying rgyud): cing // 'byung ba lnga dang spyod yul kun// rang lus bde bar bsre ba 'grub// gsang ba'i lam la goms byed na// mtshon byed rig pa'i bde ba yis// lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rtogs// mthar phyin lam gyi rim pa 'grub// dbang po dang zhing chags pa dang // bde
142b6(rnying rgyud): chen mos pa'i rnal 'byor pas// oM dang baM la gnas pa yi// byang chub rdo rje dril las 'byung // dngos po lhan cig skyes pa yis// ma lus bde bar rtogs byas la// phyi nang sbyor ba'i cho ga yis// gang zhig rtags dang ldan pa'i tshe// gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi ldan pas/
142b7(rnying rgyud): ngade chen mchog la rol par bya// ye shes nyi zla mnyam ldan pas// re dgas chad pa'i thig la 'byung // klung med gnas dang thim pa dang // bdag po gdung can phrad pa las// nyon mtshan bral ba'i snang bltar// dus gcig nyi zla shar ba'i tshe// ma lus bde bas khyab
143a1(rnying rgyud): na// gas ba med pa 'theg la 'chang // gal te nyams pa'i ltas byung na// thabs dang nyams dang ngong pa yos// 'om pa bzhin du 'aslab par bya// thabs dang shas rab gnyis med pa'o// he zla 'dres pa'i theg pa nyid// dngas thag na chagasas
143a2(rnying rgyud): pa nyid// rgyal ba kun gyi phyag tu yin// lhan cig skyes la gnas pa'i tshe// ma lus bdi nan gcig pas// bde med phyag tu gcig tu gnas// rdo rje badz+ra thig la nyid// sa ya bcug supa phrag gnyis \u0f7f// nyizla 'dres pa'i gar zangs kyis// sas dad pa'i tha
143a3(rnying rgyud): dra// thig les gang bar smras par \u0f7f// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// nyams myong ngo yis rgyas btab pa// pras kyi bdeb mthang byin nas// rtswa rkyen rten 'khrel las 'das pa'i/ rig pa'i bde ba la gnas bya// gal te nyams na bsam pa 'am// blta dang mnyan
143a4(rnying rgyud): pA la sogs pas// bar chad med par bsgom par bya// rig pa bde bar gang sbyin pas// sgo gsum bde ba chen por sbyin// spyod yul rlung dang thig ler bcas// goms pa'i thabs la dbang sbyar bas// rten dang brten par bcas pa yi// thig le rlung la dbang phyur
143a5(rnying rgyud): zhing // lha mo mi mo gnod sbyin mo// mkha' 'gro rnams la dbang byed nus// thig le dbang ba dang 'dzin pa dang // zlog dang sbyor la dbang sbyar te// gal te mkha' la 'phos pa'i tshe// dngos grub lam dang bral ba yin// phyi chad mchod dang nus pa sbyin// rang gi skabs
143a6(rnying rgyud): nim gtogs pa// gzhan du thig le mi ltung zhing // dbang sgyu rwa lam la goms par bya// nyi zla 'dres pa'i bde ba nyid// thog med snying por thim pa'i tshe// sems kyi bde bar rang snang zhing // sems kyi bde ba bar chad med// gsal byed stobs dang bral ba'i tshe//
143a7(rnying rgyud): pa lus pad chen phyag rgya ste// lus sems mnyam du gnas pa nyid// tshad dang byar kyis lo las dngas// dpag med bde ba'i rol mo ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi dpes chen te// thika le sa bon zag pa bral// ngade chen nyams myong thun ma chad// rang nyid theg pa
143b1(rnying rgyud): tams myong bas// snying po'i thig la bral ba med// phra zhing rdul bral dri ma med// rdo rje thig le dril bu nyid// 'bad rtsol med par rang sdang ba// bral thob med pa 'ang bor gnas// gang du yon tan chags kyis rab rgyas pa// bde can du thun lta bu'i na las dang /
143b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs gnyis yongs rdzogs bdag gzhan lhun gyis grub// gzhan nu med de rang nyid sdang bar zad// rang bzhin gnas phyir gzhan nas 'ong ba med// zhen pa bzlog pas bdag zhal bdag gis mthong // rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi b+ha
143b3(rnying rgyud): po las lam gyi khyad par ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ma lus kun gyi bsgrub bya nyid// phyogs bcu ma lus rdul snyed kyi// che ba'i yon tan bshad par bya// mthar phyin la yi rang bzhin no//
143b4(rnying rgyud): rtogs dang 'bras bur gnas mod kyi// mthong dang goms dang grub pa nyid// thun mong 'bras bur yang dag bshad// yang dag mthar phyin 'bras bur ni// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// dpag med yon tan ldan rdzog
143b5(rnying rgyud): pa// tshad dang dmigs pa las 'das pa// bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa ste// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dpag med pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni// ma lus mchog gi gter gyur pa// zad 'phel med pa'i nor bu ste// ma lus kun la mnyam
143b6(rnying rgyud): du gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin ni// mya dbyings tshod las 'das pa yi// ngag dang ma drag ci sdang yang // blang dor phrogs ris yongs kyis med// rang 'byung ngod gsal mnyal pa// ma lus gcig gi rang bzhin te// thugs rje'i byin brlabs tshad
143b7(rnying rgyud): bas// ma lus bsam pa rnying bar mdzad// rang byur ye shes spyan grub ni// chosas kun gyi ba'is// ma lus phyogs med rang snang yang // zhen dang ched du byas pa med// sa dang lam la sogs pa yi// theg pa kun gyi 'bras bu ni// rang rang ltos pa'i
144a1(rnying rgyud): mthang thug kyang // tshe mchog lhun grub mnyam dang bral// skad cig nyid la spyan rdzogs pa'o// sangs rgyas dpag mang yan tan rnams// rigs bdag rdo rje 'chang chen thos// ye shes lha ma la dbang gis// nyi zla'i bad ba mngan thob ste// rnga rdza
144a2(rnying rgyud): 'chang gis la bkod// dpag med rgal ba thams cad kyi// 'gro ba'i gdal bya mtha' yas pAp+pa// sra gsung thugs kyang de bzhin te// bzhugs tshul dpag med rnam par snang // che ba'i yon tan lhan rdzogs pa'i// sangs rgyas drug pa'i rang bzhin te/
144a3(rnying rgyud): pa sams gcug sa mtshan pa yis// bdu chen pa shes rgyas pa gnas// bcwa drug 'azugs gas byung// sa mjun parje'i nas nyid// sam byas pa rnag / na tan dag nyid gnas// sangs rgyas zhing 'das ma
144a4(rnying rgyud): yas pa'i// nam mkha'i mtha' thug bar du ni// gdul bya'i rdul skyed gnas kyi bar/ skad cig 'du 'bral med par gnas// bcud 'das thig le chen po ni// bde ba'i zag med thig le ste// a dang badre bar 'brel pa yi// ma lus khyab pa'i tshul du bzhugs//
144a5(rnying rgyud): thig le'i bye brag brgyad cu'i rtsa// bcud 'dus gsang ba'i thig le'i ro// ma skyes mnyam la gnas 'gyur zhing // ma lus gang ba'i tshul gyis ni// zhing khams phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa// zag med thig ler ro gcig pas// nam mkha'i gzugs can de bzhin
144a6(rnying rgyud): nyid// sa bzhi 'das pa'i khams thig le// dngas ma lnga 'dus snying po can// gsum 'dus mi 'gyur snying po ste// bdes gang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po// thig le ro yis gang phye ba// dpag med sku gsung yon tan thugs// bsam gyis mi khyab rang snang ba// thig
144a7(rnying rgyud): phyi nang dngas snyigs me lus pa// rang byung dang sa ma'i thig le nyid// gzhan med phyogs med rang spang ba/ phyogs med bde ba chen po nyid// gsang ba'i thig le chen pa ni// yon tan rdzogs pa dzang bste// bde chen po'i snying po las/
144b1(rnying rgyud): dpag med yon tan rnam par 'phrul// bde ba chen pa'i thig la ni// 'du 'phro bral bas zag pa med// phyogs ris 'das pas ma khyab med// thog mtha' med par mnyam pa yin// rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin te// thig lar la mnyam bzhugs pas// namam paSh+ra
144b2(rnying rgyud): mthas gtugs chos thams cad// bde ba chen por gsal bar myong // mtshan dang dpe byad tshad 'das pa// rang la rdzogs pa'i thig le nyid// ji snyed bde ba'i rol pa kun// rang la rdzogs pa nyid du gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba ni// rang 'byung jig pa chen po ste/
144b3(rnying rgyud): A li kA li zhu ba las// nam mkha' khyab pa'i bde ba 'byung // gsang ba'i thig le kun gyi rgyu// nam mkha'i thig le gsang ba'i dang // khyab pa chen po phyogs cha med// lus gnas rang bzhin me skyes pa// bde ba'i dbang phyug sa gsung thugs// nam mkha'
144b4(rnying rgyud): bung dpag tu med// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// gsang ba'i thig le bzhugs pa'i gnas// dpag med til 'bru rdul snyed kyi// rgyalwa ba kun dang lhan cig tu// ma lus bde ba chen po'i ro// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyis// ma gsungs rig pas nyams
144b5(rnying rgyud): btang bas// mi 'dzin longs spyod chen po'i gnas// rang 'byung nyi zla rten gyi ro// ma spangs 'dus pas 'du 'bral med// gsang ba'i thig le brjod 'dus pa// nam mkha' gang ba bde ba'i ro// gnyis med 'khril ba'i stobs las byung // mkha' dbyings byang chub
144b6(rnying rgyud): 'byor pa'i sems// ma btang mi smos thig la cha// nam mkha' rgyas pa'i mtha' bzhin du// bde ba'i tshad kyang dpag tu med// yab yum gnas pa'i grangs tshad kyang // nam mkha'i khams kyi rdul skyed do// ri re'ang bde ba'i dkyil 'khod ni// dril stod rnam
144b7(rnying rgyud): ma pa'i mtha' dang mnyam// yab yum gnyis mad 'brel pa yi// thangs dang shes rab thud 'dus pa// gang yang mo slo thig pa'i ro// snang gsum mtshan ma las 'das pa// sangs rgyas rin chen kun gyi bcud// bye brdul rnyed grangs 'das pa'i// mi sa kun dang /
145a1(rnying rgyud): lhan cig tu// mos dang chags pa'i khyad par gyis// cha lugs mtha' yas snang ba ni// la lar chags par lta ba'i tshul// de bzhin 'jam par smra ba dang // la lang 'khyud cing lta ba ste// la lang sen thabs zhal skyong zhing / la lan mnye
145a2(rnying rgyud): dang rdobs dang 'bud// 'gyed dang 'dud dang 'gying ba yi// dkar 'dzin ston dang lte ba ston// 'o dang 'ching dang dgod pa dag/ sna tshogs rol pa 'di dag gis// ma chags pa dag chags byed cing // chags pa myur du nyams par byed// tha skam myur du khengs skye
145a3(rnying rgyud): cing // bde chen lo tog skyed par byed// bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa yi// lha dang lha mo 'khor bcas pas// steg cing 'dzum pas lhan cig tu// rol cing glu ni len par byed// e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdeng tshe// lhan cig skyes pa mkha' lta
145a4(rnying rgyud): rdul dang bral ba ste// rdo rje pad+mar bcug bskyod pas ni brtags pa'i snang ba nub// ma lus khyab pas mkha' ltar dga' bar byas kyang dbang po rlung gis rlabs// bde ba'i sa bon zag pa rnams ni slar yang ldang bar byed// rgyu ba rnam par chad pa'i kha sbyor bde
145a5(rnying rgyud): ni// nam mkha'i rgya mnyam yun yang de srid bar du gnas pa ste// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni lha mo khyod la tshang ba ste// bdag ni khyod la bsten cing dga' bas mig bteg ma lus rgyal ba'i zhing du blta// gang tshe 'gro ba tha mal bder spyod yul la chags par zhugs
145a6(rnying rgyud): pa na// dga' dang bde dang rtse gcig yid 'ong 'dod par rab zhugs pas// dbang po gnyis rol nyi zla phrad cing bde chen mchog skyes che// skye rga na 'chi re dogs ngo tsha mi tsha grags pa'i chos brgyad tshod kyang byis pas mi shes so// gang zhig thabs dang shes rab
145a7(rnying rgyud): bral bas gsang ba'i don 'jug pa// rgya mtshol nis bon btab bzhin 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mi 'byung ste// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' thaskabs te// rgyal ba nyid kyang thabs dang shes rab bral bas byang chub rgya gu gtan nas skams te// 'di ni tra
145b1(rnying rgyud): du blangs pa yis// rdul snyed bcas pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// rang rang rgyan dang gos dor te// dpa' bo sgeg mo'i tshul 'dzin cing // dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed du// glu dang gar ni sna tshogs kyis// tha mal yid rtogs bcad nas ni// bde chen
145b2(rnying rgyud): yid ni 'phrog par mdzad// de bzhin dkyil 'khor bsam yas dang // zhing thabs bde ba rmad 'byung ba// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa// dpag med mtha' mas cire snang yang // rang byung ye shes byang chub sems// thig le gcig gi ngo bo las//
145b3(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa'i gang thabs sna tshogs kyis// 'dul ba'i dbang du ci yang spro// thabs la thabs kyis dbang sgyur bas// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// ngo mtshar ya mtshan rmad po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// thabs chen sgra ma rmad du byung //
145b4(rnying rgyud): sgyu ma skye 'gag med pa'i dbyings// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ thams cad rang rig byang chub sems// kun nas 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor te// kun gyi rang bzhin 'byung gnas nyid// bya ba byed la byas pa med// zad
145b5(rnying rgyud): dang 'phel ba med pa yi// dngos grub gter chen bsam mi khyab// ye shes thig le rang snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ mtha' dbus med pa'i ye shes ni// gcig ces 'di zhes brjod du med// nam mkha' dang 'byung rtag pa ltar// 'pho
145b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur med pas de bzhin no// nam mkha' mtha' dbus med pa bzhin// rang 'byung ye shes thog mtha' med// ma byung ma skyes byang chub sems// ye shes nyi ma'i 'od ltar gsal// sangs rgyas sems can grol ther kun// ma lus rang rig 'od gsal bas//
145b7(rnying rgyud): rang 'byung ye shes rang snang phyir// mkhyen dang bsgribs pa chung zad med// mkhyen pa'i ye shes nyag gcig la// rang gi cha shas chos bral bas// nam mkha'i mtha' thug chos rnams klan// skad cig ma 'dres tshul du mkhyen// rang rig byang chub sems nyid
146a1(rnying rgyud): las// mtho dman blang dor ma dmigs pas// 'khor ba'i ngo bor rang snang yang // ma chags skyon med pad+ma 'dra// dpag med yon tan ngo bo rnams// rang 'byung rig pa rang snang bas// ma lus ngo mtshar rgya mtsho rnams// rang snang gzhan las
146a2(rnying rgyud): thob bya med// byin brlabs cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos// rang 'byung nyid las rnam par spro// tshul ni rnam pa sna tshogs te// dag dang mi dag khyad par gyis// ngo bo gcig las ma g.yos kyang // mos pas mthong tshul de bzhin no// gsung ni nam mkhas khyab par ni// phyogs
146a3(rnying rgyud): rgya pa nags pa// rngas pa bzhin rgyu chags pa'i// bsam las 'dum thabs rna tshogs sna // thugs ni ma gas mkhyen pa'i thugs// na dang 'dre bcas brtser ldan pa'i// mngon shes mkhyen pa'i la shes s+ho// ye shes thags la khrud pa ma/
146a4(rnying rgyud): yon tan tshad khyad bral ba ste// nam mkha'i nor bu gter 'chang ba// dpag med bsam pa bskang ba'i phyir// byin brlabs yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul// phrin las byin brlabs rang snang ba// 'gro 'ong med pa'i don tshul gyis// dpag bsam bum dang rin chen gyi// bya byed
146a5(rnying rgyud): med par don rnams rdzogs// ma lus spros pa rnam dag cing // rang 'byung rig pa mtha' dbus med// ma lus kun gyi 'byung gnas te// bde ba chen po chos kyi sku// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni// gnyis med dang la kun rdzogs pas// de nyid tshad bral mnga'
146a6(rnying rgyud): brnyes pas// longs spyod yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku// sku gcig thig le'i ngo bo las// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// ji ltar 'dul ba'i tshul bzhin du// rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa'i sku// ma byung ma skyes don rtogs pas// ma lus dbyer med rdo rje nyid// mi
146a7(rnying rgyud): 'jigs gnyen po kun bral ba// rdo rje sku zhes rnam par bstan// gang du mngon par byang chub pa'i// 'od gsal nam mkha' mtha' dbus med// srub zhi mtha' yis ma reg pa// dang po mngon par byang chub pa'o// ma lus dbye ba mdza' spangs shing // de ltar kun dang
146b1(rnying rgyud): su gnas// dan kyis mams bya 'gyur ba// me da migs kya dang // ud / rgyug+sa nagasun la sa// ti 'dren dngas pas 'dus pa la// ba pong nul cos gang ldan pa// bdagagasu nam pa sa/ gdung du nga /
146b2(rnying rgyud): dang sa brgyas pas gargyams skyer// das pas sa / ma rnags pa sa // na nga / rten pa bar rnya pag su gang// gapamargyad sa
146b3(rnying rgyud): sa/
146b4(rnying rgyud): ma yang // mi tig ye shes grol ba'i thugs// gnyis med pade ga rten pa 'is// 'dud pa'i 'angs spyod stsa la rol// ma lus pa ba nga ba \u0f7f// 'di ni bde bachen po'i thugs// bdag gzhan nang ma mnga' yang // rang 'thung gnyis mA~M phyogs thab ngas
146b5(rnying rgyud): khyad par brtan pa'i gdos/ zag pa med pa'i thun nams dang // shes ba ba gzhi ga sa dang // di sa med par gyun pa sa// 'ad cing nags rnam par snang / gzhan yang lan tan che pa mthad dpas da pa'i dpa
146b6(rnying rgyud): su du
147a1(rnying rgyud): dbang drag la sogs pas// mtha' yas bzhis ni rnam par bsdus// lhun gyis grub par kun kyang 'grub// mdor na 'bras bu'i rnam grangs na// bsdus pas nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas// rdo rje sems dbu' sku 'phral dra ba gsang ba me long sa cang
147a2(rnying rgyud): chen po las lhun gyis grub pa ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin// dpag med rgyal bas dbang bskur ba// gsang ba'i bdag po sngags kyi mdzod// gter 'dzin rgyal po stobs po che// rang gi lag go/
147a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje nyid// dga' zhing mgu bas gsor byas te// bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa yis// rab tu bskor ba byas pa yis// 'jig rten drug tu bcas pa dag/ 'khrugs shing rnam par g.yo mdzad de// kun du rab g.yo rnam par g.yo// stong gsum 'jig rten 'khor
147a4(rnying rgyud): yug bcas// 'od dang sgra yis gang mdzad de// rmad 'byung sku gsung thugs rnams kyi// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rnam par snang // ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad 'byung gi// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang // 'dod yon lnga yis khang mdzad de// rgyal ba'i tsho gas
147a5(rnying rgyud): kun mnyes par byas// kun kyang dga' zhing mos pa yis// zhing / khams rdul dang mnyam pa yi// 'khor tshogs rnams ni bstod pa 'di// sna tshogs sgras ni glo ru blangs// oM AHhU~M a la la ho// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thugs ni mi s+ye ye shes bde ba'i shugs// mi
147a6(rnying rgyud): gas gsal ba'i thugs ni kun la khyab par gnas// gang yang dbyer med 'dus byas ma yin 'dus ma byas min skye 'jig med// dam pa'i thugs la byeng tshor g.yo 'grog ci yang med pas bde ho// sgra 'phrul dra ba ni sna tshogs sa 'bar bde ba'i sa/
147a7(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas ji ltar snang ba ngo bos dben// de nyid 'du ba'i thabs kyis da ltar yid 'phrog thim pa'i sgo// mthar yas sna tshogs bye brag ji ltar gsal yang nam mkha'i ngang du bye brag med te// skung phrul dra ba'i yon tan yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// mdzad
147b1(rnying rgyud): rgyun gyi 'khor lo dpag med rgyas par snang // 'gro ba rnams ni yid 'phrog bltas pas chog shes med par mdzes// rgyal ba ma lus yon tan rdzogs par snang la de dag mtha' thug med to// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gsung ni zab cing rgya cher nam mkha' 'dra// ma lus go/
147b2(rnying rgyud): zhing tshim mdzad rdo rje'i sgra 'byin spyan sgrogs pa// rdo rje sku chen mtha' yas mos dang 'thad pa de bzhin rnam par snang // sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i phrin las sna tshogs bya ba lhun gyis grub// bskal bzhing gi rdul snyed 'gro ba ma lus kun 'dul ba// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral
147b3(rnying rgyud): med pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'di ni rnam par rol to// de nas rgyal mchog skyes bu yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa// bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa la// gsang ba 'di ni gtad par mdzad// nga yi gsang ba'i snying po 'di// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstan pa
147b4(rnying rgyud): kun gyi rang bzhin te// ma lus kun gyi thabs su snang // gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa ste// dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul thugs kyi rgyud// chos rnams ma lus kun sdang ba// gsang ba'i me long thabs kyi rgyud// rgyal ba rdul snyed kun 'dus nas// dam pa 'di la bsngags par
147b5(rnying rgyud): mdzad// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud chen po// zab mo'i lung gi nges don 'di// rigs tshad dman pa'i gang zag gis// thams cad la ni me long ltar// bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang bas// ston pa gnyis la rgyab phyogs shing // brtags pa'i phyi rol chos la zhe na//
147b6(rnying rgyud): slob dpon la ni brnyas byed dang // rdo rje spun la sdang sems che// zab mo'i don la skur byed cing // gsang rgyud don la 'phya ba dang // ser sna rang phyogs chags pa che// dad dang dam tshig mi ldan zhing // rgyal srid rin chen mi gtong ba'i// phyi nang gnyis lha'i gang zag la/
147b7(rnying rgyud): bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// lus sems bral bar byed gyur kyang // gsang ba'i glegs bam mi bstan na// dbang dang dngos grub rnams kyang min// rmongs pas gal te byin na ni// de nyid mnar med dmyal bar ltung // dad dang dam tshig ldan pa yis// phun
148a1(rnying rgyud): sum tshogs pa kun gtong zhing // dam pa'i yo byad ldan gyur pas// lus dang srog la'ang mi lta na// dman pa'i longs spyod nams kyang min// theg pa che la mos pa dang // brtul zhugs snying brtser gus par ldan// rdo rje slob dpon ba
148a2(rnying rgyud): bkur zhing // skyon dang smyo ba yongs su bzod// bskal par 'grogs kyang yid mi 'khrug/ nyes dang legs pa ci la yang // ngo mtshar skyo ba'i 'du shes med// rang bzhin bzang dang tshul shes dang // 'grogs pas drug nang ma ldang ba'i// dam pa 'di la gas
148a3(rnying rgyud): ba gtad// slob dpon man ngagra mi ldan cing // gsang ba'i don la ma goms pas// rang rtags log pa'i tshad ma yis// gsang ba'i sbas don gtan la 'bebs// blun po mun pas chod pa rnams// log par zhen pa'i rjes 'brangs nas// mthong ba'i cho
148a4(rnying rgyud): la dmyal bar smin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya gsang chen snying po 'di// ma lus kun gyi gsang yin pas// rtogs nas gsal bar gang byed pa// dbang dang dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ste// bdag dang gzhan don lhun gyis grub// rdul skyed
148a5(rnying rgyud): zhing la bsnyen bkur zhing // tshogs kyi bla ma bsten byas pa'i// 'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te// de bas rgyal sras gcig gi yul// rnyed dang bkur stis 'tsho ba yi// grags pa'i stobs ldan rnam par spangs// a haM rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i sku
148a6(rnying rgyud): 'phrul dra ba gsong ba me long gi rgyud las mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra brdo rje sems dpa' gsang ngam long gi rgyud chen po rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la
148a7(rnying rgyud): midr-i dang / badz+re dz+nyA na ku myangs bskyad cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// slad nas bi ma la mi tra nyid la zom dge slong mas yang dang yang du zhus pa 'di gzhan la spel na dam tshig nyams so//
148b1(rnying rgyud): bod skad du/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
148b2(rnying rgyud): com ldan 'das longs spyod man po thugs brdu ngas bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdorje'i bdag sa sus mi lus byas pa med pa thams cad dang sa sam yin tham dang dbang med pa'i rang bden te// ngag min gyi gnas mazang da
148b3(rnying rgyud): bye 'a pa gi ci grus na sa sa kyang sa ba ga nga du ba sa dang yi na 'a sa nga drang ba byu nga/ ga
148b4(rnying rgyud): shes rin po che'i glo 'bur gyis mdzes pa/ rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad so so ma yin ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes kun du 'khyil pa/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che dbyibs dang kha dog
148b5(rnying rgyud): la sogs te// rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa'i tshad dpag tu med pa/ ye shes rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang / chun 'phyang dang / shar bu'i rgyan dang / gzugs sna tshogs dang / sgra sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs
148b6(rnying rgyud): dang / reg bya sna tshogs kyis phyogs bcur 'khrigs pa rang byung la/ mi sgrib par gsal ba'i rgyan bsam gyi sa mi khyab pas bklubs pa/ zlum par thar pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa'i phyi dang nang
148b7(rnying rgyud): med par kun du ying nang du gyur pan mi 'jigs pa sing ge'i khri dang / stobs kyi glang po khri dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rta'i khri dang / dbang gi ma bya'i khri dang / thogs pa med pa nam mkha' gling gi khri dang / rang bzhin gyis 'ad gsal ba ti zla dkripa 'khong dang /
149a1(rnying rgyud): gas pa med pa pad+ma na pa tsha'i gdan la skum dun dang thub med pa thams cad du yang zhal dz+wal gyi bar gsal zhing / mtshan dang dab byad du ldan pa/ bsam gros mi khyab pa rnams cad nga sku gsung thugs snga chags par kun du ltung ba/ sma bya
149a2(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i sku gsung thugs chen po las thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi phyag/ ye shes rin po che'i phyag 'bar ba can/ sku gsung thugs bsam mas mi khyab pa'i dbugasu ma dang
149a3(rnying rgyud): ldan pa 'di sa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de btsun gshegs panam par zhes pa dang/ de bzhin ga shegs pa gzugs / de bdin gshegs pa tshar ba'i rdul po dang / de bzhin ga shegs pa 'du shes rgal pa dang / de bzhin shegs
149a4(rnying rgyud): pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang / de dag kun kyang mthing ga dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / le brgan dang / ljang gu'i mdog tu 'chang ba/ btsun mongam pa'i snang ba'i dbyings dang / sra ba'i dbyings dang / mnyen pa'i dbyings dang / dro ba'i dbyings dang / bstod pa'i dbyings
149a5(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa/ btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kun du mtha' yas par khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs so// de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong ba dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje thos pa dang /
149a6(rnying rgyud): byang chub chen po rdo rje sdom pa dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje myong ba dang / btsun mi mthong bar bya ba dang / mnyan par bya ba dang / bsnam par bya ba dang / myang bar bya ba'i tshogs dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje thos byed dang /
149a7(rnying rgyud): chub chen brda rje sngam byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje myong byed dang / btsun mo 'das pa dang / da ltar 'byung ba dang / mabyon pa'i tshogs dang / 'joms pa chen mo dag pa dang / 'joms pa chen mo dag byed dang / 'joms pa chen ma ga shes dang / na
149b1(rnying rgyud): gapar ma yin pa dang / chad par ma yin pa dang / bdag tu ma yin pa dang / mtshan mar ma yin pa la sogs pa de lta bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi yang ba dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis
149b2(rnying rgyud): med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo // e/ e/ e ma'o// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dang / dbang sgyur ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs dang rang snang ba nyid
149b3(rnying rgyud): ngange 'dzin gzugs brnyan sgyu ma rnam dag gsal ba ni sgra dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las sel med pa'i yid bzhin nor bu rin po che mi zad par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i
149b4(rnying rgyud): ngo po de kho na nyid nges pa las gling gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje yid kun du bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshul rdo rjes btsun mo chos bya ba mo kun du bzang mo la 'jug par gyur te ched du
149b5(rnying rgyud): rjod pa 'di brjod do// oM chos kyi chos nyid shes bya'i dbyings// kun du bzang mo bde ba'i yum// ma g.yos rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni// bdag yin bdag gi spyod yul ba// phyag rgya sna tshogs so sor gsal// nub phyogs 'og min gnas mchog tu/
149b6(rnying rgyud): mchags pad+ma'i gdan bting ba// dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas// rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi la// phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag ldan// dbyang dang skal min gsal ba'i phyir// nang dang phyi rim lcags dang ldan// rgyal ba yongs kyi sbas
149b7(rnying rgyud): pa yi// sus kyang gting dpag dka' ba de// kun du bzang po nyid kyis gzigs// zhes brjod pas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun du bzang mo la 'jug par gyur to// zhugs nas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun du bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid kun du bzang po dang /
150a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med pa'i longs spyod bde ba la mnyam par gnas te ched du brjod pa brjod do// sems kyi sems nyid byed pa de gca// kun du bzang po rdo rje yid// ye shes drug gi rang bzhin te// shar phyogs mngon dga' bsam yas na// nA la
150a2(rnying rgyud): bu'i gter 'byin pa// gsang 'dus 'phrul gyi lteg mig gis// rnam par thar pa'i sgo lce nas// byang chub mchog gis nang gtan dkrol// mnyam spong pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// 'gro don byang chub sems bskyed nas// 'gro lnga skye bzhi dbang du 'i sus/
150a3(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs gnas dbang bskur to// zhes brjod pas thams cad mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje nyid du gsal bar gyur to// zhugs pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin dbyer med pas de bzhin gshegs pa
150a4(rnying rgyud): tid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'i rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu sman dang mA ma kI// me rung
150a5(rnying rgyud): gos dkar sgrol ma ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum yinas sangs rgyas shing // thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa min// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi rnyed do//
150a6(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to// de nas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun du bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid kun du bzang po dang gnyis su med par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e mdo phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye shes
150a7(rnying rgyud): dben// srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing // snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan nas// po lnga nyid mngon sangs kyis// thams cad mchog gi snying po bas// gzhan du rgyal bas chos ma 'chal// nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i cho/ la kya
150b1(rnying rgyud): sa badz+rang pas thams cad lanas sangs rgyas pa nga bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mthod to// gsang ba'i/ po lan na da ngas ba las kyang bsrung ba'i la' ga nyis pa'o// denas gnyis sa byung pa'i bdag nyid can thos pa shes sangs rgyas da
150b2(rnying rgyud): sems ye shes su bskyed pa 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gag
150b3(rnying rgyud): pa med las thams cad 'gag/ 'gag pa nyid na 'gag pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // gnas pa med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi ches// rdzogs pa'i
150b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs// dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong // 'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med// ces
150b5(rnying rgyud): brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad mnyes pas khyab par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos// sna tshogs
150b6(rnying rgyud): snang la rang bzhin gsang // ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gsang // gzhan du min yang shin tu gsang // zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas dbyer med na/ 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig
150b7(rnying rgyud): pa la 'gro ba lnga'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la thugs rje chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po skyes nas tshad du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o bde gshegs snying po las// rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul// sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang /
151a1(rnying rgyud): gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa// bdag dang bdag gis so sor 'dzin// sus kyang mi 'ching bcings med de// bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yin// nan gyis mkha' la mdung pa 'dar// bcings
151a2(rnying rgyud): med rnam par grol med pa'i// ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos// bstan phyir spo ba sna tshogs mdzad// rjes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems ye shes
151a3(rnying rgyud): su bskyed pa'i le'u skye gsum pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thugs rje chen po byin gyis parlabs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa dug de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las bton to// bton nas kyang las
151a4(rnying rgyud): kyi dbang gis sbrel zhi dang / yan man gyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs brgya mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po re re thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das de res 'dul ba rnam bzhis 'gro ba lnga'i don mdzad de ltams pa dang / rab tu 'byung ba dang / dka'
151a5(rnying rgyud): thub mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas pa dang / bdud btul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / cho 'phrul chen po ston pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa ston pa'i thub pa dus bzhi kun du mkhyen pa dang / thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud du kun du mkhyen
151a6(rnying rgyud): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis kun du gzigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi snyan gyis kun du gsan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi tsho gas kun du don spyod pa dang / zag pa med pas kun du bzang po'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i mngon par shes pa drug dang // kun du sra pa
151a7(rnying rgyud): mi khyab pa dang / kun du thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun du zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang // kun du gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa grangs med par yang phyogs bzung snang bar gyur to// de ltar
151b1(rnying rgyud): babargya nas spyod pa drub pa can pa tang drug bar zad pangs sa spyad nga y-is s+ho/ 'dras pa dbangadags spyad nga pa brog pa dang / nams bag pa dang / rangs skams theg pa dang / byang nasams dang byas pa dang / blan dung ba na
151b2(rnying rgyud): sa sa
151b3(rnying rgyud): gi pa sa sa na 'du sa nga migs zhes thong ba dang / gas kyi yang bya / sa ban ga shegs pa ngas
151b4(rnying rgyud): bdi spyod dang/ na sa pa'i dzi tan basbyin pa'i byed ba de gags nyid pa ni dang 'di do// se sa kyi lal ba ba sum las par// skyeng po me byed pa'o// gzhan kyis mi jigs 'ang gnakyal// ma 'a dang tham
151b5(rnying rgyud): dag byed pa'o// dedas bA dag shegs pa sa kyad kyis cid dza pa dzo // stong nga byed ga du la dU nga'ims / gtag pa'i ga mis gyis// nga gi 'jig rten pa mams pang / gyen nyin brel pa nyis su ba/
151b6(rnying rgyud): gro pa'i bag zugs sreg po yi// mamathun byede sdug phreng bar 'gyur// de nyid ji zhin ngas nyid dang // rang bsnyen pa dge nyidang tshu la gcig ste// rang basbyin te du la rnams pa da// yang dag sgyu ma'i yul ga smras// bdug dang bdagag gzhan me
151b7(rnying rgyud): nyi kyis sa// ye ga skye minyi bya gcig sa 'a dag ga de mam ni// thogs ga ba tus nyid mos// blo zhing zab pa mang min// thog tug cid byeng bya'o// gzhin dugal ba co mang mo/ ga
152a1(rnying rgyud): nyid kyang // gzham med de skad cigs// rnam par dag pa'i dbyings nyid tshul// nyid ladabang byung nyid spyod byer// bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyan// nam dag na med theg pa'i mchog/ theg pa bzhi pa pa ngas dadrung la// theg pas
152a2(rnying rgyud): kyi 'bras byung gnas// yang dag rtogs pas rabang rtag pan// rang bzhin med gcing yang 'byung// sangs rgyas mya ngan yang mi 'dag// chos kyang chub par mi 'gyur te// mngag smin mang gdul ba'i phyir// 'byung gnas mya ngan 'ad bang snyan// 'dul
152a3(rnying rgyud): sde chos mngon dang // dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// ji rnyed 'jig rten mtha' klas par// phyogs bcur kun du rab grags pa// gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros te// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di// snga stod kun dang
152a4(rnying rgyud): kun gyi// ston pa'i thub pa pas mi yas pa// 'byung gnas gtan la nges par 'babs// chos rnams meng du btags patsas// ston pa'i don dang mthu phyogs so// ming nyid rmi gtu btags nas bstan// rten pa tshig la dngas pa yang // zas badza ba
152a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis lhun gyis grub pa chen po gsal bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lhun gyis grub pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid su gsung thugs dang yon tan gyin las dza rje las byung ngo // a'i sring po
152a6(rnying rgyud): nyes dmigs bdag tu rtog las 'bros// rgyud drug ste 'gag lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas dang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa// log rtog nyid las gzhan du ci yang med// stong nyid bdag med yo ma khyen rang reg byags// dmigs byang
152a7(rnying rgyud): mad med pa dran dpang sbyar// ngo mtshang su gsung yon tan zhing khams la// gzhanan med de de nyid de ltar yin// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tung// thub drug gis sprul pa grangs med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa bya
152b1(rnying rgyud): 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos thams cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u skye bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad kyi rang bzhan
152b2(rnying rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor yod par bstan pa dang / rigs rgyud drug tu yang bshad// de la chos nyid kyi rigs ni thams cad kun la yang yod do// nam mkhas kyang kun la khyab par gnas so// de ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / nam ma pas kun la khyab kyang rnam par thar pa'i de
152b3(rnying rgyud): sa na me long g.yas g.yogs pa dang 'dra ste gzugs brnyan snang ba'i bya ba byed mi nus so zhes gsungs nas yang 'di skad rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so// mnyam nyid don rtogs rang rig rgyal po dang // rgya mtsho chen pong chu klung 'bab pa ltar// bla med don rtogs
152b4(rnying rgyud): zabs chen 'di dag tu// rnam pa'i theg pa bsam yas ma lus 'dus// a ho// bdag med gnyis rtogs pha rol byin rdzogs pa// sa bcu rim gyis bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas sar 'gro go 'phang thob pa'i lam// bden pa gnyis kyis rab tu
152b5(rnying rgyud): thob par 'gyur// phyi nang rten 'brel sgyu ma mig yor tshul shes pa'i// dngos po gzugs la thogs med rab tu 'jug/ dge ba shes mi slob rang gi rig pas rtogs// byang chub sar 'gro yid bzhin bde ba'i mchog/ bden bzhi don rtogs rab tu spong ba yi//
152b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes bcu drug cha sbyangs rab zhi pa'i// rgyun zhugs la sogs rim par sbyangs nas ni// nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sa ru 'gro// theg pa gang du bstan pa ma nges pa'i// yang na kun la mthun nas 'byam par 'jug/ yang na nges med 'di zhes brtag tu
152b7(rnying rgyud): med// 'di ni mangs rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs// dge bcu spyod cing mi dge spong byed pa// 'dod khams lha dang mi ru skye ba'i rgyu// tshad med bzhi spyod mi ga yo sgom byed pa// tshangs gnas lha sogs skye ba'i glu yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyis kun pa khyab gyur
153a1(rnying rgyud): nga// dang gartags pa'i nal dang mildan// deb+ha dngas 'ang na ma dag tsun pazlo// 'donags 'ad dgas cadas medan// ngas kyi sus du 'khyab payis// ma byig pa bas ma las gsungs pa
153a2(rnying rgyud): so rung rig sgrol sdang bar zad// ngan song dgro drug sna tshogs rgyab yang // 'khrul ba'i blo log rtog pa nyid snang ste// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings la 'gyur ba med// mi dmigs rang rig goms byas bla na med pa'i mchog/ log rtag bdag dang bdag gi
153a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gyur na// dngos med mi sdug sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur// yang dag shes pa'i rang rig blo med na// bdi gshegs zhing yang ngan song gnas su mthong // theg mchog mnyam pa'i don nyid rtogs pa ni// ngan song gnas nyid 'og min dga' ldan gnas/
153a4(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i dbyings ni de nyid bsam yis par // nyi zla gza' skang mtshan ma glog 'gyu dang // 'ja' tshon sprin mang sna tshogs 'khrugs gyur kyang // nam mkha'i dbyings pa gyur cing nyams pa med// mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings ni bsam yas par// sku gsung yos
153a5(rnying rgyud): tan phrin las rmed 'byung dang // 'jig rtog gtso mchog ma lus thams cad dang // 'khrul 'khor sdug bsngal sna tshogs nam mang// de bzhin nyid la 'phel zhing bri ba med// ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// hud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dpe las
153a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad la chos nyid kyi rgyu yod pa dang rigs gyud chad pa dung rigs brgyad so sor dbye ba'i mdong bshad pa'i lid-i s+t+wa~M lnga pa / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo dza'odakyus mchos
153a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo bar chos thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yig phreng ba 'i khor lo zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // a rab tu brtan 'gyu bas dkar las// shin tu phra ba'i arnams su/
153b1(rnying rgyud): gas can gang bar dgas la gyur nas// bzlas kyang 'pheg 'grib med par brtan// de las cang chags gsul 'bru smran// zhing bsdub 'drang bab na/ 'don rdodza dngas grub // na 'thung lags sngasanan// / ka ba gsang / nga
153b2(rnying rgyud): 1/ Ta TaDa D+ha Na/ ta thad d+ha na/ pa phab b+ha mo/ ya wA ra la/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+ShaM/ oM AM/ u A/ A e/ oM mo// 'di dag phyung bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs be rje mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos// rab tu g.yos kun du g.yos nas chos tham
153b3(rnying rgyud): cad ming gi mtshan nyid du gyur te// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// a ni stong dang mi stong gi// dbu ma dmigs su yod ma yin// thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun// yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas// a nyid sna
153b4(rnying rgyud): tshogs par snang ba'i// ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// sgra yi ming gis thams cad bsdus// mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges// oM mdo ngo mtshar ya mtshon gyi// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i ming // tshig rnams ma lusta 'dzin pa'i gnas//
153b5(rnying rgyud): tshogs don kun sla zhing ston// dngos med yi ge rang bzhin snyems// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang // dbyibs dang kha dog ming tshogs kyis// rol pa cing yang sprul cing ston// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi// ye shes sems dpa
153b6(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid// yi ge mgo nas k+Sha la rdzogs// sems ni rang bzhin yi ge ste// yi ge dngos po yod ma yin// dmigs med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che// sku gsung thugs ni ngo mtshar
153b7(rnying rgyud): ya mtshan 'phrul chen rab 'gugs pa// dbyangs la dbyings kyis bris pa ste// yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod// mgo ni mnor lam yin te// tshig ni shes rab ming du spras// shad ni thabs chen tshigs su gcod// a ni skye med de bzhin nyid// dza ni sgyu 'phrul
154a1(rnying rgyud): na smra/ sa su / nasu spyan / na
154a2(rnying rgyud): 'akyil pa nyid// na drabs pa du gyu/ na dun gyi gas ga/ sbyin lags kyi thags kyi mchog thugs kyang 'jig rjod par/ ma masgra ma na
154a3(rnying rgyud): gyi sku yi mchog/ dza ni shangs kyi sde yi mchog/ d+ha ni ljags kyi sku yi mchog/ ta ni sru~M yang 'jig byed pa'o// pa ni spyan gyi gsung gi mchog/ pha ni snyan gyi gsung mchog ste// ba ni shangs kyi gsung mchog yin// b+ha ni ljags kyi gsung gi mchog/
154a4(rnying rgyud): gsung yang 'jig par byed// yA ni skye ba rnam par drag/ wa ni gnas pa dag pa yin// nga ni 'jig pa dag pa ste// la ni stong pa dag pa'o// sha ni rtag ming dag pa ste// Sha ni rbad pa 'ang yod ma yin// sa ni mtha' bral bdag med pa// ha ni mtshan ma med
154a5(rnying rgyud): brjod// k+ShA ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs// i ni rdul skyed lha rnams su// I ni rdul snyed lha ma yin// A ni rdul snyed mi rnams su// uni rdu la snyed rgyal song rnams// e ni rdul snyed yi dwags su// oM ni rdul snyed dmyal ba rnams// oMn thams ca
154a6(rnying rgyud): 'jig par bye// oMnA rjems cad zhig pa yin// ga 'a kha~Mng+ge la tshogs chen 'dis// b+ha gsang zhugs pa/ slong ba nas// A d+hi// de nis de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo jigs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khong de dag nyid kyi gas dag 'di nyid
154a7(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo // a ho// thabs dang shes rab kyis sprin byang chub sems tshogs rgya 'khor lo// 'bras bu rgyal ba'i sprin grub ngo mtshar ming tsho gas bzhi bcu gnyis// 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas rdo rje dkyil
154b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'byin pa'i ngam// 'da' bar mi mdzad dbang med rgya rkyen tshogs pa'i mthu chen yin// a ho// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge 'khor lor gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las
154b2(rnying rgyud): yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo bkod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las shin tu gsang ba'i phyir gsang sngags kyi rgyud de'i phyi ba dang / nang pa thabs kyi rgyud gzhan la khams brgya brgyad du bstan/
154b3(rnying rgyud): gtsug lag thams cad la yang khams bcwa brgyad du bstan pa yin/ lung gi spyi 'di ni shin tu zab pa'i phyir khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bstan te/ lung gi spyi yang rgyud dang gsung rab thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin// gsang ba'i dbang po dang gsang ba'i yul/
154b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis ka yang / skye mched dang khams thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir shin tu gsang bar gsungs so// dkyil 'khor de dag shin tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir nyid la nyid ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos// thams
154b5(rnying rgyud): cad kun la rang bzhin gnas// ngang gis dag mnyam ma rtogs pas// kun la yod cing rang bzhin gsang // gzhan du min la shin tu gsang // don nyid kyis ni gsang ba'i rgyu// mnyam pa'i rdo rje can gyis gsung // 'di ni byang chub snying po mchog/ aH
154b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// dbang po yul du snang ba'i rnams// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// rigs lnga yab yum bcu ru 'byor// skye mched khams rnams bcwa brgyad po// sems dpa' sems ma'i dkyil
154b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor nyid// thams cad byang chub sems ma yi// rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang por 'dus// rdo rje dbang po gsang ba'i thabs// dbang po yul nyid shes rab dbyings// dbang po'i thugs ni rdo rje sems// thams cad 'byung ba'i gteng nyid dang // thams cad 'dra
155a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnas nyid // de las ma bsgred gang yang mad// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa g+ha// de la sa thams cad ste zhing 'byu// gnas lhag tu rgya yin te// brang ba byung chu bsgrub pa'ajas// da lus bskyed cang dalas hA// da ga drug
155a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad sgrub pa'i gnas// dbang po rdo rje pad+mod ldan// gnyis med byang chub sems 'phron// mi dmigs pa de dang longs spyod 'gro// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi rnams dang // mchod pa'i lha ma rdzogs ldan pa ni// 'jug dang
155a3(rnying rgyud): ljang dang gnas dang smon pa'i byang chub sems// ge yo dang bskyod dang ldang dang gnas// 'gug dang 'dzin dang de bzhin te// bsdus dang 'khril ba'i don bsgrub phyir// bsdams dang mi gtong dbang sbyar te// bde bsnga snyad phyogs brgyang sngags// shin tu sgeg
155a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzi brjid 'bar// yid bzhin rin chen phreng bar 'bade// dbyangs snyen yid 'phrog gzi ldan 'bar// gzugs mdzes bskyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo// kun du tshim byed bro bsung thim// lha mdzes rin chen phung po 'phro// 'od gsal 'gro bas kun du
155a5(rnying rgyud): 'bar// bdud rdzi bsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyings// a la la ho// gsung ba'i dbang po pad+ma ldan gyur nas// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis sa// pha rol sbyin baD+ha k+sha 'bras rdzogs// sa bcu rim gyis bkod med rdzogs// kun du 'od gsal bar sngan yang
155a6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab pa// yang dag rdzogs chen thabs dang ldan// rngabs dang shes rab klu mengs yang rdzogs// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs par rol// a la la ho// de bzhin nyid kyi gsang mchog las//
155a7(rnying rgyud): khams ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// bcwa brgyad po ni rgyud gzhan bzhin// gsum ni de bzhin kun gyi bdag/ pacwa brgyad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te// byang chub 'grub pa'i zhing yang yin// dade ba 'byin pa'i rgyu yang yin// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid rjod pa ni// dbang po
155b1(rnying rgyud): rjegs dpa'i rgyal// yul ni pad+ma bde mchog dbyings// sems ni byang chub 'byung ba'i gter// dbang po yul sems ldan gyur nas// gsang ba mchog gi 'phrul chen spro// dkyil 'khor rdul snyed grangs med dang // phun sum tshogs pa'i ldan grub rnam//
155b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba mchog gis 'byin par byed// 'di ni rtse gcig yin par gsungs// gsang ba'i don mchog 'dri dag ni// lta ba dman la bshad byas na// dus min par ni sgrog zad nas// mgo 'gas snying yang tshig par 'gyur// bab len gyis ni lcags su
155b3(rnying rgyud): ltar// mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par// ngan song mi kho ma bskal par brgyad par 'gyur// de bas 'di ni shin tu gsang bar bya// shes rab rgya chen blo zab yangs pa yis// blo brtan snying rje che dang dad ldan ngang tshul bzang la brtan// gzhan du nams kyang
155b4(rnying rgyud): sbyin ma b+ha zhes nyid la yang nyid brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsdus nas// thams cad ma lus par dbyings su bkod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi smon bkod pa
155b5(rnying rgyud): las sgyu 'phrul rnam par spros pa 'di ched du brjod do// rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te// yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor
155b6(rnying rgyud): mngon rdzogs pas// phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// dkyil 'khor thams cad grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsir 'gyur zhing 'byung ba dang // bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi nad spel cing // longs spyod 'byung zhing ngan song stong // ci yang gzhan du 'gyur bar 'grus
155b7(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' rdo rje skra 'byung zhing // 'bar nas mi yang 'chag pa dang // byur 'gyur 'bab pa'ang de bzhin te// 'jig rten khams ni gtang ba dang // thams cad stongs shing lgang bar 'gyur// dkrug dang btang dang bzang dang dgra'o// gis dong bsad da /
156a1(rnying rgyud): blam dang rgyal// tang 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// de nyid ye shes dang snang ba'i// chog gzugs chags pad bzhin gyis// mun pa snang byung ji bzhin du// 'gyur bas gser 'gyur stan sa rtul// sun pa mdzad ban rtags
156a2(rnying rgyud): pa gsal// dam tshig sngags dang phyag sa rnams// mnyams shes shing yo byad ldan// 'grub 'gyur mi ldan don med pa zlaka/ dus gsum rgyal bas thugs chud pa'o// dngos grub chog gi skyeng po ni// zad pa'i dus med yang bzhin mdzad// 'phel 'a
156a3(rnying rgyud): med par 'byung ba ste// dngos po med las dngos po'i sprin// sgra tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur// dngos rnams nyid na ngos med par// rtogs pa'i dbang sbyar teng 'dzin yin// gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa// dri yis chos kya dbyings mi shes// de
156a4(rnying rgyud): dngas dang dngos med pa// 'jigs pas dmigs med shes par gyis// gzhim med pa'i sems nyid ni// mo yi pa ni mid/ tshan med pa yi rigs rgyud min// kha dag ma 'i nang byibs mayin// gnas su ma yin gang yang man// de 'di
156a5(rnying rgyud): shes te// babs kyi rtag sa canam bya// thabs las bapas byang bas pas ma las// tha dang min la thang dpa'/ bye ba pa// kyis 'khong ngas pa yis ye shes ral// 'jigs me 'an pabang rgyas
156a6(rnying rgyud): myos 'dra'i sems// mnyam par bzhig pus baN+Dal nas su// sngags dang thug tus rabang rtenan// dus ga min chen por 'gyur// zhe sa brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzugs pas mnyes par gyur te// nu bzhi ga
156a7(rnying rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsang ba'i tshig 'di byung ngo // e ma'o snying po lam bcas pas// 'jigs med dpyis nyid kun bzang phyug rgya mchog/ rang bzhin sku gsung thugs chen po// byang chub ldan grub bdal ba'i ngang //
156b1(rnying rgyud): por kun bcas kun du gnas// de nyid rdzogs pa'i ngang las dngos grub kun shwar kun du gnas// a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyud pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
156b2(rnying rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor las lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis sngags 'chang rnams lhar sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di don yod par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ye nas rnam dag pa'i// thabs dang shes
156b3(rnying rgyud): rab ldan par gnas// byang chub mchog tu nyi zla shar// de nyid bzhugs gnas yin par gsungs// chos rnams thams cad bdag med pa'i// dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsal// gcig dang spros pa thams cad med// dkyil 'khor spros med rnam
156b4(rnying rgyud): po'i tshul// ye nas mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bu ldan// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// chos kyi 'khor lo yongs kyis bskor // thugs rje byin brlabs 'phros pa yis// ye shes bzhi yi dkyil 'khor spro// ye shes lnga
156b5(rnying rgyud): dang sku gsung thugs// byin brlabs ya mtshan bsam mi khyab// rang snang ba yi thabs las 'byung // bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pa'i// thugs rje rgyas pa'i gzhal yas khang // dbus mtha' med par rgyas par gnas// stong smon mtshan med
156b6(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal 'jug/ de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir bshad// der 'gro lam stegs brgyad dang ldan// rang bzhin yaM nas 'od gsal phyir// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gang na khri 'bar// ye nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir// ma tshogs pad+mo 'bar ba'i gdani// mad
156b7(rnying rgyud): med ye shes gter gyur pas// yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i gdan// ye nas mnyam nyid mi 'da'i phyir// ta la'i ljon shing rang bzhin gnas// re ba yid bzhin skong ba'i phyir// dpag bsam shing gi rin chen 'bar// yid bzhin rin chen rgyan
157a1(rnying rgyud): kyis bskor// thams cad la ni dbang sgyur phyir// 'jig rten lha chen rnams kyis bskor// gsang ba de nyid nges pa las// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis// thams cad lha nyid rtag tu sbyor// thams cad ma lus dkyil 'khor
157a2(rnying rgyud): mchog/ 'di ni rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dang // gzugs brnyan lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum// ting 'dzin lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/ byang chub sems dang tshogs mchog brten// zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
157a3(rnying rgyud): las shin tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsdus nas/ lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
157a4(rnying rgyud): bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhan grub ni// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// kun 'thung dkyil 'khor
157a5(rnying rgyud): chen por spyod// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhis brgyan par khyams dang // kun du gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan// rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// seng ge glang chen rta dang khrung // nam mkha'
157a6(rnying rgyud): lding gi khri chen la// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang // g.yas nas mthong thos mnam pa dang // myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas// gru chad la ni mthong byed dang // thos byed mnam byed
157a7(rnying rgyud): myong byed rnams// btsun mo dag dang bcas par gnas// bar khyams la ni thub drug dang // mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang // bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che//
157b1(rnying rgyud): drang sa tha~M su 'a'ang // sudul ba shang ltasags pacan// sangs tshul mnyes pa'o la byad 'ang// mthing ga ku bas dral bzhan// ltung gul sogs rdzogs pa'o// ma na ga zlog zus su'adu rdul nan// gsus 'gyu rnya gas na
157b2(rnying rgyud): byin can// 'od zer 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po// dbang ba'i phreng bas 'khyil ba ste// dbus mtha' med par khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor bas ma las sman gyis grub// skra yi zug tu mi mchog no// de bzhin dbyings la sam g.yas kyang // yang dag na ldan
157b3(rnying rgyud): gzugs sgra dang // 'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// mthun byas suni sna rdzogs ston// ston nyid sbrum mig yong tshul// tshul nyid dbyings las g.yos pa med// ma g.yas bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i// de'i tshe mi mthun sna tshogs la// so so 'dra bar snang ba ni//
157b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid kyis mu bcos kyang // las 'phro dbang gis so sor snang // dper na me long chu zla bzhin// de tshe 'gro drug thams cad la// sdig spong gzugs su rnam par bstan// dge tshul rnams la dgra bcom gzugs// rang rgyal rnams la bsre ru'i tshul// gzhan/
157b5(rnying rgyud): yang theg mchog rim pa bzhin// 'og min bla med gnas mchog rtse// sranani rnam par snang mdzad tshul// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khar rnams la// de bzhin gsung mchog mi ste ste// sku yis chos rnams mdzag par skyon// me long bstan pa'i tshul bzhin rje/
157b6(rnying rgyud): dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad sal// 'khor gyis de bzhin su bltas na// byang chubasgrib pa gting dpag med// me long bzhin du yul snang // de nas su bcu rim kyis 'byung // bla mid byang chub yang dag 'thob// rgyas srung pag med brjid du med// ma
157b7(rnying rgyud): zad med rin chen gter// sprul pa bye ba bsam mi khyad// mtshon dang dpe byad thams cad rdzogs// spyod yul kun du maN+Dal// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// thabs dang shes rabs yi mchog/ de la sogs te bsam yis mchog/ skye shi men
158a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i g.yung drung sra// nyon mongs kun ma zhing du gnas// zad mi shes kyi gtar du gyur// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin gyi sra// thams cad dper med mnyam pa'i sra// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sa/ lA rdzogs/
158a2(rnying rgyud): pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mthong yas mA med pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi lang bzhing gi rdul snyed du gsal bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med po'i yon tan chen po'i dkyil 'khor de dag
158a3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo // a ho// dmigs bya dmigs med mi dmigs dpag med bsam mi khyab// ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod mi lung // mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med rnam pa
158a4(rnying rgyud): dbyings// ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnams spro spros pa med// ye nas kun khyab dkyil 'khor bsam yas zhing gi rdul snyed du// ye nas rnam spos snying po kun gnas gnas pa med// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// a'o zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang
158a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyang // nyid la nyid mnyes par mchod kyang / kun du bzang
158a6(rnying rgyud): po dgyes te/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas thams cad gzhal yas khang rin po che sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa/ rgyas pa/ mtha' dbus med par khyab cing 'od zer sgrib pa med pa rang byung ba la bzhugs nas
158a7(rnying rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// nyid kyi dbyings nyid 'phro ba dpag tshad med// kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su ma chad pa'i// srid gsum yang dag mnyam sbyor spyod yul te// mtshan 'dzin 'das pa mchog gi rgyu las byung // dbang sgyur shin tu rnam par da
158b1(rnying rgyud): yi// de bzhin gshegs pa 'og min gnas bzhugs nas// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i bla med rjes 'dod dang // 'jig rten 'khor gyi gtsos bkur dbang phyug dang // gzhan dang 'jig rten phyogs bcu khams gnas pa// bdud rtsi ro yis dga' ba bde chen
158b2(rnying rgyud): 'grub// dug gsum dri bral bdud sde tshar bcad pa'i// 'das drang ma byon de bzhin nyid du sbyor// shes rab thabs ldan nges pa'i don phyung ba// rig pa'i thabs chen dbang sgyur nyid du bsgom// stong smon mtshan med rang bzhin 'od gi/ la ba'i// zad med bso
158b3(rnying rgyud): nams tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur// b+h+rU~M/ rang byung nyi zla pad+ma rin chen rgyas la bzhugs// rdo rje mnyam nyid thugs su chud pa yi// mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun la rol pa mdzad// bde gshegs dbyings nyid de bzhin nyid gnas pa// dus bzhi rgyal ba kun
158b4(rnying rgyud): dang mnyam par thub// thams cad 'od gsal dkyil 'khor thugs chud pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang las 'byung // spyod yul 'phrog med brjod kyis mi lang ba'i// dus bzhi mnyam nyid nges pa'i don nyid nyon// thugs rje dbang gisu 'gro
158b5(rnying rgyud): dus gnas bzhugs// nga dang bdag med mnyam pa'i dbyings mkhyen pa// mnyam pa'i don grub rdo rje can gyis bya// rnam par rtog med byang chub rdo rje can gyi skye// shes rab mchog gis ma lus yongs bsdus pa// bde gshegs mi gnas mnyam nyid dang du
158b6(rnying rgyud): byin// thabs chen ma 'dres rnam par spras pa yi// dmyigs med bde gshegs nyid dbyings thugs chud pa// thabs dang shes rab dbyings nyid dam pa'i mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi dbyings gnas mthas gtugs pa// shes rab mchog ldan gsal ba'i ngang
158b7(rnying rgyud): 'chang ba// thugs rje byin brlabs sna tshogs 'phro ba yi// bde gshegs ma lus thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// yid bzhin don chen mi zad par ldan 'phro// rang rig rgyal po che yis rtogs par 'gyur// zhes nyid la nyid du ched du brjod de rdo rje gsang ba'i
159a1(rnying rgyud): tshigakyang // gsang ba'i snying pad khan nyid ngas+ya pa las gzhal yas/ khang dbub pa thabs dra pa'i ladra gyi brgya gcig pa 'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa brgyan ma'atshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi ska dang ga stang dang / thugs
159a2(rnying rgyud): las 'di dag phyung ngo // b+h+r-i b+hI sha pri shrad d+he/ hU~M badz+dza dz+dzak+ka/ oM d+hIn d+hi ka/ sA d+hA dz+nyAk+Sha/ AM mA da lIka/ hUM dz+nyA d+h+r-i// pr-iHtI shA di/ lIng+kaSha ti/ mAM mo ha ti/ bAM drA gar ti/ tAM badz+rar ti/ k+Shi ti dA d+hA ya/ dzA Aka shA gran+d+ha ya/ hrI ta t+ta ba da ma/ dzi garbar+N+Na/
159a3(rnying rgyud): hrI/ sa sa pa yaSh+Ta/ dzas skyes ma d+h+r-i gr-id+hI t+taM gaHnI/ tsaM rIg si m+b+ha/ mi d+hI Ni sI// na ma hA la s+yaitAM/ hrIs d+ha m+be swAH/ pr-i shrI a gA yA swAH/ \u0f7fd+hA badz+ra bi sha/ d+hI ma pa shai/ ba pas kho na/ ha~M ga d+hIH!/
159a4(rnying rgyud): d+h+r-idz+dza badz+ra tsit+ta d+h+waM/ a a e badz+ra b+ha dr-i sa man+ta e/ oM mr-in kr-I sA hA/ oM mu no d+hi swA hA/ oM mun sr-i swA hA/ oM mr-i ne br-i swA hA/ oM mu nik+Sha swA hA/ oM mu ne ye wAMH/ e h+ye ti/ b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA kA r+ra nI kaM/ tr-i N+yai ho/ sa ma yastAM/ dzaHhUM dza hoHoM IHhUM
159a5(rnying rgyud): swA hA/ ba ba byA ba ba/ dzA dz+ha dzA dzA dzA/ sa sA sa sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ oM ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rmad po che// de nyid du ni minyam sbyor ba'i// phyag rgya chen por bdag gyur cig/ oM
159a6(rnying rgyud): badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ a 'adz+ras ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ho zhes brjod pas// gsung gi dkyi la khor 'di dag gis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par grags sa// gsang ba'i snying zedade kho na nyid nges pa las gsang sngags kyil
159b1(rnying rgyud): ste bcu gnas pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa pa da dza dang / bya ba mordo rje gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la tham par mdzad do// de nas phyogs brgya dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid chen po// ye shes dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba
159b2(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs rdo rje'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo // oM shUn+yatA dz+nyA na badz+raswa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA Ad d+ha shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA pA t+ya bok+Sho tre shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+rA swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha~M/ oM ma hA sa man+ta shun+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha/ oM ma
159b3(rnying rgyud): dz+nyAHd+d+ha an+tad+h+yan shAH tA dz+nyAn badz+ra sa b+hA ba yAt+ma ko&haM/ oM san ti thA ka ta ma hA kA ya badz+ra sa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha~M/ oM sarba ti thA ga ta ma hA bAka badz+ri swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha~M/ oM sarba tat+t+wa ti ma hA tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA bi At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ti ma hA un+da rA ga Na badz+ra swa thA ba saH
159b4(rnying rgyud): ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga te ma hA pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ zhes brjod pas thim par gyur to// gsal bar gyur to// 'bar bar gyur to// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// sti
159b5(rnying rgyud): gis sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung // gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni// bsam gyis mi khyab kun du khyab// sgra dang ming tshig so sor grags// thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya mchog/ rgyud mchog rgyud chen dra ba las// bde ldan gsung gi don
159b6(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'ang // thams cad pad+ma'i ngang gyur na// grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra// ji skad brjod kyang gsung mchog ste// theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang // log 'gro ma lus thams cad skad// byang chub rdo rje gsung du bsdus// bsdus nyid phyogs
159b7(rnying rgyud): bcur rnam par grags// sgra nyi mchags dang du gsungs// gsungs pa nyid na brjod du med// brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra// kun la grags shing so sor 'jal// dper na de bzhin sprid sangs bzhin// gsung gcig sgra yis thams cad do//
160a1(rnying rgyud): 'di ni gsung mchog rgyal po yin// theg pa mtho dman bsam yas kyang // de bzhin nyid las ma gsungs te// gdul ba'i thabs su so sor thos// ji ltar gsung rab kun brjod kyang // de bzhin nyid kyis gsungs pa med// yi ge
160a2(rnying rgyud): med dang rig pa'i gsung // ljags kyi rtse mnam byung yang // thugs rje gsung gi byin pa rlabs kyis// 'grod na sna tshogs sa so gas la// gsapa nyid gsung ga rdo rje mchog/ de bzhin gsung gis 'gra na rnams// de bzhin dang las ma g.yas kya /
160a3(rnying rgyud): dper na brag ca'i sgra bzhin no// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor bsgrub dang gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas nyid kyi phyag rgya ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di tsha
160a4(rnying rgyud): du brjod pa 'di brjod do// oM hU~M badz+ra satwad+d+hi/ badz+ra pre ShAn d+he/ muM badz+ra gAn d+hA dzAM/ oM tsakra mA~MHlA b+h+rUM AM/ oM badz+ra ga na prASh+TA li/ sA rat+na pra b+hA na saM/ oM badz+rag na d+ha thASha A/ oM pad+ma pA thA na oM/ bau badz+ra gaN+Da prA b+hAn pAM/ hUM badz+ra ga tIHpra bAn ha/ ti dz+ra
160a5(rnying rgyud): gan+ta d+ha b+hUSh+Tapra b+hAn te/ shI rat+na brI thAn shI D+b+h+yAM/ badz+ra ga rten pre thA na dz+haN+DitAM/ khan prag+h+nAnatAM/ dz+ra gan d+ha b+h+reHprab+hAnAH/ d+hIHpadz+raM prAb+hU d+hI/ badz+ra gne d+ha b+hUHpr-ithAn d+hi/ ha badze gar+b+he/ pra b+hAn te/ oM badzag nad+ha thASh+TapraSh+Ta naM A mai kA la bAH
160a6(rnying rgyud): nAm/ tra~M bAd+d+ha g+han d+hArmA na pa prawAn maN+Da n-igan tan/ hU~M mastan ni/ sbyar sa tu gzhan sa/ badzagan rten// d+d+he/ su sal ni la maSh+Tanas/ A bajig tu bag+h+nAn AH/ phan ba sa maHmdUr pa na pa na
160a7(rnying rgyud): blan na susu ma sa sa sa sa su rgya su sasu sa
160b1(rnying rgyud): gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA da hUM/ a a a zhes brjod pas phyag rgya gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun du gsal bar gyur to// 'bar bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang / kun rdzab sa byang chub kyi sems las phyag rgya gsung gi dkyil 'khor
160b2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa las/ chos thams cad nam mkha' dang yum gyi dbyings su 'dus par bstan nas tshod du brjod pa 'di rji // yang dag don gyi gas
160b3(rnying rgyud): mchog ni// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// nges pa'i don chen bzhi bcu gnyis// yid bzhin rin chen gsal 'bar nim// thams cad ma lus thig le'i dbyings// sgra lnga'i 'od zer mang po kun// thams cad yum 'gyur dbyangs su zam// gsas
160b4(rnying rgyud): 'bar spen gyi bdag por 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi thigs pa ni// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// kha dog gnas dang dbyibs pa yin// yon tan mchog gi snying por// rtog gi slong yul yong ma yin// zab cing rgya chen rab spangs pa'i// gsal ldan btan
160b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i spyod yul te// gzhan nas btsal zhing brtag tu med// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// sna tshogs 'jig rten brtan g.yo dang // rgyal ba mngon byung thams cad kun// nam mkha'i dbyings su ma gyur pa// dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang na med// dus gsum
160b6(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs nyid kyi mnga'// sngon gyi bde gshegs thugs chud pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad thim// thams cad shes rab dbyings nyid de// dbyings la dbyings ni rnam par sbyor// shes rab dbyings nyid 'byor pa yis// byang chub rdo rje thig le
160b7(rnying rgyud): yin// dkyil 'khor gzhal yis lhan grub dang // rgya dang bral ba'i bsam yas kyis// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// yon tan mchog gi gnas yin te// ma bcas rgyun gyi skad cig ma// de yas mthon gang yang med// rang gi rnam rtog ma yin pa// yang
161a1(rnying rgyud): drag gshegs dang log rtag dang // gzhan yang sprul pa mang po'i chags// phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad kun// de la gsang cing gzung du med// khwa dag dbyibs dang gnas ma yin// skyes bu das pa mchog 'dod papa// dul rtan
161a2(rnying rgyud): 'grus gsal bar gyis// de yi 'bras bu mthar phyin ni// rgyu 'bras med pa'i dus gcig ste// thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du// yi ge 'bru gsum rdzogs par gyur// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor los bsdus// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol//
161a3(rnying rgyud): 'jig med pa'i dbyings la zhugs// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// mtha' yas 'jig rten bsam yas kun// rgyal ba yum gyi dbyings su thim// thams cad ma lus chos skur 'dus// ho/ chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid do// gsang ba'o/
161a4(rnying rgyud): snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las thams cad yum gyi dbyings su 'dus pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba ched du brjod
161a5(rnying rgyud): pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pas// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi// snying po phyag rgya 'da' bar dka'// mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge// rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge// lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las// sbyar ba
161a6(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgya// oM dang mAM gnyis rtse sbyar te// 'bru brgyad bsnol nas rtser sprad pa// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i kye// 'bru bzhi spras nas thugs kar bkan// blo bsgreng rtse mor rdo rjer 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sra 'di gsing
161a7(rnying rgyud): zhing // 'khrel pa'i tshul gyis chos la brten// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// mu~M gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// bdud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis bal// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// m-i steng rtse
161b1(rnying rgyud): mi 'khor lo 'bar// zla brtul 'bru skas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// l-I gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta//
161b2(rnying rgyud): 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// sI rtser 'bar ba rin po che// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brten// 'bru bzhi smras nas thugs kar bkan// mAM gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su
161b3(rnying rgyud): 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kAr bkan// AMHgyi rtse mor pad+ma 'bar// bla brtul 'bru sgras dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brten// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// pA bsgreng rtse mor
161b4(rnying rgyud): dridril gsel 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lha las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// hU~M gyi rtse mor ral gri 'bar// zla ba rtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brten// 'bru bzhi
161b5(rnying rgyud): sbas nas thugs kar bkan// tA~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// ut+pal la sogs klu shing mtshan// rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar// chos kyi 'khor
161b6(rnying rgyud): lo rin chen te// gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang // pi bang gar mkhan mchog nyid de// me tog phreng ba spos mchod ma// mar me byug la sogs pa yis// las la'i' khril cing chos la brten// dbu rnams byon nas 'dud pa'i tshul// gong gi phyag rgya chen po
161b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// sgo bzhi phyag rgya chen po ni// nr-i mgo gdengs dang rdo rjes gnon// thod phreng chen pos gnon pa dang // rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon// lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho Ta hoH// sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang // 'dud tshul
162a1(rnying rgyud): 'khril ba gong ma bzhin// thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te// mdor bskus phyag rgya drug yin no// gseg par dang ni pi bang dang // go cha bo ti rin chen sbom// me dang chu ru rab tu bstan// yum ni gnyis med chos kyi dbyangs// kun bzang mnyam
162a2(rnying rgyud): bzhag ye shes 'phro// yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+ma'i dkyil// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te// yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid de// yang na rdo rje thal ma nyid// phyag rgya chen po tshogs mchog ni// thabs dang shes rab ldan 'byor na// ma bskyod ma bskul thams cad
162a3(rnying rgyud): stan// phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas// yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldar// de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste// bzhi bcwa rtsa gnyis sum 'phror 'bar// de ltar ldan pa'i gtso mchog gis// rgyal ba rgya mchog de bzhin du// bcu gnyis drug gi 'od 'phro 'bang // de la
162a4(rnying rgyud): sogs te bsam mi khyab// phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam yas su// 'dul ba'i don rnams so sor ston// theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang // phyin ci log rnams bsam yas dang // zhi khro tshogs chen thams cad la// so sor mthun byas kun du sdang // dper na gar
162a5(rnying rgyud): mkhan nyid 'dra ba// lus pas ma dgod sna tshogs ston// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// 'di zhes gcig ces brjod du med// gnyis dang gsum du rnam par 'phrogro// bskyod dang spro ba de bzhin nyid// mdor na bskyod 'gul thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i ngang
162a6(rnying rgyud): du gnas// gnas nyid mi gnas gnas pa 'ang min// de skad dag mchog nyid kyis bshad// mthe bo mdzub mo rdo rje 'dzin// mthe bo gung mo rgyal ba 'dzin// srin lag mthe bo chags pa che// mthe'u chung mazo bo legs pa mchog/ hUM hoH/ mdzub mo gnyis
162a7(rnying rgyud): spying rin chen mchog/ grang mi gnyis sbyar gzi rjid // phrin lag gnyis d+har rgyal ba to// bzhad pa'i skyes mnan chung spyad/ phreng nas chos kyi rdzog// glang po sbyor 'og 'jam dpa' nga// bla la sa
162b1(rnying rgyud): lo mchog/ mtha' chung steng 'og sa gsung yan// dz+dza g+h+nAn+na to/ mdzub margyag sa las kyi mchog/ gung mo rgya tham bsrung bar byos// srin lag kya gram gnod sbyin mchag/ mtha' chung rgya sa ma gnas par bshad// ha dz+ra a d+g+ha// phyag rgya ba chog chen dra/
162b2(rnying rgyud): 'dis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mdzes par snang // rang bzhin dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs// glu gnyis phyag rgya ldan pa yis// sa ler gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bebs// phyag rgya spros pa chen pos ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam gnyis pa// dag par
162b3(rnying rgyud): gsal bas phyag rgya yin// yi ge so so gsal ba yis// gang du bsgyur bas mya ngan 'das// dzAHdang hoHla sogs pa yis// gar du bsgyur bas rdo rjer 'ching // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid des pa las phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas
162b4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos mtshon cha dam tshig ces bya ba'i glu 'di blangs so// hUM lus dgra yid gsum rdo rje ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rang gnas pas// ye shes rdo rjeg po
162b5(rnying rgyud): zhing spro// e ma'o rdo rje che mchog ni// nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// ces kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi gyis gdab// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid la// rdo rje 'cha
162b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed rdo rje 'chang zhes bya// hU~M// ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po gtsigs la btab pa ltar// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang // dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun
162b7(rnying rgyud): lo de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs// hU~M/ phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// rdo rje rdo rje drag chen dang // rang nyid che ba'i bdag
163a1(rnying rgyud): na/ sgyun bya/ na ma// rgya / nan
163a2(rnying rgyud): de las rgyagasang 'byung ba'aM// si badz+ra ldan ldan hU~M \u0f7f/ s+t+wa~M/ lus dag sri gas pa' khor lani// rtag sung thugs kyi m+bi zhes te// nga mdzad 'ching ladapa' ba yin// snang mdzad 'khor lo nga gnas papa// ye shes 'a' dgas
163a3(rnying rgyud): zhing sgo// e ma'i 'khor lo tshe mchog gi// nyid kyi mchen du gsol ba ni// ces kyang mi shigs mi byed pas// ces kyang mi g.yos pa 'dres pas// bar chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab// rdul ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las//

165a1(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la dgyes par skar te// gsang nga byung ba na ngas pasmras smra sgrub pa mapas dang gas ba tu 'byung ba rgyags ca 'a skye bcu bdun na/ denas de na gshegs
