167a3(rnying rgyud): chen yid ni sangs rgyas yab// gcig dang du ma yongs kyis med// de las 'gro don phrin las 'chad// yid dang chos su rab brtags pa'i// rdo rje 'chang rgyal tshul chen las// rdo rje drag por lan gsum gsod// gtum pa'i sngags brjod de bskyed pas// bsnyen
167a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa'i dmachig mchog/ dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi// rin chen dbyig dngang d+hang bkun// de dag rdza sa yid ma yin te// rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin// ngo mtsha tshe 'phrul rmed kyichas// gzhan/
167a5(rnying rgyud): nas yod 'ong ma yin te// thabs la brten pa'i shes rangab nyid// de lta bu yi ngang du 'byung // shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid// thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir// ye shes la ni ye shes rol// ye shes rol pa nyid gang gsog/ rgyal ba mngon byang skyob pa
167a6(rnying rgyud): dang // byin brlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te// bya byed nus mdzu'i gzi byin gyis// sgyu ma rdo rje btsan po mchog/ cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing // yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas// mnyams 'jug pa rab brtson pa// zhag ni
167a7(rnying rgyud): sum cu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshong cu drug tshun chad kyis// sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni// ye shes thig le de nyid la// ye shes thig le nyid sdang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' ya
167b1(rnying rgyud): mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas dang // rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun// mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang /
167b2(rnying rgyud): rgya chen gsung las don byung ba// mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ngo // gcig dang du mar bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi gzigs te// rang byung ye shes gnas med snang // log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing //
167b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'brel pas na// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang // bde ba chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ni// stangs dpal gnyis sam yang na lnga// byas te dad ldan rab zhugs na// 'dod pa yid 'ong mnyam par 'gyur//
167b4(rnying rgyud): skal ba mnyam pa'i ye shes de// gnyer na nye bar mnyam pa yi// ya mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges// dad med nyams na phung bar 'gyur// zhes ched du brjod do// rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs
167b5(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phral dra ba las lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub blang ba'i thabs 'di gsungs so// ye nas mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor la// thabs dang shes rab ldan byas te// rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis// thams cad ma lus
167b6(rnying rgyud): paN+Dal// de bzhin nyid kyi gzhal yas la// rig pa rang byung gyur pa yis// mnyam par mnyam la mi gnas pa'i// chos sku'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom// 'jig rten brtan g.yo thams cad la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas myod kyi// gzung 'dzin rnam
167b7(rnying rgyud): zhags pa yis// rang rig bsgribs shing bdag tu bcings// kun gyis yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir// de bzhin chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan// rtog dang mi rtog rang rig dang // yang dag thabs chen rdzogs pa'i don// rin chen sna tshogs la sogs dang /
168a1(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba bzhi las gyur rnams kun// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya// gzugs sogs mong bris pa dag/ ye shes chen por rab 'brum gyis// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs// de bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis// rngams/
168a2(rnying rgyud): cad dbyings su bsdus nas ni// nyid kyi thugs la bstim byas te// thams cad chos sku'i phyag rgya che// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dag byas pas// nam ma pa'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// rang rig ye shes 'dra 'phro yis// thams cad chos snga phyug
168a3(rnying rgyud): che// yang dag rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis// ting 'dzin don rnams gsal bsgoms te// mA ma kI yi rgyun chags la// yang dag chos sku phyag rgya che// de bzhin ting 'dzin gsal bsgoms nas// don mchog ma lus rdzogs pa'i phyir// mkha' la 'phro ba'i da
168a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor du// dri me chos su phyag rgya gsal// dbyings dang de bzhin nyid med par// ting nge 'dzin gyis dang rabasgyur nas// kha dag dbyibs dang gzugs su bsgyur// sna tshogs phrin las rnam par ngos// don gyi snying po mchog rnams kyang // byang chub phyogs rnams
168a5(rnying rgyud): rab rdzogs// 'jig rten ga tso chog rnam sa kyis brdom// oM chos skye phyag tu de dgas sa// rab 'i gyis mthong ba tu bsgrub// ting nge dzin gyis dbang bsgre na// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du dgrub// drag po bcom po gdul ba'i phyir// 'dag
168a6(rnying rgyud): nyid drug po banoms nas ni// chos spyanag pa 'ang byung byas// bkrigs kyi sbyin pa nu nga bya// gnam gi chus nga nan par 'byung// mi mnan rdzogs kyang rngu rdzo// 'di dang 'gro ba thams cidang // shin tu stob sajug ma ldan 'gyur// thams cad
168a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis med dbyings bsku'i phyir// bdag nyid ta ya grI bar bsgos// dmar po'i chos sku gsal ba rnams te// mi mthun phyogs rnams gdan dug deng // ting 'dzin gis lo bas byin brlabs na// thams cad ma lus dbang du bsdu// mthu chen dag kyang phyi bzhin
168b1(rnying rgyud): 'drang // ci 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur// thams cad yon tan 'phel bya'i phyir// bdag nyid rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ste// gser gyi mdog 'dra phyug kyang bsgom// gang 'phel chos sgra gdan du gzhag/ de ltar dag pas byin brlabs na// yan tanan
168b2(rnying rgyud): mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang // ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// gtum khro ma lus zhi bya'i phyir// dkar zhing 'tshor ba'i chos sku bsgom// gang zhig gtum khro zhi ba'i gdan//
168b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin ting 'dzin byin brlabs na// gtum po rngam po'ang zhi bar 'gyur// gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin// zhi zhing dul ba nyid du 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// rnam bzhi dkyil 'khor dbyings su bsdus// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor
168b4(rnying rgyud): lhun grub dkyil 'khor ye nas rdzogs// a hoH/ chos sku phyag rgya chen po ni// dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin par nges// nye ba'i lha ni gang bsgrub pa// phyag rgya'i snying po bris bcug na// gang bsgoms the tshom med par 'grub// de ni rgyal ba kun dang
168b5(rnying rgyud): mnyam// the tshom med de nges 'grub 'gyur// 'jig rten pa yi lha sgrub na// lha yi snying po gang yang rung // bris te dkyil 'khor nang bcug na// lha de nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// chos nyid rten cing 'brel gris na// chos kyi don rnams rtogs 'gyur te// rang dang
168b6(rnying rgyud): spyi yi don rtogs nas// skye rgan 'chi med par rtogs// phyag rgya chen po de dag la// nyon mongs las rnams skyong byed pa'i// snying po ma nor don bris na// ngan song sdug bsngal med par 'gyur// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas dang // dpag tshad med pa'i
168b7(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya che// sku gsung thugs ni rgyun mi chad// zhing khams bye ba rdul dang mnyam// a ho// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul dri ba las lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis dngos grub len pa'i thabs te mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas
169a1(rnying rgyud): su kyi na rnas nga sa na panas da/ nas ga // /
169a2(rnying rgyud): kyi / pa ga sa// sa
169a3(rnying rgyud): ngas gsus rgya na pa/ lhags pa sa kyi nga ba ma da mi ma chad la/ bdu ngas skye par spro/ 'gru 'i ba mog sa/ gas pa na
169a4(rnying rgyud): ga sa/ kyi la 'dug pa sa myo dung rjem pa sbyin das sa ga/ nyi na 'dis da byedagasu pabyud pa yi/ khyod pa bar yang gdapa smras bye
169a5(rnying rgyud): sa
169a6(rnying rgyud): sa su sa mi nga bag 'dun rtsi/ ma byingang sa lus ga byis 'brang rung skyong chu/ ngas ba'i ba / ga na gcisadris su mang/ dpa'i ngo 'i
169b1(rnying rgyud): slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas par// nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang // go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang // gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang //
169b2(rnying rgyud): snying po lnga yis dbang bskur na// dus 'di phan chad rgyal ba'i sras// ngan song thams cad med pa dang // gnyen por gyur pa'i rtsal 'chang bas// tshe dang bde ba phun sum tshogs// kun du bzang po la sogs mtshan// mtho ris thar pa'i dbang por 'gyur// lus
169b3(rnying rgyud): dang phung por bcas pa'i sa// rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa yin// rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa'i sa// bla med kun du bzang por 'gyur// yum dang sgeg mo la sogs la// de nyid byin gyis rlob par 'gyur// pho ha 'du 'phro mang po rnams// sangs rgyas bka'
169b4(rnying rgyud): las mi 'da' zhing // de yi dgos pa byed pa dang // sgo dang skur pa la sogs pa// de ni myur du brlag par 'gyur// tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur// zhes ched du brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
169b5(rnying rgyud): las dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa degyes pa chen po mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dngos grub myung bar len pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so// de bzhin nyid dang mnyam sbyor
169b6(rnying rgyud): phyir// dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya// byang chub phyogs la gzung bar gnas// mchog tu bde ba'i zhing gnas pas// mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun bsgom zhing // byang chub sems su brtan par gzung // bya ba med las bya byed bya// mi gnas gnas
169b7(rnying rgyud): la gnas par bsgom// b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling+ga a// shin tu 'tshor zhing gsal bsgoms nas// 'od 'phro 'bar bas thams cad khyab// dus gsum ngan song gnas bsregs nas// b+ha ga'i dkyil du 'od 'phro thim// thim 'gyur dbyings nas 'od
170a1(rnying rgyud): 'bad// mam pas ni bla ti 'bang // phyogs bzur 'joms pa'i yun sel zhing // nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsil ba'i stan// thugs rngu'i byin brlabs bsam mkhyab// rol pa'i phyag rgya bas ma ma khyab// mkha' la 'da' tshon ldan
170a2(rnying rgyud): yang // nam mkha'i dbyings su rnams cad bsdus// thams cad mkhyen nyid bsam yas kyang // chos kyi dbyings su thams cad 'das// thams cad yi ge hUM du gyur// hU~M nyid gsang byang thugs rje'i dkyil// 'od zer 'phros pas 'bru gsum te// yang na cho
170a3(rnying rgyud): ma'i dkyil 'khor grang ba yi// gzhal yas 'od zer 'bar ba'i khang // pad+ma'i gdan dang rin po che// de dkyil yi ge hU~M gnas pa// shin tu phra zhing yungs 'bru 'bar// gnas gcig dang ni gnas gsum dang // gnas lha dag tu rab tu bsgom
170a4(rnying rgyud): shes rab ldan la 'dris pa dang // dri yi mig gis bltar yod par// shin tu dra keng klas la bar 'gros// shin tu rmogs la 'dis gyur nas// phyogs bcu'i stong khams rdul snyed du// thugs rje'i byin brlabs bas ma yas so// des kyang d+ha las nyam
170a5(rnying rgyud): med// brjes kyang phyogs bcu bri ba med// smyo mad bsnga med de bzhin las// yo ga phreng thim par sbyar// dzam dad+mar dab+h+ring sa nas phyag rgya 'brar// shin hUM gsal zhing 'dres pa dang // phyag rgya'i sgo nyid gsal bar bsgom// prAd chen gang 'od 'bar na
170a6(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rang ldan pa'i rgya// 'od 'phro 'bar zhing don byed bsgoms// yang na phyag rgya chen po ste// bdag nyid zhal gcig phyag gnyis bsam// zhal gsum phyag drug rtag tu bsgom// gzhal yas khang dang gdan khri rnams// phra ba'i tshul
170b1(rnying rgyud): bzhon/ nga nga byung bapa/ yan/ ga pas// rgya 'khor 'dus tho bar// ngan can pa d+hAng la tha'abar// phyag rgyasbyin pa d+ma dag las// phyugs brgyam las gzhal yas khang // 1 slad da lal ba gsadu /
170b2(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus bsgom// thugs rje byin brlabs 'gro don mdzad// zhi ba phyogs gcig shes bya ste// sa bcu mnyam par sbyong byed cing // bde gshegs 'khor yang dag par byed// de ltar sgrub pa'i rig ste mdzeg de// 'bras bu mdzo
170b3(rnying rgyud): dumasbyin // sdug bsngal thams cad pang myi 'byung // lha mi mtshan rdzogs yongs su 'brub// theg pa dman par yong mi bya// ba ga sheg pa 'thung dang rgol pa 'gyur// byang chub sangs la grags pa yin// gas nyid la nyid gsungs so// rdo
170b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa'i le'u skye nyi shu gnyis pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po sbyang ba zhes bya ba la stobs par zhugs nas rked du brjon
170b5(rnying rgyud): pa 'di brjod do// rgya gcig dang ni yiga~M 'bru bral// byin gyi brlabs dang mngon bum par// rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yas// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che// yan lag dpying pa na ma shes kun// rnam ldan yo shes par bya// rdzogs pa'i
170b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khros pa'i dkyil 'khor byarkos// gzugs sna de ro rig pa sogs// nam sbyin ma du shes par bya// yum dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khro ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// grong byin bza' brgyang gA dang rdzog/ khrog
170b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi sprin phung la// hU~M du shes pas rab spyad na// ngo mtshar rmang du byung ba yi// dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes par 'gyur// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// dbye ba'am yang na mi dbye bar// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa'i// sgrub pa dang ni sprub chen po// yum gyi
171a1(rnying rgyud): pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// sangs kyis sprin tshogs ma lus la// dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim// grub pa ni zla snying po de// 'gro drag dus gnas de dag nyid// mchod pa chen por mnyes snga
171a2(rnying rgyud): zhing // dkyil 'khor rdo rje rtse yis blang // mkha' 'gro gsal 'bar tshe la sogs// yid bzhin sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur// zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams// nyi zla'i dkyil du mkhas pas gzhag/ nga rgyal lag gis 'du byed bsgom// dzA du gur
171a3(rnying rgyud): pas rnam par dag/ dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyar 'bar// skur 'gyur 'od zer 'phro bas brjid// gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba bsgom// ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs// yenas skye med de bzhin nyid// sgyu ma snang ba mig yod tshul// snor srol bye ba
171a4(rnying rgyud): kun byas kyang // rdul cha tsam yang byas pa med// snod bcud rgyud rnams dag rtogs shing // mnyam nyid lhag pa'i mnyam nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor kun du bzang po'i zhing // byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis gyur nas// yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan// cho
171a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs par shes pa yi// rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub// lnga zhing lnga dang sbyor ba yi// tshom bu lnga yi lha bkod la// khro bo bcu dang khro bo bcu// 'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par sgom// de bzhin
171a6(rnying rgyud): gshegs dang rdo rje'i rigs// pad+ma'i rigs dang sku gsung thugs// khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso// thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchong // khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// chom
171a7(rnying rgyud): gcig gi lha rnams bsgom// khri ga khro mo tshogs chen dang // pho nya phyag brtan bka' nyan tshogs// ci bkyil sogs pa rnams kyis// dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed// rnal 'byor sngags 'tshang dngos grub na// mnyam rdzogs spen grub dang gam
171b1(rnying rgyud): shid// spyod pa la'ang thogs med pa'o// thams cad yangs dbyung mdapa'o// ra'o dgas pa thams pa dad la// 'di tho bur ba ba tubanam// da la sa byu bya// ga nga bung na ga na// yang na thag nga
171b2(rnying rgyud): nyid de// thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// ting 'dzin gsal bar 'od zer 'phro// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// rig 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar ba 'grub// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bang
171b3(rnying rgyud): byed// rdo rje rigs su bskyed pa'i gnas// skyugs 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni// thabs dang shes papa thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom// zags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'od zer rnam pa mang po spro// gnyis su med par
171b4(rnying rgyud): bstim par bya// dngos grub mchog gi snying po 'grub// rnal 'byor tha sa dang shes rab kyis// de bzhin gshegs dang yum du bcom// sems dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom// so so sngagapa dang phyag rgya dang // ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal/
171b5(rnying rgyud): gnas dang longs spyod ci bde dang // ma nyams blo ni rab ldan pas// dang po dam mnos bzhin du bya// le lo sbrid snyom med pa yis// the tshom med par bsgrub byas na// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang mchog dam pa thong // srab
171b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i zhag dang chos grangs ni// rgyud las spros pa bzhin du bya// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de khor da nges pa las tshogs kyi dkyil
171b7(rnying rgyud): gro nyi shu gsum gro'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs par dbyis pa chen por ma ma'i smin par spros te// rgyan bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas tshang du brjod pa 'di brjo da// rtswa brtsal drangs mngon
172a1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor brten pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bro gar phyag rgya'i 'dra' ba yis// 'jal lam namam khar 'gro bar 'gyur// k+Shar+Na g+ha\u0f88\u0f90 l-I phyag rgya yis// rdzas kyi dngos grab thob par 'gyur// rgyan dang dag pa'i phyag rgyangs/
172a2(rnying rgyud): dbang ba'i rgyal po thogs med 'grub// bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgyas ni// yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsir 'grub// A li kA le'i phyag rgya yis// sku gsung mchog gi thugs ldan pas// thams cad thams cad 'grib par 'gyur// shes 'jug mtshan nyid
172a3(rnying rgyud): 'byor pa'i gzus// 'bras bu sprin byed chu dang rten// nas mdzu can du gang thur pa// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags// mi dang lha dang tshangs pa yi// skye ba rnam dag 'dzin mod kyi// khyad par sa la gnas gyur yin// pha rol phyin pa kun du rdzogs// tha
172a4(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab mchog gi mchog byar dbye// sa yoM khyad par bcu dang gsum// rtswa 'bras khyad par ldan gyis rdzogs// mkha' dbyings dang ba dbying nyi// ye shes rgyal po stengs dbul sgom// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// ma lus par
172a5(rnying rgyud): ni bsgoms par 'gyur// dus rje ni phyogs bcu gang nas kyang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas gzhan du mtshol cig/ dkyil 'khor kun du rab sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor thams cad
172a6(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// zlo ga lhag gram mya tshang na// byin nyid dag ste nyes pa med rjes ched du brjod pas rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par ltar to// rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur te/ sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje gsang bya'i tshig
172a7(rnying rgyud): byung ngo // ma hoH// se mthong rmongs la chags pa ma// chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam// 'gro drug dus gnas ming tshogs med par rabasnang ba'o// zab chen spyod yul log par rtogs btags meng tsam pa// A la~M kI la~M las gas 'ang
172b1(rnying rgyud): da/ rdzubacwa gsug spang dbas// thugs thags can yon tan drugs pa'is gyur na// nyid ngamanyam par byas par brgyags/ mnyam sgrub par byu pa 'an gang rdzog gags can pas rdzogs rna
172b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje dal 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas dkyis
172b3(rnying rgyud): chen pos chos thams cad ye nas rdzogs pa chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig shin tu gsang ba'i snying po'i sprin bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang
172b4(rnying rgyud): dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang // rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni// yi ge sgro btags ming tshogs la// brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te// khong nas gab smras dron 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje thugs la gnas// dbying 'khor
172b5(rnying rgyud): ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khod dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings// sku gsung thugs rig kun mnga'
172b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i// bder gshegs kun gyi snying po rdzogs// 'brang ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo rje tshogs// dbang po yul dus rig pa'i rnams// kun du bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po
172b7(rnying rgyud): bapa sa// zugs kyi sa rjes dang / nga ba ga la tham gyur bas// 'de ba'i ma shis ma ga// shimi byis pa nyis pang byus khrag tho me pa'i bab du gyis ma srungs// sa sa
173a1(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba// dbang phyu
173a2(rnying rgyud): pa pa yin// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma pus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam skyong las// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'gyur// phyogs dus
173a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yas// bre byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam bsgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis// rang byung kun nas lhun gyis glang // 'di na sangs tha
173a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyis// 'drang bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du// dkyil 'khor ma lus brtson pa yis// nye ba'i sra dadangs par 'gyur/
173a5(rnying rgyud): skal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas shing // dkyil 'kho ma lus bsnyen pa yi// 'bras bu gsang rkyen 'di yin te// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs btsun// 'dras dang de lta mi// tshul pa'i dkyil 'khor ma la
173a6(rnying rgyud): brnyes pas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs// 'byung dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun// 'di yis ldan gyis grub par 'gyur// 'di ni gsung chen nges pa yi// 'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin// tshul ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// 'du
173a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i nges don med// bcal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do// kun gyi phyag rgya chen po mchog/ thos pasams bsgoms pa rab sbyangs pa'i// shes rab mig ldan rnams chos gzung // snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la brtan// lus dang la
173b1(rnying rgyud): na// gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya// rmongs la 'phyang bsagal te sbyin// dus min par ni srog zad nas// dasregs dang slebs par yun ring gnas// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du 'arjod do// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dmyal
173b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu gsung ba man ngag gi snying po'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom
173b3(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos dgyes pa chen po'i ngang las gsang ba 'byung ba bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o thams cad maM lus dus gsum bder gshegs mchog/ gdod nas maM skyes rnam dag byang chub sems// rang bzhin dbyer med
173b4(rnying rgyud): gdod mtha' mi 'byed cing // ye nas mnyam pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho yin// 'gro 'ong med par dus gsum cag cher rdzogs// dbye bsal med phyir bzang ngan blang dor med// rnam rtog nyid na ye shes rang bzhin te// rnam rtog mi skyed ye shes brjod du med//
173b5(rnying rgyud): bdag tu med pa'i skyes mchog sngon sbyangs pa// khri la 'ga' tsam gal te 'byung 'gyur zhing // sta rabs phyis 'byung dag dang dbyer med pa'i// mngon sum sangs rgyas skyes mchog de dag la// bskal pa 'gang nas shes rab blo spangs pa// dang ldan 'ga'
173b6(rnying rgyud): yis 'tsham par ci thag gi// bdag nyid ma mthong shes rgyud ma 'byongs pa// gzhan du tshol zhing rmongs pa'i sems can gyis// bstan kyang ma thos mtshon kyang ma mthong ba// bdag cag gzhan du tshol bas sangs mi rgyas// de dang ma bral ston pa mi mthong zhing //
173b7(rnying rgyud): bgrod par 'dod pas phyin par mi nus te// shes rgyud ci yin gang gis ngo shes shing // bya byed las 'phags cin 'dug byed pa// gang zhig blo la dpyod pa byang chub thob// ma spangs mtshan ma kun bral yod med pas// dran byed mi spong 'khor rgyun mi 'gye
174a1(rnying rgyud): de// ma snyigs mi 'byed mngon sum sangs rgyas la// blo yi rig pas dpyod cing nan tan dang // mchod cing bsten pas byang chub thob mngon te// nam mkha' gzung bas sprin gyis khebs par 'gyur// nam mkha' med par gang gis shes pa
174a2(rnying rgyud): na/ na zhig 'byung zhing 'das par misrid nga// dram par rtag pa'i gsu rungasangs rgyas la// thams cad 'a nas mnyam gnas nam dag kyang // mi rtogs yong gnas la rtog pa sungang // brgyad du med pas sna rdzogs 'byung ba yin// bdag pa 'de garji
174a3(rnying rgyud): nams kyid 'thung ba'i gter// ma jugag pa'is tu zhing dbyung med pa'o// thams kyad sams kyi nga kyi sems shes ga dgas su med// ma cos spyan gnas 'das byang chub rjing// cho tu med pa'i yinas padang ga shegs yin// da ye
174a4(rnying rgyud): shes kyi khams thams cad rang bzhin sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// mkhyen nas ji bzhin pa'i bdag nyid chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phreng ngo //
174a5(rnying rgyud): e mdzem bslabs zung chen po// grub pa chen po po shes che// gling dor med pa'i sa chen po// mig mo 'du 'bral med pa'i gdu // rtag pa'i ye shes yid bzhin gter// thams cad pa yang me lo ba zhin// ba\u0f89\u0fa4sa kyang gzugs brtan mi snang ngo // gang na
174a6(rnying rgyud): gsung chen 'dri rjod par/ mim dang 'dogs pa sa na gtams papa/ phyogasangs dradag 'gro ra byor// 'ong na gnas pa'i yang bkyi stong du khabartsam po// da pa ni nyid du gyur/ su nyid mchog gi
174a7(rnying rgyud): da// de miganas myangan 'das/ ga sa btus/ gsung po ngas pa nyidangosas lasags ngan ningag btun papa' pa'i'i kyi ba do// dad dpon gshegs pa rtsas rtson bsams
174b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'angs bzhugs nas tad kyi skal thams cad mthus par ston tarmad da dpa dam dang // dngas dang rgyang mdzangs dang // zung bar yangs ngas 'a dag/ nga ba nas pad dang // shApa 'o bang dgasasas/ rten
174b2(rnying rgyud): das dang 'jig rten pa'i// nga dang sro bstan pa dang // ji snyed rten g.yo la sogs pa// snre pa yig yong na ma 'i d+hi// skyes dram rgyam dang ldan pas// dem rtag tu matam d+ho dang // sems can kun gyi gang gyur pa// ga gtas
174b3(rnying rgyud): sbyor// thams cad thabs kyi mtshan nyid de// thabs la rlangs ni rnam par spor// thabs dang thabs las byung ba yi// de ni byang chub rdo rje 'cho// ji snyed brjod pa'i khA brkyang kyang // yang dag don gyi snying pon// gang nas bcol kyang mastod // rang bsgring med
174b4(rnying rgyud): dag pa yin// de ba rtag 'grus gams pa ni// bsnyen pa'i dam par yin to// de ni mnor la ma yin par// a lis n+ta d+hi rang ti spris// de bzhin nyid kyi dpyis nyid ni// gcig sa 'di zhes brjod du med// gsum du zag su 'byung na / D+yan
174b5(rnying rgyud): dam sa pas ma yis mtha' yas mchog/ don da gsung ba coMg nyis// de las rtag pa'i don nga // de ni rnam dag las te// nga thos bas pa pa'i zlam padzin// banas rgyad ga cung chubs mas// dan dug na ma bshi/
174b6(rnying rgyud): tshad bzhis pazla ba'i na yin te// dge pa ni ma gsum la bcwo pa // 'di ldang bzlas pa thabs chen te// dgro kun pa rang rig gnas// b+ha ba med la byas pa med// zad pa'i ngas med yid bzhin gter// bum pa brdung dang yid bzhin mdza /
174b7(rnying rgyud): ma rgyag dang yadang nan // gzhan nas me mi ma // bas dung byur ba khon dngas papas sbyin thu chu nga nan shegs pa ra gyi sgra gsung thug rdorje na du
175a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtogs pas brtags pa la mngon par zhan pa dang yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba dag gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par byas
175a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chel nas rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs pas/ srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so// de rab tu tsha ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang 'dod pas gdungs nas 'di bas shi
175a3(rnying rgyud): tu grang yang ci ma rung snyam pa'i mod la rab tu sbrebs pa pad+ma ltar gas pa'i sdug bsngal drag po dag gis rab tu nyen pa de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa brgyad dang / shin tu gleng ba la sogs pa brgyad po dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad cing bsku
175a4(rnying rgyud): pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su myong ngo // de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang yi dgas ltogs pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang / 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang / gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su 'gyur ba dang /
175a5(rnying rgyud): med par yang 'gyur zhing shin tu rid cing skams pa dang / lus dang yan lag dang dbang po mi 'tsham par gyur pa dang / bskal ba chen po drug tu skyes so// de nas las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo'i rnam par smin pa de khad kyis bslabs pa dang sngon gyi srid pas mtshams
175a6(rnying rgyud): nas yi dwags srin po chen po rab tu gdug pa gtum po lus gcig la mgo brgya pa dang / mgo sna tshogs pa dang / lus brgya mgo gcig pa dang / lus sna tshogs pa dang / yan lag mang po dang / yan lag sna tshogs dang / gdug pa'i lag cha sna
175a7(rnying rgyud): pa thogs pa 'khor rab tu mang po dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dang / 'jigs pa'i nga ro sna tshogs spogs pa/ gzugs dang / ro dang / dri dang / kha rlangs kyis thams cad spyi bung zhes byed pa/ rab tu 'jigs pa'i rdung grang ba dang tsha ba'i da
175b1(rnying rgyud): byas phyogs kun du khams 'khrugs par byed pa/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs par byed pa/ myos shing nyams par byed pa'i mthus klu'i rus dang / lha ma yin gyi ris dang / lha'i ris dang / tshungs pa'i ngas dang / 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'das
175b2(rnying rgyud): che man cad dbang du bsdus so// de sngon gyi rten pa'i stobs dang thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs nas thugs rjes 'dul bar gyur te thams cad kyis mtshan nyid bstan pa'i sgra 'di blangs so// e ma'o 'gro ba yongs ni bder gshegs lam yin te// sdug bsngal sreg
175b3(rnying rgyud): mdzad sgyu ma'i sprul par snang // yon tan rmad 'byung che ba'i rang bzhin 'di// sdug bsngal kun la bshes gnyen mgon po yin// rmongs dang 'khrul pa rab sel zhe sdang 'joms// kun 'byung bde ba rdo rje sku mchog ste// rdzogs ldan mdzad pa'i phrin las bsam
175b4(rnying rgyud): yas pas// thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis bdud rnams 'joms// sku mdog sna tshogs thabs mkhas bsam yas la// rol pa'i rtsed mor 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing // byang chub sems kyis lam la gnas par mdzad// 'gro ba kun las bde ba gcig pu pa/
175b5(rnying rgyud): a hoHdgyes pa'i mnyes pa nyid la gnas par mdzad// byin brlabs kun gyis bde ba nyid la snang // zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la kun las rnam par rgyal ba nyid du mkhyen nas mnyes par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i rdo rje bkor
175b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'dul ba'i nga rgyal chen po gzi brjid ston pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil
175b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor bya sprin chen po rnam par 'phro ba'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas khro mo'i dbang phyug chen mo mngon du phyung ste hi hi zhes dgyes pa'i gzim dngas kyis pad+ma rgyas par mdzad nas gnyis su med pa
176a1(rnying rgyud): bya/ 'khrul pa'i dbyas pas tham nas byung bab sems smon las/ rlung rlob shA brda ta d+ha ldan ma la la phaT pa Tata la ta la ba la drA gas brjod pas 'dzag tan drug gi phyogs pa na mtha' yas pa thams cad khyab par khro ba'i dkyil 'khor bya

176a3(rnying rgyud): kun du rab tu che me chem mo// shig shig rab tu shig shog/ kun du shig shig go// gtor gtor rab tu gtor gtor/ kun du gtor gtor ro// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i stong khams thams cad na gnas pa'i dbang che ba dang mthu che ba'i dbang phyug
176a4(rnying rgyud): rnon po la sogs pa thams cad brgyal rab tu brgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po nyid 'jigs byed chen po shin tu rngam pa'i spyi bung zhes byed pa'i 'bar ba chen po khrag 'thung sku sdug gnag cir yang 'gyur ba dbu dang phyag dang zhabs
176a5(rnying rgyud): stong khams kyi rdul skyed mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa de dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur te/ dur khrod chen por dgyes nas khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil na keng rwas chen po ri rab kyi steng gi 'bar ba chen po'i klong gi 'khor lo'i dkyil na dbang phyug chen po dang dur khrod
176a6(rnying rgyud): kye bdag po dregs pa chen po khyo shug gi gdan la brkyang bskum du bzhugs so// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin phung de dag kyang la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rjer gyur te shar phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'byung chen po rin po cher gyur

176b1(rnying rgyud): dang / 'bar ba'i klong na dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / gshin rje la sogs pa khyo shug gis gdan du byas pa la bzhugs so// btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams kyang so so'i sku la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// rigs
176b2(rnying rgyud): lnga'i he ru ka las gcig tu bstims te bsdus nas gcig gis mang po 'dul ba'i ngo mtshar bstan nas dregs pa chen po la sogs pa gtum pa'i sems kyis gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan nas mgrin gcig tu 'dug pa'i dngos brlang po'i gan mchog
176b3(rnying rgyud): smyes pa/ thang thang dang d+ha'i bdag btsad kar byed dma' 'gyu gang shin tu gtupa sems gyis nam nas zlab mo// das bcom ldan 'das dbus pa can po thams byed kyi bdag nyid das dbang ga phrag pacwo bcad zhabs bcad drug sanasangam par nga
176b4(rnying rgyud): kyis thugs rjes 'dul ba'i thabs kyis shin tu khros nas/ hU~M hUM hUM/ hA ha ha/ khA hi khA hi zhes brjod nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa chen po'i tshogs de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung / nang krol kun drangs/ yan lag kun bcad gtubs nas

176b6(rnying rgyud): drags pa blun po la sogs pa'i chung ma/ 'byung po thams cad kyi chung ma/ 'byung mo thams cad kyi d+ha mo'i yang rje mo// srin mo chen mo mA'i sbyin mo dang / tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sed mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dmar mo dang /

177a2(rnying rgyud): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i 'dul ba'i thabs kyis yang rigs lnga'i 'jigs byed snang bar byas nas de dag kun dgyes pha rol pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngon 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku

177a5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dang su khrag 'thung chen po'i skal tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dpa/ dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu mo rnams 'brel to// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'dung rin po che'i su la bdun rtsi mo dang / zhi ba mo dang / de con ma dang /

177b1(rnying rgyud): tA rnam par gyur to// de nas dgyes te te zhes brjod pas byang chub sems kyi sprin las dkar mo'i tshogs dang / kun mo'i tshogs dang / rmongs mo'i tshogs dang / thal byed ma'i rdzogs dang / sbos mo'i tshogs dang / gtum mo tshogs dang / sme sha na
177b2(rnying rgyud): kyi tshogs dang / mamo'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mcher dang chas nas 'thon to// 'thon nas kyang 'bar btsun po 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs nas 'khor bar 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang rang gi lag zas rgyas nas 'khod do// de nas
177b3(rnying rgyud): tu dgyes nas he zhes brjod pas seng gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / stag gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / wa gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / khyi gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / bzhad gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / kun gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / dra ru
177b4(rnying rgyud): gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / 'ug gdong chen mo'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshur du chus nas 'thon par gyur to// 'thon nus kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs kyi phyi rol nas 'khor ba'i rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod do//
177b5(rnying rgyud): de nas shin tu dgyes pas phyogs bcu'i zhing du ma lus par khyab nas phaT ces brjod pas rdo rje bsrings 'gro ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gdong mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'jig rten ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ro langs ma'i tsho gas rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar
177b6(rnying rgyud): rgyas nas bzhon par gyur to// 'thon nas kyang 'brar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgong shin tu gtum pa'i gzugs kyis gnas so// de nas dgyes pa chen po'i sprin las phyogs ban+d+ha nas phaT ces bsgrags pas thams cad khros nas ma mo thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas ga
177b7(rnying rgyud): la bar yud tsam gyis bkye'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun thugs rje chen po'i bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag byung ngo //
178a1(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra mahA a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+ha oM oM oM zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po de dag gi sta nas 'thon to// mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi rgya mtshor btsud pa las gan ma nas uts+tshuShA
178a2(rnying rgyud): kro d+ha phyung bas 'dam kun 'thungs te/ dran pa slar rnyed nas khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyang dbu dgu brgya/ phyag stong brgyad brgya zhabs brgyad brgya/ sku 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil na bzhugs par mthong ngo // de'i dus su 'jig rte
178a3(rnying rgyud): drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa kun du dregs pa'i dbang phyug thams cad 'dul ba thabs sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab par so sor snang bas dus gcig tu btul to// de nas de dag shin tu 'dar zhing bred pas rab tu zhum pa'i nga rol 'bangs su mchi 'bangs
178a4(rnying rgyud): su mchi/ 'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na/ mgo dang lus ni brgyar 'gas shing // snying yang 'gas shing gtubs gyur cig/ rul myags myig nas brlag pa dang // dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par shog/ ces 'bangs su mchi ba mna' bor nas dkyil
178a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi gdan la bzhag go// thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu yang smras pa/ bdag cag rnams kyi mchis brang dang // ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams// dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol// dpa' bo lha rje bzhes su gsol// bdag cag so so'i
178a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor bcas kyis// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yang // gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba ltar// g.yo sgyu med cing gus ldan pa'i// sems kyis blangs nas spyi bo yi// gtsug tu bzhag ste bkur bar bgyi// de yi
178a7(rnying rgyud): pa ci yang rung // ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag sgrub// gal te dpa' bo'i spyan snga 'dir// smras pa bzhin du ma bsgrubs na// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying // gas gtubs dum bur ral bar mchi// zhes smras so// de nas de'i chung ma'i cho ga
178b1(rnying rgyud): sring mo dang bu mo'i tshogs thams cad yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa// bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kun// dpa' bo chen po'i 'bangs su mchi// dpa' bo chen pos bdag cag rnams// las kyi dngos grus stsal du
178b2(rnying rgyud): zhes smrasmraso// de nas bcom ldan 'angs dbyas pa 'i dpas rgyag du cing shi nga myu dbul 'khor bya sbyo ma bya di/ zhes nga 'byung bar la pa la sa ba rang bad kyi kyil lce ba rje nam pa
178b3(rnying rgyud): cad pa'o// sa ldan smrab gyi ldan yang kyil khyong gas rten dus gags byu zla ba byung / deb gshegs pa ba ga 'ang stod du mo dang bdus pa tshigs dge ga sung shes
178b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rngam pa las gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag phyung ngo // // oM ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra mahA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Ti ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hUM hU~M phaT/ oM rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba dud+h+r-i ta ka ha na
178b5(rnying rgyud): da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Ta~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+To ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hU~M hUM phaT/ oM ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la nI sarba duSh+TaM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra d+hA ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri tsA la nI hUM
178b6(rnying rgyud): phaT/ oM mr-i tAM swaid+ha rat+na ma hA kro d+hi shwa ra~M bi d+ha ma hU~M phaT/ oM hrIHmai hA s+pha ra sA twA ma hA bad+hA k+Sho d+hi shwa rI ShA hi hUM phaT/ oM sarba a mo g+ha ma hA kra d+ha shU ri bi shwa dz+nyA phaT/ badz+ra go dA h+NaH/ badz+ra tse dwai haH/ badz+ra pra ma~M ha haH/ badz+ra She tA lI taH/ badz+ra tsaSh+TapA d+haH/ badz+ra
178b7(rnying rgyud): badz+raMb+ta s+pha rI d+haH/ badz+ra s+pha shAnA~M haH/ badz+ra sa ha mu~M ShA he/ badz+ra b+ha r+b+ba mu ShI hi/ badz+ra sr-i kle muSh+Ti te/ badz+ra shwanA mu khI he/ badz+ra b+hi d+hi mu ShI he/ badz+ra kAd lu ShI he/ badz+ra kha ga mu khI ta/ badz+ra ul+la ka mu khI he/ badz+ra Ir+ya te dza ta dA dzAHbadz+ra a ma Na haM/
179a1(rnying rgyud): shA la / // na r+m+ma k+Shuk+kur+dz+dzak+ShAm+b+ha/ b+h+ya/ 1 du/ san sa su chu sa
179a2(rnying rgyud): paT/ oM dz+wa la khros pas ni mdzad pa// thugs rjes khros dpa la rnam pa'i tshogs// 'byor ba'i byin brlob pa mau tshaM// de nyid du ni bdag la gros// oM ba~Mdz+haiM kro nas ma yi s+t+wa~M/ oM bar+b+ba bod+d+ha sa ma ya ti/ a la~M u la/ ta lo ta pa ti/ dzaH/ gon+d+ha ro/ triSha
179a3(rnying rgyud): yo gi nI khA hi hoH/ hUM ha he phaT ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad tshig rab tu tshig kun du tshig go// 'bar rab tu 'bar kun du 'bar ro// thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyis gang rab tu gang kun du rab tu gang bar gyur
179a4(rnying rgyud): to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i tshogs chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo chen po'i byin brlabs phyag rgya 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
179a5(rnying rgyud): nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// dbang po'i yul de rig pa'i rnams// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing // mnyam pa'i ngang nyid rtogs gsal na// thams cad bde ba chen po'i rgya// bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// khro bo khro mo thams cad
179a6(rnying rgyud): kun// gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro bsgoms na// bskul du spyod thams cad phyag rgya yin// zla mede chen pos de skad gsungs// yan lag snying po rtse lnga rtse dgu bcu gcig tu// las rnams so sor rab tu bsgom// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i zhabs//
179a7(rnying rgyud): rtag tu rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur// thabs chen re re baspyod na ni// pad+ma chags med re 'byung // rdo rje pad+ma de 'byor na// sems can thams cad sprin med// byang chub zhing du skye bar 'gyur// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyang // khro bo'i dkyil 'khor
179b1(rnying rgyud): ska b+h+yas te// dbu ma dkyil 'khor bskul bskyod na// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor tha sa \u0f7fdgayo// lag gi 'du byed bstod b+h+yas na// rig 'dzi zhing khams thams cad nag/ rkang pa'i skabs can gnan mchong na// sdug brgyal ma bzad thams
179b2(rnying rgyud): cad dang // bdud dang log 'dren thams cad gnon// yan lag thams cad bskul bamigs na// baspu bu ga re re nas// khro bo grangs med rdul snyed 'gro// de dag sprul pa grangs med kyis// phyogs bcu khams mang rdul snyed // khro ba'i dod rnams
179b3(rnying rgyud): phran snyed// thugs rjes gdul zhing dbyings su bstim// thams cad khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dang // khro mo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'dus// thams cad rdo rje'i brag snyings dang // mdo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bar// 'di ni hU~M rgya chen po yin// ste
179b4(rnying rgyud): bgegs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// rdo rje 'khor lo na mgo gdengs// 'og gi 'jig rten bgegs 'dul ba'i// rdo rje thong gshol ni spar dang // rdo rje gtun chen dril bu'o// shar gyi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba dang /
179b5(rnying rgyud): chen po'i dbyug pa'o// lho yi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// rin chen mi mgo'i dbyug pa dang // gshin rje chen po'i rkang bzung ba'o// nub kyi dgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// sbrul dang sti ra'i dbyug pa dang // khyung chen gash+log gis rab tu rde bas// rgya
179b6(rnying rgyud): che rnams rked par gtub// byang gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// rin po che yi dbug ti dang // ni mgo gsum pa'i dbyug to can// gnod sbyin gdon rnams tshar gcod pa'o// mtshams bzhi'i bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// phyogs bzhi dag gis
179b7(rnying rgyud): gdul bar 'gyur// gal te de yis mdul na// byang shar mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje rtse gsum ni mgo gdangs// i sha nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// 'byung po de dun rab tu brtul// shar lho mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje
180a1(rnying rgyud): sa / sa sa sgru smra smra/ // ma // na 'a shA na 'ad
180a2(rnying rgyud): byung phyugan brnams/ sbyin pan chos sa rnams dgang da rgya mtshangs kyi ga skye ga/ rlung gi bdin g+sag drug pa tha dzad/ ga pang ting byang byashin 'ardzam // gapa 'thams cad dang
180a3(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten bgags 'dul phyir// phyag cha ri rab chen po // jig chen po phyag na brnams// 'og gi bzhig/ rnams 'dul ba'o// gzhan yang ti d+ha'i dkyil 'thor gyis// cha dang grang ba'i sdug stsal pa'i// me yid dkyil 'khor chen po yas// rnams

180a7(rnying rgyud): rab tu gsol// nub kyi khro ba'i phyag rgyan// ster chen po'i dbyug pa dang // pad+ma tshigs med rab tu 'bar// rung chen dmang gyis bka nga gso// ngog ba'i gcan// phyir chen po'i dbyug pa dang // rdo rdzar+tha gra ma rab tu 'bang // dang chen
180b1(rnying rgyud): ga ba gso// l+h+wa ma rnams byung khro dang mthan// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgyan// rgyang gzhan dag dang mthun par bshad// ma ma rnams ci phyug ldan// bdag rten 'das mngargya las bshad// gas nga'i steng bar khon to sa pa pu thal dra ba las mas/
180b2(rnying rgyud): pa rdzu sas ma // nas pacom ldan 'das dkyis btsun pa pa de dag gi dkyila'i khor stan pa'i phyir byed du brjod pa 'di 'arjo // 'bar ba'i dkyil 'a skyabs bde ba// brgya pani yas rnam par ba/
180b3(rnying rgyud): d+h+ri pa'i dang dzin// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// thod sngal sna chags nyi mas brjod// 'byung ba'i 'bri ba mang po 'byug/ khyi mchogs he gcig dang stag// gtam pa'i dom kyis spar bas ni// dbang thug sa chen lnga sogs bzung /
180b4(rnying rgyud): gnag sngogadag sar gnag dang // dmar gnag lding gargya 'jigs pa'i bu// dbugasul phrug drug zhabs bzhi bzung // rgyun nas sa phyogs dz+nyAn// rngam pa'i su chen 'jugs par thogs// yul dang thong na ha tha // rta gi 'jig tun khyer du
180b5(rnying rgyud): bcas// rdo rje drang chen grang ba dang // ril gri dgra stag shol la sogs// rang gi phyog ma sna tshogs bsdams// btsun ma 'dzin pa'i tshigs dang 'brel// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang // sgo bzhi phyag rgyar rab mdzes shing // sras dang bya ma tshogs
180b6(rnying rgyud): gtso// badz+ra gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi stan dang lag cha dang // ci bgyi zhes te chas te gnas// zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun du gsal bar sbyar to// de nas dgyes pa chen po bcom
180b7(rnying rgyud): ldan 'angs nyid kyis dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phru 'a dri ba lamadza dza gas zo'i chog 'di byung ngo // oM ho// bskal par bcas shing drug tshogs 'bar ba yi// nyon mongs kun g.yo kyil 'khor 'khor lo brjod dka' ba'i// ji snyed 'jig rten rgyan
181a1(rnying rgyud): rjes rdus bla pas pags pa// rnamags blagal brnam pa dbu tan tan pa canas// zhan pa'i gdug ma gan zugasapa bdag dub // mas yan su gzugs sbyin rdul bas ma las rgyas// gas ma ba sa /

181b1(rnying rgyud): yin gzhan na med pa ste// rol pakun la mnga' brnyes shing // srid pa 'jig rten thams cad kun// sangs rgyas nyid de dus gsum du// ma g.yos snyan gnas snying po ste// rang bzhin che ba'i yon tan las// ma rtogs rmongs pa'i 'gro ba la// rtswa 'phrul dra bas
181b2(rnying rgyud): mngon rdzogs pa// snying rje chags pa'i dam tshig gis// nga rgyal nyid kyi sku chen bstan// gdug cing gtum pa'i khams gsumed// 'dul ba'i zhing du rab stor zhing // phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs par mdzad// ye shes ngo mtshar tshwam ngam gyis// chos bzhi
181b3(rnying rgyud): dgra che ba'i lha// ye shes sku ste khyad par che// chags pa'i tshogs kyis mtshan mni// 'dod chags chen po nyid kyi sgra// gtum rngam gdug pas mtshan pas na// zhe sdang chen po nyid kyi sa// gdul bya zhing du rang skyong zhing // chos nyid mnyam las bzhengs
181b4(rnying rgyud): gti mug chen po nyid kyi sgra// hU~M bcung dag pa'i spyod yul ba// thugs sgra gsung las 'phros pa dang // rgyal ba nga yis mtshan pas na// nga rgyal chen po nyid kyi sku// gsang ba'i snying po bzhi bcu gnyis// thig la~M thugs su bsdus pa nyid// gzhan du ma
181b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan pas na// de nyid phrag dog nyid lha rdzogs// skyong gsum stong gi stong chen po// 'jig rten khams mang sna tshogs pa// rdul dang bye ba la sogs pa'i// bgrang ba las ni rab 'dus mtshan// de nyid snang zhing srid pa nyid// 'jigs byed snga gsung thugs kyi
181b6(rnying rgyud): chos sku ye shes rang bzhin la// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thig le mchog/ snying po thig le bsam yas nyid// 'jigs byed dbu dgu pacwa brgyad phyug/ sgyu mas mtshan pa'i dra ba yin// de nyid tshogs dang dkyil 'khor sngags// gcig la gsum du mchog tu sngags
181b7(rnying rgyud): yul dang 'byung ba de nyid do// bdag rig gzhan don snying po nyid// thabs dang shes rab phyag mtshan pa// gnyis meng rig pa'i ye shes che// maung dang gzugs dang dpur gyur pa// phyag dang zhabs su rnam par btags// btags pa las ni 'phros pa'i sku/
182a1(rnying rgyud): yang med las cir yang snang // la 'arlang pa ga gi rdzu 'phral ba// dra ba 'angartsal la bar ba rdzogs// btags pa zal gnanams nyid lhan// spyan rnams nyid mnyam pa nyid// de bzhin dbyungs kyi sal slor// ma pa dra par snga mag
182a2(rnying rgyud): pa// gzhan du mi gzigs yul la gzigs// pad+ma 'khyim pa nyid sku gsung // mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i dngos po 'jig/ ye shes chen po'i ldan bsrad las// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyur ba yi// me yi tshogs kyi gzhan phug klog/ bdud rtsi zhing du sbyor bas na/
182a3(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi mchog gi khro bo yin// sku nyid mnyam pa rdzogs pa las// sna tshogs 'char bar rab ston pa// ye shes lha 'phral stobs chen po// mi g.yo mchog gi 'du 'phro las// gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa ni// shes rab tshogs la 'phral ba dang // thugs
182a4(rnying rgyud): dra ba'i byin brlabs kyis// 'khor yug ji snyed mtha' klas pa// dbyings nyid bde la spyod pa ste// 'phros nas dbang du byed pa'i don// rta yi kar thabs rdzu 'phrul gyis// gcig kyang yal ba ma yin pa'o// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// blo 'phrul
182a5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor mthas klas par// rtsed mo mchog gi phyag rgya ni// brkyang dang bskum pa zhabs tshul te// thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i don// rang dbang thabs rkyen grul po yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung ba// thig le mchog gi gnas la rdzogs
182a6(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug lha chen la sogs lnga// zil gnon khros pa'i phyag mtshan pa// sna tshogs mtshon rnon mang po bsnams// nga rgyal gdug pa'i zhe sdang gzod// gti mug chos sde sgyu 'phrul pa// dri ba'i thags rje mtha' dag ni// khros pa'i
182a7(rnying rgyud): rdza mos// menyas pa'i thig ler dgod pa'o// gshin rje gshed por bdag pa'i byar/ gangag pa ma rnams sa dag sprob bden/ rgyal gan du thar pas na// dus dang bdud kyi khyang med pa'o// gdag pas
182b1(rnying rgyud): la// rang rtags ye shes can du 'azhag/ dang khrod rdzas dang khrag 'thung ba'o// g.yang gzhi stagag pags can dgas// 'jigs byed rtang rje'i dam chog na// klu shoH ba gcod yadzad pa// sa ga la mgan zhes mdzeg d+ha bsgrag// ngamyal
182b2(rnying rgyud): gas 'du byud pa// brgyal 'phrog pa'i mchog ste// kun du bzung pa'i spyod yul la// sngags kyi snying po nyid pa// na rmugs bud rngu'adzung // rdo rje thugs kyi byin pa kyis// ni mdza mas ni rnam par bklags// mi ma gta ga
182b3(rnying rgyud): nyon mas rgya ma bya par phyir// zhan song chen 'jung bar ldar// 'jig rten 'bar ba'i na chen po// bskal pa las rgya zil gnon pa// rdo rje ma yi 'bang ba 'thung // nyon mo snyoms par byed// 'jigs pad thabs kyi dmachog pas// bas
182b4(rnying rgyud): yis 'jig rten 'khor yug baHsa/ rang gi sku lo gzhal med brnyas// sgra 'phral du ba'i l-i shrIs ni// zil hU~Ms gnon pa dur khrod snying // ma gnyis kyis chen po// sbyin barma kyis/ e mig yo dre ba las// rang bzhin ram chen
182b5(rnying rgyud): maman// rdo rje tha man pa nyid chags// mas gsum 'dul bur yang de da/ zhi pa nyid// na cig ni thog la dbang rkyen yin// rkyen cig sanyid// nithig 'a rol pa nyid// nyan zag las phrin la
182b6(rnying rgyud): les chags dbang 'dul// hani thig le las kun rdzogs// na thig le ye zhes thugs// rten theg yos gsung sbran pa// te ni thAg las tsham ngam lce// twe ni thig le rol pa nyid// rte ni thig le dbang thugs yid// ta ni thig las drag yul pa/
182b7(rnying rgyud): thugs cher rdzogs// rten thag les dkyil 'khor ba// 'jigs byed mchog gi spyi 'phrul te// drabs zil ga n-i lam 'gog go// hU~M ni ye shes rdzogs kyi rdzogs// sprin yo shi nyid// rkyen mo zhes thugs spugasung // hU~Mn ye shes
183a1(rnying rgyud): las// hU~M ni thig le ye shes so// phaT ni sku yi thugs kyi thugs// phaT ni gsung gi gsung gi thugs// phaT ni thugs kyi thugs kyi thugs// phaT ni chos sku'i thugs kyi thugs// phaT ni chos sku'i gsung gi thugs// phaT ni chos thugs thugs
183a2(rnying rgyud): kyi thugs// sgyu 'phrul dra bas dgyes pa ho// dbang phyug chags pas dgyes pa ho// kar thabs rol pas dgyes pa ho// sku gsung thugs ldan dgyes pa ho// yon tan las kyis dgyes pa ho// pho nya 'du 'phros dgyes pa ho// kun la snang bas dgyes pa ho// byin
183a3(rnying rgyud): kyi bas sa dkris pa te// la skyes pa 'o// shes rol par byis pag/ ci yang min pa sa kyis pa to// bad brjod pa'i kyis pabya// chos kyi sto sa kyad nga skyes pa'o// des dkyis pachen pa nyid la ting shin gyi dbas par bu // mas pas
183a4(rnying rgyud): cad gcig gi rang bzhin du gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa stong phrag brgya las dgyes pa chen po'i byin brlabs dang yon tan mchog ston pa'i le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos 'jigs byed kyi bsod
183a5(rnying rgyud): nams sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su// 'jigs byed 'khor lo rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas// 'jigs pa'i
183a6(rnying rgyud): tshogs tshon de dbus su// bdag nyid drag po bzlos tshul du// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su// 'jigs byed rdo rje rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// kho mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom//
183a7(rnying rgyud): zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen da dbus su// lus dang ngag yid byin brlabs nas// bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su// 'jigs byed rin chen rigs
183b1(rnying rgyud): ga/ / da / gas / tu rgyu
183b2(rnying rgyud): ra// yang rig sa dpar lca // 'khong la ba lal da gyi dri// gnapa pa cheg stong ba sa/ ma tshogs dngadran par ba// dang ga ba sa
183b3(rnying rgyud): dartser 'khor rdzogs par dgod// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dadus sa// sras dang gi tshad kyi r+b+ha stanas// bdag nyid dag par gnas nas// phragasung blugs ci dkyil 'khong parnam// 'jigs byi rdzogs dkyil 'kho ni// te bcwa lnga thu gas
183b4(rnying rgyud): thugs// yon tan phrin las rdzogs par bsgom// rgyan dang cha lugs la sogs pa// 'jigs pa'i tshogs ni ji bzhin par// tsham ngam chen po'i cha lugs bsgom// glu dang ga ra dang phyag rgya dang // shes rab thabs su shes pa dang // byang chub sems kyi mchod pa
183b5(rnying rgyud): dang // brda la sogs pa'i yon tan dang // bzla' dang bca' dang btung dang ngag/ longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad kyi// mdor na tshogs rnams mngon du 'phrug// sa pa'i snying po kha na \u0f7f ngas pa las 'jigs byed chen po'i bsod nams ston pa dam tshig
183b6(rnying rgyud): sam du gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos cho ga dang dkyil 'khor yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'odi brjod rdo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung thugs// chos dbyings rnam dag dkyil 'khor ro// kas sngags
183b7(rnying rgyud): skye yi dkyil 'khor las// shes 'jug yum gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs dang // lus gang lus du gsum gyi ched// rang gi rig pas ci nus par// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gnod bsrad sa gnon byin gyis bzlas
184a1(rnying rgyud): ljon pa lcug phran sdod gcig dang // ma reg tshon gyis ji bzhin du// goms par bya ba'i ting 'dzin dbab// 'jigs byed sku gsung dkyil 'khor bzlas// gnas dang zla dang rdzas rnams ni// tshogs kyi mchog tu dmigs pas gzhag/ dang por
184a2(rnying rgyud): mchod sbyin dam pas mchod// gzugs dang lugs chen dung mchog ni// ci 'dod snang bar bdag gis dgod// 'jigs byed dbang du bdag zhugs nas// khro mo ji snyed 'khor du bya// bar chad ting 'dzin mchog gis zlog/ gsang ba'i snying por nyid bshams te/
184a3(rnying rgyud): 'das pa bdag tu mnyam sbyar zhing // thugs kyi sngags kyis spyan drangs nas// bdag gi lus la zhugs tshul du// de yi gzugs gzung mchog tu bstim// dzaHzhes lan gsum brjod pas na// de nyid bsod nams lus thob cing // ye shes lnga yi dngos grub sbyin//
184a4(rnying rgyud): nya 'du 'phro mang po rnams// de yi dgos pa byed par 'gyur// yang na sa gzhir ba mnyam la// phyag rgya gzugs dang snying po rnams// lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya// dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen// rdo rje dung chen dmar gyis dgang // dung dang srog shing gsar rnyid dang // zhing /
184a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran dang // ji snyed pa yi rdzas rnams kun// 'jigs byed chen po'i ting 'dzin dang // nyams pa med pa'i sems kyis spyad// b+hU 'jal dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rdeng dang bcas pa'i bsal ga las// raM ba srid par rab tu bslab// bsnyen pa dang
184a6(rnying rgyud): ni nye bsnyen pa// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen pos// zhag ni tshong zhing rtags byung na// dkyil 'khor mthun pa nyid du sbyar// zhag ni sum du phrag drug gam// drug tu do gu ba cu rtsa drug tu// 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'jigs byed tshogs la bdag lus
184a7(rnying rgyud): dbul// de nyid dkyil 'khor nyid du brtag/ 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig las// rnams kyang 'da' bang ma mdzad do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid ngas pa las dgyes pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig gi le'u ste sum cu bzhi pa'o// / da nas
184b1(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos sngags kyi skang po 'di ched du brjod do// a ki du na dz+wA la maN+Da lA phaT phaT phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shI tA ru ka ma d+ha kra d+hi shwa ra hU~M phaT/ ru lA ma hA sA ma yA nU ru lu ru wa d+h+wa dz+nye m+be/ oM mAn+ta badz+ra shrI ha ru ka bar+d+ha kro d+he shwa rI sarba draSh+TAn hU~M phaT/
184b2(rnying rgyud): lu ma hA sa ma ya hU~M ru lu ru lu dz+nyi b+h+yo Sh+kaM/ oM rat+na ma hA shrI he ru kar tA ma hA kro d+hi shwa ra bi d+ha mu khA hU~M phaT/ ru lu ru lu ma hA sa ma ya~Md+b+ha d+d+ho d+h+waM/ oM dz+dzaHpad+ma ma hA shrI te ruka pad+ma ma dA kr-i d+he shwa ri khA ti hU~M phaT/ ru lu ma~M hA sa ma ya dU ru lu ru li ru lu hU b+h+yo d+hi/ oM ka rma ma hA hrA he duH[।]
184b3(rnying rgyud): ag ma kro d+he shwa ri bi shI d+hA b+he hU~M phaT/ ru lu ma d+hu sa ma ya twAM/ ru lu ra wA ru luT+Te b+h+yo hU~M/ oM ma~M hA sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra tA pad+ma a ma~M b+hi ma hA badz+ra shrI hi ru ka/ ma hA sa ma ya han+ta trA phaT/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru mu t+l-i Sh+To d+h+waM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma d+hA pad+ma shrI he ru kA man+ta tsA la mahA
184b4(rnying rgyud): N+Dal k+ShA ya Sh+Ta/ \u0f7f/ // mar+thA/ kA la ldan rgyal dan/ me ma seMng rjod tam/ sa ta // man+ta ga sa trA ma rgyas ma / d+hag la/ la la s+ho/ nyimams nyid cig pa
184b5(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'o// dkyil 'khor byazhi bcwo gnyis ting rdzogs// sangs rgyas dzadza d+he d+ha k+Sha/ tsa ma bri dkyil 'khor bas ma yas kyi// sku gsung thAgasus bdag sbyor cig/ oM pra rde ba~M ta~Ms pa b+h+yoH/ oM badz+ra gnas pa ya k+She/ oM oM d+hi s+ya s+t+wa~M/ kam la maH pa lA A ma
184b6(rnying rgyud): rgyus 'dzul ni tams pa log 'a hU~M zhal yal sa// gas pa'i ba kho nga dul su 'gas can bsdun rnas pa sto po'i byung ba nas bya bya sa nams pa rdul pa na/ da nas pa mya ldan sa byas pa
184b7(rnying rgyud): pos phung po dang / khams dang lce mched sbyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te gdug pa'i tshogs byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di spu dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga ta pad+mas ma yo ga nI dzaH/ zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams
185a1(rnying rgyud): cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi snying po kun du pad+mar gyur te/ dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad pa las dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed du srid pa'i rtse mor thug par gnas par gyur to// de nas yang dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs
185a2(rnying rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ri rab chen po brkyang bskum gyi tshul gyis 'dril zhing / oM a b+hi tsa ra ba shIn zhes brjod pas sgra'i tshogs dang / klu'i tshigs dang / gnod sbyin chen po dang / srin po dang / maM dang / mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa thams cad
185a3(rnying rgyud): rang dbang med par zhabs 'dril ba'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to// de nas yang ha haM a bi ra tsa tiSh+Tha zhes brjod pas la la ni lus shin tu brdzes te raM rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur te/ la la ni mngon sum gcan mar ri rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to// de
185a4(rnying rgyud): nas yang sa 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba gdug cing zhe sdang che ba dang ba med cing rdo rje theg pa smod pa zhig yongs kyi 'jig rten na gnas par mkhyen to// mkhyen nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ oM pad+ma a ma yo ga ni ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M zhes brjod pas kun du sku chags
185a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdag nyid dang / kun du gsung chags pa'i cha lugs dang / kun du thugs chags par gyur pa dang / kun du rin po che chags pa chen po dang / kun du phrin las chags pa chen por gyur te/ shar dang/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / dbus chen nyid khrag gi dpa'
185a6(rnying rgyud): klong keng rus chen po'i ri rab chen po na dus kun dang de nyid snang bar gyur to// de yang kun du sku lnga 'jigs pa'i gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun du gsung lnga'i da ro bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'jigs byed bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun du thugs lha'i
185a7(rnying rgyud): rol pa dang / zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jigs pa dang / rigs lnga tshom bu chen po'i steng du gnas par gyur to// de las mchog gi snying po chen po ma~M hArat+na ti la ka'i dburang byung las rab tu sku gsung thugs spras pa'i gzhal med khang na 'jigs byed chen po'i
185b1(rnying rgyud): pang ba rgya drugasum phyag drug tu gnas tu gnyis su med par bzhugs na// da sa byong dras dang / dbu dang / phyag dang / zhabs dang / 'phang ba snyas du rdul skad du phyag khyed chen po sam chis ma khyab par khebs par mamadza// dadang /
185b2(rnying rgyud): nga bdunan pas na na pas du ga/ dang byed las de man pa ba // mam rdzogasu brjod pasadas pa'i na pasadapa 'dug napa
185b3(rnying rgyud): cing 'bru ba'i rnal 'byor ba la gnod pa'i tshags 'khor bar ma gyis mi khyab pa dang / g.yog dang yang g.yug tu bcas pa'i bdud chen pa de ga nyen gyi yang kyis gdangs te rab tu brgyal na pa mi mthong bar rmongs pa'i gnas na pa dang de mi rten med pa
185b4(rnying rgyud): sa sbyor rab chen pa ga' gyi gnas ma phyin par gyur to// den 'jigs byung can pas te badri ma mams brjod pas gajig pa'i thong pral/ ma mngon pa'i 'am rjes te nya chen pa'i tshogs 'dul ba'i 'a' 'is sbyar ba zapa pa med
185b5(rnying rgyud): b+har te// de nas dbus pa chen po dpal 'dzugs byed rten pa de dag ga dkyil 'khor lha 'phrul rnon po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzini lha snyoms par zhugs te/ dwe bzhinA gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsung dang thags dang yon tan dang phrin las las thugs kyi dkyil
185b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor thig gi nan pa zhes bya ba di nyid ste dza \u0f7fga la chen pa 'dam tshig d+hA 'phrul rla m+bis N+yaing ngo // khrag ma mya ba thong 'phrul ba'o// tshogs napa 'jam// 'a gyim yor// 'khor margyobs bkod bar bya ba// byang ba
185b7(rnying rgyud): sa // ba mamyong bzhi nga / // nyis 'ag bcwa/ kyis ba ba du / ngasas nas bgi
186a1(rnying rgyud): brjid// 'jigs byed chen po khrag 'thung ba'i// rdo rje snying po zag la thugs// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrang// bram bzhis mchod ngos bzhir na// dgras pa chen po'i rdul 'brang ba// phyugs bzhi grwa dang bcas par ni// yul pa nal
186a2(rnying rgyud): 'byor phra men rnams// ri rab zhing chen steng na gnas// 'bar bas phyag bsnams chen po ni// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // pad+ma'i gzhal med rnge'u chung brdung // zhing gi zhags pas 'ching ba dang // kha T+wAM 'phen cing 'khril ba ste// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas//
186a3(rnying rgyud): gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang // sgra bag phya ga rgyur ba mangs par// bran mo'i tshogs chen mang po rnams// 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis gnas par byed// gas pa'i snying po khon te dngas pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gdug pa'i chags byin
186a4(rnying rgyud): gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du 'dzad pa 'di brjod do// byed pa rdo rje mchog nyid kyi// lha 'phru
186a5(rnying rgyud): klu
186a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i sa gzhir ni// rkang mthil thig gdab dkyil 'khor bri// oM dang mAM gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// de las phra mo rdo rjes dbang // phra bar sa bsdus mthil du gzung // yum gyi tshogs su shes pas brtags// gang gi yul yang dbang du sbar// mi mthun gzugs su
186a7(rnying rgyud): brtags pa ni// dra ba'i 'du 'phros de lus bzhin// lugs ka bzhin du hi du brtag/ de las 'od bzhin mthil du gzung // gsang nas ngag le ma he du bya// rlung zla'i steng du mkhas pas gzhag/ drag po lnga yi sbyor ba yis// ming khams gzhan du shin tu gtsar
186b1(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid rje gi tshogs bcas pa// ma skyes pa yi yi ge bsgom// bya ba chos khams de yi tshogs// mu~M du byin brlabs yi ger bstim// brtan pa a yi 'phro 'dra yis// nam mkha' bzhin du shin tu bsgom// brtan 'gyur a yi snying po bzlas// nyams su lon par
186b2(rnying rgyud): ma gyur tshe// 'jug pa'i yid dang nyams su sbyor// dang po'i gnas su shes pa dang // rnam pa mang por mnyam du'o// de las mi snang gzugs zhi ba// rab tu blo yi thig gnas ni// gzhan du nams kyang mi bstan cing // gzhon dang spyad dang 'tshong la sogs// longs
186b3(rnying rgyud): da rnam par gyu ba dang // ma yinan/ yongs pa ba dang can 'gas nan// rnamam kyi zin pa dmags sa te/ rnam pas kyi N+DI nga/ kyang d+hI pa migs stsal// ga chags kyu lo gnyis bzhidang // rnam
186b4(rnying rgyud): sba bar ma bya'o// byed pa rdo rje ga sha' yi tshogs// bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi gling bzhi'i lam// kun du bzang po thabs tshul ba// tsam bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// chos khams zla ba ma mo tshogs// bzhi bcwa rtsa gnyis gleng sbyong ba// kun du bzang mo shes rab tshul//
186b5(rnying rgyud): gsha' la ye shes thugs kyi thugs// chom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// de ni chos khams a la bstim// chos kyi chos bya ba yi dbyings// kun du bzang mo bde ba'i yum// de yi ngang du tshogs kun brtags// sa chu me yi 'byung ba rnams// de yi dbyings nas/
186b6(rnying rgyud): 'thung bar ni// 'dod pa'i bdag la shin tA brtag/ mi gnas nam mkha'i mtha' klas par// goms par 'dod pa thod pa dang // chu las sa bzhin 'gro ba dang // bsreg bya 'bar ba'i dbus gnas dang // che ba rlung gis bteg nas kyang // phyogs bcu kun du phyin

187a2(rnying rgyud): bar mnyam sbyor lngas// sangs rgyas kun bdag sbyin gyis brla // oM lA~M ma ma tshon bzhin du// sgra 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gA/ oM// lugs su blags pa pade 'dran// de nyi dgazugs lam mchog grub bya'o// de nyid mnyam nyid mnyam skyor las// @
187a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// s+pho l-i a yi tshon bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni// de nyid khyad par lam mchog go// chos dbyings rtogs pa mnyam sbyor las// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab/

187a5(rnying rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lugs su thugs pa bzhin du ni// de ni phri nI las ye shes so// de las ting 'dzin sgyu 'phrul bsgom// rnga ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog nyid ni// rtsa bcu rigs kyi phyag rgya 'asgom// de da dang /
