187a7(rnying rgyud): bcings shing // hUM hUM hU~M gos lan gsum du// rang lus ngag yid byin gyis brlab// mu gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bskul// 'dri lnga rgya bcings byin gyis brlab// bskyed pa rdzogs par gsor ba yis/ bzhi bcurtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor bri// nas pa
187b1(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis// de 'dod las rnams grub par 'gyur// bcu pa drag po mthing gnag dpung // 'gying ba'i gar gyis gsor ba yis// gsung snyan sgra yi bro rdebs pa'i// phyag rgya brgyad du sbyor bas na// phaT phaT hU~M gis gsor ba yis// snying po thugs rtags phyag
187b2(rnying rgyud): bsnams pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyal po las// bsod nams lus 'jig dbang du 'gyur// ci 'dod re pa thob par mdzad// brgyan pa sgregs pa pho nya dang // tshangs pa dbang po 'dod dbang dang // mdor na bcu gnyis gling gi bdag/ drag shul mthu yi dregs pa can//
187b3(rnying rgyud): sngags shing brgyal te blo sbyor nas// bum pa bzang po 'bul bar 'gyur// lha mo klu mo brgyan pa dang // rta dang glang po bzhon pa dang // gnas dang rten dang bgo ba dang // gtsug na nor bu yod pa dang // ci 'dod yid la bsam pa 'bul// de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// de
187b4(rnying rgyud): yi dgos pa thams cad ni// ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po brtan par gzung ba bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thugs rjes
187b5(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba 'dul ba bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ye nas dag chos la// log rtog rnam pa gnyis su 'grub// thams cad 'byung ba lnga las skyes// thams cad gtsang zhing dri med las// rnam rtog mi mthun
187b6(rnying rgyud): sor gyur// la la'i sman la la la'i dug/ sman du ma gyur gang yang med// thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig las// mi mthun khyad par so sor snang // sus kyang mya byas su byed yod// rnam rtog zhags pas so sor brjong // sdug bsngal ma lus 'khrul 'khor dang // ma
187b7(rnying rgyud): gsum phyin ci log bzhi dang // dus gsum 'gro lnga thams cad dang // nyon mongs sdug bsngal thams cad sbyong // rnam par thar pa lha rdzogs byed// sa bcu rdzogs shing sangs rgyas sa yang rdzogs// de phyir sman 'di bsrub par bya// kun la phan pa'i mA na yin pas/
188a1(rnying rgyud): de phyi nga dang bdag ma 'dzin// gtsang dang sde ba'i blo rtog por// thams cad mnyam pa tid du spyod// rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid rtogs// thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa spyod// snying rjeg rdungadu ma zos par gyis// bdud rtsi mchog ni mnyam pa'i dbyings/
188a2(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi'i don ni ste shi med// bdud rtsi gnas ni byang chub sems// bdud rtsi las ni nam tog stong // bdag dpal tshogs shing 'gro don mdzad// sman gyi byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// nga na sang spong zhing mtho ris 'grub// gser 'gyung sman dang mun sel bzhin/
188a3(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs 'grib// rkyen las byung ba'i dag rnams dang // rtsa ba'i dug dang sbyar ba'i du// bu drag srod gtong dug la sogs// zugs rdo zan po'i byin parlabs kyis// dug rnams thams cad bdul bar phyir// dkyil 'khor mthum cheng ba
188a4(rnying rgyud): bsgom// gnas lnga dag tu 'bru lnga bstim// oM n+d+ra ni hrIms// ya na yi ge A~M gyis bya// yang na yi ge hrIHlas gtang // dug rnams bdud rtsir bsgyur bar bya// mnyam pa'i dbyings su thim par bya// a hoHrdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// hU~M bdag nyid zhe
188a5(rnying rgyud): rje ste// thugs rjes rtog bdag 'dul bar byed// nga dang bdag med dbyings sbyor zhing // byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa'o// oM bdag nyid gti mug chen po ste// ye shes 'od zer gsal ba'i ngang // thams cad 'byung ba'i 'khor lo yi// tI bdag nyid nga
188a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal yon tan te// snying rjes 'gro don 'phel bar byed// zhi ba'i blo chen dbyings su sbyor// yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med pa'o// hrIHbdag nyid 'dod chags gsung mchog ste// nyon mongs las rnams dag par byed// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rnam par da
188a7(rnying rgyud): chags med sems ni snang chub pa'o// A bdag nyid las kyi sems dpa' ste// don rnams ma lus grub par byed// log tog ma lus 'dul ba'i mchod// phyogs brdungs bzhi 'gro ba'o// blo bdag nyid shes rab 'od gsal te// le lo ga yang
188b1(rnying rgyud): sel bar byed// thugs rnga myur ba las byung ba// rgyal ba kun du thogs med pa'o// nyon mongs las rnams dag byed cing // dbugs chen dag kyang 'byin par byed// dug rnams spong ba sku gsum ste// lam lnga stong pa ye shes lnga// 'khor ba'i rtsad dag cad shes
188b2(rnying rgyud): rab mtshon// hU~M du bsdus shing hoHyis g.yeng // ri gyis bsregs shing phaT kyis 'phang // thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi// thig le'i dbyings su thim par bya// de nas gnyis med dbyings gyur nas// ye shes sems dpa'i su ru bsgom// 'bru gca
188b3(rnying rgyud): 'bru gsum 'bru lnga bsgom// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ma lus dang // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgom// nga med bdag med phyag rgyar gsol// de nas longs spyod lnga kun dang // ye shes lnga dang rigs lnga dang // lha mo lnga dang sman lngar bsgom// oM hUM
188b4(rnying rgyud): aHoM badz+ra a mr-i ti kAN+DA li ha na ha na hUM phaT// oM bi shud d+he amr-i te hUM phaT/ oM d+harma a mr-i te hU~M phaT/ oM AHhUM zhes brjod pas thams cad dag par gyur// bdud rtsir gyur/ sa chu me rlung nam mkha' rnams// rang bzhin med par gzhag pa'i phyir// gdag
188b5(rnying rgyud): la lnga lngar dbye bya zhing // b+h+rUM gyi dbyings su bstim par bya// 'byung ba che rnams de dag la// lhag pa'i ting 'dzin bskyed par bya// rigs pa thabs kyi phyag rgya ste// de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bsgob zhing // 'byung ba so so'i mtshan nyid de// yum lnga dag tu bsgom
188b6(rnying rgyud): par bya// de rigs ye shes lnga nyid do// rgyur byas gzugs sogs bzhi bcu gnyis// phyi nang sdod bcud thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid na// de ltar gyur cing skyes pa kun// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// a hoHa ma'o lhag pa'i byin brlabs
188b7(rnying rgyud): gyis// bdag la lha rnams bsdu bar bsgom// de nas lha dang gnyis med nas// bdag nyid yi ge oM da~Mde mAM// gnyis dang 'dagra dang dbyings su thim// bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgom// sku mdog gangs la nyi shar 'dra// zla ba pad+ma gdan khri la// nyi ma stong gi gdan
189a1(rnying rgyud): thAdz+nyAn// skang pa gas kyis // / ga nam kyil 'bar byas// gnas dang thug cas mas// smras dang rgya mtshogs kyis brjod/ khor mnubs bzhi na ltung ba sa// dngasas pa 'phrul ba/
189a2(rnying rgyud): shad gyi kyi la rjong // ci 'dzin por// rba d+hi la dang mabyar byas// byang gi ci 'don yod pa// thabs dang shopa yi ldan par bas+ho// d+hag d+ha rnas bdugs pa pa ma// snying po 'du tshog gas la bar bzlas// de la badz+ra tsa'i g+hA d+ha /
189a3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa gang ba yid bzhin 'bar// rab yid bzhin skong bar byed// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed// 'dod la yon tan ldan par byed// dngos pa ba chen po tha med pa'o// bdang rje cha bzhin 'babs par byed// sgo bzhi phyeg ldan pa dang // a mr-i ts+tsha
189a4(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dang shA chen dang // dri chu dri chen maM sar bcas// pad+ma b+ha la sogs dang // gzhan ya do n+d+ha yod sa tshogs rnams// dbye'am yang na mi dbye bar// bdud rtsi nyid du byin gyis brlab// rtog pa'i bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir// gtsang sde med par dag
189a5(rnying rgyud): dbyings su yan bstim par bye/ d+ha 'od ra 'ang bzhi pargya rtsa ba'i nga sa byed// gagasam jug pa rjemi med pa dang // brnal pa na ring gan po dang / na po 'altar to// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa
189a6(rnying rgyud): gsung // bdag nyid yi gi hU~M b+ha nas// longs pad rje ldan thams cad la// oM AhU~M du sbar par bsgol// 'o lan 'dir rnaM phyogs bcur mo// slar 'dus 'od 'gro bdud rdzing 'bar// shin tu gsal zhing rtse gcig pasgos// gzhan yang mi sa
189a7(rnying rgyud): gdang // 'thungs na ngan mang spring pa byang // tra ta/ rtag bsnyen dngos grub mchog kyi 'i dug// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi nangs ma cing // lha la rtagamachod byas ni// bdag dang gnyis bu med par 'gyur// mi mdza phyogs la gtor byas na// drag po gtum pong
189b1(rnying rgyud): gyur// gzhan yangs pas ca klas pa na / mags pa 'a tha na// san 'dun pa ma nas// ma pa ga byu // na nas jug /
189b2(rnying rgyud): pa de kho na nyid nges pa las rgyud kyi rgyal po 'phrul dra ba las sman sgrub pa'i leT ste sum du dgu pa'o/ de nas dkris pa chen poseM de dag gi byin gyi brnas 'jung ba zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di 'dzad do// de la mchod kun dam ni// 'phrul ma
189b3(rnying rgyud): bcu rtsa lnga nyid// khamad dang 'byung bte la gnas// de nyid sgyu 'phrul thabs mkhas pa// drabs mngon rdzogs su gsung thugs// thams cad ma lu sa phyag rgya nyid// chos su mchog gi rten phyir pa// phyogs pargya gang bar gsal bar 'ar// nyid ngang
189b4(rnying rgyud): lam ban khengs par// dz+haiM ga tshogs rnam par bsgom// sa nyid rje yi tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung bas// kha dog nag pa'i tshan gyi mas// da mi stong nang bdag lpags la// dzaHzhes bya ba sngags bzlas nas/
189b5(rnying rgyud): lcags kyis snang // drin sdebs mgyogs pa dang // ga bya ba byin par byed// de yi lam las 'byung 'dod na// zhe bas ba dag gi gzugs bad+mad la// dul bas hUM zhes bzlas pa yis// bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur// thams cad ma lus phya nga //
189b6(rnying rgyud): chos su mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs bcu gleng bar gsol bar bsgom// de nyid dag lam lus khengs par/ oM gyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom// lus nyid aHya tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs brdzu nas// kha dog dkar po'i rgya ya/
189b7(rnying rgyud): de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la// hU~M zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// mang pos bkur ba rgyal chen po// blo rno yid mdzangs bzhin bzangs dang // snga bas longs spyod 'du ba dang // gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na//
190a1(rnying rgyud): bas bdag gi gzugs bzung la// ngal bus mo zhes bsdus pa yis// bdag gA lus la gzung bar 'gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos su mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar bsgom// de cing ngag la ma gun
190a2(rnying rgyud): khengs par// grwa bya tshogs su rab tu bsgom// lus nyid mA~M gyi tshogs la pe stim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas// kha dog ser po tshan phye yas// de 'i snying nang bdag zhugs la// k+ShiM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// nor mar ljon pa yid mdzangs la/
190a3(rnying rgyud): blorno sngabs longs spyod 'dud// de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing // gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// rgyas pas bdag gi gzugs bzung la// dal bus k+ta zhes brjod pa yis// bdag gi lus la tshud par 'gyur// thams
190a4(rnying rgyud): cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs bcu gang bas gsal 'bar bsgom// de nyid dag la lus khengs par// gyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom// lus nyid Agyi tshogs la bsgom// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas// khang
190a5(rnying rgyud): dmar por tshon phye yis// dI oM snying nang bdag zhugs la// hrIHzhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// rgyal mo zhing blon dbang chen dang // ci 'dod yid bzhin dbang du 'gyur// de yi 'khor la yongs spyod cing // gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur// de yi gzugs
190a6(rnying rgyud): las 'byung 'dod na// dbang gis bdag gi gzugs bzung la// del bus \u0f7fzhes brjod pa yin// bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar bsgom// de nyid dag
190a7(rnying rgyud): lam lus khengs par// hU~M kyi tshigs su shin tu bsgom// lus nyid hU~M yi tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas// kha dog ljang gu'i tshon phye yis// de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la// TI zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// las kyi rigs chen gang
190b1(rnying rgyud): 'dod gzugs// dmag mang mthu dbang ga mtshan bzang // zhe sdang can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur// 'dod chags can rnams 'dra ba dang // dmyal chen po 'dud par 'gyur// dza yi bstan pa 'dzin par byed// de la 'khor la yangs sung cad// gnas par dga'
190b2(rnying rgyud): ba bzhin du 'gyur// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// snyoms pas khro la gzugs bzung la// dal buswA hrAM zhes brjod pa yis// mi snang ba yi gzugs su 'chang // bdag gi lus la rgud par 'gyur// gling ngam dur khrod gnas rnams su// nga yi 'dod pa chos dbang
190b3(rnying rgyud): gis// hUM 'phrul dkyil 'khor mchog 'dzin la// dba'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs 'thung ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
190b4(rnying rgyud): dpal kun du bzang pos nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i sems can gyi don ched du de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dpal nyid kyi mchog rigs kyi yum// dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brtan la// spyi gtsug kha dang
190b5(rnying rgyud): snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs mA~M du bad+hAkas// de nyid goms las gsang mchen pa// mAM gri tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs lus// de zla'i ngang tshul nga bzung nas// sangs rgyas rdo rje tsan ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par
190b6(rnying rgyud): bsgom// lam du zhugs la de lus dkang // de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// de bzhin rigs rnams oM du bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun par rnam
190b7(rnying rgyud): par bsam// brtan pa AHyi 'phro 'dra ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// yid bzhin yi ge'i sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya shin tu gsal ba na// nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin par bsgrags// 'phro 'du rigs dang
191a1(rnying rgyud): mthun pa'i grangs// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon saman// lcags su mchog gi phyag rgya bcing // des ni 'dod pa bzhin du 'asgyur// rang bzhin su gsung 'dus ma byas// gzhan dab ma yin rdo rje rigs// dpal ldan rdo rje sgra 'phral yaman na
191a2(rnying rgyud): tu chos kyis bsgrags pa la// gsal bar 'dod pa smra bya ba// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngar byin brlabs l-I du brtags// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// l-I gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgoms// sangs rgyas spyan gyi sbyor ba las// rgyal ba thams
191a3(rnying rgyud): cad byin gyis rlob// de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rang bzhin mchog gi gzugs bcas nas// sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzum thabs yin// srubs nas zhugs
191a4(rnying rgyud): la de lus dgang // de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// rdo rje rigs rnams hU~M du bsgom// sdod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun par shin tu bsam// brtan
191a5(rnying rgyud): pa dA yi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byon brlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// yid bzhin yi ste smin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'gro 'du rigs dang mthun pa'i grangs// sgom dang bzlas dang mngon sum ni//
191a6(rnying rgyud): lcags kyu'i stangs kyis bsngal bar gsungs// rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya yis// rigs dang mthun pa'i 'phro bdu bsgom// yon tan su gsung yod bzhin gter// dpal ldan sku 'a phrul mchog chen mo// chas shing bsregs pa'i gzugs brnyan ni/
191a7(rnying rgyud): sngon pa sgrag phran la sogs pa// dbab po mchog gi las byab// sgogatsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byo brlabs oM du brtag sa// de nyid goms laphags mtshan do// ma gyi chags kyi lha rnams bskor// sangs rgyas mo yi nga ba las
191b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba thams cad byin gyis rlob// de nyid mtha' bral ma dgyes las// yon tan gter gyi gzugs brtas na// sangs rgyas rin chen can ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer b+hin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'jam thabs yin//
191b2(rnying rgyud): sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgeng // da goms blo bde gsal spro thim// rin chen rigs rnams ste du bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur pa// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun par shin
191b3(rnying rgyud): tu bsam// brtan pa sti gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// yid bzhin yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun pa ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang
191b4(rnying rgyud): mngon sum ni// dam tshig zhags pa mchog gis bcing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhi// rigs dang 'du 'phro mthun par bsgom// gso dang gsang dang pham dang rgyal// gzhan du 'gro dang 'dug pa dang // ci 'dod 'ong dang sgra yang dang // mtshon dang 'jigs
191b5(rnying rgyud): pa mang ba dang // bcings pa'i las dang mtshon las thar// dpal ldan pad+ma mchog gi yum// bde chen gar dbang gzugs 'dzin pa// dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brtan ni// ston pa'i lhag phran la sogs la// dang por gnas lnga byin gyis brlabs// de nas
191b6(rnying rgyud): gnas lnga shes rab bsgom// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// las bzhi 'bru bzhi po du brtags// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// baM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// sangs rgyas chu la sbyor ba las// rdo rje gsung rnams byin gyis rlob// de nyid
191b7(rnying rgyud): mtha' phral mi dmigs las// rdo rje gsung gi gzugs bcas nas// sangs rgyas gsung chen can ka/ shes rab phul dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byon brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul babs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang /
192a1(rnying rgyud): dgoms blo brnyegasal spro thim// ming dang snying po bcas pas dgug/ rdo rje gsung rnams oM du bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan / khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun
192a2(rnying rgyud): par shin tu bsam// brtan pa oM gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// chos dbang yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal bar nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni// bsgoms nas
192a3(rnying rgyud): bzlas dang mngon sum na// chags pa'i lcags sgrog mchog gis bcing // chags pa chen po'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// zhi ba dbang dang drag po rgyas// ci 'dod par ni rab tu bsngags// dpal ldan 'grub pa sgyu 'phrul pa// dbab par
192a4(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i gzugs brnyan ni// ljon pa mchog dang 'bring rnams la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru ltas byin brlangs hU~M du brtags// de ni e yi tshogs yin te// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// me yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgoms// de nyid steng
192a5(rnying rgyud): gi lha rnams te// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las// don yod dang tshul de bzung nas// don yod mi chog gi tsa n+d+ra ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rgya gram byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs
192a6(rnying rgyud): la de lus dgang // rgya gram tshon gyis khengs pa dang // so so'i snying pos ming yang dgug/ de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// rdo rje la la rnams hU~M bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs
192a7(rnying rgyud): la sogs// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// brtan pani kyi 'phro 'dra ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// grub pa sgyu 'phrul sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun
192b1(rnying rgyud): par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum ni// dgyes pa gar gyi gsung snyan cing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// phyogs skya 'gro dang dbrog pa dang // cha bzung ba dang las rnams dang // mngon sum ni 'dod smra bar/
192b2(rnying rgyud): mchog/ rigs kyi yum dang rtsen par 'gyur// srid pa las 'phags mya ngan 'das// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// zhes brjod pas rnam par smin pa'i tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i yon tan nyid du ma khyen te// mkhyen nas de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings
192b3(rnying rgyud): 'du shes dang rdzu'amadzu gas nga // m+b+ha'i ma ma byed pa/ sa pa smra mig/ ma sa thun pa da sa pa so ga dpa la skyes sa
192b4(rnying rgyud): zad mi shes// ngo mtshar srid lam mtha' bral dmigs med pa// de nyid yon tan mchog gi 'khor lo lam mchog yin// A hoH/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas che ba'i yon tan ston pa zhes
192b5(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i sgyu 'phrul chen po baspyang gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba cho ga dang bcas pa 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las
192b6(rnying rgyud): phung ngo // dbab pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnams// kha dog grangs bcas ma brlams pas// shes pa blo ma khongs yengs la// zab par spyod la mi sto bar// zas srung go sa rdzas da ma zas sbyin// dung rkyen snod du chu yis bsing // rten du rung bar ting 'dzin
192b7(rnying rgyud): dang // dbang dang sgrub pa mchog kyang bstan// mi sgra gsang ba'i dmachog dpog// oM dang muM gyi blo bstan nas// gsang bas mtshan ma ldanas sbyang // sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi padru gnyis// phung po khams dang skye mched lcang // longs spyod lnga ldan
193a1(rnying rgyud): sadz+rod sbyin b+ha// rdo rje dag lam gsung blun bzlas// oM sarba twA thA ga ta dz+nyAn ma/ oM badz+rag lang+ging+ga badz+ra/ oM san ta thAg ta s+t+wa~M hA s+t+wa~M/ oM pad+mA tA thA hAd ya skA ra laka/ taprad+hA hA/ rbA d+hi shwar thA/ te Sha ratal/ mata ta A/ rAg
193a2(rnying rgyud): ma sa zhes sa nas sa
193a3(rnying rgyud): cad kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rje'i bdag nyid dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma chen mo dang / spyan chen mo dang / mA ma kI chen mo dang / gos dkar mo chen mo dang / dam tshig 'phags ma sgrol ma chen po'i rang bzhin nyid du
193a4(rnying rgyud): kun du snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab pa'i gsum zhi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos sgyu 'phrul
193a5(rnying rgyud): chen po'i byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo // sgeg mo mchod pa byin bsdu ba// gzugs skyon dbab par bya ba ni// rigs dang mthun pa'i
193a6(rnying rgyud): zugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs ya nyid sbyin// de nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor yin// de nyid goms la gsang mtshan pa// ya yi tshegs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid hUM gi lha rnams te// bdag med mtha' bral
193a7(rnying rgyud): mi dmigs las// rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas// sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang // rdo rje chen gyis khengs pa dang /
193b1(rnying rgyud): po ming yang bod// de gams zlo bad gsal snga zom// med yang snying po bcas pas dgug/ rdo rje lha rnams hU~M bsgom// snod nas sgeg mo khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// b+hag rgya sbyang po gzugs la rdzogs// ga
193b2(rnying rgyud): thun pa nyid du bsam// brtan pa dA yi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/ gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni// bsgoms
193b3(rnying rgyud): nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// sgom bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya ba zhis// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// rin chen phreng ba'i byin bsdu ba// gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni// rigs dang mthun pa'i gzugs brtan la// sdig drug
193b4(rnying rgyud): kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs e nyid sbyin// de nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor yin// de nyid goms nas gsang mtshan pa// e yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid ste gyi lha rnams te// bdag mede mtha' brel mi dmigs 'a// rang gi dang dz+wal
193b5(rnying rgyud): bzung nas// sangs rgyas rin chen tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rje byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang // rin chen tshon gyis khengs pa dang // so so'i snying pos mi yang dkun
193b6(rnying rgyud): de go mas blo bde gsal spro thim// rin chen lha rnams stong bsgom// snod gnas phreng ba khengs gyur par // yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsam// brtanas 'aM kyi 'phro 'dra ltar// rnam shes
193b7(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtse med pa'i sems nyid sa// sa sa rgyas rin chen smin tshogs 'asgos// phyag rgyags la banye basbyin pa// 'gro dra rig sa dang mthun par ni// bsgos sa nas brgyas dang mngon suman// sgom bzhi y-i phyag bang //
194a1(rnying rgyud): chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// pad+ma'i dbyings kyi byin bsdu ba// gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni// rigs dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs bai ru
194a2(rnying rgyud): brtags// de nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de nyid goms la gsang mtshan pa// bri gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid oM gyi lha rnams te// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas// sangs rgyas pad+ma cen ka/ shes rab
194a3(rnying rgyud): yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang // pad+ma'i tshogs kyis khengs pa dang // so so'i snying pos ming nas dgug/ de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// pad+ma'i lha rnams
194a4(rnying rgyud): oM du bsgom// snod gnas dbyangs ma khengs 'gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// brtan pa hU~M kyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhiH
194a5(rnying rgyud): med pa'i sems nyid las// sangs rgyas pad+ma'i sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// sgom bzhi yi phyag rgya brjing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs
194a6(rnying rgyud): dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// gar mkhan las kyi byin bsdu ba// gzugs sngon dbab par bya ba ni// rigs dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs ma nyid sbyin// de nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de nyid
194a7(rnying rgyud): goms las gsang mtshan pa// ma yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid ni gyi lha rnams te// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas// sangs rgyas las rnams can ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las
194b1(rnying rgyud): rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su thugs la de lus dgang // lus kyi tshogs kyis khengs pa dang // ma ma' steng pos meng nas dgug/ dgoms blo bdagasal spyom// las d+d+hi D+ha rnams d+hung bsgom// stong gnas ga ma ngan
194b2(rnying rgyud): khengs 'gyur bar// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// brtan pad+mo kyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs rang du brtags// gzhi rtsi med pa'i sems nyid las// sangs rgyas
194b3(rnying rgyud): smin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba te bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// sgom bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// dkyil 'khor bzhi tu
194b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi// ska rnams mngon du ltung ba dang // sgo bsgom mang po dang // dus bzhi'i lham mchog dbab dang // lha dang mu mi tsho nas bcas lus// mngon du smra bar bya bar man// thal chung dang ni 'khor 'phrog dang // bsngar nga dbang du bya ba dang // gsung dang
194b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshogs bcas dang // bdag 'gro myur du phyin pa dang // nor 'dod pa dang ci bya ba// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// dus med par ni mchod dang phrad// ces brjod pas 'jog rkye drug gi phyogs bcwa thams cad byin bsngo ba'i mchod pa chen por gyur to// gas
194b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnying po khon ti nges pa las byin pa sde bo dang dam tshig dbab pa'i sgra 'phrul dra ba'i thugs rje zhes bya ba'i lce ste bzhi badz+ra gsum pa'o// / de nas dgyes pa chen pos yongs spyod chen po rdo rje skyeng po zhes bya ba'i ting ba 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na
194b7(rnying rgyud): 'phrul chen po'i dam tshig mchod pa longs spyod ces bya ba 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i skye dang gsung dang thugs rdo hU~M 'phrul dra ba la 'i phyung ngo // rab 'bring zama'i sgo rnams kyis// nges par bsgom par bya dran// rgyas po sa 'dzin mchog 'ad pa pa/ ga ga
195a1(rnying rgyud): rten bcas la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// goms par dzaHnyid mdog dmar bsgom// de goms gsang nas khong bsdus te// rang lus mdog dmar ngang tshul 'dzin// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs pa du
195a2(rnying rgyud): brtags// de goms gar gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// dzaHzhes rgya bcings drang bya zhing // goms par gsang nas zhugs tshul du// yam nas ngag gi dbang por bsdu// oM las sangs rgyas tsa na ka/ snod gnas dkyil 'khor khengs par bsgom// ming dang snying
195a3(rnying rgyud): goms pas dgug/ mngon sum gsal bar gyur pa na// lcags kyu la sogs mtshan pa yi// rjes su chags pa'i mchod pas bsham// yid la goms pa gsal ba na// gang la bya ba dbang du 'gyur// blon po'i sa 'dzin mchod pas bsham// yid la goms pa gsal ba
195a4(rnying rgyud): na// gang la bya ba kha dang snying ga mtshan// goms par dzaHnyid mdog dmar bsgom// de goms gsang gnas khong bsdus te// rang lus mdog dmar ngang tshul 'dzin// spyi gtsug kha dang snying gi mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs pa~M dA brtags// de goms gar gyi dkyil
195a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor bsgom// dzaHzhes rgya bcings drang bya zhing // goms par gsang gnas zhugs tshul du// lam nas ngag gi mchog tu bsdu// A~MHnas sangs rgyas tsa na ka/ snod gnas dkyil 'khor khengs par bsgom// ming dang snying po goms par dkug/ mngon sum
195a6(rnying rgyud): gsal bar gyur pa na// lcags kyu la sogs mtshan pa yi// rjes su chags pa'i mchod par bsham// de la las su stsal pa na// gang la bya ba dbang du 'gyur// lha mo gru mo rigs ngan mo// yud tsam rtag par 'dod sgrub rnams// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// da'ang
195a7(rnying rgyud): drug lha chen lha dbang po// rgyal chen phyogs slong mang po la// chung ma bu mo la sogs mtshan// 'dod spyod dbang bar blo 'chang rnams// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// de yi dgos pa thams cad pa// ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur// ces brjod pas
195b1(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad rab tu g.yos kun du gsal bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod chen po kun du snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid des
195b2(rnying rgyud): pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po dam chog gi mchod pa'i longs spyod ces bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid du snang bar gyur to//
195b3(rnying rgyud): drug pa'i las kwa'i tshogs 'dul bar gyur nas sgrub pa chen po la mos pa'i ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// klu'i tshogs rigs gnyis pa dang // rigs gsum pa dang / rigs tha dad pa dang / phyogs gnyis pa las 'khor du byas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas khengs pa'i
195b4(rnying rgyud): gnas su nyid kyi bsnyen pa che chung la ma gtogs pa yid la dga' ba ci byas kyang mi'i 'grub cing bar chad byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir gegs bsal balnga pa zhes bya ba 'di 'thon par gyur pa 'di ched du gsungs so// sgrub la 'dug pa mi gnas dang // sragazhi bdag tu dbang bad
195b5(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams ci yod pa// gdug pa'i sbrul rnams bsal ba dang // 'khor du gtogs pa mang nyung la// gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur zhing // ljon pa lcag phran la sogs la// gdug pas gnas par mi 'gyur phyir// wa pa zhes ni rab tu bsngags// bdag gi
195b6(rnying rgyud): gdug par mchod pa'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting 'dzin las// bdag nyid gdug pa'i mthing gnag mdog/ lag na zhags pa ut+pal 'dzin// mgo la gdengs ka sbrul chen bcu// nyi shu brgya'am stong dang khri// bsam yas dag gi sbrul chen po// kha dog nag
195b7(rnying rgyud): gsum 'bar// gdug pa klu yi tshogs mangs pas// 'khor mar 'jigs brjod spyi bung bas// mchog tu phyag rgya 'di bca' bya// mi bskyod rin chen yig 'bru rnams// phral te go ran byas pa na// gdug pa sbrul gyis 'og tu gding // nA ga pu ka la nA ga phaT ces
196a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ da/ dang/ napa/
196a2(rnying rgyud): bya ni// zhog sa sa gzhi ba shas sa// mang cu rdzogs kyis dgang / du sa ti bu'i song / jug pa'i tshe rgyog kya kyil 'byo do'o// desog ba d+ha te/ la long btu na// mang du da /
196a3(rnying rgyud): 'bru byin rtag shig/ de nas yig 'bru tha ma basbed// de nas yig 'bru 'phral bskyed pa// nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung ste// sa gzhi mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de la shin tu dngangs 'gyur te// phyogs bcu kun du 'brom par 'gyur// de la dran bzhin byed par 'gyur/
196a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor du gtogs pa nga yi 'khor// 'khor mang ji snyed mchog byed pa// gdug pa mang pos gnod pasgrub phyir// rdzas la mes ni rab sbar nas// nga yi snying pos brjod nas 'byung // de la yig 'bru drug brjod na// de la gnod par mi nus shing // gdug pas mchod ci
196a5(rnying rgyud): pang 'byung // de yin rnams sos par 'gyur// mngon sum snang ba'i gzugs brtan dang // mchog dang ma.A 'dring rnams la// gdag pa'i tshogs kyi bzhin pa ni// snying gar oM gyi 'bru rnams te// kha dog dbang po 'bang ba'i nang // gzugs pa snang bgran pa
196a6(rnying rgyud): thub pa'i nga tshul de bsgoms nas// rin chen yig 'bru yi ge bsam// de la rab tu 'jigs par brgyang // yi ga dang po zam yid// oM gyi tshogs su 'byung gzhan// mi spyod nyidams brtson 'chang // thod pa'i dbyig par mas nas ni// rgyal sdig ni dran
196a7(rnying rgyud): rtsal ba dan gyis dpang bzung ga// ga pa / sa du du pa byung// ngas gyug sa ma pa gang su da na
196b1(rnying rgyud): cod pa byed pa dang // sgrub pa thams cad myur bar 'gyur// gsang ba 'a byung ba lan nyid nges pa las thub pa can thabacom ldan 'das kyis gru tshogs kyi gdug pa'i las 'dul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bdu lnga pa ga/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang bas
196b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'i tshigs zil gyis gnon pa zhes bye ba 'dab ze dngadu brjod pa 'di brjod do// rdzu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khar las// mamathu gnyis kyi lharnams pasgom// nga nyid 'dug pa'i gnas bsha te// lo dang thab gsumi dang ltar// rdo dung chen gang pa dang /
196b3(rnying rgyud): phyag bsnams dril bu la// sngags bzlas teng 'dzin goms par bsnyen// rdzas la tshun gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin// rtags dang mngon du gyur par ro// sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas// khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal// rang gi rang bzhin dor bsgyur nas// d+han
196b4(rnying rgyud): mche gtsigs sdang mig 'bar// brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs bsgom// shig shig drug tu gyur pa ni// ro yi snying po bzlas nas ni// de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// de ltar 'grub pa'i rtags rnams ni// gang la dmigs pa'i mdun dag tu// bzhin bcwo
196b5(rnying rgyud): gis bltas nas ni// lce la drag tu phaT ces brjod// brgyal 'gyur mi nas dmar rtsa dbub// de las sbyi zhes bya ba yid// dang po'i gnas su 'dus pa na// mchongs par 'do na langs par 'gyur// 'phral dra ba'i dkyil 'khor las// tsam braganyis kyi lha rnams
196b6(rnying rgyud): 'asgom// ting 'dug pa'i gnas pa shams te// lo dang zla ba gisum sna bdun// da mang can gang byadong // rdo rje phyag brnams dril bu la// sngags pazlas ting na goms par 'gyur// rjes la chen gyis ma dag bsgyung bzhin// rtags dang mngon dubu ba
196b7(rnying rgyud): rgya rje drug snru sa dang // blo srog gi rgyal// shi rje rlos pa'i rgya ma spyod// rang gi rang bzhin der bgyur nas// spyan bgrang ma chegacigs kyang mig par// brgyang badrum ngam pas zhing sbyangs bskum// shig shig drug tu phreng ba

197b1(rnying rgyud): drag tu phaT ces pas// brtul 'gyur ma las dmar gyi dpab// de las d+ha gas bya ba ying // dang pa'i gnas su bsdus pa na// mchongs par 'dod na langs par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul chen pod nyid mas// sa sa nas rdon phyag bsdams pa// rdzas ldan pa
197b2(rnying rgyud): 'khyil// bdag nyid rang bzhin der bsgyur nas// spyan bgrad mche gtsigs srung mig par// brkyang ba su mjam pal zhing stengs bsgom// shig shig drag tu gyur pa las// mau gyogs pa'i phyogs su sbyong pan// da ye snying po mchog bzlas nas// hUM zhes pa

197b4(rnying rgyud): le sgrol mar gtogs pa yis// brgyal 'gyur oM las dmar rtsi dbab// yid la bsgoms pas langs par 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po da khon nyid nges pa las su 'phrul chen po rab tu rgyal bar byed pa dmachig mchod bkod pa'i laru ste pani ba drug pa'o//
197b5(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dbyas pardzun pa'i spyan ster dwags brgyan po dang / dbang drug cad pa dang / rdul bcan po bzhi dang / sgyogs s+ho byu ba mau tshan dang rna seM baHsa/ b+hA dang g.yog dang yang g.yog gi rab tu 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis
197b6(rnying rgyud): par dam bcas shing // rang rang gi dkyil 'khor dang / snying po zhes bya ba 'di mgrin gcig tu yang smas so// dregs pa 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor dang // lus dang ngag yid dbul ba ni// 'khor g.yog bye ba dug rngu rnams// keng rus gsar rnying gnas su gyur//
197b7(rnying rgyud): pa sha khrag tshogs la spyod// thod par 'thung za med pa'i nang // mdung thung ngal gri dgra sta dang // zhags pa dbyig pa zor ba dang // dza dang lnga ldi khrag 'thor zhing // gdug pa'i tshogs rnams kun gyis bskor// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la// ming tsam
198a1(rnying rgyud): da pa sa// byas kyi la du 'di gas to// rlung gi snyid po dod na// dkan padan bdag rtag pad// de yi dgo la mi yang rung // mamra rdzogs par 'dag cag 'aslab// 'dug nas s+hom 'a da bzhan gras// /

198a3(rnying rgyud): gnas su ni// lha mo mang por bdag spyod cing // rin chen snod du bdag cig 'jing // gdugs kyis rgyas par steng nas g.yogs// gzugs mdzes pas ni gda' bar bskyed// rin chen mo tog la sogs dang // lha yi me tog phyogs su 'thor// la tshogs mang kun
198a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas bskor// dkris pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi mthil du 'di bris te// rang gi snying po 'di brjod na// de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid// gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang // de yi dgos pa tsa yang rung // mdu
198a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs par bdag cag bsrub// de gzugs ston cing gda' bar bgyid// oM marba dwe bA ma hA u pa ha// rgyal po rnam thos yul 'khor srung // 'khor tshogs skyong phrag mang po yi// lus dang ngag yid 'bul ba ni// 'khor g.yog stong phrag bye ba brgya// me tog sil ma
198a6(rnying rgyud): bkram pa dang // rgyan mang phyug pa gcal bkram pa// sde dpon nyi shu bye ba rnams// ce legs par ni rab tu smra// rim pa che zhing sri zhu gus// mchod par byed cing lugs mchis pa'i// bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags// rin chen btsal dang 'thung ba dang //
198a7(rnying rgyud): mo glu gar snyan pas brgyan// rin chen khang par bdag mchis shing // bzhon pa dmag mangs 'khor bar mchis// rin chen snod du chang 'thung ba// gdugs kyis brgyan par steng nas g.yogs// gzugs mdzes pas ni gda' bar bgyid// rin chen me tog
198b1(rnying rgyud): gas su 'thor// rgyal po'i tshogs mang kun gyis bskor// dri za med pa'i bdag po dang // dbang ldan rlung gi bdag po rnams// 'di bzhin gus par bdag cag brjid// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dra rnams la// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi/
198b2(rnying rgyud): mthil du bris nas kyang // rang gi snying po 'di brjod na// de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid// gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang // de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub// de la gzugs ston gda' bar bgyid// oM sid d+ha d+hi d+hi d+ha ho
198b3(rnying rgyud): swA hA/ rgyal po mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po// 'khor tshogs khri phrag mang po yis// lus dang ngag yid dbul ba ni// 'khor tshogs khri phrag bye ba brgya// me tog sil ma bkram pa dang // rgyan mang byug pa gcal bkram pa// sde dpon nyi shu b+he ba rnams//
198b4(rnying rgyud): ci legs par ni rab tu sba// rim pa che zhing sri phru gus// mchod par byed cing lugs mchis par// bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags// rin chen btsal dang btung ba dang // rol mo glu gar snyan pas brgyan// rin chen khang par bdag mchis shing //
198b5(rnying rgyud): bzhon pa dmag mangs 'khor bar mchis// rin chen snod du chang 'thung ba// gdugs kyis rgyas par steng nas g.yogs// gzugs mdzes pa ni gda' bar bgyid// rin chen me tog phyogs su 'thong // rgyal po'i tshogs mang kun gyis bskor// gnod
198b6(rnying rgyud): sbyin srin po'i tshogs rnams dang // chu bdag gshin rje'i 'khor mang rnams// de bzhin gus pas bdag cag bgyid// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi mthil du bris nas kyang // rang gi snying po 'di
198b7(rnying rgyud): brjod na// de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid// gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang // de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bgyid// de la gzugs ston gda' bar bgyid// oM d+ha ka d+hi dud+ha bi shu pa shi oM hUM/ zhes mgrin gcig
199a1(rnying rgyud): sa na pa da na khyod kyi 'dza can pa 'ad 'dal bar shA hAs/ mamaldan sa can pa swA dang gang nga grus pan tan rgya lam ma la 'a jug sa ca rdza na
199a2(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa bsam yas snying po bsam yas par// 'bru gtor bsdu ba las ni 'das bzhin bsnyags dka' ba'i// mnor las chen gcig gis rab tu 'dul 'gyur zhing // de yi bsngags pa'i bka' las 'da' bar ngas mi nus// thugs kyi thugs rjel rdo hri
199a3(rnying rgyud): ma nor lam nyid la// gsang ba'i snying po nges pa sgyu 'phrul mchog nyid pa// nga nyid 'dud 'gyur gzhan lta smos ci dgos// de nyid thugs las sprul pa'i thugs nyid do// ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu 'dul ba
199a4(rnying rgyud): gyur pa gnas dang / snying po dbul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i spyan sngar dregs pa chen po dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i tshogs kyis/
199a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sems 'dun pa chen por gyur te/ ched du bstod pa'i glu 'di mgrin gcig tu smras so// e ma'o ya mtshan 'phrul chen gyi// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rang bzhin dpal// dug dang bdud rtsi khyad med par// dag pa'i rang bzhin
199a6(rnying rgyud): 'byor thags// kun du bzang po rdo rje'i sku// ye shes lA yi lho rgyal niH// khrag 'thung 'jigs byed he ru ka/ sang+yas rjes mtha' yas 'gro ba rgya mtsho 'dril// thugs rje bas ma yas khro sngal kun gyig tso// khrog 'jung dun las ches 'angags yid bzhin mdza
199a7(rnying rgyud): gnag mthong gnag lhung gi nag dpe gnog dang // sngo ga nag ri rab tu bar brjod pa'i sgo// bskal bar bcas pa'i ma pa dbun gnas pa'i// ri tshogs mang po'i dkyil nas zhal rngas pa'i// bsod nams lus bcus rdo rje mi zad pa'i// skar tshogs mdar ti
199b1(rnying rgyud): 'od bzhin du// brgyan drugs pas 'jigs pa'i chags pan 'joms// ma ngas du stsal la klung ba ra ba rlung // 'dung ba dbang drug+sa gar stan 'du bags/ 'byod pa/ myu gas thugs sugasung gzhal// thag sa tsam thang byung rnams shi shAng
199b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs 'joms// khroganyi rnying 'dren 'jigs byed zlog ltar phye// du mdzod 'jam thong du ga 'jigs par byerjod// 'khor ba'i rtog pa 'jig pa byed dran phreng bas brdegs// rol phyir gyi mor snang bas ma matal bzhad// rang nyid chings dbang rdzogs
199b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal bas dbul brgyan// sbyin rig khro gnyer klog bden rab 'khya bas// phyogs dang mthun pa'i khrag 'thung 'gyed cing srung // sprul pa de lta bus ni zil gnon pa// 'jigs pas mun pa'i tshogs chen rab bshams kyang // sngar migasan ni nyi bla rgyas 'bar bas/
199b4(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa'i tshogs phung sdug bsngal gtan nas spyod// khros pas zhal gdangs so chen gtsigs 'bar bas// srid pa'i rtse nas dmyal khams snyegs pa ltar// 'jig rten dus gcig ming mdzod lam dug gtan nas gcod// ye shes phye gang snyems phyag mtshan 'bar
199b5(rnying rgyud): ba yas// phyid gsum mdzes du la phran stongs par mdzad// rkan mA sa stsol pas 'grol bya brdabs bzhin// khrims gsum kun la chus rgyas nga med/ sa thob 'byud na rjen mchog gsor// rig chags sa bang gtsun pa phyed gzhi bdams/
199b6(rnying rgyud): klu 'dul yon tan sbal nag stong gis bklubs// 'jigs bcas klu yi tshogs kyang zhabs 'og mnan// 'dod chags 'dul ba 'dod chags kun gyi gtso// 'dod chags chen po 'dod chags nyid kyi sku// mang po'i 'khor bcas 'jigs pa'i 'khor du byas// zhe sdang
199b7(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba zhe sdang kun gyi gtso// zhe sdang gdug pa zhe sdang kun gyi sku// 'jigs pa'i tshogs rnams zer gyis kun bzhu ba'i// rab tu brjid pa 'jigs pas 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gti mug 'dul ba gti mug kun gyi gtso// gti mug blo sel gti mug chen po
200a1(rnying rgyud): sku// mi 'byed khrag 'thung sran chen ri rab brtan// nga rgyal 'dul ba nga rgyal kun b+hag to// 'jigs tshogs sad nas rachags mang gi gnas// zhabs bsrad mche gtsigs chog pa'i dus mtha' med// 'jigs pas phabs par dga' zhing shin tu
200a2(rnying rgyud): sdang // phrag dog 'dul ba phrag dog kun gyi gtso// phrag dog che mchog phrag dog chen po'i sku// bud med kun bsdus dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing // lam nor gdug par bcas pa phaT kyis gsod// zhing gi sham thabs gdug pa 'dul bar bsdams// sku 'dra
200a3(rnying rgyud): 'jigs tshags gzugs kyis lha la brgyan// zhabs dang phyag tu gyur pa bas mthag chad// zhabs chen g.yon mang btung bas lha gnon bdud la khyab// zhabs g.yas thabs chen mang pos dbang sdud 'dor zhing bsum// rdo rje se gol phyar brdangs gnyid che ra bsel
200a4(rnying rgyud): mdzad// 'od chen dbus nas glag chen rab 'gyu ba'i// 'jigs par grong na med pa'i dpa' bo khyod// zas ngan bdud rtsi stong pa'i sman chen bdag/ 'jigs byed khyod lta bu ni rab tu dkon// bskal par bkrus kyang skor skya dri ma la// ye shes nyi zer 'od kyi byin parlabs
200a5(rnying rgyud): dang // thugs rnga dag pa'i char gyi cho 'phrul gyis// brda tsam yung la rmongs 'khrugs las spong zhing // shi ba'i lab 'gog shes rab dkyil 'khor nga // skyeb gtan nas sbyong ba'i thugs rje 'char// byams sdang mi mnga' bka' drin chen po'i gter// khrag 'thung
200a6(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bka' drin dran pa'i klu zhes bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brtan zhing
200a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba dang // 'jig rten gyi khams su gnas par bya ba'i cheng du 'byung po rnams kyi/ yang rdza mo// mi srin mo chen mo// mi srin mdang / tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sred ma dang / gzhon nu ma dang / dmar mo dang / bdud rtsi mo
200b1(rnying rgyud): dang / khyab ma dang / byatsan mo dang / srin mo dang / zab mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / rad khrag 'thung myos dang / gcig pu srod dang / phyed 'phrog ma dang / grang mo dang / phung mo dadu/ gsod byed mo dang / mamo dang / phag mo dang / rgan bud mo dang / snamad mang
200b2(rnying rgyud): chu lha mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ramago dmar ser chen lo dang / bum rna sngoganag chen mo dang / gsus 'dzin ser gnag chen mo dang / rgyal mo dang // blon mo dang / sde dpon mo dang / g.yog dang yang g.yog dang / bran dang / yang bran la sogs pa/ sbas
200b3(rnying rgyud): dang byi mo dang / bran mo rnams la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po nges pa 'di// gsang sngags kun gyi rgyal po yin// thabs rjen mtshon pa'i shes raban// smra ba phral dra ba'i snying po dang // gsang brgyad ni mang po rnams// nga yi thugs las sprul
200b4(rnying rgyud): pa yin// tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa// sde dpon 'phrog ma'i yul rnams dang // lus 'phags pa lang spyod pa dang // sgra mi snyan dang 'jom slod du// nga yi thugs kyi snying po 'di// phyogs bcwa kun du spel ba dang // de
200b5(rnying rgyud): gzugs la gtad pa ni// yod bzhin mdzod 'byor bka' yi gnas// hrI nang zag pa bstan bcos dang // stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams// spyod dang bsgom dang 'bras pa dang // sdom pa klan la mkhas pa yis// brnam pa zang dang mis dang / @#
200b6(rnying rgyud): pa 'dzin par nus pa yi// gsang ba'i snying po mchog tu gtad// gzhan la bsnyad par ma yin no// mi 'khrug blo zab can thab cid // yid bzhin sbyor bar mos pa la// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig bstan// zla dang bcas pas dam chag che// sgorang gnyi ga rdza bas/
200b7(rnying rgyud): pa dang // lung dang tshad du ldan thub dang // gzhan la bsnyad par mi byed cing // bstan pa mchod par byed pa'o// nye ba bsnyen pa dam tshig la// bsgrub pa bsnyen pa nye bsnyen pa// ci nus par ni shin tu brtson// sems can dang tshul kun por nas// ngag yad
201a1(rnying rgyud): kyang mi 'khrugs shang // mchod pa tshogs la stobs la rub// bud med 'gugs pas gtsal dbul// zung thub gsang la mkhas pa yis// nges pa can la shin tu gtad// gzhan du bstan par ma bya'o// thogs med byal bar 'dod pa spyod// phud
201a2(rnying rgyud): da yon tan kun yod cing // 'dod chags kun dang mthun spyod la// rtsa ba dang du blang ba dang // 'tsham par lha yi sku bstan te// nye bsnyen gsang ba'i man ngangag rnams// nams kyang sbyin par mi bya'o// de la sbyor stangs de bstan nas// gzhan ni bstan par ma
201a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// dang sman sran cing ljon pa// dad pa zhing chos la gus// chags par ngan pa bka' nyan cing // gnas bdaga' shing lung nyan pa// ma pa yan lagang mchog skrag// mchod pa'i gnas shAm rjem pa srung // bskye pa lan byin ngas nas// ga
201a4(rnying rgyud): gas tshogs kyi mchod gnas su// nga yi gsang ba byin phab ste// thogs pa med par mngon sum la// sbyor ba'i thabs ldan mnyam sbyor ba// dkyil 'khor bzhi brta lha gnyis kyi// bdag nyid mnyes pa'i mnyam sbyor zhing // mnyam pa'i grub pas tshogs la
201a5(rnying rgyud): mchod// dam tshig mi ldan spyod rtsing dang // gting nas bstan pa mi 'dzin la// 'dod chags spel bar mi byed cing // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na// nges pa'i don ni mi ston la// nga yi dbang dang bslab pa rnams// rim pa bzhin du rab tu sbyin// rigs ngan pho
201a6(rnying rgyud): 'dod spyod ni// spo thung 'dod chags rab tu che// blo zhan phrag dog sgo skur can// gnyid che chung dang brtson 'grus rung // slob la mi gus nan tan med// slob dpon mi dran spyan sems chung // gal te dam la gnas na yang // nga yi gsang ba 'dzin pa la//
201a7(rnying rgyud): dru dga' bar mi nus te// lcagan bka' mas 'das pa dang // grol ba dka' zhing nus me zhen// lan dang srog ste bral// grwa reng ban phrangad par 'dzad spyong cing // 'dod chags 'ga' la pa do ga la// cig rnams gsang ba tu byed pa// na
201b1(rnying rgyud): mthun pa las// gsang ba'i snying po sbyin miH// bskal pa'i 'jig rten par du yang // thugs kyi bde ba mi sgo zhing // rnams kyang bstan par mi bya'o// 'jig rten 'dod pa dga' rnams snyi// gal ta tshangs pas byin pan// rnams pa /
201b2(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba yan lag spangs pa yin// bsrogs dang sbrebs par yun ring gnas// zhes brjod pas srid pa mtha' dag gi bud med kyi tshogs rnams dam tshig 'dis 'dul bar gyur te// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po su gsung thugs dang yon tan srin
201b3(rnying rgyud): rdorje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phung ngo // oM e ma/ e ma'o chos rnams sgyu ma yi// ngang nyid bud med gsang ba sngags pa yi// lnga dug dus btab snang srid 'byung ba'i gtor// yang dag lam rnyed mngon par kun kAn ma kun du gnas// chos mang chos nyid mnyan
201b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyag ji snyed las// las du ni dge ba'i cho 'phrul lam chen 'di// kun gyi khyad par nyid ni bud med bdeb gcig pa yin// chos kun de nyid yin phyir dman pas mi smad 'jam par btud// yul 'byor pa nyid ni bti ga shegs nyid yar rab tu gas la/
201b5(rnying rgyud): gsang pa'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po kho na nyid nges pa las ngam rdzog rten po sa bud med brtul ba'i le'u sde bzhi bcu dgra pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos mnyas pa'i mtshad pa' cad du brjod do// sad la mchod
201b6(rnying rgyud): thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bskul// de nas gnyis med blo yis ni// snod ni 'jig rten rnying nge rje// gnyis su me per bsgral bar bya// 'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam stor bas// bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya// mnyam pa'i glab rdza chen po
201b7(rnying rgyud): dag/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'bul// bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bso// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi// bder gshegs yon tan rmad po che// gzhan
202a1(rnying rgyud): yod pa ma yin na// lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos// rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs gyur cing // gsal ba'i yid gnyis med pa ni// dkyil 'khor chen po 'bar bar 'gyur// zhes brjod pas/ mnyes pa chen pos 'jig
202a2(rnying rgyud): rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mchod sbyin gyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos don yod par bya ba'i phyir// dam tshig chen po ched du brjod do// bla med rjes
202a3(rnying rgyud): par nges gyur pas// nyon mongs las rnams kun spyod kyang // byas la mi sogs tshogs gyur te// tshul khrims sdom pa phun sum tshogs// bla med mchog gi dam tshig tu// 'dul ba'i dbang du tshul khrims dang // ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa// ma lus dun 'a
202a4(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag/ yod med dbu ma'ang mi dmigs shing // sgyu ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul// srog med srog gcad gcad du med// srog dang skyes bu log rtogs tsam// bden pa gnyi gar dbyer med pas// 'phrul dga'i tshul te tha dad min// gzhan dang ma byin med
202a5(rnying rgyud): blangs med thams cad nyid dbyings/ rjes rnams sgyu sa lta bu dang / deng tshig tu brtags pa 'a na// dzin nyid la ni la na spyod pa/ bdun zhes btags cas spyong sa ston/ ma chags pa la chags pa dang // chags pa nyid na chags med pa// de ngas ma
202a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal po ste// shin tu chags pa chen po yin// bla mde mi spang bla ma bkur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// yang dag lam du zhugs la byams// gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya// 'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te// bsrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig mchog/ gnyi
202a7(rnying rgyud): chags dang zhe sdang dang // nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo // dkar gyi dmar rtsi dri sha chen// dag pa'i snod du mi dong ro// yan lag bcu yi dam tshig mchog/ ye nas dag mnyam rtog pas spyad// bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig lnga// rtsa ba yin te rigs med
202b1(rnying rgyud): ri kAng mi dor lnga gnyis ni// yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka' ba'o// mnyam la mnyam par spong ba yi// mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// mnyam rdzogs chen po thob par 'gyur// 'das na sangs rgyas mA man no// zla ba nyams pa'i thal bdag
202b2(rnying rgyud): la nye bar mi brtson dang // skad cig yud tsam sbal byed// nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// bsgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur// yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i// 'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'du// yan lag
202b3(rnying rgyud): tshig nyams gyur na// 'bras pa med cing ngan 'gror lhung // de latshig rnams no rdo rje na// sangs sus kun gyi bdag nyid yin// rtsa ba'i dam chog wA la ni// gcig la 'ang gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum// yan lagad ma tshig lnga gnyis la// gcig la ba
202b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis su dbye// dam tshig 'di ni mad po che// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs btsu na// srid gsum 'gro ba je snyed pa'o// ga 'dul dam tshig de snyed spro// gzhan yang rgyal mchog kun bzang gi/ thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi// bsgrub med dam pa ma
202b5(rnying rgyud): 'grub// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ rgyal ba'i rigs mchog 'dzin pa ste// 'jig rten gtso dang 'khor gyis bkur// dam pa'i mchog dang dam pa yis// sras dang spun dgongs byin gyis rlob// bder gshegs nyid kyi yul la bzhugs/
202b6(rnying rgyud): 'jigs med kun du bzang por sbyor// ji bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs// ji snod sdom pa bsam yas pa// ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis 'grub// nyams na bskangs pas rdzogs pa dang // de la sogs pa bsam yas mchog/ ces brjod pas/ de bzhin
202b7(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'dul bar byur to// gsu byung bdi/ na tu dngas pa las ma cig gi ya lnga bcu gcig pad+mo// de nas da zhin ga shegs brgyad kyi rgyal bad+ma 'phrul drub las/ sdigs 'ang sa
203a1(rnying rgyud): don yod par bya ba gyur// dmachogasum bsdu pa'i rtsa ba mdor bsdus nas// sngags 'chang rnams kyi don ched du du rtsod pa 'di du/ phyogs bcu'i lag tan rdul snyed du// log rtogs ma bzang rdul phran snyed// tog 'dul gnyen po
203a2(rnying rgyud): sam me khyab// 'dul ba sdom pa bsam yas dang // rdo rje theg mchog mang po kun// nyid las g.yos shing spos med kyang // ra'i rig 'khrul pa'i rtog pa yis// lta ba mthong men pas mo mi khyab// de 'dul don phyir 'tsham par bstan// yang dag nyid
203a3(rnying rgyud): log rtogs gnyis// ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur nas// de la bcos shing bsgyur du med// ye nas ngo bo nyid med na// nyon mongs spangs shing don bsrub med// thams cad ma lus ro gcig 'gyur// kun rdzob chu zla ltar yin pas// cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang
203a4(rnying rgyud): 'grub// rnal 'byor de nyid rtogs pa yis// don dam skye 'gag med pa ste// kun rdzob sku ma cir yang 'grub// ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dam tshig sum brgya drug cu pa'i rtsa ba bco lnga pa mdor bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o//
203a5(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas/ thugs rdo rje rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin laM snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// nam mkha'i mkha' dkyil dang baM yi// yid bzhin sprin tshogs rnam pa 'thung // sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'od 'phro
203a6(rnying rgyud): 'bar// r-i/ srid gsum sreg pa'i ma yin te// yid kyi ye shes me ru 'bar// haM/ dbang po dang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// spyod yul rdzas rnams bsdus nas ni// lhan ne lhang nger 'od du zhi// a/ zhi 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar// thA shes rje byin brlabs
203a7(rnying rgyud): mang po che// hUM/ 'gro ba sna tshogs don byed pa// 'di ni byang chub mchog tu gsungs// / rbazhi gro 'joms shing ngan song sbyong // trAM ta/ spyan bcud len gyis drug sbyong bzhin// phyi deng nang gi dri ma dag/ bdag med gnyis kyis dag par byed/ gas pa
203b1(rnying rgyud): zhag par bya bamed// nyam shar pa'i 'od bzhin du// snang dang ma snang gtag myed // de bzhin ma tham gnyis ya shes kyis// thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing du stong // oM/ pa rig ye shes rgyal po las/ phyogs bcu 'ang sanyams dbang bas nas/
203b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad mi dmigs dbyings su thim// thams cad lta ba'i tshogs su 'gyur// rtog pa rnam bzhi mi dmigs dbyings gyur pa// shes rab yum gyi mtshan nyid dbyings su thim// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med dbyings byung bas// chos rnams thams cad dbyings
203b3(rnying rgyud): kyi khro ga zu mor 'gyur// a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de khon nyid nges pa las chos thams cad khro ba dang khro bo'i rang bzhin du gyur pa dang / rang rig pa'i ye shes thams snang ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas rabani
203b4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi rgyal po'i 'bar ba'i thugs rjes gtum 'khrugs gling tshogs chen por bsgyur nas/ thams cad 'od dpung 'phro zhing 'bar bar bstan pa ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa yis// phyogs badz+ra'i zhing
203b5(rnying rgyud): khams ma lus par// blo dang tsakra'i 'khor lor sbal// 'od 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs chen d+hi// gtumatshan dus maH'i me ltar 'bar// ra~M/ nyi ma'i thod skal mang po zhiH// khro gnyer glog stong 'grar babadzin// rngam pa'i dngo 'bru / 4
203b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i sprin chen phyogs bcur 'bar// khros pa'i me dpung rdo rjer 'bar// rdo rje 'khor lo brtsegs par 'bar// tsakra/ khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya mdzes// ha he/ slas dang bran mo byi mo'i tshogs// rang gi stan dang mal cha dang //

209b1(rnying rgyud): rjod mi lang // mi dmigs de bzhin gshegs kyang bsam mi khyab// ma skyes mchog gi dbyings kyang bsam mi khyab// ma 'gags byang chub sems ni skye 'jig med// 'gro med 'od med mi gnas pa'i// thugs rje byin brlabs rnam par 'phro// zhes nyid pa nyid gsung ngo //
209b2(rnying rgyud): dbyings las dbyings byung thabs kyi phyag rgyar gsal// thabs las dbyings byung yul gyi phyag rgyar gsal// dbyings su dbyings kyis ye shes 'byor bas na// byang chub sems tshogs dkyil 'khor brjod mi lang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nges pa'i don ma lus
209b3(rnying rgyud): par mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyar tshim pa'i le'u ste drug rngu gnyis pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po tshe mtha' yas su sprul nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan bsdus te// b+h+rUM dang bi shwa'i dkyil 'khor du// ma dang A yi
209b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor la// rdo rje 'khor lo rab bsgoms nas// bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don bsgoms te// de yis phyogs bcur gang bar bsgom// s+thi dang dzaHhU~M baM hos dguka/ sku gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog/ lus ngag sems la thim par bya// rdo nyid dngos sa ma yid bzhin mtsha
209b5(rnying rgyud): bum pa mchog ni bzang po yi// cho gzhag gnas ni 'di yin te// yang nas yang du dgug bya ste// mngon sum smin par gyur pa dang // dbyings su yang ni sba bar bya// rdo rje go cha bsrung ba yis// brtan zhing 'khor los dgag par bya// snying po 'bru lnga'i nang du bstim/
209b6(rnying rgyud): grus thams cad ma lus kun// rgyal po tshe dpag med pa bsgom// sku mdog grangs ri 'tshor ba la// rgyan phreng sna tshogs rnams kyis brtson// yid bzhin rin chen phreng ba dang // yid bzhin rin chen za ma tog/ rin chen rgyan dang bum pa bzang // gzhan yang 'gro ba'i
209b7(rnying rgyud): don bya ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ bgegs kyis ni rnams mi ster na// tshe dpag med dang khro bo ste// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// sgra skad drag po bton nas ni// thams cad ma lus phul bar bya// dbang du tshe dpag med pa bskur//
210a1(rnying rgyud): ma bsnyen dngan te bsnyen dang // sgrub dang ni sbrub chen dang // thabs dang shes rab 'byor ba yas// Na 'dod las rnams grub par byed// chang ba man byud 'phel ma// dkar mo'i mdog la 'o 'a 'bar// phyugs mtshan ga pa 'i// rag
210a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs cir yang bsgyur// 'jig rten drag gi phyogs btsun// snyanus pa'i 'gro drug ma lus la// phan pa'i tshe dbang 'di sbyin no// de las lhag pa'i rgyud 'phel med// yi ge bzlas pa 'phrul chen 'di// rnam gsum tshul gyis ma 'khrul bar// sngags bzlas rdzog par ma
210a3(rnying rgyud): mal sa
210a4(rnying rgyud): gcod/
210a5(rnying rgyud): a a/ oM/ tshe rnams dbang du ma gyur na// bder gshegs la yang tsho pag med// skye gsung thugs kyi gzugs kyis ni// phyogs btsun ma ma khri'i khams bkang nas// phyag rgya mtshon ma sna tshogs kyis// 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i bdud bcom nas// 'gro lnga
210a6(rnying rgyud): tshe rnams dbang du bsdu// phyag rgya gshol la sogs pa yis// 'og gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs nas// kashin rje'i gnas nas tshe bkug ste// snying po lnga la bstim par bya// phyag rgya 'khor lo rkyen po yis// steng gi 'jig rten khyams dkrugs te// dbad stag
210a7(rnying rgyud): la sogs dang // bar snang bgegs rnams rgyu ba las// nr-i tshe rab tu dgug par bya// 'khor lo'i 'a ya bstim+b+ha nas ni// de nas pa~M gri 'bru lnga de/ dr-i ya~M gnas lngar bstim par bya// oM oM badz+ra ka pa tsa badz+ra rak+Sha hU~M/ oM r+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra a d+hiH
210a8(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya bsrung ba'i cho ga ste// 'bru pA'i yi ge 'bru gcig ste// 'bru ga cig mo dmigs dbyings su thom// oM/ yid bzhin bum pa'i na tshe// rgyan dang rin chen phreng bas brgyan// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // l+la sa ngas kar la
210b1(rnying rgyud): mkhan rab brtan blo ldan pas// yan lag mnyams sngags bzlas bsgom// rgyan chas lnga dang ldan byas nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas rigs kyi bu de yis// yo b+had ma lus ldan byas nas// mchod yon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/
210b2(rnying rgyud): sa mkhyod da sa grub thob par 'gyur// sgra phrum sa tshig yang ma shin tu gas pa'i le sa drug tu gsu ba'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje thung pa pami 'gro ba ljang ba med par smrazhes bya bar 'a bac+doMs rnas kya dus
210b3(rnying rgyud): pa 'di brjod do// gsang ba'i dkyila'i 'a grong kyi dbying sa// kun du bzang po thugs rje'i dang // sku gsung thugs ldan yod tan rdzogs// mnyam pa'i zhing du spa bar bya// rdo rje rab tu gsang ba yis// rdo rje rab tu kun sbyar to// mau dang sri da 'byor ba bsgom
210b4(rnying rgyud): dang dbyings su thim par bsgom// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa dang // thig le man+ta de dag tu// rnaM thal mthu bzang po'i thig/ rtabapas mo khyud bzang po dang // rdo rje rtsa gcig 'od 'bar dang // 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu dam pa yis// rdorje rtse gcig rtse gsu
210b5(rnying rgyud): bri// dkyil 'khor chu dang ldan par bya// mchod yon sna tshogs mchod par dbul// yaM/ drad ka'i ye shes 'od 'phros nas// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dzaHlas lcags kyu grangs med pas// de yis snying du zhugs par bya// ma las nyi ma'i dkyil
210b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor du// dzaHlas lcags kyu mang po yis// gang dgug de yi snying ga nas// drangs te de yi khang gzhug bya// ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// dzaHlas lcags kyu mang po yis// gang dgug de yi snying gnas// drangs te de yi khar gzhug bya// sngags 'di
210b7(rnying rgyud): rab tu brjod par bya// oM dzaHhU~M ba~M ho/ a nr-i pra du/ ming pra bi sha/ ci 'dod las de bzlas par bya// lag gnyis sor mo spyir bsnol te// khu tshur dam du bcangs nas ni// srin lag mthe'u chung mthe bo gnyis// bar du mthe bor drangs te// oM mang pra pa
211a1(rnying rgyud): A A// thal ba yungs kar drag tu rdeg/ ming de khong du zhugs par bya// babs nas rdo rje lcags sgrog zhags pas bcing // gang yin zhes ni dris nas ni// skra'adre la sogs gang yin pa// lha zhig na ni mchod par bya// gdon glan ni co phrar bum
211a2(rnying rgyud): bsres nas ni// de blud sngags 'di rab tu brjod par bya// oM badz+ra d+haka kro d+hi sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ gal te sgra ru mi btub na// lag gnyis sor mo phyir bsnol te// khu tshur bcangs nas mthe'u chung sbar// gyen bsgreng dbab pa'i kha ru gtug/ sngags oM badz+ra b+ha Sha moM dza pa bsha
211a3(rnying rgyud): hrIzhes lan mang du bzlas pam// ye shes thogs med sgrib mi mnga'// bden pa'i tshig der zhugs par bsam// lce yi thor to a dkar po// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de steng du// oM dzaHd+hIHdmar po bsgom byas na// gdon mi za bar sla bar 'gyur // bdag ti
211a4(rnying rgyud): bsgoms la// a dang nr-i la sogs pa yi// lam lnga'i sems can gang yang rung // i k+ki hU~M dang rang sngags kyis// lan 'bum bzlas shing dgug par bya// pra be shas kyang bzlas par bya// gzhan yang dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHste// gzhag cing dbab pa'i sa de ni/
211a5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra gnyis pa// gcig dang lnga la dbab par bya// thig le bum pa me long 'bar// gzhan yang gnas rnams thams cad ni// spro ba'i cho ga phun sum tshogs// phyag rgya rdo rje skar mo rjer// dgug pa'i phyag rgya kun gyis dgug/ dzaHhaM/ dbang phyug lha chen la
211a6(rnying rgyud): bcol cang bya ba de bzhin no// b+hU k+ki hU~M dzaHsa mi btub na// ha ya grI pa gnas dang yul// zur phyin mgo mjug mnan nas ni// drag tu bzlas shing lcags kyus dgug/ srog gi snying po ma nor bang // gzir gyir drag tu drang bar bya// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/
211a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i thabs yod ci yang rung // nem rdung med par dgug par bya// bya ba sna tshogs las zin ni// sngar byas bum pa lnga po la// sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga// rigs kyi yum dang bdud rtsi 'khyil// ci 'dod las rnams thams cad dang // gzhan yang dgos pa ce
211b1(rnying rgyud): badz+ra a mr-i ta a a a/ oM ma hA badz+ra a mr-i te phaT/ dza gad dza gad tsa zhes kyang brjod do// oM bud d+ha lo tsa ni swA hA zhes bzlas// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa der// ye shes lha rdzogs nyid la brjod// ye shes snying po khyod nyon cig/ yang nas yang du mngon
211b2(rnying rgyud): gsal du// byang chub mchog gis rtag sgoms shig/ de ltar byas pa'i dngos grub ni// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// brda phrad skad kyis dngos grub thob// ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir yang ched du brjod do// pra dbab pa'i le'u
211b3(rnying rgyud): ste drug cu bzhi pa'o// / dpal shrI he ru kas yum kro d+hi shwa ri dang gnyis su med par 'du ba mdzad nas/ byang chub sems kyi rdo rje las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mang po spros nas// 'jig rten pa'i dbang mo chen po dang / dbang po dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i yang
211b4(rnying rgyud): rgyal po dang / blon po dang / sde dpon dang / 'khor 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa thams cad ma lus par dbang du bsdus te/ 'jigs byed chen mo rnams da ltar dang / dus phyi ma'i dus su la la ni cho 'phel ba'i las su bskos/ la la ni longs spyod
211b5(rnying rgyud): 'phel bar bsgos/ la la ni 'byung ba chen mo la thogs pa med par 'gro bar bskos/ la la ni gzugs mi snang bar 'gro bar bskos/ la la ni gzugs sna tshogs cir yang 'gyur bar bskos/ la la ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs dbang du sdud par bskos/ la la ni
211b6(rnying rgyud): nyams shing rmongs par bskos/ la la ni bskams shing 'phro bar bskos/ gzhan yang bya ba sna tshogs pa ci 'dod par bskos nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis// 'jig rten gtso mchog dbang du sdud// thugs rje chen po'i byin brla
211b7(rnying rgyud): kyis// 'gro ba'i don rnams sna tshogs bstan// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// 'di ni rang byung lha yi lha// byams dang snying rje ldan par rol// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas// thams cad kun la sbyor 'gyur
212a1(rnying rgyud): yang // bag chags sogs par mi 'gyur te// bsod nams ye shes tshogs 'gyur rdzogs// thabs mkhas spyod pa ma gtogs par// gzung 'dzin 'khrul rtog rdul tsam med// de bzhin nyid dang dbyer med phyir// rtag tu rang bzhin 'od gsang
212a2(rnying rgyud): gnas// de nas bdag nyid rmad don gong nas 'byung ba bzhin lha khro bo dang zhi ba de dag gang la goms par bsgom/ ting nge 'dzin las su rung ba lha gsal bar gyur pa dang / rang gi lha'i bzlas pa 'bum 'bum gdon to// lha chen po ni dbugug pa'i phyir lcags bya zhwa
212a3(rnying rgyud): pa Ta ra/ ma hA de bAr+b+hu dzan dzaHhUM baM hoH/ lha yi dbang po'i snying ga nas// yang nus yang du rnam par drang // ma mjug sha ma hA ba dz+rahA hrI Sh+T+r-iH/ d+ha'i gzugs mdog ni 'tsher la dkar// lus ni ran chen kun gyis brgyan// gtsug na yid bzhin rin chen /
212a4(rnying rgyud): lag pa g.yas na thogs pa ni// yid bzhin rin chen bum chu gsol// yon tan rin chen sde lnga ste// lce rnams kun gri re ba skong // badz+ran mo ut+ma ta gnas pa// rtag tu 'dod yon lnga dang ldan// bdag nyid snang mdzad gzhal yas dang // lha yi gzugs ni snga ma
212a5(rnying rgyud): lha yi sa bon 'bum phrag tu// srog dang ldan par bzlas brjod bya// mdun nas dzaHhU~M baM hoHsa drang // rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// dze ho rnge nye gnyis med par// lha chen po ni gsal gyur nAm// ci 'dod las de byed du gzhug/ lha chen 'khor bcas thams cad
212a6(rnying rgyud): kyang // de thub dbang byed 'du bar 'gyur// gang 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur// de nas rgyal po chen po sde bzhi bsgrub pa'i las 'di gsungs so// byang chub sems mchog ting 'dzin gyis// phyogs bzhi ma lus thams cad kun// rigs sngags
212a7(rnying rgyud): gi dngos grub tu// rgyal chen bzhi yang dbang du bsdus// bdag nyid rigs bzhi'i he ru ka/ gong don byung ba bzhin du bsgom// lha nyid rtag tu gsal gyur cing // lha yi gzugs tshul gsal bar bsgom// bdag nyid lha dang gnyis med par//
212b1(rnying rgyud): dag dan du gsal bar bya sgom// de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung // gzugs na gangs nya shar 'dra// mchod sbyin 'od zar brgya dang ldan// lag g.yas rdo tri shUl la// lagA g.yon bdud rtsi bum pa gsol// in d+ha swA ya swA hA/ chu rlu coH/ tra baT+Ta d+hA /
212b2(rnying rgyud): su ra ta bak+Sha dzAdz+dzaHdzA dzA hU~M trAM/ zhes lan 'bum bzlas nas/ bdag nyid rdo rje he ru ka/ 'dren pa'i phyag rgya de dag gis// lha yi dbang po'i snying nas drang // rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// de nyid lha yi dbang gyur nas// las gang 'dod pa byed du gzhung// thams cad thams
212b3(rnying rgyud): cad grub par byed// kun la 'byin cing kun la za// lha yi 'khor rnams thams cad kun// ma lus par ni yang dag 'du// bran bzhin du ni thams cad 'brang // rgyal po 'phags skyes bslab pa ni// bdag nyid rin chen he ru ka/ sku mdog rgyud nas 'byung ba bzhin//
212b4(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya rnams kyang de bzhin te// 'od kyi 'phro 'du byin brlabs kyis// 'phags skyes po ni dbang du bsdus// d+h+r-i ta d+h+r-i ta swA hA/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na dur+thid swA hA/ hau hi hiM/ rat+na dzaHhU~M hU~M hoH/ zhes snying mo lan 'bum du bzlas te// srog dang ldan par ting 'dzin bya/

212b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor rnams thams cad bdag la bsdu// yid bzhin rin chen gzhal yas 'grub// rgyal po mig ngan bsgrub pa ni// bdag nyid pad+ma he ru ka// sku mdog gong ga snga ma bzhin// phyag rgya'i tshul yang de bzhin te// snying po 'bum phrag gsal bzlas nas// ting 'dzin phyag

213a1(rnying rgyud): ka can// de ni rab tu dbang bas phyir// bi d+haDA ka swA hA/ wa dzA ba hoH/ nA ga shan pa ya phag sha phag dzaHb+hu ba toH// 'bum phrag du ma bzlas nas ni// do na bdag gi dbang du bcu// bdag nyid lha drugasal bsgoms nas// mig mi bzung gi snying gnas/
213a2(rnying rgyud): yis rab tu bzung nas drang // rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// de nas bdag dang gnyis med pa'i// dbyer med par ni gyur pa dang // ci 'dod las de byed du gzhug/ mig ngan 'khor rnams ma lus par// dbang gi las rnams grub par byed// rgyal po rnam thos bslab pa ni/

213a4(rnying rgyud): sngo zhing 'char// phyag g.yas rin che ni dbyig to thogs// g.yon na 'dod yon bum pa gsol// dbu la rin chen sna tshogs mdzes// be shra ba NaM ye swA hA/ dzaHA~M ba~M hoH/ ku be raM/ kang kang / yang yang / dzaHhUM baM hoH// 'bum du brlam shing srog yod par// yang dang yang
213a5(rnying rgyud): bzlas par bya// bdag nyid bdud rtsi he ru ka/ dza yis rnam thos snying nas drangs// dbang du yang dag bsdu bar bya// rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// yid bzhin rin chen dbang du 'gyur// gnod sbyin 'khor rnams bran bzhin bsdu// rin chen spros shing las rnams bslabs/
213a6(rnying rgyud): ci 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las lha chen po bsgrub pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po de rnal 'khor bkod cing bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la shin tu rngam pa'i
213a7(rnying rgyud): gdangs kyis klu 'di blangs so// trAM/ gi tu ma chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// 'od zer nyi me 'bum gyi gzi// khro gnyer zlog sbyong 'gru ba bzhin// meche bzang yag za byed che // b+h+rUM/ rngam pa'i nga ro 'jug sbyang ldir// thug chem ri ba 'bul pa la sang /
213b1(rnying rgyud): A a ha la'i gad rgyangs che// dbyug pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che ho// hU~M/ khros pa'i shes rab 'od po che// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun du gsal// 'bar ba'i ye shes kun du 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes thig le che ho// hU~M/ khros pa'i rgyal po sprin chen po// khros
213b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che ho// hU~M/ bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po// bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms// 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs byed chen po
213b3(rnying rgyud): thig lo che ho// hri/ rdo rje brag chen sra ba po// rdo rje chu bo ldad pa po// rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che// rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rnang che to// zhes tshad du blangs so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges paM las mnyes pa'i le'u ste drug cu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
213b4(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gsang sngags kyi rgyal po// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bdag dang rdo rje sems dpar dbyer med par yang yang dag pa'i dbyings su 'dus shing bdag gis rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal
213b5(rnying rgyud): mngon sum du mthong ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so// kun rdzob sgyu mar zhal mthong ba'i// thams cad mig yor sgyu ma'i tshul// snang srid ma lus thams cad kun// chu zla'i tshul du 'drar shes shing // yul dang rtog pa gnyis med par// gang
213b6(rnying rgyud): gis de ltar rig pa de// gzhi lnga med dbyings skad cig ma// snga phyi med dbyings de bzhin nyid// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin// rdo rje sems dpa' de la gnas// lha spyod mthun pas zhal mthong yin// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor yang dag ni// chos dbyings bdag dang dbyer
213b7(rnying rgyud): med pa'i// mnyam par sbyor zhing dag pa'o// thams cad byang chub lhun grub pa'i// de ltar gang gis rtogs 'gyur ba// de ni ye shes gnyis can te// de yis yang dag snying po mthong // de nyid cis kyang mi tshugs pa// shin tu sra zhing brtan pa yin// rang bzhin
214a1(rnying rgyud): byings nas 'ad gsal ba// sems dpa' mchog tu yang dag gsungs// de ltar rtogs na zhal mthong yin// de bzhin mnyam rdzogs ldan grub yin// de bzhin gshegs dang ye shes lnga// rang byung chen ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgos// tshogs nyid
214a2(rnying rgyud): bral ba'i thabs mkhas kyis// lcags la dngom po med 'asgom sa na// mthong thos la sogs med pa'i tshul// rang gi ye shes gsal bsgom min// rang bzhin med lnga ci yang 'grub// 'grub 'byung nyid na dngos po med// ji ltar bcom ldan de bdir byi/
214a3(rnying rgyud): dbang dkyil du t+pa la btsugs// thamam cad bya chub shing dus te// mjug pa rang gis mi dka' nas// ta la bcad rnams yong mo gtsang // rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid yin// bdag dang ting 'dzin mthong du dab// de nyid rdo rje zhal mdza myong// rdo rje sems dpa'
214a4(rnying rgyud): bsgoms te// ting 'dzin shin du 'dris gsal na// thams cad rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// kun la dbang skad ces mi tshugs// bdag dang sems dpa' dbyer med de// las mthun ji ltar snang ba bzhin// bdag dang sems dpa' lta spyod gce// de nyid rdo rje 'a
214a5(rnying rgyud): yin// gzugs brnyan dkyipa 'khang yang dag ni// chen po dgas padza seM myong rtogs/ tshan 'dzin shes btog/ ga sa med 'dal thabs rten yin// ba byung shes rab dang du gnas// snang dang gnas pa thams cad kuH// de bzhin nyid pa
214a6(rnying rgyud): ma g.yos phyir// g.yodang red pa gnyig med// gnas dang mi gnas dpe ru 'ad// nyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad 'du// 'dus nyid gnas su thibs pa yi// thams cad de lta bu yi dang // mnyam gnyis dper med sus mi tshugs// de nyid sems dpa'
214a7(rnying rgyud): bzhugs gnas yin// de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog de// sems dpe' ti dang rig pa mthon pas// de nyid rdo rje gal mthang min// rgyur byas phung po khams rnams la// gzhi rtsa de 'azhin nyid dru gcig/ smr-i mar snang ba gzugs na chupa/ @
214b1(rnying rgyud): nyid ni dngos po med// dngos nyid de nyid sna chags ston// phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs// dbang po rnams sems byang chub sems// yul dus po de chen po yin// bdag rtog rnam pa khra ba yin// rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo yin// de sems rang rig nyid
214b2(rnying rgyud): bya// thams cad dbyings 'gyur kun du bzang // de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin// gang gis dri ltar rtogs sbar na// sems dpa' nyid dang dgongs mthun pas// de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ming dang chog dang yi ge dang
214b3(rnying rgyud): yis mtshon nas don bstan pa// kun kyang yi ge ming gcig bzhin// gang yang dngos po ma yin te// dngos med de nyid sna tshogs snang / snang ba nyid na gang yang med// bya byed sna tshogs kun byed kyang // dngos po med de yang dag nyid// don cis kyang mi rmug
214b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i// sa rdo dran med ma yin te// de nyid shin tu 'od gsal yin// rdo rje sems dpa' de ltar gnas// gang gis de ltar rtogs pa ni// rigs mchog dam pa rgya yin te// rdo rje'i rigs dang dbyer med phyir// de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// skyes bu blo rdzas ra
214b5(rnying rgyud): ldan pas// kun dang dbyer med don rtogs te// 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang // byang chub sems la gnas bcas pas// dper na mngal dang sgo nga yis// mngon du ma gyur bsgribs gyur kyang // rtsal chen 'dus pa 'byung ba bzhin// rnam rtog gzugs ni bo
214b6(rnying rgyud): thag/ thams cad kun la dbang sbyar zhing // rigs mchog dam pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dang mnyam pa yi// dngos grub mchog rnams yongs su rdzogs// bde ba can gyi zhing yang thob// byang chub mchog la rol par 'gyur// lha mi rnams kyi
214b7(rnying rgyud): papo// lus ngag sems la dbang thob nas// ji ltar dmigs la bzhin du 'grub// tshad med bzhi la dbang byed 'gyur// bde ba'i ro mchog kun la spyod// tha mar skye rga na 'chi la sogs pa'i// sdug bsngal zad pa'i go 'phang thob// rdo rje rigs mchog
215a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa// nags / dang// dang
215a2(rnying rgyud): ba tshul yang ston// spyan thos rnams pa dag btum cul// byung chub rnams pa byed rnam// ngas ra/ thab sa 'dzu dkyis// dun la mthun pa tshul yang rdzon// rang bzhin dkyis las la
215a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin du kun du ston// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de lta bu yi ngang du gnas// 'i ste rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// nyid la nyid ji skad ces brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de khon to dngas pa las skyes gradam pa blo \u0f7fla rab gcig gis rdo rje sems
215a4(rnying rgyud): zhalnga mthong bya'i le'u ste drug cu bdun pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pargyad kyi rgyal po lta 'phrul brib las sngags 'cha rnams ngon yod par bya ba'i phyir/ dematshig sum brgya'i rtsa ba mdor brdzes nas sngas su bcang rnams kyi don du med du ba
215a5(rnying rgyud): pa'adi brjod do// phyogs badz+ra'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du// log rtog mI bzang rdul phran snyed// tog 'dul gnyan mi khAb// 'dul bsdom pa bsam pas dang // rdo rje theg mchog mang po kun// nyid lus g.yos shing spos med kyang // rang rig 'khril
215a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtog pa yis// lta ba mtho dman bsam mi khyab// de 'dul don phyir 'tsham par brten// yang dag nyid dang log rtogs nyid// ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur na// de la bcos shing baphyang du med// ye nas ngo bo yod yin na// nyon mongs spangs shing kyang 'a
