215a7(rnying rgyud): med// thams cad ma lus ro gcig 'gyur// sun rdzob chu b+h+rUM lha yin pas// cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang 'brang // rnal 'byor de nyid rtogs pa yis// don dam gyi 'gag med pa ste// kun rdzob rdza mchir yang 'jug// gnam ngan du ma 'og rtogs nyid
215b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin bral ba nyid rtogs na// bdag med ye shes rang bzhin nyid// snying rje thabs mkhas ting 'dzin gyis// cir yang dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// so so rang bzhin nges zhe na// yang dag lam nyid bcos su med// de bas yang dag blo chen gyis/ thams cad
215b2(rnying rgyud): po med par bshad// dper na dug gi rigs shes pas// dug gis mi tshugs bzhin du snang // ha la ha la'i dug rnams kyang // bsgrub na ra sa ya na'i sman// bdud rtsir 'gyur la tshe ring 'grub// nyon mongs rang dang spyi bstan pa// mtshan nyid ma nor rtogs bas
215b3(rnying rgyud): rnam par byang ba'i lam du 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub kyang // gang na med de de yin te// nang gi chen po lnga nyid kyang // rang dang spyi yi don brtags na// mtshan nyid med pas rnam par dag/ so so'i rtsal rnams 'dzin gyur pas// thabs chen du
215b4(rnying rgyud): par spro// mtshan rnams rang bzhin mi gnas pas// shes rab dbyings su rnam par sbyor// gti mug ces ni brjod pa ni// ma rig ming gi rnam grangs te// gnyis med don gcig yin par bshad// rang gi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// chos dang bdag dang
215b5(rnying rgyud): dngos po rnams// ngo bo nyid la sogs brtags pa// rtog nyid sgyu ma krung gyur te// log rtogs smos pa'i rgyun yin la// thams cad chos dbyings ro gcig ste// bzod pa'i chos nyid mig gcig yin// spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal spong bdag
215b6(rnying rgyud): med// ma rig pa ni spang du med// rig pa yang dag bsgrub tu med// thams cad dbyings su ro kacig thim// sku ma dngos por rtog pa ni// sgyu ma rtog nyid mi dmigs pa// mi dmigs de nyid sna tshogs snang // skyes pa nyid na chos nyid gcig/ dbyings nyid yi migs
215b7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid// de nyid chos sku phyag rgya che// mi dmigs sgyu mar dngos po la// rtog pa'i yul gyi dngos nyid kyang // chos nyid mi dmigs y-i nas dag/ sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir// yod med gnyis ga dbyer med pas// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// thug
216a1(rnying rgyud): kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// chos nyid dmigs su med pa ste// mi dmigs bzhin du sgyu mar spos// gdul bya'i bya ba bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o// de ltar gti mug spang du med// rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen yin// zhe sdang rang
216a2(rnying rgyud): spyir bstan pa// kun nas mnar sems rtog pa yi// sgyu ma'i dngos po thams cad kun// 'jig par mos pa'i rang bzhin can// spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// zhe sdang snying rje spangs bsrub med// chos kyi dbyings su
216a3(rnying rgyud): phyir// sgyu ma rang bzhin mnar sems pa// dngos po thams cad 'jig rtogs na// sgyu mar snang ba thams cad kyang // chos kyi dbyings las mi gzhan te// mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu mar skyes// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin ni// bdag srog gso ba'i rang ba'i
216a4(rnying rgyud): med// snang ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings// ma nang sems sgyu mchos nyid do// thams cad mi dmigs de bzhin yin// kun kyang dbyer med chos phyag rgya// mi dmigs sgyu ma kun nas mnar// rtog pa kun nas mnar sems te// chos nyid sgyu ma mi dmigs
216a5(rnying rgyud): chos nyid spyi ma mi dmigs phyir// don dam kun rdzob ro gcig ste// ti ngange 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs kun nas mnar sems pa// 'dul ba'i bya ba bsam mi khyad// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o// zhe sdang gyi yi
216a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid ni// yang dag nyid kyis rab brtags na// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid de// gnyis med zhe sdang spang du med// nga rgyal mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// khong nas 'gying zhing khengs sems pa// pha rol zil gyis gnon par byed// spyi yi mtshan nyi
216a7(rnying rgyud): pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// nga rgyal spangs nas zhing sgrub med// chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pas// kun rdzob sgyu mar khong 'gyir nyid// de bzhin nyid las mi gzhan te// chos nyid mi dmigs 'gying bar skyes// skye 'gying nyid
216b1(rnying rgyud): da de// 'byung ba'i rang bzhin sa dmigs drag/ 'gying dang mi 'byung dbyer med rnying // rdzas su byug d+ha rten pastan// pa dmigs N+Ding rnam 'thong // 'bring bas zil gyis gan ba nyid// rgyas kyi dbyings las ma gzhan te// sgram gyis nyid dbyer ma//
216b2(rnying rgyud): phyir// don dam kun rdzob gnyi ga gcig/ ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs sgyu mar 'gying bzhi// nga rgyal 'dul ba bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin// nga rgyal dang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni// rnam par byang
216b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid yin// zhi bsgrub nga rgyal spang du med// 'dod chags ring spyi'i mtshan nyid ni// sred pa kun la zhen pa ste// spyi yi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// chags spangs ma chags bsrub tu med// chos kyi dbyings su ro/
216b4(rnying rgyud): gcig phyir// kun rdzob sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du// 'dod cing chags pa sgra mi sred// mi dmigs pa las mi gzhan phyir// mi dmigs de nyid sgyu mar skyes// chos rnams bdag las mi gzhan phyir// mi dmigs de nyid snga mar skyes// spyod pa sgyus ro gcig
216b5(rnying rgyud): phyir// chos nyid chos can dmigs su med// rgyal ba kun dang dbyer med pa'i// chos kyi sgra yi phyag rgya yin// mi dmigs lha mar 'dod cing chags// 'dod chags chos nyid mi dmigs te// sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer maud phyir// bden pa gnyi gar
216b6(rnying rgyud): dbyer med gcig/ ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bskur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs dbyings nyid 'dod chags spos pa ni// 'dul ba bsam gyis mi khyab ste// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin// 'dod chags ring dang spyi yi mtshan// rnam par byang
216b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid yin// chags dang ma chags gnyis med pas// 'dod chags mtshan nyid spang du med// phrag dog kun gyi mtshan nyid ni// gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la// sems dog rtog pa sgyu ma gzhan// thabs kyis sbyor ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin can//
217a1(rnying rgyud): b+hag dag su mtshan bshad pan// rtagasug ga la sbyong bdag med// drug drug klung yang sa bslab par// byed nga / dun bskam gzhan ci na dum la// phrag dag rtag pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid// mi ba gas
217a2(rnying rgyud): pa las mi gzhan te// mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu mar skyes// phun sum tshogs pa'i lhag par sbyor ba yi// thabs kyi rtogs pa sgyu ma'i chos nyid de// dus gsum stsal ba kun dang dbyer med pas// chos sku phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs sgyu ma gzhan gyi phun sa
217a3(rnying rgyud): la// phrag dog rtog paru 'dzin pa dang // rtag dang phyag dog mau mi / swa taM// nu ma ma dmigs dbyer med pa'i// bden pa gnyi gar ro gcig pa pa// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang bsgyur na// thugs kyi phyag kyi na po // mi dmigs gzhan gyi phun du yul/
217a4(rnying rgyud): dgra rnam par spros pa ni// gdul ba'i bya ba bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin// phrag dog rang dang spyi bstan pa// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin// dog pa rnyeng zhir yangs bslab med// sems can rnam pa mang po ngan// nang gi chen po
217a5(rnying rgyud): sogs bstan// rang spyi'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs pas// ma grol khams gsum 'khor ba yin// de ltar ris dang che mthong na// sngags kyis yongs su zin pa'i nad// dran la gnod par byed mi rdzas// 'an
217a6(rnying rgyud): rab rtogs// dug gsum sdug bsngal gnod mi 'gyur// thabs la mkhas pas ma zin+dan// lam gyi dge sbyong stegs bcas kyang // madz+dza ris lha dang mri ru skyes// b+h+rUM shi med pa'i sa mi rjod// bas mkhas snying rjes zin pa // mtshams med#
217a7(rnying rgyud): lus kun// byang chub sems dpa'i snying rjes bsad// bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob// ma bsad na yang sems can yal bor te// snying rje med de sdig yod 'gyur/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gta muka dang // rakyil phrag des chen po dag/ gang gyi byang
217b1(rnying rgyud): sems de ni// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs par gsal// nyon mongs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs// ngo bo yin par gsal por gsungs// chos kun rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa la// nyon mongs
217b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad byang chub rgyu// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin bdag med pas// de phyir de bzhin gshegs bsam yas// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// phyin ci log nyid byang chub lam// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir// mya ngan 'das pa yod pa yin//
217b3(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags bla na med pa yi// thabs kyis ji ltar zin bzhin 'grub// bsam gyis mi khyab nges pa med// don dam cir yang ma grub la// sgyu ma'i sprul pa bsam mi khyab// thabs chen dag gis zin pa ni// nyon mongs lam yang rnam par grol// thabs med dag
217b4(rnying rgyud): gis ma zin na// dge ba spyad kyang grol mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor don dam ldan pa yis// nyon mongs 'ching ba'i chos spyad kyang // rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba yin// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// gnyi ga yod pa ma yin pas// 'khor ba yongs su shes pas na// /
217b5(rnying rgyud): de ni mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha'// nyon mongs phyin ci log rnams dag/ thabs la mkhas pas zin 'gyur yang // byol lnga char par mi 'gyur na// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni// 'dul ba'i dbang gis bya byed kun// dzan dang smad 'tshong ston pa'ang ltung //
217b6(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod tshul bzang // phal la med pas mi rung na// sngags mchog shin tu zab pa yi// skye bo kun gyis bya bar 'byung // bdud rtsi dang du blang bar gsungs// mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med ni// sku gsung rdo rje dbang thob 'gyur// thub pa'i
217b7(rnying rgyud): rdzas su de phyir gsungs// shes rab mnyam pa ma rtogs na// byol song la la chos dang ldan 'gyur yang // drang srong 'tsho dang rtag mthun dang // ji srid 'tshal bar du 'dod pa spong byed pa// de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad// chos rnams thams cad yongs su
218a1(rnying rgyud): dgapa bo// ma zhin sa kyi sna na ga ldan// rnams rang zhin dag pa dang / 'tha thams pa dag 'byung // snam sa ny-i rnam pa dang / rA a/ da bu dang lanag das
218a2(rnying rgyud): tshul nyid 'byung ba rtse// rgyud nyid rang gi sems yin pas// 'byung ba rtson po rgyalas dag/ 'bras bu yongs su dag pa ni// sems can kun gyi sa pa ste// dza snang chub sems/ yin te// ga'i pad+ma yin// dri chen dri rje gar bum du// seMs 'alus lag nA
218a3(rnying rgyud): sa nga / sa dag la gas
218a4(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa sbyin gyis snang // de bzhin pa shes pad min sa mnyam/ / k+sha par / rtog pa bano ga da / ma sa sbya phyin 'o// sa sa mes byed dag pa
218a5(rnying rgyud): shegs/ ga rnal pa'i bdu phyos/ nga ba pa// shas mdza napa// rna byu na // rang
218a6(rnying rgyud): ma pa dbyi sa zlas btsugs pas/ sgrubs dang shes 'phrul ba ra// rje yid pa pa'i ba par 'byur mye nga pa ma med rtogs pa // gzung dang smig cing rtogs pa sa ra/ na sa nyid ma
218a7(rnying rgyud): bye pas gul la gyings su 'byug bya 'idrisas yang dgrags drub pas sang bye du bya byin sa drag pa byi sa chub kyis na pa 'phrug brasas
219a1(rnying rgyud): brgyad myong bar 'gyur// yun ring rtag tu mi thar pa'i// shin tu nyam thag myong bar 'gyur// grub pa gcig bzhin lhan cig spyong// gnyis med dad pas rjes spyod sman// bder gshegs dkyil 'khor bla med yin// shes rab gsal nga
219a2(rnying rgyud): rtag tu gdung // zhes gsungs/ gsang ba gzhan la mi bsgrags shing // sgra gsung thugs kyi dmachog rnams// rnal 'byor mnyam pa rnam gnyis kyis// thabs dang shes rab 'brel rtogs nas// mnyam pa'i smod pas la dor te// phul dang mi 'dra
219a3(rnying rgyud): yang dag rtags// ma rtogs pa yi phyogs rnams dang // skye bo kun la rab tu gsang // gsang ba'i brda dag sna tshogs gsungs// thabs la mkhas pas byas pa yin// gsang sngags ston yod ma yin te// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas kyis// rjod pa
219a4(rnying rgyud): yin dang br-i tul rnams// las 'phro ngan pa'i don phyir gsang // brgyal gang zhig gsang don 'di// las 'phro na la bsgrags 'gyur na// dper na gtsub shing mes gzubs nas// gtsub shing nyid kyang 'tshig par sdang // gzhan yang tshig par gyur
219a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin// chos don bzang po me dang 'dra// skal ba chung zheng shes rab dman// blo ngan rgyu 'bras rmongs pa rnams// mnyam pa nyid la skang 'debs pas// ngan song gsum du 'phangs par 'gyur// gsang don ma rtogs sdug bsngal slong 'gyur na// gsang ba 'phel bar
219a6(rnying rgyud): byed pa yang // m+b+ha byed lce la zhing mo zhing // sdug bsngal chen po myong bar dgyur// de phyir sems can don phyir gsang // rlung phyogs tsam du'ang brjod mi bya// sngags dang phyag tu rgyun meg zad// sngags zhes rab tu bsgrags pa ni// don dam kun rdzob dbye
219a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i// mnyam pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po du// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ni oM// de la sogs pa bzo bcu ga nyis// phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid ni// phyogs brdungs bzhi gshegs pa mi// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// bdag dang dbyar med
219b1(rnying rgyud): gsal la brtson pa'i yon tan ldan// yid bzhin ma chags dbang bskur te// goms shang brtan par bya ba yin// de bas par chad brtson med na// dper nas bon chag pa las// 'bras bu 'dod pa dang 'dra ste// bsgrub pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur// ngi
219b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor bar gnas 'gyur te// rnal 'byang zan pa la zugs pas// byin cing rnams thams cad pa// dmigs med gcig dang du ma dbral// man dbus gang yang ma yin pa'o// ngab nyid med macan tad ma// mnyam pa'i phyag rte nan pa ming / sa
219b3(rnying rgyud): bcu dus bzhi thams cad dang // 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// yon tan sngon rnams skye 'gag med// gang gi ngo bor ma grub mnyam// kun rdzob chos rnams skye 'gag med// mi dmigs gang gi ngo bo min// chu zla'i tshul du sna tshogs par// snang zhing bya ba
219b4(rnying rgyud): sa pa'i// phyag rgya chen par phyogs brgyad pa// gsum 'ams gsu tho pa da da // 'jig tan pang ga tan 'das// yod tan dupas thams cad dang // bla ma mnyam pa gas gas 'dir rdul phyogs bya nas/
219b5(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid chos nyid skye 'gag med// ngang las ma g.yos par gnas na// phyag rgya chen po thams cad kyang // rdzogs par phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs// thams cad dbyar med ye mnyam la// ma 'dis rgya yongs mchad
219b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i// gzhal yas khang dang nyi zla ye// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhan grub ni// su gsung thugs kyi yon tan bsam mi khyab// mnyam pa'i dbyings rkyen rdzogs par bsgom// de ltar dam tshig 'di gsum ste// de la gnas na 'grub par 'gyur// yan la
219b7(rnying rgyud): mnyams sngags bzlas shing // 'dod pa kun la longs spyod bya// lus dang ngag sems brtan 'gyur na// byang chub rab 'byam thob par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po las 'das na// nyen ni shin tu che bar gsungs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
220a1(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi spyod pa don bsgrub pa// rmongs pas gal te 'das byas na// de me srog kyang der zad 'gyur// dam tshig bsrungs dang sngags bzlas dang // phyag rgya chun mig cad pa bzhi// brtson 'grus che zhing brtan pas gzung // rnal 'byor ba
220a2(rnying rgyud): 'as drang 'gyur ni/ e nyin yang che ba gsungs// ji ltar ram gyi so la nan tan du// rjes bus sbyang dum pabyung na// 'gabangs par chad par 'gyur// de bzhin nan tan meng pa'i gas sngags pa// de na 'am yang na 'das tham dpar 'gyur/
220a3(rnying rgyud): 'byor dam pa rnams kyis ni// sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams gsal// don dam ma nyams dag byas shing // brtson 'grus cher bskyed myang bar 'grub// sngags bsgom ma nyams phyag rgya gsal// cho ga yo byad gtsor mu gsungs// tshogs ni yang ni nye
220a4(rnying rgyud): pa med// mtshogs na yang nyes pa med// ma tshogs na yang 'grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid rang gi lhar sbyor bas// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// cho ga lhag gam ma tshad na'ang // 'grub par 'gyur te nyes skyon med// ces gsang ba'i tshig
220a5(rnying rgyud): du'o// dam tshig sum brgya pa rtsa ba bco lnga mdo bshad pa'i le'u ste drug rngu brgyad pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gyi shegs pa dgyes pa chen pos bzhugs gnas dang / spyod lam dang / lha stangs bstan pa/ theg pa chen po kun grub don 'dod
220a6(rnying rgyud): na// rgya chen zab yangs shes rab myur// zab pa'i don rtogs mi ldog bde// nga dang bdag med yangs pa bde// gnas su chos dbyings gnyis med bstan// thabs chen kun mdzod 'od gsal byams// thams cad dragyes mdzad dbyings ma gtum// che chung
220a7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor// g.yog 'khor lha srin sde mang gtso// bdag gi mtshan gzugs shin tu spags// chos dbyings mkha' dkyil yangs pa la// shes rab myur du don 'gro ba// 'gro med 'od med mi gnas pa// byang chub sems ma
220b1(rnying rgyud): bde// shes rab zad med dkyil 'khor la// thugs rje rol pa'i ye shes 'phyo// gnyis med dbyings sbyor a re bde// ma rig 'khrul pa'i 'dam dbyings su// ye shes sgron ma'i mda' 'phangs nas// gti mug mun pa rnam bsal te// rang bzhin 'od gsal
220b2(rnying rgyud): bde ba'i mchog/ dge dang mi dge gnyis su med// rnam rtog mtshan ma yong mi 'dzin// rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal ba'i// dge sdig med pas shin tu bde// bde dang mi bde gnyis med pas// ye shes chags med rnam par dag // thams cad dbyer med ye shes
220b3(rnying rgyud): yin// sems nyid dang bas a re bde// rgyan du dkyil 'khor thams cad mdzes// ye shes rgyu las grub pa yi// phyi nang sgrib med gsal ba'i ngang // ye shes blo brtan shin tu bde// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la// gtsang dang sme ba'i blo mi 'dzin// thams
220b4(rnying rgyud): cad chos nyid ro gcig pas// gnyis med pas ni shin tu bde// shes rab chung chen ting 'dzin gyis// thams cad ma nor gzhung lugs bzhin// 'khor ba ma spangs sdug bsngal med// gnyis med tshim pas arare bde// thams cad ma lus gcig pa'i ngang /
220b5(rnying rgyud): lta dngang lta ba gnyi ga med// ye shes sgron ma bsgreng bar ni// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad mthong // 'di dang pha rol gnyis med phyir// 'gro dang 'gro bar bya ba min// yan lag stabs chen ma mchongs par// phyogs bcu stong khams thams cad na// thub
220b6(rnying rgyud): mchog ston pa'i spyod yul ni// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// chos rnams thams cad dmigs su med// chos nyid lham cing yang 'grub// zag med de zab pas don brtags na// dag par ma gyur gung yang med// ye shes ma bcos kun du gsal//
220b7(rnying rgyud): rnarnam par dag pa'o// ye nas de ltar gnas mod kyang // ma rig rmongs pa'i ling tog gis// gsal ba'i sgron ma bsgribs gyur te// khams gsum mun nag rgyun du 'khor// rnam rtog mtshan mor 'dzin pa yis// lus dang longs spyod gnas dang rje/
221a1(rnying rgyud): bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong // de la su zhig byed pa yod// yang dag mthu chen sus ma byas// rang la rang gis bcings par zad// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ snying po yod pa ma yin te// l+h+wa ma mig yor sprul pa dang // smig rgyu
221a2(rnying rgyud): 'ja' tshon chu zla'i tshul// de ltar gang gis rab rtogs pa// de nyid sangs rgyas yin par bshad// sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa yin// skye med phun sum tshogs yin te// byed med pa yi mchog kyang rdzogs// zhes nyid la nyid brjod do// sgra 'phrul dra ba las brgyags
221a3(rnying rgyud): gnas khang pa bstan pa'i leru ste drug tu dgra pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mi 'chi ba'i rdo rje bslab pa 'di gsungs so// rdo rje zhing chen bsgrub 'dod pas// thams cad myi shi med pa'i tshul// mnyam nyid dag pa nyid du brgya
221a4(rnying rgyud): khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yai// rmA hUM ba nyis dgug par bya// bdag dang zha ba gnyis med pang // yang nas yang du bsgrub par bya// phrarnams gsapa par d+har pa dang // zhing chen 'og tugajug par b+ha// dkyil 'khor ma lus dang bkod nas// khro bo khra mo dkyi
221a5(rnying rgyud): bsgom// ma ngag pa'i pho nya phyogs bcur gtong // thams cad ma lus dbang du ldud// bsrub pa gcig gam yang na gnyis// gsum dang lha ru bsgom par bya// pho nya mang pos nr-i bkug nas// zhing la yang nas yang du gzhug/ sngar dang ser dang mdog sbrum 'byung /
221a6(rnying rgyud): dri nas bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin gyis// lan grangs 'bum phrag mang por ni// bzlas pa'i tshul yang rnam gsum dag/ rdo rje sngags bzlas rtse mo gsum// de yi bar nas bzlas pa 'byung // 'od zer lnga dang ldan par bya// zhing de lde mo ldem por gyur dang // bdud rtsi
221a7(rnying rgyud): yis bskul bar bya// de nas yig 'bru lnga dgan// gsal zhing 'tshor bar bsgom par bya// dbang po la pang dang bar cu'o// yan ga sngal rigs lnga tshul// rdo ting 'dzin da yis bsgom// denas stong de 'phrul 'gyur nas// zhing dadrag te 'dul ba // /
221b1(rnying rgyud): klags pas bsdam par bya// yan lag rnams kyang gzum par bya// phyogs bzhi dag tu thod pa bstan// ha ya grI ba'i sgrang bsgoms shing // ljags ni 'bum phrag mang du badz+ras// rtogs bcur spro zhing zhing la bskyil// de nas zhing de dag 'bul nas// rdo rje ting
221b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin da yis ni// brtan pa nyid du bsgom par bya// de nas par par byed pa dang // an pr-i du gang yin pa// rdo rje drag tri brdeg cing dbab// thod pa'i khwa nas nr-i snang nas// rdo rdo ting 'dzin mo yis gahAd// rdo rje sngags zos khong du bstim// gnyis su med par bsgom par
221b3(rnying rgyud): bya// de nas zhing de langs pa dang // rdo rje dbyings nas dbang yang bskur// bdud rtsi chu yang byed par bya// las rnams thams cad byed du gzhug/ zhing des rab tu smras pa'i tshig/ dpa' bo ci bgyi minas sti ming chos rnams dang // lam rnams ma lus kun bgyid do//
221b4(rnying rgyud): de ltar bsgrub pa'i rigs mchog gis// thal ba thams cad mos par 'gyur// bsgrub pa'i sa ni dur khrod dang // ri brags gnyen po bgegs gnas dang // nags khrod stong pa tshar ma can// ri bos bskor ba'i lhag ma can// rab tu rnam par dben pa dang // gnod
221b5(rnying rgyud): sbyin srin po 'byung ba'i gnas// de dag du ni bsrub par bya// dgu dang 'acu gnyis bcu gsum dang // bcu drug man chad bsrub par bya// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// phyi nang 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams// la me lnga'i zhing dang sman lngar bcas// 'bru rnams
221b6(rnying rgyud): cad bcal 'a bya// rtag du tshogs che mchong par bya// gsum dang lba dra bar mi ga cad // kha zas rnams kyang thod par bza'// btung bdag kyang de bzhin te// ma mi rtag par gtang bar bya// d+hI rI yi mar las b+hA// yan lag bas pa'ang de bzhin to//
221b7(rnying rgyud): 'i sbrul hU~M// rlud ni drung rkyen srabs mang ba// wang lo yo dang me kyang da// dbye ba mthong ba// ma ga yan lang can la yod// rdon bslabapa par gtod phyir// ga tu ma gyims ni gi da par bya// hUM yi nang pa g.yas g.yon nas// slob pa sa
222a1(rnying rgyud): phyi bad+hA/ de lagal yangs nas// bla rtags dang gas sa/ 'dam na nas par \u0f7f// 'ag ga sngag pan rnams la// zlab brgya dang sum ban// da shA nga ba nas// da ba ta
222a2(rnying rgyud): rdul nga// sgrub pa rdo rje bsgom par bya// sgrub pa dngos la ma gtogs pa// phyogs rnarnams ma tshangs kyang gcid// da sa g+ha sa ba brgyad ni// bzhos dang brnas dang brag rgya gsum/ lag yod mgol me 'bang bzhin// bar mchims med par
222a3(rnying rgyud): bar bya// de ltar sgrub pa'i rigs mchog gis// lham yin rnams bran bzhin 'khor// 'jig rten dbang phyag dbang du ldang // dza rje rigs mchog 'khor bye rnams// gleng bzhin drani 'byung bar 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul cher po'ang dag ni// lus sdeng dras nas rmo na
222a4(rnying rgyud): dad+ya // ma yin par shin tugasapa/ rnab pas pa'i din la// 'phrul / rol su bsgrub pa'i 'ang sa dzi na pa'i// gsang pa skye ya dbang ting ngas pa la thob pa'ang zlog de rje da cig ces bya bangs par cang du 'dza pa
222a5(rnying rgyud): brjod de/ phyogs bad+ma mtha' yas dus bzhi yi// thams cad dper mad maN+Da la'i// nyi zla shar ba'i gzhal yas la// pad+ma chags med gdan bting nas// rin nan zad med pho blangs// rje rlung dpag tu med pa yi// byang chub pade ldan dkyil 'khor la/ 8dz+ra
222a6(rnying rgyud): ldan byang chub rab bkod nas// ma lus kun bsdus dbyings bsdus te// lus bstod yan lag bskul bsigs dang // dbang po lnga yi lha stod kun// phyag rgya chen po yin par bshad// gong gi dkyil 'khor tshang nyi b+ha// mi blugs pA yi sa gzhi la// pad+ma ma
222a7(rnying rgyud): gdan bting nas// thabs dang shes rab chags med tshul// yan lag dbang po thams cad kun// rang bzhin yongs su dag pa dang // ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs lnga'o// ye nas ma bcings yongs kyis te// lhag pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis/
222b1(rnying rgyud): dbu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor// yan lag bzhi la rigs bzhi 'khor// gdog dbyibs dang phyag rgya dang / thabs dang shes rang gas pa bsgoms te// phyogs brdung spro gang ngan 'ang sbyar// brnas bsud dkyil ba ru// ras dang ma
222b2(rnying rgyud): 'das thams cad kun// bder gshegs zhing du rnam par sbyor// yan lag chen po la baspyod na// phi/ sa lnga'i dkyil 'khong ma lus gso// 'gro sa byang chub lam du mdzad// gsam lA ya ba d+hi ma pa d+ma dag/ bcing mdza legs pa'i gos bags na/
222b3(rnying rgyud): 'od zer sna tshogs 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas mthang ngag mdapa'i bad// ye shes lnga yis brgyan par 'gyur// skyes pad+mon la ba ldan pas// rtag tu dkyil 'khor de ltar bcwam// tshig tsa mI ma yin zlog ting nga// bdag dang byed med nyid du'o// rdza
222b4(rnying rgyud): shes rab ldan gyur nas// shar gyi phyogs su kha bstan te// seng ge'i stabs chen mthong bar bya// ljags kyi yi ge hU~M bsgoms la// lce ni 'bum phrag bsam yas dang // sde yang bsam gyis mi khyab s+ho// phyogs bcwa ngas bzhi bas ma yas su// gsung gi
222b5(rnying rgyud): kyi lnga la ba 'di 'bar ba// gsung ga tig dkrol la ba yan lag N+DI// sam gyis mi d+hab kun du grags// spang nga ming rtsig so sor gsal// ljags kyi dbang po bkamanas gsungs// zar dong mthor gnyig brjod// nges pa khyon yang dag tu/
222b6(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis yong ma gsungs// b+hU li dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du// hUM gi yig 'bugs la 'asgoms nas// dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu dus bzhi pa// mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyad // hUM yang bsams pas 'di 'phru 'bar// phyogs dus dkyil byakhos
222b7(rnying rgyud): lus zos// 'gro drug 'khor ba'i gnas kyang chos// sgra dang thos pa gnyis med pa'o// de bzhin dri dang ro rag rnams/ 'i mtshan nyid gsal bsgoms nas// rig 'dra'i snying po bzhin dgod // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang // 'gro drug
223a1(rnying rgyud): lus thams cad kun// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis rol// dri la sogs pa bde mchog gis// kun la tshim par yang dag mchod// 'gro drug ma lus thams cad la// ji ltar 'tsham pa'i don yang byed/ thabs mkhas thugs rjes de ltar
223a2(rnying rgyud): skyon// de bzhin rigs dang rje'i rigs// mchags la sogs shes rab ldan// gtso bo lnga dang gtsu moH/ zhabs dang shes rab ldan pa sgoms te// tsam bu gcigag ma yang na gsum// wa gyi dkyil 'khor rab bsgoms te// thabs deng shes
223a3(rnying rgyud): phan tshun du// lha gsal 'od 'phro bsti ma byas te// dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom// ting 'dzin shin tugs lta gyur nas// bdug dang phyogs bcu dbyed med par// gnyis su med par bsgom par bya'o// de nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis/
223a4(rnying rgyud): spyod la char ma gyur par// dkyil 'khor dag la gsal bsgoms na// dbus nas shar phyogs kha bstan nas// rkang pa'i stobs chen bstod byas shing // lcug gi 'du byed kun bskyod nas// bro dang gar g+hi phyag rgyar bya// dkyil 'khor 'od zer dkar 'gro
223a5(rnying rgyud): ba// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag/ shin tu gsal dang 'od zer 'bar// thabs dang shes rab de phub shog/ cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yis// bdud bzhi dag ni 'joms par byed// theg mchog rdo rje'i rig 'dzin pa// thabs dang shes rab de grub shog
223a6(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid rigs pa'i rdo rje yis// nyon mongs sdug bsngal med par shog/ me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// thabs dang shes rab gsal 'gyur shog/ nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad bcad nas// ma rig mun pa med par byed// thugs rje'i 'od zer nyi shar bas//
223a7(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab 'od 'aper shog/ shin tu sra zhing spyi shi med// rdo rje'i thugs rje rol ston pa// 'gro la thugs rje yongs kyis 'byung // thas dang shes rab byams ldan shig/ thabs dang shes rab ldar gyur bas// yon tang phyogs su kha'i stan te/
223b1(rnying rgyud): yan lag bskul bsigs nas// stobs chen dag kyang brdung bar bya// dkyil 'khor ba lus 'byung ba'i gter// zad med nor bu rin po che// ma lus kun gyi re ba skong // thubs dang shes rab de grub sh+log/ nam mkha'i dkyil gyi mdog bstan pa// yang na thams
223b2(rnying rgyud): cad gser bcom// dkyil 'khor bsam yas zad mi shis// thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ yon tan rin chen bsam yas kyang // thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang gnas nas// de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes te// thabs dang shes rab mnyam
223b3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur shog/ bder gshegs yon tan rmang po che// ye nas chags med byang chub zhing // yang dag nyid du thams cad gnas// thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// drang phyogs su ni kha bltas nas// yan lag
223b4(rnying rgyud): nga po bskyod byas te// gar rnams shin tu gsal byas nas// stobs chen dag kyang brdung bar bya// chos rnams ma lus kun spyod kyang // pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin no// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas// thabs dang shes rab de grub shog/ las dang nyon
223b5(rnying rgyud): yongs nub 'gyur ba'i// bag chags mtshan ma rdul tsa myi med// thabs dang shes rab rgyur byabya shog/ byang chub chags med dkyil 'khor ni// gang nas ma 'ongs nyid rnyi dbyings// mi gnas tshul gyis dbyingasan bzhugs// rnags dang shes rab
223b6(rnying rgyud): grub shog/ thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// byang phyogs su ni kha bltas te// lus bskyod yan lag gar byed cing // phyag rgya so sor gsal gyur nas// rkang pa'i stabs chen brdung bar bya// yang dag rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis// bskal ba
223b7(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa'i// sgrib pa thams cad byang byas te// thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs kyis// bdud bzhi btsal nas mi mthun bsal// bye byed med la don rnams grub// thabs dang shes rab myur grub sho
224a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma lus rdzogs byed pa// sna tshogs kun du 'gyur ba'o// ljang gu'i tshul du mdog bstan pa// thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ thams cad ma lus don grub pa// las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed// nan tan chen po bya ba rdzogs//
224a2(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rang myur grub shog/ sdug bsngal dra ba tshar bcad de// dkyil 'khor ma lus kun byas kyang // gang nas ma 'ongs par mi gro// thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ bder gshegs ma lus thams cad kun// phyogs dus kun du bdag
224a3(rnying rgyud): nyid che// mi dmigs rdzogs kyi dkyil 'khang du// mardzas kun 'du rnam par dang // thabs chen dkyipa 'khor yang dag pas// bder gshegs can pa rnam par macoM// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi// bde ba'i dkyil 'khor ba sa pas
224a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma las rigs bzhi ye// nang du ma 'ja byung pa / da bya snye kyi 'khor nyid/ nas pa bdeb pa shog// gas la di rgyal 'khor dang bad+ma zhing // ye shas sa pa da gro// phyogs pamams
224a5(rnying rgyud): par gang gyur nas// thabs dang shes rab 'od 'bar shog/ de bzhin rigs mchog 'dzin pa po// thams cad ma lus dbyings bsdus te// thams cad kun du bzang por ston// thabs dang shes rab gtsor grub shog/ thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs
224a6(rnying rgyud): gyis// phyogs dus gnas pa ma lus la// chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor// thabs dang shes rab mchog 'grub shog/ 'gro ba ma lus thams cad la// de bzhin nyid kyis yod pas// ma mthong rmongs la nam mkha'i mdog/ thabs dang shes
224a7(rnying rgyud): rab dbyings grub shig/ sman du rdzogs cir yang snang // thabs rkyen rnams lamanyam pa'i tshul// rkyen pong rnams la dag pa dzum dz+wa la// rang la rnams lang// rapa spyo rdzogs shAH'phrul// sgra mi rnams la dge 'du rdul//
224b1(rnying rgyud): la e na ma// gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad la// ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du ston// de lta bu yi sku ston pa// thabs dang shes rab sku grub shog/ thabs dang shes rab ldan bsgoms nas// rgyan lnga yis ni rnam par brgyan// yan lag lnga la dkyil 'khor ba
224b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes rgyan gyis pho byang brdung // gnyis med dkyil 'khor zlum po'i tshul// mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil 'khor du// lhun grub tshogs chen byang chub tu// thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ chos dbyings dam pa bdag med pa// mi dmigs dbyings su ma lus
224b3(rnying rgyud): 'dus// mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med pas// thabs dang shes rab dbyings grub shog/ bder gshegs dkyil 'khor dbu bskyod na// sangs rgyas zhing khams ma lus g.yo// lag gi 'du byed bsngal bskyod na// rig 'dzin zhing khams dag par byed// rkang
224b4(rnying rgyud): can dag gis skabs mchongs na// 'gro ga gnas rnams stongs par byed// snyun gyis phyogs brngub tu byas nA// ba du ba g+h+nAM dang d+ha rnams pham par byed// thabs dang shes rab smra na// de lta zlo ba ni tha~Mb shog/ thams cang ma lus de bzhin ta/
224b5(rnying rgyud): ni gang yang mi dmigs la// skye dang 'gag dang gnas pa dang // 'od dang 'gro ba'i dngos po med// rnal 'byor bro gar rtse 'jo mi// rna tshogs byed la byas pa med// de nyid rnam pa sna tshogs pa// rnal 'byor las rnams grub par sho// thabs dang shes rab tha
224b6(rnying rgyud): da kyis// de lta bu yis longs spyod na// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes// srid gsum 'gro rnams thams cad la// dpa' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur// lus ma spangs par rig 'dzinas// yun rings chos kyi bde sprad nas// bla med dong sems dpa'
224b7(rnying rgyud): sa// rang byed chen gyis rnam par brgyan// mngon shes drug ldan thams cad mkhyen// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// sangs kyis sring la dbang sgyur te// spyod yul kun du maN+Dal// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grug// rnal 'byor las
225a1(rnying rgyud): drang rnams kyis// 'di lta bu mo las rnams b+ha// 'bras bu mngon dum gyur byung // lus drug yid la dbang thob nas// sangs rgyas 'byung dang sgrar mi 'gyur// theg pa man par mang me// ngan song gsum du yong ma chung // gnas ngan yong
225a2(rnying rgyud): spyod mi bde ba'i// ngan pa'i sa ru yod mi lhung // rdo rje theg mchog brjed mi 'gyur// tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// lus byad bzang zhing yan lag rdzogs// dbang po tshang zhing lhag chad med// skad gdangs snyan cing 'gre don byed// bdag gi longs spyod thams
225a3(rnying rgyud): cad kun// gzhan la gnod pa med par 'grub// chen po che yi mthu stobs ldan// 'gro ba'i don du yang dag byed// gzhan la gnod pa yod me byed// snying rje che zhing shes rab ldan// mthu stobs che zhing thabs ldan pa// bdag dang gzhan don rdzogs par sbyor/
225a4(rnying rgyud): mthar ni skye shi med pa'i sa// sangs rgyas yon tan rin po che// bkod pa'i gzhal yas thams cad la// dbang sgyur spyod pa'i dngos grub thob// rnal 'byor gang zhig 'di 'dra'i don// ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas ni// gsang don nges pa'i don ston pa// blo med
225a5(rnying rgyud): mchog chu grub par shog/ dbyer med byang chub mor tshugs can// shin tu bstan pa'i ri bo gnas// mu stegs rlung gis tshugs mi 'gyur// theg mchog rdo rje de lta bu// dkyil 'khor mi zad 'thung ba'i gter // yid bzhin nor bu rin po rje// byi dor ma byas
225a6(rnying rgyud): shin tu gsal// bskal pa grangs med gnas bcas kyang // spu ni shin tu gzhon pa'i tshul// skye shi med pa rdo rje yi// thams cad 'byung ba'i gter yin te// yon tan phun sum tshogs dang ljang// bla med byang chub 'grub gyur nas// ye shes rdo rje lhan grub
225a7(rnying rgyud): shog/ tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs gyur cig/ thams cad kun gyi ston pa po// thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang brnyes// sangs rgyas zhing la dbang byed shing // de rtogs kun kyang rdo rje'i rigs// sgo gsung thugs kyang grub par shog/ rnal 'bar ba
225b1(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab dang ldan man pas kyis/ dus thams cad 'dod yon lnga spyod cing blo zlabs bya'o// gsang ba'i snying po de lo na nyid nges pa las sro gar mye 'jo'i le'u ste bdun cu gcig pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyad kyi rgyal po sgra 'bul dang /
225b2(rnying rgyud): las klu'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ste 'di skad ces gsungs so// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings ldan las// sgra dang dri ba 'brel 'gyur nas// sku mchog rdo rje 'od snang bas// mthun pa'i rdo rje dang skang ngo // gung drug 'khor ba'i lus sdang ba// dam rtog thun pa'i las
225b3(rnying rgyud): rlung ngo // de bzhin su mchog dri bral dang // bde gshegs sgra lngar mdor bsdus te// bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub gzugs// bla med gzugs dang rdo rje ru// de la sogs te snga bas ma yas// phyogs bcu dris bzhi su ston pa// thabs kyis sa stor
225b4(rnying rgyud): nyi// byang chub mchog go rdo rje sku// chags med zhing du mu ston cing // dbyings las ma g.yos bzhin du snang // sku steng de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// rnam dag sku ston ma yin te// log 'gro rtog pa thams cad la// so sor 'dul ba'i skur yang ston// de mo skyong sha med pa
225b5(rnying rgyud): su// las dang ma chags pad+ma'i sku// thar dang mthar sna tshogs kyang // sna tshogs snang la gnas pa med// snang dang mi sdang gnyi ga med// de ltar rdzogs pa'i rigs mchog ni// badz+ra zhes ni gdags pa yin// ji snyed su ston ngas ma yas pa// thams cad ma lus
225b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rjer bsdus// 'khor lo zhes kyang brjod pa ni// de la sogs te sku bsam pas// byang chub thabs kyi dkyil nas byung // sku ni sna tshogs thams cad kyang // 'ja' tshon chu zla 'dra shes na// dbyings nyid las ni dbyings snang zad// thugs nyid gsung gi dkyil
225b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor snang // gsung nyid sku yi dkyil 'khor te// dbyer med de bzhin yong gis so// dkyil 'khor bzang po 'grub 'dod pas// rtag tu dus gsum thams cad du// bdag dang bdag gi dbyer med pas// ya nas dkyil 'khor yin par brtag/ 'di ni
226a1(rnying rgyud): dngos grub mchog yin par// kun du rgyal gyis de skad bshad// klud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las su'i dkyil 'khor mngon du rung ba zhes bya ba/ le'u pa'i dkyil 'khor zab tu ni h+la kyi rgyal po rtse ma las ba sha d+ha / bo la
226a2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur zhes 'byung ngo // rang bzhin su'i dkyil 'khor du bsdu ba'i le'u ste bdun cu gnyis pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgra phru l-i drwa ba las ting nge 'dzin gyi rim par spor zhing dngos grub myur du len pa'i zhabs dpa la
226a3(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsungs so// dkyil 'khor bsam yas dngos grub ni// mi migs dbyings nas don 'byin te// ma bcos kyi bzhin dang bzhag dang // snyun gyis thab pa'i dkyil 'khor 'jung // mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// ting nge 'dzi
226a4(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur na// ye shes sprul pa sna tshogs 'grub// spyod yul thams cad maN+Da la// ye shes dkyil 'khor thar byed skyong // longs spyod sgra dang sangs rgyas zhing // ji ltar 'dod pa smon pas 'grub// yangs shing rgya che lhun grung ni// phyi nang snod bcud ye
226a5(rnying rgyud): nas dang // ngag rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin// de nas rdo mnyam yin no// dngos grub myur du 'brub 'dod na// shin tu bya zhing zab par bsgom// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// shin tu mi dmigs dbyings su bsgo// tang 'dzin dri na goms pa
226a6(rnying rgyud): dang // thams cad sgyu ma mig yor dang // sprul pa'i tshul de shes par bya// de bzhin yang nas yang goms nas// de nas phra mo'i ting 'dzin bsgom// phyi nang snod bcud hU~M du bsu// gang bsrub yi ge so so ste// spyir ni gang bsgom kun du 'dra// rdo rje sems
226a7(rnying rgyud): dpa' nyid du 'dra// yan lag lnga dang rnam shes nyid// yi ge hrI du shin hU~M bak+Sha/ n-i yi mig gis bltar yod par// yang nas yang du 'dris pa dang // 'an thar ming po // phyogs bcu dus bzhi pa bad // sla dz+wal bstim
226b1(rnying rgyud): dmig sa shes// thasu 'gyur dbyu sa nas ma dag 'bar// shang tu 'char bar gsal sgoms pa// thamasaca sa dra 'ar bar gnos// de 'di nyid ngas// na la 'khor to// so mags rab
226b2(rnying rgyud): nas// nyi zla gang po'i nyi zlar bsgom// sdigs la pang chags med bsgom// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yus bsgom// nyi zla gdan dang gzhal yas khang // thams cad bdu gling lba bar bsgom// de bzhin yi ge hU~M gnas pas// mthi ga 'tsher la gnas
226b3(rnying rgyud): 'od zer 'phrob rnam par brkom// 'od 'bron gyis su sur bsdus nas// shin tu rdo rje 'od zer 'gro bar 'gros// de 'od 'thob la 'bar nas// dbyings su 'dzi ni bam par bya// de nyid sems dpa'i phreng bur nas//
226b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhi gnyis pa dag gyu nas/ ga ga la na tud shud bye dang / dngang du da pa / 'odus sa sa pa// ma shes // ngas pa bam
226b5(rnying rgyud): yang na cig car bsgom par bya// nyi zla gza' skar dus gcig d+he// chu kyi la drangs par gsol bya ba zhin// de ltar gro mas te sgo rigs mchog des// ji ltar dbang po sgyu bzhin du 'grub// mnga' lnga 'byor de rig 'dzin gnas// mu srin bzlog
226b6(rnying rgyud): mi 'gul// ri byugs la sogs thog med 'dzul// rgyul mi 'bying mes mi 'tshig/ dug dang mtshon gyis 'jigs mi 'gyur// mi snang ba dang mang por sprul// gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// lha srin rnams la dbang sgyur zhing // tshe dang dus pa
226b7(rnying rgyud): nga // skyong gsum yungs 'brur bskyed pa dang // ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'byu // sbre la dang gcanagacan ga drug pa rnams// khyi bzhi byi bzhin 'drung ba 'gyur// bcu ngag skye ga sa// rgyags par mo'i byur bran bzhi gyur
227a1(rnying rgyud): sbyangs par gu nas// ye gas pad pa / sdug ga gas ma pa tha~M nga sa// las dbang parnalam man// mab malus dang yang bya// ngas
227a2(rnying rgyud): rnams thams cad kun byas nas// kye 'chi med pa'i gzung drung ngog// batshan 'i byang chu kyis bcan// bsad rnams ye she tshogs can ldan// mabang byen tu bad pa 'thag// bsgrub pang spangs 'ad chos kyi dbyings// 'ag mang 'ong med de bzhin
227a3(rnying rgyud): nga // de ltar bsgrubs te bsgoms pas na// 'bras bu la na dum su dgung // bas kyi bu thams cad du// ma s+yA na thang du tho ba 'gyur// ni TI pa sa par yong pa gyur/ khyo rigs pa dog 'byed par 'gyung // zhes rdo rdzogs ma chog tu'o//
227a4(rnying rgyud): rgya po chen po sgra 'phrul dra ba las shin tu gsang par bya ba chung dngos grub thob par bya ba'i le'u ste bdun tu gsum pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyad kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las hom rnams kyi phrin las 'dri gsungs so// da
227a5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid du gsal zhing 'dris par bsgos// de nas bdag gi snying gar a gsal zhing 'amar ba gcig bsgom mo// u re shin tu gsal bar gyur pa dang / phyogs bcur 'od du 'dres par bsgom/ 'od de slar a la brje zhing bstel/ ma dar A las
227a6(rnying rgyud): ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bstim zhing 'tsher la gsal bar bsgom/ hrI las pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom/ hUM shin tu 'od 'bar bar bskam/ snying gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje sems dpa' mtshon gang ba gcig phyag tu dang bcas par bsgom/ bzhi ba#
227a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi sngags dang / yin 'bru dang / phyag rgya yang gsal bar bkris/ 'bru gsum dang 'bru lnga yang bzlas/ 'jug 'bru bzhis mtshams bca ga tu sa bya/ tshogs dang mthong ba yang bya/ nga po mo dus pa'i nga du sa gang
227b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gtso ba du skyon rdo rje sems dpa'/ drag po yang rdo rje// dbang ba n+te ru ka/ rgyas par tra t+te dra ka/ zhi ba btu ho d+ha ba/ spun drang ba na e tse ha mahA kA ru hU~M gzhes hom gang byed pa'i lhag cu ba nas sun drang / mchod pa dang ar+tha dbu dran/
227b2(rnying rgyud): drag po'i mgor ni/ sngags ri la hU~M/ zhi ba la mgor ril oM/ bar ma rnams la yang de bzhin sbyar/ spyan drang ba ni gang mdzad pa'i gtso bo nas zhi la shAn+tiM bsnan/ sprini la so so rang sngags rdzogs/ drag po lho/ dbang nub/ rgyas pa byang / zhi ba shar/
227b3(rnying rgyud): gang yang rung gru gsum dang thod pa kha gdangs so// blugs dang / pad+ma dang / chags med de/ phyag rdzarnam pa bdun la phyag rgya chen po dang / chos nyid kyi phyag na dang / dmachog gi tsug rgyang de/ las kyi sdug tu dang / thabs dang / shes rab kyi lhag sa dang / ting nge 'dzid gyi phyag rgya dang / lcas
227b4(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o// rlung hrI rnal pazhin po 'phrul dra ba las nyo dam ni'i lerje ste badren du bzhi / dwangs de bzhin gshegs pazla parta po bla 'bral ra ba las/ mang du byung ba'ang mchog pa 'angs
227b5(rnying rgyud): bshad de/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang nyid du// dbyings su ro gcig de bsdus te// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs// yon tan mchog gi 'dod pa ni// snang srid ma lus thams cad kun// mnyam pa'i zhing du ra
227b6(rnying rgyud): bstan// chags pa med pa'i tshul du spyad// 'di ni nam dag legs pa lal/ khyad bra mchog tu 'gro ba'i gnas// bang chen po zad gter du 'gyur// rjes snang mi rmugs rdo na'i sgo/ pa ma jug bsngal 'dang chags ni// lus dang
227b7(rnying rgyud): brlabs 'gyur te// yi dgas gnas nas gnas su // sgom dang bkres pas nyin mongs 'gyur// rwag khrag ngan sngags rtag tu mthon/ la spyod pa'i dang yang med// kyang gdug pas bslangang 'gyur// thugs chen pa
228a1(rnying rgyud): ni// 'khor ba'i myangan no bcad cid // bder gshegs la mdu 'dzun par byed// ya dag don dang ldan par 'byung // thugs rje tshul gyi sa khro ston zhing // shin tu mnyam pa'i ngang du 'dzag/ rdo rje sems dpadzi zhi ba las// yang dag
228a2(rnying rgyud): mchog gi bde ba 'bral// ye shes gsal pa'i 'ad ba ni// bdag dang bdag gi dbyer med de// rang pa rnyed med po dbye sa/ su rol// thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngang // kun du khyab pa'i skamanga' ba// shin tu 'od gsal rnam dag la ma// byang chub sem
228a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgrib pa spong // sems can nyon mongs dugasel 'gyur// thams cad zhing sgo dang tshul ni// yon tan bskyed pa'i brtsod yin to// dmed bdag zed mi dmigs la// rtswa zhig de la ngacwal skyed// dbung mna'i tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i // shin tu rgya
228a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i khyu mchog 'grub// lha srin bdud sde tshar bcad pa'i// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin thog/ phrag dog yangs pa'i don sbyor ba// nga dang bdag med de ni rtogs na// dog dang yangs pa gnyis med do// ba mchog dkyil 'khor yangs pa 'grub// phrag rong
228a5(rnying rgyud): ngos po mi shes shing // nga dang bdag tu 'dzin 'gyur na// lha ma yin gyi gnas sa skye// de nas yi dgas gnas sa 'gro// gal te yulas rnyed gyur na// shin tu mi 'de dog par 'gyur// gzhan yang longs spyod thams cad la// dbang byar med cing gzhan
228a6(rnying rgyud): dbang 'gyur// mdor na nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'grub// phrag dog yang dag rtogs pa ni/ nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang // rkyen ci log la phrag drog ste// thams cad gnyis su med par sbyor// bde ba mchog kyang 'grub par 'gyur// gnyis med don yang rtogs
228a7(rnying rgyud): par 'grub// nga med bdag mad dbyings su zim// sprin grub na mchog 'grub par 'gyur// yod la lhan dag bsgom par// rgyu 'bras sman gyis grub pa ye// bdag gis klur drung bang bsgyur te// rig 'dzin gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ 9'i rig
228b1(rnying rgyud): babub bya ba// skyol dang spor bas mthar byin 'gyur// sbyor ba nyid ni sgrol ba yin// rang bzhin gyis ni blor sgrol dang // sgrol ba nyid na sbyor ba yin// ting nge 'dzin gyis sgrar sgrol dang // dbang po'i yu'adus stor sgrol dang // thabs chen dag gi sbyor sgrol dang // man/
228b2(rnying rgyud): du lung ba'i sbyor sgrol lo// yang na sbyor sgrol bdag la sogs// shes rab dbyings dang bdag tu sbyor// zabs chen sprul pa bas ma mi khyib// dbyings dang dbyings su thams cad sgrol// rol pa'i phrin las bsam mi khyab// thugs rje sprul pa bsam mo khyab// sbyor sgrol
228b3(rnying rgyud): phrin las bdag la rdzogs// byang chub sems sprul phyogs bcur 'phro// ngan song gnas rnams stongs par byed// rig 'dzin bde ldan thob par byed// bla med zhing rnams dag par byed// sku gsung lhan grub phyogs bcur 'dul// rdo rje zhes ni mtshan bsgrags te/
228b4(rnying rgyud): theg dman rnams kyang rdo rjer dpyod// zad mi shes pa'i gter yang 'grub// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i sku// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog/ thugs rje sprul pa dpag med kyis// 'gro drug dus gnas mA lus mkhyen
228b5(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba nyid na nyid kyi sku// nyon mongs byang chub lam du mkhyen// 'khor ba nyid ni bde gnas so// chos kyi dbyings dang sems can mtha'// dbyer med yang dag nyid du'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rmad du byung ba'i dam tshig bco lnga 'di ltar yang
228b6(rnying rgyud): bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun cu lnga pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dam tshig rnam par smos pa 'di nyid la nyid ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// spros pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ zhe sdang rdo rje'i thugs rje'i
228b7(rnying rgyud): dang // dmyal ba'i gnas rnams tshar gcod pa'i// brgyad gnyis bcu drug zhing du sbyor// tsha ba rnams la bsil ba'i sman// grang ba rnams la dro ba'i sman// bsil dro 'jam rtsub cha snyoms pa// thugs rje'i byin rlabs de ltar ston// byin rlabs ya
229a1(rnying rgyud): tu rgyun nanas su
229a2(rnying rgyud): ga sa rnams car macang cing / lus dang nas kyis bsgribs pa 'o// nyon dngas bte ga sang pa gan/ ma \u0f7fsa ba rjid ci g+sa ne/ nga dang 'dag meng gnyis me byal// 'o gapa la gyis// ngan snga meng pa'i sdug bsngal bsam
229a3(rnying rgyud): med theb pa dag par byas// ye shes gsal ba'i thugs rje yis// bya byed med par nyon mongs sgom/ tshul song gnas ni stongs byed kyi// thugs rje'i sran ma da kar blon// phrag dog ces bya ba dam ga ni/ yangs patshan par ye shes kyis// ngadang ba nga
229a4(rnying rgyud): rnam la ni// sngags rjes gnyis med mnyamathor zhing // dog dang yangs pa gnyig med// nA men yangs pa'i blo lda pas// di la'i grwang gang yang med// thams cad yangs pa tid du thong// rna ma yin rnams stongs par byed// nga rgyal ba ma
229a5(rnying rgyud): nyid shes pa la/ da thar/ ga ciga'i meng pa
229a6(rnying rgyud): 'i gnas rnams stongs par byed// rang bakhyen gyis 'od ga stsal ba zhes zab 'a byan/ 'jig nyen yod pa// ringangs rjo pa na ma'i can ting gzhig byas na// rang bzhir med de yang ga nyid/ nga ma yan
229a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad sangs rgyas zhing du sbyor// sa 'acos ma byas rang gis gas pa// yenas 'od gsal sangs rgyas dang / nyid kyi kyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i na mchog ni/ rangabazhin nyid la gnas pa yi// sras kyang ma byas rang hru ste// dam ca nga bzhin nyi
229b1(rnying rgyud): sbyor// gces med dbyings kyi dang nga byem// rang byung ye shes dkyil 'a khor gyis// ma lus de bzhin nyid du thung // spang dang mi srung gnyig med// yang dag khon nyid ngu'o// bde ba'i dang zhi ces bya ba'i dum rtag na/ thams cad ma lus rnam par dag na gyi byeng
229b2(rnying rgyud): las mi gzhan phyir// bde dang mi bde gnyis ka med// thams cad dbyings su ro gcig ste// ji bzhin nyid kyi dang btsan par// yang dag nyid kyis de skad gsungs// bshad dang nyan pa'ang gnyi ga med// de bzhin nyid du gnyi ga 'du// dus pa zhe tshul mchog ces bya ba'i
229b3(rnying rgyud): dam tshig ni/ gong na med pa'i ye shes mchog/ thams cad kun la dbang bskur te// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sbyor// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad dang // 'byung dang 'byung bar ma nges pa'i// ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis// dus bzhi snga phyi med pa yi//
229b4(rnying rgyud): skyed du sa nga rjod/ wAn sa tha byed so na sa du 'a na mas kya nga byeng rgyu zla / sbyi dug pa / sa chung kyis zlagasa'i// theng chub pa ma / sa
229b5(rnying rgyud): dbyer med nyid du 'dus// byang chub don sgrub ye nas rdzogs// mnyam pa'i zhing du thams cad thim// rdo rje skye gnas zhes bya ba'i dam chog ni/ theg pa che mchog rigs su nges// rigs te byang chub bstan pas gzung // thams cad mnyam pa'i dbyings shes na/
229b6(rnying rgyud): rigs mchog kun gyi skye gnas yin// skyes pa nyid na skyes pa med// las dang las kyi bag chags med// cis kyang mgos thams cad 'joms// skye shi med pa'i sa yang yin// byang chub kyi zhing bkod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba ni/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu
229b7(rnying rgyud): med pa'i// snang thags bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ phyi dang nang gi gnas pa dag/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su nim// mdor na zhing khams ma lus par// yon tan rin chen bkod pa yi// ye shes rgyan gyis spros pa rnams// zhing de yon tan bsam mi khyab//
230a1(rnying rgyud): ye shes bzhugs gnas zhes bya ba ma gwa ne/ gang 'dzin nam pa ma shen// rabade gshegs pa can thaganas// gsang sta nga sngon pa thupa 'do pas// gcung 'dzin bral ba la shes blog// rjes kyi dbye sa dang sa
230a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis med de bzhin nyid dugacigs pa na rtogs pa'i skyes pa// de'i bsregs pa yi pa na rigs po'i rgyas myo ces bya'i mig // rnam par byang dang nanamangs gnyis// mas yadang payin te// mangs
230a3(rnying rgyud): gnyen pos bcos su med// thams cad dbyings su re gcig pas/ de la 'jigs pa'i gnyen po med// ces kyang mi thogs gong na med// mchog tu bde ba'i zhing yang yin// nga med bdug med rgyal ba'i mchog/ gzhal yas khang brtan zhes bya ba'i
230a4(rnying rgyud): dug tungs dang du da// dag dus gas/ ga la ga rtogapas pa sa rnam #
230a5(rnying rgyud): pa// 'khor ba'i myang dang 'bras bu gnyis// gzhis med pa'i sa dazigs/ yang dag byang chub sems cig ni// mdag tu 'bras rnapa par dang // can mangs pa nyid byang chub ste// thams cad ma lus bde gnas so// lang lnga sto byer ces bya ba
230b1(rnying rgyud): tshig ni/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom byas te// nyon mongs lam lnga'i sgro bkag nas// lam lngar snang ba rnam rtog yin// tog dang mi rtog gnyi ga med// gnyis med de ni yang dag lam// thabs dang shes rab dang nyid du// shin tu mnyam bzhag rtogs
230b2(rnying rgyud): bya zhing // bla na med pa ston par bya// yang dag don ston zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ theg pa bsam yas ston pa yang // de bzhin nyid kyis ma brjod kyang // sems can blo yi rim pa bzhin// so sor 'tsham par kun la gsal// 'di ni rdo rje theg mchog ste//
230b3(rnying rgyud): sa sa/ nga da / ga nga ni/ na sa / sa ma ga da ga
230b4(rnying rgyud): snyoms pa bsam mi khyab// don dang mthun pa 'ba' zhig ston// mi mthun zhags pa 'khor ba gcod// bder gshegs zhing rnams dag par byed// thams cad dbyings su dag par 'dus// sbyar byed byang chub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rang rig ye shes
230b5(rnying rgyud): dbang thob nas// dkar po chen gyis mdog sgyur bzhin// dug kyang sman du 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin byang chub dug gsum ste// 'gro lnga byang chub lam du sbyor// nyon mongs sdug bsngal thar byed la mo// thar dang mthar gnyis med na// thams cad ma lus
230b6(rnying rgyud): byang chub rgyu// mnyam rdzogs lhun grub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ye shes sgyu mar sdang ba dang // log rtog sgyu mar sdang ba gnyis// sgyu ma yin pas rang bzhin mnyam// mnyam pa nyid na mi gnas pa'i// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te// ye shes
230b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor la// thig mchog rdo rje ma lus rdzogs// dpe byad bzing po dpag tu med// thams cad dbang sgrar zhes bya ba'i dem tshig ni/ shin tu rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis// spyod yul thams cad smon na mkhyen// de bzhin nyid dang kun tog la/
231a1(rnying rgyud): sa skye// ldan / nga na / pa pa ga// nga rdzogs papa spyod du 'jug/ nas ngas zhos bya da na/ 'ang
231a2(rnying rgyud): gsum goms byas nas/ dus byaste// ni na pa'i nyi / zhi byengs/ sral ma par
231a3(rnying rgyud): sa rgyas pa'o// bad 'drug te ldan zhes bya ba 'di mtshan te/ sheb ba pon padag pa'i/ sa kya ga dul/ da rtsod yul gnyis sa med// de bzhi dang gcig gi/ na lasbyor dras/
231a4(rnying rgyud): rin+da men gter du 'gyur// mi zad par ldan dmachog mchog/ 'og mi namatha' dbus bsam ma khag// bsgru ba med pa nyam rdzogs zhes bya ba da chog ni/ thams cad mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor laM// rang blar me shes 'byor yi// dbyings dang cig pa gnyis me
231a5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid de rje'i rigs// thams cad gnyisas med pa la// bcu ba dang chub pa yong pa yin/ sengs na gyi grang pa'o// de la lamagyis bcoms med// thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba da chog na/ sa rnams yo sa @
231a6(rnying rgyud): phyin ci log gi blo log nas// log tog gnas na longs spyod pa// ma rig 'khrul 'khor bsam mi khyab// 'u khrul tsog ngan pa bzlog pa'i phyir// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas// nyon mongs 'dren cing mtho ris gnas// byang chub lam chen rtogs par
231a7(rnying rgyud): ston// gsung mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i dmachog ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// seng dang tshig tu brtags nas ston// ji snyed mang po'i don brjod kyang // rdo rje gsung la spros pa med// spos med de ni sna tshogs pa'o// kun du brda'
231b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes gsung // sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// thams cad pad+ma chags med pa'o// bsgyur ba zad med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// snang srid mo lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid kyis dbang bsgyur te// thams
231b2(rnying rgyud): cad ye shes dbyings su bstim// zad med ye shes gter ldan pas// thugs rje byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// so sor don rtogs rnam par dag/ thams cad skad 'jal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thar pa'i dkyil 'khor
231b3(rnying rgyud): 'bum phrag dang // 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus la// gsung gcig tshig tu ma brjod kyang // sngon gyi thugs rje byin brlabs kyis// thar dang mthar gnyi ga la// so so ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// chos kyi gsung mchog dam pa yis// thar pa bskul zhing ngan song
231b4(rnying rgyud): sbyong // rang rig dbang sgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs dus bsam gyis mi khyab pa// de na ji snyed yod pa yi// mtshan ma sna tshogs brtags pa yang // rang rig rnam par rtog pa nyid// sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'bum na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil
231b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor dang // sprul pa bsam yas 'byung ba yang // ye shes sprul par dag pa'i yul// yi ge med 'jal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ yi ge tshig dang sgra spangs pa'i// brjod med dang du gnas pa ni// gsung nyid rang bzhin med pa yi// chos rnams thams cad ye
231b6(rnying rgyud): nas dag/ thams cad thugs su gyur pas na// sgra dang tshig la gnas pa min// thugs la thugs ni mi gnas pa'o// bdud sde tshar gcod ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ nyon mongs pa nyid rnam par dag/ phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas// bdag nyid lha yi dkyil 'khor
231b7(rnying rgyud): te// ni med pa'i gsung drung gnas// bdung ban bcom pa'i skyes macag gis// drags pa rtsen tha mas cad btsam/ ma rig log 'drar 'dul bcad de// rtsom gyi dbyings su thams car thim// rkang gsum sar grags zhes bya ba 'damacheg no//
232a1(rnying rgyud): thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// phyogs bcu 'jig rten rdul snyed du// 'gro ba'i phrin las bsam mi khyab// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shas ci// thams cad gdul gyi chud ma zos// ngan dang /
232a2(rnying rgyud): na chu sa
232a3(rnying rgyud): de ltar rtogs pa'i ye shes ni// kun la dbang phyur rang dbang can// thams cad tshig gi sgra ltar snang // 'di ni ye shes gsung mchog yin// bsam yas ye shes rdo rje gsung zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams bstim gyis mi khyab ste// mtha' dang dbus
232a4(rnying rgyud): med kun du khyab// khyab dang khyab med rdo rje'i gsung // sgra skad sna tshogs bsgrags pa dang // dngos po med la dngos po'i sgra// ji ltar pi bang lag thogs na// sgra ni sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur yang // dngos po med pa de bzhin nyid// phyogs dus dbyer sbed
232a5(rnying rgyud): su na
232a6(rnying rgyud): por yang dag 'dra// rang rig de nyid thams cad yin// 'jigs med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dmachog nI/ 'dus ma skyes nyid 'dres byas yin// 'dus byas snang dang mi snang gnyi ga min// yod dang med pa'ang dbyer med de// rang bzhin ye nas dag pa 'i/
232a7(rnying rgyud): ma bcos ma byas ngang gis gsal// 'jig dang gzhig par bya ba min// ces kyang mi tshugs rdo rje'i bdag/ ces gsungs so// de bzhin sku nyid ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ de bzhin zhing khams bsam yas dang // 'gro ba ma lus thams cad la/
232b1(rnying rgyud): bang pa rnams la dag pa'i sgra// rtog pa can la 'khor ba'i lhas// sa sbyor 'tsham par ngan snyan cing // rdzun pa nyid la dngos po med// rmA d+hA'i dz+wal dukun la snang // bAn+d+ha la de ltar rtogs par byos// ldan grub pade gnas zhes bya ba 'dam rgyag ni/ chos rnams ma/
232b2(rnying rgyud): sa san
232b3(rnying rgyud): mi dgos// che mchog rnam dag ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rig pa'i rgyal po dang gyur pas// thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur te// gong na med pa'i sa mnan pas// thams cad kun gyi gtso bo yin// thams cad ma lus gnyis med pas// bsgo dang bsgo bar bya ba
232b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid la dbang bsrung bas// thams cad dbyings su gcig go// tshong thams cad kyid kyi la lo zhes bya ba'i da mtshig ni/ byin snod brdud bdag rnams la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ye nas gnas// chen po'i gdug pa snang thams cad
232b5(rnying rgyud): ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// b+h+ra ma'i rtsal rnams 'dzin 'gyur ba'i// de bzhin yum sti dkyil 'khor do// dang rig byang chub dkyil 'khor te// thams cad kun nas 'khyil par gnas// bud med gtung chen zhes bya ba'i rim tshig ni/ zas
232b6(rnying rgyud): bcas gnod sbyin nor dang 'dra// sems can 'phel 'grib zadang 'gyur gyi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan ni// zad med 'phel 'grib mod pa yi// mang po spros pas 'phro mi 'gyur// nyung ngu bsdus pas sbom po min// zad med rin chen gter yin pas// thams
232b7(rnying rgyud): cad kun la khyab pa'o// rnam dag byang chub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas rnam par dag pa la// rnam tog rkyen gyis glo bur du// khams gsum 'khor ba'i btson ra gnas// rang rig sgrib med dag pa yis// mya ngan
233a1(rnying rgyud): 'das dang 'khor ba gnyis// rang bzhin med par don rtogs na// sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par dag/ gzung 'dzin dril byed ces bya ba'i ngam tshig ni/ byin ci log tu rnam brtags na// bdag dang bdag gir so sor sdang // de la 'dzin pa
233a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis zhugs nas// rang bzhin med bzhin so sor sdang // yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// dngos po thams cad stong pa yin// dngos dang dngos nyid mi gnas pa// de tog sa sdug bsngal bral byed yin// yum 'gyur dbyings phyag ma'i dam tshig
233a3(rnying rgyud): ni// 'byung ba lnga la brten 'gyur na// thams cad 'byung med ma lus gnas/ skye 'khrungs ma lus gzhi yang yin// thams cad kun gyi rgya yang yin// de bzhin shes rab rnam gsum gyis// le la med pa'i brtsan pa 'ab// nga bzhin dbyings nyid
233a4(rnying rgyud): gyur na// bla med byang chub 'byung ba'i gnas// chos la skyon med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // ngan song gnas rnams ma lus kun// rgyu nyid rang bzhin gnyi ga dag/ rang bzhin ye shes de bzhin no// 'bras bu rnam par
233a5(rnying rgyud): dag pa yi// 'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa// snang ba nyid na ngo bo med// de nyid chos sku chen po yin// sems can don byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ byang chub sems su don gcig pas// rtsa ba snying rje chen po 'byung // thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa
233a6(rnying rgyud): spyod// nyon mongs lam nas 'gro bar byed// nyon mongs khams gsum gnas pa yang // phyin ci log nyid snang ba yin// der rtogs mtho ris thar pa la// rtogs nas don 'dzin ces bya ba'i dam chog ni/ thams cad ldan gyis grub pa dang // sku ma mag
233a7(rnying rgyud): la shes pa// gnyis ka rang rag nyid du 'dus// de nyid yang dag yin par bshad// skra dang tshig tu brjod pa ni// yang dag don gyi snying po 'byin// med tshig sbal mi rten par// blo yi gting du go bar bya// sems la gnas bcas zhes bya ba'i de mtshig
233b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma lus zos so cog/ sems nyid las ni gzhan na med// sems dang chos su dbyer med pas// byang chub lam de ring ba min// gang nas ma 'ongs gar ma 'gro// rtog med rang rig kha na tsam// sangs rgyas sems can sems la gnas//
233b2(rnying rgyud): brjod med spos med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// sna tshogs ji snyed brjod pa yang // so so'i mtshan nyid ma gtogs pa// ba spu tsam yang brjod pa med// bsod nams chen pos bstangs pa yi// sangs rgyas zhing nyid
233b3(rnying rgyud): dag pa'o// las ngan dag gis khams gsum gnas// de nyid dbyings las spros pa med// mi 'gyur rdo rje gsung zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rnam dag sku gsung sprul pa dang // che mchog sna tshogs bstan pa yang // byang chub sems la snang 'gyur te// snang
233b4(rnying rgyud): ba nyid na dbyings su 'ub// phyin ci log g.yo bsam yas kyis// khams gsum gnas dang lam lngar 'khor// de nyid log rtogs sna tshogs snang // de las ma gtogs gang yang med// ye nas ma bcos zhes bya ba'i dam chog ni/ blo med byang chub sngon pa
233b5(rnying rgyud): dgos// 'gro lnga ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas byang chub snying por gnas// de bzhin dbyings kyis kun du khyab// ji lta ba yi dang gnas la// de ltar rtogs pa'i blo 'jug pas// gnyis su med par rtogs 'gyur na// su zhig bcos shing sra yis
233b6(rnying rgyud): rtogs// rang bzhin 'od gsal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rang rig yi nas dag pa yi// sras kyang ma bcos dang gis gsal// ma chags pad+ma 'dra ba yi// ye shes can gyi spyod yul de// kun dang thun mong de
233b7(rnying rgyud): ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul de// sras bu blo rtsel rab kyis rtogs// thams cad dbyings phyag ma zhes bya ba'i dam chog ni/ mi zad yon tan gter gyur pa// zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzad// bdag dang bdag gi med pa
234a1(rnying rgyud): ya// shin tu dang pa'i blo las byung // chos dbyings zab mo'i don rtogs na// sku dang ye shes bsam mi khyab// rang reg ye shes don rtogs na// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thob// byang chub sdom byed ces bya ba'i dmachog ni/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i
234a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyis// chags med dbyings la mnyam bzhag na// thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi zhing // nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'byung mi 'gyur// chos kyi rang bzhin ji lta bur// bdag gis yang dag rdzogs byas te// theg pa dman dang phyin ci log/ thams cad
234a3(rnying rgyud): nyam pa'i dbyings su dgod// phyogs dus gnyis med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyang // rtogs pa'i mtshan ma so sor snang // snang ba nyid na dbyer med de// mtha' dang dbus med zlum po yi// de bzhin rang gis rig pa yang // mtha'
234a4(rnying rgyud): dang dbus med du ma min// gang du mi 'gro kun du khyab// kun la bde sbyin mi gnas pa'o// thams cad 'byor ldan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams so sor rtogs byas shing // thams cad gnyis med dbyings shes na// mi zad par ldan rgyan thob ste//
234a5(rnying rgyud): kun du zad med rin chen gter// de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas na// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi 'byung ste// rtag tu bde gnas byang chub nyid// mtshan dang dpe byad kun dang ldan// thabs gnyis shes rab ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun//
234a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad thabs kyi rang bzhin te// thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor// spyod dang sbyor ba gnyis ka med// sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kyang // snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med// de nyid shes rab yin par bshad// rtag tu thabs nyid mi dmigs pa'o// shes rab
234a7(rnying rgyud): nyid la thabs su sbyor ba zhes pa pa'angamachog ni/ de bzhin 'ang gyi dbyings nyid las/ la pa tshogs kyis ming 'byung // 'byung ba nyid na rang bzhin med// med pa cad du chags snang / thabs dang zhes rabang byings pas byung // mnyan bsams bsgom sa pa/
234b1(rnying rgyud): shes rab kyis// shes rab thabs su don rtogs byos// kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis// gnyis med byang chub sems zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thabs dang shes rab ldan 'gyur na// gnyis med byang chub sems 'phros na// kun gyi 'byung gnas byed pa po//
234b2(rnying rgyud): de yis ma byas gang yang min// kha dog dbyibs rigs gang yang min// shin tu brtag dka' sus mi rig/ bdag gis bdag kyang mi mthong na// gzhan gyis rtogs par ga la 'gyur// thams cad sbyor byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ yo nas lha dang lha mo yin/
234b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor ba dang // dbang po yul du sbyor ba'o// phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs// 'byung ba lnga nyid yum du sbyor// dus bzhi'i lha mo nyid du sbyor// rtag tshad mu bzhi khro mo'o// thams cad ma lus 'byung ba kun// mnyam pa'i dbyings dang rig
234b4(rnying rgyud): par sbyor// yang na shes rab dbyings ma la// bder gshegs dkyil 'khor kun bkod la// bdag nyid rig pa'i ltar bsgoms te// gnyis su med par ldan par bya// rdo rje dril bu ldan gyur nas// byang chub pad+ma shin tu'o// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor mnyes pa
234b5(rnying rgyud): dang // 'gro ba mang po bde thob nas// slar yang gnyis med dbyings su bstim// thi ma 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgyar 'bar// bder gshegs thabs dang shes rab rdzogs// phrag che drug kyang yang dag rdzogs// bsrid nams tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs//
234b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad dbyings su 'byor pas na// ngan 'gro mi ltung yang dag 'grub// 'di ni bsgrub pa chen po yin// sgrol ba nyid ni sbyor ba yin// sbyor ba nyid ni ma lus bskal// thams cad ma lus par sgrol byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyi nang snod bcud ji snyed pa/
234b7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun// bdag nyid chen por rtags pa yis// dbyings su yang ni bsgral bar bya// shin tu khro ba chen po yis// thabs kyis lce chen bskal pa ltar// chos nyid rtags pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// gnyis su med par thabs kyis bsgral/
235a1(rnying rgyud): thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// lam lnga'i sems can kun dkug nas// thams cad ma lus bskul bar bya// re rab chen po'i gling bzhi la// gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun// thugs rnga chen pos byin brlangs te// ye shes pa
235a2(rnying rgyud): chen bsgom byas na// thams cad ma lus bsreg par bya// dbyings su yang ni bsgrim byas te// de bzhin gshegs par byin gyis brlabs// rgyal ba'i sras su dbang yang bslar// de ltar bsgral ba kun byas kyang // bskal ba'i dngos po gang yang med// phung po lnga
235a3(rnying rgyud): po bshig pa la// bshig nas 'byung ba bag la zha// ma bshig na yang 'byung ba yin// rnam shes med pas bsad byas na// gnas pa nyid na dngos po med// sems kyi rang bzhin de la ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgrar langs kyang // sus kyang mi zin
235a4(rnying rgyud): sod pa med// 'o na thugs rjes gang bsgral na// rnam rtog mtshan ma thams cad kun// phyin ci log las bzlog byas te// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya dang // shin tu goms pas dbang bskur te// byang chub zhing la dgod par bya// de tsam la ni bsgral zhes
235a5(rnying rgyud): gdags// bskal ba nyid na sbyor ba yin// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad bcad nas// byang chub gnas su bskal bas na// gnyis med dbyings su sbyor ba yin// thabs nyid shes rab shes rab nyid thabs te// gnyis su med pa nyid byang chub kyi sems so//
235a6(rnying rgyud): sbyospyo pa ni lha dang lha mor sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / dbang po yul du sbyor ba dang / chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar sbyor ba dang / so so rtsal sgyu ma tsam du yod pa yum du sbyor ba dang / dbang po yul dus lha dang lha mor sbyor ba dang / rtag chang mu bzhi khro
235a7(rnying rgyud): khro mor sbyor ba dang / mngon sum du sbyor pa'o// sgrol ba ni thabs kyis sgrol ba dang / 'pho bas bskal ba dang / dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du bsgral pa dang / thams cad ma lus par dbyings su dus gcig bsgral ba dang / thams cad thugs rje chen pos gnyis su/
235b1(rnying rgyud): med par sgrol ba'o// 'di gnyis dus gcig tu mdzad de/ ya char ma gyur par bya'o// dngos grub mchog kyang der thob ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bshad do// ma khyen par len pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'jig rten
235b2(rnying rgyud): 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan na med// rang bzhin rang gis bdag med pa// kun la thogs med spyad 'gyur yang // spyad dang spyod pa gnyi ga med// thams cad ye nas stong pa la// gang gis len
235b3(rnying rgyud): cing gang la spyod// snang srid ma lus thams cad la// thogs pa med pa'i spyod 'gyur yang // bcing bar mi 'gyur bsod nams tshogs// chags med ye shes chen po yin// ma lus thams cad chos kyi dbyings// de ltar dang rig yin par bshad// gnyis
235b4(rnying rgyud): su med par rtogs gyur na// blangs pa nyid na kun du bzang // brdzun du smra ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas dngos po yod ma yin// rang bzhin dang gis 'od gsal la// med tsam tshig gis mtshon mod kyis// ming dang
235b5(rnying rgyud): cho ga la dngos po med// ma rig pa yi 'khrul rtog gis// nga dang bdag tu med pa la// so so mtshan ma dngos por bzung // 'dzin pa'i dngos po yong med de// chos rnams thams cad ming tshig tsam// ji snyed mang po brjod pa yang // rjod par byed dang brjod pa med// chos
235b6(rnying rgyud): rnams thams cad brdzun du snang // brdzun nyid la ni brdzun spyod de// brdzun zhes bya ba btags pa tsam// thams cad brdzun gyi tshig yin no// rdo rje 'joms byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thog ma med nas phyin ci log/ bdag dang bdag gi med pa la// rnam rtog mtshan
235b7(rnying rgyud): ma so sor 'dzin// 'dzin pa'i dngos po yod ma yin// mi mthun mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// bdag tog bag chags kun bcom nas// rdo rje dbyings su thim par bya// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thugs
236a1(rnying rgyud): chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// khams gsum nyon mongs 'khor ba rnams// gzhan gyis bcings te 'khor ba min// 'dzin rtog chags pa nyid kyis 'khor// blo chen rab tu ldan pa yis// chos kyi don po mchog nyon la// 'khor bslang med
236a2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas zhing // thams cad ma lus chos nyid rtogs// rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ nor gyi mchog ni dkor bdun yin// 'dod pas btsal bar mi rnyed de// sku gsung thugs 'das mi dmigs pa'i// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni//
236a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med par 'byor byas na// nor bdun chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// mtshan dang dpe byad sna tshogs ldan// pad+ma chags med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// bsgo nga bsgo dang
236a4(rnying rgyud): ba med/ pad+ma 'angam nas skyes pa 'dra// ji ltar snang ba mtha' yas kun// bdag las gud na gcig kyang med// bdag nyid shin tu mi dmigs pas// nyon mongs nyid kyang byang chub zhing // don rnams bslab pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rdo rje rigs kyis thams
236a5(rnying rgyud): cad bcom// rin chen rigs kyis yon tan 'byin// pad+ma rigs kyis chags med 'gyur// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// thams cad don rnams rdzogs par byas// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam sangs te// mnyam pa'i dbyings la sems kyis lnga/ ske 'chi
236a6(rnying rgyud): med pa lhun gyis grub// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las rmad 'byung kun grags pa// gzhan nu yod 'ong ma yin te// rang byung ye shes gnas med yin// mthong ba'i tshul gyis gzugs snang dang // bla med byang chub skrang snang ba// me long lta bu'i
236a7(rnying rgyud): tshul bzhin du// sna tshogs kha dog dbyabs su snang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnams ni// sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// brjod med rang bzhin kun du go// nyon mongs med cing bla mod sde// mi brjod stong gsum grags pa yi// gsung brjod pas
236b1(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa// brjod pa nyid na stong gsum med// de nyid sna tshogs brjod pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs ldan pa// yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags pa// gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma// mtha' dang dbus kyang brtag tu med// de nyid snga
236b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu// sus kyang ma bcos ma byas pa// bdag gis bdag kyang dmigs mi 'gyur// dngos med kun la dbang sgyur ba// sku gsung yang dag ldan 'gyur na// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// mi 'gyur sangs rgyas zhing du rung // spyod
236b3(rnying rgyud): yul ma lus thams cad la// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'byung // mi zad pa yi gter chen 'grub// gzhan gyis dbrog tu med pa yi// lo de'i dkor ni rin po che// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// bya byed med par rnam bzhi mdzad// mdzad dang mdzad par
236b4(rnying rgyud): bya ba med// ye nas lhun grub sangs rgyas chos// sgyu ma'i tshul du kun la spyod// spyod med dang gi dkyil 'khor la// chags med tshul du rnam par rol// bya byed rnam pa sna tshogs kyang // byed pa nyid na chu zla'i tshul// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// rtsa ba lnga
236b5(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod mod kyi// brjod pa nyid na yod med de// mtshan nyid med pa sna tshogs sdang // de nyid thams cad mkhyen nyid yin// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// de ni rig pa rang dbang 'gyur// bsam gyis mi khyab kun du khyab// nam mkha' snang byed ces bya ba'i
236b6(rnying rgyud): dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// de bzhin nyid kyis kun du khyab// snod bcud ma lus thams cad la// snang ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur// nam mkha' gzung du med pa ltar// snang sing thams cad de dang 'dra// chos rnams thams cad sems
236b7(rnying rgyud): yin te/ sems ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no// rten byed sa chen zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ji ltar sa gzhi chen po la// sems kyis zin dang ma zin pa'i// skye 'khrungs ma lus thams cad 'byung // thams cad kun gyi gnas brten te// de bzhin zag chen bla
237a1(rnying rgyud): med la// byang chub sangs rgyas kun kyang gnas// theg pa mtho dman thams cad 'byung // thams cad theg chen dbyings su 'dus// sreg byed ye shes me zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ bdag med ye shes rang rig gis// dngos dang dngos med/
237a2(rnying rgyud): bag chags bsregs// rang dang spyi yi chos rnams dang // sems kyi phrag dog thams cad kun// dngos po med par rtogs byas na// 'khor ba ma spangs rnam par dag/ mya ngan mi 'da' ye nas gnas// 'gro dang gnas par bya ba min// rtog pa thams cad ye
237a3(rnying rgyud): nas tshogs// thams cad 'khru byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sems can ma lus thams cad ni// sgrib gnyis dag gis 'khor bar 'gyur// mnyan bsams bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyis// bdag med gnyis ni rtogs byas na// pha rol phyin rdzogs
237a4(rnying rgyud): sa bcu bsgrubs// sa gsum yang dag rdzogs byas te// mnyam pa'i zhing la thams cad 'god// khrus kyi mchog ni 'di yin no// g.yeng byed chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sems can ye nas dag pa la// bdag 'dzin rdul snyed g.yogs par 'gyur//
237a5(rnying rgyud): sems dang rdul rnams med rtogs pas// ye shes rlung gis bag chags gtor// chos rnams ye nas rlung dang 'dra// de la gzung du med pa ltar// kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis// ma bcos ye nas de ltar gnas// thams cad kun la dbang sgyur zhes bya
237a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i dam tshig ni/ rang reg phyin ci ma log pa'i// gzung 'dzin gnyis med rtogs pa yis// thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang 'gyur na// thams cad ma lus bdag yin pas// thams cad kun la dbang sgyur te// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub//
237a7(rnying rgyud): kyang dru bang bami dngas kyis/ gam sa kyi seMs ma tu byags cur byung shes par bya ba'o 'o// ngas bya 'byung ba 'bri pa/ nga ngadu du ma sun du
237b1(rnying rgyud): nyid chos su yin par bshad// rjes kyang mgos ma spangs pa'o// so sor snang zhing mthun pa'i gzugs// bdag dang bdag tu ma brtags pa// de lta bu yi dang du snang // chos rnams sgra ltar shes par bya ba'od mchag ni/ zharnams rnga snyed brjod pa
237b2(rnying rgyud): yang // dngos po med las dngos po sgra// brjod dang sgra yi dngos po min// chos rnams sgra ltar shes par byos// thams cad ma lus don 'byung ba// tshig gis mtshan las grad na med// sgra nyid don gyi dngos po min// don nyid sgra las gun na meng//
237b3(rnying rgyud): chos rnams dri'i mtshan nyid du shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams thams cad dngos med par// sna tshogs 'byung zhing rnam par 'phro// de bzhin dri yi dngos po yang // yod pa ma yin kun du mnam// the tshom med pa'i shes rab kyis// chos kun de ltar/
237b4(rnying rgyud): shes par gyis// de yis rab tu tshim 'gyur yang // dri dang dngos po gnyis su med// dngos grub thams cad de ltar ro// chos thams cad ro ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// gzhi rtsa med las thams cad byung // de
237b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin dbang po dngos med dang // rdzas kyi dngos pa med pa yi// rnam shes dbang po yul tshogs na// ro yi dbang po thams cad 'grub// dang ro ru rtogs pa yang // rang bzhin med pa skad cig ma// chos thams cad reg rta ltar shes par bya ba'i dam
237b6(rnying rgyud): tshig ni/ gzugs rnams dbu brdos pa 'dra// tshor ba chu yi chu bur bzhin// mtshan 'dzin smig rgyu bzhin du gnas// rnam shes sgyu mas dbang sgyur na// mtshan ma sna tshogs 'byung bar nges// bde ba'i ro mchog kun kyang myong // de nyid bsod nams tshogs
237b7(rnying rgyud): chen te// bde ba chags med ye shes yin// reg gi dngos grub de ltar ro// 'dus byas rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ yang dag nyid la gnas bcas na// phyi nang snong bcud rnam par dag/ rags par snang ba de bzhin gshegs// sgyu mar
238a1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa yum gyi dbyings// gzugs ni mtshan ma dngos po med// gcig la lnga lngar bshig pa dang // thams cad nam mkha'i ngang du gnas// nam mkha' de bzhin chos kyi dbyings// 'dus byas nyid kyi dngos grub bo// 'dus byas kun du
238a2(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gshegs sku sgyu mar snang ba dang // log rtogs sgyu mar snang ba gnyis// gzhi rtsa med de rang bzhin stong // rigs dang rgyud du brtag tu med// rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med pas// phyi nang snod bcad rnam par sdang // snang ba
238a3(rnying rgyud): nyid na chos kyi sku// cir yang 'gyur zhing thams cad 'grub// kun 'byung dngos grub de ltar ro// glang po brjid gnon zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sems can ma lus thams cad kun// rnam rtog 'du byed mang pos g.yengs// ji ltar bus pa shed ma ste//
238a4(rnying rgyud): mang pos g.yengs par gnas// bya byed mang po bdag med pas// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur na// mtshan ma mnyam pa'i dbyings su gnas// 'du byed sna tshogs mi g.yo brtan// dbang lnga rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams thams cad rtse med
238a5(rnying rgyud): pas// shin tu brtan pa'i dbang thob 'gyur// rang rig ye shes 'od gsal bas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbang yang thob// chos rnams thams cad dbyer med pas// kun la spyod pa'i dbang thob ste// spyod cing chags pa med pa'i tshul// kun kyang rang
238a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin ye nas zlu ma// thams cad rgyas 'debs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og bcu// rang bzhin chen pos kun du khyab// rang byung de nyid dngos med par// kun gyi phyag rgya skye yin no// chos dbyings de nyid zab pa yi// bdag
238a7(rnying rgyud): la gnas shing brtag dka' ba'o// mnyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad 'dus// ye nas bde gnas zhing du'o// chos rnams dbyer med pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ye nas dbyings su ro gcig pas// de la nga dang bdag ma rtogs// rang bzhin rnam par
238b1(rnying rgyud): dag pa la// gtsang dang skye ba'i blo tsam med// thams cad bder gshegs snying po pas// rten gyi rdul gyis gal 'gro// shes rab mchog gis de skang rtogs// ma lus kun 'das dbyings shes byos// thams cad 'jigs bya
