238b2(rnying rgyud): shes rab blorgyal ldan pa yis// bdag tog ma tshan ma thun pa shig nas// mtshan ma med pa'i phyag na d+he// thams rgyad 'das par yang dag togs/ panyid nga dngos sbyi da rtanan @
238b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yung drung tshe 'phel zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams thams cad bdag yin pas// gang du 'gro zhing gang du skye// 'jig dang skye ba'i dngos po med// dngos med de la sra zhig gsod// gang zhig gnyis su 'dzin pa la// skye dang 'chi 'de
238b4(rnying rgyud): yod// ye shes can gyis brtags pas na// skye 'jig nyid na dngos po med// thams cad mi 'gog pa zhes bya ba'i dmachog ni/ mchog gsum rdzogs pa man chad nas// ngan song gnas rnams yan chung ngu// yang dag pa ni dbyer med de// gang yang spang bar bya
238b5(rnying rgyud): min// theg pa mtho man bsam pas pa// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs// ngan sang gnas rnams thams cad kun// bla med byang chub tu yod pa'o// thams cad spyod pa zhes bya ba'i dmachog ni/ thams cad kun du bzang po yi// 'dod pa'i yon tan
238b6(rnying rgyud): narnams la// thogs pa med par spyad byas te// bsod nams tshogs chen yin par brtag/ de bzhin gshegs pa ltar yang brtag/ gzhan yang stong khams thams cad ni// shes rab dbyings dang 'dod yon rnams// rab 'bring tha ma thams cad spong //
238b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad mi chung pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs dus mnya' pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ rje dag mchog ma rtogs par// theg pa dad man dang lta ba dpan// des ni theg mchog rtogs mi 'gyur// mi mnyam pa yi don nyid kun khyab kyang // nyon mongs sprus
239a1(rnying rgyud): su gas/ sa tad pa da/ sa tsud pa// pa babyung 'i sa nang 'dam gas/ mas cad pa thasasangs rgyas pa/ 'bru chung ba byur bya ma// / nga da sa
239a2(rnying rgyud): nga dang da/ sa da dganas/ nga sa/ dus ba pas ma ga pa
239a3(rnying rgyud): sa bang phyu sa kyi 'di sheg na shA ga sa//
239a4(rnying rgyud): ga bsngal bad parjod/ dmacig 'dud do // mchims pa da pa'i makya / kyi'i midzi gyinas// sa pa' // na dzin gyi ga rna ma ga/ rung ma
239a5(rnying rgyud): gi shA/ 'du ga shegs rigs gca na// dbya ba ma myed med bye par/ ba da ma ma mau bcig na ba// yangan mtsha nyid meng par byudag/ ting 'dzin phyug tu dam mag na/ yade ga shegs
239a6(rnying rgyud): sa / gnagasams na/ bzhi du du da// na bya na ba man pas cag tu
239b1(rnying rgyud): sgrosapa// thabang ca dru ga ga/ rgyu 'dzin sa/ mas su dug nasu nan zhes// ngad sa la pa cwa 'dul dra ba sa mthoganam par rnas pa yong na/
239b2(rnying rgyud): nga shAng / rnams ga du
239b3(rnying rgyud): ma 'ad gas pa// ni 'di ldan 'du // rlu rang ba sbyin med pa bzhis// nga na sasu sa la gas par// gas pa pa dang bzhin myed pang na nan sa gsu bsgrums sa danapa
239b4(rnying rgyud): min thob par 'gyur// de nyid gzugs brnyan tshul shes na// ye shes chags chen thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byur bas ni rtag tu banam// ye dam mA de blangs byas na// ngan mang mi bde rtag tu byung // rdzogs dang phyag tu rgyan pagacad pa'i dzin na/ sdug pa
239b5(rnying rgyud): ga rtsa bar mi gtsang // dz+wal 'byor 'grub pa'i las yang yin// maM gdang ma zhing 'dzin pa'ang yan// na mchog rdzogs pa'i gnas yin te// rAg tu d+hA ma zhag phyag rgya yin// ga gsum gting 'dzin gas yin te// yang dag da nga na
239b6(rnying rgyud): dus pathams 'ad par phyug tu stegs// med bdun cwas brjod // tun rnams pa'i mtha shA sa// gan byu dang yi ga // ng+ge ni sa mam nyid 'dzin pa/ med dpal la stan pa pa// yin tan med de
240a1(rnying rgyud): mchod byas na// sangs rgyas byang chub zag me ring // rdo rje mched dang lham dral gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa/ rdo rje rigs kyi sman yin te// thog ma med nas las mthun pas// lha sprod mthun pas 'dir skyes te// gcig la gcig ni mig dang 'dra/
240a2(rnying rgyud): shin tu gdung zhing brtse bar bya// dam tshig ngan sems dpya byas na// dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur// de bas dam tshig 'da' ma byed// gsang ba'i dam tshig bstan pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// srid gsum ma lus kun la khyab// phyin
240a3(rnying rgyud): sa sa du sa pa
240a4(rnying rgyud): gsang don bstan gyur na// rang bzhin gsang don mi shes par// 'phral gyi spyod yul de dag la// shin tu nges pa'i don bzung nas// gsang don de nyid log par khrid// ma togs de nyid dmyal bar 'khor// de bas shin tu gsang bar bya// thugs rje chen
240a5(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pas// zar lam kun la mkhas par bya// shes rab mchog dang ldan pas na// sems can snod kyi rim pa bzhin// theg pa mthong man don nyid ni// so sor 'tsham par bstan dgos so// dang du blang dang mi spang ba// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu spong // ma
240a6(rnying rgyud): pa med par gyur pa dang // dngos grub ya mtshan chen po ni// dam tshig mdo bshad nang nas 'byung // ma rtogs pa zhes spad gyur na// yi dgas srin po'i nang du ste// yang na mtshig 'di lta bur// ji ltar spyad kyang sdom pa me 'da' ste// byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis
240a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// 'gro dang nyal dang 'dug pa na// mnyam pa de yi dbyings na gnas// shes rab mchog gis rtag tu gyis// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// bya lam nam mkha' gcod bzhin gyis// 'dzin chags ma lus thams cad kun// mkha' la rlung chen
240b1(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba bzhin// yid kyi rtog chags ma lus pa// tshul na chen 'phyo ba ltar// rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar ltos// de ltar rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis// chog tsam ma yin blo gting spos// rdo rje theg mchog kha 'ches la// mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes par/
240b2(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags dam tshig mnyam zer zhing // thugs tha ba dag gis spyad byas pa// dmyal khams rag tu brgyad par 'gyur// mnyam pa'i don nyid ji lta bu// maHma dang rtags pa gang yang med// dzi la mi gnas yul la stod// snod gar byung dang smon pa
240b3(rnying rgyud): med// de lta rtogs pa'i rigs mchog ni// rdo rje rig 'dzin skye ba na// 'jigs ma kun tu bzang bar sbyo // yon tan mi zad gnas pa yin// mnyam pa'i dog nyid mi shes shing // kun rdo 'don dam gnyis med la// mos deng gang zag gnyis med na/
240b4(rnying rgyud): 'di ni byang chubs pa yin// las dang nyon mongs thams cad la// mnyam pa'i don du mi shes shing // rten 'brel rgyu 'bras yod 'dzin na// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyis// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// bden bzhi'i dngos po yod lta zhing // spang dang mi
240b5(rnying rgyud): byed 'gyur ba// 'di ni nyan thosas pa yin// dge bcu dag la gtsor len cing // dge dang mi dge mi mnyam pas// lha dang mi yi skye gnas te// 'dod khams dag tu 'khor ba'i sa// mnyam pa'i don nyid mi rtogs shing // tshang rang ba'i dang bsam gtan
240b6(rnying rgyud): rim pa sa sor bdag 'dzin cing // gzugs chags dag la bdag tu rtag// 'din cings gnas rnam par ste// mnyam dang gzunas med martogs par// ming bzhi med par ma shes te/ lcemached ba'i la gnas 'thar dus/ lung ba'i tha me sa d+ma ste/
240b7(rnying rgyud): cad mnyam par ma shes na// mthas kun lazhe sdang zhing // snying rje yang dag med 'gyur ma// 'di mam bzang chen pa la// dmyal khams bcu drug gnas pa yin// chags ma mangs pa mi shes nas// thams cad kud la 'dod chags shing // lus kyis bad
241a1(rnying rgyud): dang byus kyis bsgribs// yi dgas can pa'i gnasas te// dadung bdag meng mi shes shong// sa rnams can pa ngas byas pas// shes bathogs pa don mdapas// dgrothog gnas kya nam rtags/ dun rtsom sang gnasapa te/ na
241a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin mad lachar pang 'grub/ rang bzhin byeng sa las gams pazud/ na gzhan sa/ sod pa shA pa/ zhin pa ma ga ses dang sa ba ga gas/ tsu pa mi mtshan ma dam ma
241a3(rnying rgyud): par// mtshan maldan dang thams cad myed// kun dang mnyam pa nyid yin pas// 'jig rten dngas dang 'jig rten pa'i// sa snro ba da na// lag rtag pas pa yas pa// ye nus yod bya mA yin te// zo ba'i rnam rtog pagra chags kyis/ ga
241a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin dra bas bsgribs 'gyur te// ci yang med la cir yang snang // snang babad na rang bzhin med// de skar rtogs na bder 'gro'i gnas// rdorje can gyis de lta tshogs// rnal 'byor chen po'i lha snod ni// phyir yang stong kyang rang bzhin med// mkha' la
241a5(rnying rgyud): chen rdzing bya bzhin// thul sbyar chen 'phyo ba bzhin// mkhye' la drung rkyen 'gro ba bzhin// rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar blta// rnal 'byor rlud pa chen po'i// thams cad kun la dbyer med stod// 'itsho mchog myong bar 'gyur// de la su tshig chags pa
241a6(rnying rgyud): byed// spyad pa ban ma tshogs pa shes yin/ bde ba mchog sa gi song napa sa phyogs// des bu sa ring spyo/ dzin byung ba rgyabapa chen yin spyod la par 'dUr ba'o// sngag sa'i thang rnams kyis rtag tu spad// bcig skyab ma nyim gnas kyang /
241b1(rnying rgyud): ba la sa/ ga kya / sa ma ga/ ga // 'du ga dpa pan/ da sa// sa /
241b2(rnying rgyud): na sa na 'das/ na rdza sa pa dang ga chen pa// rnam par TIg pa byed// shA na bang+gA' da med de// ba pas pa
241b3(rnying rgyud): thabs kyis kyang chen / man pag pa las 'phags pa// don 'dzin na bdunan/ rdzob rdzogs // rgyas pa nyid las ma gnas bzhin// rangs zhagan ston pa ldan// thabs dang shes rab dpa pa dag/ 'ang
241b4(rnying rgyud): garjo// de la gas dun sa Sh+TaT+Te/ rlu na na na sa ldan pa ma sa ba lus
241b5(rnying rgyud): ma na / sa ga snyan d+ma ga / ma nan chu
241b6(rnying rgyud): sa// gas da smra pa nga// de bzhi nga duni jig/ ba sa pa/ sa
241b7(rnying rgyud): byeng du myong du smri don pa parnams sri'i 'i dus su da du drang du 'a ra bya/ gang yang ma zhi ni tung // byu du ba du gas // 'do pa na
242a1(rnying rgyud): rigs// snang srid ma lus thams cad la// gsal zhing dro ba'i gnas byed cing // mtshan ma bag chags sreg byed pa// 'di ni me yi rigs su bshad// chos rnams ma lus thams cad lnga// dngos por snang la gzung du med// brjod
242a2(rnying rgyud): rtan pa'i gnas 'ad pas// dngos pa med pa'i tshul nags s+ho// 'dini mchen yin par bshad// rdo rnam pa ma smras pam de bzhin rnamam pa'i chen pa ste// dang nang sh+tha ga byed pa'o// thams ca dgas pa pa'i de// 'byung ba
242a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyang // thams cad nam mkha'i ngang du thim// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su 'bru// nyon mo sa lnga pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ma rig pa ni rig par 'gyur// phyin ci log ni yang dag ste// nyon mongs lnga po de bzhin
242a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs// dngos med rtogs na byang chub lam// ma rtogs ngan song gsum du 'gro// de bas thos bsam bsgoms pa'i sa// yang dag don nyid rtogs byas te// thams cad sangs rgyas nyid du sbyor// 'dod chags rang bzhin med pas na// yang dag don la
242a5(rnying rgyud): chags byed de// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas// ma chags pa la chags pa dang // shin tu chags mchog chen po yin// rgyal ba'i zhing khams 'byung 'gyur te// snang ba mtha' yas zhing dgra yin// thams cad pad+ma brdzus skyes yin// rdo rje'
242a6(rnying rgyud): sa ru skye// zhe sdang chen po'i mtshan nyid ni// byin gyi log la zhe sdang zhing // zhe sdang dngos po med shes na// sngar dang mi sdang mnyam shes te// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang nyid ni// thams cad kun la dper med de// de ltar me rtogs
242b1(rnying rgyud): kun la snang // de bzhin phal gyis mnyam mi shes// des ni zhe sdang nyid du mthong // yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// zhe sdang thugs rje chen po yin// ga ti mug rmongs pa zhes brjod pas// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// don dam du ni dbyer med la/
242b2(rnying rgyud): kun rdzob skya ma mig yor tshul// snang ba nyid na dngos med pas// de la su zhig bdag tu 'dzin// thams cad dbyer med mi dmigs pa// shes rab can gyi gti mug yin// de rtogs de bzhin gshegs pa'o// nga rgyal mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mnyam pa nyid la gnas
242b3(rnying rgyud): bcas nas// byin ci log dang theg dman la// shin tu rgyal chen por byung // ngabral zhib so so man// rang bzhin med pas dbyings su 'dus// 'di ni yon tan+ta 'byung gnas yin// de bzhin dag par shes par byos// phrag dog mtshan nyid rjod pani//
242b4(rnying rgyud): bdag tu 'dzin pa ste// 'dzin nyid dngos po yod ma yin// mnyam mi shes la phrag dog cing // thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'dus// mi mnyam pa la shin tu sdom// de bas phrag dog chen po yin// sbyin ci log tu bdag tu bcings// gzung dang 'dzin pas shin
242b5(rnying rgyud): dog/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// dog yangs med de thams cad mnyam// de nyid shes pas las rab 'grub// phung po lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phung po lnga por snang ba yang // kun rdzob bya ba sna tshogs byed// bde ba'i yul dang mi bde'i yul/
242b6(rnying rgyud): sa so'i ro rnams mong byed cing // lnga po'i mtshan nyid bshig byas nas// so so'i mtshan nyid dngos po med// gang gis de la dngos bzung na// ngan seng gsum du skye bar 'gyur// de la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni/ pa nyid ni rang bzhin med// sdang med de nyid
242b7(rnying rgyud): chogs sbyin// mang mi nga gnyis bu da/ rabs rnam par bang ba'i gzus// gathubs nyid yongs spyo rdzogs pa'i bya// rjer pa mabya da rjod pa'i// kun larnam gsum byung ba sa// rjod du mi ba di dang po med// ga pa yid lung sa
243a1(rnying rgyud): bstan// b+ha tshogs tshor ba 'byung 'gyur yang // tsher du 'byung ba gnyi ga stong // stong nyid dngos po yod ma yid// de rtogs chos kyi go bgos yin// 'du shes mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// gsur chags mtshan par 'dzin pa yin//
243a2(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid bshig pa na// dngos po med de de bzhin nyid// dngos po de ni sna tshogs pa// bya byed med par kun du 'jug/ khams gsum ma lus thams cad la// mtshan ma che chung bsam mi khyab// khyab med dngos po yod ma yin// de ltar rtogs na sangs rgyas mtshan
243a3(rnying rgyud): 'du byed mtshan nyid 'di ltar gnas// rtsa ba brgyad pa'i grangs 'gyur te// lnga bcu rtsa gcig kun la 'pho// der rtogs rtsa ba yod ma yin// med bzhin log g.yo rnam par 'gyung// de la dngos por 'dzin pa ni// rtag tu nyon mongs g.yengs gyur nas// khams gsum
243a4(rnying rgyud): btson re kun du 'khor// yang dag don phyir rig pas ni// 'phro ba'i gzhi rtsa de bzhin de// de la rnam rig 'byung ba ni// dngos po med de skad cig ma// ye shes dbyings la rol pa mdzad// sprul pa'i tsho gas chen yin par bshad// kun gyi 'byung gnas rnam shes
243a5(rnying rgyud): te/ de yi dngos po'i rang bzhin ni// kha dog dbyibs dang rig rgyun min// gang yang ma yin nyid mi dmigs// 'di ni kun la dbang bsgyur te// mtho ris 'gro'am ngani song 'gro// rtogs dang matogs khyad par ro// bzhi po mnyam pa'i rang shes na// 'di ni ye shes
243a6(rnying rgyud): chen po yin// kha dog lnga yi dam tshig ni// sems can ma lus thams cad la// ye shes lnga yis kun khyab kyang // rang gi rnam rtog bsgribs byas te// ye shes lnga yi don ma mthong // ma mthong rmongs pa thams cad la// yaM shos mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir// dag
243a7(rnying rgyud): dang dmar dang ser ba dang // ljang gu la sogs nag por bstan// chos rnams bdag med rtogs byas nas// byang chub sems nyid dag pa'i phyir// shin tu mdog ni dkar bstan pa// de rtogs bya phyir dag pa'i mdog/ cho rnams ma lus thams cad ku de// @
243b1(rnying rgyud): rab ba badzadang // chags dang chags par ba bamed// chags mod phyir ya nga sa d+ha na// lan ta gte ba 'dam shos// thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te/ de bso pang dpyod sa ma lus la// mad myo bla d+hA'agyu du/ dunan
243b2(rnying rgyud): gser gyi mdog tu bstan// chos rnams phyin ci log rnams la// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// dbyings su yang dag bsdu dgos pas// las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed// kun du las ni ljang gu'i mdog/ de bzhin cid kyi dbyings nyid
243b3(rnying rgyud): las// cis kyang mi tshugs bcos su med// kha dog nag po dngos po la// tshon gzhan dag gis bsgyur du med// de bzhin kun la shes par byos// phyogs lta zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin du// dbyer med dang du gnas/
243b4(rnying rgyud): pa la// ye shes rtogs pa'i don ba phyir// phyogs dang dbus su gnas par bya// sems can ma rig mdangs pa la// nyon mongs mi rig bsal bya'i phyir// ye shes sgron ma 'od 'bar bas// ma rig mun pa sel bar byed// de phyir de la shar zhes bya/
243b5(rnying rgyud): sems can ma lus thams cad la// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi gnas shing // ma rig mun pa nub 'gyur bas// de la nub kyi phyogs zhes bya// sems can kun gyi nyon mongs kun// ye shes chen po bdag med pas// thug bsngal rab tu byang
243b6(rnying rgyud): byas nas// de la byang gi phyogs zhes brjod// de ltar mi lus thams cad la// thugs rje shar dang sgrib pa nub// rnam rtog mtshan nyid byung gyur na// de yi yon tan chen po rdzogs// de ltar chos rnams ma lus kun// rang bzhin nyid kyi dbyangs
243b7(rnying rgyud): su 'dus// phyogs rnams me lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid du rnam pa'i tshul// phyogs rnams kun pa de ltar blta// mau dag phyin ci lag rnams kyis// phyogs rnams so sor bzang 'gyur na/ rtag tu nyon mongs 'khor bar 'gyur// dbang po lnga nas
244a1(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sbrul lnga dag la dbang byed cing // gyen ci log ni dngos por 'dzin// dngos por bzung bas khams gsum 'khor// gzugs rnams ma lus thams cad la// snang zhing dngos po med pa dang // lha dang lha mo pa
244a2(rnying rgyud): brtags// bdag dang A ting gnas pa'o// skye rnams na tshogs grags pa yang // ti dngos po myed byer shig// nga rjo pa sa rnams da / swA hU~M na tshogs yin/ med nga por snang ba yang / dza rang bzhin gang yang meng // dza sa
244a3(rnying rgyud): chos kyi dri yin te// shes rab chen pos de ltar rtogs// ro yi dngos por snang ba yang // ro yi rang bzhin yod ma yin// ro bro de bzhin nyid kyi ro// bde ba de yis tshim par byed// reg bya sna tshogs snang ba yang // reg bya'i dngos po yod med de// reg byar snang ba
244a4(rnying rgyud): yongs byed yin// bde ba chen po chos kyi b+ha// mi shes bya naci lcog rnams kyis// dbang po'i yul la chags 'gyur na// rtag tu 'dod dang mi 'bral zhing // ngan song gsum dang mi khom brjid// rtsi ba sog ma'i me bzhin du// khams gsum dgra rtsa 'khor ba
244a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de bas ye shes chags med nanas// byas lam sogs bsod nams byas// kun la spyod cing legs pas// ye shes che btsug tu bsgoms// mnyam pa lnga zhes bya ba'i dmatshag ni/ don dam par sleb med par mnyam pa dang / kun rjeb rdza mar
244a6(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa dang / don dam pa dang kun rdzob tu dbyer med par mnyam pa dang / chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa ldang mnyam pa dang / rnam par shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa'o// de la don dam par skye ba med par mnyam pa ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad
244a7(rnying rgyud): kun// de bzhin nyid dang myong ba'i mtha'// yang dag pa dang chos kyi dbyangs// mtshan nyid meng kyang dmigs su med// gzung du med cing smon pa med// yi nas mya ngan 'das pa yin// thams ci nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med//
244b1(rnying rgyud): can rdo ba ltar mar mnyam pa dang // 'dus byas ngos pa na rdzogs ni// smra ma'i tshul du thams cad snang // 'bral gyi b+ha ba kun kyang byed// rtogs pa kun gyi mtshan ma snang // 'di dag thams cang gzugs brtan te// bya byed spang zhing dngos po nga// rbanra chu
244b2(rnying rgyud): rnams cang gnas// thams cad sdang le rang bzhin med// don dngazlan rdzob dbyer 'a ni// chos dmas ma lus thams cad sbyin// gan ma med las thams cad 'byung // yid dang med pa gnyig mid// dod da pa kun rdzob dbyed med de// 'das mthas di 'dres
244b3(rnying rgyud): sa nga / rlung banyid nang sa ni // sa med de nyid pa rdzogs s+ho// de nyid b+h+ra ma tshan ma rdul// 'byung brnyan pa snang bzhin gshegs pa snar ma thum pa ni// ma rgyan sumakha' las/ yum tshogs 'thung 'byung ba// gag yod pa pa yin te/
244b4(rnying rgyud): ga da mam dag ca ga me ni/ sa cu sa/ da pa pa ga lan jugs// dung gsapa bcad pa shes su smre ga dun gsus sa/
244b5(rnying rgyud): ma sa sa kyi
244b6(rnying rgyud): brtag par bya bdang // dus gsum kun du me darigs pa// 'di'i mnapa nyid ye shes yis// mgatogs dbang po'i spyod yul spangs// dab bo'i yul rnams dngos med par// thams cad dbyed med de bzhin nyid// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes na// me
244b7(rnying rgyud): 'di sa ba da // la rnams sa ma thosas cad pa// len 'ang bzhin med pa dang // bas che spya gyis dra 'apa'i bdags// ni yang dag tshogs pa la// bras kyi kyil 'khor shes du bya 'du byag / bsad nangs la shas chags rabs
245a1(rnying rgyud): sa / na na can du na na du
245a2(rnying rgyud): sa sa
245a3(rnying rgyud): sa / gas 'i sa
245a4(rnying rgyud): na sa / sa sa sa/
245a5(rnying rgyud): rgyabasam gyi gas dul yin// de'amani sa nas nga la sa ranas parnyas / dam nas / na ba na thong par byed/ gshegs dkyil la malus pa// 'a dra'i mas pa 'du /
245a6(rnying rgyud): tshim byed bsod nams chags tshar 'gyur// dngos por mi 'dzin pasang rnam sa chags// d+he sa suM mA mchog gis/ thams cad dz+nyAn la tshim par m+b+hi// mi dgasu gnas du longs spyod ldan// dkyil 'khor ma lus ma da pa yin// bde ba chen rdzogs
245a7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// nal 'byang las su drang rnams thos// rnam pa mang pos bathun pa dang // slar mchod dag gis longs spod na// dkyil 'khor bas mangs ldan gling 'gyur/ ba chen rtsol ga de'i di 'drar nas// sdig pa'i phun rdzogs bar byed// dpung /
245b1(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i// mthu chen dag kyang 'grub par byed// tshogs kyi phrin las zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// kun la thogs pa med par spyad// thams cad ma lus 'dul bar byed// mi mthun phyogs nas dbang du byed// yon
245b2(rnying rgyud): tan chen po 'phel bar byed/ khro bo gA tum pa'ang zhi bar byed// thams cad kun la spyad bde ba// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas// dbyings su bsdus pa'i dkyil yin te// 'phro 'du mang po'i 'khor gyis bskor// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang nyid ni// de lta bu
245b3(rnying rgyud): tshul du gnas// 'khor gyi phra men tshim par byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ bdag nyid 'dul ba'i dbang phyug tu// rtag tu mnyam bzhag khro bo'i tshul// 'khor gyi khro rnams de bzhin te// mdog dang phyag rgya thams cad dang // sngags mchog dam pa ma lus
245b4(rnying rgyud): 'don// de nas phra men 'khor bsdus nas// so so'i las dang mthun byas te// so so'i gnas su gzhag par bya// dbang du bsdu dang bsgom pa'i thabs// ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bya// ma lus thams cad byos shig par// lhag ma byin nas dbang yang
245b5(rnying rgyud): bskur// gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad la// 'dod yon lnga yi sbyin pa btang // de nas las rnams rdzogs byas nas// dbang phyug chen po'i gnas brten nas// rigs lnga ye shes lnga la sogs// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// bdag la thams
245b6(rnying rgyud): cad bsdu bar bya// de ltar bslab pa'i ngang 'chang ba// ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs byas nas// rig 'dzin rig pa'i sa la gnas// theg dman spyod par yod mi 'gyur// mi khom gnas su skye mi 'gyur// skye shi med pa'i g.yung dung thob// sangs rgyas zhing
245b7(rnying rgyud): yang spong bar byed// ngan song gnas rnams stongs par byed// yang dag mchog gi snying po 'grub// dbang po yul du snang ba kun// yul rnams yod pa ma yin te// kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid// dngos po sna tshogs par snang ste// snang ba'i dngos po
246a1(rnying rgyud): rnam bshig na// so so'i mtshan nyid rnam bshig nas// gzhigs na nam mkha'i dang du zhi// nam mkha' dkod lngas gzhogs na// mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings su thim/ thams cad kun gyi 'byung gnas so// gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig ma/
246a2(rnying rgyud): se
246a3(rnying rgyud): gnas med de// snang ba'i dngos po med pa la// nyon mongs blo yis byung du med// bsgo dang bsgo bar bya ba med// de ltar sgo byed dngos po med// med bzhin sems kyis log brtags pa// khams gsum btson rar rtag tu 'khor// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni//
246a4(rnying rgyud): nga 'i nga gnyig // nad cig sung tsal rtog pa 'im/ panyid kyang 'grum/ yul gyi sa pa 'brog/ 'di thaM bzhin tun nyid / rnam shing bya phyugs pa/ khrim sa byung byed/ nga ga dang gas
246a5(rnying rgyud): shang kha ni rlung 'pho 'dra// rlud ni yongs su ma chud pa// 'd-i'i kun du 'byung ba yin// de ltar don rnams dngos po med// chu dang rlung dang rlabs 'dzug// de gsum gcig dngas so min// de bzhin kun bzhi nyon mangs yid// gcig pa ma yinas sa man/
246a6(rnying rgyud): kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyings// thams cad ye shes dbyer med cing // gcig tu yang ni brjod pa med// de ltar ma togs sems can yin// rtogs na sangs rgyas gud na med// byang chub sems kyi de bzhin ni// shin tu mi dmigs brtag dka' ba// yengs la
246a7(rnying rgyud): rgya cho gter zab pa// shes rab zab pas rtogs 'gyur te// gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro// 'od dang 'gro bar bya ba min// shin tu brtag dka' mi dmigs pa// mtha' dang dbus kyang brtag tu med// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang nyid ni// dmigs med tshul du de ltar
246b1(rnying rgyud): sdang // drengs dang dbyings kyi ye shes kyang // rang rig khon tsam du zad// sems can ma lus thams cad kyis// de ltar khong du chud par byos// kon mongs sdug bsngal med pa dang // bla med 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// sems can ma lus thams cad la/ snying rje'i
246b2(rnying rgyud): zag pa ma chags par// nyon mongs lam las grol byed cing // byams pa dag gis mnyes par gyis// de bzhin 'khor ba'i btson ral// snying rje'i zhags pa cher brkyang nas// nyon mongs 'dam nas 'dren par byed// snying rje chen po skye ma byed// de bzhin skye bo phal rnams
246b3(rnying rgyud): la// las kyi sgrib pas mi gos shing // thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas par// dga' ba dag la 'gyod pa med// sems can nga dang bdag med la// thugs rjes gnyis rtog mi 'byed de// b+ha gcig 'dra bar blo gzhag bya// thams cad dri ma med par bya// chos
246b4(rnying rgyud): rnams thams cad stong pa bas// de la dngos dang rtog pa med// nam mkha'i ngang du gnas pa la// de la bcos shing bsgyur du med// chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med// snang ba thams cad dngos med pas// yod dang med pa thams cad kun// mtshan nyid med pas
246b5(rnying rgyud): mi dmigs so// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa// chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba yang // bdag las gzhan pa ma yin pas// kun la smon cing chags su med// byang chub sems rnams thams cad ni// shin tu brtag dka' gting zab pas// rtog ga'i snod
246b6(rnying rgyud): yul de ma yin// ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med// sems nyid de nyid ji lta bu// byang chub de nyid sems yin no// sems dang byang chub dper med pas// sems can ma lus thams cad dang // dus gsum chos rnams thams cad yin// thams cad ma
246b7(rnying rgyud): lus chos so cog/ sems dang byang chub nyid du 'u ba// bo d+hi chen pos de skad bshad// skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas// ci la'ang thogs pa med par spyad// spyang pa nyid na chags pa med// dus mtha' med par ma nyams gnas// 'di ltar snang ba thams cad la/
247a1(rnying rgyud): mngon sum tshad mas rtag mthong yang // snang ba nyid na dngos po med// de bzhin yang dag nyid du rtogs// gang zhig stong pa'i ngang yod ces// med pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa de// ri bong rwa dang lo gzham du// tshig tsam gdags su rung mod kyi/
247a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad ming tsam stong nyid med// thams cad ma lus sbyong zhes te// dran med pa rdos pa ma yin pas// rtogs med rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing // 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun// brdos pa tsam gyi mos med do/ shes pa 'ba' zhig kho na'o// thams cas
247a3(rnying rgyud): banyis med rtogs gyur na// de nyid don dum dbyings yin te// gzhan nasu btsal zhing gzhag tu med// bod pas badz+ral na sgo btags 'gyur// med las bcol na skar du t+ya ste// yod meng gnyis las btsal byas na// de ni lung dum bstan 'gyur// rnam par
247a4(rnying rgyud): rdeg pa mi mnga' ste// de yis mi mkhyen ci yang med// rnal 'byor lta ba de lta bu// tshig gis snga phyi yod med kyang // don gyis cig char rdzogs par bsgom// de lta bu yi don rtogs kyang // 'gro nyal 'dug sdod yongs spyad kyang // theg chen sgom las nyams pa
247a5(rnying rgyud): med// grong gi rin ltar ma rtogs pa'i// blo ngan mnyam par khungs phyung nas// martogs le lo sgo ma las byas// don ma grub par dran sor 'gro// sems kyis mnyam par martogs na// tshig gis mnyam pas sang+yas mi rjes// de bas don tshig ldan par byo//
247a6(rnying rgyud): 'on tang the tshom med par 'grub// rnal 'byor don chen rtogs pa yis// dus mthunga' med par de ltar bsgom// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/ spyod yul sangs rgyas nyid du gcig/ rtag tu bsod nams tshogs chen ldan// bya byed med pa'i brtson 'jus
247a7(rnying rgyud): sa/ des ni byang chub snying po len// zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dbang po dang yul du 'dus pa bstan pa'i le'u ste 'dun cu bdun pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las
247b1(rnying rgyud): sngags 'argyang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir thams cad phyag rgyang 'dug shing stanang sdod btung thams cad pa 'di skad brtags shing zug rgya'i dra mchog bapung ba dang / dmachog ni gan sa yin no// phyag rgyag bsum shir smos pa yang 'di yin te/ ched du 'arjodapa
247b2(rnying rgyud): 'di brjod do// gsang ba de nyid kho na las// byang chub mchog 'di bstan pa'o// mnyam pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni// phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa'o// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// ye nas dbyer med de bzhin nyid// mnyam dang mi mnyam bya ba
247b3(rnying rgyud): min// de bzhin nyid kyi dang du 'ab// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// brjod pa ma lus thams cad kun// chos nyid dang las ma rtogs pa// log rtogs nyon mongs rdul tsam med// phyag rgya sna tshogs 'od 'bar yang / de ba byin nyid las ma g.yos te// bdag
247b4(rnying rgyud): nyid dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// mnyam la mnyam par gnas pa yi// rnam gsum tshul las bsgom byas shing // phyag rgya skyed cing log 'dul ba// bya byed med pa'i tshul gyis su// las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed// de ltar rtogs shing rigs kyi mchog/ bdag yid
247b5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya kun gyi bdag/ ye nas rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/ byang chub skye 'khrungs rgyu yang yin// 'bras bu yang dag nyid du'o// chu 'bras dbyer med rdo rje'i sa// bcu gsumangon grub de gnas pa/ mthar phyin gang la'ang ma gnas pa'o// rang bzhin phrag rgya chen po ni/
247b6(rnying rgyud): phyi nang sdong bcud thams cad kun// thams cad shes rab dang du gnas// rigs lnga bder gshegs yab yum du/ ma bcos ye nis de ltar gnas// thabs dang shes rab nyid la rol// bde min ma chags tshogs chen po// yang dag nyid la rab tu rdzogs// lhag pa'i
247b7(rnying rgyud): phag chen mo ni// nang gi rtags ni phyog byung te/ mdor bsdus phyag rgya chen po dang // gzhan yang kyag rgyang tshogs pa// lag gi 'du 'grongs pa yas dang / yan lag skabs chen bskul bamigs kur// nyid kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // rang bzhin nyid kyis de ltar
248a1(rnying rgyud): gnas/ 'arnams shing a snang mi grags pa// rang byung chen po lta pi lta// thams cad kun la 'jigs par byebya/ dpa' ba zhes kyang gdags par bya'o// las dang mas kyis mgos pa// gnyis dung chung kyang gas shing/ 'ardzogs
248a2(rnying rgyud): la chags pa dang // shin tu rnam par dag pa yi// de bzhin nyid dbyings dkyil 'khor la// sgra gsung thugs ldan zad mi shes// yon tan mi zad gnyer du 'gyur// gzhi ni mi zad par ldan pa'o// sku gsung las rnams rdzogs byed pa'o// rnam par rtog med
248a3(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis ni// thams cad kun la chags med rol// 'dul ba'i don lan bsam mi khrub// 'joms dang ma chags kun 'byung dang // thams cad dbang bsdus don 'grub pa// mu lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ kun nas zlum zhing 'od zer ngado// rigs bzhi ma
248a4(rnying rgyud): khrus thaman cad kun/ gnya ma tshogs dbyings su thams cad 'dus// rigs rnams gcig med gcig pa ste// lhun grub dkyil 'khor dang nyid du// phyag rgya'i dam cho go mtshan nyid na// thugs kyi rtags su bskrun pa yid// dper na tshul pos rgyas btab /
248a5(rnying rgyud): sa su
248a6(rnying rgyud): gnas// de sa hUM pheM blo mang na// rdo rje'i rigs su yod mi bshad // gsang pa'i snying po lo na nyid nges pa las phyag sgra 'dam tshig gi le'u ste bdun cu brkyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de zhi gshegs pa nyid lagasang sngags kyi rgyal ba brtan par
248a7(rnying rgyud): pa'adi ched du brjod de// skyes phyogs bcu dug pazhi rang bzhin 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rabo nyid// gzung 'dzidzinas la 'phel ba yi// rnam tog zhags pas so sor zin// rje res byung par degod pa yang // gsang pa'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam// ye shes ngo ma tshe rab 'byam gyis// 'o
248b1(rnying rgyud): dun sa na sa/ spya / na sa sa / sa na sa / na
248b2(rnying rgyud): nges pa'i byed pa las byag/ nings par lusastan te// sras ni thags pas skyes pa yin// shApa na medagan mi she ga zhe'as pas cad byed med du byes 'dug pa'i med pa pa khyis sru nga gdong sngags kyi spyan phrag po bkod pa'i can nga/
248b3(rnying rgyud): bzhugs so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las yongs su gzu ba'i le'u ste bdun tu dgu pa'o// / 'chags pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i stong phrag brgyas las mtshan nyid dang rgyad thams cad kyi lung gi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ba/ sa
248b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i snying po khon nyid nges pa'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par smos te 'khor long skor 'de dag kA~M 'bras bu mtshag/ gsung brjen po 'dri yod par// me ma mung po dong phyogs shing // su mo so ni gtams las mang // 'jogs nas bu dgra 'gro bar byos// khong naganas pa'i yang khong du/
248b5(rnying rgyud): gas kyi rlom tha ba grum// 'ams ca la par yong / gra gsu sa mang ngo // shes 'ig // byes// 'a ba ni ni dang tu byed ga byu ba ga'i snang bso'i// dge / pa/ pa la ba
248b6(rnying rgyud): pa than ma cag gi spyad sa te/ can po dam yon// mying zhi'i ban/ de 'i kyis dus na myeng ge/ tun rgyu rje byu tshig sa ba / rje kyi kyi nga rkyen la/ khyos kyi byung po cing ba lding/ sa nga
248b7(rnying rgyud): brdul tsam med// de bzhin chos kyi mtshan nyid kyang // mtshan ma sna tshogs cer snang yang // nyid las gyur pa rdul tsam med// gseng ba'i snying po de kho na nyi da nges pa lamachos nyid kur du'i 'gyur bar bzhan pa'i le ru ge brgyad dru pa rdzogs so//
249a1(rnying rgyud): sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po zhes zla ba/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thabs chen thig le bde ba'i don// rdzu 'phrul drab ma ngan rdzogs pa'i// ma lus 'dus pa'i
249a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo'i tshogs// lha mos bzhad dang rol pa yis// gnyis med bde bas tshim pa yi// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo rags pa// ma lus bde chen rang bzhin du// snang zhes thig le'i ngo bor ldog/ thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// brtags par
249a3(rnying rgyud): rang gi rtog tsam nyid// thabs chen gsang ba'i ye shes gsal// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis// gsang ba'i 'khor la dbang bskur bas// nam mkha' gang ba'i skye bo rnams// ma lus thig le ra gsal 'gyur zhing // rol pa'i gsang ba'i nyams ldan
249a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i// thabs dang bcas pa'i bdag nyid kyis// thabs dang mdzad pa'i dgongs pa dag/ dus bzhir mnyam pa'i tshul du bzhugs// de nas gsang bdag skul pa'i skus// 'dod lnga chags dang thabs sbyor bas// thabs kyis gsang ba'i don ston pa// ma lus
249a5(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa'i don thob pas// thog mtha' med pa'i thabs la gnas// 'khor las thabs kyis pha rol phyin// 'khor ba thabs kyis bder son pa// thal bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten du// 'dod pa lnga la ma chags par// gdul dka' ma lus kun 'dul
249a6(rnying rgyud): te// gsang ba'i don la smin mdzad pa// de ni thal ba'i dbyangs zhes bya// dus mthar snyigs ma'i 'gro ba rnams// gang dang bral bas ma smin pa// gang dag de dang ldan bzhin du// 'gro 'ong med pa'i thabs chen pos// 'khor ba gnyis med don
249a7(rnying rgyud): sbyar ba// 'di ni thabs chen rol pa'i rgyud// lus dang de la dgongs pa'i phyir// 'di ni gsang chen thang ba'i byud// de tshogasang bdag mnyam 'dras pas// 'khor gyi rig sngags rgyal po yis// 'khor lo'i bdag po gca bo la// 'dod dang mnyes dang tshogs
249b1(rnying rgyud): mchog/ dathos pargya pa la pas parjo// gas bya'i gzigs pab 'a byas// ra gan yang skyobs bya s+ho// ma tag sa nan mdzad/ 'ad sa // na ga du nga// nadang
249b2(rnying rgyud): byagasang chen gsang ba'i mchog/ 'dus pa'i gakhong lo spyod mdzan pa// maTa' dbras la phyogs dus med pas// rtsig rgyas pa'i bod gnas// thabs chen rgyu thul dra ba'i // rjen thong zan mong pa yid pa'i// glang gzhi bachog ting ltar lags/
249b3(rnying rgyud): ral pa'i gsang ba las byung ba'i// sems kyi khyad par staT// gas ba'i thabs ba cig las byung gA'o// yad rtogs pa'i khyad / b+hU t+pal dra ba'i sang drugs// rang shAgan nanas yas dang snang ba'o// dkyil 'khor ma rgya gzhing
249b4(rnying rgyud): lags// phyi 'a gzugs brta byang chub sems// rig pa'i thig le mngon snang ba// khyad par rim pa 'i ltar lags// gsang bgasang chen mthar thag pa'i// dam pa gang lags khyed kyis gsungs// 'dul ba'i rgya ba snod ldan la// gsang ba
249b5(rnying rgyud): dmachog de skyer skye/ thabs ci ral pa'i dbang mchog gang // rig pa mtsho ga la gnas sbyor ba'i// rig pa'i brgyal zhugs ni ltar lags// 'jug pa 'i khyad par ji sar ba // thabs bral log pa'i gang nag rnams// nges pa'i thabs kyis 8
249b6(rnying rgyud): dkrol// thag sa dang spring po ga ze// 'dod pa can la ro la srung bas// 'gro chags can ji lta'i dpol// zhe sdang can gyi gang byug la// rig pa'i bag cags ji ltar badz+ra// las kyi khyangad par di ltar lags// rdu dz+wal tham nyam sbyo bas/
249b7(rnying rgyud): tshad dang dgrol ba'i tshad dgang // babs dang brel ba'i rnal 'byor ngas// gsang bsru bas sar 'gyur// 'bas mkhas rim pa rnal 'gyur ba// spyang pas spyan gyi yang gar grug/ 'das dang sa 'angs rnal 'gyur ba// med kyis bstan
250a1(rnying rgyud): // gang la sbyar// thabs lan theg pa'i che bgang // 'dul ba'i gang nag rgyal sras la// thabs kyi theg pa ji ltar ston// 'di dag thabs chenagasang ba'i don// ma lus bsdus par zhus pa ni// dus gsum sdoms
250a2(rnying rgyud): bste/ chud kyi phyi mo zab mo mchog/ 'dod chags brtul zhugs mchog chen po// 'dus pa kun gyi rjes su gsungs// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang // lha mo'i tshogs dang gnyis med cing / rol pa'i gar dgu rtse dang bcas// ma lus bde bas tshim
250a3(rnying rgyud): mdzad nas/ 'khor lo rol pa'i tshogs dang bcas// thabs kyis rol pa'i bde chen gyis// lus kyi dkyil 'khor dbab mdzad cing // bzhin 'gyur dag chad de do gus med// rnal 'byor pha ma rdul snyed bcas// rje gcig bde ba 'bar bar byed// bde
250a4(rnying rgyud): chen thig le'i tshul nyid kyis/ rdo rje'i chog tu 'di gsungs pa// 'di zhes nye bar mtshon pa ni// e sogs rnam bzhi'i dbyibs can gnas// skad ces gsal byed las ming can// baM dbyibs theg ler bcas ston pa'o// mad ma nus sdom byed
250a5(rnying rgyud): yid/ las can rnam shes de dag la// thabs chen tshig bral nyams ldan pas/ gsal bar go bas bshad par 'dod pa sgra don dam nges pa'i rgyud// yAn theg chen 'di yin no// dus ni bsam gyis mi khyab dus// nA ma de ming zhes bya'o// /
250a6(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang khyad par bshad byab// thabs dang shes rab mnyam pa yi// sna tshogs bde ba'i thig le yis// de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa yang // sna tshogs zhen las grol bar bshad// bye brag brgyad cu bcu gsum pa// ma lus bde
250a7(rnying rgyud): chen ngo bo yi// brdud 'dus thig le chen po nyid// snang dang stong pa la sogs pa// brjod byam lus rdzogs par sdang // rtog tshogs sangs rgyas bzhi bcu lnga// snang bas phyi phyir gnyis su med// shes rab blag gsang ba'i gnas// de dkyil
250b1(rnying rgyud): pad+ma'i rim gsum po// gnyis gsum brgyad kyi khyad par can// mtha' ma gnas dang yon tan gyis// mngon par mtho bas 'og min te// las dang bcud kyis mtha' bral ba// ye shes bzhi la dpag mi rigs// dgos pa 'byung ldan rin po che// ye shes lnga yi
250b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo bskor// sangs rgyas ngo bo snong brdud kye// spyi bor shin tu 'khyil par gnas/ nyung dkar sor gyis spags pa ni// sa ya bcu gsum bde bas brgyan// sna tshogs ro dang ldan pa yi// 'dod yon byed par can gyis mdzes// bde ba chen pos kun khyab pa'i
250b3(rnying rgyud): gang yang bde byed phyi nang bral// 'bras bu'i chos rnams rdzogs par ldan// byang chub mchog tu nyi zla 'bar// de nyid bzhugs gnas yin par bshad// bcud lnga ye shes kho na'i phyir// drangs sdigs med par kun tu gsal// sgra dbyangs gsung gi gnas bzhi
250b4(rnying rgyud): yi// dbyibs gsum gsumangos gnyis dang // bzhi bcu gnyis su gyur pa yin// sa ya ba tu gsum las rdzogs par// skye 'gag med pa'i ngo bos yang // rten can ji bzhin rten de bzhin// nyi zla zabs dang shes rab kyi// ro gnyis mnyam pa dus gsum
250b5(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// dngas ma'i thig le chen po yi// bde ba'i dngos por ye shes snang // thabs dang shes rab mi phyed pa'i// zhig le gsang ba'i ro ldan pa'i// mtshan nyid kun bcom pade chen po// rang gi ngo bo ma grub pas// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir// bcom
250b6(rnying rgyud): ldan de bzhin gshegs shes bya// gzugs phyogs lhag pa'i thig le ni// las dang yon tan sngon ldan phyir// rig pa'i rgyal po nyid du brjod// bcung lnga 'dus pa'i thig le ni// rgyu dang gnas kyi kha dog ldan// ro dang las kyang de bzhin te// rang gi mtshan
250b7(rnying rgyud): nyid kun du snang // gang phyir 'byung sogs rang bzhin nyid// chen po'i bdag nyid ltar snang ba// mkha' gyogs snying la gang gnas pa// nyams dang sbyor pa'i khyad par gyis// zab mo dag gi stobs las snang // khyad par rim bzhin shes par bya// mkha' sog
251a1(rnying rgyud): 'a 'byung la dang / ba shos 'byung sgralas dgags// bskyed sti dbyengs su bad / bdun ma 'a ngas pa nga da/ 'tha pa spyor pa'i 'bras pa sangs/ thog 'do ga nad pa byas// stsal sang da/
251a2(rnying rgyud): gdab// dkyil 'khor tshogs chen brjod pa lang // gang gyur thig les byin brlabs pa'i/ rig pa'i tshul bzhi bsam mi khyab// rig pa'i rnam shes pade chen nyid// rang gi nyams kyis gnas pa'o// gsang ba'i thabs ldan yul bzhi dag/ gang sbyor bde
251a3(rnying rgyud): skyed btsun mos// bde ba chen por rgyas btab pas// lha mo nyid du bstan pa yin// dmigs sogs rang gi thig le ni// thabs chen thig ler mnyam thong bas// las dang ngo bo 'bras bu'i phyir// sems dpa' chen po nyid du brjod// nyes zad byed phyir
251a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje b+he// ma lus mi phyed pa de chen las// rang gi gnas kyis phye ba'o// gzugs sogs na dbyer rab spangs te// rang gi rtsa brdud bcas pa ltar// zag med thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis// bde ba bskyed phyir ba tsun mang // dus ni drang gig phye// byam
251a5(rnying rgyud): pa la sogs ye shes pa'i// de bde rim pas skye ba yang // ting 'dzin dbang du nges par gsungs// thabs dang shes rab mi phyed pa// gsang bar mnyam spong thabs kyi phyir// gsang yul dbang po'i rnam shes reg/ lus kyi chos bzhi 'das spyad pas/
251a6(rnying rgyud): ma lus 'joms phyir khro ba ste// mtshan nyid las kyis phye ba yin// gsang gsum thabs kyi spyod pa nyid// rtag sogs mtshan ma las bskyed phyir// badz+nyAn mo zhes su bstan pa ste// las kyi skabs kyis mi gnas pa'o// gsang chen 'apas phyi rol pa'i
251a7(rnying rgyud): zla// ma sus thig lang rang 'a ga// skal ldan thams cad slong phral te// rigs cad dngan pa'i yul ma yin// skya 'phrul ba la ba'i byud byen pa 'ang/ gsang pa'i gling gzhi bshad pa'i 'a ga / de ngas ga'
251b1(rnying rgyud): bshad byug// thabs dang shes rab rol pa ya// sems kwa'i khyad par snang ba 'o// thal ba'i rgyang 'dir bshad par \u0f7f// zhabs kyi rol par gang bskal bas// shes rab rtags par sla rang nyid// de bzhin zhus rab thabs brgal bus// ma ba/
251b2(rnying rgyud): bde bas zhen pa sel// gnyis med rol pa'i sems lnga yis// rdo rje 'chang ba nyid du 'gyur/ gzhan yod byas par bshad par bya// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'o// thig le mi byed rang bzhin ce// rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni// rdzogs pa
251b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas wa dragasal// lce mched khams sogs ngo bo nyid// sems dpa' sems ma'i rang bzhin no// swarba spyan dang mA ma s+t+rai// mu drung gos dkar grol maH// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyugs// gsang yul dbang po rnam shes rag/
251b4(rnying rgyud): lus 'joms pas khro ba ste// rtag sogs mtshan nyid las skyes la// yum ste las kyi mi gnas bshad// yid chos bzang po bzang mo mkha'// chags sogs yang dag nyon mongs drug/ 'dul gyir sprul pa zhes gsungs so// thabs chan
251b5(rnying rgyud): snang ba rab bsgral bas// shes rab thabs la gang bskul ba// phyogs bcu dus bzhim lus pa'o// sda grag gnas pa'i ltos rnams kun// dra ba zhasar ba zab mo'i dbyings// gang la gang gis mi mkhyen zhing // mi shes byis pa'i yul las
251b6(rnying rgyud): 'das// thabs la mi gnas de bzhin nyid// khyad par thabs chen sku 'phrul 'das// skal med ma sbyangs lci bo dang // byis pa'i lo gzhan dag sbrang dang // mthun ma'i rnal 'byor yul ma yin// thabs dang shes rab rol pa ni// dga' dang bgad dang
251b7(rnying rgyud): chags pa dang / blta dang 'khyud dang 'dzin dang mnye// 'bud dang steng dang zhal sbyor dang // brtse dang gzhi ba dang myang dang 'cha'// chags pa'i gar thabs sna tshogs kyis// tha mal snang ba bde bar thim// dzaHbe hUM hoH'i phyag rgya yis// bzung
252a1(rnying rgyud): dang 'khyud dang bsdams bskyod pas// gsang ba'i 'byung lnga la brten pas// rim pa lnga ldan sems kyiro// rim par 'byung ste gzhan du min// bde ba'i thig le las byung ba'i// skad cig zhen pa las 'das pa// brda/
252a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i ro ni gang skye zhing // rtsa dang thig ler bcas pa dang // thig le'i bde ba nyams su 'char// gang tshe zhe bral bdes gang bas// yul sems bde ba 'gags pa yis// lhan cig skyes pa kun ldang ba// 'gags shing ldang bar bshad pa yin//
252a3(rnying rgyud): rten las 'byung la ma brten pa// bde dang mi rtog gnyis med pa// gang dang gang du rtag gnas pa// gnas pas de ni gnas pa ste// dus yun tshad las ma nges shing // rang gi rlung dang 'tsho ba dang // sbyor ba thabs kyi yan lag gis// rnal 'byor pho mo
252a4(rnying rgyud): rnam par mdzes// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// rig pa'i nyams la dmigs pa ni// gang du zhen pa kun bral ba'i// bde chen rang bzhin bsam mi khyab// 'di ni yul dang dbang po dang // rnam shes dmigs pa'i yul las 'das// thabs dang //
252a5(rnying rgyud): shes rab 'dres pa las// rang rig bde bar rang gsal bas// ma lus thabs chen rgyal po nyid// rlung sems rten gyi thig le la// phyi nang drangs snyigs rgya ba dag/ 'gro 'od med par gsal ba na// re dogs 'gro 'ong las grol ba// mthar
252a6(rnying rgyud): phyin ye shes sems nyid ni// bde chen mi dmigs bsam yul 'das// bde ba'i thig le bcu drug pa// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las// phyi nang yul sems bcas pa dag/ ma skyes mnyam la gnas 'gyur zhing // thig le zung 'jug bde /
252a7(rnying rgyud): ba las// gsang ba'i nyams ni 'byung bar 'gyur// rten 'brel bde ba'i zung 'jug las// mkha' ltar rang byung ye shes skyes// bde chen thig le chu rkyen 'das// rang byung ye shes gnas med las// sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul rang bzhin 'char//
252b1(rnying rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dra ba bde chen po// rang byung dang rig yul las 'das// skye 'gag gnas dmigs las 'das shing // 'gro 'ong bya byed las 'das pas// rang byung ye shes de bzhin nyid// sems kyi mtshan nyid gzhi rtsa 'das// mtshon pa'i yul la
252b2(rnying rgyud): mi gnas pa'o// sgyu 'phrul thal ba 'argyad chen po las/ sems lnga bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya // thabs dang shes rang gnyis med pa// thig le nyi zla 'dres pa las// 'byung ba'i
252b3(rnying rgyud): blta ba bshad par bya/ rdo rje dbang gi stobs ldan zhing // sngar byas thabs kyi bcud ldan pa'i// thabs ldarda rnal 'byor nges pa yis// tsakra bzhi dang ka ba gsum// thabs ldan me rlung sbyor ba ni// man ngag stobs kyis shes par bya// thabs
252b4(rnying rgyud): ldan thig le 'byor pa yis// ye shes nam mkha' lta bur mthong // bskyed pa rlung gi phyag rgya yis// phyi nang drangs snyigs 'dres pa'i rlung // bzung dang mi bzung sbyor ba yis// gsang ba'i thabs kyi rol pa las// ma skyes mnyam pa'i ngo bor
252b5(rnying rgyud): mthong / steng 'og thabs la brten pa yi// zhu bas gnas thim bde ba'i ros// ma lus rgyas btab mnyam sbyor ba// bde chen thig le stobs la gyur// gang de thabs las byung ba ni// nyi zla gnas bcud rang 'bar bas// gnas bcud thig
252b6(rnying rgyud): le mi dmigs pas// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid gsal// gang du thabs chen las byung ba'i// steng 'og rlung gi sbyor ba ni// thabs lam bde ba'i gnyer dag gis// brtags pa rang gis rtog pa bzlog/ dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo la// bzlog
252b7(rnying rgyud): bya nges kyang mi dmigs so// phung sogs rtog pa'i 'jig rten kun// log rtog sgra ma snang tsam las// nyi zla bden gnyis la nyid kyis// ma skyes mnyam la gnas 'gyur zhing // phung sogs lha yi dkyil 'khor du// rang snang rang gi mngon
253a1(rnying rgyud): sum gsal// phyin ngapa nyams la brten pa yi// kun rdzob thabs la mnyam sbyor bas// rang byung thig le rtog byed cing // skye med bde chen krung du 'jug/ ma skyes bde ba'i thig le nyid// ma skyes pa dang bde chen dang //
253a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis med 'dres pa'i thig le nyid// yi ge gsum gyi brdas mtshon nas// byin rlabs thabs kyi sbyor ba yang // bde chen rang rig mngon sum gsal// thabs dang shes rab thig le ni// ma 'dres gcig dang du ma bral// thabs kyi bde chen gsal gyur cing // bde//
253a3(rnying rgyud): chen gsal zhing mi rtog pas// seng 'i khrig byin rlabs mi g.yo bas// ma lus dam pas byin rlobs mthong // thabs la goms pa'i man ngag gis// dngos po bde bar nyams myong bas// rang rig phyi dang nang med nang // mi dmigs brjod med gang bsgom pa//
253a4(rnying rgyud): 'du shes kyang du zhugs gyur na// brjod pa med pa de nyid mthong // nyi ma zla ba rkyen phrad las// drod dang rlan la thogs med cing // rnal 'byor thabs kyi rim pa stsal na// bde chen ye shes thogs pa med// gnas bzhi bcud ldan rang bzhin la// rkyen dang dmigs//
253a5(rnying rgyud): pa la brten pas// sems lngas thig le sngon sbyangs te// ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs su skye// rtsa dang rnam shes rku ba las// thabs kyi gsal byed de goms nas// 'byung lnga bcud lnga phung por bcas// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor mthong // tsit+ta snying
253a6(rnying rgyud): po kha sbyor dbus// chos nyid ye shes g.yas g.yon la// dbu ma dbyer med thabs bzung bas// sems lngas thig le mngon sbyangs te// phung po 'byung ba rnam shes bcud// grangs las 'das pa'i ye shes kyang // mnyam pa lnga ru gsal bar mthong //
253a7(rnying rgyud): rang byung mi shigs thig le ni// dngas ma ye shes lnga ldan la// sgron ma'i thabs kyis gang bskul ba// dngas ma bde ba'i rtags 'byung zhing // ma bslad ye shes 'char bar 'gyur// phyi rol chu bzung bcad cing // dngas ma rim par zhugs pa na//
253b1(rnying rgyud): bzhir snying po thim pa las// dngos po bya nang yul 'gags pas// bde can snu ma las byung zhir // ma skyes ye shes gsal bar mthong // dngas ma'i nyams kyi rtags 'byung ba// 'dzag dang 'dar dang 'phar ba dang // rgyag dang grwa dang swa slo klu dang // 'bar/
253b2(rnying rgyud): dang bde ba 'byung ba dang // thar dang 'chang med mngon shes dang // skye mched nam mkha'i rang bzhin gsal// thabs dang shes rab mngon sbyar ba'i// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis// thig le 'khor lo bskur ba'i tshe// thabs ldan gnyis med gsapa
253b3(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// thabs chen thabs la gnas pa yis// pad+ma rdo rje sbyor ba yi// gsang ba'i thig le zung 'jug pas// drangs te ma lus gang ba yis// phung po rnam shes lnga chags la// thig le thabs kyis zin pa la// lhan cig skyes par rang sdang
253b4(rnying rgyud): bas// rtog pa'i bye brag rang 'gags shing // las dang sgron bral pad+ma can// bde ba'i thig le ma skyes pas// ma rig gnyis 'dzin la sogs pa'i// phyi nang bde ba chen po gsal// bde chen sgyu mar rang snang bas// phyi nang bdag gzhan log pa'i
253b5(rnying rgyud): sems// bde chen rang byung thig ler gnas// rang byung rten gyi thig le la// man ngag thabs kyi bde byas pas// dman pa'i mtshan ma ring spangs nas// rang byung ye shes mngon du gsal// 'di ni 'jigs bral tshad ma ste// ngo bo nyid kyi bden mthong zhing //
253b6(rnying rgyud): rang byung ye shes mngon sum pas// dman pa'i tshad ma rnam par 'jig/ 'khor ba mun pa'i phung po la// thabs chen sdang bas gsal byas nas// rang byung bde bathog mtha' med// dag nyid du gsal bar byed// thig le zung 'jug bde ban// sems
253b7(rnying rgyud): mtha' ldog pas go phye nas// dkyil 'khor drug gi yul rnams su// sprul pa'i thig le rang shar ba'i// sdang ba'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab// chags sogs nyon mongs la rtog ril// gdul phyir sprul pa zhes su bshad// sgra dbyangs gsung
254a1(rnying rgyud): gi bstan pa rnams// nges par grags pa kho na nyid// phung sogs rtog pa'i 'jig rten kun// log tog sgras sbyang tsam las// nyi zla bde na gnyis la nyid kyis// ma skyes mnyam la gnas 'gyur zhing // zang sogs
254a2(rnying rgyud): yi dkyil 'khor du// rang snang rang rig mngon sum gsal// dus gsum du'ang mi 'gyur phyir// theg 'dir thabs dang snying rjer bshad// gang phyir 'jig rten mtha' yas par// mos pa bsam yas phyir gsungs pa// bstan pa mtha' yas bstan pa ni
254a3(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji bzhin no// gang phyir theg chen gsang ba'i don// zhal ba'i chud chen bstan pa 'di// 'gro ba chags chen 'dul ba'i phyir// dug gis dug nud bsal ba ltar// sgyu 'phrul chen po 'di dag yin/ skyes bu thabs kyis bder 'dun
254a4(rnying rgyud): pa// gang gis 'di drag bder sel ba// marmongs thabs la mkhas pa yis// pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin no// sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ zhabs chen lta ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad
254a5(rnying rgyud): bya// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// bde chen su gsung thugs dkyil 'khor// 'di dgra legs pa ba shad par bya// 'gro drug mang cos rang byung ste// lus gnas rtsa dang 'khor lo bcas// ba lus kun la khyab gnas pa// ra
254a6(rnying rgyud): bde ba'i 'khor lo'i sgra// rang byung rtsayi 'khor lon// so so'i yi ge gang gnas pa// gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun dang 'brel// rang byung gsung gi 'khor lor bshad/ gang du brgyad kyi jig le yis// bde ba chen po'i do ldan pas// mchis
254a7(rnying rgyud): spyan grub dang gsal ba// khyab pa grags kyi 'khor long bshad// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi// gsang dbang badrang ldan gyur pa// thabs pa de nyi zlang ngog 'bang bas// sa yang badz+ra gsum ba gang ba// rang ljang sbra 'i dkyil 'khor nyid//
254b1(rnying rgyud): slong bya thabs kyi kyor bra las// sbal pa'i lce k+ko k+ko byem pas// skra dang bcas pa'i bde bar// rang sdang gsung gi dkyil 'khor nyid/ ljang zag dngas sdigs kyi ba las// g.yas g.yon gnyis med gsang ba'i lam// dbug dang bathag pa'i thabs nyid de/
254b2(rnying rgyud): byed pa sdom pa'i thabs kyis mtshon// rang byung ye shes l-I li ro/ khyab pa'i tshul gyis snang bar byed// nyi zla gsang sbyor brig le las// gnas dang bstims nas dbyer med pas// ma lus pa'i chen lhan cig skyes// rang rig ma bcos mngon sum gsal
254b3(rnying rgyud): gnas dang 'byung ba ma lus pa// rang rig ye shes gzugs su skye// de nyid bde ngar rang gsal ba// rang spyang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin// rang byung jig le nyams skyes pa// dang ba dang rten gyi phyag rgya las// bzung ba'i rlung la 'gro 'ong med//
254b4(rnying rgyud): bzlog pa thugs kyi sa bon can/ 'di ni thabs ldan gang zag la// 'khor ba'i bag chags ma lus pa// pad+ma rdo rje'i man ngag gis// nyi 'od mun pa bzhin du sel// bskyod pa thabs bzhis 'od zer gyis/ thig le a la cung zad 'og// rang byung gas
254b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i lam du 'dri la// ha yi pad+mang 'byung ba la// thugs kyi sa bon thabs bcus pas// rang drang 'khor lor thim pa ni// chu la chu ltar gnas par byed// lan rje chu la thim pa ltar// ma lus bde chen snying por thim// ma lus rang rig bde chen te// tha
254b6(rnying rgyud): dung gnyis pa'i thos med de// sems med bde chen snying por gsal// kye med stong pa'i thig ler thim// 'gro ba ma lus thams cad dag/ gnas pa'i stobs ni zad pa na// 'dus pa wa ye rim pa yis// bag chags snying por rang zad nas// 'od gsal
254b7(rnying rgyud): sbyong bar snang bas na// ri dgas med pa nam mkha' bzhin// par mar sgra ma'i lungs tho nas// ma 'ongs longs spyo rdzogs par bzhed/ nye zla 'dres shing zung 'dug pas/ sprul pa gzugs kyi sgrar 'gyur ro// gnas pa thabs kyis gsal byas /
255a1(rnying rgyud): rang byud srug sum ldan gyis grub// gsang sngags rdo rje'i thabs chen gyis// 'khor ba'i rgyu 'bras zag pa rnams// gser 'gyur 'od dang bdud rtsi ltar// bde ba chen por byin gyis brlab// srugasung thugs kyi thig ma
255a2(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab las byung nas// nyi bla yi ge'i stobs dag gis// brjod bral rang gi mtshan nyid mthong // a las byung ba'i gsang thig le// rang snang 'khor lor gnas brgyad pa// chu las byung ba'i thig le ltar// a las byang zhing a la thim// rol
255a3(rnying rgyud): paspu 'phrul dra ba las// ma 'arjod gsung nyid rang snang bas// ma lus brjod bral bde ba'i gsung // sbrul ldan rnams la rang bzhin spang // nam mkha' rin chen phog pa ltar// thig le bde bas rgyas btab nas// phyogs btungs bzhi'i zhu gsung thugs//
255a4(rnying rgyud): bde chen zag med rgyas par 'gyur// rang snang sku yi 'khor lo la// rang bzhin gsung gi dkyil 'khor nyid// g.yas dang g.yon gyis dbye ba yis// sde tshan brgyad dang byed pa dang // khyab 'jug gsum yang de bzhin te// rim par bkod pas rang snang
255a5(rnying rgyud): pas// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// ji snyed bsgyur ba'i las rnams 'byung // rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa lnga yi// ngo bo nyid du nges pas na// khu brtsa yi gzugs dag gis// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lngar// ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'o//
255a6(rnying rgyud): rten gyi dkyil 'khor gang brten pa// sgra dang gsung thugs yon tan ni// rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu dang // lus can khyab pa'i rang bzhin te// chu yi 'khor lo dbyibs kyi tshul// gang la thabs kyi rkyen gyur cing // bde ba bskyod dang smin pa las// dbyibs
255a7(rnying rgyud): dang tshul ni dbang drag yin// gyen du 'dren dang thur du bskul// 'khor lo bzhi la rgyas 'debs yin// gsang ba'i lam nas thabs bsngal ba// bcud pa'i lam ni sku gsung thugs// sum cu rtsa gnyis khyab pa'i rtsa// 'byung ba'i thig le gnas
255b1(rnying rgyud): pad// mags sa mdangs dang ldan// nga'i di rim bcos pa// bzhig tus 'dab ma'i sto ba lnga// chos nyid ye shes yon tan // dang tung bzhil yang lag bcad/ 'a bskyed pa thogs pa pa dngag snying po rang ba ni blags thags
255b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis med 'brel ba'i rang bzhin gnas// brgyad gnyis ldan pa'i ge sar la// AM gnas 'dab ma A li tsan// gsung gi 'khor lo rten dang yul// pad+ma kha phye lta bu la// 'dus pa'i snying po spong ba'i tshul// las can sra rnams gsal bar 'byung/
255b3(rnying rgyud): yul badrug cu bzhi gnas pa// sum hArtsa gnyis rang bzhirje de// thig le 'gro 'du gnas dang ldan// rdo rje'i pad+ma'i rtse dang 'brel// zin dang mazi ma khyad par las// bde ba zag pa yod med 'byung // steng 'og thabs kyi rang bzhin la// 'phel dang
255b4(rnying rgyud): sdung par shes par bya// lus can bran pa po zang ste// thig le 'khyil ba lha nyid do// ro lngas can la rgyas btab pas// su gsung thugs su smin par byed// sgyu 'phrul rol pa thabs kyi rgyud// lhag pa'i thal rlung chen po 'di// dbang dngas
255b5(rnying rgyud): maud skye bo la// 'chad cing ston pa ltung bar 'gyur// yab yum gsang ba'i thig le la// rang byung thabs kyi snying pos btags// de ni kun gyi snying po ste// noms pas thams cad thub par 'gyur// gsang ga thabs chen mngon snang ba// bdag nyid
255b6(rnying rgyud): spobs ldan nas goms pas// rkye rjod yul bcas pa dang // ngadi chen ro ma nyid du cug// rang cung dag pa'i rtse rol// dbang bskur man dag las goms na// longs spyod ldan pa'i tsha 'dims// bde cheran po ldan grang 'gyur// sdig pa'i byang chub
255b7(rnying rgyud): sems ga ma byung ba ga so zhi da // byed rjod rjen pa'i ba gajigs bdag kya na pa 'thug// 'debs pade bag na yun// drin nyi dang 'drabs/ dbaston 'dob phel 'grib dang/
256a1(rnying rgyud): sa da/ pa spyan na na
256a2(rnying rgyud): lam// bde chen po nang pa'o// zlab pa'i tshig sa pa bya/ pa byu bamed pa'o// ba pa'i spos pamed pa byis// sa sa pas// dran po da panapa ga rdzog pa dgu pa'ad/
256a3(rnying rgyud): gas ste// gas pa las rgya byung chung zhi/ chog gsang po zas pa dos/ gsang ba'i gte ma phyin pa// 'pho ba gas pa'i dod // ngag gis ba pa la 'i// ga bang lasan+d+ha // chu
256a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'o// gang du po byad mchog gyur pa// chab gnyis las lnga lda ba// mchog tu gyur bya can 'tha~Md cing / gal nyams 'jig par 'i gyur// ra byung ba ba'i thig san// gsang ba bcud las 'byung ba ste// theg pa med pa'i tshig lel+ya/

256b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i chog tu gsungs// thabs dang zas rab gnyis med pa'o// ral pa sngags te phyag tu 'gar// thabs dang ldan pas btod goms pas// dngos phrab lngar 'dod pa 'byung // thabs dang shas rang byid dbus pas// phyag cha can mang bstan pa pa /
256b2(rnying rgyud): b+ha ga'i rgyan dang rnam mkha'i khams// do na thig le mnyam sbyar byas// gsang ba'i mkha' wa 'byung bar 'gyur// de las ye shes skye bar 'gyur// sra pa dang nigashe ba dang rjo // go 'byed baspyod pa'i rang bzhin la// til ba rtson pa sa
256b3(rnying rgyud): cig skyes pa'i bde ba 'byung // brgyang dang bde la goms 'gyur zhing / gar thabs drung la dbang bskur bas// rdza ba yan lag nad 'che zhing // pade chen bdud rtsis ring du 'tsho/ lus dang rtsa dang sems kyi sdod// gsang ba langs sod lnga pas mas/
256b4(rnying rgyud): sa pa la ni spang ba bzhin// dngom pa ba brgyan por 'gyung// thog ma med par las bsags pas/ ga pa'i bgazugasas pa phyis/ byams cad kyi mjed ng+ge stsa spags pa// klung du 'bras na pas// gzugs
256b5(rnying rgyud): dus/ thabs dang brjod pa da bzhi skyes/ duganas su thug pa dang // dbabang bani du rgya to// dgang dang dag pas pang bya nang // da drug la dag par ba/ thabs kyis leg pa da babya// dus
256b6(rnying rgyud): ga par bcas// mi kyi rmugs gis byastan/ mi la / da pas nan la ba ra/ dngos da pa dbyas/ rgyal po sgyul// dbas kyi dgas gas
256b7(rnying rgyud): gas byang ldan dang grangs la ban/ brgyang rgyab dag nyid rgyas pa'is// gnyis me gas la bar dran pa// brgya yi kyi 'dra bdas/ 'ad dang pa 'byung ba// dpal lu skyob pa'i rgya rgyags// malas thab pa
257a1(rnying rgyud): bya// gangs 'ad da da ga 'ad / dab da ma dag/ thabs pa ladag pa dngas mngogs// bdag ga'an ga nyis/ stsal ba byung // dbus gnan yang bshang byab/ da nga 'tham la bcud dpangs
257a2(rnying rgyud): dngas mthig le wa 'bar ba// sras ni can pa dang gnas // thabs dang bral bas mthong ba zed // dang byung ba dkyil khor drug/ gsang pa'i kyis gnas pa mig/ brgyad 'dra ma thig le me re// bang can can kyi hU~M bta// thabs kyi
257a3(rnying rgyud): sraspangs pa las// 'bras bu yang bzhin na bu bzhin// 'di nyid tu 'phrul drab Te// dkyil 'khor ba tha~M min// gnas pa sgol marlung gis 'arjod// 'ab ba de ste rkyen pas te// chu khams 'khor bar ma thabs// mi thugs pa shes ram ma /

257a5(rnying rgyud): zhugs / 'du sa / 'ag pa sa
257a6(rnying rgyud): ba zad par \u0f7fs+t+waM// 'phong brta d+ha gzhes par gyi// sngags pa drangs ma du ma grags na// dad dang drag zis la gdung ba dang // ba chen te la ba ca byung // tshigs mdangs pa pa' shi// rtags phyogs bzung bar 'gyur/

257b1(rnying rgyud): thams dang bad ga zub// mngon shes lnga sogs 'byung 'gyur zhing // bde ba snyeng byed nam mkha' bzhin// rdzu 'phrul thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis// dra ba ma byas shes rab gsal// dper bang don la snyoms pa yis// ldan thub dkyil 'khor gsal ba
257b2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// pad+ma 'dus pa'i snying po la// rdo rje thig le shor ba med// gsang ba thabs kyi bde gnas la// 'tshe ba'i bag chags nub par 'gyur// thig le 'gro 'ong med pa la// bdebang phel 'grib mi 'byung bas// thams cad bde chen dkyil 'a
257b3(rnying rgyud): mchog/ nam mkha'i mthang bzhin khyab par gsal// gang du 'phel ba gsal byed pa// mthob pa dang rgyan bcas pa// mi 'phel ba dang chags pa dang // la ma 'o gang ni rnam par spangs// gang yang thams cad 'dus pan// rig 'i
257b4(rnying rgyud): bde ba rten// ji ltar lan na chur 'jug ltar// thabs dang man ngag ldan pa yis// dngos po 'de chen snying por thim// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// sdug bsngal ba dang bar chad dag/ sna tshogs mang po gang byung ba// yengs dang dral bas
257b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin no// sgra 'phrul thal pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rang snad la thabs ces sgrub pa bstan pa'i leng stel pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad byapa// rang byung byang chub sems cid ni// rna tshogs gzugs brtan khyad par dag
257b6(rnying rgyud): nas rim par bshad par bya// thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i// rten dang brten pa las byung ba// rang byung byang chub sems nyid ni// thig le bde chen ngo bo nyid// ma lus 'das pa'i rang bzhin no// khams lnga bcu gnyis 'dus pa yi// gsang ba 'dus
257b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin te// lus can kun la rang bzhin gnas// rang bzhin thig le chen po ni// snod bcud bde ba'i mtshan nyid kyis// ma byas bdengs kun khyab pas// gang la gang brten mtshan nyid do// 'byung lnga dngas ma'i brjod las byung // bde chen bsung kyi
258a1(rnying rgyud): dag/ bde chen thig le'i ngo bor gnas// rtogs pas thabs chen pha rol phyin// ma lus phyag rgya chen po'i dbyings// gsang ba'i thig le chen po nyid// rtsa dang thig le'i tshul dag gis// thams cad khyab pa'i tshul gyis gnas//
258a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med pa bde ba'i rgyu// nyi zla khu bar gnas pa yi// sems lnga skyed pa 'brel pa yi// bde ba'i ro dang bcas pa yi// mi shig thig le bde chen po// dngas ma ye shes lnga yi ro// khyab kyang thabs la rag lus pas// rang bzhin mngon sum snang mi nus//
258a3(rnying rgyud): thig le snod bcud rang bzhin ni// thabs kyis khyab dang ma khyab lam// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// dag dang ma dag khyad par snang // 'byung lnga bcudad lnga ye shes lnga// ma lus gnyis med 'dus pa yi// bye brag thabs kyi khyad par las// rten pa'i nyams
258a4(rnying rgyud): ni gsal bar 'byung // gsang pa'i thig le sku mchog des// rgyal ba dus gsum bzhugs pa'i gnas// las dang ngo bo'i tshad med pa'i// gnyis drug brgyad gnyis sor nyung spang // bcu drug bcu gnyis nyi shar gas la// de nyid 'dres shugs ston pa
258a5(rnying rgyud): nyid// nang zhugs las kyis snang bar byed// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// 'khyud pa gang gi phyag rgya las// bde ba'i 'bru tshogs gsal 'byung ba// bskyod pa rlung gi phyag rgya yis// nyi zla'i thabs kyis zin pa las// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye
258a6(rnying rgyud): shes skye// skyes bu'i lus la thabs kyi rtsa// pad+ma 'dus pa'i snying po can// gnyis med thig le btur 'dus pa// ma 'dres 'brel pa'i stobs las byung // brag gdung lta bur gnas pa las// goms pa'i rtog pas ye shes skye// 'byur lus 'di
258a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i bcud gyur cing // bde brlang sel zhig ler thim// ma lus dbyer med mi g.yo ba// rang byung thig le rten dang bral// gsang ba'i thig le 'gro 'ong med// bde chen nam mkha' chu 'bras 'das// gsang ba'i thig le dam nyams na// 'khor
258b1(rnying rgyud): ban+dag cang sdug pasal pas// gsang pa'i lam nyid pa cad gnas// tshig la ma thos slong po 'gyur// gsang ba tshogs pa byung ga// thog yo dab ba dang bzung ba dang // gtag da blangs sags thabs las byung // khams gnos 'das par/
258b2(rnying rgyud): skyobs las skyes// la bag bya thag nas bskal bas// gnas nas sang shing bdag yo ba/ rang la mya tog 'gags dang / ra shi 'thob pa paganas che/ hU~M ba'i 'din par 'don// goms pa'i myu mthas smrar bskyed thams/ ma

259a1(rnying rgyud): na dang// sa dang dang bde ba sa/ ga na/ na // ga la byu // bcwam dang ldan pa

259a6(rnying rgyud): phyed nam mkha' ltar// gzugs can ye shes lnga ru brjod// phyag rgya chen po tshogs pa las// thungs kyi lhan cig skyes pa gsal// rtag tu gsal bgoms pa pani// thams cad 'da' chen po ste// zabs dang nying 'dzin yo byad kyis// ba
259a7(rnying rgyud): chen med par goms pa yis// 'bras bu nyi ma'i steng ngo bzhin// smanas 'bras bu mthar phyin thun mong las// thabs dang shes rab mnya mdzo ba nas// rtse nas thig lor ma bzlog pa'o// phri nang zhen pa chu 'bras chos// bcu drug maH
259b1(rnying rgyud): phyim bye ba med// gang gis bskal pa grangs med par// dka' thub sdug bsngal spyang pa yis// 'bras bu gnyis med mi thob pa// dga' ba des tshe 'dir 'grub par 'gyur// skal ldan dbang phyug rgyal po yis// gsang ba'i rgyu 'bras rim bzlog pas/
259b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba pad+ma'i 'dam bzhin du// sdug bsngal med par pha rol phyin// gsang chen mi ldog rigs su nges// byang chub sems la rab sbyor bas// 'di chen thig le mi g.yo ba// gsang chen 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i sa// mthar phyin yon tan ldan rdzogs pa'o//
259b3(rnying rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po thal rgyud chen po las/ byang chub sems kyi gzugs can snang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rdo rje mi phyed skyes pa'i don// de ni bde chen yod min te// gsang ba'i don ni bshad par bya//
259b4(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i byin rlabs mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen las// thabs kyis chags pa gdul bya'i phyir// gsang sngags yid bzhin nor bu bshad// gsang sngags thig le'i bde ba ni// yab yum gnyis med rol pa ni// thams
259b5(rnying rgyud): cad thabs la bcu drug brgya// bsra banyis bzhi bzhir rol pa'i chos// rag byang chub dus gcig 'bar// lhun grub dkyil 'khor rang las 'char// rgyal ba'i sems dpa' mi rtog ste// thabs chen thun mong ma yin pas// dman pas rnyed par
259b6(rnying rgyud): ga la 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po nam mkha'i dbyings// de ni rnamathar rang bzhin to// thams cad 'byung ba'i rang bzhin pas// zab mo shes rab pha rol phyin// b+h+rUM yi ga b+ha gar sna tshogs 'dus// las dang ngo bor dag pa nyid// byin rlabs skyob phyir yum
259b7(rnying rgyud): du brjod// tsat+ta'i khams lnga'i gshir la// rdo rje rgyal ba rin chen chos// shes rab rigs ldan bcud kyi gzugs// nges pa 'dzin pa gsang ba'i sngags// de nyid dngos ma ye shes lnga// ma rig gnyis sogs bzhi po dang // mi phyed
260a1(rnying rgyud): na sa s+ho// nga// na dam ma / gsus gas pa sa ma 'dapa
260a2(rnying rgyud): dang gas dpal brten pa'o// zlas byaza bas kyis pa bslo pa/ chags pa'i ba byas ga / rnags pa'i da cogangs y-i // srad yang la gyis kyil pa'o// gnas dmas pa'i mchog tu bshang // gang ma
260a3(rnying rgyud): bdag gis zag pa pathob pa'o// gan pastod pa'i bdes nyid/ sa spyong brjo ni / nang du yum med 'a byud me// bdab bskyed pa ma pa na// byams sogs cad meng rang ba'adzin// nges par thob pag
260a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i grags// gnyis 'dren 'don pa nas byaste// de 'ad kyi ba lam byung nal/ ma ni 'i rlos ze dzin nyid// 'drig bong ga la rnam par bshad// shin rnam pa'i rigs las byung // gsal ba'i ya sa 'ad rgya/ kun gas pa
260a5(rnying rgyud): dang 'du ba'i// gnyis par thugs spyan ga/ da / mas ni 'jigs pa dz+ra // dang nga las kyi ba yis// dag pa na la nga du 'dzid// dgrag pa sems la@
260a6(rnying rgyud): dang gnas pa rnyed 'a/ brnams shing mi mthong ba yin// brjod dang bas ya / rnam zhes gas pa'i das rjin// ye shes rdzogs thags nyidang // dbyeng migs sa na ma dga'asu mams/ ba dung bzhin gas kyi
260a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i// rang nyid 'khor lo'i rtsa 'dod dang // sa bo zung gsum de bde ba'i// ngas skyes rang rig byar ba yis// gnyis 'byung rang rig thub par gsungs// dngas ma lnga dang nyi rna la// ye shes lnga lo gnas pa// gsang ba'i thabs kyi pa nyams myong ba//
260b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med par zhugs pa yin// ye shes nam mkha'i 'khor lo de// gsang ba'i thabs kyis 'gugs pa yin// gsang ba'i ye shes bskyod pa'i phyir// ris nas rim par thim par bya// thabs kyis rang byung ba de skyes pa// ma skyes rang byung brjod du med/
260b2(rnying rgyud): bde chen rang rig mi rtog pa// nges skyes phyir mi ldog par bstan// 'khor lo gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang // rta nyid thig le chen po ste// su gsung thugs ni bde ba'i mchog/ thams cad zab mo'i rang bzhin no// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa/
260b3(rnying rgyud): sdod bcud rang bzhin sku gsung thugs// gsal ning thim par gang mthong ba// dbyer med su gsung thugs thob pa'o// theg chen gsang sngags rang bzhin no// thams cad bde chen thig le'i mchog/ slang grub med pa'i rang bzhin nyid// shes phyir skyob pas
260b4(rnying rgyud): sngags zhes bya// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kye// ye shes thig le mngon phyung ba// 'khor lo la ni thim mdzad nas// ye shes lnga yi rgyas btab po// me bskyod byed po yum dang bcas// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ldan// byams pas snying de bzhin
260b5(rnying rgyud): no// gzhan dag rang gi phyag rgya ste// gshin rje gshed la rtag par bshad// thub chen rdo rje 'dzin 'chang ba// zla dang bral ba dpa' bo che// rang rang rigs kyi cho ga dang // rig pa ji bzhin mkhas pas brtags// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa// skye zhing
260b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur bas rtsa ba ste// gang skye'i rkyen te de yi sngags// 'jig rten 'das te 'jig rten pa'i// rang rang mthu can byin brlabs pa// brjod dang 'das pa don byed pa/ 'di ni 'das pa don gyi sngags// dang sngags gsang ba shasang chen 'di// kun gyi spyod yul
260b7(rnying rgyud): ma yin te// dbang dang yan ngag ldan pa yis// yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'grub// gnas gsum khra' 'jug ye ge las// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// khams gsum byid rlabs ga byin bgrus// rang bzhid rdo rje gsum gnas pa// rA
261a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis tshul gyis rang bzhin gnas pa'o// rang bzhin thabs kyis byin rlabs pa// gnas gsum gsang ba'i 'phro 'du yis// ma lus khyab pa byin rlabs pa// rdo rje gsum du byin gyis brlabs// lte ba rnam gnyis zla ba la
261a2(rnying rgyud): ldang mags nyid// rjes macan lan tan las// yan la gajigs pa'i bas // rang bams rgyas pa cig da// rnalas 'apa 'du ba// dpal ba ma pa kyi// yinas thong pa'i nga
261a3(rnying rgyud): thabs chen kun 'dus pas// rnal 'byor gang yang rung ba yis// bla ma slob dpon mnyes byas shing // dam tshig cho ga ldan pa yis// ji ltar bsgrub kyang 'grub par 'gyur// dus gsum rgyal bas byin rlabs pa// thams cad bde chen 'khor lo mcho
261a4(rnying rgyud): gsang chen thugs kyi snying po ste// sgyu 'phrul rol pa thal ba'i rgyud// gsang ba'i dam tshig la zhugs shing // slob dpon bsten cing dbang thob pa// chags pa can gyi gang zag la// rgyud chen 'di dag bstan par bya// gsang ba thabs kyi me long ste
261a5(rnying rgyud): zab mo mngon phyung bshad du gsol// thabs dang shes rab rnal 'byor pa'i// bde ba mchog la gnas 'dod pas// de yi spyod yul bstan pa yin// sku 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gsang ba sngags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// /
261a6(rnying rgyud): nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba gsang chen mthar zug pa// de dag khyad par gang yin pa// bdag nyid chen pos bshad par bya// sangs rgyas sku dang gsung dang thugs// gsang ba gsum du bstan pa ste// nya ni thos la sogs ska la dman
261a7(rnying rgyud): pas// yul min ma rtogs don phyir ro// thams cad rang bzhin gang yin pa// bde chen thig le'i ngo bo ste// thog ma tha mar dri med pa// rang byung gsang ba nyid du bshad// gang phyir dman la sbas pa yi// zabs chen gsang ba zab mo yis//
261b1(rnying rgyud): thabs chen dngos nyid gsal 'gyur ba// gsang chen thugs kyi rgyas btab pa'o// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa la// dbyer med bde ba chen po ni// gang gis gang la rgyas btab pa// de dang do yang bar 'gyur// mtha' dang 'bras thal rang rig nyid//
261b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin bde ba chen po nyid// gnyis med zung du 'jug pa ni// mthar thug ye shes nyid du bshad// rang gnas thabs kyis goms pa las// dgyes pa chen po'i ngo bo ni// gsang ba yum gyi bdag nyid de// dman pa rnams kyi spyod yul yin// rang bzhin
261b3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya chen po ni// bye brag du ma gnyis gnas pa// rang byung rten gyi thig le nyid// lus can kun la rab gnas pa// bde ba chen po'i rgyas btang ba'o// thabs chen spyi yi mtshan nyid ni// steng 'og thabs las 'byung ba yi// rlung dang thig le goms pa yis//
261b4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor rnams la rgyas btab pa'o// rang byung bde chen dam tshig ni// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi// thugs kyi ngo bo mi g.yo ba// phyag rgya chen por yang dag bshad// gsung mchog chos kyi phyag rgya ni// gnyis med bcud las thig le'i rgyun//
261b5(rnying rgyud): phyed 'byung brtan pa rang gsal ba// ma skyes don gyi gsung sgrogs pa'o// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rkyen dang thabs kyi phyag rgya yis// ye shes skyes pa'i lam yin te// bskyod cing rgyas 'debs don du 'dod// thabs kyi phyag rgya chen po ni//
261b6(rnying rgyud): ma lus lha yi rang bzhin la// thabs kyi bde chen rgyas btab pas// mtha' dbus med par gsal ba las// rang byung thabs dang bcas pa yi// rang rig bde chen 'bar ba yis// thams cad ma lus khyab pa yi// rang rig bde chen phyag rgyar gsal//
261b7(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i bya bo dpag med la// thabs mchog mas dang 'tshams pa bzhin// bu byed med par rang spang ba// bde bachen po'i mdzad pa yin// bskul ba'i tshul gyis lan than pa// 'dus pas spar bas nyams skyes pa// thun par ma yin pang 'og
262a1(rnying rgyud): thabs// bskal ba'i rang bzhin bstan pa yin// 'gro chags can gang dag la// zhabs rten gsang ba' bstan par// me tog sa ni chu bzhin du// bde chen 'bras tham ma ma meng// rang bzhin dman dang theg par mus
262a2(rnying rgyud): dbang dang man ngag med pa la// bskal pa bye bar ci bstan kyang // don med ngan 'gror ltung bar 'gyur// gsang yu mthabs kyi 'aspyod pa yis// shes rab gsum la nyams kyang na// skal ldan rnal 'byor ngo mo rnams// chos 'dis grol bar
262a3(rnying rgyud): so/ ma na sa sapad gyur/
262a4(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu mngon tho lam// badz+ra drug ma la rang gnas pa'o// nyizla 'bar ba 'dzod gshor las// lus sems shings sa pan las// dngos grub lo thog phun sa ma tshogs// ma sras kun ci gzhing 'gyur ba// dzig les phyogs cha rbA /
262a5(rnying rgyud): lus can rtsa la chub nyid// thabs chen ldan pas mngon sum te// thabs bral lam chas btab pa yin// steng 'ag lam la goms byas shing // me chung sems lags la brtan pa// rnam smin snyigs mar bcas pa 'di// rdo rje'i rdzas
262a6(rnying rgyud): 'grar ba mas da// 'byed dang spad dang ge ba dang bstod// 'bebs dang brkye dang grub pa dang // gan dang 'byung sogs las rnye pa// bsngod brlung na kya' // 'bar dang rjen dang ba l+r-i dang // gsang dang ba
262a7(rnying rgyud): lus gnas la sags pas byed // sbyar ba po yi phyag rgya bshad// bram la ma goms pa las/ 'khor lo 'thung ba'i rgya 'a shi nga'is la dang byung // gang da byu nga 'grags la sags/ @
262b1(rnying rgyud): thig le'i chu// ma lus bad bcan pa ste// khyab pa rang rig mi rtog pa// rang byung ma shes sgra 'bras 'das// bded chen po nam mkha'i khams// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le ni// dngas ma'i snying po bde chen po// gsang ba'i thabs la brten pa
262b2(rnying rgyud): yin// ma lus bde ba chen por 'gyur// dngos snyigs bye ba'i thig le yi swA// khub rtsi yi tshul dag gis// khyab pas bde chen dngos med par// rang byung nam mkha' lta bur bshad// gAsang yum snying po 'dus ma byas// bde ba dang rig dngos
262b3(rnying rgyud): med dgus la// gnyis med thig le 'gro 'du med// mnyam pa chen po chos kyi dbyings// thabs dang shes rab ga nyis skyed pa'i// 'byung ba gsang pa'i rig min// me bskyod do rje lngangapa// hU~M mthig le yi ge dngos// rin chen par b+han+tit+ti mA la/
