262b5(rnying rgyud): rang gi gnas kyis bsnol mar 'gyur// rab tu 'dres par 'gyur ba las// rgyal ba'i ye shes pade chen po// myang phyir thob pa zhes su gsungs// gang du thabs chen las byung ba'i// 'brel ba'i thabs chen mngon byung ba// thig le bzhin
262b6(rnying rgyud): bskus gcig tu 'gyur// rlung gis bsdus par bkan par brjod// zhal gyi lam dag rgyas pa ni// phyag rgya 'bar ba ces bya'i sgra// zla ba nyi ma bsgribs pa yis// chu skyes rab tu rgyas pa yi// dril bu skra dang ldan pa'o// phyed phyung tshul
262b7(rnying rgyud): gyis gang bskyed pa// sbyang bamau phying bdun par bskrad// zla bathig la rjes mthun par// rdul bu byed kyis 'byor dgyes pa// mtha' gnyis thal ba'i byang chub sems/ phyag tu chen par 'di brjodade// mal bgyis btsun pa'o// grangs
263a1(rnying rgyud): chen phyag d+ha bsam mi khyab// bcu drug bde rten 'gro 'od med// thig le bde bas rgyas btab pa'o// gsang ba'i thig ma che zo ni// yon tan rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid de// ma lus bde bar rgyas thebs pas// thams ca
263a2(rnying rgyud): gcig pa'i phyag rgyar gsal// bde chen thig le'i phyag rgya 'dis// ji snyer gyi nang dngos po drug/ namA mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa dang // mthebs pa ni yod ma yin// skye 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gsang ba bsum bkod cing byas @
263a3(rnying rgyud): sa brgyad pa'o// de su gzhan yang bshad byung// rjer mor thun mong ma yin pa'i// gsang ba'i dmachog khyad par dag/ de nas rim par bshad pa gyi// gang zhig gang gis gang thong ba// lus dang rig sems ci 'tsham
263a4(rnying rgyud): bsrung byam lus 'dir 'dus pa// de dag mchog mdor bshad pa'o// 'khor ba 'bas kyis gnyer po sel// sangs rgyas 'khor lo bskyod byed ci // dbang bskur thabs kyis thob pa dang // bdud ni snying la 'jog pa dang // dam pags
263a5(rnying rgyud): padang // slob dpon sangs rgyas mnyam par bshad// mi 'bral srog gis bsdus pa yi// dang po nas gsung mthar thug par// me dang 'od dag gcig pa ltar// rig par sgrogasum bzur bar bya// bla na med pa byang chub sems// ris pa bzhin
263a6(rnying rgyud): bskyed par bya// blangs bstan mthar rdzogs skying po'i bar// brtan zhing nges par gzung bar bya// gsang ba thabs kyi rgyas btab nas// ma lus phyag rgya rang gi lha// sgo gsum par zad med pa ni// gsung gi dmachog gsang ba'o//
263a7(rnying rgyud): 'a na/ du la rus zhing mamyong 'i/ khri'in tshig mas pa gyu/ ma nga/ babyed pa 'am/
263b1(rnying rgyud): la sbyar ba dang // blang ba'i dmachog spyad pa ni// rnal 'byor skyes bur shes par bya// nyon mongs lnga dang 'dzan yan la// rten dang shes pa la sogs pa// rnal 'byor gyis bus nyams su blangs// 'di'i thun mong da mchog ste// rnal 'byor ba pas dadung
263b2(rnying rgyud): bar bya// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang // 'byung lnga lus kyi bdud rtsi dag/ 'khar lo thabs kyi khyad par dag/ bcud ni gsang bar brten par bya// dka' thub can dang ba mal dang // 'jig rten grags pas spangs pa yi// spyad pa dang ni rten pa dang // rang
263b3(rnying rgyud): nyams thabus dang ldan pas spyad / rang lus brgyad kyi bdud rtsi yis// rang rig di chen mi rtog pa// gsang ba zabs chen ldan pa yis// bdud rtsi'i bzud kyis yid rlos b+ha// nam mkha'i bdud rtsi myang bya las// zag med pade bas
263b4(rnying rgyud): pa na// tshe dang mngon shes rdzu 'phrul dang // dngos grub mchog ni 'byung bar 'gyur// bskyod pa drang gi phyag rgya las// thams cad ldan pas bskul bskyod pas// steng 'og rang bzhin drod bskal pas// 'byung brjod ldan 'byung ba yis// rang
263b5(rnying rgyud): bde ba'i 'khor lo d+ham// thogs med 'byung bar rlo tshom med// rang byung 'khor lo bzhi'i yul la// ting 'dzin blta bas grang bsngal ba// gnas bzhi thig le bde ba'i 'o// gsal 'grub mnyam pa chen por mthong // tan tsam snying 'khor lo//
263b6(rnying rgyud): drangs ma lnga dngas bon drug/ rtsa bzhi 'od dang snying po gsum// thugs las 'od byung rim bskal pas// bsreg bku rim thim gnas thig le'i// nam mkha'i ye shes gsal bar mthong // rang byung ye shes thig le'i dbyings// rkyen bral rig
263b7(rnying rgyud): le med pa ste// thabs ldan 'dzag pas bde ba bskyed// de nyid 'debs thig le'i dbyangs// lus ni lha ste pade chen po// dka' thub gadrug sogs bya ba min// 'dod la thabs kyi brgyad chen gyis// rtag tu babs kyis mchod par bya// /
264a1(rnying rgyud): 'thong rdzab kyilas ldan la// was dang dbang brod pa dang // 'dod na paN+Dal grags ldan pa po// gang zag pa maspyod stsal ldan// thad po ldan pa'i dam chog 'di// dum na dang da/ 'tha badran pa dang // nas dag/
264a2(rnying rgyud): chung dang byang mang // 'dod pa bral mapa'i btang snyoms pa// ma rlabs rnams hU~M spyod yul min/ lha 'phrul bal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gsang ba dam tshig gi leng ste dgu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// la
264a3(rnying rgyud): na rdul 'dzur lam gzhag phyir// ris pa wa las ring 'byor ba'i// dbyung gA khyad par bshad par bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad ni// dbang bsrang gnas pa rmang byung ba// dkyil 'khor slob dpon thob me dag/ byin rlabs ti 'dzin
264a4(rnying rgyud): les tshogs kyis// skal ldan rim par dbang bskur ba sa// gong nas gong du smin par byed/ bskrad pa'i rim pa dang bral na// 'jug pa'i ris pa nyams par 'gyur// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung bar 'gyur// phyi nang gsang ba'i lhang
264a5(rnying rgyud): par dag/ bcud kyi thig le nyams pa yin// ji snyed pha rol bshad pa yis// 'dzin bral dang rig nyid du mnyam/ thig le hA dang 'bas ldan na// rigs dang na tshod lo grangs dang // rab 'bring tha ma khyad par dang // thig le bye ba'i zhing
264a6(rnying rgyud): du mnyam// gong du bzhi yi khyad par brtags// rigs dang dad pa lus ngag sems// rim pa ri 'phrin brtag par bya// dus rigs kyi bdag po la// rtsod pa med par thad par bya// zhabs kyi tshogs nan can gyis// bdag nyid dbang du gyur
264a7(rnying rgyud): par bya// phyinang gsang ba'i sngags rdzas dag/ skyon med dag par byed par bya// lus dag gsa' ba'i gnas dag no// chog na par gyi gyis badz+ra // gang du dgos pa'i chos mthun ltar// gzung ba'i tshul du brtsam par bya// pa
264b1(rnying rgyud): ma lus zhi ba'i phyir// bsrung ba'i thog brtsam par bya// lus dang rtsa dang lo grangs sogs// ji bzhin ma yin thabs mtshon pas// sor bzhin ma mkha' dbyings kyi bar// nyams kyi tshad kyang bstan pa yin/ gru bzhi tshad ldan dkyil 'khor
264b2(rnying rgyud): la// ji ltar chu ba'i rang bzhin dag/ 'di dag dkyil 'khor mtshon pa ste// mi grub mtshon pa legs par bshad// lus ngag phung khams skye mched dag/ bde chen kar bcas sru gsung thugs// b+ha ga dkyil 'khor rgyan dang brngas/
264b3(rnying rgyud): shes lnga mtshon bdag nyid do// cho ga sngags dang phyag rgya yis// rang lhar gsal nas gnas lnga dag/ gsal ba'i khyad par ji bzhin du// bdag gam gzhan gyis byin gyis badrab// rang lus dag sems sku gsung thugs// bskyed pa'i
264b4(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyi rtsa gnas su// dra ba'i thig le yi ge nyid// su 'phrul dkyil 'khor gnyis su brlang // b+ha ga 'dus pa'i nyung 'bru ru// khams gsum 'gro rnams bsdus byas te/ rtog tshogs dkyil 'khor mngon du bya// phyogs
264b5(rnying rgyud): bcu dus bzhi spyan drangs te// sangs rgyas thig ler gyur pa yis// ce thim bcud kyi thig le yis// bde ba chen po dbyin gyis brlab// thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa yis// nyizla rten gyi thig le dag/ cen pa rlung gi zabs bsgyur bas//
264b6(rnying rgyud): thogs med lhan cig skyes par 'byung // sa bon dam par 'phel ba 'am// chos nas zlab parla drug ltar// bar zad pas le bas goms gyur na// bde chen nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur/ rlung gis zin dang mazin las// tshogs dang
265a1(rnying rgyud): bde ba 'byung // dug la thabs dang ldan bral ltar// 'ching dang grol bar snang ba yin// gang zhig thabs kyis ma zin par// chags pa'i bde ba gang bsten pa// thar med 'khor ba'i sa bon te// bskal pa bye bar srin bur ltung // ma
265a2(rnying rgyud): chags thabs bral 'khor ba ste// chags pa thabs rdul 'khor ba nyid// thabs chen ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la// thams cad bde ba chen por gnas// thig le chen po'i rang bzhin la// ji ltar yon tan kun 'dus pas// thabs zin ros ni nam mkha' nyar/
265a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad khyab pa'i tshul du snang // rang byung bde ba'i thig le nyid// nin nas gsang ba'i mthar phyin pas// dang po rten can dbang po la// bde ba bag les rgyas btab la// de na sa rten med nyams myong gis// thabs dang 'dzin pa bsam yas pas// thams
265a4(rnying rgyud): cad bde chen ngo por gsal// ji snyed chos kun ma lus pa// rgya mtsho la ni chu klung ltar// tha dad snang bam min te// pad chen thig le'i ngo bor thim// rang byung nyams la brtan thob pas// phyi nang bde chen rang rig pas// shes pa 'jug pa'i yul las
265a5(rnying rgyud): 'das// rig pa'i thig le skye ba med// bde chen thig le khyab pa la// rlung dang thig le 'gro 'ong med// 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med// rgyu 'bras med cing rim pa med// nam mkha' la ni rang snang bzhin// rtog pa'i dbang po dag pa las// dbang yul la
265a6(rnying rgyud): sogs gang snang ba// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gsal// 'dis ni nam mkha'i mthar thug par// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam par// bde ba chen po chos kyi dbyings// gsang ba gnyis med dag pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi bsngags pa yi// gsang
265a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i dam tshig chen po 'di// mu stegs can dang dka' thub can// dman pa'i rigs can yul ma yin// bde ba med pa'i chags bral 'di// nam mkha' la ni myu gu ltar// bde ba chen po thig le nyid// 'byung bar nus pa ma yin no// thig le thabs kyis ma
265b1(rnying rgyud): zin pa// gang gis zhen pas de sdud pas// tha mal pa dang mu stegs kyi// log pa'i lam du ltung 'gyur bas// zag pas rgas dang rgud pa dang // nyams dang brgyal dang nad gzir dang // log pa'i gdung bas gzir ba dang // rigs ngan mngal du skye bar
265b2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// rtag tu 'dod la zhen pa ni// de bzhin rten pas mal bar byed// grong dang 'geg pa srid 'phel te// drabul po lo byad thal nga bzhin// 'de chen thig le'i man ngag 'di// rig pos stor gnas su banyim// bskyod pa hA yis bskal ba yis// bdag
265b3(rnying rgyud): nyid chen po la yi mun// steng sgonas byung bde ba'i bcud// so so'i bzhi bcu gnyis la this// kun nas bde ba'i ye shes tshe// rgyal ba mnyes pa'i mchog tu gsungs// bco brgyad phrag gnyis bum pa dang // drug gnyis gzer gyis sbyangs nas ni// da
265b4(rnying rgyud): bskur byin rlabs 'dri thob pa// theg pa chen por dbugs phyung ba'o// dpral ba'i khyad par dang sbar nas// dkyil 'khor gnyis la brten goms nas// phra ba'i khyad par rnam bsam nas// nas mkha'i mthar thug par bye/ gyi nang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// bya ba'i
265b5(rnying rgyud): las rnams mthar phyin nas// 'dug dang nyams rnyed kA ma yis// slob ma'i rim pa smin pa'i phyir// 'jug pa'i cho ga tshul bzhin zla// dkyil 'khor gang dang 'tshams pa la// 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas byas pas// bdag gzhan nus pa mthar smin pas/ @
265b6(rnying rgyud): chen lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// bla med dbang phyug mnyes bya'i phyir// rigs sam yang na 'byor pa yi// ser sgra spangs pa'i zang zing dag/ phongs pa med pa'i sems kyis dbul// gang du dang dang brtson 'grus dang // brtul zhugs gsum dang ldan pa la//
265b7(rnying rgyud): sare ni 'jug dang nus byed nas// bde ba'i dbang ni rim bzhin sbyin// phyag rgya chen po nam mkha'i dbyings// sor bzhi tshad du rang bzhin gnas// bde ba ye shes thugs dkyil 'khor// kha dog dbyibs dang ldan par bya// thabs kyi rang gnas cho gar ldan// 'jug
266a1(rnying rgyud): pa pos kyang gsol ba gdab// thabs dang shes rab nyi ga'i 'aH// sra mo gsal ba'i rang bzhin la// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ldan rdzogs pa// gsal bar gnas pa bris pa yin// thal ma zhes bya sdebs pa'i sku/
266a2(rnying rgyud): dbang po yul du rab sbyor bas// phyag rgya chen po nam mkha'i dbyings// btal zhugs chen po'i mang du blangs// rdo rje mdzub mo'i rtse dag rtsa// til 'granam mkha'i gzhag yas su// ri rab gcig gi phyag rgya dgod// thabs rgya chog drang gnas bya/
266a3(rnying rgyud): sags su thAb/ rgyu gapa ga gas thu/ // rnas pa gnas // dang 'phel ba'i mang bzhin/
266a4(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po rdogs par 'gyur// ma nyams thabs dang nyams ldan pas// lo zla tshes grangs rab 'bring gis// dbang bslar phyag rgya lnga gnas pas// rang byung thig lesna tshogs 'grub// bcu drug tshul gyis 'grub pa ni// bdag gzhan bya ba mthar gyi
266a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin mchog/ bde chen rig pa las byung ba'i// zhing khams gzhal yas sku gsur thugs// gcig dang du ma las 'das pa// gsadab chen po'i mtshan nyid do/ de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// thun mod byin rlabs dkyil 'khor du/ rigs ldan brtson
266a6(rnying rgyud): 'grus can dag la// rgyal po lta bu ga smin pa// khams bcud bde ba'i lam nyid du// dngam brgyad rgan mtshan ldan pa// dra ba'i rtsa dang dbang po dang // phung sogs ye shes pade 'khor lo// hUM ge bde ba ye shes gcas// tshogs 'byud rang 'dzin pa
266b1(rnying rgyud): shes la// sngags rdzas dgongs pas gang bslangs pa// kun nas ldan zhing skyob pa yis// sdug bsngal las grol rigs su nges// pri mgrin snyeng dung yan lag sogs// rang byung rten gyi tri ga le lus// rigs kyi phyag rgyags la ldan pa// gnyis
266b2(rnying rgyud): med thim pa'i byin rlabs kyis// nus pa lnga ldan phyag rgyar sbyin// thabs kyi cho ga dbang bskur bas// rgyal mchog rgyas btab phyag rgya'i mchog/ rgyal mchog nyid du grub pa yin// thabs dang shes rab brin rlabs kyis// me spyod yab mu ma rol pa las//
266b3(rnying rgyud): bde ba gsal zhing dmigs pa la// shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje ye shes hUM tshogs kyis// pad+ma ye shes bsdus 'khyil ba'i// nyung dkar tshad tsam rdo rje sems// rtse nas rtse ru phyin pa yis// rang bzhin chos khams dkyil 'khor gyis// sa bon
266b4(rnying rgyud): zung gsum gnyid dang bcas// gnas ngan len pa gsum sbyangs te// dmigs med sems kyi ye shes la// gsal bas sa bon tshig pa bzhin// mi skye thabs kyis dbugs phyung ba'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rjes su 'jug pa'i phyag rgya
266b5(rnying rgyud): nyid// zil pa'i thig le sngon lam bzhin// badz+ra drug phyed phyed thig le gcig/ phan tshun bkod pa'i sdom gyis bsdam// bde ba gnyis pa'i ngo bo nyid// gsum pa ye shes dkyil 'khor du// gsal ba'i bshad pa gyur pa'i sgra// rang bzhin 'od gsal dkying
266b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor ro// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rdo rje nyi mthabs kyi rtsa// phung sogs phyag rgya'i tshogs dang ldan// de zla bsil byed shes rab dngos// dus gcig ro mnyam thig le che// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rdzogs shing // zla ba ye shes gru bcu drug
266b7(rnying rgyud): dpe byad la sogs dpag tu med// sems shes mngon par shes dang ldan// sems mtha' 'grol rdzu 'phrul che// gnas nas log par thim pa'i sgras// mtha' gnyis mgos pad+ma can// sprul ba'i gnas nas skye ba yis// bzhi bcu rtsa lnga rdzogs mtha'
267a1(rnying rgyud): na/ yas// gan dag zhan nyid dngadags labs// bcu gsum lag 'khor lo brjod// rgyal ba cad gyi mug sung zugs// dbye bang bun mang nyid// dbang bkur lnga yi thung bar bya// yul ldan rnams la bstan pa
267a2(rnying rgyud): yin// gong du bskal pa bye ba yi// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// sdig pa byas pa gang yin dang // dka' thub sdom pas lus gdungs shing // sdug bsngal nye dar gzir ba kun// dbang ba spang nabs kyis tshe 'dir zo la// sgra 'phrul thal ba'i
267a3(rnying rgyud): chud chen po las/ dbang bsur byung bshad pa'i ling skye bcu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad b+ha ba// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'o// gsang zin lam la zhugs pa yi// lam gyi don mi dngul zhugs pa shad// dpag tu ma
267a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i log tog dang // mos pa'i spod pa'i khyad par ltar// brtul zhugs mtha' yas 'di gsungs so// 'di ltar thabs ldan bde ba rags la// thal ba'i dbyangs la sogs pa yi// ji nyid gdul byam lus pa// chags pa can dang log ra
267a5(rnying rgyud): can// 'dul ba'i don du bstan pa yin// rang bzhin mnyam pa'i don gcig kyang // rkyen gyis tha dad sna tshogs pa'i// las dang spyod pa mtha' yas kyang // rang bzhin nyid la ldan bral med// rang bzhin ma bcas zos kyi dbyings// log dang ma la
267a6(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas pa// gnyis med gsang bar gsal bas na// skyed dang mi spyang mtshan nyid gcig/ nam mkha' rang bzhin khyab pa la// so so'i rang bzhin ma bkag pa// rang rig sems nyid cing yang snang // ngo bo nyid la dbyer med do//
267a7(rnying rgyud): rtog log pa ste// bag chags pa bus pa'i rang bzhin nyid// log sbyong 'jig rten zhen pa can// 'di dag log pa'i brtul zhugs pa'o// thang 'ad can dang dgag bsrub can// gnyen po can dang dka' thub can// khrus dang gtsang tu gang phyud pa// ma
267b1(rnying rgyud): nyid bde ched padul zhugs spyod pa 'di// theg dmanam gtog spangs pa yi// byang chub dang can sogs pa'i// bde chen sras dang bcas pa'i do// sa sgya ga la gang lag dan// ni smad rang gi srog gcod ltar// thabs ngal sdod pas grol 'ad
267b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i// rnal 'byor bdud kyis bslus par 'gyur// gang du rnal 'byor skal ldan pas// thabs bral rnams kyis gang spangs pa'i// dug lnga 'dod wa la sogs pa// skyes bu thabs kyi pha rol phyin// mi mthun thabs kyis mthun 'gyur bzhin// thabs chen
267b3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pas// sgo gsum bya ba'i spyod pa la// bde chen stor gsum 'gyur med pa// rang lus rdo rje phyag rgya che// gnas shing rtog ta goms pa la// sgo gsum rang bzhin dri med de// thams cad rgyal ba'i mdzad par snang // 'gro dang 'dug
267b4(rnying rgyud): dang za dang nyal// gar dang skabs klu gro la sogs// mdzes dang chag sa dang drag shul spyod// thabs ldan skyes bu'i brtul zhugs nyid// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rten dang bde 'a byung 'dod pas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thig le'i/
267b5(rnying rgyud): don la gnas pa yi// rkyen zla snang ba'i ye shes kyis// thabs kyi bde ba nyams thob nas// gang de gas la brtan bya ba'i phyir// lus ni bzad kyis 'tsho bar bya// rdzas ni thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis// ci bde bar ni gnas par bya// sha lnga dang ni bdud rje wa// badz+ra
267b6(rnying rgyud): dang sbyararam dngos kyang rung // bza' btung mur ba la sogs pa// 'di dag rtag tu bsten par bya// rgyal ba rnams kyi dam tshig ste// mchod dang longs spyod 'byung ba dang // bsnyen dang mos pa tsam gyis kyang // sdug bsngal las grol ba de chen thob// de nas
267b7(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'dod chags bral ba bde thob cing // bde ba'i thig le rgyas bya'i phyir// 'dod chags thabs kyi spyod pa ni// ma lus thabs kyi 'dul ba dang // rig pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang // skyes pa'i yo byad ldan pa yis// rigs
268a1(rnying rgyud): bgro rgyad pa dus mthung ga// dam pa bzhin brtag pa dbya// bcu ga nyis bcwa zhibarda drags// brdab cad kyi gnyis byasogs// yid 'ong ltas meng sa/ khadag lags// dum dang thams ldan pa dang // nga
268a2(rnying rgyud): thabs la mkhas shing brtson// 'di ni byin las me byung ltar// rig pa bzhin du nan tan bya// mdzes shing chags pas blta ba ltar// bzung ba dang ni 'khyud pa dang // sbyor ba dang ni mnye ba dang // 'bud dang dang ba'i sgra 'byin dang // rtog dang 'bebs dang rdebs myo
268a3(rnying rgyud): dang // 'dod dang 'ji ba dang 'cha' ba dang // rtse dang 'bab dang zhon pa dang // btsugs dang 'byung dang 'jug pa dang // rol pa sna tshogs smad pa yis// dbang bskur lam la goms 'dod pas// tha ma la spyod yul ma lus pa// ma chags pa rnams chags
268a4(rnying rgyud): byed cing // de bzhin yid ni rtse gcig 'gyur// de nas yid ni rmongs pa dang // snga ma'i bag chags don la 'jug/ dag pa dang ni 'dus pa dang // chags dang 'dir dang 'dod pa dang // yid gcig pa dang rmongs pa dang // tshems pa 'di ni yan lag brgyad//
268a5(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po 'bar byas nas// rang lus thig les rgyas btab la// gsang ba'i thabs kyis bsten byas la// rang byung lhan cig skyes pa'i nyams// bar chad med par bsgom par bya// thig le dbab dang bzung ba dang // bzlog pa dang ni 'dren pa dang
268a6(rnying rgyud): khyab pa dang ni brtan pa dang // rgya che yun ring spel ba dang // sbyangs pa'i bde chen gsang ba'i lam// shes pa dang ni spyad pa dang // bde chen thig le 'bar 'jug pas// thabs dang shes rab tshogs thams cad// 'byed pa dang ni 'jug pa dang // 'bar dang /
268a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzag dang thim pa dang // khyab cing rgyas par bstan pa las// rnam smin bde chen yid kyi lus// rdo rje ye shes lus thob pas// thabs ldan lam la bar chad med// rdo rje 'dzin bdag rigs kyi gtso// bdag po'i rigs la tha dad med// gang du dbye
268b1(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs pa// mos pa gdul bu'i don du snang // ngo bo bde ba chen por snang // de nas gzhan yang bshad byab// thig le 'gro 'od med pa'i lam// lam gyi khyad par gang bstan pa// dpa' bo thabs kyi lamartang nas// bar chad nyams sras bsal nas
268b2(rnying rgyud): kyang // mthar phyin lam la gnas kyi bar// bde chen 'phel 'grib med par bsgom// shes rab thabs kyi nyams ldan pa// rang rig thabs kyi bde thob nas// gnas pa thabs kyi bar chod byed// thig le rlung la dbang thob pas// 'gro 'ong 'phel 'grab
268b3(rnying rgyud): dang bral// bcu drug cha shas 'phel ba ltar// rig pas mthar phyin lhun gyis grub// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// dbang gi nyams la brtan pa yis// nyi zla 'gro 'ong brtan gyur na// ma lus lhan cig skyes par gsal// re re gzung dang
268b4(rnying rgyud): bskyil ba dang // thig le'i rgyang dang zung sbyor du// 'dren dang bzlog pa'i khyad par ni// byed pa sdom pa'i thabs kyis gsal// yab yum thabs kyi dbye ba dang // yang na thabs kyis 'dus pa dang // blta dang snyan dang brtse ba dang // rol pa nyams dang sngar
268b5(rnying rgyud): ba ste// rang nyams slob dpon drag gis bstan// gdul bya chags can log sred can// mthun pa'i thabs kyis 'dul ba'i phyir// thal ba'i dbyangs sogs 'dus pa la// thabs chen brtse ba'i tshul gyis ni// sku 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// thal chud
268b6(rnying rgyud): chen po bshad pa yin// 'di ni brtul zhugs chen po yi// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// rtog goms thabs la nyer gnas shing // rdzas dang yo byad kun ldan pas// nyams ldan par chad med par brtsam// lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'gyur//
268b7(rnying rgyud): 'phrul thal ba'i byud chen po las/ rig po brtul zhugs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sgra 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// gsang chen thabs la nges 'jug pa// 'dir yang dag pa shad pa
269a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ sa/ sa du/
269a2(rnying rgyud): na // dadam par ba // dad tshig / ba pon ma zhes shing dbang thob pas/ tham pas gangs pa skye// lce bu larna pa lam nga // zhabs pan gas
269a3(rnying rgyud): rnams pad byed/ rnamapas/ men na pang nas pa da/ rlung na pa di / gas pa snyanas/ tsun pa 'a
269a4(rnying rgyud): snan+dan dang du 'gyu na// dbang pa tshad maldan dang// dbang po nang bkun te// 'dod pa yang sa rdzu sa// dag nga shAd// dka' rjeb ma pa med pas thag// bsam pa'i yulan tshigs te// sems can pa
269a5(rnying rgyud): zugasas/ babum gyis m-i tha gang basbyin pas// dkyi bas ni tshogs ldan// shA na'i phy-i brjid/ ma seM rji kyi m+b+hi bums// thams pad ga 'ag/ nga ba'i ba ba ldang ba mang // su can pa nga/
269a6(rnying rgyud): na pams cad ldanalatho blun do// bas pa 'a / nga dgas ba ma sa pa/ ba mas sa tha/ margyad pa dang mig padag
269a7(rnying rgyud): bdas rgyan grangs te/ b.ras gyi'i pagams ma bsadasas sargyas bang / don 'dra bra sa ma ba ba'i mamangs 'tha/ gsu ma du ma bang mazab/ dbang ba bar zung// bar ba
269b1(rnying rgyud): pas sangs rgyas kun// mi 'grub nam mkhar myu gu bzhin// bde bas 'khor lo bzhi dag la// bya ba gzhan spangs rtse gcig gnas// 'byung ba lus dang rig pa sems// brten pa'i snang ba'i chos nyid rgyud// thog ma tha ma med pa'i bar// mthar thug/
269b2(rnying rgyud): bar ni nan tan bya// dam tshig dbang ldan rnal 'byor pas// chags lam dbang thob rab 'bring gis// mos pa'i tshad dang sbyar nas ni// ji lta bar ni nan tan bya// gnas pa dang ni rku ba dang // dwangs skyigs dbyi bas shes bya ste// gnas pa'i srog gi rten can
269b3(rnying rgyud): mi shigs thig le shes pa'i gnas// gang gnas rab tu gnas pa ste// gzhi zhes dang ni bshad pa yin// rgyu ba dngas mnan can dang // phyi rol snyigs mar shes par bya// phyi nang 'phro ba bcu gsum te// dus tshod dbye bas shes pa yin// gnas pa gcig da
269b4(rnying rgyud): rgyu ba bdun// shes pa'i bye brag bstan pa yin// snyigs ma tha ma rlung nyid ni// bde dang sdug bsngal btang snyoms pa// gang du khyab dang chags pa dang // dpa' bo sel bar byed pa ste// gyen dang thung dang thad ka dang // mnyam par rgyu ba shes pa yin// nang
269b5(rnying rgyud): du rgyub gcig yin te// lhag ma phyi rol shes par bya// thabs kyi drangs ma zhes bya ba// rlung gsum thabs kyis nang bzung cing // steng 'og rtsub gcod par bya// rlung gis snod kyi sgo phye nas// thig le rlung du 'dres pa des// snyigs ma'i rtse mo nas brtan pas/
269b6(rnying rgyud): dngas ma'i rtsar zhugs bde ba 'phel// bde ba chen pos lus gang nas// mngon shes rdzu 'phrul snang bar byed// rlung sems bde ba thig ler zim// thog ma tha ma med par thim// bde chen de bzhin nyid du snang // rang byung 'khor lo bzhi brtas pas// nyi mas
269b7(rnying rgyud): 'khya grab bzhu ba ltar// thig les lus kun khyab byas pas// gsang ba'i ye shes mngon du 'char// ma rlung thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// g.yas g.yon thabs kyi thig le bskul// sprul pa'i 'khor lor bzlog bzung bas// nam mkha'i ye shes cing yang
270a1(rnying rgyud): gsapa// rnamam pa 'id kyil 'khor bkrab las// bdag sras thub par byed parnabs pas// thams cad dab bachen por gsal// thabs dang gas ba ldan pas// rnapas thabs la ma khas b+haH// dbang ba lnga ma thar thams/
270a2(rnying rgyud): thabs kyis sdung par ci rigs par// rang rig rnams kyi bde chen ni// 'phel 'grib med par bsgom par bya// chags pa dang ni meng pa dang // 'dzin pa la sogs sang bar bya/ gang du thabs kyis spangs pa las// skul ba'i bde ba lus sa smin// zas de
270a3(rnying rgyud): bsasra pas kyi gcig bsgom// mgoms pa bcan gyis brtsod// chu dran bzhin rnamatshan pa zhom// dus gzapa nyid mtshan po rbaH// sems ni theg le brtan pa// rten gyi thigal mi 'angag ci // 'thung dag med par bad bar gas pa// thams na/
270a4(rnying rgyud): rag cig zim par 'gyur// gang byer byung ba'i ma bzhin no// 'od kyi bas bzhin du// malus bde chid pan// thams cad gsal bar brtan pa dang // deka ba bar thim thur na// pad can thog lo smos med pa rten// long dgragangs
270a5(rnying rgyud): gan sbyar// rmob dpon gong mas thabs phyir bas// yun ring chu che zag med pas// rdul 'byor byin gyis rlo pa 9// bskal pa brgya stong khre 'bram dang // bye ba zer 'bra ma la sogs par// 'khor phrag stong gsum brgya myong thag/ gangan /
270a6(rnying rgyud): glang sogs dpa' yas shing // nam mkhye' mthar thag par ste/ bsgom dngas bsgoms par cad med// thun gyi pa grub pa gas la bar b+hU ra~M// thabs dang shes rab dbang rab gyis// seng thug sa bur byin pa rdza pas// rang rig pade chen pas
270a7(rnying rgyud): mab+hab// rnams pa mtha' mnyam ma long la// 'di can yon na nga ga ga// rang b+ha rang snang ba'i shig saM// byed byed kyang dmed// rig pa'i mang kyang ba 'i// nachags chos rnams na bang zad // dang myed dag pa gas/
270b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i yon tan rang snang ba// 'phel 'grib res 'jog mi gnas te// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' che// nam mkha' dag dang mnyam pa'i gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' rtag tu bzhugs// thog ma tha ma'i dus med par// mnyam gzhag med cing rjes thob med//
270b2(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen por rtag tu brtag/ sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gsang ba thabs la 'jug pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// thabs bral log par 'khyams pa rnams// gsang ba'i thams kyis
270b3(rnying rgyud): bya'i phyir// rim pa bzhin du bshad par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs 'chang zhing // zhi zhing dul ba snying rje ldan// zab mo thabs kyi gter dang ldan// dbang dang man ngag ldan pa dang // rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa// khyad par bye brag ma rmongs pa// 'di ni sangs
270b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba 'dul phyir bzhugs pa yin// dad pa dang ni dam tshig dang // shes rab snying rje phun sum tshogs// brtson 'grus gtor phod che ba ni// pad+ma'i rigs su shes par bya// bud med chags pa che ba dang // de bzhin skyes bu dang labab//
270b5(rnying rgyud): lang 'tsho bde ba phun sum tshogs// gsang ba thabs kyi snod mchog yin// 'dod pa bral dang ma ning dang // ma smin pa dang dka' thub can// log par 'khyal zhing mi 'jug pa// gsang sngags thabs las 'das pa yin// gzhan yang dad pas sgor 'jug na//
270b6(rnying rgyud): rigs ngan dag dang kun tu rgya// zhe sdang can dang gti mug can// 'dod chags nga rgyal phrag dog can// mtshams med pa dang rkun po spyod// ma byin len dang mi tshangs spyod// rdzun du smra dang ngag 'khrul can// phyin ci log pa spyod pa rnams// 'dod chags can gyi gsang/
270b7(rnying rgyud): sgo 'dir// spyad pas gnyis med 'grub par 'gyur// thabs chen gsang ba'i nges sgo 'dir// ngan song ngan par spyod pa yang // tshe 'dis 'bras bu theb 'gyur na// gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos// 'on kyang dam tshig nyams pa dang // gsang ba'i don
271a1(rnying rgyud): sra sbyar ba 'dabs// snying nas slob dpon grangs pa dag/ brtson 'grus thabs kyis ci ba// bas byung // ma 'di'i 'de ba yod minan// thar pa'i go 'amang de ltar skyob// gsang ba'i gsad chen rgyud 'di'i// dbang bltar
271a2(rnying rgyud): zabs kyi don mtshon nas// rin chen gter dang thon ma bzhin// ma lus ye shes snang bar gsal// dbang dang thabs kyi don bral nA// dka' zlab dman pa'i tshad ma dang // mtshan ma'i cho ga la brten pas// bskal ba byi bar 'geb mi 'gyur// zhabs
271a3(rnying rgyud): chen gsang ba la gnas pa'i// dbyer med don la gnas goms na// dka' thub gdung ba bya mi dgos// khrus dang gtsang sbra de bzhin min// slong mos 'tsho ba rnam par ldang // thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// gsang ba thabs kyis bder bsgrub na/
271a4(rnying rgyud): tshe 'dir sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor ba'i rwa'i ga myan khang na// bde chen rmang byung gter gnas pa// dbang dang man ngag bdud rtsi yis// mngon du 'char bar the tshom med// rgyal ba kun gyi thabs ldan pas// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i don chen po// ji ltar
271a5(rnying rgyud): dug gis dug sel ltar// dman la thabs de yod ma yin// phyi rol thun mong gang zag la// nyi mas mun pa sel ba ltar// dad ldan rigs nges gang zag la// thun mong thabs kyis 'grub pa yin// ji ltar nang gi 'tshon khang la// nyi mas mi snang spos
271a6(rnying rgyud): mes sel// bskal pa bye bar bsags pa yi// sgrib pa 'gas kyis mngon du sel// 'khor ba 'i lus dang nyon mongs kun// thig le nyams dang lhun dus su// gang yang gnas pa ma yin te// thams cad ldan cig skyes pa nyid//
271a7(rnying rgyud): kun khyab cing // 'gro ba kun gyi snying la bzhugs// lus gnas lus la mi gnas shing // ngo bo nyid la tha dad med// bde ba chen po thig le nyid// khyu dang 'bras bu las 'das pa'i// rtag min chad min kha dog thal// mtshon pa'i byang
271b1(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kun dang bral// gzhin 'das pa'i snang ba ni// dngos dang dngos med gnyis kAm na// de bzhin nyid kyi snying po ste// rtog ge bA li gral ma yin// grag chen thabs lam brgyad kyi mchog/ thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing // rdzag
271b2(rnying rgyud): thabs kyis bder zin pas// ma lus bde chen gang bar 'gyur// ma lus bde ba chen po'i dbyings// chos nyid gsang ba'i rang bzhin la// 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med// stong dang bde ba las 'das shing // rang rig byang chub sems nyid
271b3(rnying rgyud): de// rtsa bcud thig le don dang 'brel// gsang ba don gyis byings las 'byung // rten gyi thig le 'gro 'ong med// des na sems kyi thig le la// phyi nang steng 'og cha shas med// thig le bde ba chen po nyid// ci la yang ma gnas mi gnas pas//
271b4(rnying rgyud): bas ma brjod shes pa'i yul las 'das// khyu 'phrul thabs kyi rang bzhin te// drab shes rab tu bstan pa// gnyis med 'brel ba gang ma yin// thabs chen thig pa gang bshad do// bye brag sum thu rtsa gnyis kyi// ngo bo bsdus pa'i snying po bzhin//
271b5(rnying rgyud): steng dang 'og gi tshul gnas shing // thabs dang shes rab tshul dag gis// skra dang gsung thugs dang gnas pa'i// lus can kun la khyab par gnas// bcud dang ldan pa'i snying po 'di// rten pa 'bas kyi phyin pa yis// gsang ba le lo med bsgrubs na/
271b6(rnying rgyud): bde ba'i ye shes 'char bar 'gyur// ma lus gsang bas don mthong na// dngos por gnas pa ma yin te// chu shing snying po ltar gnas shing // de bas thig le rang bzhin med// lus med thig le mi dmigs te// bde ba chen po rang bzhin med// gangal
271b7(rnying rgyud): dngos med de bzhin nyid// thog ma tha ma med pa yi// rang byung dngos po byang chub sems// mnor rtog pas 'khrul bzad// bde ba chen po gsang ba'i don// rtogs nas mngon du goms byed pa'i// rang lus gnas pa'i mtshan dpe ltar// gzhan du
272a1(rnying rgyud): la ba 'byor ba cad// sa thabs rgyas marjod pa'i nga/ byung ba tu ma bas sags// gzung na 'anag/ rang byas 9 gyu pas// dab dang na gapa nga sa
272a2(rnying rgyud): skrag rnargyal 'an pa ltar// rtog gleng ba rna pas shes med gyung // thabs ni theg pa don 'a ga/ slob por thugs la gnas pa phyir// sras dang songs khyon rgyal srid ces// bsnyen sngon 'dri shes par bya// le lo spangs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi
272a3(rnying rgyud): ga // 'a pa sa / / shA sa ba da//
272a4(rnying rgyud): sbyin pas yon tan dpal 'amar// gsang ba'i gsong bzhag pa'i rgyud// babyas rgyang pa rtsib ste// dmar pa'i chos grub tsog spangs// di nigs rkyen rnying ba // rgyu phral thal pa'i drud chen po las/ gang zag thabs kyis gzung ba'i la
272a5(rnying rgyud): brgya gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya'o// 'dod pa can pa zugs su pas// sngo' po dan pa las grol ba'i// rgya da ris pa bzad par bya// gang zhig gang la dga' ba ste// log pa'i thabs kyis mi 'dul te// rnam
272a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung thabs can gyis tha yis// cha mthun thabs kyis gdulta bar bya// gang po N+NasaM pa da 'i na// ded+hi na pas ma ma smin rabs// chags pa sbyor ba mkhas pa yis// maldan rnam par grol bar 'gyur// gsangang sras pa 'bras
272a7(rnying rgyud): mkhas pas// blo dran tha pa'i bar ma snyed// gsang pa'i thabs chen sgra phu gyis// ma sras 'ad bar rjong bar 'gyur// phyogs padzin sa pas rgyas thabs cad ni// mung thul dra ba shis byaste// thab sa dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis/
272b1(rnying rgyud): skyes pa zad med nga por btags// 'dzin par spyod btsun pa'o// nya mang rjo ga pa dang / ma po thama'i na papa// tham la rtog pani na cing // thabs can la ma la mkhas pa yis// ye shes snang ba 'byed par 'gyur// bkas pa
272b2(rnying rgyud): ni brtags pa dang / sa nga shegasapa pas/ napas ga ma ra gyu/ ma gas bags pa// bzhim na byed de// dmigs pas pa 'du shA/ ba
272b3(rnying rgyud): dang sa yad bzang bzla// mig tud mar zhing so yang dmad// seMn mo sangs kyi mdog sbyang danang // snga lags rtse mo zung kyi byung / mig sa d+hi ring lda ngang pa'i blos// sgra ma ngag mthi ga phyir lon // dmathar mdzes te ca yA pA //
272b4(rnying rgyud): nga lag 'ji 'ad pa ba dag pacoM// bad+ha na pargya gag// / byed par mnyim thog/ ngan kyang rnying ba bzhi ngas// mig tu gzham la mi mngon ni // lus pa dang na 'jug pa'i/
272b5(rnying rgyud): smos pa// brtags pas mtshan ma shes byan// gdong ba chung la rgyan pa dang // rdo snod kyizhing panya ma marnaM/ brda 'dring byed ba zlum pa'o// zla l+r-ing ma la skang rdzi // so rags mdo la dang ba dang // kha nas pan kyang dang lda zhing/
272b6(rnying rgyud): khams che ba ba nus pa// duN+Dal nan la skya brgyad// dka 'ad kyim ga las na man \u0f7f/ ma drang nga zhing 'jigs pa med// mig phrag ting gying ba gcan// shang la N+DI paM rigs bshad pa// legs par brtags gang mnyam thangs
272b7(rnying rgyud): pa// byadang drung la mig nga ba// samanye rnaM la dam pa'o// rdu 'phru kyi nyim gyi// bris kyi ga yeng gyi rgyangan// mgri du gyu nga ba // rlung sa sa sgram nga \u0f7f// uHma tsung bram la rnam pa// gas dang chags
273a1(rnying rgyud): dun/ na sa da/ nas mag/ ga ga// / 'a/
273a2(rnying rgyud): lus ngan bzhin lus g.yas su yo// b+ha ga chung la rub pa ste// rna tshogs rimos mtshan la dga'// khro la 'thub cing brlung tshigasra// sngags dang rdzas dang zabs phyogs pas// dgon pa bar chad med pa'i gnas// rdo byed dang sber dman pa
273a3(rnying rgyud): dgongs ka'i dus su dgug par bya// nang was b+ha ga pho brad dbyibs// spyi dang khyad par brtag par bya// gang du bde skyed rten gyi dbyibs// yo ba dang ni sgru ba dang // rtsa ngan 'phel kha che ba dang // zla ba gang zlum mtho 'dzeg pa dang // 'thur rung mi
273a4(rnying rgyud): legs dman po dag/ de bzhin spang bar shes par bya// rtse med pa dang shes pa dang // rtsa ngan pa dang yo ba dang // kham pa dang thung ba dang // phra dang nub pa med pa yang // spang bar bya ba rab tu bshad// sra ba dang ni 'phang mtho dang // rtsa ldan drod che
273a5(rnying rgyud): ske ba dang // mi 'gyur ba dang zlum pa dang // bting ring 'jam zhing cung zad dam// pad+ma'i snying po bzhin du zlum// shin tu chung la spu nyung ba// bzang po'i rigs dang mtshan du bshad// 'gugs dang bskrang dang gsang ba dang // rgyas pa'i ri dang sbom pa
273a6(rnying rgyud): dang // rang bzhin bzang dang nus pa che// bcos su med pa bzang por bshad// gong du gzhan gyis dpang byas dang // dka' thub can dang ngo tsha can// gtsang sde can dang rang bzhin dan// g.yangs pa yis ni 'grangs pa dang // gnad dang gnyid dang snyings
273a7(rnying rgyud): pa dag/ rus pa med pas spang bar bya// gal te bde ba skyed chags 'dod na// chags pa'i glu dang gar dag dang // bza' brdung balha dang chags pa'i gtam// ci legs pa yis spyad par bya// steng 'og 'khyud pa gnyis yin te// blta dang gzhi ba dang 'dzin/
273b1(rnying rgyud): pa gnyis// reg pa de bzhin shes par bya// thabs dang shes rang rgyal gyis so// du ma de bzhin mig gnyis dang // sna dang 'gram pa chu so dang // brla dang lte ba b+ha ga la// dgyes pa bskyed phyir 'o bya'o// mchu dang nu ma'i gong gnyis dang // mtshan lung 'bur
273b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis mkhar chos la// bud med dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir// mi drag par ni sos gdab po// mchu gnyis bar du mchu gnyis dag/ blta bzhin yun ring gzhi ba par bya// nu ma gnyis dang 'bur gnyis dang // brla dang nu ma mkhar chos skyed pa ru// brtse dang chags
273b3(rnying rgyud): pa bskyed pa'i phyir// sen thabs bcus pas reg par bya// gsang ba'i stod kyi gnas gsum du// sked pa'i gnas gsum bcu gnyis dag/ mtshan khung rtsib logs rgyu zhabs su// tha ma la tshul gyis drud par bya// srin lag thabs kyis bskyod par bya//
273b4(rnying rgyud): reg dang 'phro bas yid 'pham pa// de tshe rtags ni 'byung bar 'gyur// rtse gnyis 'phrad pas bde ba che// gang la dang dbang med par ni// 'khor ba'i srid pa rang thi ma 'gyur// d+ha ga pad+ma'i snying po la// rdo thabs chen baspyod pa yis// gsang ba'i thig le bcud
273b5(rnying rgyud): 'bru// rtse nas bzung bzlog sbyangs pa yis// dbang po yul dang rnam shes kun// bde ba chen po'i gzugs su skye// 'di tshe bar chad med pa yis// mthar thug gsang ba'i ye shes 'grub// dbang dang man ngag sngon song bas// yon tan bcu dang rab ldan zhing // yid
273b6(rnying rgyud): 'od rigs bzhi thig le ni// pad+ma nI dang hA hrI nI// shang ka nI dang tse tanI// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la// nub phyogs 'og min bde ldan du// ma chags pad+ma gdan bting ba// nyi ma shar ba'i gzhal yas khang // nyung dkar chod kyi bum pa ni// yon tan
273b7(rnying rgyud): tshad med gter dang ldan// las dang ngo bo tshad dang bral// bdag nyid ngo bo can ldan pas// bcu drug bzhi chas pad ba pral bas// gnyis ka'i gnas su yab yum dag/ phyag rgya dgu gnyis tshad mas gdab// sa ya bcu gsum gnyis kyi brdud// bskyod
274a1(rnying rgyud): brgal thog thabs byas gdags// tin dus gcig 'dres sha drung // de nyid bzhil slar bzlas na// dang po stod bral bams cad kun// bcugs sa rgyag ca bul 'khor gsal// thub po dang dran gzung / rdza
274a2(rnying rgyud): le bde chen 'gro 'ong med/ sgyu 'phrul thal pa'i rgyud chen po las/ zhwa ga bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// zhe sdang can gyi gang zag la// gnyen po thabs kyis mi 'dul ba// thabs rjen gsang ba
274a3(rnying rgyud): bshad par bya// nongs par spyod dang log sred can// dam nyams log dang 'khra ba dang // thA ma mchod dang dkon mchog dgra// dam dgra dran pa'i ngang tshul can// yongs la gnod dang 'dus par 'ongs// bla ma grogs kyi yum phrog cing // tshogs kyi yo byad
274a4(rnying rgyud): chu 'phrog byed// gsang ba 'jigs pa'i las byed pa// dam tshig dam chos dmod pa dang // lha dang mi dpang na 'gror bcas// thams cad bskal pa'i zhing dra gsungs// bdag dang gzhan la 'an pa'i phyir// thos kun rogacig nyid gnas shing // mnyan nyid rig pa
274a5(rnying rgyud): rnapa 'byo byas// rdzabyabs cu 'bras gsad pa // byam sa myong nga ldanas pas// bar ma zen nga ba par bya/ drag tha bad gyi rjod pa'is/ mnyas nyid la dgang nga bya// bas pa'i sngags rgyams// 'amar ba'i
274a6(rnying rgyud): bkug nas ni// thugs rje'i ljid dang ldan par gnan// shes rab mtshon chen ldan pa yis// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rgya dral te// chu shing sdong po kha bye ste// ma rig mun pa snang bar byas// de nyid ye shes 'od kyis sbyang // 'byung ba gsum gyi thabs kyis sbyangs
274a7(rnying rgyud): raM laM khaM/ ma bskyed nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// 'byung ba'i rkyen gyis mi 'jig ltar// skye med sems kyi rang bzhin la// mtshan pa'i rkyen gyis 'jog pa med// sel ba nyi zla'i gdan sted du// a las hUM gi sbyor ba yis// tshen gang 'od kyi sems
274b1(rnying rgyud): slo tsug sa// ga sa gyu pa// ma gyu dzad// na ma pas dus gyu// na mas na// gnyis sa yod pa bang brdzur// bdag kun du
274b2(rnying rgyud): mthar phyin to// phung lnga 'dod pa'i yo byad wa// dur khrod sna tshogs las grub pa// mchod pa'i sprin ni rab 'byams kyis// ma lus khyab par spro bar bya// bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir// thams dang snying rje ldan pa yis// dpag med log par
274b3(rnying rgyud): 'khyams pa rnams// thabs kyis ma skyes sa la bkod// 'chi ba med pa'i chos spar thim// bde che nas la sbyor bar rigs// bde lam 'di las gzhan med do// a yi rang bzhin thog mtha' med// ta la pa yi mngon mtshan pas// rtog pa
274b4(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i spyod pa yis// ma lus mnyam pa nyid du sbyor// aM las dbyug btags dkar ldan sbas// ma lus mnyam pa nyid du sbyar// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yis// phyag rgya snying po ting 'dzin gyis// sgyu 'phrul dra ba gnyis med pa'i// go 'phang tshe
274b5(rnying rgyud): 'drir 'grub par des// chags pas sdang ba grol byed pa// mun 'gyur sprin dang bdud rtsi ltar// dka' thub tshogs dang bral ba yi// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi// gsang ba'i thabs la legs goms pas// nyi zla 'dres dang rtse zin par// thig
274b6(rnying rgyud): le zhe sdang bde bar thim// gsang ba de dag gnas pa na// nyon mongs dran rtog ma lus pa// mun pa la snang ba bzhin// gsang ba thabs kyi snang bar 'gyur// 'dod chags spang ba'i gang zag gis// thal ba'i rgyud la legs goms pas// 'dod
274b7(rnying rgyud): chags ma la 'dod spyad pas// zhing khams bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa yi// bde chen thig le khyab par ro// lus gnas lus las ma skyes pas// thams cad lhan cig skyes par gsal// phra las shes rab pha
275a1(rnying rgyud): rdol byin// kyes thathabs dang nus pa yis// rigs nges gsum dang ldan pa la// thabs kyi sbyor ba de bzhin bsams// chags pa spyad dang rlung gi thabs// dang ngo'i las can dag 'a ba'i phyir// mi yi tha mol
275a2(rnying rgyud): spyod pa// 'di dag thig le bzung phyir bsten// ting 'dzin ye shes lha mo la// brten pas sems kyi bde ba 'byung // rgyu 'bras zag pa khu ba med// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le la// brten pa med cing 'dzin pa med// yid dang ti 'dzin ye shes kyi//
275a3(rnying rgyud): yin lha mo la sbyar bas// bud shing me ltar rung tshig cing // zag pa med pa'i bde chen po// snang bu 'di las sa khams dang // dus khams zhing khams nam mkha'i khams// bde ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ma'ang thug par//
275a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i sa gsum ma lus pa// thabs kyis zin dang mdzichin las// 'phel 'gri ba zag pa yid min dang // 'ching grol khyad par 'a tshogs snang // thabs dang skyes bu'i khyad par las// ma lus 'de ma chog su ma'i phyir// gang yang mi bya ba med de//
275a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad rgyal ba'i mdzad par gnas// pad+ma thabs dang 'dus pa las// dbang po rnam shes yul las stsogs// tha dang grol bas ring log ste// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor gsal// lus dang sems dang ye shes kyi// brten pa gsum la ma
275a6(rnying rgyud): sbyor bas// 'du shes kun las rab grol te// thams cad bde ba chen por smin// shes rab pad+ma'i me long la// rdo rje gsang ba'i thabs bltas pas// bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan tshogs// mtha' dbus med par rang bzhin snang // bde ba
275a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin ni// snang ba ma yin me sdang min// mtha' bus zhen pa las 'das nas// thams cad pa de chen mnyam pa nyid// shes rab gsal ba'i me long la// skyes tha thabs kyis bde gnas shing // skyes thathabs kyi ban par// shes rab
275b1(rnying rgyud): du// gas su ston sa ldan
275b2(rnying rgyud): zhugs/ sa na /
