275b4(rnying rgyud): sa rgya slan pa'i sa / denapa pa la na /
275b5(rnying rgyud): blags smra/ sa da sa
275b6(rnying rgyud): ga gsu byung na la// byed bad// de'i mi kyi sa sa// yu du nyid/ kyis 'di'i
276a1(rnying rgyud): khams pa gnas // tug gta / la dogasapa/ ba // ga pa dza to / stong pa 'angs sprul// dang da
276a2(rnying rgyud): 'dags med 'jig pas na// rdzogs pa skyed par rol rte// malus pa mi skye par 'gyur// rang dag spyong pa'i gzugs pa 'aM// me zhes jig pa dang na// de seM 'o nga bcwas// rang bzhin las dang rnas par bcas
276a3(rnying rgyud): dang med pas nang du bshad// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa la// spyod yul thal pa'i gsung ba ste// b+hag bde rkyen po nyid// log bzhi ltar rang gnas pa// thabs dang ldan pas rtogs 'gyur gyi// dman pas rtogs par dag la 'gyur/
276a4(rnying rgyud): gang du yul dang phrad pa'i rtsa// dngas ma dga' 'a chags pa dang // rtsol bdi dgas chad pa'i sems// mi mthun pa nyid mthun 'gyur yang // thabs tha' rnams la mas btab bo// thabs dang shrIs rab ldan pa yis// dga' ba 'dul pa ga
276a5(rnying rgyud): pa// rtsa gcig par ni 'gyur ba'i tshe// sna tshogs dran pas ma zhi bar 'gyur// ro la dang 'khyud dang zhal stong dang // skye// dang 'jo ba blta da nga rtse// sA gas kyi nang spong ba yis// lus sems rkyen byas par 'gyur// gang du gyi nang rol pa
276a6(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab ldan pa la// gyi rlung dran pa sems lus pa// zhen pa rdzog ting dbang du 'dra// 'gres byed pa'i dus nyid ni// gang la 'jug pa'i yid spangs pas// rang byung thig le bsam ma khyab// de nyid ma rig la sogs brtsos
276a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'dus pa'i lhang pon// dzi ska da rten las ngab ste// so song dkyib mig nang ts+tsha // na rjenasepas la nga bzhi rdzogs// de phyir thabs dang sbyor ba yis// rjes las brgya gyis 'byur ba ltar/ Al na dbang po
276b1(rnying rgyud): rapa lnga// gang phyir bslab pa de bzhin snang // gsang chen thabs kyi rol pa'i rgyud// chags pas chags pa grol ba ltar// gang 'dir thabs dang bral ba yis// nam mkha' la ni me tog bzhin// rgyu dang ngo po nyid dag dang // mthar phyin thabs kyi d+hang /
276b2(rnying rgyud): dag gis// ma lus kun la khyab gnas pa// phrin las rol pa thabs kyi rgyud// rdo rje pad+ma nu ma skad// rkan dang lce dang thabs sbyar bas// me long la ni gzugs brnyan bzhin// pad+ma'i bde ba mngon du snang // thig le mngon du 'byung ba na// thabs
276b3(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab gnyis med pas// 'dren pa dang ni 'dzin pa dang // rtse dang sked pa rtsa ba dang // lte ba snyeng mgrin sgra mtshams su// thig le 'ong ba'i tshul gyis ni// bya ba'i thabs ni gang la yang // phrin las bzhi ni kun 'chang ste// thabs dang ldan pas
276b4(rnying rgyud): rnam dbye ba// ma nor don dang ldan pa yis// bdag dang lha dang sgyu ma dang // nam mkha' lta bur mthar phyin pas// bde chen rig pa rang gsal ba// phyogs dang bral bar rang bzhin snang // shes rab med pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bdag nyid bde bar
276b5(rnying rgyud): ldan pa'i phyir// rig pa'i lha mo bsten pa dang // brda' dang gzhib pas bde ba bskyed// de nas stong zhing mi rtog pas/ dbang po yul sems las gos chos// rang byung rang rig byang chub sems// dbyer med bde ba chen por bsgom// gang
276b6(rnying rgyud): dang gang du phrad pa las// de ni de yis der snang ltar// thabs chen rig pa mnyam sbyor las// rang byung bde chen gsal bar 'byung // dgug dang bkug dang 'thab pa dang // 'dren dang 'dzin dang bskyal ba dang // sbyang dang srel dang las
276b7(rnying rgyud): brtsams pas// bar chad med pa'i bde ba 'byung // gong du thabs chen ldan pa yis// yid 'ong mtshan ldan bu mo la// blta dang snyan dang 'grogs la sogs// bde chen bar chad med par gnas// gsang chen thabs kyi me long 'di// kun
277a1(rnying rgyud): la gnas kyang mi sdang ste// long ba gzugs dang 'phrad pa bzhin// de ltar bkas pas mthong bu med// thig le mnas dam gnas pa// dang po nas brtsams mthar phyin par// goms da
277a2(rnying rgyud): sa gong// lam gyi khyad par mthar sbyin 'gyur// las dang ris bgyi rlabs dang // ye shes rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs// dngos dang ting 'dzin pa zod pa// de du gsum par ris sbyor bas// yul dung can dang mun pa sogs// rim rang ba'i
277a3(rnying rgyud): 'phel ba yis// mthar thug lam la gnas par 'gyur// sangs rgyas lha ma rol pa yis// sbrul ldan rigs la dbang bskur bas// bcu gsum mdur phyin rkun grub pas// rig pa'i me tog stong pa la// bya byed med pa'i rang ba drin gyis/
277a4(rnying rgyud): yon tan sna tshogs gsal bar sdang // phyogs badz+ram lus sangs rgyas sras// mthar byin dbang gi sbyor ba ste// mthar thug pado ba'i nam mkha' la// nyim gyis brdal ba ltar// ye shes nAm mkhang mdang dbus med// rang byung ye shes
277a5(rnying rgyud): rang rag stong pa yul las 'das// rkyen rim pa kun dang ldan// dpag bas mya shing dang nor bu la// zhing khams nam mkha'i mthar thub pa// nyi 'od chu rlabs char bzhin du// 'phel 'grib med pa'i tshul du gnas// gang la 'di stong dbyer med
277a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis ka ma ye nAM gnyis med min// mtha' bus rtswa 'bras ri dgas sogs// srung rdzob med par rtag tu gnas// gsang ba'i yang gas de snying po ste// gas ba mngon phyir rlabs kyi d+hang// rdzu 'phrul zas che gas sha'i la/
277a7(rnying rgyud): 'an ga thabs kyi mchog/ bskal bar sbyangs kyang mi rtad la// bla ma'i man nga ga thabs can du// da nyi nyid du mngon par dang // myung hrul thal ba'i chud chen po las/ drin las bshad pa'i lang nyi drug pa // / de nas pa
277b1(rnying rgyud): yang bshad bya ba// thabs dang gA sA ba ldan pa so// rdo rje dang ni dril bu'i chad// denas lags par bgad byung // nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa yi// rdo rje thabras chen mA zhas te// rdul pa shes rab par la phyin// tshangad dang bral bar bshad/
277b2(rnying rgyud): bya yin// thabs chen bde ba rdo rje yis// nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa yi// bde ba ye shes tshad med pa// dpag med thog le bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba chen po bdag nyid can// gang du bde bas khyab pa'i gnas// dngos med shes dang /
277b3(rnying rgyud): rol phyin// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// nam mkha' lta burang rang bzhin gsal// chos nyid dbyings dang mnyam pa yi// bde ba chen po tshad las 'das// gang gis dpag par mi nus pa// bde chen dbyer med bsam las 'das// bdagra gzhan
277b4(rnying rgyud): byabs ma las 'das pa// yul dang dbang po sems la sogs// ji srid snang grags las 'das pa// de sred bde chen chos kyi sra// dngos dang dngos med gnyis las 'dus// thabs dang shes rab 'de ba'i mchog/ rdzu 'phral dra ba thabs kyi lam
277b5(rnying rgyud): gsang mchog thig le dbyings la rdzogs// 'gro 'ong dmigs rtog kun la 'das// dbang po rdo rje gsar ba'i bdag/ thams cad 'dus pa'i rang bzhin te// ma lus gcig pu gsal ba la// yul med bde bar rang bzhin gsal// shes rab dril
277b6(rnying rgyud): bupad+ma ste// chos dbyings b+ha ga gsang ba'i yum// gzhan yang thams cad 'dus pa ni// bde bskyed pa'i zhing du bshad// gsang dbang tshad ni mdzub gang ste// brgya phrag bye ba 'dus pa'i rtsa// thig le phra rags khyab byed pa// lus can thabs la rang
277b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin gnas// yul ni pad+ma sor bzhi ste// shes rab rang bzhin dri med de// bskal pa dpag med dul snyed kyi// bag chags bsal nas bde ba bskyed// rdo rje thabs kyi thig le nyid// phyogs bcu dra ba'i rang bzhin te// thabs la brten pa'i nyams myong
278a1(rnying rgyud): gis// thams cad bde chen rang bzhin gsang // gsang ba'i pad+ma'i rtsa thig le// zla brag brgya badz+ra kun 'dus pa// ma lus 'dus pa'i rtsa thig le// phyogs bcu kun nas byin gyis rlobs// gang phyir nyi zla gro 'ong gis//
278a2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i nyams la gang gnas pa// lo zla tshad dang grangs bral bar// mi 'gyur bde chen 'grub par 'gyur// thig le ro yis khyab pa yis// mtha' dbus gzhi rtsa med pa'i dbyings// rgya dbyibs tshod dang dral ba de// rang bzhin rtogs nas groms par
278a3(rnying rgyud): 'grub// lus dang rtsa dbyibs tshad ldan pas// thabs kyis rang snang mngon sum pa// TIg le'i rang bzhin ma gyes pas// ma lus ngag rtogs pad+ma can// thams cad bde chen mi rtog pa// thabs le shes rab sbyor ba dang // shes rab la ni thabs
278a4(rnying rgyud): sbyor zhing // gnyis med 'brel pa las byung ba'i// bde chen sems la sgom pa'o// jirje zla ba'i thig len// gong gi zabs la brten pa yis// ri mnas rim par mngon byas pa// mchags thabs kyi rol pa mdzod// gnyis med rol pa phyi rol
278a5(rnying rgyud): yul// mngon mkhyen thad ka'i dmigs yul bral// shes rab nyi ma la brten pas// mA lus bde chen thig ler gas la// lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o// thams cad thabs chen lam gnas pas// mi 'grub pa dang tshogs chen dang // dka
278a6(rnying rgyud): thub gdung ba las 'das shing // re dogs bral 'dod yon tan lngas// dka' thub med par tshe 'dis 'grub// gsar chen thabs kyis bskur ba ltar// snyigs mer bcas pa'i lus nyid ni// spangs pa med par bde chen 'grub// thig le chen pos gas
278a7(rnying rgyud): ba yi// phyi nang snod bcud 'jig rten kun// ma lus bde bar rang gsal bas// rtags zhes thabs kyis rang sa grel// bde ba la ni gang brten pas// rang lus thabs kyi rang bzhin las// me long bzhin dang 'phrad pa ltar// rang lus mngon du
278b1(rnying rgyud): sa nga ba sa// ra sa// sa sa// / sas dus pa // ba smrasas/ thal sa/
278b2(rnying rgyud): da mnyam pa ste// deb cad med pa shed de// me pa ba gagyigs pas byu // shes byang nga byu med pa// rtagazabapa la ma na pa // rnam ga samaN+Dal bu 'i \u0f7f// rnam mkhar ldan ma tog panan// pa ma tog rgyas pa la/
278b3(rnying rgyud): rnamachod dang bapyod pa dang // bsta dang brda ma dang pakhre ba dang bskyed// rtag tu bdag dang mnyam thor bas// bde cin nga nyams rtag 'ang // rnamam pa'i lta bu'i bde chen 'grub// dang po rgyang zad bded de// rtsigacig rig le lus byung ba// dz+ha
278b4(rnying rgyud): byazhi ldan rabasgyur bas// thabs kyi thig lce srin pa'i tshe// ri dgas 'jigs pa'i rnam tog dag/ thams cad bde ba chen por 'bar// de bas yon tan kun ShAnA paM// rnam g.yengs 'du bye dag cod byed cing // chags pas chags pa se la byed pa// mr-i
278b5(rnying rgyud): mo basbyin par gyi// was kyi nus pa brtan rdob pa// ting 'dzin btan pa las byung ba// nas d+hi zag pa las bung da'o// dag pa'i tha ma bsten par bya// le thabs la pa grangs med par// zag mid par btus bya zhing // mthar thug pade bgrub b+ha pa'i phyir/
278b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes sa ngas kyus btsun mo bsnyen// 'di la dga' dang mi dgang med// 'jigs dang bag na cung zad med// byag med cing brten pa zed// shangs nang dang khrag med cing // khrab med cing gzhung gci med// rnamam pa'i 'ang 'drang gzugs padan
278b7(rnying rgyud): snang ba bde bang pol byed cing // rgya mtsho chu 'ong bzhin du// gnas pas bde chen nam mkha' ltar// 'byung 'dug rgya rkyen na las 'das// mtha' dbus med pa'i byang chub sems// dus kun 'de chen dbyer med pas// rang byung ye shes yul zal po/
279a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis med ma yin gnyis pa min// bzhi bcu lnga sogs dus gsum chos// kun mkhyen ldan bral gnyis ka min// thog ma tha ma dbus med cing // spang ldan shes dang mi shes bral// gnyis med rang rig byang chub
279a2(rnying rgyud): sems// thams cad ma bcos thig le ste// gsang ba gsang chen dman yul min// thabs chen ldan pa 'ga' yi yul// bcud 'dus ye shes thig le che// 'phro 'du med pa'i rang bzhin las// phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor snang // snga
279a3(rnying rgyud): stong bsam pa'i yul brtags la// tha snyad mtshan ma ci yang rung // bde ba gnyis su mi phyed pa'i// ngo bo nyid kyi gsang mchog bde// gzhan gyis ma byas mi g.yo ba'i// rang rig bde chen sgyu 'phrul la// ngo mtshar rmed byung snang ba ste// ngo bo nyid kyi
279a4(rnying rgyud): yul las 'das// don dam ma bcos ma bslad pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te// dman dang tha ma la dka' thub ca naM// gang dag rnal 'byor spyod yul min// rdo rje nyi ma gsang ba'i bcud// zla ba thig le thabs kyis bzung // phyogs
279a5(rnying rgyud): cha khyab par gsal ba na// rang lus snyigs ma bde bar gsal// gdams te dang po 'og gi snod// thig le 'gro 'ong bcas pa rnams// mi 'gro rang la thi ma pa ltar// rtog pa lhan cig skyes par gsal// chags sdang zhen pa phrag dog rnams// dug
279a6(rnying rgyud): gis de nyid sel ba ltar// thabs chen dbang gi man+t+ra ngag gis// nyi 'od mun pa bzhin du sel// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba yi// gsang ba thabs lam snang ba ste// rdo rje'i tshig lam snod byed 'di// rtog ge daldan la mi brtan te// dbang dang man ngag
279a7(rnying rgyud): ldan pa la// byin rlabs nan tan chen por bya// nyi zla rgya mtsho phog pa sbyang // thig le 'gro 'ong med par bcings// rtse mtshon ma mkha'i mthongs la gtad// gling bzhi ri rab gcig tu bsdu// thabs la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// chags sngang
279b1(rnying rgyud): sogs mi dge chos// spyad pas mi ldog pha rol phyin// bad chen thabs su bshad pa yin// sgyu 'phrul sprul ba'i rgyung chen po las/ dbang po yul 'dus pa'i la'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ji skad
279b2(rnying rgyud): rjes rnams mtha' yas pa// yid deng chos su 'dus pa'i don// 'di ni nges par ba shad per bya// gang du gri nang bcas pa yi// blo yul cir yang snang ba ste// 'khor dang myung na 'das pa nyid// chos su snang bar 'dris pa yin// de yo rjes su ba
279b3(rnying rgyud): yis// dran rig gsal bar gang gyur pa// rang rig blo la mngon sdang ba// de la yid ches brjod pa yin// gang du snang ba thams cad kun// sems las gzhan na med pa'i phyir// nyi 'od rgya mtsho'i rlabs bzhin du// rang las byung zhing nyid la gnas// tong
279b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i bye brag thams cad kun// gnyis med dang la rang bzhin 'dus// ma lus yid dang chos 'dus pas// de yang ma skyes rang bzhin nyid// chos kyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa// rang byung ye shes dkyil 'khor snang // rang byung ye shes gnas med la// /
279b5(rnying rgyud): phyogs dang rgya dbyibs las 'das pa// ma rig ma skyes de bzhin nyid// sgyu 'phrul shes rab gsal bar snang // gang du rtogs dang ma rtogs las// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das par snang // kun 'byung yid kyi dkyil 'khor te// chos kyi yid der 'dus pa yin//
279b6(rnying rgyud): dngos po med las dngos por snang // dngos snang de bzhin yid kyi dbyings// thibs dang shes rab dbyer med pa// ma bcos rgyun gyi byang chub sems// yid kyi 'khor lo sgro phye bas// chos kyi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gsal// mkha' la 'byams shing sprin phung
279b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin// ma skyes sems las rnam par snang // rna tshogs dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang // sru dang gzhal las 'du 'gro yang // ma skyes dang rig byang chub sems// dbyeb med par rang bzhin gnas// ji snyed kyi skyed dmigs rtog kun// tshul chu dur rnam pa
280a1(rnying rgyud): ltar// rang bzhin med la gnas pa yi// yid dang chos su yang dag 'du// nang gi dkyil 'khor chos kyi gnas// 'od bzhi a sogs dbyibs su gnas// rtsa ba bzhi la yan lag brgyad// dang sa ma lnga dang snyigs ma
280a2(rnying rgyud): bcas// rnam shes bya ba'i rten du bshad// sa bon drug ste 'od bzhir ldan// snying pos mtshams sbyar 'od du 'bar// thig le gcig la thim pa yis// zag pa med pa'i ye shes skye// chos nyid yon tan ye shes bya// rang rgyud kun la gnas pa ni
280a3(rnying rgyud): su sun
280a4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// rang bzhin ngan dang ma sbyangs dang // dka' thub can dang dam med dang // zhen chags can dang phrag dog can// log sred can dang le lo can// log pa'i gang zag dbang sogs pa'i// dam pa min par shin tu spangs// 'di ni 'khor ba'i gzhol phyegs
280a5(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin log pa'i mthu ldan pas// gsang ba'i don la log pa yis// bdag gzhan gnyis ka ltung bar 'gyur// gsang chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste// thabs chen mngon srung bstun pa ste// ma lus bde chen rang snang ba// mngon snang gzhan gyi
280a6(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa// mnyam pa ltar med theg pang de// gang ltar snang pas pA 'i sbyin// gsang pa'i mchog tu 'di ba dang // thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// 'dod chags la brten padape yis// snod khrel da na pa rdza
280a7(rnying rgyud): de nyid rang byung nyid ces bya// me lus rol pa thabs kyi chud// gsang ba 'di ni shad pa yi cha// thabs dang shes rab thams cad kun// chags pa'i bde ba bskyed mdzad de// blta dang blta zhing 'dzum pa dang // la lar zhal 'a pa dang // la lar dam du
280b1(rnying rgyud): par byeng // brla ga tus dam par 'khyud pa yis// gsang dbang ba ng+gAs rbag brjod pas// rtanangs spyadang sapas byung rnams// nga byung ba bru dan pa rnams// thogs sbyo byung ba la// byud pa rnam pa nabs mtshan pas// byin yul sams mthus/
280b2(rnying rgyud): pa// lhan cig rgyas pa'i rang bzhin gsal// tsa yi sa bzhin mthong med pas// ma skyes sa yi de bzhin la// babs chen rang gis mtshon pa ni// thams cad ma n+tas kha'i gling // gsang ba thabs kyi nyams ldan pas// byi nang sna brgyad dgang yang /
280b3(rnying rgyud): al dkrug btags dkar ldan nyid// de nyid su 'phrul dra bar bshad// thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin la// thabs dang zhes rab mngon phyung bas// dbang po yul sems ldan pa la// bcu drug ye shes gas le'i b+ha// gnas deng gnas pa'i dbyings
280b4(rnying rgyud): can dang // rten dang brten pa'i thig le dag/ mkha' dbyings gsang bar brten pa las// rang byung ye shes thogs pa med// gsang ba thabs kyi thig le nyid// rang byung ye shes chags med pas// mkha' ltar kun la khyab byar kyang // rang bzhin man
280b5(rnying rgyud): pas rtogs mi 'gyur// gang la gsang ba'i thabs ldan pas// mun pa la ni ldeng bstar// bcas bsgyur med pa rung snang ba// snas thamachog ga na du bshad// b+hang thul zhal ba'i rgyad chen po las/ thabs dang bral bas mthol bar brtan pa
280b6(rnying rgyud): cad // dus ga / sa rgyas// sa rnams / da ga brdzun pa pas/ sa na sa
280b7(rnying rgyud): nga // mthas thabs na ste// byung gsang bri ma mang nyid// dbang ga tshul sems kyi mangs// gsang ba'i thabs kyis btsun pa// thams cad ma shes pa rdzo ga/ thangs ldanarnams la spang bar zung // ma yong sbyin par mdzod//
281a1(rnying rgyud): chen lus lnga rang bzhin rdzogs// me long bzhi la srog shing gsum// bskyod pa rlung sems sbyor ba yis// gsal ba ye shes re dogs bral// myur du 'byung bar mtsham med// thabs ldan rkyen gyis gsal byung na//
281a2(rnying rgyud): las dang nyon mongs gsal ba dang // ji ltar me la shing bsnan ltar// lhag pa'i ye shes gsal bar 'gyur// thabs lam gsal ba'i mar me 'di// rang byung lhan cig skyes pa mthong // ma chags thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// goms pa'i stobs la gnas
281a3(rnying rgyud): gyur na// ma lus ye shes chen po ste// snyun grub ye shes thogs pa med// thig le shu mo gyi 'od ldan pas// gang gis byed pa'i thabs ldan pa// de yis de 'dzag bde ba'i sems// snying por thim pas ye shes skyed// gnas pa zhi gar thabs ye shes las//
281a4(rnying rgyud): sems mtha' 'gro 'ong la gnas pas// ma skyes sems la gnas 'gyur zhing // ma lus dag par byin gyis rlobs// phyogs bcu snod bcud thig le kun// gsang ba thabs la mnyam sbyor bas// sprul pa'i thig le bsam mi khyab// 'dzin dang dbab pa'i
281a5(rnying rgyud): thabs las byung // gsang gsum thabs kyi spyod pa 'di// thabs ldan rnams la mngon sum ste// skal med man ngag bral ba la// bskal pa bye bar snang mi 'gyur// bskal ba zhing gi rdul snyed du// rgyal ba bla ma mnyes byas shing // dbang dang man ngag le sbyangs pas/
281a6(rnying rgyud): ci dgar spyad pas bde bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga ldan zhing // na so lang tsho dar la bab// pho mo chags pa brten pa dag/ gsang ba'i lam 'dir myur du 'grub// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// 'dod chags rol pa'i stobs ldan pas// bskyod pa chung
281a7(rnying rgyud): gi thogs med cing // rdo rje rtsa la 'jug pa yis// gsang ba'i thig le 'gro 'ong med// rgyu ba'i chung la rang chad nas// spyod yul bde ba chen por thim// 'dod chags ldan pa'i gang zag la// skabs dang rim pa'i bye brag gis// btsun mo gsum du bstan pa d+hi/
281b1(rnying rgyud): snang ba'i zhen pa ldog par byed// gang la snang ba'i zhen pa dag/ ma lus bde chen rang rig ste// bsam brjod zhen pa kun las 'das// thogs med ldan pa'i gang zag la// thogs med 'od gsol byang chub sems// dbang yul thig le rtsar phrad pas// gzung ba
281b2(rnying rgyud): med cing gtong ba med// rang byung rig pa bdir gnas pas// thams cad ma skyes ngo bo nyid// rdo rje nyi zla'i thig le la// ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pas// spyod yul mtshan mji skyed pa// lhan cig skyes pa 'char bar 'gyur// gang du thabs dang ldan pa la// phyi nang
281b3(rnying rgyud): spyod yul bcas pa kun// bde chen gsang ba mngon sum ste// 'khrul dang log pa'i spyod yul min// b+ha ga gsum la mnyam sbyar bas// rig par byed pa chen po skye// rig pa rtog gis zil mnan pas/ mkha' ltar bde ba chen po 'grub// bsam
281b4(rnying rgyud): longs spyod kun ldan pa'i// bde chen rang rig snying po la// ma lus bde chen gsal ba la// wang len dgag sgrub kun dang bral// thig le las ni nyams bskyed zhing // de nyid bde chen mi rtog pa// rang byung ye shes nam mkha' nyid// rtogs goms gsal
281b5(rnying rgyud): bas lhun gyis grub// nam mkha' lta bur bdag med cing // bya byed mtshan ma'i yul las 'das// bde ba chen po 'pho 'gyur med// rgyu rkyen zag pa 'du 'phro med// thig le chen po kun khyab pas// rang bzhin 'phro 'du kun dang bral// ma skyes rang
281b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin dbyer med la// gcig dang du ma'i cha shas med// gsal ba'i yid kyi thig le la// rang drag gsal bas gnas pa'i tshe// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// rang byung ye shes gsal bar skye// rang byung ye shes dbyer med pa// nam mkha' lta bur
281b7(rnying rgyud): dpag med cing // brjod cing bstan par mi nus pa// byin rlabs nyams kyis gsal bar mthong // gsang chen thabs kyi nyams myong bas// rgyu ba phyi nang rang bzhin 'chad// re dogs 'du shes stong par thim// rgyu rkyen bral ba'i ngo bor smin// gsang
282a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i thabs kyis gang sbyar ba// g.yo dang mi g.yor bcas pa dag/ ma lus bde chen rang bzhin te// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gnas// phyi nang snod btud ma lus pa// gsang ba'i snod bcud thig le yis// thabs dang nyam pa
282a2(rnying rgyud): sa/ ga sa latshogs sa gas/ sa da smras
282a3(rnying rgyud): rlung la dbang bsgyur bas// ma lus lhan cig skyes pa ste// rgas dang rgud dang dman pa dang // ma ning la sogs bcad pa yis// thabs dang man ngag la gnas pas// ji ltar bsgrub kyang tshe 'dis 'grub// rang lus thabs kyi mchog nyid de// mo so ngo bor rnam
282a4(rnying rgyud): par bstan// gzhan du dman pa'i rnal 'byor pas// nam yang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// bde ba chen po gsal 'gyur zhing // dbang bskur man ngag la gnas pas// dka' thub gdung ba spangs pa yin// bar chad med par 'grub 'gyur te// gsang snga
282a5(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi rgyal po 'di// su gsung thugs la rtag gnas shing // 'dod lnga bde la gnas pa yi// sku 'phrul dra bar thabs kyis 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'di// lus gnas zabs kyis ma rtogs pa// bsam pa'i spya 'phrul la brten cing // cho ga
282a6(rnying rgyud): zabs chen ldan pas 'grub// rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab ldan// dbang la brten nas goms paM yis// thams cad bde chen rgyas btab pas// bdung dang zhen pa kun las 'das// kun 'byung ba yi su 'phrul che// mnyama'i mnyam par mi gnas pa'i//
282a7(rnying rgyud): ma skyes 'di chen thig le 'di// rna tshogs snang zhing nyid la rdzogs// sku 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ skal ldan grol ba'i me skyebacu dgung // / de nas gzhan yang ba shad byung // chags pa'i thabs zin las byung ba// gas
282b1(rnying rgyud): 'phral dam pa 'di// sangs rgyas kun ci ba shad pa yin// dus gsam gdul bu byed par rnams// 'dod dang theg pa la mos pas// rdul skyed sangs rgyas thams cad than// sgyu ma snar nas rol par 'gyur// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rdul snyed pa/
282b2(rnying rgyud): zheng khams bye ba rdul snyed du// zhing dang longs spyod dga' bar bcas// thabs kyis rol pa mdzad pa yin// gang du thabs dang shes rab kyi// thig le dga' ba der bcas pa yi// zhing khams phyi nang snod bcud bcas// bde chen lhan cig skyes par
282b3(rnying rgyud): la// ma lus ji snyed snang ba kun// dri med thig le las 'byung zhing // tha dad med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// gsang ba'i thig ler rang bzhin 'jug/ rgyal ba rdul snyed btsun mor bcas// lha dang lha mo 'khor lor bcas// bde ba rim gyis gang ba
282b4(rnying rgyud): yis// dga' dang blta dang 'khyud pa dang // 'o dang 'khor dang 'bud 'jo dang // zhal sbyor brtsed 'am nye ba dang // 'ji ba dang b+ha ga gar 'dzin ston// rol pa'i gar nI sna tshogs ston// gsung ni 'jam zhing mnyen pa yis// phra zhing dal pa'i klu blangs te// 'jam
282b5(rnying rgyud): zhing chags pa'i tshig dag gis// gzhan yang yid 'pham rmongs par byed// bde ba chen po rang 'bar bas// nam mkha' mtha' ltar mi gnas pa'i// rang bung thig le mi g.yo ba// tha ma zhen pa kun las 'das// re dang dogs pa kun zhi ba'i// rang byed ye
282b6(rnying rgyud): shes gnas pa yi// bde tshogs rgyu 'bras kun dang bral// gsang chen bde ba'i ngo bo nyid// gsang chen rig par rang gsal ba// stong dang bde bar mi phyed pa'i// mkha' ltar rdul bral mi gnas pa// bde ba chen po'i ngo bor gnas// rdo rje thig le mi phyed
282b7(rnying rgyud): gzugs// rang byung bde bar kun snang nas// 'jug dang mi 'jug yul las 'das// dus gsum 'jug pa yongs kyis med// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo nyid// bskal pa mi 'gyur thog ma la// skal ldan mngon rdzogs rgyal po yis// rdul snyed do/
283a1(rnying rgyud): rje 'dzin pa la// 'dod 'dzin zhen pa grol ba'i thabs// man ngag dbang gi thabs kyis bstan// thog mtha' med pa'i bde ba che// rang nyung thig lebasam mi khyab// chags bral chags chen 'dul ba'i phyir// thabs chen
283a2(rnying rgyud): grol ba sna tshogs kyis// 'gro ba thabs kyis grol mdzod phyir// rdo rje 'chang ba'i 'khor tshogs la// 'das pa'i rgyal ba kun gyis bshad// sku 'phrul rol pa chen po 'di// ma lus 'dus pa'i thabs yin te// gsang ba nyams las mngon snang gis//
283a3(rnying rgyud): rtog ge dman pa'i spyod yul min// gang du zabs kyi sdang ba 'di// snga rabs 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// 'dod chags bde bar rgyas byed pa// gsang ba'i thabs chen chud 'di bshad// de dag thabs kyis gsal bar byed// de dag kyang la thab
283a4(rnying rgyud): mtshon pa// mi 'dul log par 'jug par 'gyur// bde chen rol pa'i rang bzhin 'di// thabs chen dbang gi rang bzhin pa// ting 'dzin rgud pa'i thabs kyis gsal// gzhan du sus kyang rtogs mi 'gyur// bskal pa grangs med rdul bral du// mig dman
283a5(rnying rgyud): dka' thub rtog ge yi// byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs pa// gsang ba'i thabs kyis mngon du 'char// ye shes dag dang ting 'dzin chud// las kyis gang la gsal byas pa// dngos po ji snyed ma lus pa// bde ba chen po nyid du 'gyur// 'di la khras dang gtsa
283a6(rnying rgyud): med// cho ga sngags dang phyag rgya med// 'jigs dang ngo tsha zhen pa med// rang byung bde ba nyid du gsal// sku 'phrul dra ba zabs chen po// mA lus bcud 'dus thig le la// ye shes rdzogs pa'i ro ldan pa// gsang sngags grags kyis mngon sum gsungs// tho
283a7(rnying rgyud): med pa'i rgyal ba rnams// thabs dang shes rang rol pa les// bde ba chen po las byung ba'i// zhing khams rgyalang nyid du snang // gsang ba'i ye shes bde ba'i mchog/ ma lus thig le gcig 'dus pa// thabs dang ldan pa'i snod ngabachud pas// malus lhan ci
283b1(rnying rgyud): par gsal// ma lus rol pa parda mchog ste// rgyal ba rnal 'byor chen po rnams// bde ba chen por gcig pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa nyid// rang byung lha 'phrul dra ba las// ti zla thags kyis gang mtshon pa// zhing khams lus su bcas pa dag/ zag med
283b2(rnying rgyud): bde bar snang ba dag/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa// gang yin thabs kyis bon rnams// rdul snyed grangs las 'das pa rnams// rdo rje ye shes hU~M tshogs kyis// 'dres dang 'dzag pa'i thig le can// phyag rgya la dang bcas pa yis// thams cad rang rig gi
283b3(rnying rgyud): su snang // bcud gsum las skyes bde ba la// rig pa bzhin du nyams gsal ba// phyi nang thig ler brtan 'gyur na// mi shigs thig le 'pho 'gyur med// mi 'gyur 'gro 'ong gnas dmigs bral// rten gyi thig le gnas gsum du// byed pa sdom pa zabs
283b4(rnying rgyud): dang bral// snod bcud bde bar snang byed pa// mun sdang gsar 'gyur lta bur bshad// bskal pa grangs med 'das pa yi// bye phrag brgyad cu la sogs pa// zhing khams rdul snyed ma lus pa// thabs mchog rol pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs// gsang ba'i gsang
283b5(rnying rgyud): gleng don 'di gsungs// ye shes mngon snang thabs kyi lung // ma lus bde ba rgyas byed pa// skal ldan rnams kyi blo la snang // sangs rgyas bde ba chen po 'di// byang chub rdo rje bcas pa la// thabs ldan gsang chen 'di gsungs te// gzhan pa dag la ma
283b6(rnying rgyud): gtogs so// dpal ldan thabs kyi rgyal po 'di// slob dpon dam par mi 'dzin cing // dam dang man ngag med pa la// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde chen 'di// bskal par mtshon kyang mi mthong ngo // rig pa zabs kyi brtul zhugs 'di// gang gis spangs te mi sbyor
283b7(rnying rgyud): do// ji ltar nam mkha'i mtha' 'tshol ltar// byang chub 'bras bu cung zad med// 'das dang da ltar mgyon pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// bde ba chen po mngon phyung ba'i// gsang ba'i thig le thabs kyi chud// 'gro bzhin cing chags pa dang / tha
284a1(rnying rgyud): kyis mngon par grol byed pa// lhag pa'i lta ba gsal byed cing // spong barmad krung mthu yis ni// ma lus byin rlabs bde 'byung zhing // ye shes ka li 'khor lo bskor// ma lus bde chen spang ba la// mi mthun tha dad yod
284a2(rnying rgyud): yin// sgyu 'gul thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ 'das pa'i rgyal ba thabs kyi grol ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// da ltar phyogs bcu rdul snyed kyi// zhing khams phyi nang sdod bcud bcas// sangs rgyas su
284a3(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa bshad// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rmad thung gsang ba bla na med// sku 'phrul dra ba chos kyi dbyings// gang du dmigs pa med pa ni// bde ba chen pos khyab pa ste// dbang dang ma nang ga la brten pa'i// dgongs pa thabs kyi khyad par gyis// sa
284a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gsang ba mngon du 'chad// kun tu sgyu 'phrul zab mo 'di// dbyer med dra ba don chen po// thog mtha' med pa'i don chen po// rang bzhin thabs kyi stobs las snang // thig le snod bcud bcas pa yi// ma lus thams cad dkyil 'khor nyid// rang la
284a5(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i bde ba ste// sA lu'i khrod dang mar me bzhin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// phyi nang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// rgyal na kun grong bor bshad// nam dag blan med pa yi// sa dang rnam tha ji snyed par// ma lus pa yi thabs las thus
284a6(rnying rgyud): dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin mchog/ sgyu 'phrul thal chen rang bzhin las// dra ba shes rab gsal bar 'gyur// gnyis med rlig le las phyung ba// gsang chen thig le las kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// ma lus thig leng de
284a7(rnying rgyud): po// phyogs brgya rgyal ba'i rang bzhin nyid// rang bung thabs kying por gnas// gnyis med thabs las rung ba yi// byang chub thig les chud lis zung // zla ba nyi ma brdzogs pa las// dra ba bcas pa'i ye shes nyid// rang snying thig la bcas pa yi// 'bab
284b1(rnying rgyud): 'dogs gar las dbang bsgyur ba'i// ye shes ra byung thogs pa med// gsang ba'i thabs dang log rtog nyid// nyi zla phrad pa'i bzung bzlog gis// bar chad mang ba'i lam las zung // gsang ba'i sa dang sems nyid rdzogs// log rtog 'gro dang thig ler bcas/
284b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i gnas nas gnas spyod pa// rtse nas rtse ru thog pa med// btugasums la the tshom med// phyogs bcu rnal 'byor pho mo dag/ bde ba chen po dbugs phyung bas// rlung dang thig le sems su bcas// ma rtogs skye la dbang thob pas// rdzogs pa'i thig
284b3(rnying rgyud): le gang bskul bas// nyi zla 'bres pa'i gar las byung // gsang ba'i byang chub thog le ni// zag pa med pa'i thabs kyis mtshon// thabs kyi rdzu 'phrul mthar phyin pa// mthong ba'i don nyid ye shes rdzogs// phyag rgya mtshon pa'i ngo bo las// bde ba chen por rgyas btang
284b4(rnying rgyud): pas// gang yang mtshon pa las 'das pas// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo rags la// da ltar phyogs bcur mtha' yas pa// rang byung thig le rang snang bde// me long dang ni gzugs btsun ltar// gsang ba'i thabs la brten pa mthong // gsang chen thabs kyis
284b5(rnying rgyud): sku 'phrul pas// ma bcos dra ba mtshon par snang // rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa ni// ma lus gcig dang tha dad min// gsang gsung thabs la brten pa yis// skye ba 'di yis rnamang grol// dngas ma'i thig le bcud 'dus pa// thabs kyi snying por goms
284b6(rnying rgyud): pos na// radang byung rig pa bde chen po// 'gro 'ong re dogs med pas gsal// bdag nyid ma lus kun snang ba// zhen pa rang gi ngo bor ldog/ zhen pa ma bcos rang snang bas// thams cad lhan cig skyes par gsal// pad+ma rdo rje la brten pa'i// thabs kyi lam
284b7(rnying rgyud): la brten pa yis// rig pa phyi nang bcas pa'i sems// ma lus pade chen ngo por grol// thams cad bde ba chen po la// zhen pas brtags pa dang snang ba// dngos med dngos min gnyis ka men// thabs dang shes rab sgor med pa'o// gang du rig pa dbyer med na//
285a1(rnying rgyud): dadanan stong pa'i tshig la la// mkha' ltang ngas dang dus mengs su// 'di ny-id thA dzada'o// sangs sa can dang byung mad pa 'o/ thig legs pa'i bdag nya ni// thams cad ba byin nang 'ad// thams da
285a2(rnying rgyud): rgyam d+hA // dang byung rig 'a ba ga / nang gas pa'i na a// shes pa gang 'gams pa mas/ sa nyid du za pa // phyog she sa sun nas/ sgyu 'phrul ba na mas shing sa gsal
285a3(rnying rgyud): brtan no// mig la ba tung da ba'i yid// sangs rgyas pan sde bdag nyid 'grub// gsang yong byabs rol pa yi// bde rten ma ma nyid// dal ni man pa'i yul man// / rdorje ni chen pa mas pa'i yul// TI gan po jig yodzi
285a4(rnying rgyud): dus gsum rgyal pa'i bdud yin te// man dag zabs dang 'brel ba yis// lhag bsngal med par rtogs shing 'grub// rang lus thabs kyi rgya'abo la// chags pa thabs ldan gang zag gis// 'dod la rol pas pa der srung na// tshe 'di nyid la 'grib par 'gyur// ba
285a5(rnying rgyud): chen dral pa'i thabs med na// pham la zhen pa'i sngang bra la// thang pa kye zag ci brten kyang // spun gru brdo rje chang dang bral// rdo rje pad+ma ldan 'phrur zhing // byin rnapas thabs kyis gang rjo na// pad+ma la ni 'ang mo bzhin du// khong ba de bachen po rang ra
285a6(rnying rgyud): ba cid tu me mtshungs med pa'i// gAsang bya'i ci na ma 'di// drag gisangag da pal bstod// thabs rje chog tu shes par bya// ska la ming ngaman dang dbang med pang // log par gyur pa'i gang zag sas// bskal ba bya bar ci san // lob pA
285a7(rnying rgyud): dasrung bar 'gyur// rang byung bang ba'i 'arjor pon// rdum gas lugs gang gnapapa// ma chenathangs mtshan pa/ man ga dngas shes par bya/ byung ba ba / gdugs pa ga shing gdu
285b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes bcas// rdza ltar gas pa zhing gcig tu thim// bde bas bde ba gsal byed pa/ dkra' rdzab 'jig rten chos dang bral// gang zag chags dang bral ba'i yig/ bde chen rdol pa'i thabs 'jug cing // man ngag thabs kyis bde spyad na// thams cad pa
285b2(rnying rgyud): chen bzhin du spyor// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung mchog ste// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'di// skra dang tshad makun spangs nas// rol pa'i thabs chen ldan pas gsungs// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i thig po chen po ni// mngon pas
285b3(rnying rgyud): mthong bas go'i min te// las dang yon tan mtha' bral zhing // dngas pa ye shes 'khor lo bskor// 'dod pa wa yis brgyan par gnas// nyi zla gsang ba'i pad+mar ldan// dga' zhing ldan pas gang 'jug na// thig lo gong 'og 'bab pa la// dga' ba btud
285b4(rnying rgyud): dang mtshungs par gnas// mdags bcu drug gres par bya// gsang ba'i ye shes lnga ldan pas// kun tu khyab cing bar ma chad// thun mong thun mong ma yin pas// sprul pa'i phreng ba rgyan ma bcad// gsang ba rang byung snying po la// rang bzhin thabs kyi khyad par dgyes//
285b5(rnying rgyud): bcings par rnam par grol ba'i thabs// ma lus 'dir ni shes par bya// de nas gzhan yang bshang thub// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi// b+hi dang lha mor gnas sdud pa'i// skyes bri thabs kyi rang bzhin te// brang med shes rab shes par bya// gsang ba'i thig
285b6(rnying rgyud): lo jog min gnas// las dang yon tan cher ldan zhing // do dang nyams dang ye shes nyid// snying po thig le kun nas zlum// dga' bzhi thig le kun dpral// haM zla pa d+ma'i rang bzhin kyang // gnas te thu gsung thugs nyid du// rang bzhin thabs dang 'phral bar bshad
285b7(rnying rgyud): tham pa na du chung byed// nga sa gas myong babring// ga 'i sa mam / gso nyis nga // thags pa ca pa chung gyur te// sad ba bldan pa dag // las da 'o ta sa dgas//
286a1(rnying rgyud): pan 'a kyi la kho ba// bad ma ngal pa did gsungs te// dpas gzhan dang 'bral ba yis// bskal pa bye bar gas 'gyur// b+ha 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud can pa las/ dAk+tar rnal 'byung thabs kyis thal bar rgya te tha
286a2(rnying rgyud): gcig pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bye ba// thabs chen gsang ba'i rnam pa ste// gsang ba brtul zhugs rol pa 'di// kun gyi phyi ma rig pa mchog/ ma lus kun las mchog 'gyur zhing // thabs mchog pade chen phyag rgya mchod// ma lus
286a3(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi byin rlabs kyis// bdag gzhan bde chen phyag rgya sems// rgyal bkun gyi sku gsung thugs// ma lus rol pa thugs nyid 'di// skal ngan dman dang rigs chang dang // byis pa rgan po ma ning dang // dka' thub ltang na rnam par spang // thabs chen yid
286a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin nor bu 'di// zab dang 'phel 'grib mi gnas dang // rngabs chen ga pa lda ni spyod yuld// gzhan la mi gnas spyod yul min// bskal pa phye bar mi 'byang ba'i// las da nyon mongs sdug bsngal dang // sgrib pa bag chags thams cad kun// thabs
286a5(rnying rgyud): chen gsang bas mngon du spel// dka' thub gdung bas lus gzir cing // lces sems drug bsngal dbang bsgyur ba'i// sangs rgyas sbas su byur pos kyang // phyogs tsam dog par rdul ma yin// spyan kyis spangs pa'i chags sdang // 'dod lnga dran togarma
286a6(rnying rgyud): rags bcas// thabs kyis de dag zil mnan nas// rnal 'byor bde ba'i pha rol phyin// tshong ma gzhan da bral ba ma// dang rig pade chen byung chub sems// rdo bo rtog dpyod las 'das pa// gro 'o mi yul bsam pas 'das// thams cad byang chub kying
286a7(rnying rgyud): po mchog/ gang phyir bde ba ye shes ni// cho ga zabs las shes par 'gyur// thabs bral thabs las rnam par 'jog// rang bzhin thabs kyi pha rol phyin// thabs chen bde bas gang rtogs pa// bde bas dka' thub zil gyis gnon// sbyang phul dra ba mngon
286b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa// thabs chen gsang ba'i thig le ni// rtogs shing goms par grol 'gyur te// gzhan gyis nam yang 'grub ma yin// rang bzhin rtogs goms byin rlabs kyis// dper na nyi 'od rin chen bzhin// las dang bsod nams rkyen dag las// chu dang ma po
286b2(rnying rgyud): gzugs brnyan ltar// dngos po ji ltar gsal ba ltar// thabs dang man ngag stobs kyis dgrub// sgyu 'phrul chen po thig le nyid// drabs dang shes rab gsal 'gyur bas// bde ba gsal la mi rtog pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs du sbyang // rang nyid
286b3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya stobs chen gyis// mi mthun pa nyen po bral ba las// thobs chen gsang ba mthar phyin pas// man dag ldan pas 'grub 'gyur te// rang rig yon tan mngon ldang bzhin// bye brag brgyad rgyal sogs pa// bstan pa'i khyad par ci rnyed pa// 'dral ba
286b4(rnying rgyud): dbang gis snang ba ste// gsang ba 'dis ni rtogs par 'gyur// gang med de nyid mi 'byung phyir// dper na lus dang yan lag bzhin// dus gsum sangs rgyas bstan par bcas// rang byung bstan pa rgya mtshor 'dus// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas par//
286b5(rnying rgyud): thabs dang dka' bas gang btsal bas// zab mo'i thabs rgyud mi mthong ste// zab mo rgyal ba'i dgongs par bshad// phyi nang gsang ba la sogs pa// thabs chen bstan pa gang gsungs pa// thams cad yan lag snang ba ste// kun gyi snying po 'di gsungs
286b6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// zhing khams phyi nang bsam yas par// gleng gzhi gleng bslang rtog pa dang // cho ga'i dkyil 'khor grangs med par// thams cad 'dir gnas pa nyid do// 'das dang ma byon da ltar ba'o// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor thams cad kyi// lam mchog gsang ba 'di
286b7(rnying rgyud): yin te// 'byung gnas 'byung nyid de phyir ro// khyad par thabs chen sgyu 'phrul 'di// gsang ba'i gsang mchog dam pa 'di// gzhan dang dbang po dman pa dang // ma dag pa la ma gnang ngo // rnal 'byor gsang bar zhugs rnams kyis// gsang chen rol pa'i thal
287a1(rnying rgyud): chud las// dbang dang man dag stobs kyis btag/ mo 'di nyid la 'thub par 'gyur// dka' thub gdung ba kun bral zhing // longs spyod ldaldan rdzo ga yas// 'dus pa med pa'i spyod pa yis// 'ji gra med par rnam par bral//
287a2(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' lta bar ga rtogs pas// rdul po'i spyod pa la brten na// bar chad med pa rags la goms pas// yid bzhin nor bu lta bar 'gyur// gzhan yang gsang chen thig le ni// gsang ba'i yid 'phrog thabs kyi rlung // ma lus thabs kyis rol spyad na//
287a3(rnying rgyud): skad tsog tsam gyis grol bar 'gyur// ma lus 'ching ba srel gyi drug/ rgyal ba'i dgongs pa sa dbang bsgyur nas// phyi na yul sems sdong bzung bcas// thabs chen bde bar mngon dugs lnga// bye ba brgya zag mar po'i tshogs// lha rnasas dang ni rnam
287a4(rnying rgyud): da nas / da sa kyi gyu // sa /
287a5(rnying rgyud): gsang chen rnal 'byor spyod pa 'di// dga' dang sbyangs pa'i rang bzhin las// gzhan dang byis pa rnga ma la dang // spro sbyar ye gar gnas la sogs// byinan par chad 'byung 'gyur te// dmyal ba yi dwags byol sor sogs// bskal pa rdul sbed gan
287b1(rnying rgyud): te// bdebs phongs pa nyid du 'gyur// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// sbyangs dang bsags pa gang yin pa// skal ldan 'ga' yi spyod yul te// bsgrub byar 'bras bustong bo nyid// gsang nga chen po thal ba'i rgyud// ma lus dag pa'i 'jig tad da /
287b2(rnying rgyud): skad cig byin rlabs snang mdzad pa// gsang chen rmad byung theg par bshad// bla 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gsang ba theg chen bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad d+ha ga// tog pa kun las rab
287b3(rnying rgyud): 'das pa// brtag pa kren kyang bo nyid// sku 'phrul du bas mngon sdang ba// sangs rgyas kun rje rang bzhin ni// dag dang mang ga khyad par gyis// drin yul sems dbang por bcas// ma bcos rang rig dbyings su 'dus// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yang //
287b4(rnying rgyud): gzhi na med dbyings skad cig ma// me gnas tshul gyis gnas 'gyur te// de la gnas pa gang yang med// 'byung ba ma dang phung po lnga// khams dang sbo mched la sogs pa// thabs dang shes rab ldan byung ba'i// gnyis su med par rang bzhin gnas// rgyas
287b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul snyed pa// zhing dang longs spyod mdzad pa dang // ma lus gnyis med sdang ba ste// dbyer med rig pa rang snang ngo // phye dang nang dang yul sems dang // ji snyed spyod yul 'gyur ba kun// nam mkha' la ni gza' sbyar ltang // chos kyi dbyings
287b6(rnying rgyud): las don 'byung ste// bya byed med pa rang gis sdang // phyi nang gsang bar bcas pa yi// kun gzhi thabs kyis gsal byas pas// ma sras rang sdang 'jig rten pas// srang dang spang bar bya ba med// dbang po yul dus rnam shes tshogs// ma lus gnyis me
287b7(rnying rgyud): rang snang ba// skyes bu thabs kyi spyod yul te// skal ldan dag gis shes par bya// thugs kyi bde ba chos kyi dbyings// rang rig bsam pa'i yul las 'das// de nyid ji ltar gsapa bsgyur// thabs kyi rdzu 'phral sde tshogs 'dzin// gang dag gang la dang
288a1(rnying rgyud): ba ni// 'di ni dbang po mchog tu gsungs// brten pa'i shes rab bcas pa yi// dmigs par bya ba'i yul nyid do// skyed chos rnams bsam yas ra// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'o// rten gyi byang thams cad kyang // dbang po
288a2(rnying rgyud): smra bang shA/ la nga/ ga tugasas// /
288a3(rnying rgyud): sgra tshul pas// ji da chos can rang bzhin 'char// thams cad rtsig 'di rten pa// yul dbang sbyin slob su med// 'byung thabs kyis 'gyur ni// dkyil 'o na gyi 'angs rgyad // thabs dang zhes rab rjel pa lngas// 'arjes kyang bzhin gas
288a4(rnying rgyud): med pade rol pa'i mchog// gsang ba dbang gicog las// bde chen lam la bar chad med// dbang po mchog gi yul du gyung // de bas gnon gyi snod lung chen// sangs rgyas dun gyis byin brlangs pa'i// rang dge bde chen gnyis med 'di// mnang gzabs
288b1(rnying rgyud): mtshon pa las// tshig dang yi ge'i spyong yul man// ma lus gsang ba'i rang bzhin la// gsang bzabs kyis gang mtshon na// bgachags bsal ba'i ye shes kyis// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gsal// zabs chen rol pa mngon bstan pa'i// gsang
288b2(rnying rgyud): bkun 'dus thabs kyi gyud// skal ngan dman la sdus pa ste// thabs chen ldan pas shes par bya// phye med sgyu 'phrul dra bA las// thabs chen rol pa'i cho 'phrul gyis// 'gro ba chags pa can don du// sna tshogs 'gro ba 'dul bar mdzad// sna chags bdud
288b3(rnying rgyud): ldan thig le yis// 'khor po yul dang dbang po chos// thabs chen las byung bde ba yis// rig pa'i 'khor li khengs pa yis// phyi nang yul sems chos rnams kun// ngo bo bde chen mya ngan 'das// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi// dbang po yul
288b4(rnying rgyud): sems ldan pa la// lus dang sems yas chung ba kun// rgyamatsho'i rlabs deng tshwa chu ltar// rang bzhin bde ba chen por thim// btags pa'i bye brag sna tshogs pa// ngo bo nyid ni cir snang yang // rang bzhin dang la dbyer med de// thams cad ma bcos rang bu ni// ma byas
288b5(rnying rgyud): rang byung dang snang bas// yul dang dbang por bcas pa kun// ngo bo gcig tu gsal bar gnas// ma lus ye shes brda' las 'das// ma lus ye shes rang sdang zhing // sgyu 'phrul thabs kyi me long la// dra ba gzugs brnyan rang bzhin 'char// sgra 'phrul
288b6(rnying rgyud): thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rdo rje dril bu tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gang dag don la 'gal byed cing // thams cad log pa'i dbang song ba'i// spyod pa de yi 'bras bu bshad// rang
288b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin dbyer med don gcig las// log pa'i rtog la zhe na dbang gis// dbyer med mnyam pa'i rang bzhin las// bdag gzhan bde sdug sna tshogs snang // log rtog rgya 'bras zhen brtags pa// dngos med log rtog brtags dbang gis// bag chags
289a1(rnying rgyud): gan gas sa dbang gas sa// 'khor ba dang bzhin gas par d+ham// thams cadagasang pa 'ang bzhan 'as// dag pa'i byu pa byung ba// dang ga yo gas ba da// ngas mad dang ga nga nan nyid//
289a2(rnying rgyud): mthong tha dad dbang dang ldan// rang bzhin don las spangs don ci// dgag bsla ba don la ngas brtson nas// gnyen po'i thabs kyis gang sbyangs pa// rang ga rang la bcings pa yin// dka' thub sdom pas gzing ba yis// las dang byab la brten
289a3(rnying rgyud): pas// gnyis kan la 'byor la btsun pas// 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa yin// gsang ba thabs kyi rnal 'byor pas// gang la brten nas rtogs goms pas// dka' thu rtsol ba kun spangs nas// cho ga cig 'bras bu dang las 'byung // slob dpon
289a4(rnying rgyud): thabs la mkhas pa dang // cho ga'i drim pa dang ldan pas// gang ltar brtsam pa de bzhin du// nges par 'byung bar tho tshom med// log pa'i dbang du zhugs pa dang // gang du byangs min rang bzhin dan// le log yengs pas bsdus pa dang // 'khor ban+da ni
289a5(rnying rgyud): yun ring gnas// byang chub sems ni ma phyes shing // dang dang dmachog ring spangs shing // rnga ma dag la rgyub kyis phyogs// dbang dang man ngag mi ldan par// gsang sngags ring bcos 'jal bar byed// log pa'i spyod pa'i dbang song ba// 'di lta bu sr-i
289a6(rnying rgyud): sdig can ni// rdo rje dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur// bla ma mnyes par ma byas shing // zhe sdang la sogs nyon mongs ldan// bag chags ngan pas rang bzhin bcings// log tog zhen pa'i mthur ldan pas// gang ltar bgrod pas log pa'i lam// log
289a7(rnying rgyud): pa la ni gzhol bar 'gyur// gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni// dam pa rnams kyi yul yin te/ dman ba rtog gi la sogs pa'i// yul dranam yang 'gyur ma yin// gang du 'chang ba'i las rnams kyang // thabs dang ldan pas grol bar 'gyur// gang
289b1(rnying rgyud): dri thabs dang mi ldan pas// thams cad 'ching ba'i mdud par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang chen 'di// thabs dang man drag mi ldan par// dregs dang rtul dbang song bas// thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtshod lhung // gang du thabs dang ma
289b2(rnying rgyud): ldan pas// 'dod lnga chags pas rol spyod na// thar pa'i bde ba spangs nas ni// 'khor ba las ni zar mi 'gyur// gang du dngos po'i rang bzhin la// bde sdug zhen par mi gnas kyang // las dang nyon mongs zhen pa la// thams cad log pa'i stobs su sdang // gang drug med/
289b3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid// de la de ltang ngo bo nyid// gang la de yi rang bzhin ni// gang ma yin te de bzhin nyid// 'gro 'od gnas pa las grol ba'i// mtshan nyid zhen pa las 'das pa// ngo bo log pa'i rkyen gyis bsgyur// tha mar log pa'i grong khyer brgyad// dngos 'dzin log
289b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i drugand kyis// dngos bral dngos por rang btags pa// mthong ba log pa'i stobs ldan pa sa// 'khor ba'i grong khyer thar pa med// chags dang chags bral snang ba'i gnas// zhan dang spang dang 'ag ga dang sbyang // bsgyur sogs mtshan ma'i dbang song bas//
289b5(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' la ni 'phyos pa bzhin// sdug bsngal rgya mtshor srung bar 'gyur// theg pa mchog la mi chags shing // 'dod lnga chags pa spangs pa dang // bu mo mtshan ldan spangs pa ni// thabs bral 'khor ba'i rtsub yin// thabs dang bral ba rang bzhin gnas//
289b6(rnying rgyud): tshangs pa byede ba'i skang khrung nas// d+h+r-i ga lce 'bar nas zla ba ni// thabs kyi bsam pa'i lam gang bcang // 'bar ba brgyad po thim par bya// shar ba rdo rdo d+hi gi bdag/ \u0f7fkha lo mas gang bsdus pa// yid ni smin mtshams gyen la gtad// gsang ba'i gas
289b7(rnying rgyud): la mongs spyod bya// gsang ba'i yid ni 'pho 'gyur na// bya ba la sogs rang dor nas// rnam shesas la brim 'gyur te// sa yang tshul thim par 'gyur// chu ni me la zim gyur pas// de nyid drung la thim par 'gyur// rlung ni snying po'i thig ler te// de las ma
290a1(rnying rgyud): d+ha/ long gzugs bzhin du// ma sa stor ba'i grong du 'pho// sgrub mad cing 'gag pa med// rgyab meng cing zag pa mang // gakhrag ga sha ga sa zla ba mad // nam mkhul rtswa bur gnas pa nyid// gsang ba'idakyil 'khor gnas can pa/
290a2(rnying rgyud): kAl ba kun gyi gzhal yas khang // ti lA 'bru lta bu'i pho brang ste// rtsa gsum 'dus pa'i rtse mo ste// bam dbyibs gnyis med phreng ba las// nyin phrad pa'i thig le las// rim par skye ba'i ye shes ro// gnas nas gnas su 'pho ba yin// bcu drug skye bar
290a3(rnying rgyud): tsham med// thig le zung 'jug bde ba ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin phyir// bag chags mtha' yas kun sol te// 'bras bu ldan grub rang la 'char// rang byung thig le rten dang bcas// lus can kun la khyab pa ste// zag pa yod med kun dang
290a4(rnying rgyud): bral// thig le chen po g.yo ba med// thabs dang shes rab thams cad ni// sbyor ba'am rang gi stobs las byung // nyi ma zla ba rgyas pa ni// rang gi stobs kyis bzung ba ni// gnas dang gnas min khyab pa'i bar// gsal brtan nges las ye shes skye// gsang
290a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i thabs kyis nges skye na// mun pa la ni mar me ltar// bcu drug rim par 'bel bar 'gyur// rang gi nyams las shes par bya// phyi nang bde ba'i thig le la// ma lus chos kun rang gnas pas// rnal 'byor rig pa'i thabs tshul gyis// gzhan du ma
290a6(rnying rgyud): yengs tshul gyis blta// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba ni// 'gro 'ong 'phel 'bringab med pa ni// dus gsum bral ba'i thig la ste// nam mkha' lta bur 'byung 'jig med// lus sems yid byed med pa yi// bde bar rig bsam mi khyab// rgyu rkyen
290a7(rnying rgyud): zag pa'i yul lam 'das// thig le 'gro 'ong rgyan dang bral// nga rgyal phrag dog ldan pa dang // yo byad yod dang med pas kyang // thabs 'dis grol 'gyur the tshom med// gsang ba'i thabs la gang gnas pa// rigs dang na tshod gang yang rung // phyi nang yul
290b1(rnying rgyud): sems chos thams cad// bde ba chen po'i ngo bor ldog/ dbang dang man ngag byin rlabs kyis// sgra dang bral ba'i bstan pa nyid// snying gi dkyil nas byung 'gyur te// bde chen thig le 'phel 'grib med// rang rig sems kyi bde ba la// rgyu 'bras dang ni
290b2(rnying rgyud): zag pa dang // 'byung 'jug yengs dang ma yengs med// bde chen khyab pa rang bzhin gnas// gsang ba yid gnyis med pa yis// thabs kyi bye brag bsngal gyur na// ye shes nam mkha' mtha' thug med// thams cad myur du 'grub par 'gyur// gsang //
290b3(rnying rgyud): chen rol pa'i stod pa las// tha mal pa dang dman pa med// dka' thub gtsang sde zhum pa med// lha dang sngags dang phyug rgya med// dkyil 'khor sbyin bsreg 'phro 'du med// de bas sgyu 'phrul thabs chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnyis med bde chen dbyeng med pa//
290b4(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab mi phyed pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas rang bzhin nyid// nyi zla thabs dang shes rab kyi// ro gnyis 'dus pa'i stobs las skyes// de la me tigatogs pa'i bdag/ rdo rje sams dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ drangs ma'i bde ba la brten nas// rten medapa
290b5(rnying rgyud): ba nges par skye// ma skyes nam mkha' lta bu ni// rtog dang goms pa'i stobs kyis 'grub// ma skyes bde chen ma rtogs par// mtshon pa'i thabs la bder gnas na// dngos po zhen pa'i 'du shes kyis// ngan 'gro'i rgya mchod ltung bar 'gyur// bud med
290b6(rnying rgyud): rigs la gang brtags pa// lam dang nus pa'i khyad par gyis// 'ching grol khyad par de bzhin te// zag pa yod med don gyis brtags// gsang ba'i bud med bsten par bya// lus can yid can ye shes can// gang du thabs dang goms pa dang // mthar
290b7(rnying rgyud): phyen ldan gyis grub par sbyor// tshogs bsags las rgyud dag pa dang // thabs lam mchog la sngon sbyangs dang // dam pa mchog gi spyod yul te// gzhan du bskal pa bye bas min// gang dang bral ba'i bya ba thams cad ni// srid pa'i rgya mtshor sdug bsngal
291a1(rnying rgyud): zhen pa ni// tha ma dman dang log pa'i dbang song bas// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thabs dang bral ba yin// 'khor ba'i dug 'joms thabs mchog rnams spangs nas// zhen chags mtshan ma dka' thub lam spyod pa// long bar /
291a2(rnying rgyud): bor g.yang sa stog pa ltar// sgo gsum thabs chen bral ba ltung ba'i rgyu// gang du dbang dang dam tshig brtul zhugs can// gsang ba'i spyod pa dga' zhing rigs ma bsten// lus dang sems kyi 'khor lo bde ba'i khu bas 'geng // 'jig rten zil gnon
291a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i mun pa sel// ye shes sgron mos bde chen gsal bar byed// thabs chen ldan pas pad+ma la bzhugs nas// lus nyid bde bas sems kyi don bstan nas// dang rig byang chub sems ni bde chen 'khor lo can// lhag bsngal mtshan ma med pa
291a4(rnying rgyud): sud du 'byung // bskal pab rgya phrag du mar rab brtan pa'i// sunA nag 'jigs su rung ba'i khang pa reg/ thabs la mkhas pa'i sbyor bas brtsams pa yis// the tshom med par myur du sel bar byed// thog ma med pa'i bag chags bur mong dang // thabs
291a5(rnying rgyud): dang theg pa gzhan gyis gsal dkar ba// dbang dang man ngag thabs kyi mar me yis// skal ldan snying gi mun pa myur du sel// rang sems bde chen rten byed sems kyi rin po che// 'dod lnga longs spyod dag 'dud bde bas gus brten na// 'bras bu ldan
291a6(rnying rgyud): grub ya mtshan rmad byung ba// gzhan la dag me lus par rang las 'byung bar 'gyur// thabs chen thabs las byung pa'i sku gsung thugs// bde chen zag med nam mkha' lta bu nyid// slob dpon mthu las 'dod pa 'grub 'gyur gyis// dman dang log
291a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i thabs kyis 'grib pa med// gsang chen rol pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni// dus gsum rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs pa ste// dman pa mtshan pa'i rnal 'byor dpag med du ma yis// de yi su'i b+ha gang 'char ni nus// sgra 'phrul thal ba'i
291b1(rnying rgyud): po las/ thams cad yid dang chos su 'das pa 'i laT ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gang du thabasan med pa yi// brtags pa'i sgyu 'phrul du ma las// bslus pa'i thabs ni bshad par bya// rtog pa'i bye brag
291b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad ni// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus pa ste// sku gsung thugs su bsdus pa nyid// rang rig chos kyi dbyings su thim// phyogs bcu'i rgyal brdul snyed pa// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ngo bo ste// de nyid sku gsung zhugs kyi bdag/ de nyid ma skyes chos kyi
291b3(rnying rgyud): dbyengs// byab rgya dang na thags dag dang // bzlas pa dang nimached pa dang // dkyil 'bang sbyin pasreg la sags pa// dang ma'i lus can la bshad// kyi phyi ma 'dir mi 'dod// bram pa can la ba gad pa min// gsang ba las kyang gsang bu rapa/
291b4(rnying rgyud): rang lus dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang // lha yi dkyil 'khor grangs med dang // mchod dang bzlas pa sbyin bsreg dag/ thabs kyi cho ga mkhas pa yis// rang gi lus la bskyed par bya// rang lus bde ba chen po'i dbyings// mkhas pas thabs la
291b5(rnying rgyud): gnas pa yis// khrus dang dka' thub mi bya ste// longs spyod kun gyis tshim par bya// bdud rtsi lnga dang bcud dag dang // mi mo mtshan ldan bcu drug ma// mtshan ldan lus rgyas yid 'ong ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pas// bdag gi lus
291b6(rnying rgyud): sems mchod par bya// gtsang ste'i rtog pa mi bya zhing // bslang mo'i bya ba sbyang gnas min// lus sems bde bas brgyan byas nas// bde bas bde ba myur du 'grub// tsit+ta'i dkyil 'khor rin po che// bye phrag thig le mang po rnams// kun las
291b7(rnying rgyud): 'dus par gyur pa ni// dngas snyigs thig par 'dus pas na// bcu kyi thig ler gsal ba la// ro wa'i khyad par kun rdzogs pas// ma lus 'dres pa'i ngo bar gnas// tshangs pa bde ba chen po yis// sems kyi bum pa rgyas pa yis// lus
292a1(rnying rgyud): kyi bde brgyas byas nas// rang la dgongs pa ldan gyis grub// 'dul bar bya bas kun kyang skad// gsang spyod ba dab thig lal// yon tan ma lus lhan rdzogs shing // rganas ma lus dang 'gas
292a2(rnying rgyud): skyes pa'ang po gsal// bde ba rang gi gsal ba la// mtshan ma thams cad kun zhinas// sgyu 'phrul drabar gnas pa ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad do// rang lus thabs kyi bder gnas pa// rims dbang gis sbyin pa bas pa'i// thab
292a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes mngon thob pa// bcu gsums rdzogs yon tan thob// rang byung ye shes dkyil 'khor lo// rgyu dang 'bras bu kun rdzogs pas// sku dang gsung thugs yon tan las// ma lus bdag nyid las byung ba// dpag bsam shing dang rnyin chen bldan// dang
292a4(rnying rgyud): por mtshon pa'i dbang thob pas// zhen med bde ba chen po skye// rig pa ma skyes bde ba'i sems// thabs la mkhas pa 'byung bar 'gyur// zhen cing 'dzin pa grol bar 'gyur// bde ba chen por rang gnas pa// thabs dang ldan pa'i rim nas rim/
292a5(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen por mthar thug med// ji ltar tshos nas bcu drug ltar// rang gi yon tan rdzogs par 'gyur// ting 'dzin nyams kyi drod ldan la// rig pa'i lha mo ro la dbang gis// dang po nas nis brjod par// sa yi rim pa 'phel bar 'gyur// de nas phyod
292a6(rnying rgyud): bcu dag pa'i zhing // rin chen mdzes pa'i gzhal yas su// sa bcu'i dbang phyug rtswa lajogs la// phyo gru bcu'i rgyal ba kun 'dus la// ye shes lha mor rol dbang gis// zhen pa za ma rang dag nas// nam mkha' mtha' dbus med pa la// nya mtha
292a7(rnying rgyud): mad shar ba ltar// sems dang sems las byung ba kun// thog ma tha ma med pa yi// lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes shar// rig pa rdo rje 'dzin pa ni// dang po rnam par smin pa ste// de nas ting 'dzin yid kyi lus// de nas sprul pa'i lus su
292b1(rnying rgyud): thAs ye shes lus mthar phyin// dang po lha yi dbang po ste// gnyis pa rigs bzhi sems dpa'i tshul// gsum pa rgyal ba lngar gnas pa// mthar thag kun bzung rdo rje 'chang // yA shes rigs dang dkyil 'khor dang // sangs kyis dkyil 'khor kun 'dus/
292b2(rnying rgyud): shing // cho ga'i mtshan ma phyag rgya sogs// ma lus rtog pa 'dus pa ste// rtogs pa'i rgyal po blan med// thabs mchog ma lus 'dir 'dus pa// dman pa'i grong khyer bcom pa yis// rang b+hu ye shes 'phel bar 'gyur// dzaM sprad thog pa'i
292b3(rnying rgyud): brag dang // skrag sre phyag rgyang kyil 'khor dang // sbyin pasreg sadi ma sgra dang bcas// de skad rnam par ma bshad pa// 'di nyid mngon pa'i thabs len te// grazha ni dgangs pa yod ma myed// drabs thabs mchog 'di nyid na//
292b4(rnying rgyud): bsdus par bshad pa yin// phyogs bcu mtha' yas ma lus pa'i// rdul snyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // thabs chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste// 'bras bu kun kyang 'dir bsdus pa'o// gang phyir dngos po 'dir mthong bas// blta ba thams cad
292b5(rnying rgyud): 'dir 'dus pa'o// rnal 'byor thabs chen rtogs pa la// gtsang sde blang dor mi gnas pas// dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du spyad// spyod pa chog mdor bsdus pa'o// dkyil 'khor dpag med mtha' yas pa// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te// brda
292b6(rnying rgyud): ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dkyil 'khor ma lus 'dus pa'o// bden gnyis dbyer med byang chub sems// mkha'i ltar gnas pa'i don rtogs nas// dbang mchog nyid du 'di gsungs te// dbang gi cho ga 'dir 'dus pa'o// sgo gsum mnyam
292b7(rnying rgyud): par rtogs pa las// thams cad bde ba chen po nyid// ma lus skyon thal dam pa la// bsrung bya ma lus 'dir 'dus pa'o// dngos grub kun gyi snying po mchog/ bde chen mchog las gzhan med de// sku gsung thugs sogs dngos grub mchog/ grub pa
293a1(rnying rgyud): ngan gyi snang bam ga/ banas pa nga ga nga// sa bags mas pa// rnas pas padab pags pas sa bapa // gsang ba nga mam chagasams // thabs
293a2(rnying rgyud): sa ga/ gsu sa sbyi pas/
293a3(rnying rgyud): dag tum gsungs pa// dbang dang dmachog da mnu pa dang // mtshan ma dag la mos dga' ba'i// blo dang rig pa'i spyod yul min// gas ba zab mo'i thugs kyi chud// rol pa smod cing dga' bder gnas// rigs chad dka' thu ldan pa spangs// dag
293a4(rnying rgyud): bde ldan pas gang spyad pa// ma lus yid bzhin nor bu bzhin// gsang sngags phyin rlabs thabs kyis 'grub// bya ba ma lus mdor bsdus pa// bya ba med par yang dag 'grub// gsang ba thal rgyud chen po 'di// yon tan che ba kun gyi gnas/ lnga 'jal
293a5(rnying rgyud): thal ba'i byad chen po las/ rtog pa bsdus pa'i les k+ti nyi shus pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad byab// gas ba chen po ba dzes pa// snying po las kyang snying po mchog/ swA la n+d+ra la thal med chen po 'di// phyogs bzhi dus ba ma
293a6(rnying rgyud): lus pa'o// nam mkha'i mthar bug rgyal ba rnams// gsang ba gang la zhugs pan// 'gro ba chags pa can don du// 'dul ba'i glang zag la dgongs nas// thal chen bde ba gsang ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba snyigs mal dgongs nas// gsang ba 'din
293a7(rnying rgyud): bstan par mdzad// byang chub sems dpa'i lham chags// bde ba chen po nyams ldan pas// dgyes pa'i ba pa'i rol pa yis// thabs chen lam la gnas par mdzad// mkha' 'grom mo mnam// rgyal po 'khor du 'dus pa rnams/
293b1(rnying rgyud): kyang thig la yid g.yos nas// blta dang chags pas 'khyung byas dang // bcu da nga gzhi ba dang zhal sgong dang // dkar 'dzin 'gying ba'i tshul gyis spyon// sems dpa' lus 'dar mig dngas nas// chags pa'i gang ni tshogs byung // dga' ba'i chag pas ci
293b2(rnying rgyud): bshad brjod// kye kyai rgyal ba thams cad gzigs// rgyal ba thams cad dgongs pa yi// thig le chen po thabs kyi mchog/ 'gro ba lam mchog bder skyon pa// klu 'phrul dra ba lam gyi phugs// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// pad chen rig pa bsam
293b3(rnying rgyud): mi khyab// dngos nyid bder gsal thog mtha' med// nyon mongs kun las rab krol ba'i// 'khor ba bder gnas thabs kyi mchog/ 'dod chag chen po bde ba che// 'dod cha gra chags bral chags pa 'joms// tha ma pa mtshan ma rnams 'jig cing // dga' zhing bde bar ldan pa yis/
293b4(rnying rgyud): gdung zhing dka'athub sdug bsngal med// thun mong zhen pa ldog pa des// gang ltar bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// rig pa brgyad par grags pa 'di// thabs ldan rig pa 'dzin pa can// sa mthar pa bar+tha tra lus// 'dod la thabs kyis don rtogs nas// dza\u0f89\u0fa4
293b5(rnying rgyud): can thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir// snying gi dkyil 'khor sgo phyes nas// mchog dga' bde la lhan cig skyes// 'khor ba pad+ma'i sdong po ltar// ma spangs thabs su sbyar bas na// thal bas khengs pa'i 'jig rten du// thal ba'i dbang por lung bstan thob//
293b6(rnying rgyud): sgra 'phrul thabs gas rgyud 'di// dbang phyug rgyal po'i gtor 'dzin cing // dgongs dang dbang phyug da mchog ldan// rgyags byu thugs brtse 'gro bskyob// gzi rnyed chel rtogs rngub pa// 'di la gsang ba bstan pa gtad// 'gro bskal ldan dad pa can/
293b7(rnying rgyud): lus dang srog pa mi blta zhing // brtul zhugs shis rab bstan par ldan// slob dpon bzung dang grogs dag la// srog dang mig ltar blta bya zhing // lus dang 'tsho ba longs spyod dang // bu dang chung marta la sogs// bdag gi lus kyang dbul bar bya// sangs
294a1(rnying rgyud): ma nga // ma sa // ga'ad gams par 'byung ba'o bas// rnamangan pa 'ang mthong// dbang dug rgyam pas gnying ga dpang // gsang bzhunas nga chen da// ma rna
294a2(rnying rgyud): rjod cing // 'khor pa'i bdu pa dang / deb tsun po phes bya ga/ na pa dzi ba skyed pa// gas ba dpe par nges par gtad// yid pa'i dang tha 'argyang ra// bas pa yangs durdzogs // zhemangan byung brnamapa
294a3(rnying rgyud): gsan sa na / yulabs rnyed papa/ tha slan pa ga nga lan pa btsugs sa// ma da 'a ba ba dang/
294a4(rnying rgyud): 'phan yul du bsgyur cing gtan la babapa la// rgya ga ga dang / gargyag d+han nA bi me+e d+da pa da hU~M d+hapal mi hU~M sh-ing sa d+ha mA yA da ga tar+tha/ bod ma dri/ gsang ba'i snying po dakhon nyid nges pa'i khrob chen pa ts+tshabs kyi rnal 'byor dbang kyag klab
294a5(rnying rgyud): su'askal dra ba'i da/ dngul 'ang ma pal rnon po la phyag 'tshal mo// dade skad bdag gis bshad pa tshaM/ 'jig rten gyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das 'di chags chen ba/ zhwang zen po/ gnyi mug chen po de'i gzhal yas khang na/ dbyar
294a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i bu ba dang ldan pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la sogs padu ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de ma nyal gyi gang bu bzhin gang rnaMs khyab par bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ngo tshe 'di skad gsungs so// @#
294a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i don can gang bsgrub pa// blo dzin pa'i sgo bsam ste// rdul 'byor srog dang byol pa la// zhi ga nas skrag bathong bsgrub par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das dag dang / byang sems de nag thams cad kyis/ gsungs pa med na yang dag par thubang byed/
294b1(rnying rgyud): gsol pa/ kye kye bcom ldan 'das legs chen po// rnal 'byor lam la legs brten tshe// ji ltar khro bos phyogs dag bsrung // srog rtsol bden gnyis ji ltar bskyed/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa// yid 'ong bde ba'i phyogs dag tu/
294b2(rnying rgyud): las dang dgos pa ldan pa yis// rnal 'byor bar chad bzlog pa'i phyir// srud pa'i 'khor los bsrung bar bya// zhe sdang rdo rje sems dpa' che// rang gi gnas la dga' ba'i phyir// bka' sdod gnod mdzes bdun du bskyed// gnod mdzes khrod
294b3(rnying rgyud): hUM gi spus// las rnams bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir// bdag nyid 'khyil pa khro bo che// rang las phyung ba gnas su bzhag/ sprul pa chen po'i byin rlabs ni// zhal nas 'gugs pa'i khro bo'i rgyal// las dag myur bar bya ba'i phyir// las las las
294b4(rnying rgyud): byung hU~M gi sgras// gang dag 'gugs pa'i las byas nas// gsum gyi mthar ni gnas byed pa'o// chos sku bde ba'i longs spyod dang // sprul pa'i byin rlabs skur sprul pa// gnas pas gnas ni dga' bar byed// de la bgegs 'gugs pa'i khro bo hUM gi
294b5(rnying rgyud): sngags ni/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga wAn/ bid+yA krod+ha hUM phaT// de nas bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// 'dod las gnod pa bkug ma thag/ rim par gnas su bsdu bar bya// de la bsdu ba'i snying po ni// sad
294b6(rnying rgyud): ha ra Na b+h+rU~M// de nas bsdus pa'i chos kunaM las// hU~M ga~M sgras bskyed hU~M las ni// hU~M las bskyed pa'i khro bo che// rnam rgyal gshin rje rta mgrin dang // bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dbug sngon can// mi g.yo mgon po 'dod pa'i rgyal// khams gsum rnam rgya la kAn+ta kuN+Da li/
294b7(rnying rgyud): gnad mdzes rgyal pos stong 'og phyogs mtshams bsrung // gnod sbyin sngags kyi rgyal po la// mi g.yo mi 'gyur brtan par byos// zhes bsgo'o// de'i tshe gnod sbyin 'dul mdzod bdud rtsi khro bo che// phur pa blangs nas byin pa rlabs sder mo'i tshi ga
295a1(rnying rgyud): mamed dem bzhin 'dod pa'i rgyal po gdang // 'dod pa'i bral po ma rgyab tu'o// gnong sangs rgyal bas blang ga nga than bdag// dal byan byas bza' pa'i thugs na/ ar+tha b+hag+ta tA ya b+hata yas nga ldan pa gas/
295a2(rnying rgyud): trai la ya/ sarba pa paM/ pAT ma rba phaT/ hU~Md+hUdz+dza/ badz+ra kI la ya/ bgyur yA bA ya ta~M kA ya na/ tra~Ms Ta phaT/ gzhan du bgegs pakang marbe/ las thams cad pa'i sngags 'di'o// kau N+Di / hrIH/ daMta t+ta/ paH/
295a3(rnying rgyud): gzhan du bgegs bskrad pa ni/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i las kyi sngags 'dzir// na maHsa man+takI yA lpAn Na~M d+d+ha ba~M NA~M/ na mo badza kro drA yA/ ma hA snod dzad+hi dz+nyA nA ya/ a si mras la/ pad+ma pA sha ta s+phA yaM/ oM e mr-i ti kuN+Da li/ kha kha pa khA hi khA hi/ hu l+r-i r+tha /
295a4(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ d+hut+ta k+Shan+ta/ hA na ha na/ dA ha daha/ btsA paH/ gar+b+ha gar+b+he/ bi kr-i Ta ya'i s+pho Ta ya/ sirba bai thAM/ bi nA yai twen/ mahAg N+Da pr-i ti/ dA po tId+haki rI li hU~M pi dra swA hA/ de nas gnod bra la rnal 'byor pas// gang du rnal 'byor bsgom par bya// rnal 'byor zhes
295a5(rnying rgyud): rim pa no// rgyud 'dir rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis// daM n+ti srog dang rtsol ba ste// gnyid dang bya ba rbengs nas bsgom// srog gi tu ni rnam bzhi ste// sa dang chu dang me dang rje // lte ba gesang gnas nying ga mgrin// gnas bzhi dag na gang gnas par// dpyang
295a6(rnying rgyud): dang dbyar dang sbyin dang dgun// nam zla dus bzhi 'khor ba'i spyan// sa dang rlung dang du dang me// rlung dag rim bzhin 'byung byed pa// 'jug pa bag la zha bar byed// gyen dang mthur dang 'byung bar byed// gyen du g.yas g.yon gnyis ka naswa// dkyil 'khor drag
295a7(rnying rgyud): rim cu ba ni// khri phrag gnyis dang stong phrag dang // drug 'byi nyin mtshan 'byung byed pa// 'jug pa bag la zha bar bya// thun brgyad thun phran nyi shu bzhi// snga dro dang po phye ma gnyis// srod kyi dang po zam gnyis// tho rangs dang po tham gnyis// sa chu me rlung
295b1(rnying rgyud): bshin du// dus kyi lha mo re re 'byung // lha mo de dag bkyil yang // srog gi zla ba nyis stong dang // brgya phrag bdun du 'byung bar byung // lha mo re rer lha mo gsum// lha mo nyi shurtsa bzhir 'gyur// nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag la yang // lha mo bzhi bzhir 'gyur 'gyur te//
295b2(rnying rgyud): lha mo bcu phrag dgu dang dug/ dbugs ni nyis brgya bcu phrag gnyis// rtsa lnga dag ste rku ba'i grangs// thun gcig thun gnyis thun phrag gang // dbyig gu lha mo'i nus pa gang // nus pas dbugs bgrang grangs bzung nas// ngal pa med pa dbugs la brten//
295b3(rnying rgyud): yang na dbugs kyi rgyu ba la// ngal ba med par dbugs bgrangs pa// bgrang phreng dag kyang mi dgos te// g.yas par me 'byung dmar zhing 'tsher// g.yon par rlung 'byung gnag la drangs// gnyis kar ngal rgyu chu rlung dkar// gnyis kar thub rngubs sar+tha
295b4(rnying rgyud): ser// lha mo bdag mo dang ldan pa'i// ye shes bzhi nyid 'byung bar byed// gcig min du mar ma grub phyir// g.yas dang g.yon du gnyis kar yang // g.yas dang g.yon du brtag par bya'o// skya rengs dang po shing ba nas// dros kyi bar ni dus dang po// dros
295b5(rnying rgyud): kyi mtshams nas phyed kyi bar// gnyis ka yin te sa dang chu// nyi ma phyed nas myur spang mtshams// phyi dro dang por shes par bya// myur smad mtshams nas chal tshil mtshams// nyin dus bzhi par shes par bya// chal tshil srod mtshams dus dang po// srod nas
295b6(rnying rgyud): phyed par dus gnyis par// phyed nas thor chung ngus dang po// tho rongs skya rengs dus gnyis par// dbugs kyi grangs kyis dus phyes nas// gzhan du gzhan dag rim pa bzhin// dbyar dang ston dang dgun dag dang // dus dang dus phran gang byung ba// de dag dang po
295b7(rnying rgyud): gtsor 'byung ngo // grangs dang dus tshad snga ma bzhin// mi 'gro rlung nyid 'byung drub rang dbang thob// sems 'dul de gsal de tshe shes rab bskyed// gzhan nas ma yin 'byung ba nyid dag dang // rtsol ba dbyer med rang don ci bzhin spyad// yun ring tshom ni gnas
296a1(rnying rgyud): gan bya dang // dbyar mdan mnyam dang pa'aga' bang thob// rnas bdag pa 'astong pa'i rlabs yod do// thams ga la nas 'brug ng+gAg nga // ces gsungs sa// de nas byang chub sams dpa' da
296a2(rnying rgyud): rang gi rdzogs rag nas pabyung ba/ em ho// lags sa lags sa yang dag legs// thams cad bdag pa rtsod ri mtshar// sA stod rnamam pa'i dbyings 'jug 'tshal lo// gzung yo nang tan pa'i sAl phyag 'tshal ba// da dzin pa dang
296a3(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// mtha' yas kyis kyi rgya la phyag rdub la// ngan yong bskyed pa'i rlung la phyag 'tshul lo// rlung rje ba bar gshegs 'jug 'tshal lo// gsang pa'i steng ba yang shing rjes pa/ khru bas kyi rnab 'byong bang phyag chub pa'i b+ha Sh+Tha
296a4(rnying rgyud): byung rdzogs so// / rtag ma khan po 'i malan dang / dpon par tsanas pacu cid thas te gtam la bapal/ rgyag na dang / grwaHga te/ ma las rtapa la ha~M/ bdad na/ gas pa skye pa
296a5(rnying rgyud): hi nges pa'i rgya ma zan po stobs kyi myal/ dpal kun du bzang po la phrag tshal lo// 'dis/ nga 'dag gis rnaMs pa'i rnal gcin na/ 'og me thigangs ca du ba'i rten yang pa phyogs bcu dus gsum bya bzhin gshegs pa
296a6(rnying rgyud): cad kyi bdug po kun tu bzang po nges par 'brel to// nyid kyi skyes bu chen po rdorje sems dpa' bka'arjod do// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'dul ba 'dus la babs pa gsadang ngag nyid kyis zhus pa/ rgya cher bza' dpag dka' ba// rang bzhin tsha la nges don ngan// rgya
296a7(rnying rgyud): pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di// gsang ba bzhis tshad don mdzad pa// rton tshogs log par zhen pa rnams// thang dang rdzab gang gis spyad// mon pa'i lam du zhugs pa rnams// yang dag lam dung ltar gakyang// shin tu gsang ba'i mnang gdon// snod ldan bumal
296b1(rnying rgyud): ji ltar sbyin// zhes ched du brjod do// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos dgongs pa gsang ba'i ting nge 'don gyis 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor bzhi dang srog shing gsum// sum cu gnyis dang bcu drug dang // brgyad dang drug cu rtsa bzhi yi// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i
296b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor la// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// A li kA li'i bla dbyangs ldan// kyu mcho ga ting nas sgrol ma g.yos// me lce srid pa gsum la khyab// nam mkha'i ba bzhos bde ba che// 'phags pa 'gro drag mchod sbyin phul// bde ba ye shes rol mo
296b3(rnying rgyud): yis// dus gsum dgyes pa'i mchod pa 'bul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba'o// yid chos kun bzang yab yum dang / nyon mongs dbang gis bskyed pa ni// rtsa ba phung po'i rlung lnga dang // yan lag skye mched rlung lnga yis/

296b5(rnying rgyud): srog 'dzin nung ni snying gar gnas// rnam shes phung po mi bskyod pa// sa la spyod pas sangs kyis spyan// do zhes rgyu ba bum pa'i bdag/ dkar ba'i sa ni chu la thim// me long ye shes dang du gnas// thur sel rlung ni gsang bar gnas// tshor ba'i phung po rin
296b6(rnying rgyud): 'byung sku// chu la spyod pas mA ma kI// ser po chu nyid me la thim// mnyam nyid ye shes srog tu gnas// gyen du byung lkog mar gnas// 'du shes phung po stang mtha' yas// me la spyod pas gos dkar mo// rna ba g.yas nas rtswa byed pa// me nyid rlung la rnam 'du
