297b1(rnying rgyud): tshogs dang bcas pas 'ang sa dang // em to// mtham yang byas pa'o// kyem zes bams rnams mang pobs// byang chum mas dpa'i kyil 'khor nyid// phyogs bcung dul byed kur pa // sa med pa snga ma dgros pa tang // thugs dang /
297b2(rnying rgyud): shes ngang du bub// ces brjod pas/ de dag 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bstod de rjes su yi rang nas bsdus te gtad pa/ phyogs bcu dus gsum bde gshegs padag/ gti mug chen
297b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin can// 'dod chags chen po'i bdag po ste// zhe sdang chen po'i ngo bo nyid// dog pa rnam dag sgra gsung bdag/ gsal bar bde ba dgyes pa ho// zhes brjod do// de nas ngag tu 'di brjod do// log lha yongs su gtad de bsdang pa ni/ oM sum+b+ha ni
297b4(rnying rgyud): sum+ba d+ha/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pha ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga An bid+yA rA dza hU~M phaT/ oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAn phaT/ kI li kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT/ phaT phaT hU~M hU~M badz+ra kA la ya/ badz+ra d+ha ro A dz+nyA pa ya te kA ya wA ka tsid+ha badz+ra pA la
297b5(rnying rgyud): phaT/ ces snong ma yin rnams bskrad cing mi ldang bar byas te/ bud med kyi tshogs gang yin pa la yongs su gtad cing chos kyi mig can la khro bar gyur to// stobs kyi dbang phyug bslab pa/ dka' ba spyod pa man ngag gi snying po zhes bya ba'i kyad rdzogs so//
297b6(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ sad+ma rgyas tham+ba cad mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba rgyad kyi rgyal po// bcom ldan 'das ye shes dbugs 'byin gyi rgyal po shin tu rnam par grol ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis go ba nyid kyi
297b7(rnying rgyud): thos pa'i dus na/ dus gsum sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i sku// sna tshogs snang ba gcig pu nyid// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha// rmongs pa gdung ba sel ba'i 'od// rang rig dkyil 'khor 'od gsal zhing // brjid
298a1(rnying rgyud): mdangs gza tshon rab tu cha// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba' mchod// dpal ldan dgyes pa ye shes b+hA// nga bo nyid las ma g.yos bzhin// gcig na kun tu snang bde// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// so sar
298a2(rnying rgyud): rang rig 'dus pa'i dpal// klu dang gsung dang thugs dang su// yon tan phrin las phyogs nus kun// ma lus mi lus lus med gnas// 'og min rang byung chos kyi dbyings// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// dus gsum bdag po rdo rje 'chang /
298a3(rnying rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i dbu mnga' zhing // pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya 'bar// brtul zhugs mnyam nyid kyil mo krung // ye shes sku ni zang thal zhal// gti mug gdung dang zhe sdang gdung // shin tu gdug pa 'dul ba'i gdung // ser sna'i gdang dang 'dod chags
298a4(rnying rgyud): gdung // phrag dog gdung dang shin tu sgo// sman phung 'khrigs pa'i dam tshig can// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// yang dag bsgrub pa gcig pu nyid// sangs kyis bde chen kun 'dus pa// mkha' 'gro sgyu mi bde mchog pade// sangs
298a5(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor zab mo sku gsum rdzogs// dam tshig las dang chos dang ni// sgra nyid phyag rgya chen po ste// dga' dang mchog dag 'daga' ba dang // lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin can// snga ma chen po chos kyi sku// gsang
298a6(rnying rgyud): ba shes rab bde chen po// bstan par bzhed nas dkyil 'khor spro// stong pa ye shes rab snang ba// tshogs pa'i dus na rnam par dag/ de nas nyid kyi bde 'byin mas// sku yi rnam par bsul mdzad do// mi 'da' stong nyid gar gyi bdag/ g.yar dam
298a7(rnying rgyud): po dngos grub mdzod// dam tshig chen po ngo bo nyid// ye shes can du grub par mdzod// ho e mngo mtshar ya mtshan can// rig pa'i rnam pa stong nyid thugs// ye shes rol pa rnam par rol// rol pa'i ngang nas dam tshig 'byin// pad+ma rgyas par gar ma
298b1(rnying rgyud): de// rig pa nyid du mjal bar byed// ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo // rgyud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor las/ rgyud 'byung ba'i gzhi rnam par bkod pa ste/ rtog pa dang po'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
298b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyis gsang ba bka' bgros pa zhes bya ba'i/ sprul pa rnam par byung ste 'dul bar dgongs nas/ thugs rjes spro ba 'di gsungs so// rig pa nyid las skyes pa'i phyir// sku gsum yon tan phrin las thugs// rig pa shes pa rnam drug
298b3(rnying rgyud): che// chos nyid dang du ye shes gnas// mi s+ye'i chos can skye tshul rtoni// thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor mdzad// dug lnga ye shes lnga yis 'joms// ci yang mi gsung mnyam par gnas// 'khor ba byung nas skam sar 'don// dbyings
298b4(rnying rgyud): la ye shes rol rtsed mdzad// nam mkha' lta bur sna tshogs ston// bdud rtsi dam pa'i chu bo 'bebs// ma rig sel ba'i sgron me mdzad// 'khor ba'i nang nas byang tshul ston// rdo rje'i gdan la rdo rje 'jog/ bye 'a khrag khrig gdul bya la// de dang
298b5(rnying rgyud): mthun par sprul pa 'gyed// dpa' bor mos la dpa' bo dang // dpa' mor mos la dpa' mo dang // mthun byas mthun pas don mdzad pa// pad+ma 'dam skyes skyon ma gos// 'ja' tshon 'dra ste dngos med gsal// zhes gsungs so// de nas
298b6(rnying rgyud): gdul bya gdul dka' ba dag dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa dam pa gsang ba bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// mthun byas sku yi don mchod pa// rig
298b7(rnying rgyud): drug dam chog las sbyang phyir// ye shes dang las dam tshig chen pos bskul// bde gshegs thams cad rnam par bka' bgros mdzad// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rdo rje zhe sdang chen po la bskul ba/ rjes su chags pa rnam mang badz+ra
299a1(rnying rgyud): rnam drug pa// margyad pa gsal bar rjes sumamed byas nas/ mchom turtag pa la 'byung ba dbas pa da 'grub par mdzad/ bsamachod dam tshig nyid/ mchog tu ba ba rnal 'phyo gas tu skul bzang nachag ma nyas
299a2(rnying rgyud): ga dang kyag spya pa'i sa s+ho/ des rgyog pa sbyin ma pa sgrul/ dang ba ma // a ma lan// de de ba na shegs pa rnams kyi 'byo mchen pa'i bcu na// / rAHg+h+ra
299a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dam tshig yin pa'i phyir// rab tugs pa'i lha mo mchog rnams so// 'gro ba'i rgyan rnam pa d+ma tshanas 'dul bar bugs la ma khyen// dam tshig thams cad dngos po'i brtan ga yo kun gyu bar 'gyur// rdul ba kun gyi bdag nyid rdul 'byor ba pa'i mtha'
299a4(rnying rgyud): 'am snam rnam stsal to// kyi mdam partag pa'i sa su'adzin pa rab tubasgrub pasto/ a maH// bdi mchog badri drangs rnam par sprul// rna rnam par snang mdzad a la la to// hU~M ba~M hoH/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin tu tho ga tum
299a5(rnying rgyud): gdage pa chen po la bskul ba/ rnam pa mang gzo bo'i nAd kyis sems can maM lus pa// lus pa med par thugs rje'i thugs kyis 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sta ba~M yi// bde mchog sgyu ma thams cad rnam sprul rnam par sprul/
299a6(rnying rgyud): hrISh+T+rIhU~M/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rin chen sad pa chen po la 'phrul ba// nam du ma b.rab tu dga'a' na kyi sems can la// ma thus grag pa meng par 'dril ma bas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sbram la// rnamA
299a7(rnying rgyud): kyi skyem sa mthu sa gshegs pangs su skyes mang bye pa'i 'phrul na/ rnam pam pa da ga tu gyis sun ma/ ma brim pa ngang pa 'a sasas
299b1(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma yi// bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rnam par sprul// ten ta te hrI/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phrag dog rgya gram chen po la bskul ba// rnam pa mang pos srog gi rgyud kyis sems can la// ma lus
299b2(rnying rgyud): lus pa med pa 'dul mkhas paM// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma yi// bde mchog sgyu mas rnam sprul rnam par sprul// hUM bi shwa bi sh+ya hUM// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'gro drug spyod pa'i rgyal po rnams sku rnam par sprul cing phung ba/ 'das pa'i dus
299b3(rnying rgyud): na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba// dri tshe sems can thams cad ni// mngon par zhen cing ltung bar gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam sbal gyis// chog
299b4(rnying rgyud): tshogs 'dod rnams la// las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// 'dul ba'i phyir na sprul pa yin// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por 'di 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam stor
299b5(rnying rgyud): ba// mkha' 'gro snyam bde ba'i mchog/ sgyu ma sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi don mchog rnams// sangs rgyas mdzad pa'i 'dul bas 'grub// ces dpal rdo rje sems dpas dbugs nyung ba'o//
299b6(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu stong pa nyid la brtson// 'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bas//
299b7(rnying rgyud): 'gog shing yongs su mya ngan 'das// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'gro ba thams cad rnam sbyang phyir// sangs rgyas sprul pa kun tu 'gyed// stong pa ma yin mi stor min// dbu mar yang ni
300a1(rnying rgyud): mi dmigs te// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// thabs kyi snying rje'i bdag nyid rnams// dpas na ni snying rje'i thabs// shes rab pha rol phyin pa rags la// rtog pa med pa 'a chas rnams las// sems can
300a2(rnying rgyud): don du yang rtog pa// rnam par mi rtog la mos pas// thams cad rtog pas rtag par bya// zhes rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung na// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
300a3(rnying rgyud): rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad kun// shin tu khrog tum gdug par byer// shin tu gdug cing khros pa yis// 'o dod 'bod cing ltung bar gyur// shin tu gdug cing khro ba la// zhibs phan par mi
300a4(rnying rgyud): te// shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor pas// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum dag bsreg byed na// sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus smos ci
300a5(rnying rgyud): dgos// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dam tshig la sdad rnam srung phyir// du khro dgar gyi phyag/ rgyags la// thar banag po dregs ldan dang // mangs chen 'jug sel lha chen dang // gu lang dbang chen nye dbang bcas// nyi D+ha
300a6(rnying rgyud): rje tshangs pa rnams// bsgral nas thal ba rdul du bshig/ rdo rje kha T+wAM dril bsil shing // thal bar gyur pa 'tsho bar byas// sems can khams ni rnam sbyangs nas// dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams su// sangs rgyas byang chub dag la bkod//
300a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dod khro la sogs kyi// tog pa bla med thams cad ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mkha' klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs// des he chags dbugs kyang ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po
300b1(rnying rgyud): ye// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'groba'i dzulang skyon byung ba// da ma sems can thams cad ni// mag par bskul gnas par gyud// skab shan bya ngan pa yis// 'dad 'bor pa chen par gyur// nal 'byur de nyid bcom ldan
300b2(rnying rgyud): 'das// byang chub sems ni rnam sbyang phyir// chags pa'i bad+mona'i chos// hUM ru kar gnas nyes smon thal// khams gsum nyes sbyangs spyan ras gzigs// pad+ma ga ra dbang phyug rgya dgasal// 'dod chags thams cad dag pa ni// pad+mar sbyar
300b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'dod chags kyis// 'dul bar gsal bas don la sbyor// badz+rag gyi dbang phyug gis// nam ma pa'i mtha' bras rtog pa rnams// sems can khrims rnam sbyang ba 'byor// chags pa rin gyig rnam par sbyang // zhes partag pa
300b4(rnying rgyud): dbang blag gis dbugs blang ba'o// 'das pa'i dus ni sngon byung ba// bdag nyid ldan po rtog pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul tu sngon zung ba// de ma thams can thams cad ni// shon tugadug cing dran mi pa gyur/
300b5(rnying rgyud): brdungs shing brkam pas yi rgyags lhung // de nas 'phos nas dbul por skyes// de yi skyon gyis gsod par byed// shin tu gdug pa spang ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// dam pa'i don chen nyi mabyung // nam mapa'i snying po'ingan
300b6(rnying rgyud): gyi// re ba kun yang yongs rdzogs mdzad// thog tu ma zhi bas mi 'dul phyir// shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor rje// de ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya gsal// 'jig rten gsum sogs rtog pa kun// sbyangs nas yon tan rgyas shing 'phel// rdo rje na mas
300b7(rnying rgyud): dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab lo// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba// ji tsha sems can thams cad ni// brtson 'grus shin tu chung bar gyur// shin tu brtson
301a1(rnying rgyud): das nga ma/ na ngas zlas chud du smranas/ ma na na gzugs// ga zu gas nga pa dun
301a2(rnying rgyud): gtum pa la// zhibs pan par mi 'gyur te// khro ba de bzhin gshegs pa yis// sreg med stobs kyis ngamathon du// rdegs pa po ni mnan nas su/ da tshe yum rnams rang gos spyad// de rgyas dbang drag lhun thub kyis// tsi rnam par yul po
301a3(rnying rgyud): yis// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// sems can rnams kyi don yang byed// rta mchog dpal gyi rgyal po yis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' don bslabs// zhes dpe la rta mchog gis dbugs phyung ba'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas mnyam stor pas/
301a4(rnying rgyud): rigs drug gi 'gro ba la sprul pa rol pa'i lo rgyas bkod pa'i rtog pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku dang gsung dang thugs dang
301a5(rnying rgyud): yon tan dang phrin las 'dus pa las 'di dag byung ngo // Am hA grAshrA r+b+ha tAdz+nyAn badz+ra srAb+hU wa At+ma \u0f85haM/ b+harmA d+hA tu dz+ra mAr+thA la AHko&haM/ d+hIH// pra ba wa daHpaT/ e Aka sha maN+Da la/ yaM ka rma dat+ta ha~M/ bi mA ma ka ri/ su ru ti ma2/
301a6(rnying rgyud): ra n+yai maN+Da la/ rag ta mAM sa kerad+h+waM tsakra mar+N+Na la/ b+h+rU~M badz+ra maN+Da ya/ kr-I N+DA maN+Da li/ g+h+nAM pad+mA maN+Da la/ b+h+rUM badz+ra bi shwa maN+Da ya/ d+hu e maN+Da la/ ka/ bag g+hang / tsa tshwad dz+hanya/ TaHDa D+ha Na/ tu tra ba wAn/ pa phab b+hA ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha
301a7(rnying rgyud): a mAM/ i I/ u A/ r-i dai/ l+r-i mAM/ ai ai/ o au/ oM A d+h+waM/ oM hi ny+dzad+hA a/ oM mAr+d+ha s+saSha badz+ras twa ma~M daHhU ba~M hoH/ sur ta ts+tsha dza badz+ra Sh+Ti swa ya~M ka man+ta/ hU~M badz+ra ki li ki lir+thaM/ bi badz+ri ni rba ra ta hoH/ 'adz+ra

302b7(rnying rgyud): dpe pyang chags// bdem chag dkar mtshal mo skyes// thabs dang zhes rab mda'ag zhu 'dzin// hUM skyes gser mdog e mthod// dbyug gyi rdo rje rin pon pa rnams// bai snang mdad dam pa drang thod// thabs kyi kha rab tu 'khro//
303a1(rnying rgyud): ho ltas ljang bu sra bam mo// dakhrud cing bdun kyar rabacugs la// shang lcags rim bzhin byang du 'khar// e sangs rgyas byang chub dkar mtsho// dus gcig rgyangs mgu mda' gzhu 'phen/ !/ rgyas kyi 'khor la ka
303a2(rnying rgyud): ser ma// dmar skya rnam rgyal ha las byung // tri shul rdo rje gsum lnga 'dzin// khaM/ 'dod pa'i dbang mo ljang gu zhal// dpag bsam lcug ma chung gis bskyod// shar lho nung byang rim skyes so// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal 'khor lo che// dkar 'bar sna
303a3(rnying rgyud): mdzad dge slong cen// chos kyi 'khor lo glegs bam dang // 'khar gsil lhung bzed mtshan dper ldan// k+She/ sgo sang sangs rgyas byang chub ma// rdo rje lde yi rnam par bsgom// raM/ dpa' mo gser mdog cha yang 'khrol// waM/ kun bzang dam ris
303a4(rnying rgyud): rin chen 'dzin// daM/ mi bzad ljang gu dung 'dzin ma// dbus kyi 'khor lo shang nas 'khod// k+ShaM/ sprin chen dmar mo sprin chen 'bebs// daM/ nam mkha'i spyan ma pad+ma dkar// haM/ sangs rgyas dbyangs ma ser mo zhags// tshe skyes dbang po pad+ma

303a7(rnying rgyud): dag// / phra mo dmar po phyug bzhin/ rdo rjebam por khor la 'dags/ phrab tshogs sgrog / ga padza 'an// bdan yul rab tu thos// sa nag mar /
303b1(rnying rgyud): khyod bzhags// dpyong sa tha bas phyogs sul dang // dkang sa mtshan mda' gzhung dkang // 4/ sor mo kha la bu 'khrol// ya/ dmar sar 'khor po rgyabs brgyad pa kar// 8/ sna chags ldang grang dang 'dzid// 'di dag 'byung tshul mdung nas ra// ba
303b2(rnying rgyud): kA yi na gas rdzogs// hUM/ nyi ma ther po mang 'brig yas// gzhu da nyi ma rdo rjes mtshan// hUM/ dbang 'askur dkar mo bri rgyan 'dzin// gas ldan ser mo rin chen skyom// ton rgyal mtshan dmar mo na rkyen rgya la// haM/ mchod chen ldang bar na rjod// gsol la ba
303b3(rnying rgyud): phyogs bzhir gnas// ngi/ mdang 'dzin dmang ser mda' gakhru can// ston no/ khad+h+waM 'gro 'dzin// la/ dmar ser nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can// rdo rje ljang ser mthod sdong can// dudz+ra hi mya rin rkyen rtogs// ma gang dbang dmar po parda la te// zhal gcig phyag ga
303b4(rnying rgyud): rnam par mdzes// yang da rdo dril mdzand// nyi du gcig dang rdza bcu gnyis// dzaH/ rnam gzigs dkar po pad+ma byed// hUM/ grol mdamar s+ya ut+pal sra// waM/ sa 'dzin dgang mi 'khor long dzin// tan khroganyid dang un pa ldang // rje/ gtum po pa ma dzimabyeng /
303b5(rnying rgyud): haM/ rdzogs pad+ma 'khor lo sde/ An pad+ma chu yin rgyal mtshan dkar// tse/ pad+ma ljang zhub d+mang sgrub// byeng byung gyi nang ri'i meg rdzogs// pad+ma gang dbang rje gros rdzogs// AH/ ljang ser rta mchog rta gdong ljang // bdan gsum pa rje tshogs thugs// ra le
303b6(rnying rgyud): mnga' ni bzhi par 'chang // sna tshogs pad+ma mdud rtse gsung // btson gzhon bzhi pa pa dzin// 'gyed 'arji dgar rtsi sbya ldan dgyes// / sna tshogs pad+ma dkar ljang ga yas// ha/ rje tshogs g.yas// las bzhin mchog rim par sbyar/
303b7(rnying rgyud): gram ta ye 'khor lor rdzogs// hU~M skyes dkar po rtazhal 'jugs// ma sbyi lda mo gling bu 'dud// sor mardo ba phreng 'dzin// baM/ nga tshan dmang rarjeri 'drung sa// / rdza su midzod// zlum zhing rgyal nas tha la rdzogs// d+hi rgyas
304a1(rnying rgyud): sa// tu/ sa // na na sa su // na nga/
304a2(rnying rgyud): na 'a lugs gas sa ga/ pa sgra sa dzul/
304a3(rnying rgyud): sa la sa nga ga
304a4(rnying rgyud): smrapa sa ma na du
304a5(rnying rgyud): sa/ sa sa na / 'du gas
304a6(rnying rgyud): sa /
304a7(rnying rgyud): su mchu/ 'ad phes sa / ga pa nga ma
304b1(rnying rgyud): da mongs sus byas pa byang du ba rnam pa stsal pa'o pa pabyud pa ma'o/ nas tha 'dugasangs na// da pa ga bad pa dadang // daTIng dag pa rnye par sprul sa// / dgas ma ga khar ltar dag pas ma pa na// nga /
304b2(rnying rgyud): gshegs su shes la bar sri dmigs kyang // thugs rje'i dang chen chos sra dag pa la sa// ye shrIs smra ma rol cing gshegs su gsol// bsnyengs pa mi mnga' stobs brgya thugs mnga' ba// ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos rnams rab turtogs// da
304b3(rnying rgyud): rten mongs rlon rdzogs pa'i sku// rngams bya'i zhal nas 'jug grog cing // seng ge'ing ngos kyang ni bskyed du med// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis gdon mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'grol brtse ska dag shegs su gsol// mkha' 'gro kun dang babs
304b4(rnying rgyud): cig gshegs su gsol// phra ma gar gyi rol pas 'dzin// rig pa nyid la ye shes 'jug/ mthu ldan dus pa rtog pa sol// mchod pa'i rnam pa thams cad la// rnaMs chu dang zil pa dang // grub pa bzhi yis rab brtan pa// ting 'dzin mtho dang ngo bas
304b5(rnying rgyud): grag// sangs rgyas rnams la can dan rnaMs// rdo sprin la phur bu ma yin// skan ngas bzigs la can den das // gsung narje nyi ma la// me tog kun dang bdug pa na// de bzhin mar mthams cad dang // thos rnams thams cad ji sring pa/
304b6(rnying rgyud): 'chang la dbul du rung // smin dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor ru// yag she 'bar ba'i mgo thod bzhag/ rang byung gi mam pa// go krung dang tana'i rgyan// d+hISh+Tha A~M traSho zhes pa// dbus shar ljon 'a byung du gnas// ye shes 'od lda kha dog 'ab /
304b7(rnying rgyud): dag shu sbal bas kha dog dril// d+hIHlas byung ba ma shes ma// stong gi dardo khong ser can// khams gsum tsho 'arjod rgya mtshor 'khyil// sangs rgyas smin tshogs sbyin pas bstim// lus dag mthu ldan nus partse// bgegs rnams 'joms pa /
305a1(rnying rgyud): marnams kyi mchog/ shangs kyi 'od ci rlung sum nas// 'a la zhang skyo ba gsal byed dbyangs// gang nas rgyas thal ba 'drab// khani bum pa 'bab pa ste// gnabasapa kha dang mardungs// tan tham pa g+sa/
305a2(rnying rgyud): nikang gnyed dang 'dra// can cig nyid dang mtshungs// tshan gdugs chos pa'adra// dza na ma'i mgo bo ba'in// nin chen gzugs s+thAH/ bani snyed zhig hAH// ngan pa na nga // dz+nyA ni
305a3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa da ni// rgyun sbyin padag dang 'jug// mdza dang na// bzla cwa lagag/ derten brgyan dang mchudas// ng+ge ga zlamadzu da// / sa na bzhis
305a4(rnying rgyud): 'di da khyung mgau mtshungs// 'dus rgya ba sti myugaH// ma d+hi kI ba'i mtshul po'i gzugs// blag don dru pa yadang du// wa phyag bya rog la dang sde// shA Sha bo zhi ba'i spyan// sa s+yA / 'brog me nga// na mA rbA mra'i kha sta
305a5(rnying rgyud): rnamam+b+ha kha dang 'gros kyis dkyibs// mtshon pas phrin las rnam 'a ba sdus// Ad+hi r+g+hom b+ha'i mgo bo'i gzugs// A nyid de dang cung zad 'dra// i ni glang chen lhas bu// A~M ni dbang phyu gadzin pa 'dra// Anirnga mo'i mgo de bzhin/
305a6(rnying rgyud): shrI ba'i kha 'dra ba// ngan re bong mgro bo 'dra// yi ge rI ni ming mgo bzhin// yi ge yaM ni glang chen la// l-I ni dbang ldan zhal dang mtshungs// e ni mra he'i kha 'dra // ai nem bya'i kha dang mtshungs// o ni byi la waM kha dang mtshungs//
305a7(rnying rgyud): rgyas bya'i ba dzin// yin smin mgo 'o dra// tshigadrug ya ni rnamag bzhin// sbyor rlabs ma las thebs gsungs pa// ngang pa na nyid kyis rnam pa'ar 'am// thabs dang shes ra'i 'bad pa pas// rang thung ga dang pyid du 'dus
305b1(rnying rgyud): sus na du // smra swA / ga ngas/ smra/ rgyas// dasmra nga/ na
305b2(rnying rgyud): pa dang / mtha' sa gdus pa zhes na // ni ba pa'i // pa nga ba sa// mas// lu sa su bdod
305b3(rnying rgyud): ra / ga gas pa gangs rnams// / ma ga rang ma ma sa / ga ga
305b4(rnying rgyud): su sa smra sa
305b5(rnying rgyud): da t+ta tha~M / / / nga / blam stsal la'o// te/ la ma tho bye ba'i ga pa'o// / skyes zhe/ rkye rdzog/ 'a'adra/

305b7(rnying rgyud): sa su/ sa ma
306a1(rnying rgyud): rnga paT+Ta/ ta Ta ta ba tA ba rba wanata Tab ta/ ta Ta ba ta ba ta don/ dpal rnam par rol pa'o// bta ba tab ta phaT r+thaH/ shin tu byung ba'i mi'i phyag rgya zhes pa b+ha/ sil spyan ni phyag rgya shes byar// sal snyan don la thug cha' sra// rang
306a2(rnying rgyud): med par gsan zhugs pa// sems can don phyir nan tan mchog bskyed cing // ye shes thags rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang // ye shes dang du mo gnyis gcig pas na// 'du 'bral med pa'i dang gsal chos nyid du// me gnyis don spyir mchog gi dngos
306a3(rnying rgyud): grub rnams// bdag la sgrol cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// klu yi phyag rgya 'di dag gis// glu yi phyag rgya gar bya'o// bdag med phyogs phral don dmathugs chud cing // byams dang snying rje dgra zun mi mnga' yang // gdug pa 'dul phyir dus la mi 'da'
306a4(rnying rgyud): pas// mnyam nyid dang gis khro la phyag 'tshal lo// khros pas longs spyod mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'du 'phro mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang rin chen bdun// marmongs rmongs pa kun grol rgyal ba'i gnas// rab tu dga' ba'i
306a5(rnying rgyud): bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// dga' rab mdzod cig dam tshig dam pa grub// sgyu ma nyid la sgyu ma spyod// sgyu ma chen po rigs kyi yum// sgyu mas sgyu ma dga' mdzad ma// tsan+dan dkar dmar nyi zla'i skad// pad+ma rdo rje thabs las byung // dga' dang mchog tu dga' dang
306a6(rnying rgyud): bral// skyes pa lhan cig dga' ba'i ro// rang bzhin dngos po rnam gnyis kyis// myur du dngos grub skyed byed de// 'phral du yid ches byed pa yi no// yid ni nang du chud pa yis// 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgom par bya// rang rdzas thig le phyir phyung nas// sangs
306a7(rnying rgyud): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' mchod// he ni bde chen las byung ba// du ni rin chen chags dang bral// ka ni rab tu rmongs pa spangs// he ru ka sogs dgyes mchod rol// skye ba bdun pa dag pa'i zhing // zhing bcu bskal ba bstan pa'i dgra// ngan song gsum ni snying rje'i
306b1(rnying rgyud): gnas// ting 'dzin partan thob rtul 'byung ngas// thugs tsha dam chog skyeng rdzas bzang // mongs spyod phung po tshogs la ro la// dag pa 'ad gsal chos spa spyor// 'og man b+hag 'i dang / btag// bas rnams la shas tshogs 'gyur ba// gsang ba'i
306b2(rnying rgyud): dam tshig mi bcag phyir// dngos grub snying je mchod pas rol// gzugs med dang ni gzugs snang ba// gzugs kyi mtha' ni rnam par rig/ sgra med sgra ni brag cha'i sgra// rig stong snga ni chos nyid gsung // dri med dri bral stong pa'i dri// rang bzhin sbyor ba sna yi
306b3(rnying rgyud): yul// myong ba med pa myong ba'i ro// med par myong ba bdud rtsi'i chu// reg med reg na bde 'jam zhing // reg pa bzhi bsdus lus kyi gnas// chos med chos te chos kyi mchog/ yod med 'khor 'das bsdus pa'i chos// kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul la//
306b4(rnying rgyud): yum gyi b+ha ga chos kyi dbyings// dam tshig dri med yon tan drug/ b+hags dam bzhin du longs spyod rol// zhes gsungs so// chud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor las/ mchod pa'i sprin rnam par bkod pa'i phyag rgya'i le'u ste rtog pa lnga pa'o//
306b5(rnying rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// skal bzang bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa// mchod rten dben gnas skyed mos tshal// gtsug lag kun dga' ra ba dra// sems dpa' rdo rje dpa' bo bsgrub// dgon
306b6(rnying rgyud): pa mchod rten gtsug lag khang // der ni rnam par snang mdzad bsgom// rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma'i tshul// rdo rje nyi ma rab tu bsgom// pad+ma'i tshal lam chu 'drab tu// pad+ma 'dzin pa rab tu bsgrub// sna tshogs mkhar ram chu bo'i 'gram// rgyal khams gzhan du
306b7(rnying rgyud): rta mchog bsgrub// dur khrod lha rten ma mo'i gnas// he rba ka ni rab tu shis// nyams dga' yid 'ong bsam gtan 'phel// pad+ma 'khor lo rnam pa'i dbyibs// skyon rnams bral zhing yon tan ldan// chom bu rgyas pa bgrub par shis// shes pa'i 'khor
307a1(rnying rgyud): nas dus 'ad // sanasu rdzogs parab tugacas// mthod ma nagasag sa kyiyo ga dang // na shing mang zhal// nga brtag batha dang byur ba dang // bslad bgrang snang bas myo gardzogs// nyes 'gyur dathang sa
307a2(rnying rgyud): te// mdzes shing 'tshams pa rab tu shes// sems dpa'i skyil lung lagangs nas// rdo rje sems dpa'i gar byas te// sngags dang phyag rgya ldan pa yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// rdo rje lus mo gnyis bcings te// rdo rje lce la'o/
307a3(rnying rgyud): bcas nas// bdag nyid stan la 'dug nas ni// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// drag shul can la drag shul sbyor// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// zhabs bzhi pa la rmaM ka pa bzhi// rta mgrin rgyal po bgegs rnams 'joms// pad+ma
307a4(rnying rgyud): skyil krung bcas nas ni// lag pa pad+ma bskor ba dang // sngags dang phyag rgya ldan pa yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par byed// rdo rje nyi ma g.yon brkyang bas// byas btab rmongs byas thal bar byas// khams gsum pa yang 'tsho bar byed/
307a5(rnying rgyud): bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// he ru ka ni rdo rje'i 'gros// gdug pa thams cad spa yang bkod // rdo rje sems dpa' sgegapa mo// dpa' la dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa snying rje'i bdag // rgod pa 'jig rten dbang phyu
307a6(rnying rgyud): mchog/ rdo rje nyi ma khro bo'i nyams// rta mchog dregs pa 'jigs par byed// shAkya thub pa mi sdug pas// ngo mtshar la ni a la la// rab tu zhi ba sangs rgyas so// 'khrul 'khor 'phang ba mdo' dang ni// ma 'phangs ral gri'i phyag rgya dang // la
307a7(rnying rgyud): pas 'phangs pa mdung thung sogs// 'phangs nas slar bzung zhags pa dang // rkang bgyed kyi stobs 'gyed pas// rkang pa gshibs bsas gnon cing // rkang pa bskyed pas sa mnan pa// dkyil 'khor grwa bzhir mnan pa dang // brkyang
307b1(rnying rgyud): gnas gsum men na// dbyibs kyi phyag rgya shes par bya// mi lhod pa la sran gzugs dang // mnyen zhing yan lag bstan pa dang // rgya cher sa bzhi rnam par dag/ lus kyi phyag rgya bde blag can// rkang pa mnan cing rmig pa mnan// mda' gzhu 'dren pa'i rgya
307b2(rnying rgyud): rgya yas// khams gsum rgyal srid chen po dang // rnam par btul nas dga' bar spyod// nyung dkar gu gul rdzas dag dang // rgyal chen mnga' gsol phyogs skyong mnan// khro bcu bkod de dam sri mnan// chos rgyal mnga' gso ba sgo byang gdags/
307b3(rnying rgyud): bgegs dang lan chags sbyin pa dgye// sa yi ri mo bya ba dang // dur khrod zhal pa'i ri mo bya// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dris byugra te// me tog dri ni rta blangs mthun// mchod sogs lha yi lhag par gnas// sgrub pa'i bum pa lha grangs mnyam// gar
307b4(rnying rgyud): bum pa dag dang ni// thams cad las kyi bum pa dang // rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'o// sbyangs nas bsangs ti gzhal yas khang // bskyed drang bstim mchod bstod pa dang // bsnyen pa nye ba'i bsnyen pa dang // bslab pa bslab pa chen po ba'i// dkyil
307b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor rab tu bsgrub par bya// gtso dang 'khor gyi bsnyen pa bsgyur// sbyin bsreg bya zhing las sgrib bshags// skal ldan bu mchog la sogs pa// rtags gdab dam tshig bsre brnya na bya// sems bskyed sdom pa bzung ba dang // bdun po rnam dag slob bskyed
307b6(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs shing // rdo rje'i khu tshur gnas gsum gto // spyi bor bdun dmigs snying mchod dbul// maN+Dal pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// rnam lnga ba ko tsam byugs te// u dum war las byas pa// sdig spangs bcu gnyis me tog thod// dor to
307b7(rnying rgyud): brtags sung skud gdags// dag pa'i sngags kyi khyod chus bkru// rigs lngang ku sha rmi la ma brtags// zhi ba rgyas pa dbang drag dang // rdzas dang mchod pa'i rim pa yis// ngan pa'i ltas la bsregs sbyangs shing // sar pa'i rgyu las khab sbyar te// rdza'am
308a1(rnying rgyud): nyi shu'i kha dog can// rdo rje chun thag la sogs pa// gsang ba'i sngags kyis bsgril nas ni// mtshan ldan mdzes pa lhar gsal nas// oM dzaHzhes ni gtad par bya// nam mkha' gang ba'i bde gshegs rnams// khyed kyi 'gro don
308a2(rnying rgyud): mdzad dus lags// thig gi sgra 'dis bskul nas kyang // de rnams 'dir ni gshegs su gsol// gsung ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dang // dkyil 'khor thig gdab shes rab can// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs nas// shar lho thub byang gyog rnams
308a3(rnying rgyud): su// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor dgu// dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi// 'dus pa'i bdag po 'khor lo can// rdo rje can gyi zla gam dgu// pad+ma dbang gi chu skyes brgyang // rdo rje nyi ma rin chen dbyibs// sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram can// rta yi rgyal po
308a4(rnying rgyud): yang dag gnas// ji srid 'dod pa ci 'byor ba// ji ltar dus dang ci bde ba'i// dkyil 'khor kug tu gnas pa dpal// phrin las karma'i rigs yin phyir// rta mchog phyag rgya cir yang gsal// mtshams bzhi las bzhi dkyil 'khor du// las bzhi'i rigs
308a5(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyal po la// lha mo bcu drug 'khor lo che// rta babs brgyad ldan tA ra na// mdzes pa'i rgyan bzhi 'debs pa'i tshul// phyogs mtshams steng 'og mnyam gnas pas// dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su bskor// ma mo brgyad dang lha chen brgyad// zhing myong shing dang
308a6(rnying rgyud): chen brgyad// rAkya thub ma de mthar phyin cing // mchod rten brgyang ni bsgom tshul mdzad// ye shes me brgyad rab tu 'bar// byams pa'i chu men brgyad 'bab cing // snying rje'i blag brgyad mdzes par brtsegs// dgang ba'i sprin ba rnyad kun tu 'thib// bta
308a7(rnying rgyud): rlung brgyad rab tu 'bud// phyogs skyong ba ru ni rab tu gnas// rab 'bring tha ma'i tshon phye la// sngags kyis byin brlabs pra brtags te// rigs kyi mdog la gnas 'gyur tshon// tshom bu dgu pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// rigs sngas chen por bri ba dang // gdung byang du
308b1(rnying rgyud): phyir dang ba sa// rab ga sa rdzogs pa'i dkyil gabar dang // mug sung thugs kyi thub rgya dang // dbyar ba'i yongs spod gang yin pa// rgyun dang mtho rje gangs byur// srob na grungs slob ma 'jug/ gang la babs pa'i rigs kyi ste// nA phyogs
308b2(rnying rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor ltos// rigs dang sbyar nas dbang yang rdzogs// rgyud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor las/ dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor spros pa'i le'u ste drag pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba sbyin pa zhes bya ba 'dri gsu
308b3(rnying rgyud): lus kyi dkyil 'khor phra bzhi la// rdo rje mchu dang rdo rje bcas// mtshon can po dag bslab pa ni// mthu yis rab tu grub pa ste// pad+ma'i snod kyi nang du gzhug/ chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de 'azhin gshegs// sangs kyis su gyi rje jug
308b4(rnying rgyud): dmachog 'di ni 'da' bar dka'// de yi mtshal dang khu ba dang // mtshal chen po yi bsgrub pa dag/ chags pa chen po las byung bas// dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad// dmar chen po dang gapur bcas// tsan+dan dmar po sbyar bdag/ tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag
308b5(rnying rgyud): ra sa yan kun slong byas// rang gi wa yi sbyor ldan pas// srin lag mthe bo'i rtse mo yis// zhim pa'i btung ba bzhin myangs na// rtag pa yi ni dngos grub thob// b+ha ga pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// skal ldan gsol btab dam tshig sbyir// de nas khrus byas
308b6(rnying rgyud): lus drug/ ci 'byor ba li gos dang kun// sku tshogs gos dag bgos nas ni// 'dri zhim pa'i me tog byung // sna tshogs skal ba bzang po can// slob kya la hUMs dal gyis so// gos dag bkab pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gi 'byung ba bsngal ba ga/
308b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla rnams// shar bdag ni mthong ba yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing // bsod nams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor padade chen dbang 'dod pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// ri ma dang cig char 'jug pa yis// de nyid yang
309a1(rnying rgyud): dag bsgom pani// rig parang bzhin 'od gsal ba// dngos zad rtog pa'i bag chags drag/ sgyu ma ma long gzugs brtan 'angadra // sgyums sam sbyor bsad// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin mi dmigs kyis// chos kyi su 'di shes par gyis// ji ltar nam mkha'
309a2(rnying rgyud): dngas pa la// rang bzhin med ltar rang sems zhog/ 'od gsal chos su rtog med pa// bskrad pas drims kos 'gyur byer// ma bsnyad bu gcig rang ser zhog/ brjid po chen po'i khri ste ra// sal ldan chen po bzhag nas de// gdagasad kyil mtshar bur
309a3(rnying rgyud): dang // rol mo rnams kyis rnam brgyan nas// bdud rtsi rnam rgyal bum pa'i chu// rigs kyi cod pan mdzes par bcing // khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa// gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung // dbang bskur ba yi rdo rje che// mi ldog pa la dbang btu /
309a4(rnying rgyud): sgra dbang mda' gzhu gtad pa dang // shes rab dril bu gsung gi dbang // thugs kyi dbang du me long bstan// yon tan yangs pa mig thur dbang // phrin laswa brtul zhugs chen po'i dbang // gdams ngag 'debs pa tshig gi dbang // gsang ba'i mtshan rtogs
309a5(rnying rgyud): ming gi dbang // nyan dang 'chad dang bskyab pa dang // phrin las dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur// 'khor lo rkang par bzhag byas nas// lag pa g.yas par dung sbyin te// g.yon par lce ni sbyin par bya// 'jig rten kun la thams cad du// sems can kun la na pa'i
309a6(rnying rgyud): ra sna tshogs 'dul gyur pa// rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu brko// / khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// pad+ma'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// sna tshogs 'khor lo rab tu bskor// kye spyod rnal 'byor nud rnams la// 'khor lor ba
309a7(rnying rgyud): bskor ba dang // tha med rnal rgya chen po la// ma rdza a ny+tsa tel// blo dang madz+ra slar 'khor lo bskor// 'gro drag sems can dbugs phyung zhig/ dri nan yaM shes mnyes bya'i phyir// gang la yongs su btang dka' ba// gang yin de ni mchog tung shad//
309b1(rnying rgyud): dang gang la yid 'ong mchog/ de dang de ni bla mar dbul// yang na shin tu khyad par can// bla ma'i sems la dgos pa gang // de dbul yang na zho sha dbul// dngos po chung la mnyes pa mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa'i yon dbul ba'o// bu mo shin tu brgyan pa'am/
309b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin chung ma sdug pa gang // kul nas yon gyis bsdu ba yin// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog yin no// rdo rje rigs la bdag nyid dbul// slar yang rim gyis bslu bar bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal sbyor ba'i// 'bul ba yon gyi mchog yin no// mu tig ba
309b3(rnying rgyud): po rdor bu dang // shin tu dkar ba'i ras zung dang // de bzhin rtani dkar po dag/ pad+ma can gyi yon mchog yin// rgyal rigs longs spyod gter rnams dang // gos dang rgyan gyi tshogs rnams dang // de bzhin mchod pa thams cad ni// rdo rje nyi ma'i yon yin no// shin
309b4(rnying rgyud): brgyan pa'i rta dag dang // glang po shin tu brgan pa yang // shing rta rin chen gang ba dang // rta dag rta mchog yon yin no// bla ma mnyes par gang byas pa// de ni rlung yang mchog yin te// che sde rin chen ri rab tsam// chung ste khab sru du yan chad la// bla ma mnyes pa gang 'dra
309b5(rnying rgyud): pa// dkyil 'khor dgu yi yon yin no// rgyud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas mnyam par sbyor ba las/ dbang bskur phyag rgya'i le'u ste rtog pa bdun pa'o// // de nas thabs yod par byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// bla med gsang zhugs skal bzang
309b6(rnying rgyud): po// ji ltar rgyad 'phel grub 'dzin pa// rtsa ba sku gsung thugs rnams bsrang // dus bzhir rigs drug zur bsgomu zhing // gsang sngags phreng ba dag la 'chang // rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgom byed pa// sbyor lam kun las nyams pa med// wang dang sngags dang las
309b7(rnying rgyud): skyes ma// mtshan bzang gang yin pade bkye// ngam chog gsang ba kur tu 'thung // zhing ba cu'i tshogs la gnas spor cing // 'gal bdag la mtshon cha'i char// bab nas bde bar gshegs la 'brel// sram thug dam tshig la gnas byer// de mchog dam pa
310a1(rnying rgyud): rtags ca// / nam thas / b+h+ya// zhas phyug rgya lagan // ba dpa myed pa ma pas pa// phas pa bad pa thams cad 'drang// rabardzun pas grub pa ga// / sa d+has sa nya ba dang ma mnyam pa// nams khas
310a2(rnying rgyud): mapa 'azlas pa'aM// 'ardeg cig pad pas 'grub 'gyur// dam chog tsos kyi phyag sa 'dis// gang dag thus par mthar cig/ khrel dung gzung mgur cig/ dam pa kyichen de dag med/ bya la d+had+ha si d+ha la gnas samad+has tsun m+b+haH/
310a3(rnying rgyud): zug mchog 'di/ sems pan mams cad babyed pa// stobs kyis rlung du ga // na pazhi de byed 'jug/ rtag ta 'i na pa/ mi ma grag tu na// 'dod pa di ban ldan pa'i// Sh+Ta /
310a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal gnas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub ba bsla nas// bud med gzhan gyi gyi zhig sa// dzAbag ta hriH/ rab thams cad kya rdzogs pa// chos kyi khrag nu dam pa 'di// rab thams cad rigs byed ba'i// ba pad+mab ta la yo
310a5(rnying rgyud): rgyas kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// 'jig na thams cad ba tu 'jig/ 'di rnams das tshig mchog yin te// chos kyi sreg tu shes pa'o// zhe sdang chen pos zhe sdang ba// gti mug chen pos gti mug tsa// de rdul rgyal dag la gnas// 'dod chags can la 'dod chags/
310a6(rnying rgyud): sbyor// de 'irjid cag dag zag dag nyid// khong khror barbab tum garig rgyan// drug go'i jigs kyid rig sa par byed// rigs kyi dpa chog chen poni// rigs dru drug thabs kyis 'drug// da chog rnam pa cing ldang yang // tshub nyid dang las ma yongamasan
310a7(rnying rgyud): kyang yan lagazi da bor// grub pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs// slob dan la ni rtag tu gus// mched la gdung zhing gsang brdug// sngags dang phyag na tshun mi gtsang // rig pa nyid du skyes pa'o// zhes gsungs so// rgyun gyi rgyal po sangs byas mnyam
310b1(rnying rgyud): sgor las/ thams cad yod pad ma chog gre le'u sa rtog pa bcud pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sna tshogs rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// 'gro ba'i 'khor lo mchod pa ni// yongs grub 'dod yon lha sbyar ga pa
310b2(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang 'dod yon lha mor bcus// rigs drug rgya tshogs ma par mchod// 'dug pa'i 'khor lo bsgom pa ni// dpral ba mkhyen pa sgying ga spyi// lte ba lkog ma gas parba// rnal 'byor 'khor lo drug bsgom ste// lag pa gzar ba rnam gnyi kyis
310b3(rnying rgyud): lus kyi dkyil 'khor mchod nas ni// ye shes mes ni bag cha shes bsreg/ thal ba bshang lam las phyung ba// nang gi sbyin sreg mchod pa'o// phrin las 'khor lo bsgom pa ni// dge dang mi dge lung ma bstan// lus ngag spyod pa rnam dag pa// 'od
310b4(rnying rgyud): gsal chos sra bsgom par bya// hrIN+Da las sgrib dag mchod pa'o// nyams chag skong ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba ni// rigs drug lha yi thugs ka dra// d+ha mchog 'khor lo nyid bsgoms nas// de la dbang lnga bkur byas na// nyams pa dag par byed pa ste/
310b5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig nyams pa dbang bskur mchod pa'o// rtog pa 'khrul pa'i 'khor lo bsgom pa ni// nam rtog shas che'i rnal 'byor pas// khrus kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa ste// rigs drug mdun du 'khor lo drug/ bum pa drug ni rdzas dang ldan// lha bsgoms
310b6(rnying rgyud): ga ni grangs rdzogs nas// dkrus pas 'dag pa'i mchod bya'o// le lo gzhom pa'i 'khor la ni// le lo shes tshe'i rdul 'byor pas// rgyan chad med pa thun bzhin// rtswa yi 'kho mo slobasla ba sa// l+r-ing bsgril pa'i phra yinaH// rmi lam nga
310b7(rnying rgyud): slar bsgom par bya// le lo 'joms pa'i mchod pa'o// yid phyo gsang ba'i 'khor lo ni// yid ni sgo ba'i rnal 'byor pas// rgyun du lha yi rnal 'byor goms// dang po'i las kyi rnal 'byor pas// grangs ngas mtshan
311a1(rnying rgyud): ma bskrad pa stsal// yang slobs pad+ma mdzad pa'o// ma brtan pa yagapa s+ho// mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pasmra// mtshan ma brtan par bskos par thA// brtan pa zab pa'i mdzad nan/
311a2(rnying rgyud): brtan pa yang dag sbyor ba'i 'khor lo ni// mtshan thob mngon shes skyes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mchog gi dngos grub yang dag ye shes bsgom// yang dag dbang bar bsgom pa'i mchod pa'o// 'di ltar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gang yin pa/
311a3(rnying rgyud): rab ni sgra lnga spyan grub thob// 'bring ni reg 'don rnam bzhi'i lus// tha ma lha mi'i mtshan rdzogs pa// 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'di gsungs so// rang gi lha yin la 'byor pas/
311a4(rnying rgyud): gdong rgyan gon te bslab pa ni// gsang sngags brjod na 'grub pa ste// oM T+wAM ki hU~M / lhar gsal nyin re de brjod na// rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub thob// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub ni// 'di mchog ma yi ting 'dzin gyis// spong bzlas bslab bya
311a5(rnying rgyud): gleng gcod 'gyur// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnal 'byor gyis// tsigs bsrub bya'i snying bcad nas// oMdz+dza daM hU~M phaT/ bzlas na bsgrub byag du yin pa// me shi'i bar du 'gugs par byed// khrag 'thung chen po spya sha ni// bsgoms te 'di nyid dag tu
311a6(rnying rgyud): brjod// oM shud+d+he mu// bzlas na mkha' 'gro thams cad 'grub// byin rlabs mngon sum lam mkhas pa// rnal 'byor can gyi sgrub pa pos// oM DA k+ki ni hUM daM// bzlas na nyes pa kun las grol// rigs drug bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dge ba'i
311a7(rnying rgyud): btul zhugs byas nas ni// blo bsdams lce rtse rgan gtad nas// oM AHhUM zhes brjod na// rdo rje'i bzlas pa de yis ni// rgyal dkun gyi sku gsung zhugs// thig le stong pa yi ge gsum// kun dang mthun pa de nyid thob// bzhengs bzhugs spyod la mtha
311b1(rnying rgyud): t+pas// sbru las byung ba'i sa// mthung nag zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// skyong nyid dang thabs kyi mdal// mA ye kha T+Ta shes dbyug wa// nga gi b+hag d+hArnam par 'dzin// kawa ra la sogs mya mo bcad// thug pa dag pa'i / la 'khor mjug/ 'thab
311b2(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa gi tu badzod// sngags 'dis longs rdzogs d+ha bur ba// oM bad+ma ts+tshi hi ru ka ma d+ha marba daSh+TAn// sru gsal rnal 'bror de nyid la// bka' nyan zhi bskos bcings pan// bgegs kyi sgor bkun dang bral// kaM las rdo rngogo khrab ste// zhes nan rgyan
311b3(rnying rgyud): bsnams// sgro las rin chen na d+haH// 'ag gnyis mdzu gaN+Dal ba cing // rar+thamA la oMts+tsha // rin chen phreng bas bcing ba dang // parba la~M/ d+ha d+ya blangs dkar pog yas spya phur// adz+hai hrIHla/ dang dbyang sa dmar pa ga yon du 'thar ba /
311b4(rnying rgyud): dur khrod thod pa'i khang pa na// hU~M yig rdo rje yongs gyur byas// oM shrI he ru ka b+h+rUM zhes pa/ brjod 'gying nag po rdo rje 'phyar// dung dmar ba dan kha T+wAM ces// oM/ badz+ra hi dra ka kA pa rul du wa hU~M dz+dza/ gsang sngags 'di la gnas gyur na// da lta nyid du sangs rgyas pa
311b5(rnying rgyud): nas gsungs so// chud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas mnya ma sbyor las/ las sna tshogs par las kyi phreng ba'i le'u ste rtog pa dgra pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// oM mnya ma nyid mig yo
311b6(rnying rgyud): mnyam nyin mchog gi chos kyisan// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sprin mdad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam nyid dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de/
311b7(rnying rgyud): ni dang mkha' la yang kun tu yod pa med// dngos bu mthar yang mnyas mede pe dang bral ba'i rnams// sems can 'ams la dngos kyu' mchog rnams ngas par rtsol// rtag tu drim zed ma thugs nga'i thugs las byung // sngon lam 'grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i tsha
312a1(rnying rgyud): // can// 'gro ba'i don srung rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rnga chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa shin tu mnyes gyur kyang // khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog
312a2(rnying rgyud): stsol mdzod pa yi// thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yang mi 'gyur// e ma ho shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sprin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog mnyes pas// khams gsum kun la dngos grub mchog sgrol mdzad pa yi// mgron po dus gsum
312a3(rnying rgyud): sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen // dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis shin tu gdug pa 'dul ba'i tshogs rnams la yon tan bsngags pa 'di gsungs so// sgeg pa dpa' ba 'dis
312a4(rnying rgyud): su rungs pa dang // nod dang gshe dang rngams pa'i nga ro dang // snying rje rngam dang ngo mtshar chen po dang // skra yi dngos po shin tu 'gyur ba'i ga ra// dur khrod rus pa'i rgyan rnams rab tu mdzad// theg mchog glang chen ko ba brjid dang ldan// thabs mkhas zhing chen pags pa mdzes par/
312a5(rnying rgyud): rgyan// 'od sgeg stag gi pags pa chos nyid rgyan// rak+ta thal chen zhag gis mi srin dbang du sdud// bdud dang srin po tshar gcod cu rnga sgrol// dpa' rtags mtshon cha thabs kyi ye shes me// bdud kyi bdud 'joms bdud dpung thal bar rlog/ dag po drag chen drag tul he ru Sha// mtshan
312a6(rnying rgyud): dpos rgyan ldan 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// skra yi gar mdzad gsang sgor 'gro ba 'dug/ tug chom 'brug sgra stong khams bgegs la sgrogs// kad rgyangs gad mos gsang ba'i bshugs klu len// rtag chad mu stegs 'gog pa nyan thos bu// dman pa'i theg pa log lta 'byung po 'dul/
312a7(rnying rgyud): seng ge'i nga ros gcan gzan gzug pa 'dul// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis skal ldan rnal 'byor myong // chos 'chad log lta tshar gcod bdud rdegs 'dul// ngan song stongs mdzad thar pa'i lam la 'god// thugs rjes 'dren pa snying rje'i rgyug bag can// smon 'jug sems lnga brkyed
312b1(rnying rgyud): cing nan mangs 'dul// zhidas thams pa'i gsang ba kun la sgrogs// 'dul sbal ma sungs pa' brur rgyun kyang // nga mthar gzugs spyang khang stong nam mkha'i 'anga'// sems can na mdzad 'dul sa nyan mangs pa// rin pa'i rgyal babu med te drag/ rig 'don rnal grong
312b2(rnying rgyud): grub mchog stsol mdzad// rnam dag sgra lnga 'jigs pas nam mkha' 'dra// sha dang khrag med stong pa ye shes sgra// gdos banas dug 'joms dpa' bo 'jigs pa bral// sku gsum lhun grub brdal ba thig le che// snang stong dbyer med shes rabathangs ldan sgra// 'khor dang myar na 'das pa
312b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs par rol// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor las/ yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u ste rtog pa bcu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sras sangs rgyas byang chub skal ldan ma dang / zhal bzang ma dang / kun bzang ma dang / mi bzang ma dang / sprin chen ma dang / nam mkha'
312b4(rnying rgyud): spyan ma dang / sangs rgyas dbyangs ma dang / dbang mo dang / bde mchog ma dang / e ma bde ba dang / sgrol ma dang / zla ba mo dang / sangs rgyas byang chub ma dang / chos kyi 'khor lo ma dang / kun bzang ma dang / kau ri ma dang / tsau ri dang / pra mo ha dang / pe tA li dang / puk+ka li dang / g+hasma re
312b5(rnying rgyud): dang / tsaN+DA li dang / sma sha ni dang / mda' 'dzin ma dang / kha T+wAM 'dzin ma dang / 'khor lo 'dzin ma dang / sna tshogs pa dan 'dzin ma dang / dbang skur ma dang / gter ldan ma dang / rgyal mtshan mchog dang / mchod rten ma dang / mda' gzhu 'dzin ma dang / ral gri 'dzin ma dang /
312b6(rnying rgyud): nyi ma 'dzin ma dang / sbyin sreg ma dang / rnam gzigs ma dang / sgrol ma ri mi dang rdzas 'dzin ma dang / khro gnyer ma dang / gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma dang / sna tshogs pad+ma dang / pad+ma'i na bza' ma dang / 'dod pa'i dbang mo dang / sna tshogs pad+ma n+ya gra ma ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje ma dang /
312b7(rnying rgyud): gling bu ma dang / pi wang ma dang / rnga chen ma dang / rdza rnga ma dang / me tog ma dang / bdug pa ma dang / mar mo ma dang / dri chab ma dang / la sbram dang / mA le ma dang / gIrti ma dang / nI rti ma dang / gzugs rdo rje ma dang / spa rdo rje ma dang / dri rdo rje ma dang / ro rdo rje ma dang / lcags
313a1(rnying rgyud): kyu 'dzin ma dang / zhags pa 'dzin ma dang / lcags sgrog 'dzin ma dang / zil bu 'dzin ma dang / gzhan yang dbang po thams cad dang / dpa' mo thams cad dang / rig 'dzin thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su gyur pa thams cad dang / gsang ba'i rigs
313a2(rnying rgyud): su gyur pa thams cad kyis/ mnyes pa chen po'i mchod pas mchod do// rtog pa'i rgyal po nyid la rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ nyid la nyid snang ngo // nyid la nyid spyod do// nyid la nyid gnas so// nyid la nyid sdud do// nyid la nyid spel lo// nyid la nyid spogs so//
313a3(rnying rgyud): yongs su spro'o// shin tu spro'o// yongs su shin tu spro'o// spro de nyid dbyer med par gyur te/ gzhi 'dus pa'i rgyud bstan to// lam spros pa'i rgyud du ston to// 'bras bu yongs su 'dus pa'i rgyud du ston to// mang du bskyed pa'i rgyud du bstan to// nyung ngu sdud pa'i rgyud du bstan to// yongs
313a4(rnying rgyud): su 'dus pa rtsa bar bstan to// yongs su bkod pa bshad par bstan to// lkog tu gyur par ston pa kha skor bstan to// mdud pa dgrol bar dka' ba gcod par bstan to// des de bzhin du gsungs so// de nas de bzhin du mkhyen to// de rnams de bzhin du yi rang bar gyur to// mngon
313a5(rnying rgyud): par 'dud par gyur to// de nyid de bzhin du gyur to// de nyid de bzhin sdud do// de nyid de bzhin bsdus nas de bzhin du gsungs so// yongs su gsungs so// rnam par gsungs so// de nyid gsungs pa bzhin 'dzin/ yongs su 'dzin to// rnam par 'dzin to// rgyud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas
313a6(rnying rgyud): mnyam sbyor las/ yongs su bkod pa'i rtog pa la rjes su yi rang zhing bstan pa gtad pa'i le'u ste rtog pa bcu gcig pa'o// // sdud pa'i chud dam pa gsang chen gyi rtog pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba/ mkha' 'gro sgyu mi bde mchog/ dus gsum
313a7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku 'dus pa chen po'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta sU h+ya gsang ba dang / bod kye lo ts+tshang 'brog mi dpal gyi ye shes kyis bal yul du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
313b1(rnying rgyud): thAg+sa sa smra/ sa ma rag sa na / / dbupas sa ba spya smra chub gyud s+hos/ dngu sangasas dpang 'artag /
313b2(rnying rgyud): dpung sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gas dpa mchog gi dgyes pa ni// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'di ni dang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu rab tu tsho ba'i lha// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam spong ba// mkha' 'jo stsam
313b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i mchog/ chags med chags dang bral ba'ang men// dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so// bud med kun gyi sku ma'i rgya// 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma dag na thams cad pas// bud mad snyam khyad par che// ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis// rang bzhin gyis ni de 'gru pa
313b4(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gsum 'dir dbud med 'dris// gus par byed pa dag tu 'gyur// rnyed dang bde dang dga' kun gyis// ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur// rang gi ngo bo yongs bskur na// bud med kun gyi sgyums 'grub// ngo mtshar sde ma'i phyag rgya 'di// mkha' 'gro ma nas brdar
313b5(rnying rgyud): bstan to// rna ni nam ma par 'gro ba zhes// khams las mngon du btags pa ste// nam mkha kun tu spyod 'grub pas// mkhor 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags// thams cad ma lus phrag rgyu yi// thams cad ma lus bde mchog gis// srings rgyas thams cad mnyam spong ba// ma'
313b6(rnying rgyud): 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags// de ni nam mkha' 'gro ba zhes// sangs rgyas pamasA las rnam par brtags// kun tu 'gro bar grub pa ni// sangs rgyas kun bdag mkha' 'gro ma'o// shrI zhes bya ba bde bar bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi babede rkyen yin// su ma thams cad rab sbyor ba/
313b7(rnying rgyud): mchog tu bdabs pa de ba mchog/ kun tu sa nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid tu d+ha ma pa kun// sangs rgyas la sogs ba nag yo phran// kun gyi ngos pa bdag gyur to// sems dang sems dpa' ting 'dzin dang // byang chub spyod pa snga tshogs nyid// de bzhin 'dud
314a1(rnying rgyud): 'amal// don byung chubs sa nas 'on// da ji nyid dang // dbazhin pa d+ma da// d+hA dang / dedag ga yang gus pan// du 'a gas/ 'do nag smra la// 'dod pa dang nagrol bul ston// ga
314a2(rnying rgyud): gsum mchog gsam dang // 'jig rten gsus dang kham sa gsum dang // rnam pasna tshogs pa dang pa'o// gangs pa thams cad de nyid do// 'gro dag ni malus kun// thams cad drini 'di gyur no// de la sogs pa mtha' las mag/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mamanyam
314a3(rnying rgyud): pa// namam par dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// dngos po rnams cad de yi ti// nAMmamakha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' di bzhin gshegs// mangs kyis thams cid mnyam spyong ba// mkha' 'gro snyam bde mchog ga// bskal ba b+ha ba grangs med byar/
314a4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad ma thob pa// phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis// tshe 'di nyid kyis thob 'gyur ba// de nyid bdag gis brtag par bya// sangs rgyas kun bdag bde ba'i mchog/ bdag nyid shin tu bslabs pa las// sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog go// rnal 'byor yang dag
314a5(rnying rgyud): ma yin sems// lha la dmyigs par byed po dag/ rnal 'byor gzugs parnyan rang bzhin te// lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor ste// yang drug mchog se mas rnal 'byor pa// b+ha la migs par byed pa dag/ rang gi mchog mnyam sbyor ba// mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur//
314a6(rnying rgyud): gzugs brtan lugs la sogs pa la// rnal 'byor skye bar mi 'gyur gyi// byang chub sems la rab brtson na// de las rnal 'byor lhur 'gyur ro// byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// de bas thams cad bdage slong bas// sangs rgyas thams cad
314a7(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' ba thams cad bdag yin no// de bas bdag nyid lter sbyong bas// bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya// de yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dbang po rnams kyang thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du//
314b1(rnying rgyud): du bar gyur// nas bamam ldan 'das da ba ngasamam dngas dand gsungasas// sangs rgyas thams cad dang ma ma par gyur pa ma 'a bya ba snyam padapa mnag las kho nyid kyang ba dam pa'i phral la 'jug pa lags kyigags ga pa lta ga/
314b2(rnying rgyud): pa khyod sa ldan 'dag// rdzu seMm dpa de bzhin gagags// sa sa rgyas rnams padas rgya spyong ba/ mabyi gro ma da mchog// rdung mang+yas dnga' bdag sbyor ba// dab pazas da pa / ngas nas thams pa ma sa stong /
314b3(rnying rgyud): 'byor dbang phyug bde ba ci// de bas bdi banyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas bde bkun 'thob bo// sangs rgyas thams cad mnam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug pa chen po// 'di la khrus dbang snyom mi dgos// dkara' thab dkang bskad mi dgos// dka' thub sdom pa med pa dang /
314b4(rnying rgyud): bde ba dang mi gang bas 'grub// depas de ltar 'dod spyod cing // kun na de bzhin thams cad spyod// spyod pa'i ltar 'dod par byed// g.yo ba dag kyang ci dag byed// langs pa dang ni 'dug pa'am/ 'jug gram nga lta ga meng // dgod ngam rab tu ga ya ru
314b5(rnying rgyud): gdan de ltar spyod kyang rung // dkyil 'khor du yang ma rdzogs pa'am// sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa 'ang rung // rang gA ltar ni bdag sgron// bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid rnapa 'byor 'di yis ni// thamus cad 'grub par byed pas na// ngan zos ngan spyod bams ca
314b6(rnying rgyud): sa// tis pa dag tu ngas kyi 'gyur/ sprul pa byu ba thub ba// sang sa rgyas dam pa thams pa dang / drug d+hA tshig dag gis ni// bslabastan pan ba 'gyur pa// bad+mag nyi gu 'a pe byed pa'i martog/ 'di ni dug gis brtag par bya// sangs nas khrims ca
314b7(rnying rgyud): ma sa nga ga/ kyi / su ra gyur// byi na/ sa
315a1(rnying rgyud): mi spyod// shin tu byin gyis brlabs nas tAM// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang matam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun drang mnyam pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//
315a2(rnying rgyud): gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing // rnam pa kun tu mchod byeng na// de yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // mthong zhing mchod pa byas par 'gyur// 'od dang sangs rgyas thams cad la// mthong ba dang ni reg pa yis// dkyil 'khor dag tu maklags pa'ang // bdan pa
315a3(rnying rgyud): dag myang mthong bar 'gyur// mthong ba dang ni rig pa dang // thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing // sangs rgyas dngos grub thams cad 'grub// 'dri dang sangs rgyas thams cad la// rdul 'byor thams cad mnyam myong bas// bud med dag
315a4(rnying rgyud): rnam grol zhing // sangs rgyas byang chub reg par 'gyur// kun tu kun nus thams cad ni// bdag nyid rnam pa thams cad du// sangs rgyas thams cad dngos grub par// de yi bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur// 'di ni 'dag nyid kun gnas pas// mdzud pa'i smin chen thams cad
315a5(rnying rgyud): bdod par 'byamachog sa dag gis// dang 'dug shes sa sa dpa mangs/ gdapal/ sa rgyas dpa' bajig gyur ba// sangs rgyas kun rang gyi// bde ste mad ni sgru ba par gyur/ la 'byor ba sa gas
315a6(rnying rgyud): dpal ni gzhir 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur// rdul 'byor kun ni bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de yi nye bar sbyor ba ni// khams gsum mA lus thams cad do// rnal 'byor kun gyis longs spyod kyis// dri ltar bde bar bstan byed cing // rang gi
315a7(rnying rgyud): sgra yi rnal po khyod kyis// bdag nyid rab tu mchongasar bya// rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing // rnal 'byor kun gyi bde bdag/ bdag nyid kun tu myong byed na// shin tu sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// ra ma yin bdab 'dis/
315b1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i dpa' tshe dang // pang tshond med pa de mchog 'grub// kun tu kun na sa thams cad kun// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam skyong ba// mkha' 'gro blam byede ba'i mchog/ rtag tu das ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skar ces
315b2(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mapa' 'gro sgyu ma badre ba'i mchog las dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu sbyor ba'i rtog pa ste gnyis pa'o// // 'di ni rdul 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas
315b3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa dmanyam skor ba'o// mkha' 'gro sbram bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje se sa pa'i rnal 'byor pa// dpal ldan rang gi dam tshig bad// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyong ba'i// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i// mtha
315b4(rnying rgyud): ni thams cad du/ phyag rgya bde ba chen po ku ni// so so rjes sbyar ba 'grub 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpung dpal sbyor bas// mthun kyis nI thams cad du// rnal 'byor bde ba mos pa kun// sos rjes su dang 'grub 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas// mthund
315b5(rnying rgyud): ni thams cad du// bde ba'i mos pa'i dngos grub kun// so so'i rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// rdo rjesems dpa' da bal sbyor bas// na bu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// bde ba mos pa'i dbang phyug kun// so so'o rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas/
315b6(rnying rgyud): mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' yas pa'i// bud med mchog rnams skye bar 'gyur// de yo dam tshig de byung ba// skrag pa'i dam tshig bdag rjes 'brang // shin tu skor dang sbyor chen po// thams cad bdag nyid dam tshig mchog/ gcig bzhin du ni
315b7(rnying rgyud): bcos myong pa/ lhan cig spong bas rjes song sdug/ sangs rgyas thams cad lanyas slong ba// 'jo ste mchog tu 'bar// jings cad gang ba ma lus pa // phyag tu thams cad bde 'che// rtag pa dam pa lha mo yi// rgyal chos mchod pa thams cad mchog/ rdorje rnams
316a1(rnying rgyud): la6// dpa' sbyor ba dang // thams cad sta 'dus pas ni// ma lus hral ba bzang po kun// bede bas so so rjes su 'grub// phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa las// rdo rjemapas dpa' che ba'i // nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// l+h+wa mo bang pa chen mo dran// tha sa/
316a2(rnying rgyud): cad rnal 'byor bde bas myos// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'phe// phan tshun du ni rab dga' bas// skyes bu'i tshul gyis dga' bar byed// dbang po kun na 'byung ba yis// mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi// bkod pa rab 'byam tshogs rnams kyang // thams cad bdag nyid
316a3(rnying rgyud): mchod par byed// rnal 'byor bde ba thams cad kyi// dbang bskur bde chen las byung ba// rin chen tshogs rnams thams cad kyis// rab tu rmongs pas dbang bskur 'gyur// lha ma kun gyi longs spyod la// ci bde bar ni bsten bya ba// bdag ni che ba'i sgrar stor bas/
316a4(rnying rgyud): bdagul bdag gis rab tu mchod// rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yi// rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing // rtag tu myong bar byed pa na// shin tu stong bas rab 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi// ra sa yin bde ba des// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang /
316a5(rnying rgyud): lung nad med pade mchog 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi sgra chen dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal chen po// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug k+Shan
316a6(rnying rgyud): gyi gtso// rin chen dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ de dag dang ni dga' stong na// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro'ong ldeng // lha mo thams cad grub chen po// 'khor los spar ba rab tu 'grub// chos dbyings man ma dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthus sbas par// dngos
316a7(rnying rgyud): grub kun gyi bde smos pa// de las rgya chen mchog gzhan med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam slong ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug pa chen des// 'di la tsa 'di nyid kyis ni// rnam pa kun tu mi 'grub pa'i// dngos grub kun gyi bde myos pa// chos dbyings mnyam rang mi
316b1(rnying rgyud): bta pa// nabam pa'i dbyings ma 'tha byas pa'o// dbang rnab thanam pa thos pa// dam pa rnachen gang yang med// sangs cas thams cad pa ma b+h+yor bya// mabang nga po snyam pa mchog das// 'di da nyid kyis // dam ga tu'i 'dra ba da
316b2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo sems dpas de gang gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams ca dang mdam par sbyor ba mkha' 'tho snyam ba pa'i mchog las// lha mo byams cad dang mnyatsho bar spong bskal ba mchog bzang po dngul marji mchog pa rtog pa gsums/
316b3(rnying rgyud): 'di'i rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnis sbyor ba// mkho 'gro snyam bde ba'i mchog/ lha mo dran dang matam stong ba/ skal ba bzang mchog 'dod pa ste// yang dag sbyor ba'i 'di myong pa// 'dod zag sa
316b4(rnying rgyud): na pa'o// sang sa gas rkyen dang // dbyang sa dang dang dug dang // rgyas sa dag pang // rang gi spyod par brgyud/ yangs kyis rlol rgya nang sa dang // gtsu me du sa rnams da gad // ngas pa spong ma da
316b5(rnying rgyud): mi'i// rgal bzang bud med ci nag spos// lha yi dngos grub dpa' ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub pa de chen po// skal ba bzang po par myong bas// so sor rdzas sna rang 'thub 'gyur// dngos grub thams cad las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kung rje dpang // dal
316b6(rnying rgyud): bzang po'i longs stong ban// rang gi spyod par du stod do// rdo rgyan gyi sru mchog dang // 'jig rten dbang po la chog gyid pA la// sangs rgyas dga' bas bde dam pa// rdzogs n+ya sbyinye par spyod par byed// kham sa g+ha ru ma dag na ma lus pa'i// sadas rgyas rbal srid chen po
316b7(rnying rgyud): kyar/ thal gyi stongs byas ngamadzad du// rmugs nim par spyod byed// sangs rgyas su kyi thub chen po/ mchos gi dbang phyug ngam bdag / ldan na sa thogs nas spyod na/ mongs stong pazhan sa kyin spro/ mthung las ni bas pa ban/ 'gas /
317a1(rnying rgyud): rngab dang du la sa dpal// pas kyis bas sa da// ra ba / mas pa byan napa 'o/ ga da ga pa nga stsa/ bas stos bya thogs gang// des dus pa grub
317a2(rnying rgyud): pa'adug se la dbang tsamam// mchog gi dbang byag dam pa dag/ ba rgya pa thogs te dz+nyA n-i// 'a stong gzhan d+d+hoH// dbyas mi snad gang shing // sangs kyi don tha bdun/ bya ba dgang yang med/ rnyen pa dang byed pa'ang
317a3(rnying rgyud): sag sa chog sa // des tha sa sa pa
317a4(rnying rgyud): rna sa mang/ so sa/ dag su sbya
317a5(rnying rgyud): pa nan pa sa pa ts+tsha ba byu nyid nga da/
317a6(rnying rgyud): chos dang mthun sa tshur gad// la la 'jig rten gas ma rgyal baM// ba pa kun mi bya byug // pa la rtog pathamapa tsa m+b+ha Ni// thub pa 'i dbang b+hag b+han myed// del sogs pa byan 'gas mchog/ pa sa sa pa bdag bdu gas/
317a7(rnying rgyud): par thabs spangs pa'i gang// rnam par sprul pas dgyes ni tshom/ ngos su na sa / 'danabang 'i 'a // gzu pa nga slos// dpal lnga rje sems dpa' bzhin// 'om pa dgags brten na dang /
317b1(rnying rgyud): gagags par bya mdzad// ma mang pal lda ma chog/ mas dpar ra tu 'jug/ thams can pams ni du ma dag/ mthu pa ni b+hab rgyas 'dabs// lha dang bya cu ba dka' brnams// btan pa sebs pan ga ga d+hin// bangs rgyas ngan pa dag pa
317b2(rnying rgyud): sa/ sab canacan gyi do bye byeb// mthus sre pa meng pa la// bskum bu sa phyi par gnas// rjes bcom ldan das rje thems dpas de ga sungs so// bang+yas rgyas thams sa dang 'jam par stong pa mtha'a' gro ma pa chog las d+ha g+sas rnam
317b3(rnying rgyud): cang bdal ba padang ba martog gi dngos grub ces byaste/ dpal dam tshig gi rtog pa ste bzhi pa'o// / 'di la 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rjemams dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'angs rgyas thams cad mnyam skor ba// mkha' 'gro smra ba'ade ba'i mchog/ yang dag
317b4(rnying rgyud): grub pa gcig tu da// ji zla 'dod pa bzhin du gyur// rtog pa chog thams cad la// grub pa dam pa mchog gi mchog/ A chags las kyi sbyor ba yis// chog sna tshogs 'dod pa yi// sems canarnam sun 'dul ba dang // bde ba thams cad 'grub pa /
317b5(rnying rgyud): stan pa // sangs nas ni ro rdzu 'phrul bas// sems can pa don ma 'phrul na// mAng du kwin rje 'grub bar snar// don bam yang ni bla 'am// yang na de bzhin po / skye na byed kyis pan sun yang // sa nas
317b6(rnying rgyud): gar bya'o// khams kyi de cin bras ca dang ngo // de bzhin dang mi lalas 'byung // rang gi lho la cha lung ste skye// badz+raT+wA~M pa'i phyag rgya bajuH// dkyil 'khor gang dang gang bstan pa// sna tshogs phyag chu'i mchod pa mos// slob ma thogs pa di dang da /
317b7(rnying rgyud): pa byas nas nges bsgrub po// de las gzhan yang rtog kun gyi// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam sprul pa// ci rigs par ni sprul byas pa'i// gdams ngag rab tu bshad par bya// sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gas rab tshan
318a1(rnying rgyud): gas nas pa// nad bdag da jugs// 'do la nga ba sa na das// padam pa na pa// rtagatung / byung ba banan// ngam na 'du bar da// / chog sazugs rnams la// kyi ba rgyags

318a4(rnying rgyud): ga rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu stong pa nyid la brtson// 'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bas// 'gags shing yongs su mya ngan 'das// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//
318a5(rnying rgyud): stsol bzung cad rnam snang rtsing // sangs rgya suM sbrul pa kun tu bskyed// stong pa ma pri mi spyod min// dbu mang yang ni mi dmigs te// shes rab rlol byed stong ba// thabasu dang steng ji bdag nyid rnams// de bas s+t+rI rje'i rdzabs// shes rab pa ma phyin par gas
318a6(rnying rgyud): rtog pa med par chos rnams la// sems can don du yongs brtags pa// rnam par mi rtog la mos pas// thams cad rtog pas brtag par bya// brag cha yi ni sgra 'dra ba// chos kyi tshig du de 'gyur te// de las theg pa chen po yi// yang drag yon tan rgyas pa'i glus// dus gsum
318a7(rnying rgyud): pa yid mtshig gsum// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nga spyod// mnyam med gdomanyam med mchog gi chos nyid chen// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' las dngas grub rnams cad byin 'dzid pa// ji mod mig sa mnyam
318b1(rnying rgyud): mid dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon tan shin tu phra ba'i chal dang tshad med de// dpeni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha' pas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol// rtag tu dri ma med pa'i
318b2(rnying rgyud): drug brje'i shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // tshad med tshad dang bral bas shin tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa go 'phang ngam
318b3(rnying rgyud): pa brnyes gyur kyang // khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// thugs rje spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par long mi 'gyur// e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pas// khams gsum kun
318b4(rnying rgyud): la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par dbu mkhyen pa// dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsal// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang dag yon tan nu chen te// lan cig tsam ni brjod pas kyang // sangs rgyas
318b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid stong bas// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyis// dus gsum pa yi rgyal ba kun// dmachog gsum gyis bsgrub par 'gyur// s+thA ni lta bas mi ngoms pa// thams cad bdag nyid bstan nas kyang // legs so zhes nas
318b6(rnying rgyud): dngos grub ni// mchog rnams ku ni rab sbyin mdzad// thams cad bdag nyid 'grub dga' dang // bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs// sangs rgyas 'grub pa mchog kun dang // rnal 'byor dam pa 'ang sbyin par mdzad// de nas de yis bskyab pa dang // shin du rtag pa'i
318b7(rnying rgyud): dngos grub dag/ gang gis sred pa 'di nyid la// dngos grub shin tu rtag thob bshad// rdo rjes go gtogs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgrubar bya// thal mo legs par sbyar ba pos// thal mo'i ni gsum rnam par brdab// dbang po gang dang gang lam gyur// de dang
319a1(rnying rgyud): dayong ba sa// gan sagam sa pa stod pa las// sa spya nga gan du na/ sa pa dgas pa dang // ga par phyogs pa pos// nas sasas mgrub pa// shA byung banas pas// ga rnamasasas na// 'ad

319b1(rnying rgyud): dang gsopa pa yang rnabs sa dang / rtswang sa dang drag sa smyanams byung // gca dang ba dang // rdungs pa 'jug pa na yang // rjo su la sgrugs sa dang // denas brlos byu // mams dpa ra 'a byos/ ga
319b2(rnying rgyud): ni// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// dpung pa gnyis ni rdo rje bcings// rdo rje sa gol brdabs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu mdzad nas// de yi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas// 'khor dang 'kho po ro'i tshogs bcwas
319b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs 'gyur na// gzhan lnga smos kyang ci zhig dgos// rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus par// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa// kun gyis til 'bru bzhin du rgyas// shin tu gdug cing gtum po la// zhi bas/
319b4(rnying rgyud): phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo yi// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos// de nas sA yi rtse mo la
319b5(rnying rgyud): yid ni brtan par yang dag gzung // sna'i dbugs ring dro ba las/ rgyal bas phyag rgya'i sbyor ba byung // bcom ldan de nyid rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje khro bor gyur nas byung // dpal chen rdo rje he ru ka/ 'bar bas thal bas rab tu 'jig/ sems dpa' sngon por 'bar ba'i bar//
319b6(rnying rgyud): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar por 'bar// 'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar dra ba// dur khrod kyi ni mo dang 'dra// 'bar ba chen po skra 'bar ba// thod pa mang po'i dbu rgyan can// 'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar drag/ dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs// khro la sogs pa'i tshul ldan pa/
319b7(rnying rgyud): zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur ba dang // smin ma khro gnyer bcas par 'gyur// 'bar ba'i lhubs gar byas pas// ku ladi dbang chen nyi dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas// gnas gsum dag ni 'bar byas nas// thal ba bzhin du rab tu bshig/ de rdo rje san+da/
320a1(rnying rgyud): la ba 'i spel pa las// thams cad pa banas spang bang ma// rtsu par gyur babang lnga bar byed// dpe bur ba rnam smras// thung ba'i thob mam bzad pa// brgyad nas ma smras bdud la sngags// gag pa rnams kyi bag nas// rgyal pa don dag dang /
320a2(rnying rgyud): ldan cig du sring drum par rol// thams cad rdo rje mnyam myong ba// mthang 'grod kyil pa ba dang bang ba yis// shin tu gdug cing khro ga pa'i// sems can lams ni nas sbyangs nas// dag pa'i sangs kyis zhing rnams sa// ngas rgyas zung chub dag pa bko/ po
320a3(rnying rgyud): ma ga/ / / sa
320a4(rnying rgyud): 'phro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// log par lha la gnas par gyur// shin tu lta ba ngan pa yis// 'odod 'bod pa chen por lhung // rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// byang chub sems ni rnam spyad phyir// pad+mo chags par sbyor ba yis/
320a5(rnying rgyud): su gnas par gyur// ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di// tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa// de bzhin bag chags khams gsum gyi// nyes pa sna tshogs rnam par drag/ 'dis ni kun du gzigs pas ni// rgyal ba dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur// dpal ldan spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang /
320a6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags thams cad dag pas na// mchog sbyin dam pa bcom ldan 'das// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// sna tshogs pa ni 'dul bar spro// kun tu stan ras gzigs dbang rgyal// pad+ma kar gyi dbang drug zung // ba
320a7(rnying rgyud): po da'i sbyor ba// mkhangar po sgom 'de ma chog des// bang+ge ga dab sa sog kyi// rtog pa med thams kyad kyis// rnam mapa'i da sa kyi mtha' klas par// sems can lams ninas par sbyangs// dpal pad+ma gar kyi dbang thug gis dbugs byung ba /
320b1(rnying rgyud): san sa// na tan pas// na gshegs pa gsu ba // 'a ma na ga ma pa dus// nga pa ma pa sum/ shin du 'das pa nga na/ khyod nga /
320b2(rnying rgyud): par sbyad // den sa 'dris nas slar yang ni// shin tu dbul por skyes par gyur// bkres dang skom pa'i skyon rnams kyim// de dge phan tshun gsod par byed// shin tu gdug bskyed pa'i phyir// rnal 'byor de ni bcom ldan 'das// dam pa'i don nor chen po// rnaMgis zung /
320b3(rnying rgyud): bar gyur// nam mkha'i snying pos thams cad rdzogs// kun gyi ba yongs rdzogs mdzad// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' las rin chen thams cad 'bebs// shing+ga tu gdug cing khrob la// zhibs phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi nyim na//
320b4(rnying rgyud): rab tu gdung ba kun bsgrubs pas// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // dbrog pas kyang ni khyad per du// rgyal bar byas nas gnas gsum gyi// nor gyi tshogs kun srung par byed// 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i kyis
320b5(rnying rgyud): gyi mtha' gas pa'i// sems can lams ni rab tu dgrol// dpal rdo rje gims dbugs snang pa'o// / 'angs pa'i dustan ston ltu ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bdide na gshegs pa'i gsung la// 'be ba'i tshul ni ljon byung ba// rdo tshesams can thams ca
320b6(rnying rgyud): 'du 'grus gis chung bar 'an// basbyin 'grus chung ba stis// man med pa yi srung bar sru // rnam 'ad brjem ldan 'ad sems dpa'ade bzhini gshegs// drug bub sbyor bu'i tshul dugs g+sa dpa la 'i blang bar gyur// sa
320b7(rnying rgyud): dag par pa rjes sa // ya ma pa la dag go// ga thaMg ma / mi mang po 'i sa// ga dkyi dun bgyim pa'os//
321a1(rnying rgyud): // par byed// brid pa dang ni sgra dag dang // ngang dran stobs kyis de bzhin du// dgra cha lnga pas brgal nas ni// de ma 'ji rten gsum las rgyal// sbyang ma gnas pa 'gro ba rnams// mthang dag brgyal nas 'grub par 'gyur// 'dal pang thabs rnams chags
321a2(rnying rgyud): kyis// rang gi rgyal srid rjes su skyong // g.yem pa rnams la g.yem par 'gyur// khro ba rnams le khro ba'i mchog/ zhi ba rnams la zhi ba'i mchog/ drag shul can la drag pos gnon// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// dbang phyug dam pa rab mnan nas// la mo b+ha mo
321a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs nas ni// rdo rje longs spyod rang brir spyod// sdig med stobs kyis do thon du// mthu bi che yang rab mnan nas// drug mi ni yang thogs nas ni// de tshe 'ongs spyod rang gir spyod// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// skye dgra'i badrag po rab mnan nas// lha mo
321a4(rnying rgyud): zhi ba 'phrogs// de tshe longs spyod rang gir smod// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// 'dod pa'i lha ni rab mnan nas/ dga' sdug mi yi dbang phyug ma// phrogs nas de tshe nye bar spyod// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchod// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// rnam
321a5(rnying rgyud): mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par// rdo rje las mchog rnam gnon pa// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas// bas dang rtsal gyi grub pa yis// dr-ig shul sbyor bas bskyabs na ni// khams gsum rgyal srid ma lus par// rdo rje 'dzin pad
321a6(rnying rgyud): thob nas// byang chub sems ni mtha' yas mchod// drag shul sbyor bas grub par byed// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// rtsal gyis pha rol gzhin pA yis// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'brel// lha yi dngos grub dka' ba
321a7(rnying rgyud): dang // sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// go 'phang mchog ni rtag pa dag/ rang gi rnal 'byor gyis thob nas// sems can khams ni du ma dag/ ma lus par ni rgyas 'debs shing // 'chi med byang chub dka' ba dang// sems can rnams la brtan par sbyin//
321b1(rnying rgyud): mchog rnam par sprul pa yis// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// bskal pa kun tu srid par gnas// sems can kun gyi don snang byed// de ltar rta mchog dpal la sogs// rtag pa bamed thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings ci mtha' klas pa'i// sems ca khams
321b2(rnying rgyud): sa rab tu bsrubs// dpal rta mchog gis dbugs phyung ba'o// // de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// rang byung rnams kyi gtam gyi rtags// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal//
321b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug ras grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid 'jug par byed// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las gtam
321b4(rnying rgyud): gyi phyag rgya zhes pa rtog pa sde lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang thams cad du// rnam pa sna tshogs mchog 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor pa// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog bshad// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde 'byung
321b5(rnying rgyud): pa// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi dmatshig dpral// rdo rje sems dpang snang bya ba de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas mchog/ rin chen rgyan la sogs pas smras// dril bu tshul mtshan mchog
321b6(rnying rgyud): bla re dam pa bres pa na// rdo rje grwa dang mchod la sogs// gla dang sil snyan rnam par 'phrul// me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang // mar me dri dang sogs ldan pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro snyam bde mchog bltab// yang na bdag gi gnas
321b7(rnying rgyud): dag gam// sred mos tshal la sogs par bsgrub// der ni dang por gdan bshams te// 'jam zhing reg na bde 'gyur pa// sna tshogs pad+ma ras kyis ga yogs// de ni thams cad dag pa'i gdon// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// slong da'i dbang phyug rnam 'phrul
322a1(rnying rgyud): pas// mas dpa' dpa' gyun// da rnam par 'phrul ba pang // sman dag ni thams cadang / gnas pa pa nang dgo// rtsubanipa la na bzlapa// babs pan mes mangs par byas gas nga ma dang /
322a2(rnying rgyud): thub// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi// bud med dag ni legs bsgrubs pa// skal bzang ring gi rdzog rgyas mngon// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// mi yi mtshal ni grub pa pa// dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad// ngo bo nyid kyi mdu dag dang // rang 'di'i na de bre babang //
322a3(rnying rgyud): zung dzo bcas/ mtsha chen po dag bsgrub pani// mthungs mi sgrub pa ste// pad+ma drod kyi mang ba dang // chags pa men pa bcom ldan 'das// rngonam mas dpa' de bzhi gshegs// sangs rgyas grang hru// ngamatshig 'didza da nga dgas
322a4(rnying rgyud): de yi mtshol dang khu ba dang // mtshal chen yoni bsgrub pa dag/ chags pa chen po las byung bas// dranar chen po zhes bya bar bshad// dmar chen dang ni ga pur bcas// tsan+dan dmar por sbyar ba dag/ tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni// dam ya na gu spong ba//
322a5(rnying rgyud): lha yi sgor ldan pas// srin lag dang ni mthe bo sdos// zhi ba'i btung pa bzhin myangs na// rtag pa yi ni dngos rgya cog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mi// ra sA yan bde ba 'dis// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe dang gzhon// nad med pa dang bde mchog 'jug/ sa byas rnam
322a6(rnying rgyud): cad mnyam stong ba// mkha' gro sgyum 'di mchog gres// 'dus pa der ni zhugs pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro ra rje// kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs kyis la sogs brtan g.yo byin// kun gyi dngos por ngo gyur ro// 'di
