322a7(rnying rgyud): bsrung ba byas pas dpal// rdo rje khrims dpa' bzhin du 'gyur// rnal dpyo mkha' 'gro ba de mchog gis// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid 'grub// de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus// ci 'dod pa yi gom dang rgyan// sna tshogs gos bzar bgos nas ni// me tog phreng rdza
322b1(rnying rgyud): ga// chags su mas la nga // bamang pa sa ma la gyis pa// gos dgab pa pa stong ba las// bdag su 'byung ba bskul par bya// rtogs pa sangs cas tan rnams// gang bdag nga ba bas// sdug pa ca mas pa 'thung da// bang /
322b2(rnying rgyud): nangs thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// nges pa'i lam dang kun ldan pa// rnam par 'das pas rnam par brtan// brtan ni grub paskong byed pa// kun nas slong ba'i bde bani// stong pa shin du rnal 'byor yod med ma nus// nam mkha' bzhin du dam tshig nye bar gnas// bdag shes
322b3(rnying rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzung dpal khyod ba dag/ rgyal ba nyid kyi glur blangs na// shin tu mya ngan yongs 'das pa'i// shrI ba'ang spyad ni spangs 'gyur na// yang srid pa ste ci zhig smos// lam pa'i dang ni mad ba ldan pa// rnam par
322b4(rnying rgyud): dA ng+ge lngas mdzes par byas// sna tshogs 'brang bar rab tu 'grub// 'jig rten gsum ni rab bslab pa// 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa// 'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa'i// 'jig rten gsum pa snying sbyin po// 'jig rgyu gsum po bdag la bslabs// rdza ma
322b5(rnying rgyud): dbye'i dpal sbyong ba// lha mo kuni dang 'grogs pa yis// hUM tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po// A sI ni kun 'brub 'gyur// rnam pa rgyal gyi mna'i klas pa'i// lha mo kun dang bde nus pa// rje sa mas dpa' yang dag rdzogs// nyi ma zla ba gsal bar 'char/
322b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dper yang dag sbyong// mkha' 'gro smra ma bde mchog 'jung // lani cig dmigs pa tsam gyis kyang // bde ba'i dngos grub kun 'byung ba// stan zhing grub pa skrong byed pa// sna rdzogs 'brang bas de bzhin du// gan d+ha rba dang khaN ba'i// zla dbyangs sna tshogs
322b7(rnying rgyud): glus bsgrub po// de nas de ny-id dam pa yis// thar ba thams cad rmongs pa yi// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid dpal// glu 'di yis na bskul bar bya// rjes su chags pa'i rnam mang dka' ba'i pad+ma ni// rnam dag mthod pas gsal bar rjes su mchod kyis nas// mchod
323a1(rnying rgyud): tu rtag pa'i na la 'byor bde bas bde grub mdzod// sa ma'o mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid// mchog tu bde ba shin tu rnal 'byor skal bzang mchog dgyes pa// rang gi dam tshig smon med dag pha rol cig rol cig to// kye ma mchog tu gsang ba'i bdag sra
323a2(rnying rgyud): rang gi dam tshig ni// yin pa'i phyir na rab tu gsang ba'i lha mo mchog rnams so// 'gro ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul ba'i thabs ni gsal bar mkhyen// dam tshig thams cad dngos po brtan dang g.yo ba kun gyi ngo bor gyur// rgyal ba kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor bde ba mkha'
323a3(rnying rgyud): 'gro sgyu ma ho// kye ma dam pa rtag pa'i dngos grub chen po rab tu sgrub pa ston// dzaHhU~M baM hoHe maM'o bde mchog bde bar drongs// rnam par sprul pa hU~M snang bar mdzod// a la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// mkha' 'gro sgyum sna tshogs kyis// slob ma dag ni
323a4(rnying rgyud): gzhug tu gsol// gle pi rgyal po 'di drug ni// rdo rje sems dpa'adapal la gnas// kun gyi sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// klu 'di dag ni len pa na/ dkyil 'khor sna tshogs thams cad du// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul pa// mthus
323a5(rnying rgyud): lus pa med par snang // rnam pazang po'i 'did chags rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dril mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi su maud pa mchog sems thams cad rang sul rnam par sprul// hU~M/ rnam pa mang po rab tu dga' ba'i chung kyis sems can ma
323a6(rnying rgyud): lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi snyam pa mchog sums thams cad rab skal rnam rol sbrul cig sbal// s+'u t+ma/ rnam pa mar po khro ba'i rgyud kyis sems nan ma khris lus pa med par 'dul mangs pa// de bzhin ga shegs pakun gyi ma
323a7(rnying rgyud): bad ma chag sums thams cad btularnam par grub// phu po/ rdib pa mangs srog gi spyad byis sebs cad malus lus bamed pa phyim 'amang / de bzhin gshegs bkun gyi sgyu me dmachag sums thathos cang rab rnam pa bu//
323b1(rnying rgyud): de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// rang byung rnams kyi grwa yi rgya// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la ni gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams
323b2(rnying rgyud): cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa dang // lha mo kun gyis rab bsgral nas// ma bar 'gro su ma bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'grub// dbang po kun las byung ba yi// mchod pa'i sprin chen rnam bgod pa// rab 'byam tshogs rnams
323b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyis// kun gyi bdag nyid mchod par byed// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid lus// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// ston pa'i phyag rgya phab pa yang // bud med dag kyang bslabs nas
323b4(rnying rgyud): ni// rdo rjer bcas pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin// rnal 'byor mar ni rab tu 'gyur// de dag rang gi lha rnams dang // 'dra bar byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs nas// sgron med rol mo'i sil snyan gar// rnam par 'phrul pas 'grub par 'gyur// lha yi gzugs dang sgra dang dri// ro dang re
323b5(rnying rgyud): bya bde myos pas// bdag nyid rang gi lhar mthong zhing // mchod pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur// lha yi mchod pa mnyam sbyor ba// skal bzang mchog gi 'dod chags nAn// rnam pa kun tu skal bzang ba'i// bde ba yang dag sgrub par byed// sangs rgyas skams byin brlabs pas//
323b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rnams dpa' mnyam sto ba'i// dngos gru bkun gyi bde ba rnams// dkyil 'khor mo thong bas myong par 'gyur// rje sems dpa'i matam sbyor ba'i// mahA nyid kyis ni thams cad rje/ A tshogs kung+gA gi skal bzhing ba// dngos pade banyid gyis 'grub// sangs rgyas
323b7(rnying rgyud): srin gyi gzugs chen dang // dbyangs dang dri dang ro bde bas// rdo rjesams dpa'i bdag nyid du// de yis rab mthong mchod par byed// mchod pa thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// skal bzeng mtshig gi 'dod chags can// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi// dngos
324a1(rnying rgyud): grub ma pus lus med 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam skyong ba'i// mkha' 'gro su ma pa de mchog gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyi gang // rnam par rol pa mchog tu snang // de nas par dag dbu gsang bas// bud med dag ni bzhi rnams dang // gang /
324a2(rnying rgyud): ste phyag rgya mchod pa yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// rab tu dga' ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdor// oM hU~M/ dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol// oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod
324a3(rnying rgyud): oM trAM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod// g+hu ya phrag rgya 'di na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// mthong ba ma phu lus med pa'i// rab 'bum khas pa dang phyung du dang // gang dag grub par mgud dang // mchod pa dag ni me 'byong pa// phyag rgya 'di
324a4(rnying rgyud): mchod byas na// mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub// mchod pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag dang // lha mo bzhi po dag gis ni// me tog la sogs mchod byas nas// slob ma thams cad gzung bar bya// dngos grub 'dod pas ci 'dod par// snyim pa'i gang ni kun bskyod nas//
324a5(rnying rgyud): dag gdong ni mnos pa yi// ras kyis g.yogs te gzung bar bya// dngos grub ni lhur 'thob 'dod par// slob ma me tog 'thor du gzhug/ lha mo gang la lhung ba ni// lha de de la 'grub par 'gyur// de nas gdong ni bkrol nas kyang // yon mi mchog ni blong
324a6(rnying rgyud): skyengs kyis rin chen dbang bsrung bas// ci lta bar ni dbang bskur ro// dmang chen po dang ga bur bcas// tsan+dan dmang po byur ba rnams// tshogs kyi dbus su bdag pa la// ga pon pa mtshan+do don rdo rje banas// rang gi rgyu yin la 'byor ldan// med lag dang ni ma
324a7(rnying rgyud): bong gyimo// ni ba'i btung ba bzhin byangs na// rtag pa'i ngos khri thod par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam myong ba'i// ma ra 'gro ma tshogs kyis kya / thabs tshong te// de la gnod par mi 'gyu // de nas can na bgags byas nas
324b1(rnying rgyud): srungs mas cad babyud papas// mag rta dag par gang phral pa// dang rtag rdzob bstan pa bya// sang su rnam thams cad patam byung bar// zlum pa rnams par byed byed na// das sa rgyas shAms cung dang // thad chu sa pas dang 'ad 'ad// ga dang /
324b2(rnying rgyud): po longs spangs shing // dka' thub gyis ni gzing mi bya// ci bde bar ni bde bar spyad// 'di ni gyi dus sangs rgyas yin// rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la// cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// sdig pa med kyis khyed ma 'jigs// dkyi tshig 'di' bar nga/
324b3(rnying rgyud): thub pa gcig pu ka cig la spyod// lhan cig spyod dang rjes spyod sdug/ sangs rgyas byang chub bla med yin// yang dag nyid kyis rtag tu bsten// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de skad bka' stsal dpel ldan gyis// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // rdorje
324b4(rnying rgyud): can gyis bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor bcas dang gsang bcas pa'i// bdag gi ye shes rgya bsgrubs nas// ci lta'i tshul bzhin gar byed pas// slob me rnams la bde bar sbyin// slob ma dam pas de phyin chad// phyag rgya'i ye shes rjes bzung nas// rnam par snang mdzad mchog
324b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid grub// de nas ro dang nus dang gnas// b+hu dang si la sman la sogs pa// de dag mgon po rnams la dbul// rdo rje bram chen po dang // bdag rang gzhan lo 'dod dgus mchod// 'dod don 'bras bu hu d+h+r-i gas g+h+rag// dwenas/
324b6(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid rab bsgrubs nas// kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas pa// ci lha'i tshul bzhin 'jug pa yis// bden pa'i chos ni brjod par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi tshul// rtog pa thams cad rab bsgrubs shing // rtog pa kun la ba myong po'i// ngo bo nyid phyir chen
325a1(rnying rgyud): pa'amachog/ chags pas sbyor ba dang // dngul ba'i bdag nyid sna tshogs pas// sems can rnams ni 'dul ba'i yir // de las gzhan pa'i tshul du bstan// rdal byong de nyid bcom ldan 'das// dzangasams dpa' de bzhin gshegs// thar pa thams
325a2(rnying rgyud): cad rnam kyang phyir// 'gro ba'i mapa' 'gro drung bar 'thur// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis// rang gi byin rlabs bskyab pa'i rgyas// phyag rgya che bzhin rje byed pa'i// sangs rgyas spel pa bskyed par bya// ga zhi yang rnal 'grong bcom ldam // dmajig la sdar rnam
325a3(rnying rgyud): ltung byer// thams cad rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ rdo rjem pa' tho 'byung bar 'gyur// gzhan lang shin rna pa 'byor ba// ma lus pad+ma rnam sbyar gyir// la bzang dam pa mi 'gyu pa// pang+tha mA ma byung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das//
325a4(rnying rgyud): naM rA gyi mchog gis rnam sbyar gyir// nam mkha' kun gyi bdag po che// rdo rje nye ma dpal 'byung 'gyur// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan dadas// drog shul skyor bsrung ba'i byed// rta ma grin pha rolang po gnon pa// rta mchig rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur// rang gi lce dang 'a
325a5(rnying rgyud): tu kun nas thams cad ni// sangs kyis 'phrul pa thams cad kyis// bdag / nyid rtag tu rnam pas nau// sangs rgyas pa/ sa brtan g.yogan// bud mye dngos po di 'gyur ro// kun tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas su la pA thams cad kyis// bdag
325a6(rnying rgyud): bai 'i brel ba ston// lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis// sangs kyis zhing ni ma lus pa // sangs kyis sbrel pa grub par byed// sangs rgyas sbrul po skyes pas// sangs kyi rnams kyi mngad pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam rkyong ba'i// mkha' bo sdums
325b1(rnying rgyud): nga// dam na smras/ 5// sa su// na sa du // sa sa// ba tu/ 'phya ga shA / du
325b2(rnying rgyud): da byung ba dag/ mid pa rnaMm 'dul mas// mas ca pa rjed// khams gsulab y-i na me / na shing ba nga// pas sa nga ngogs pang // mig kyis spyo par byed// de lams cwa
325b3(rnying rgyud): shA ga/ sa / ga / ma pa da ngas smra/ pa pan nga / rna //
325b4(rnying rgyud): rdug sa sna / pa tshogs lagags// smra // sa ma skyed rgyab/ sa nga
325b5(rnying rgyud): sa / rje med ga sa sa da byed dus su
325b6(rnying rgyud): nga skye sa nas shin byas /
325b7(rnying rgyud): sa na sa sa sa
326a1(rnying rgyud): gas parnan du/ ba ba pa sa// nga na pa rgyu ga'as/ mya thag pa dang // rnam dun rmugs pa// sas nus dgas pa sgyu pa dam// sun sbyin nga/
326a2(rnying rgyud): dag 'angag/ su myang ma mu / das nga sbyi / ga ma/ dadag pa ni skye gyu// rgyal ba thaM /
326a3(rnying rgyud): dan ni/ ni ba tshigs ma 'o// rgyal po'i shes pa bsgrub par bye// dzi mi pa dang // de bzhi po 'brab dgags/ la khams gzhan las zung par/ bsgrub pa bya// rnalags dbang sa dade/ banapo po
326a4(rnying rgyud): gyis// rdo rje sems dang dgos pa la// dkyil 'bong pas kyis rab tu sgrub// rangs rgya sa rnams kyi padang byung // phyag na tshogs la// 'jig rten par gyi bdag dkur// rdorje nyi ma pa'o sgegasang// 'dug kun pa byor ba// 'i rgya na
326a5(rnying rgyud): rnams// sems cad rab tu rtsub pa dpag// rnamachog rdo rje rjen gyi // gnas dang 'khor rnams kyi 'dra dang // gad dang 'gro ba'i 'dri dang // 'khor rnams bkod pa ci 'dra ba // de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchag gis mdad// rjerjesamam dpa sgornams kyi// 'o
326a6(rnying rgyud): mithong ba las// bsad na pami brtag pa ci 'du ga// kyis bris pa yang de bzhin no// dpel lakhor TIg btab shes rab can// phyogs kun mdam pa ting bsgrub cing // shang rngub byung gi phyogs dgaH/ ga pani ba pa'i dkyil lakhor brjid // khyim mang pa
326a7(rnying rgyud): 'dra bar// rab tu rtag par su zhi nus// rang gis lho yi rang bzhin gyis// dkyil 'khor brtag pa 'grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid rang gis lhar sbyor bas// dngos srung thams cad bsgrub par bya// chog lhag gam mtshang na'ang // nyes po med de 'grub par 'brur
326b1(rnying rgyud): gas / su // sa / // dus
326b2(rnying rgyud): sa/ da da na ya la/ bye di zugs shing/ sa pa dag/ gas pa ma /
326b3(rnying rgyud): gas gas pa ma/ sa /
326b4(rnying rgyud): nyid dang ldang ba// da cig pa byung / pa ba na// srid pa zhi tu bsgrupas pastan// skal bcing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// nabadun rnams pe rgyun// 'i ma sra ma ngan 'das// ga thams cad ba par byed// nga shi
326b5(rnying rgyud): dnga'i// stong pa nyid par bskyong bas// dang rgya la rnam ni rkang ba na// 'dod chags sems cad namya dag pas// skal bzung sman sa gzigs TI dbang // log par lta dang ldan pas na// sbrul ngan diganon mu stegs na// dam pa na chog stong ba byed// ni 'i 'i
326b6(rnying rgyud): padang // bajig gi rnapa mas so// nga dang ga na nga sa// nga da rnangs ldan gyis bya/ dpa zhernas pa banang// di 'di pangs su na pa byag/ sa la ba na//
326b7(rnying rgyud): mye du na 'a/ no da / mas/ la
326'a1(rnying rgyud): dpan la dranas pa// mdzad pa kru bar byed pan// dpal 'aya da par sgrub pal// gsang ba yang dag pa sa // thog da dgas pa na/ da ga gas na// la ba ba dang labang shAdus byanas// gagag /
326'a2(rnying rgyud): parabya// gsu dag 'du shes na// skye ltar 'dod par rab tug zug/ gsang ba yang dag mi shes na// g.yas pa yI ni ga jug par bya// de ltar dkyil 'khor rje gas da // de bzhin shin du ldan dbul ta// gas pa da
326'a3(rnying rgyud): mchog 'grub bo// tshogs tham la// do na mchog dag ni dpral ba nges// grang la yongs su gtang dka' gang // de ni mchog d+hA bshad pa yin// gang dang gang ni sdug pa'i mchog/ yung ni shin du byed par can// de dang don rnam pa// de nyid zang
326'a4(rnying rgyud): pas dbul// yang ni n-i 'dod 'gyung ba'am// don te sems la dgos padag/ de sbyin yang na dgas paH// de ni rlung yang 'chog men/ mchog bdag sa// de ya da pa'i yo na dulan// kun mi slob dpon brnam pas na/
326'a5(rnying rgyud): bsngal 'thob// bla mashin tu brtan pa'am// de bzhin drung ma sdug pa dag/ sa nas don nis b+ha rje// sangs rgya bying chub gakhyog gso// mchen dag ni thal rnam sa/ nga de kyis tha bdepal / na
326'a6(rnying rgyud): mA tig bzang dang nor tha dang // shin tu dkar ba'i ras zung dang // de bsnyen ni dkar po // bA rkyen gyi smon mchog rten// d+ha pa snyid yang sa da deng rnams dang // gis dang tshogs rnams dang // de bzhin mtshang sa rnams cad // khyi ma'i byon
326'a7(rnying rgyud): su du sa mu / sa dus su sa san sa du
326'b1(rnying rgyud): spyi bo dang ni dpral pa dang // 'bam pa gnyis dang lhag pargya// sangs rgyas rin chen thams cad kyi// dbu kun mi 'gyur dam pa'o// khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam// srog dang rtsu ba ni de bzhin te// thod pa den chen dbu rgyan nam// sangs rgyas gtsug sa
326'b2(rnying rgyud): nod bu dag/ kun tu tshogs bla ma ni// kun gyi slob dpon kun labya// rgyal phreng thams cad rnamang bra la// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rin chen ngo mtshar gcig las byas// de bzhin sna tshogs rgyan gyis smras// sangs rgyas pad+ma'i dbang bskur bas// blo'am/
326'b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad dbang bsrurang ngo ro// sangs rgyas rin chen rdo byed// rdo rje rigs lnga rdorje yin// sun ris gzigs kyi sangs rgyas su// nor bu 'dzin gyi nor bu yin// sangs rgyas rin chen pad+ma dang // rdorje nor bu de bzhin du// thams cad mchog ni rta mchog le// nga gi dang
326'b4(rnying rgyud): bsgyur bsdus pa'o// thugs pa dang ni byas pa'am// brdungs pa 'am yang na bris pa'ang rung // sna tshogs rab tu legs pa yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rab tu brtag/ kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// rang byung rnams kyi mtshan ma rgya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa
326'b5(rnying rgyud): lha mo rnams kyi bde ba'i mchog/ gzhu dang mda' dang de bzhin du// skal ldan de bzhin skal ba bzang // thod pa drang ni kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin no// pad+ma rgya gram dpag mid che'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe bsgrub pa// lha mo tshogs rnams thams cad kyi// mtshan ma'i
326'b6(rnying rgyud): phyag na rdzogs skab pa 'i// mang drid de bzhin tshangs pa'i tshig/ de btsun 'i phyag rgya dang // rdo nga rje ma gyig rgyu'i mchog/ dpag pas mu shing dang phyug ma dang // bdun masmin 'bang mthob// mgrin nga klu ba na// phag mchepa grub /
326'b7(rnying rgyud): nga // sa sargyas gas kyings pa// myo pa da/ tshogs no// gleng bru pa bang can// ma dang nga sa// ma rtag 'jig pa ma ma dang // chags
327a1(rnying rgyud): // de bzhin no// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dam pa'i tshogs// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la gnas// grub
327a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdug nyid grub par 'gyur// chos gos dang ni lhung bzed dang // de bzhin du ni 'khar gsil dang // dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam dag// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// de bzhin lce yi phyag rgya dang // cha lang dang ni rnga dag dang //
327a3(rnying rgyud): dang ni rin chen snod// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// de bzhin sangs rgyas gtsigs brnyan dang // me long dang ni rlung yab dang // rdo ser basmin dang bcas// de bzhin mig gi b+ha gan+d+ha dang // rdo rje dab ba kha d+h+r-i ga~M/ thod po kham por de bzhin no// dmar
327a4(rnying rgyud): chen dang ni snying rje n+ya dang // sha chen po dang dang rkyen dang // rnon po mdang dang de bzhin 'dren// rgyang dang chu dang de bzhin te// lcag pa rlung gis bskyod pa dang // ras dang de bzhin me dang ni// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po'i dpal// gdug pa rnams cad za ba yi// mtshan ma'i
327a5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya grub pa'i tshogs// rnal 'byor dngos grub rab sgrub pa'o// pad+ma sna tshogs dmar po dang // ljang gA de bzhin dkarari po dang // mthi ga ser po le brgan dag/ pad+ma mtshan mchog rnam pa bdun// pad+ma snying po bud med rgya// de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang // gas
327a6(rnying rgyud): shing dpal bskyed rdo rje dang // pad+ma mtshan ma'i tshogs gzhan no// gzhu dang mida' dang ral gri dang // de bzhin du ni 'bar ba'i me// dbang bskur gter dang rgyal mtshan dang // mchod pa'i mtshan ma bsdus pa'o// de bzhin sna tshogs pad+ma dang // rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin te/
327a7(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma'i phyag rgya thub pa yis// rgyal srid thams cad 'joms pa ste// sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa// dngos po brtan g.yom lus kun// rang klung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i sgra// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' rmis pa'o// de skad bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs//
327b1(rnying rgyud): sa smras / da sa smra du// ga/
327b2(rnying rgyud): lnga'i// rnam pa kun du sna tshogs mchog/ mchod pa thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes par bsgyur// dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying ba'i thabs// g.yas pa pa dan gsum babya// sri 'ung brjes pa'i bta
327b3(rnying rgyud): ba mchog/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dpal// 'dzum dang brngas pa'i mig gis blta// bsam pa g.yos pa'i rtsag rgya'o// sangs rgyas rdo pad+ma 'dzin/ rdo ti ma khams gsum pas// / rtsig gis kyang phyag byed na// longs pa gzhan sa tsonag smras//
327b4(rnying rgyud): dbang nyid bang bcas// ti thag shin rje tshangs par bcas// bdud de rab tu phyag 'tshal nas// las rnams thams cad byed par byung // rdo rje dpal kyi thal mo brgyad// bsam pa g.yos pas phyug byas pa'i// sangs rgyas mchod pa me gas byas ni// mthus smras pa med
327b5(rnying rgyud): par 'grub// sprin ma g.yon du 'dag tshul gyis// ru lu ru lcang bcas pa gang na// tshangs pa nye dbang drag por bcas// khams gsum pa rnams rgyag byed 'gyur// thal mos bad+mo ba 'bras bzhin// rlung gi skyong ldan snying gar bcing // mthe bo mthe rung 'dab ma bzhin/
327b6(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa btud pa'i phyag kyang bya// lus kyi yan la ga zums ci dri ni// stsal baN+Dal te kyag b+hag// snying ga kha dang smri gtsug tu// rgyal mo te phyog rgya// dpal sman rdorje dgyed bya thabs// 'dzum pa'i mig pA~Ms rgyag byas na// khams gsum pa yang phyag ca na/
327b7(rnying rgyud): skyams gzhanas kyi zhig sa// rdzog batshal ba'i phyag tu shes pa'o// rgyud mas ji skyed dang / ni byung phrul tron du// sems dzig/ ngag do rnams dru byed pa'o// dgying dang cas pa'i tshul byas nas// titi dul bzhin ga byer
328a1(rnying rgyud): // zing // bskor ba'i bar rnams sna chags kyis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u rlung grangs bsgyur te// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo lnga chur bcad// g.yas pa ba ngan gsum // phyag tu 'di la
328a2(rnying rgyud): btab na ni// sangs rgyas kun dang 'phrogs pa dang // dngos grub chen po mchog kun gyi// dbang phyug chen po 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'grogs pa// dpal skal pa bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// snyems 'don chen por bcas pa 'o// sbyor bas de nyid ba
328a3(rnying rgyud): nas su// 'gram pa'i phyogs su yongs bsgyur nas// spyi bo'i mtshams su gzhag par bya// thams cad 'bebs pa'i gar byed pas// gar byas de nas phab nas su// skal bzang hU~M zhes bya ba'i glus// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par
328a4(rnying rgyud): ba / pag 'a gas du rnams/ da
328a5(rnying rgyud): bzang oM zhes bya ba'i glus// mdzong ba thams cad dbul bar bya// dpa' rdon thal mo sbyar ba sangs rgyas kyi mchod ba'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mtshul mo mthe'u chung ma dzel pasgyur te// rdorje zab mo gyen drang grol// mchod pa'i gtor ma la/
328a6(rnying rgyud): cha lugs gar byed pas// phyag rgya 'di yis gar byed cing // skal bzang rdo rje drag por dgod// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i thod pa'i thal mo skye mchod pa'i gtor ma thams cad kyi cho ga'o// las pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo maze'u
328a7(rnying rgyud): rgyang mangs bsgyur te// g.yas g.yon thal mo brdabs pa yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi thal mo'o// lag pa gapas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub somaze'u khrung mdzes bsgyur te// rdorje rin chen thal gyur nas// mthong
328b1(rnying rgyud): thams cang bul bar bya// re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang la rdorje rin chen zhes bya ba'i phyag bya'o// gyen du 'thong zhing thur du 'bebs// bskor zhing nga bzhin nyug pa dang // me dag bdug pa mar mem chog/ dri la mchod pa 'byung bar// gad ba' ma na ba stong du /
328b2(rnying rgyud): rung // yang ni ci 'byor pa yis kyang // dmachog mnyam par bsgrub pa yis// mchod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di rnams bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'gyur// dngos grub dbang phyug grub pas kyang // kun gyi bdag nyid
328b3(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// rang byung rnams kyi mchod pa kun// gang dag de yis ma byas shing // spel bar yang ni ma gyur pa'i// rlabs chen dam pa gang yang med// sangs rgyas thams ca
328b4(rnying rgyud): mnyan sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i dbang phyug bde chen dang // dngos grub las dang bde ba dag/ 'di yis mi 'grub gang yang med// mchod par ba 'byam grub pa rnams// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
328b5(rnying rgyud): mnyam par spor ba ma bar 'gro sbram bde ba'i mchog las mchod pa thams cad da du mnyam par sbyor ba dpal skal pa bdang po bye mchog gi rtog pa skye brkyang par// / de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi sgra// kur d+ha sna tshogs mchog
328b6(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi// phyag rgya thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba ma chog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// bde ba kun la zan pa dang // dngos grub thams cad rnam dag phyir//
328b7(rnying rgyud): dzaji sems dpa' bde ba'i mcho/ zla ba nya par spa gang sra// 'dod chags kun pa chags pa'i phyir// chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di// dmar po sna tshogs 'ber ba'i 'od// khams gsum dag na rin me pa'ang// sangs myas ma
329a1(rnying rgyud): // chen lta bu med// sangs rgyas kun gyi ran chen che// dbu rgyun can na bde ba'i mchog/ gzhan gyi nor min 'di mi 'phrogs// lha ye nu 'dis dag pa ste// mthu dang po nyid dag dang // rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub bo// zad pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyang dang //
329a2(rnying rgyud): rgyas gtsug gi nor bu can// kun nas nyon mongs 'jig rten dbang // mi mdzad la sogs de 'grub po// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// lha mo kun dang 'das pa yis// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad 'grub// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+ma
329a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs pas bskrad nas ni// las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed// phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // lha mo srin mchog dpal dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'bub// mchog tu ga
329a4(rnying rgyud): bal rab tu sbyor bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba mchog gi phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// bde ba cha lpag sa ga byed cing // sems dpa'i skyil mo srung banas na// / dang rnams thams cad rang tu 'joms//
329a5(rnying rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i brel mo klung de// zla ba kha dog 'dral ba'i thal// dngos grub thams cad dag pa dang // bad+ma'i 'dod chags rnam dag phyir// pan+da mi dbus na dam la dkang // rgyag mtshol lar ston pa'ang// dper bong gang dbang byag / ba bdang
329a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug pas// dkar zhing sar ba'i brla dang ldan// lnga rdzas sna tshogs kha dog mchog/ babar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od// pad+ma sna tshogs la gnas pa// thams cad dag par rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas pad+ma la sogs mchod// rin chen sna tshogs
329a7(rnying rgyud): can dngags// sangs rgyas thams cang 'dras yin// mdzad la sogs brgyad pa // khyab dang bsgrug pa dang // 'jug pa dag kyi skyeg par mang// bdag la 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'jal ba bas paca zag pa kyang / ga kyang ra
329b1(rnying rgyud): na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dpal ldan 'dod pa kun la dbang // rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'khrug/ mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje dpa' bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rnam pa sna tshogs dam tshig chags// bde
329b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'bebs pa'i gar byed pas// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya mchog/ dbus kyi lha mchog chen po'o// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'od lding // bde chen dbang phyug dpal dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dka'/
329b3(rnying rgyud): la rab sbyor ba// skal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// se ral kha mi tshul dag tu// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga bzung ste// bdag la 'khyad pa'i phyag rgya ni// bde bcas rdo rje rgya gram mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa
329b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin du 'gro 'ong ldeng// rnal 'byor kun gyis dbang phyug rgyal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi kham phor 'grub// bdag la
329b5(rnying rgyud): 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal skor ba// dbus kyi lha mchog chen po'i// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dpal ldan tsho deng ga zhon 'grub pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu
329b6(rnying rgyud): bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje tshe bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// rang gyung phyag rgya sna tshogs rnams// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal
329b7(rnying rgyud): ka dpa' ma banas te// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid 'bab par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so// gtsug lag ci lta'i rjes mthun pa'i
330a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f// dpal rdzogs rgya man gar dag gis// mda' ba na yangs su 'phangs nan// bdud pa na dag las rtul bar 'gyur// tshangs pa che po'i mgo dpal rdo rje mnga' zhes bya ba'i phyag na'o// rkang pa' dag cang lab pa dang // gshobs nyam tshangs pa'i stabs dag
330a2(rnying rgyud): gis// 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas bstod nas ni// khams gsum dag las mchongs par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje mthu bo che zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // phrogs pa dag gi khyad par du// sna tshogs phyag rgyas gar byed cing // khams gsum dag ni
330a3(rnying rgyud): bsdu bar bya// dpa' rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyag ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// lcag ma gang yang rung bzung nas// bdag la labyung ba'i phyag tu yis// bud med thams cad bsnyen na ni// dpag bsam shing ltar rtag tu 'dra'i// dpal rdo rje 'dod pa'i sgra ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/
330a4(rnying rgyud): babi byung ba ltar byas pas// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// ti n+ta kA shini rje blangs bcas pa'o// 'jig rten gsum dag rnams par byed// dpal rdo rje rtagadong zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// swA y-i myang ba'i rngub pa yis// dran po dbang po nyi dbang bcas// hi thAg
330a5(rnying rgyud): tshangs bcas pa'i// khams gsum yang ni bud par byed// dpal rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// mig tshugs zhen par blta ba yis// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten gsum yang za bar byed// dpal rdo rje
330a6(rnying rgyud): sman nyi zla zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// thams cad bdag nyid myangs pa yis// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// dpal rdo rje kun gyi bdag nyid khams gsum slar 'tsho ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gla
330a7(rnying rgyud): bu len pa'i tshul ston cing // ji ltar 'bab pa'i gar byed pas// tshangs dang nya dbang drag por bcas// 'gro ba gsum dag dbang du byed// dpal rdo rje gleng bu'i dbang byed ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// pibang len pa'i tshul ston cing // ji ltar 'bab pa'i gar byed pas// las
330b1(rnying rgyud): rnams grub par rab bya ma dang // dngos grub ma lus myur du 'grub// dpal rdo rje pi bar bde bas rmongs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// cang te'u tshul ston rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar babs pa'i gar sbed pas// rims dang gdon dang du gzhon pa'i// sdug bsngal thams
330b2(rnying rgyud): cad myur du sel// dpal rdo rje cang te'u sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rnga rnga'i tshul ston rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar babs pa'i gar byed pa// gnas gsum dag ni ma lus pa// skad cig tsam gyis 'bebs par byed// dpal rdo rje
330b3(rnying rgyud): rngas myos par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis// mchod pa thams cad byas na ni// rang byung gar gyi mchod pa rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rims dang dug dang dbyig dug byed// phra men gdon gyi gnod pa rnams// bskor ba'ag
330b4(rnying rgyud): rnams sna tshogs kyis// skad cig tsam gyis zhi bar 'gyur// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dag/ skad cig tsam gyis 'tshe bar byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog// chos dbyings mnyam
330b5(rnying rgyud): dang mi mnyam pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// rang byung lha mo phyag rgya rnams// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid babs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams
330b6(rnying rgyud): cad mnyam sbyor pa// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gi// rab tu grub pa'i glu rnams kyis// bla med pa yi dngos grub 'thob// de nas phyag rgya ye shes 'di// dpal ldan rdo rje mchog gi glu// las rnams thams cad rab grub cing // srid pa shin tu brlab pa ni// kye kye rdo rje sems
330b7(rnying rgyud): dpanga' bde chen skal bzang dpal khyod bdag la bla bdag cag bsgrub la rtogs par mdzad du gsol// kye de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog sgrub pa bdag la sgrub par
331a1(rnying rgyud): mdzad du gsol// a la lan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsal// pra r+b+hu ba hoH// kye bde mchog pad bas byung pa rnam par sprul// d+ha snang bar mchad du gsopa/ a pa la ho// de bzhin gshegs can sna tshogs
331a2(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro sgyums slob ma gzung du gsol// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mtha' 'gro sgyum bde ba'i mchog/ kun tu kun nas thams cad du// 'di nyid kyis ni myur du 'grib// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma'i rnal 'phyir gyi dkyil
331a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// thar pa thams cad rnam dag phyir// sangs rgyas phyag rgya dpal du gnas// don dam rnam par dag pa'i phyir// bcom gser gyi kha dog bzhin// chags
331a4(rnying rgyud): med la sogs chags chen phyir// dkar zhing sna tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs// chos kyi rgyal srid rang bsgrubs pas// rin chen chos las lhag pa med// de bas theg chen byang chub sems// rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen dag/ g.yas pa'i mthe bo glang mo gnyis// g.yon pa'i
331a5(rnying rgyud): khu tshur brdungs pa yi// sor mo kun la reg pa ni// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal yin// byang chub sems chen skye ba dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste// phyag rgya 'di las btab na ni// shes rab pha
331a6(rnying rgyud): zol phyin pa'i tshul// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par// rab tu bsgrags par 'gyur ba yin// byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste// sangs rgyas nyid du rig par bya// mchog tu rtag pa'i sangs rgyas so// gang gis ldan pa di ma
331a7(rnying rgyud): dam pa pa la gyung byungab// da sangs rgyas ga pa mang byed par 'gyur/ ni babyed pa thag tu yang / rgyas kyi ba 'a 'gas par pazhing // mig sa bya ba rgya ga rgyang // gapa'i ba
331b1(rnying rgyud): yis// g.yon pa'i yan lag sran las rgyal// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas na// bdud rnams thams cad rab tu 'dzams// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // rdo Ta bu tshur bcangs nas swA// lag pa g.yon pas bkab pa ni// sangs rgyas kun rdzo dngo
331b2(rnying rgyud): grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// de bzhin dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje khu tshur chen po dgab// dpa' bo 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// pad+mo'i bud med khu tshur ni// de bzhin g.yon pas bkab na yang // byang chub
331b3(rnying rgyud): spyod rab 'grub pa rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rin chen 'dzin pa'i khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// sangs rgyas nor kun dngos grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// sangs rgyas khu tshur bcangs nas su// lag pa g.yon
331b4(rnying rgyud): pas bkab na ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// bud med phyag rgya bcings nas su// lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// dngos grub thams cad myur 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rta gdong dpal gyi khu tshur yang /
331b5(rnying rgyud): lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// thams cad 'gugs par rab grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dpal grub spyan gyi khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// sdang ba thams cad rab grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dang po sangs rgyas kun/
331b6(rnying rgyud): sdong pa// gnyis pa de bzhin dpa' bo yin// gsum pa kun tu bzang po'i'o// bzhi pa mi zad snod yin no// sangs rgyas yan lag kun ldan dpal// de bzhin zhal bzang gzungs ma yin// sprin chen mo ni bdun pa ste// brgyad pa nam mkha'i spyan yin no// gzungs ma thams
331b7(rnying rgyud): kyisas bya'o// phyag rgya shes pa 'di dag gi// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i grwa mchog ni// 'grib par 'gyur ba byed pa'i mchog/ las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// slong bar byed pa brten sgrub pa// de bzhin sna tshogs rgyas pa dang // drug pa'i dbyangs kyi glu blangs
332a1(rnying rgyud): nas// de ba ta yi glu blang ngo // 'jig rten khams mar rdul phran grangs snyed khyab par 'phros pa yi// rgyal ba'i don rnams rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs skyed pa// sprul pa yi ni sku rnams phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs ster ni// srid pa bde chen de bzhin gshegs kun
332a2(rnying rgyud): sa / la / klu ga/ na'aphrus 'di
332a3(rnying rgyud): grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// de nas bud med bzhi rnams dang // rang gi yang dag gsang ba yis// cho ga rgyas pa'i tshul bzhin du// me tog la sogs mchod pa bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems
332a4(rnying rgyud): dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dam tshig la sdad rnam byud phyir// dur khrod dpal gyi phyag rgyar gsal// shin tu gtug cing gtum pa la// zhi pas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis// rnal 'byor bde mchog dam par 'gyur// sangs kyis khros
332a5(rnying rgyud): gyang khro po ni// thal bar 'jig pa mchog yin te// sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba can// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar por snang // gzhan gyis ma yin mi 'phrogs pa// lha rdzas chu yis dag pa ste// 'di ni rang bzhin nyid dag dang // mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub//
332a6(rnying rgyud): gos chen po dang blugs pa che// sha chen po dang sbrang rtsi che// dur khrod kun gyi 'byung po yi// phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug mchog/ shin tu khro gdug gtum po yi// sems can khams rnams rnam sbrang phyir// 'di ni dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje rgyal chen dbang phyug ma
332a7(rnying rgyud): thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang // sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/ rgyal srong thams cad rab bsgrub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rdo rje kha T+wAM rdo rjer bcas// dril bu dkrol ba'i sgrar phongs pa// dpal ldan he ru ka 'bab pa'o// phyag rgya sna tshogs rnam
332b1(rnying rgyud): sprul pas// sangs rgyas dza da pa d+ma ngan// rdon ma khams gsum pa// rgyas bta bzangs byas thos nas// tha' bar thar pa 'ang 'job byud // dpal rgya dzarjeng bab pa rnam par 'phral ba/ bad+mag dkyang bang drug cas byu phrug rgyang // sa ral pa la rdzal/
332b2(rnying rgyud): dag tu// kha T+wAM ga la rgyab rten byas// lag pa g.yon na thod pa thogs// g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya// nam mkha'i phyag rgyas rnal 'byor pa// nam mkha' kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ dngos po thams cad mkha' las 'byed//
332b3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya 'di yis yongs btab nas// bde bar lhag pa'i tshul ston pas// nam mkha' las ni kun lhags te// bdag gi spyong par de spyod do// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla mkha' 'gro ba bzang tshags// rakhang las sna ma kun lhags nas// lus pa ma
332b4(rnying rgyud): pa re za'o// nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// skal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje mkhang 'gro ma'i bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya na// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i spyod pa yis// bde ba 'bab pa'i gar byed pas// zil mo phre ni snyed bcas la// rkang pa rang gi
332b5(rnying rgyud): bsdams na// drag po dbang ba nye dbang bcus// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa// zlas btab rmongs byas blangs nas su// gar byeng cing ni de ba'o// de nyid kyi ni stor ba yis// de nas bde ba rab rla bsnams pas// legs par bsdams te cher btabs nas// rang
332b6(rnying rgyud): bkram ste btung bar bya// snu ma de dag nyid kyis ni// de nas pargya phrag bskyod pa yis// skal bzang lha dang me rnams kyi// bud myed kun la de spyod do// bde bar rag+sa pa thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba sbrel ba bzang po dpal rdo rje drag po gnas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya/
332b7(rnying rgyud): nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// dpal ldan he ru ka bcas pa'i// phyag rgya sna tshogs gnas pa'o// zhi dang drag po rmongs pa mchog/ dga' ba'i gar byed 'gyur bar bcas// shi ba ldang ba'i sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i
333a1(rnying rgyud): sh+tsa// phyag tu rab tug nas// zhi dang dag pa rdungan byed dang// gyen du dgrags 'byin gyur byed zus// sgru ba'i sdug tu grub pa'i ga/ gsang ba bgyur ba bdem chagags// mnyas bdag pa'i ltar ba mchog/ chang dang nang nga krug su dang // ras dad ma gang dang /
333a2(rnying rgyud): pa yis// kyang bar du ni rgyas 'debs so// rtse gcig mnyam par sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba'i gnyur ba bde ba sbyin// mngon par gtong zheng se go la gto// dal bus gyen du dbugs 'byin pas// g.yon du blta zhing lag pas drangs// 'o byed 'khyud pa de bzhin //
333a3(rnying rgyud): byed du rmongs pa dang // tha de gsang pa'i lus rnams dang // tshangs pa chen pa'i mam dang ni// de bzhin 'dug rten gsum las nal// de bzhinas las 'dren pa dang // rang gi phyag rgya'i tshul ston dang // dru khrod dgag gir byed dang // de bzhin drung ga
333a4(rnying rgyud): dang // rab tu 'jigs par sreg pa'i me// las kyi phyag rgya rab tu gnas// dang po rgyas 'di bas ma yi rgyu// snying 'dren ma yi gnyis pa'o// gsum pa shin tu rmongs byed pa'o// de bzhin bzhi pa 'digs byed mo'o// lta pa gar byed pa yi rgyu// drag po gsod pa'i yin
333a5(rnying rgyud): par bshad// bdun pa zab mo yi rgya// brgyad pa las kyi phyag rgya yin// de nas phyag rgya 'dri kun gyis// phyag rgya'i las rnams bla na med// phyag rgya'i bdag nyid kun 'joms pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje pad+ma skrod// gar dag byed cing byas na ni// rgyas btab
333a6(rnying rgyud): rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// dpal ldan pa ni sbyor ba'i grwa// las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyas thong pa// rnam pa rmugs
333a7(rnying rgyud): 'o byed 'khyud pas rmongs mdzad de// rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchod ston kun gsol la// rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo mtshar ba stan du gsol// rgyas btab rmongs byas mnabs su gsol// bde mchog ngo mtshar bde bar zhugs// d+hI a la la ho ldang bar mdzod
333a8(rnying rgyud): rgyal nyer gcig
333b1(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byar bdam chag byams smral// dam chag dag la 'jug tha gas la// rgan mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzad// ma lus pa dag mnabs mya gam ma// nyon mongs thams cad bsal bar mdzad// glu 'di dag na blangs pa yas// rdo rje thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/
333b2(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// dpal he ru ka'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes bya'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags thams cad rnam dag phyir// pad+ma'i phyag rgya dpal
333b3(rnying rgyud): du gnas// me 'gyur dam pa grub pa'i phyir// shel sgo nga shin tu dag pa 'dra// 'dod chags thams cad bsal ba'i phyir// 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od// sangs rgyas tshe yi rin chen spras// gos dang sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// sangs rgyas thams cad
333b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa yis// bde ba can bzhin dam par 'gyur// gar stabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// yongs su bskur zhing gar byas pas// pad+mo'i mtshan mchog pad+mor bcas// phyag ni rgya rnams 'khor lo bskor// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa//
333b5(rnying rgyud): mas rnam sbyangs nas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub par mdzad// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa'o// skal ba bzang po dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis// skyil mo krung ni phyed mar gnas// rgyal po'i skyil/
333b6(rnying rgyud): mas// zag parda' bye ra byed// dzinas pa snyen ni ba / bas pa'i laga'i gdon pams// bad+mad ma ba ci ba brdzung// rangag nyi ga dzin pa'i dzug// badra da ba phred ga/
333b7(rnying rgyud): lag pa g.yon pa yis// peng+ga sman po ci bder bzung // rang gi snying gi ri 'dre tshul gyis// thar med phyag rgya bcing bar bya// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo kar po ci bder bzung // 'khar lo'i phyag rgyab cings nas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bar/
334a1(rnying rgyud): // bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma mthing gci bder bzung // g.yas pas rab tu gar byed pa// dpal gyi phyag rgya ba dan gsum// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma ser po ci bder bzung // g.yas pa rab tu gar byed pas// rgya
334a2(rnying rgyud): srin tshul du bsgreng bar bya// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma le brgan mchog bzung ste// rang gi snying gar 'dren tshul gyis// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// rnam par gzigs pa'i rnam dag dpal// sgrol ma'i byang chub mchog yin no// rgya chen ma yi 'tsham
334a3(rnying rgyud): yo bskor// khro gnyer ma ni phyag rgya'i lan// pad+ma gnas pa'i dpal chen yin// 'dod pa'i dbang mo'i 'gro ba gsum// dpal pad+ma'i rgyal po'i rig pa'i lha mo chen mo rnams so// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// pad+ma rgyal po dpal gyi glu// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub
334a4(rnying rgyud): pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la sogs pa'i gzugs mchog sna tshogs 'dzin// sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog dngos grub mchog mnga' ba// kye sems dpa' pad+ma dga' mchog sgyu ma'i dga' ba bstan du gsol// a la laM la
334a5(rnying rgyud): ho// kye gar dbang thar dga' dga' ba'i gar mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa dag tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang phyug bdag/ nyi zla bdag lagra a la la la ho// pad+ma lha ma dpal rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mdzad dag pa'i tshul gyi sa gar mdzad pa// pad+ma dam tshig dbang phyug sangs
334a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas gar rnams mdzad du gsol// 'dod chags rnam par sbyong ba thams cad du ni rnam par sbyongs// pad+ma 'dzin paM de yi spyan sngar gar mkhan gang mdzod cig/ glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// sna tshogs pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon
334a7(rnying rgyud): mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor ngo nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// nor mchog rnam par sbyang pa'i phyir// dpal ldan nyi ma'i phyag rgyar gnas// nam mo ba'i snying po thams cad
334b1(rnying rgyud): sa/ ga sa pa // drus na nga ba / nga / sa pa sto ga// sa shA dag pa shAn/ na/
334b2(rnying rgyud): 'dral ba'i 'jig rten rnams// drag po nyid kyis sgrub par byed/ nyi m+bu'i gzugs dang stod lam dang // tshul dang gzi brjid chen por ston// rdo rje gtu dang mad 'a mchog dag/ shin tu legs par 'gengs pa ste// mdangs gsal 'dzum dang bcas pa'i sbyar// ga na/
334b3(rnying rgyud): pa 'byed cing byin du 'deg/ drag po dbang po nyid bang bcas// nyi zla gzhin rje tshangs pa yi// 'jig rten gsum po ma lus par// drug bral nyid kyis 'dul bar mdzad// dpa' khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i phyag cu'o// rdo rje bram mo gnyi
334b4(rnying rgyud): bcings te// rdo bye la ma byung bcas nas// bdug ni nyan pa 'dug rna na// bge gas rnam sathams cad gzhig par bya// dpal dzad kyil po // dbang bgrar ba dang gter bdag dang // rdul mtshan mtshag ldan margyad pa tsho// cirje'i tshul dag can pa dag/
334b5(rnying rgyud): rang ga na rnams grub pa'o// de nas phyag na shes pa 'od// rgyal po'i skyem mchog gi hU~M// las rnams thams nad rab sgrub bya// byed par dran pashad par bya// khams gsus kun gyi rgyal zing sna tshogs mchog gnor ldan pas// mang la dum gsul
334b6(rnying rgyud): rnam mang khyad par sangs rgyas 'dul ba ste// rnam pa sna tshogs mngal dum rnam par rgyal po'i rgyal mtshan can// rdo rje nyi ma chul po bde mchog sgyu ma bstan du gsol// sems can phrin las byang chub mcho ga sbyin sna tshogs char 'bebs pa// bdag gi re ba kun srubs
334b7(rnying rgyud): man malas lag/ sa rungs 'tho bang 'drir thang par ba la srul du gros / sa gyu mingangag thams drang sru su rgyang chu cuchu phyogs su myong sru ma gartsi ba cwa mchogang mong can ngag pa
335a1(rnying rgyud): // pa'i don du thams cad 'gro// gru 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// rgyal srid thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag tu shes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/
335a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// drag shul sbyor ba rnal 'byor dpral// rta yi phyag rgya rab tu gnas// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// rab tu gdon pa'i rtsal dag gis// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'joms//
335a3(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags can la g.yem par ston// gdug pa rnams la gdug par ston// zhi ba rnams la zhi bar 'gyur// drag shul can la drag shul sbyor// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// zhabs bzhi pa la rmig pa bzhi// rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ste// dbang phyug dam pa grub
335a4(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur gyis// dpal ldan pad+ma sna tshogs 'dzin// rdo rjer bcas shing slong bslab// g.yas pa ba ngan gsum par bya// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// shin tu ltung bar gyur pa yang // de ma thag tu kun bslangs nas// ldang ba thams cad
335a5(rnying rgyud): rab tu 'grub// thams cad dag pa mnyam par sbyor bskal pa bzang po/ dpal rdo rje skrod pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis// brkyang bsum pa yi tshul byas nas// khro bo'i skyil mo krung bcas te// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu bshig/ dpal
335a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje khro bo gnas pa'o// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di'i// rta mchog dpal dang ldan pa'i glu// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// ltos byed stong las lhag par bde ba 'dod pa'i gzugs ston pa// 'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong las
335a7(rnying rgyud): lhag par rab tu 'jigs// zhi ba'i sgra yang tshangs pa stong pas shin tu lhag par ston// dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog tu de bzhin gshegs kun 'grub par mdzod// thams cad rnam par dag pas ngo 'thon stobs kyis gnon pas non// hi he ho hi haM dbang phyug thams cad rab
335b1(rnying rgyud): shig rab tu shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis rdo 'gron dbang phyug non// sgor chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum pa las gsum grub drangs// rab kyi rdul gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis dro 'thon mthu chen non// mnyam spod ru Ta ma Ta snying las dpal mo drongs
335b2(rnying rgyud): shes rab rmongs shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon po'i stobs kyis jo 'bon tshangs pa non// sbyor chen tshangs las grol marnyongs shig s+phar Ta// rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon dga' dbang nan// mAnyam sto rA kun gyi bdag la dka' drangs a la la
335b3(rnying rgyud): la ho// gdug cing khro la rab tu gtum pa'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir/ sbub zhugs a la la la ho// oM suk+sha ni sum+b+ha hU~M phaT phaT/ mdza' bo mi la bya'am mi bya yongs rtog de dag med kyang sba// de 'dra'i mdza' bo sgyu ma yin pas de la mdza' bshes su zhig zer// rga
335b4(rnying rgyud): ba la yang bya'am mi bya yongs su rtog pa med kyang sla// de 'dra'i rgol ba sgyu ma yin pas de la dpa' zhes su zhig zer// gru 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni// rta mchog mnyam par sbyor ba yi// mkha' 'gro lhu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// thams cad
335b5(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// mdzul mos mthe bo mnan nas ni// rang gi maH bos mdzub mo mnan// dbul grubastan gyi phyag rgya ste// mdzub mo mig gi 'bras bur b+ha// rdo rje thal po mnyam skar nas// rdo rje spyan ni gnyis dag tu// khor gling du ni sbyor bar bya// dpal grang
335b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i spyan yin no// 'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// dpal grub stan+da ni grub pa ste// sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// las kyi dngos grub rab 'byams
335b7(rnying rgyud): rnams// ma lus dngos grub myur du 'grub// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgrag/ mthe po'i rtse mo mnyam par gzhig/ 'dzi steng mi 'gyur dem dzan rgyu// spyi bo'i mtshams su rab bzhag nas// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// sangs
336a1(rnying rgyud): // rgyas dngos grub ma lus pa// lus pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dasde// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtsa ma gug/ mthe bo gnyis kyi mche ba gtsigs// 'jigs pa'i rdo rje gnod ldan ma// 'grub pa
336a2(rnying rgyud): bdud la sogs pa za// de bzhin du ni rmongs par byed// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// de bzhin rnam par shes pa sgrub// gter rnams 'byin par byed pa dang // de bzhin nor kun 'phrog par byed// dal ba so po ni dpal mnan te// dpal mo dag kyang phrogs
336a3(rnying rgyud): nus ni// mngag gzhug mar ni byed pa dang // gnod sbyin ma dang dga' ba spyod// gnod sbyin dag gi sde dpon du// 'dis ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbar nas// gung mo mnyam par rab tu bsgrub// mthe
336a4(rnying rgyud): po mthe'u chung 'dab ma bzhi// pad+ma dri med rab tu rgyas// 'dis ni sdig rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// sdig pa byang na rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas byang chub mngon sangs rgyas// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// dpal ldan pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar ba//
336a5(rnying rgyud): mdzub mo mnyam par phyir bkug ste// mthe bo rdo rje g.yogs pa ni// rdo rje dpal gyi nor bu ste// phyag tu 'di yis btab na ni// nam mkha' thams cad rab 'grub ste// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' las dngos rnams thams cad spong // rdo rje thal
336a6(rnying rgyud): mo mnyam sbyar nas// mthe'u chung srin lag mnyam par brkyang // mdzub mo rtse mnyam bkug pa ni// dpal mchog rna zhes grags pa ste// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'brel nA// thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i dpal/ lha yi skal bzang
336a7(rnying rgyud): spos ci dgos// dam tshig gi phyag rgya shes pa'o// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje 'i// mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan byas te// thams cad 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gi lhar ni bdag nyid bya// 'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dpal// de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad pa
336b1(rnying rgyud): rdorje 'dzin pa thams cad // tshwa 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun bdag dngas grub ni// chos dbyings mnam dang sa marnam pa// nam bu ny-i dbyings kyisatha'akrus pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam stor ba'o// mkha' 'gro sum bde mchag 'das/
336b2(rnying rgyud): mi 'grub 'byor byar mi 'gyur ba'i// dam pa rgya chen grang yang med// dam ga chen po'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i// de lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs su ldan// bde ba nyid skyes kun gyi bdag/ kun gyi bdag la zhugs par bya// phyus
336b3(rnying rgyud): 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong ldeng // rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor bskal ba bzang pa'i dpal rdo na sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// chags pa med cing ma
336b4(rnying rgyud): chags med// dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med// bud med kun gyi sgra stong 'di// gnyis su med pa'i theg pa'i mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btaban ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ang lding // dpal lan s+thA ma kun bdag// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'thub// sgyu ma thams cad
336b5(rnying rgyud): kyai lha mo'i phyag rgyags pa'o// yod pa ma yin med pa'ang shin// dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med// shes rabal rab zin stong sa// sangs rgyas byang chub dbu 'grub pA'o// thams cad na bum pa'i mtshan nyid de// nami mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// khrims gsu mangs/
336b6(rnying rgyud): nI ma lus pa// thams cad ldum swAd+ya te// ji ltar lham thams cad du// mthong ba dang ni reg par 'gyur// dmigs su yod pa'ang ma yin te// de bzhin 'gro ba gran+da g+hi dz+wal// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'gyor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'bru 'ang lding // bud med la sogs
336b7(rnying rgyud): na chen mchog/ mnga' 'is dngos rnams bams cad spyad// dngos po med par bdag spang bas// nam mkha' kun dang mnyam spong ba// mkha' 'gro sbram bde ba'i mchog/ shin tu rtag par 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di// chags pa'i nyes pas mi
337a1(rnying rgyud): // gos pa// rnal 'byor ldan pa'ang de bzhin du// gnas kyi nyes pas mong migos// shin du gdug cing drag po la// zhibs phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba ni// rnam par rgyal phyir rab tu drag/ thams cad dag par mos pa ya/
337a2(rnying rgyud): sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thon du// drag shul sbyor bas mnyam sbyor ba// 'jig rten thams cad gzhom par bya// sbyor ba'i phyag tu shes pa'o// sbyor ba ji snyed yod kun dang // byed pa rnam pa sna tshogs la// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyiH// dngos grub thams cad
337a3(rnying rgyud): rab sgrub pa'o// byed pa'i phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // chags pa chen po dbang phyug dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// kun tu sna tshogs skal pa bzang po dpal dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang /
337a4(rnying rgyud): khyad per du ni 'phrag pa dang // yan lag kun tu byed pa yis// de ni nor rnams kun kyang phrogs// 'o byed 'khyud la sogs pa yis// khams gsum pa yang rgyas 'debs so// thar bar byed cing gsod par byed// shi yang mod la sos par byed// sbyor ba'i longs su/
337a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyis// gnas gsum po ni ma lus par// rgyas btab rmongs byas bslang nas su// gar byas nas ni za bar byed// sbyor ba kun gyi bde myong bas// khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// sgor
337a6(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam bskur zhing // bde ba myong ba rab sbyor ba// mdzes par lta ba'i gar byed pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rlangs byas zos pa dang // la
337a7(rnying rgyud): bar gyur pa'ang 'tshe bar byed// bud mod mkhas pa sgyum che// mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam bsgyur ba// rim gror bcas shing sgeg pa'i mchog/ mdzes par bstabs gar byas pa// sangs rgyas pad+ma rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas bas
337b1(rnying rgyud): nI// zos nas slar yang 'tsha bar byed// sangs rgyas byang chub mnyam sbyor ba// rab tu dga'abs palta zhing 'dzum// shin du srid pa yang dag sgrub// gsang bar bltal gnas na ni// drug po dbang po nye dbang bcas// ti zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// srid pa kun tu kun ba slabs nas/
337b2(rnying rgyud): rigs gsum dag ni sgrub par byed// sgeg la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan// mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam bsgyur zhing // rim gror bcas shing sdig pa'i mchog/ steg pa'i blta bas gar byed cing // mdzes pa'i tshul dang thabs rnams kyis// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/
337b3(rnying rgyud): gshin rje tshe dang bcas pa'i// 'jig rten gsum dag sgrub par byed// mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i khaM// khro zhing 'dzum dang bcas pa'i bzhin// khrol 'gyur bar bcas shing 'dzum// gsal bar blta zhing legs par gnas// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/
337b4(rnying rgyud): gshin rje tshangs bcas pa// rgyal po sgrims rnam rgyal nas// khams gsum dag ni thub par dbyed// 'dod chags myos pas g.yem slob// mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam par bsgyur// 'di ni bzhin gyi phyag rgya mchog/ khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// drag po
337b5(rnying rgyud): brnon po gtsigs// gdug pa zab rigs 'a gas te// gams pa'i bzhin gyi myig tu yis// khams gsum dag kyang zabar byed// dngos grub kun gyi ba dba'i mchog/ dang zhwa dga' bar ba sna 'a // gzhan pa'i bzhin sde phyag rgyalas// khams gsum
337b6(rnying rgyud): drag kyang thar bar byed// bo d+ha ma sbyin gsang mthob/ rtag dong ljang se la dag gas so// so gtsigs pa nim na mnanan// 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs par byed// bzhin gyi phyag shes pa 'o// lha mo kun gyi bad ba mchog/ rgyas pa'i mam chu chos mnan
337b7(rnying rgyud): te// 'dzum pa'i phyag tu mchog 'di ni// sangs rgyas thams cad dkris par byed// 'dod chags bdebs g.yom spro'o// sdig pa'i ma mchis sa mnan pa'o// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// sbyor bkur gyi ba ba /
338a1(rnying rgyud): mdzes pa'i mamathugayo bar byed // 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed // sha chen gyi ni ro myong zhing // mya ma sa yis mnan pa yis// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed/
338a2(rnying rgyud): bde ba kun gyi ro myong zhing // ma mchu rnam par mdzes byas pa// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog shes pa'o// bde ba myong bar rab sbyor ba// zam zim lta ba rnam 'gyur bas// rgyas btab rmongs pa
338a3(rnying rgyud): zos pa yis/ khams gsum dag kyang 'tsho bar byed// bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma'i mchog/ mdzes par blta ba'i gar byas pas// rgyas btab rmongs byas bslang nas ni// khams gsum dag kyang sgrub par byed// sangs rgyas gsang ba'i mnyam sbyor ba// lta ba
338a4(rnying rgyud): rab zhi bde bar gnas// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// bud med thams cad dbang du byed// smin mtshams khro gnyer 'gyur bcas pas// lta ba rab 'bar rnam par bsgyur// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang 'bar bar byed// khro zhing
338a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur bar bcas pas 'dzum// lta ba gsal la bde 'i gnas// lta ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog 'di ni// khros pa thams cad rab tu sgrub// steg la sogs pa'i ro dang ldan// stag bcas lta ba'i gar byed pa// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang
338a6(rnying rgyud): gar byed 'jug/ lta ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// nu bas+thA sar+b+ba bud+d+he d+haHzhes pa'i phyag rgya la gnas na// las dang mchod pa ma lus pa// lus pa med pa thams cad 'grub// rlung chud rnams kyi mchod pa kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang ma mnyam pa// nam mkha' dngas
338a7(rnying rgyud): kyi ma klas pa// lin cig brjid pas 'grub pa gyur// das mi chos kyi sdug rgya 'dis// gang dag byas par mgyur cing // spel ba dag tu mgur pa'o// dam rgyu na dag cid// yong du su la ti Sh+Tha la canas twAnas dran swA hA/ sa kyi phrag tu ga/
338b1(rnying rgyud): mas namams cad dang byu pa// rnams ma tha gas na na na sa// swAHga sman panas nas s+ho// dz+nyA ma d+hag na nga/ pa/ 'dadu sgyu / na na
338b2(rnying rgyud): phyag rgyal gnas pa/ sangs rgyam byang chub dang bslabs na// ba ma nas so s+ho// ba hU~M/ / ra~M bi gams med can rdzogs// ces kyi phrag tu dam pa dadi// rab thangs da rjegs byung pag/ hrI do Sh+T+ri k+Sha skul mo she na
338b3(rnying rgyud): kyi thug tu dam pa 'di// dag rten rnams pa btu dzigag tugs pan/ da cig 'i da na dang// tha snying pa shing banas pa dang // dus ra pazhipa macig rnams kyis// rgyam chags pa'i gru rnams
338b4(rnying rgyud): par// de ra sgrubang bla ldan ces// d+h+r-ig bra rtsagad+hA ba // de nga sems dpa' rab tub n-i// skye ma kun gyi snyam mag/ dz+ha sogs bzhin dag / sa dang na ma sog// dz+nyA na ngas thams pa rjes su rnyeng // a~M g+ha g+h+ra li n+yag rkyeni// tsham
338b5(rnying rgyud): dbyangs kyis ci dgar dablangs// ma lus skyes pa med pa y-i// sems can thams cad ba bar byed// rdo rje dreg gi ga maH// bakhrang pa'i dbugs kyus rlung dpyod cing // dbug gis ltar zab pa yi// dri lu ru lu'i sgra byung na// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor ba// khams gsum
338b6(rnying rgyud): dag kyang rgyas 'debs shing // thar par byed cing gsod par byed// shi ba mod la 'tsho bar byed// rdo rje drug druga'ad pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rje zhes bya ba'i b+hU yi n+ta// thangs nad dag par su pa'o// ha~M zhes bya ba'i grwa yi na// khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar byed//
338b7(rnying rgyud): gal bye dang rtso 'i dbyangs// de bzhin rab tu gdangs sman dang // ka ha sha ye b+ha yi rgya// 'joms pa thams cad grub pa'o// glu yi phyag rgya shes pa'o// gling bu dang ni rgyud gcig dang // de bzhin rgyung mangs rgyud sdig dang // sil sbyin phyag rgya bshad pa rnams/
339a1(rnying rgyud): rnams thams ca dang bsgrub papa/ chathags pa na du gang byer // ma bang+yas dang 'dar btu 'thug/ las bus pan lum ba d+hA/ 'drang sa nga ni pa 'gyur 'thag/ stong baphrag rgya nags gdug// thab rnam pan mas su // nga
339a2(rnying rgyud): la gas pa'ithabs/ sa du ba mas kyang zla sa/ chub sa// dza m+b+ha / sa d+hu / sa/ thas/ / g+sas/ lal pa// / d+ha b+hA A sa rbA r+b+h+ya
339a3(rnying rgyud): sa/ ba hU~MH/ ma/ 'dudapa gapalenano// rnan
339a4(rnying rgyud): tshog gsam kyirnam 'a ba bya kaung shi ga d+ha thAH/ san / da sto// do 'i phyug rgya/ bar+d+ha badzaH/ bad+d+ha brje s+t+waM bad+d+ha btA dza / po
339a5(rnying rgyud): brdabs pa'i dza'o// d+hAn+te/ b+hag+ha b+hab+h+ra b+hA D+ha thA/ ta n+yatwAn+sa d+hanAn+tananra/ d+h+r-it+taM/ d+b+ha d+hAt+tha/ dzIn+dokaM d+hi tU \u0f7f/ k+shan+tha/ rgyal po'i dza'o// dzA ni rl-i \u0f7f/ Ta'i hAM d+haH/ b+h+yAM/ skems pa'i 'gros so// dz+nyAr+thAd+b+ha d+haHd+hA d+hi/ myong zhing rang tu myung ba'o// tAda? byaMH/
339a6(rnying rgyud): brdzun/ tathA ga te/ pad+ma/ na na dpal nam tsho ba rnam par do bya'o// tA b+ba hwA ste/ sprin tu sbyar ba'i byag / sil can gyi drug rgya shes pa'o// de sems daphreng bar bya sbyong bas// rig gas 'i bcings pa pos// don pos
339a7(rnying rgyud): brdabs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgru bar bya// de mi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas// 'khor khyod kyil 'khor dang bcas pa'o// sangs rgyas kun kyi 'du 'gyur// gzhan sa spros kyang cigag dgos// g.yon pa'i sa gol brdabs pa dang // na'i mod dru
339b1(rnying rgyud): ba dbas pas 'brug/ g.yas pa'i bral mo yin pa gas sa// gnyig kun du spyad pa yin// thal ma sbyor ba bgyur ba // las kyi rlos pa da 'byung ba dang // bas mo la bus bsgrub dang // bla dngas panan ga byed pas// rtog dang dab dung snying rje dang / rgod
339b2(rnying rgyud): dang khro dang 'jigs pa dang // mi skrag ro mtshar zhi ba yi// nyams kyis phyag d+ha dang din sbub// steg la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan// sna tshogs phyag d+ha gar byas pas// thams cad bdag nyid rgyung myur bas// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// rdo rnamams dpa' ga pa
339b3(rnying rgyud): la// dpa' la dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa snying rje la// rgod pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog/ rdo rje nyi mkhro ba la// rdo rje drag po 'jigs pa la// shAkya thub pa mi sdug pa// ngo mtshor la ni arang ye// rab tu ni la sangs rgyas rtag/ sdug bsngal bams cad
339b4(rnying rgyud): zhi ba'i phyir// dngos po klan sde rang bzhin gyis// nye ba gnas ning byin gyis rlobs// skabs mi ngoms pa yi gzugs// thams cad bdag nyid ston par mdzad// legs so zhes bya 'grub pa yi// mchog tu gyur pa rab tu stsol// thams cad bdag nyid grub pa'i mchog/
339b5(rnying rgyud): de thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// sangs rgyas kun tu 'gyur ba'i mchog/ rnal 'byor dam pa ster bar 'gyur// phyag rgya'i sgor ba 'di dag gis// rang gi mchod pa rab tu sbyar// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi g+ha li// sbyor ba thams cad rnam 'phrul dang // phyag rgya phyag
339b6(rnying rgyud): rgya'i lan rnams dang // sna tshogs phyag rgya rnam sprul pas// yid la bsams pa kun rdzogs phyir// mchod pa dam pa sbyar par bya// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// kun gyi slob dpon bdag nyid bsgyur// kun 'byung la sogs spor ba yis// rgol ba bdag dang
339b7(rnying rgyud): gar byas te// de nas rgol ba ci rigs pa// sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas slar ni rgol ba yang // rdo rje 'dzin po chen por bsgyur// rgol ba'ang de nas tshul bzhin du// padz+ra gar 'phrul chog tu bskur// de nas smad du rgal ba yang /
340a1(rnying rgyud): do nyam ma chog tung byung / nas thar yang rgol b+hU/ madz+ra 'byung bar bsgyur bar bya// denas par ni nas pa yang // bdag 'byung bas rab tu 'bru // de sa cag cu byas pa 'ang// rnam pa thams cad dag so dang// rjongasams dbang dbul rdzog
340a2(rnying rgyud): khyad par du de bshang pa bya// la lang dri med zla ba'id kyil 'khor stong las mdzes pa'i gzugs su rnam par srung // lalar rab tu 'jigagapa pa nyis bye ba zag dpa'i 'od bur mthog pas 'jigs// la lIng mdangs bzang gA Na ba de dang zhing du pajal ba'i
340a3(rnying rgyud): sra snang // la lar 'gro ba thams cad mnyam par 'jog pa'i gzugs ldan gsung mchog ldan par ston// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub phyir gad+gal la mkhas pa ma lus bde ba'i mchog rnams las// wAr li rnams mnyam sbyor grub mdzod ru Ta ma Ta a la la la ho//
340a4(rnying rgyud): grI pa mang po 'dul bar mdzad pa'i tshal la gar m+b+ha lan 'chog gi su gar mdzad pa// dam tshig gar gyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas par mdzod a la la la to// rnam mang bde mchog rab tu gar mdzad pa yis thar pa'i bde ba dra rdzob par mdzod// 'di dag glar ni blangs
340a5(rnying rgyud): pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyod pa'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ 'grub par 'gyur bar gdon me za// de skar rab tu gar byas te// de las gang zhig pa bakhyad pa// tshogs la de yis phyogs kyi zas// yon dang bcas par dad
340a6(rnying rgyud): par bya// mchod pa'i cho ga 'di dag gis// sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur// de bzhi/ rtag par bsrung bar 'gyur// rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang // mkha' 'gros gcod dag don rnams dang // bdud dang ma gras
340a7(rnying rgyud): can dmyal ba rnams// 'di yis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// dngos grub rnams dang phun sum tshogs/ dga' dang de bzhin bdag po dang // sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad dang // phyag rgya'i mchog rnams 'grub par 'gyur// gar gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// ra
340b1(rnying rgyud): dag rjes su rab chags dga' ba'i mda' gzhu rab tu phra ba'i rgyas btab pas// rab tu dga' bar sbyor ba'i bde bas myos pa bde ba thams cad bdag la grub par mdzod// rab tu bde mchog rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i longs spyod dang // rab tu
340b2(rnying rgyud): dga' ba'i dbang phyug tshe mchog grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs hod+ha mchog to// rab tu sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog la rol cig to// bde bas slong la rnam par rol hUM snang bar mdzod// a la la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu mo sna tshogs kyis/
340b3(rnying rgyud): slob ma rab tu gzung du gsol// kye mo'o bde mchog thub par mdzod// rtse ma'o bde ba bde bstsol// dam par rab tu zhugs par mdzod// de dag la rab tu dgyes par gyur// a la la la to// e ma'o// shin tu zhugs shig zhugs shig/ mkha' 'gro ba de mchog yongs
340b4(rnying rgyud): bskor kun du zhugs// 'di dag glur ni blangs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchod// grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// rdo rje sems dpa' sdud pa dang // rdo rje rin chen bla med pa// rdo rje chos ni gsungs pa dang /
340b5(rnying rgyud): las ni byed par 'gyur// hUM rdo rje las kyi mda' gzhu la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje kha T+Te// rab tu 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa'i rdo rje dril bu rab tu 'khrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo// la la da rab tu drag cing
340b6(rnying rgyud): por drag pa drag pa'i bud med sku ltar rab tu snang // 'gro ba mtha' yos sdug bsngal gcod phyir la lang rwa rab tu rdo ba'i 'khor lo phyag na bsdams pa'i sku// la lar rab tu des zhing zhi ba mi 'gyur sbyin pa tshangs pa'i sgrar yang ston par mdzad// la lar rab tu 'bar ba'i chags pa pad+ma
340b7(rnying rgyud): rgyal po'i dam chog bdag la grib par mdzod// thams cad dbang bsrung dbang phyug dam pa mi zad gter mchog bdag la grub pa mdzad du gdol// kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal bsgreng ba'i rdo rje rin chen shin tu che ba bdag la grub par mdzod// la lar mkhas
341a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzugs kyang 'dzin// la lar dus mtha'i dus ltar drag// la lar rgyal ba'i dbang po bzhin du zhi// la lar rta mchog slor bas 'dod pa sgrub// rdo rje gru yi mchod pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// me tog dkar dang dbar ba dang // mjing ga ser po kun bsdus pa/
341a2(rnying rgyud): me tog phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spro// rgya skegs mthing ga ljang gu'i mdod/ tshon sna bzhi yis btsos pa dang // dkar po lnga yi phyag rgya dag/ snga ma bzhin du mnyam par sgrub// khams las byung ba thams cad dang // srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin
341a3(rnying rgyud): te// rnam par mdzes shing dri zhim pa// snga ma bzhin du mnyam par bsgrub// tsan+dan gnyis dang gla rdzi dang // ga pur rba ga sha la ki// bdug pa bu ram dang gyur pa// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// gan d+ha dri dang gu gul dang // sardza ga pur gA rtsi dang // rdzas 'di dag
341a4(rnying rgyud): las bcos pa'i mar// me mar byas na snang ba skye// tsan+dan phur bum smi ka dang // ga bur dang ni tha rtsi dang // gtses pa'i bdug pa grub pa ste// spos kyi phyag rgya smyos mchog 'gyur// kak+ko la dang sug smel dang // g+ha sgang gabung gla rdzi dang // 'di rnams zhib
341a5(rnying rgyud): btags pa ni// seng ldeng bu ram dag kyang sbyar// shring tshwa ba tA lo dra dang // na le sham dang ga bur sbyar// sa ha ka re shing mdad kyis// smras pa kha yi spos yin no// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya sbyor ba'o// me tog dmar po sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can
341a6(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs pa// 'jig rten dbang la mye tog dkur// ser po mkha' las byung ba la// tsan+dan badrug po sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la tsu rus// spyan ras gzigs dbang ka pri ta/ rtse bog rdo rje nyi ma la// mar me phreng ba sangs rgyas la// rdo rje cardal mang me bdun
341a7(rnying rgyud): sbyin ras gzigs la mar me brgya// spyor ni rdo rje nyi ma la// sangs rgyas rnams la tsan+dan spos// rdo rje can la gu dgum yin// spyan ras gzigs la tsan+dan dmar// gzhung rdo rje nyi ma la// me tog kun dang bdug pa kun// de bzhin mar me thams cad dang /
341b1(rnying rgyud): rnams thams cad ji snyed pa// rdo rje rta la dbul du rung // mchod pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// sgeg mo dang nair n+d+ha dang // myos dang de bzhin bdud rtsi dang // gtsug tu dpa' dang 'dod chags su// g.yon tan bran mod bzhin te// lan rnam sogs kun dang /
341b2(rnying rgyud): khar la sogs bdud rtsi bzhin// bdag nyid TI ni ro grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// sha dang chang du ldan pa yi// bza' ba sna tshogs grub pa ni/ dga' ba'i longs spyod skal mchog ste// tshe yi dam pa rab tu 'grub// amra sman dang mun 'grum dang // pan
341b3(rnying rgyud): da sbe ts+tsha mo A sa sa/ ga mchog din nagyi/ da satha bras thasas 'a// 'den thugs pa des/ laldanas gsus gtasar ma lamags// nyam pa'i dril pa'i zla bar kyi/
341b4(rnying rgyud): drang rgya skegs la sogs pa'i/ tshon gyis mthun par kha bsgyur nas// shun pa gro ba la sogs byas// mchod pa'i tshe na dbul bar bya// 'bras bur bcas pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// sangs rgyas rnams la bshos dbul bar// shwa dang chang ni rnam par spangs// grwa dang
341b5(rnying rgyud): sil sman grub pa dang / gzugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang // sha dang chang du bcas pa ni// gtor ma'i mchog ste sna tshogs pa'o// bdag gi phyogs chen skal bzang po// rdo rje'i las ni dpal grub pa'o// bshos dang gtor ma dkar po drang // pad+ma'i me tog
341b6(rnying rgyud): ldan pa ni// sman ngas gzigs dbang gtso bo la// phul na dgos pa thams cad 'grub// rgyal po 'i kha zas sna tshogs pa// shu dang chung ngu ldan pa dang // sgra dang sil snyan skal bzang dag/ rdoH tim+ba'i 'khor la dngul// kha zas kun gyi dro rnams dang // sha dang
341b7(rnying rgyud): she yi mchog rnams dang // sha yi sbyor dang sha skam dang / bshos dag rdo rje rta la dbul// mchod pa dang gter ma thams cad kyi cho ga'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bo sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dpung // gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par gyur/
342a1(rnying rgyud): // lhag ma rdo rje thab mor sbyar// sangs rgyas rin chen phyag rgya 'di// rang byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba// rgyal sred thams cad mkhas pa// lus pa med par myur du 'grub// skye bo dang ni dpral ba dang // 'gram pa gnyis dang lkug par ni// sangs rgyas kun/
342a2(rnying rgyud): gyi rin chen mchog/ dbu rgyan kun tu brgyan par bya// dbu rgyan bcings pas bcings nas ni// 'gying zhing mtha' mas dgrol bar bya// dar gyi mtha' ma dpyangs pa ltar// byas nas thal mo brdab par bya// sangs rgyas pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa/
342a3(rnying rgyud): de yis dgra med sdig med par/ bdag gi longs spyod nyid du spyod/ 'di yis bsrung ba byas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos grub che// 'khor los sgyur ba rab tu 'grub// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// nor bu rin po
342a4(rnying rgyud): che'i dbu rgyan mnyam par sbyor bskal ba bzang po dpal gyi skyed ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// sor mo thams cad nang du bsnol// sor mo rtsi lo kun smad nas// mthe bo rdo rjes mnan pa ni// sna dang mi gzugs lta bu ste// bad+mo rin chen phyag rgya 'dra// bdag nyid chen por dab
342a5(rnying rgyud): bsgyur ba// rgyal phreng thams cad ma lus pa// lus pa med par sbyang du 'grub// b+ha bo dang ni dpral ba dang // 'gram pa gnyis dang lkug pa de sbyar// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan te// sangs rgyas gtsug ga nod bu 'bang // dgra man bcings pas bcings nasas
342a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'i mthu nas dkrol bar bya// dang kyi mapa' ma dbyang sa pa ldang // byas nas zil mo da pa par bya// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// do ni rnams dang sa pa drang // khang sa gsum dag ni rgyal srid ci// da lo las myur byar rab ta 'thub/ dpa rje/
342a7(rnying rgyud): ga pa dor bur na tsho das byan tum par byor bsgos pa zing po dpal kyi phreng bzhes bya ba'i phyag rgyang/ dong ba ma byas // bags nyi tshong ba di cin du// de gang gas par data ma hU~M sa// ma ma bcom ngan// yongs su ba
342b1(rnying rgyud): bdag nas su// dpral bar lags par gzhag nan// khams gsum bangadag po rgyal bdag/ ma lus pus pa med par 'brag// dpal rdo rje na chen gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa shin tu brdung ba la// mdzub mo gnyis pa'i mdung par bcing // drang ma na sa kyim da/
342b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i phyag bya yongs su bsgyur// yongs su bsgyur te te gnas kyang / khro gnyer du ni legs bzhag na// rgyal srid thams cad legs 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grung // 'di yis bsrung ba byas na nI// rdong las tse dpal dang 'dra// rnal 'byor dbyung rgyag ra
342b3(rnying rgyud): bsgrubs pa// ma lus skyes pa med par 'gyur// ma mo dang ni byad ma dang // mtha' gro ma yang lhag par 'grub// dur khrod dngos grub thams cad dang // pas rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur/ dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i phyag rgya'o// bzo bo dpa' bo'i skyil mgrang /
342b4(rnying rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar// lhag mardo rje thal mo'o// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya 'dri// rang byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'o// 'jig rten dbang po dam pa kun// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// 'di 'is bsung brgya
342b5(rnying rgyud): na ni// rnam par snang mdzad dpal dang 'dra/ sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa// mA lus lus pa med par 'grub// tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje zal mo mnyam mar phye// mdzub mo bsnams te phyi rol dadu/
342b6(rnying rgyud): mthe bo gnyis ni rab tu bzung // rdo rje n+do bru zhes kyang bya// dpral bar myur du bzhag pa ni// bsam pa thams cad yangs rdzogs shing // rgyal srid thams cad rab sgrub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dpa rdor bya rin po hUM dbang bsrung ba'i b+hag rgya'o//
342b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas ri chen brjod de// de bzhin rdo ri can dang // yid bzhin nor bur ni chen mchog/ nyamachog rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgyas rab tu dbang bskur po'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// ser mo pan tshun bsngol ba ni// rnga rje thal mo yin par bshad//
343a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad bsdams pa ni// dza bsngams pa yin par bshad// rdorna bsdams pa byas nas // 'dzu mamathab mang pa dgas// g.yas pa mthob mamanam 'du// rtsomA brgyamyal ba rnam par bya// dga' dzin dpal sa rnags// phyag na 'aras
343a2(rnying rgyud): cad dang byung ba/ rab 'byam las rnams dngos bye ba ni// ma lus smras pa med par breb// dga' ba'i rdo rje bcings nas ni// grang mo bcings pa'i nang du gzug/ mthe bo mthe'i chung rtso mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bsgyur// 'di pos sangs rgya thams cad
343a3(rnying rgyud): dang // de bzhin dpa' ba thams cad drung // rdorje 'dun pa thams cad ni// cho 'de nyid pa 'grub par 'gyur// dpal bde ba chen po rje'i phyag rgya'o// de las byung po skyags kyu na// bdag kyi steng gar gyur par bya// dodon thams cad 'grags pa'i \u0f7f// de thag/
343a4(rnying rgyud): tu phyag rgya 'dis// sangs rgyas pa d+mo rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khyams gsum pa// bkug ste dbang du byas nas ni// las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed// dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni// gung mo bcings pa'i nang
343a5(rnying rgyud): du gzug/ mdze'u chung mthe bo rtse mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgyar yongs bsgyur nas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpar yang // sbyor ba 'di yis mi dka' na// dngos grub gzhan dang las kyi mchog/ rab 'byam gzhan lta ci zhig smos// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
343a6(rnying rgyud): cad kyi dpal rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa las// gyor ldan thal mo khong stong sbyar// khams gsum dgu ni ma lus pa// de ma thag tu 'bebs par byed// dpral rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya brjings pa las// phung po de bzhin btu gnas
