343a7(rnying rgyud): ni// rdo rje rdo rje zhes brjod de// gung mo nam mkha' rdo rje mchog/ phyag kyi 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong ldeng// dpal ldan 'dod pa kun gyi bdag// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// dpal rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa la 'am
343b1(rnying rgyud): kyi mang rnyan shAs/ mdzum ma gtas byas yo pa// byug Na ba / thug tu 'di s+yA la 'thong pa// da nasang gnas// byang tu pa ma na thung ngas ca/ da ma tha thangs cad rgya ba// dab 'ang
343b2(rnying rgyud): gnas pa rdo rdo'i phyag rgya'o// de rje'i bad+mod byas pa las// grang stong bangs pa'i dbus na gnas// mthe chung btam pa'i tsam lda Ta// rdo rje mda' ni yongs su 'beng // phyag tu 'di yis btab nan// tshangs pa nyid bang dag 'byed bcas// mamra sa byung du ba rgyas byas das//
343b3(rnying rgyud): khams gsum dag na sgrub par byed// dpal rdo rje mdu'i phyag d+ha'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs brjings nas// grang mo bcings pa'i byoraro la gzhag/ don sgo tshogs dpal kyi rtsa// ljang ba thams cad rab grub pa'o// rngo sa rtsig tu thams cad shes pa'o// e waM kAng maHma
343b4(rnying rgyud): byas nas/ kha li thA kar mdud par bya// de yi 'og cung mo rnams// l-i ge thams cad dgod par bya// phrag byed dag gis lhag ma bya// ya~M gar nI myA sur \u0f7f// glang kor zlab kham pa dang // chog gnyis skye bya gnyis sa \u0f7f// 'di ni sangs rgyas jam /
343b5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya 'gyur dam pa ste// sangs rgyas dpal kyi mong bshad // l-i ga dag pang pa 'thar mchog/ rdo rjes ngas dpa dpal kyi // badz+ra dang brgyas pa'i na bris nA// rdeg pargyad las thang ba gyu// gsod nams rnaM dzes par rang tu
343b6(rnying rgyud): dpanga' dpal klong zhe// / rab tu dang pa'i rtson bris na// skrag pas gan las pa byang 'byur// bang bathams cad rabacu 'breb// dag rkyen grol ba dpal zhes byag// chags pa'i mtshan dag zis da // khrig pa kun las bla dab 'gyur// zol btsun pa
343b7(rnying rgyud): du ba gang pa 'as/ lu byo sen/ sdig pa the las pa mar bye// jis byang su chog gying bya/ rgya shes pa dpa 'a dgarjes rgyags 'i dngagarjes sa la
344a1(rnying rgyud): // dag pa thams cad rnam par dag/ rdo nyi ma'i dpal mdangs zhes/ bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan gris nu// sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// longs spyod kun la rab tu gnas// rta mchog pha rol gnon dpal zhes// chag pa'i mtshan dag bris nas rba zhig
344a2(rnying rgyud): las thar bar 'gyur// dbang phyug thams cad rab tu 'grub// dris na bsod nams che bltar// dod pa dag kyang de bzhin te// las kyi dngos grub rab 'byam dag/ mgun par ni myur du 'grub// lhag pa'i lha ni gang gang gis// stong dpon gang dang gang yin pa// de dang de yi mtshan dag ni/
344a3(rnying rgyud): dpal gyi tshig dang ldan par brjod// slob ma dkyil 'khor btsud nas kyang // yon gyi mchog dag blangs nas ni// rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas// de bzhin gshegs par de lung bstan// phyag bya'i sbyor ba 'di dag gis// byang chub snying po'i bar du ni/ rdo rje'i ming du nga
344a4(rnying rgyud): tu gnas/ de nas sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur// bstod pa dang bcas pa'i ming gi phyag rgya shes pa'o// spyi bor nyug pa gang yin pa// phyag 'tshal bar ni ston pa yin// dpral bar reg par byed pa ni// phyag largya yin par shes par // sprin ma bskul ba gang yin pa/
344a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa'i brda// g.yas pas nam mkhang 'gro ba 'gung// g.yon pa rnam par rgyal ba yi// rang byung rnams kyi brda yi rgya// tshig gnyis g.yo bar 'grub pa ste// g.yon pa bud med bzang mo yin// g.yas pa skyes pa bzang po'o// rna ba dag la
344a6(rnying rgyud): reg pa'i brda// g.yas g.yon gnyis ka de bzhin te// g.yon pa legs par blangs pa'i gru// g.yas pa legs par smras pa'o// sna yi bu ga gnyis kyi brda// sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa ste// g.yas pa bdag la bdug pa spong // g.yon par dag la dri slo
344a7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// kye ni ldag pa ltar byed pa// brda yi phyag kyar gnas pa ste// g.yas pa sha yi phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa chang gi phyag rgya yin// me che ba g.yas dang g.yon pa yi/ bar du ma mthu mnan pa ni// g.yon pa bud med reg na bad// g.yas pa de bzhin skyes pa'o
344b1(rnying rgyud): nag mang dag pa 'ang bzhin ta// bar yi phyag cur gnas pa ste/ theg pa chen po bla med pa'o// rtog pa thams cad smra ba'i mchog/ snang gar byen du 'dren pa ni// rang byung brag d+ha'i da grub pa// rdo rje thams cad 'dren pa bya// 'khor ba shid tu snang ba'o// skye ba'i dkying
344b2(rnying rgyud): du reg pa ni// parda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste/ dbu ma'i nan tan bsgrubs pa yis// chos kyi 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil// rang gi dbang po bslang ba ni// rang byung rnams kyi brda yi rgya// de las de bzhin bde ba yis// sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur/
344b3(rnying rgyud): phrag pa gnyis ni kun bstod pa// brdal phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// g.yas pa 'grags pa'i phyag tu len// g.yon pa slad du gtong ba'o// dpying pa g.yas g.yon gnyis ka phyis// bdag pa shes dab ltung ba'i// g.yas pa thams cad 'grub pa pir// g.yon/
344b4(rnying rgyud): pa dbang phyug thams cad 'grub// khu tshur g.yus g.yon gnyis ka yis// khu tshur bcangs dang dgrol ba dag/ g.yas pa rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa mi rnams zong shig pa'o/ brla gnyis rab tu bsdams pa ni// g.yas dang gaben pa de bzhin te/
344b5(rnying rgyud): g.yon pa 'dod la rab tu brtson// g.yas pa thos la brtson pa'o// bras so lta nga'i brdadag kyang // gang sdang da ga yon pa de bzhin te// g.yon pa 'dred pa'i phyag ste// g.yas pa rab tu zag patshal ba'o// khrus mo gangs gdon gnyis dag gis// byAd+na brdzag/
344b6(rnying rgyud): snang sgru / rdzu stsa/ sa sa nga sa/
344b7(rnying rgyud): las dang ba / da'i sa pa thab dang du da// 'ad papa 'i thuba'o// margyas su me ba phyu// brdas kyig tu shes sa bye ba'i badra// 'di ga rgyal bzhis pa'o// bya ni//
345a1(rnying rgyud): // par shes par bya'o// sems dpa' sngon dang mtha' med pa// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas phyag rgya bde ba yis// e ma'o bde ba yin par bshad// e ma'o bde ba dpal gyi mtshan// rdo rje sems dpa' gang brjod pa// sdig pa kun las
345a2(rnying rgyud): thar bar 'gyur// bde ba thams cad rab tu 'grub// bde mchog e ma'o bde ba dang // sgron ma de bzhin shi shi dag/ rgyas 'debs ma dang rmongs byed dang // zab mo dang tshe 'phel ma// sangs rgyas byang chub chos 'khor lo// de bzhin khams gsum rnam par rgyal/
345a3(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i lhag ma thams cad kyang // phyag rgya brda yi phyag rgya'o// rta gdong rdo rje'i zhal dag dang // de bzhin rdo rje snang ba dang // thal bar rlog pa'i ro langs ma// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no// gling bu dang ni rgyud mangs dang // de bzhin du ni rgyud gcig dang // phrug
345a4(rnying rgyud): po dang ni na ji dag/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya'o// me tog mchod dang 'dug pa'i mchod// de bzhin sngar mo'i mchod pa dang // spos kyi mchod pa gA N+Di dag/ longs spyod phyag rgya'i brda yin no// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi ma
345a5(rnying rgyud): pa// nem mkha'i dbyings mi mtha' klas pa'i// lha mo kun gyi brda yin no// smin ma bskyod pa brda bzhi yin// b+ha ga ling ga e ma'o bde// thod pa pad+ma yin par bshad// kha T+wAM ga yang rgyal mtshan che// sangs rgyas phyag rgya pad+mang gnas// bde ba kun gyi
345a6(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi yin// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// shi shi sangs rgyas kun tu bshad// dkyil 'khor la ni 'khor lor bshad// de nyid dam tshig yin par bshad// lha rnams thams cad tshogs pas na// skye bo dam pa kun tshogs pa// tshogs kyi 'khor yod ma pa ni/
345a7(rnying rgyud): mdzad ba thams cad 'das pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda dag gis// de bzhin mdza' bar 'dus par gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor thams cad yin par bshad// lha mo thams cad kun 'dum pas// thams cad sna tshogs bskal pa pa
345b1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// sangs rgyas kun tu bdag sbyor bas// rnam pa kun mkhyen shes pa'i phyir// kun gyi slob dpon yin par bshad// kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas pa// lha mo thams cad 'dus pas na// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog dag gis// kun tra thA
345b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs skal bzang po'o// de yi slob ma grub pa ni// grub po'i rjes su grub pas na// sangs rgyas brda yi gsang ba yis// rgyal mtshan yin par rnam par bshad// de las gzhan pa'i slob ma kun// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma'i rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi
345b3(rnying rgyud): dag gis// byang chub sems dpa' yin par bshad// sangs rgyas thams cad rin chen mchog/ dbu rgyan mi 'gyur dam pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal srid mchog/ yin par rang byung rnams kyis gsungs// thod pa'i phreng ba 'od la rgyan dang // sangs rgyas gtsu
345b4(rnying rgyud): gi nor bu dag/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// dpal gyi pad+ma'i tshul du bshad// sangs rgyas rang bzhin grub gcig dang // de bzhin pad+ma'i rang bzhin gcig/ thams cad dbang bskur dbang bskur te// yin par don kun grub pas gsungs// yon gyi dam
345b5(rnying rgyud): pa grub pa ni// nor gyi dbyig tu bshad pa ste// snying yang nor gyi mchog yin par// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyar bshad// ga pur tsan+dan dmar po dang // sbyar ba khrag chen yin par bshod// tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag po dpal// thams cad ldang bas sa
345b6(rnying rgyud): yan// pag zan las ni byas pa'i phyugs// tsan+dan dmar pos bskus pa dang // bag phye'i zan las byas pa'o sha// rgyal po'i zan zhes gang bshad pa'o// de nas grub pA'i mna' bsgrag pa// dam ldog ces par bshad pa'o// bde mchog bde mchog ces gsung
345b7(rnying rgyud): pa// sangs rgyas pade mchog thams cad kyis// phyag rgya'i bde'i mchog tu gsungs// de bzhin oM ma bde ba dang // snang ba shes pa 'ang rab tu gnas// shi shi srid pa'ang sring pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyir chang // 'da' bar bya ba'ang ma
346a1(rnying rgyud): yin pas// sangs rgyas brdal phyag rgya yis// phyag tu dam chog yin par bshad// phyag d+ha'ang stong ba yi dpung bshad// sbyor ba'ang phug tu yin par bshad// rdo rje sems dpa' dbas stong pa// stong ba thams cad par par bshad// bya
346a2(rnying rgyud): dam tshig ste// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rtswa yis// stong pa thams cad yin par bshad// de yi nye ba'i longs spyod ni// khams gsum thams cad ma lus pa'o// de yi gzugs dang sgra dang dri// ro dang reg pa bde mos pa'o//
346a3(rnying rgyud): gzugs ni ri mo yin par gsungs// sgra ni glu yin zhes bshad do// dri ni rab tu sdom par gsungs// ro ni ra pa yan yin// reg pa bde ba yin par bshad// rab tu reg pa dga' ba'i bde// sangs rgyas par yi phyag rgya yis// ches ni spong ba yin par bshad
346a4(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyis// ji ltar bde bar sten byed cing // bdag gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba// rang gi mchod pa'i dam tshig yin// rjes su spo bas mchod na ni// sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// bde/
346a5(rnying rgyud): chen po yin par bshad// lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'o// ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa// rnal dpyor zhes ni bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas parda yi phyag rgya yis// ting 'dzin rab tu stong ba'ang bshad// lha mo kun dang mnyam
346a6(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'o// srings rgyas sems cad mnyam sbyor ba// sangs rgyas cad kyis zin bsgrib po// dga' ba smod pa grub par bshad// rjes su sbyor ba rjes su grub// skyes pa ltar byed dga' spyod pa// gang yang rjes su grub par mdzad//
346a7(rnying rgyud): lha mo kun la bde dadug pa// sbyor ba kun la mos pa ni// kun tu sangs rgyas kun rtse bdag/ ram yin bde bar bshad// thams cad ldan pa kun tho ba// dngos grung dam par rab tu ma shing // dngos grubo chen po ldang ba cher// sangs rgyas brda yi rtseg tur bshad/
346b1(rnying rgyud): grubarjen pa kun gyi mchog/ dbang byug chen po blan med// sal du ma dam pa kun gyi mchog// sangs rgyas bran gyi bang yis brgyad// dngos grub chen po spyan gyi martog/ dang phyug chen pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thams ca panyam stong ba// sbyor ba'i dbang phyug bde
346b2(rnying rgyud): mo// khrag ni me tog yin par bshad// mdangs ni bdug pa yin par bshad// sha chen dag ni mar me ste// thal ba dag ni spos bu bshad// chang ni sgeg mo yin par bshad// rab tu myos pa snang rdzi // bu ram chad ni myos byed gsungs// dun rdung dge na bdu
346b3(rnying rgyud): d+hI yin// bdud rtsi lam gyi yan lag brgyad// sang sa rgyas kun gyi brda yin no// rgun dang srang rtsi mchog tu dmar// dz+nyA ni 'dod chags sra ba yin// skyur po'i khu ba g.yon can yin// nam lani bran mor bshang // chung ba blang nye ba yin// sha ni sman gyim
346b4(rnying rgyud): phyin te// dbang b+hag dum pa dran gyi mcho// sangs rgyas bran gyi bang yis bshad// drangs grub ched po sam gyi 'jog/ tshang ni ngas yanar bshadang // zas na ci zhes bya bar bshad// bza' ba sna rdzogs thub pa ni// sha dang chung ngu ldan pa dang // dge' ba'i cho
346b5(rnying rgyud): da skal bzang po// cha yi dam pa yin par bshad// am nun 'thob pa nas// na li ker A drang// 'bras bya chen po'i ldang par dag// bdud cu'i 'bras bu yin par bshad// am b+hin bu grol ba bshad// de bzhin bde ba nye lde ba dang // 'de bas rab
346b6(rnying rgyud): kyi myos padag/ sangs nas kun gyi bar yin no// 'bras ze chen po pa nas// rbe ma tha'i thag ba'i mchog/ ma yi kai da'i dngos grub che// dam tsho sa 'bras bu oM rbaka/ blo ma chog tu brjod par bang // drang deng dag nga sal ldan pas// sangs
346b7(rnying rgyud): pa 'i rgyag rgyalas// ba sa pa la par bgang/ rdorje dpa // nga 'gyu byed pa// 'ang me pa par bzhed dus sa kyi bu gyi rab la pa'i/ pa'i phyis byed kyi// ngabagying
347a1(rnying rgyud): dang // gar ni shAn tu rnam sprul pa'o// chags bcas glu dang sil snyan dang // gar ni shin tu rnam skal pa'o// mi yi dbang po'i sil spyan glu// gar ni shin tu rnam sprul pa'o// rab tu dpa' ba'i sil snyan grwa// rang gi rtsal gyi gar byas pa//
347a2(rnying rgyud): rnam par sprul pa ni// brda yi dam pa rab tu bshad// TI zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro yi// khams gsum 'dir ni rnam par brtags// nam mkhar 'gro ba'i phyag rgya dag/ mkha' 'gro zhes ni rab tu grags// kun tu sna tshogs phyag rgyade// thams cad nam mkha' nga mo
347a3(rnying rgyud): pa ste// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam byor pa// mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags// sgyu ma'i gar dbang grub pa ni// a ra li zhes ming du btags// mkha' 'gro ma yang a ra li// sangs rgyas brda me phyag tu'o// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam stor pa/
347a4(rnying rgyud): sgyu ma kun gyi gar byed pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig mchog/ bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dpal// rdo rje A rA li zhes bshad// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro bla ma bde ba'i mchog/
347a5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' sngon dang mtha' med pa// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba'i marjod// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya ming // de ni skal pa bzang por bshad// gang zhig rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan// bral ba bzang po zhes brjodade// shin tu srid pa kun 'grub cing // de ni dang
347a6(rnying rgyud): phrug chen po 'breb// Tani 'dod pa yin par bshad// dga' ba ki li kI la len// thams pa phrin na par bya dang // 'dzud pa'i dbang po dbang b+hU g+sa mchog/ rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag/ das myig gsam gyi dam pa yad// mi dang tshu 'i chen shad pa// sa
347a7(rnying rgyud): rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin// drangs te bcug nas bcings pa dang // zhugs nas dbang du gyur pa ni// \u0f7fhUM baM hoHbshad pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no// e he ya hi zhes bshad pa// tshur spyon par bzhud ces bsgrags pa'o// ti ha ha zhes gsungs pa ni/
347b1(rnying rgyud): ngas ladrangs nyug drangs zhig pa'o// ga gzhagag shig pa'o// / bri zhes pa shAng shig pa'o// da rang byi su 'o// rung rlog cig pa'o// hrulu du su zhugs nig par// a dadang sgram cig par// e ba ba khyos 'o// sra da /
347b2(rnying rgyud): sa su Sh+T+rI sa
347b3(rnying rgyud): dbang dang mkha' las skyes// shes 'gyur dag 'gyur grub par 'gyur// zhugs la dbang du 'gyur bar mdzod// aM AM a A kun bshad pa// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin// thams cad mkhyen par gyur pa dang // de bzhin bde bar ma khyen pa ni//
347b4(rnying rgyud): bid ces bshad pa ste// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin// oM ru ru s+phu ru tA la tiSh+Tha sid d+ha lo tsa nI sar+b+ba ar+tha sAd+ha ni swA hA/ 'khor lo dngos grub mkhyen pa dang // don dam nye bar zhi ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas rang byung bcom ldan 'das// rnam snang mdzad chen gtso
347b5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin// skal ba bzang po zhes bshad bya'o// ko&hU~M/ ko tsA ba/ kai Ta ba~MT+TA/ kauN+Ti ri/ ko la ga k+Sha/ kro la ba/ ko la/ ko la ba sh+tsa/ ko la b+hasta ta/ phyag na rdo rje rang don gyi// mtshan 'di rnamasa'i gang brjod pa// de la rgyal po rdo
347b6(rnying rgyud): bran bzhin dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// rgyal srid dang ni yongs spyod dang // gter gyi rnams kyang lhag par ster// dgros pa thams cad byed par 'gyur// de bzhin dgra yang med par byed// mig dang rna ba snga dag dang // lce dang lus kyang de bzhin te// gzugs
347b7(rnying rgyud): sra dang dri dag dang // ro dang reg kyang bdag gi don// rdo rje mtshon cha be di dang // dgra bo dag tu rab grags pa// de yis phyag rgya rdo rjer 'gyur// lag na rdo rje zhes kyang bya// nyon mongs thams cad gang za dang // dgra rnams kyang ni gang zad pa// phyag ni rdo rjes
348a1(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i phyir// de ni yak+Sha yin par bshad// ga du dpal ni rdo rje che// thal bar 'jig pa'i mchog len te// sangs rgyas kun gyi khrab che// brda yis rab tu bshad pa rin+da// rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu 'jigs// kha T+wAM gni rgal mtshan \u0f7f// rgong pa kham
348a2(rnying rgyud): phor pad+ma'i snod// khrag chen dang ni slad kyi che// dkar mo hu byed rab rmongs dang // ro langs dang ni klob byed dang // gtum mo dang ni sme ma dang // lha mo bdun ni brda yin no// srungs shig myur du rnam rgyal dpal// thal ba bzhin du rab tu rlogs// hi ha hri hUM kun
348a3(rnying rgyud): bshad pa// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin// rol cig dgongs sheg de bzhin du// rog du chu gcig gsod du chug/ mA ra Ta phaT laT ces bshad pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin te// rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'dzin// dbang grug dam pa'i reg pa ni// sangs
348a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// skal pa bzang po yin par bshad// rgyal po stan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ 'jig rten dbang phyug ces bshad de// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda dag gis// de yang skal ba bzang zhes bshad// dag dang grub dang de bzhin blo// rdzu 'phru
348a5(rnying rgyud): 'phel dang 'byor pa dang // rnam par lha dang sgrol ma dang // rgya chen ma dang khro gnyer ma// pad+mar gan so zhes bya ba dang // rdo rje pihr-ing dbang phyug ma// pad+ma lha mo rigs chen te// sangs rgyas parda yi phyag rgyas bshad// nam mkha'i snying po thams cad kyogs//
348a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// skal ba bzang zhes rnam par grags// rdo rje nyi ma nor bu che// hU~M dang bya ba Ta Ta dang // traT tra Ta kun grags pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin te// dbang bsgyur ba dang gter dag dang // rgyal mtshan rtse mo mchod chen po// chos
348a7(rnying rgyud): pad+ma thams cad spyan// de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad pa// byang chub kun gyi sems chen po// sna tshogs rdo rje bla na med// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// 'jig rten thams cad rab 'jigs pa// rta mchog pad+ma dpal dang ldan// skal pa bzang rngas
348b1(rnying rgyud): yis bstan// brda ye phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis// dkyil 'khor skor bas nges pa ni// grogs po mkhas par bcas pa yis// dngos phub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// brda yi phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdzas su chags par bya'o zhes// tsha lugs shes pa bden
348b2(rnying rgyud): byed cing // dngos grub kun la rjes chags pas// mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// las kyi dngos grub rab 'byam dag/ ma lus par ni myur du 'grub// rjes su chud par bya'o zhes// cha lugs
348b3(rnying rgyud): shes pa bzhin byed pas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje mchog/ cho 'phral dag ni ston par byed// rjes su chud par bya'o zhes// cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rjes su srad par bya'o zhes//
348b4(rnying rgyud): cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas// sgrib sbyang thams cad dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rjes su yi rang bya'o zhes// cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mchod pa'i lus kun myur du 'grub// rjes
348b5(rnying rgyud): su gzhom par bya'o zhes// cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas// rtul phong las rnams thams cad ni// mra lus lus pa med par 'grub// ye shes kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal stor ba// dbyibs dang gzugs ni ce 'drar ldan// thams cid
348b6(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid rgyar sbyor bas// mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// kun tu kun nas thams cad na// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// pra se na li dngos grub mchog/ ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad chunyam spong ba/ mkha' 'gro snga la 'di
348b7(rnying rgyud): mchog gis// yang dag bden pa tshul bzhin du// mthong ba dang ni thos par byed// sarba me rlung nam mkha' dang // khams rnams kun na thams cad las// thams cad mthong zhing thos par byed// rnam par shes pa kun 'grub cing // kun tu thams cad kun gyi bdag
349a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f// 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad dang // rnam par shes pa'i las gnapa// thams cad mthong shing shes par byed// pang+gAng chags par rjes chag du shing // bu tshogs parnyam pa 'byed pas// thasen ni sna tshogs pa// mthong ba dang ni thos par byed// ro tog
349a2(rnying rgyud): pa mar me mchog/ spos dang mchod pa thams cad le// rnam par shes pa kun grub pa// thams cad mthong zhing thos par byed// reg dang ma reg rdo rjerje// dral gri me long mde gtu dang // shing dang rgyu dang 'bab zla zag/ gzugs brtan byung ba'i khyis bdag la//
349a3(rnying rgyud): bya dang de bzhin mi bya dang // ston pa dang ni ma stor dang // phrogs pa dang ni ma phrogs dang // de bzhin rnyed dang ma rnyed dang // gson pa dang ni shi ba dang // de bzhin rgyal dang pham pa dang // don yod dang ni don med dang // de bzhin grupa dang mi grib dang // bde dang mi
349a4(rnying rgyud): pade cho ga bzhin// lha yul dag gi don rnams dang // sangs rgyas zhing gi don rnams kyang // kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bsams pa mthong zhing thos par byed// rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// ci lta'i dbyibs dang gzug
349a5(rnying rgyud): ldan pas// dur khrod lha yi gnas rnams dang // ma mo gAnas kyi thal ba mchog/ thams cad dpral bya'i bsung ba ni// thig le sor ris gsum du bya// phyogs mtshams nam mkha' sa bcings rba// bsrung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o// dpal rdo rje thal ba'i dam tshis ces ba
349a6(rnying rgyud): bsrung ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// ci lta'i dbyibs dang gzugs ldan pas// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i 'bab rgyu'i 'grum// lha rdzas zhi ba'i chu mchog gis// gtor ba dang ni blugs pa dang // khrus byas pa drang 'bogs pa yis// kyogs mtshams
349a7(rnying rgyud): da mib ma bcis ma/ sub kyi tu 'du ga/ sa du 'i bya ba'i rgyas tu/ de bangs da'i ba gi slog nga bsdigs sa kyitho su ga/ mi bsrid pa'i da myo/ yis byang
349b1(rnying rgyud): par bya// lo ma yungs kar zas su bza'// mgor bsdus de bzhin 'bras bu yis// phyogs mtshams nam mkha'as bcings na// bsrung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o// dpal don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// ma mahA
349b2(rnying rgyud): so yis legs mnan nus// dpal ldan g.yon du 'byung dang bcas// gsal bar phyogs su 'khor lo'i tshul// bla 'og tu ni byin brlabs na// gnas gsum dag ni rgyas 'debs so// gzhug dka' bdag nyid ngan pa rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor
349b3(rnying rgyud): 'grub// thams cad kyi mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug byin gyis brlabs pa dpal skal ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// bde bar rab tu 'grub par 'gyur//
349b4(rnying rgyud): 'dis btab ma thag tu ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs 'gyur// shin tu byin gyis brlabs 'gyur las// sangs rgyas kun dang phrad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang
349b5(rnying rgyud): mnyam pas na// sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// dpal sprul pa bzang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i bsrung ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// sangs rgyas kun bdag sbyor ldan pas// phyogs su legs par
349b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo'i tshul// bla dang 'og tu byin brlabs nas// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// khoms gsum dag ni ma lus par// gzhug dka' bdag nyid ngan pa rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs 'gyur// thams cad kyi mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug dpal zhes bya
349b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// he ru dpal gyis rnam sprul pas// thams cad kun tu kun gyi bdag/ thams cad bsrung ba mi 'gyur che// rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nad// mkha' 'gros gtso dang gdon rnams dang // bdud dang ngan khrid tham
350a1(rnying rgyud): cad ni// mod la rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// dpal rdo rje he ru ka dbab pa rnam par sprul pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// ci lta'i dbyibs dang gzugs ldan zhing // sna tshogs pad+ma kha 'byed pas// sgrib pa med par 'grub par 'gyur//
350a2(rnying rgyud): sgrib pa kun las rnam par grol// dag pa thams cad thob par 'gyur// drag pa thams cad rnam dag na// mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i bsung ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// 'bar ba
350a3(rnying rgyud): blta ba'i tshul zhugs na// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba'i me// rab tu 'jigs pa mi bzod 'gyur// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// bskal pa yi ni me ltar 'brar// 'di las ngan 'gro rnams gsum dang // khams gsum dag kyang thal bar rnyog/ rdo rje chen po'i me rab tu
350a4(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa 'bar ba mi bzad pa'i dam tshig chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// ci lta'i tshul bzhin byed pa yis// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// go cha bgo ba'i thabs su bya// spyi bo dang ni dpral bar gnyis// srog
350a5(rnying rgyud): dang chub da ga / pa bcing ba dang // s+ya sa ng+yas bag na bya// dung dbangs rnapas su ngas nga // rtsong da thos par tha sa la// dang dngangs pa yenasas cas das// ngam mo ba du bras dan padag/
350a6(rnying rgyud): byas na ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra// mi chod pa dang mi phyed pa'i// rdo rje'i sku ni rab tu 'grub// rims nad dug dang dbyig drug nad// mkha' 'gros gtso dang gdon rnams dang // yan lag ma rung byed pa kun// 'di'i sra bsrungs na yid mi rdzogs// da
350a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje go che zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bsrung ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// chos sems dpa' bo tshul ston cing // rdo rje bu tshung gnyis dge dang // zhi ba'i lta bas bltas nas ni// rims dang dug rnams thams cad sel// rdo rje khu byor gnyis bcings dang /
350b1(rnying rgyud): thugs rgya su cing // mdun gyi mnyam pa'i rnamapa na// nad nanas thams na pa par byed// yongs sa bad+hAganasaso// dpral bar ba par gzhag par bya// ma was lus pa med pa yis// rtags lamams cad ses par byed//
350b2(rnying rgyud): na ma tsams lus kyi nad gso ba'o// rdo rje bsdam pa byas pa las// mdzub mo phun tshun mngon phyogs pa// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// zug rngu kun las grol bar 'gyur// bu nad lkog nag stan dag dang // dmu dzings la sogs kun las zang // 'di nyid thub par
350b3(rnying rgyud): byur nas ni// nad rnams kun gyis gnod pa med// zug rngu thams cad med par byed pa'o// grub pa dbul gyi spyan bcings te// 'di yis mig gnyis phyis na ni// phyag rgya grub pa mchog 'di yis// long bdag kyang mthong bar 'gyur// bdag nyid sbyor bas ldan
350b4(rnying rgyud): byas pa// rdo rje badz+rar dam pa yis// drang ba'i tshul du klad pa nas// khe phyogs drang zhing brgyad par \u0f7f// rims dang drug dang gdon rnams dran// su dngul gyis bzung // bdag gi wAng ni stod ldan pas// 'thungs na thams cad med pa
350b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// zad pa'i spyasman no// ta thA ga ta ga suM sa ho// 'din bar bzlas pa'i mchog/ rdug du ba brjod 'dren pa // g.yas pa yini lag pa med// sems dpa'i gtsug tor bcing sani ni// thim pa nad med 'jo byer 'gyur// thams cad bsrungs
350b6(rnying rgyud): shing bri de ba zob// gzhon nu gso ba'o// g.yas pa yi ni lag pa yi// klu li gdengs ka lta bur b+ha// 'bar po'i tshul ston 'bebyas bcas na// dug gi lngas rnams bsgrub bur bya// 'bar dang 'dul dang bcings pa dang // za ba'i dug rnams med par byed// ga drug
350b7(rnying rgyud): pas chen dang lu ta dang // shaM ba sos par byed pa'i mchog/ gdengs ka'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i mthong gung mo gnyis// g.yon pa'i bu tshur bcangs pa yi// phung mo pa ni reg byas na// gdon rnams kun las thar bar 'gyur// dug gso ba dang gdon gyi cho ga
351a1(rnying rgyud): ba dan gsum po gnyis bcings nas// gung mo gnyis ni mdud par bcing // mdzub mo mthe'u drang rje mor+than+ya// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bcangs pa// yongs su bsgyur te bteg nas su// sbyin ma'i mtshams su bzhag pa ni// mkhang 'gro'i las rnams ma lus pa//
351a2(rnying rgyud): lus pa med pa thams cad 'grub// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// gnas gsum po ni ma lus pa// rgyas btAb rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i khro gnyer zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya snye ma mo shes pa'o// rdo rje sems
351a3(rnying rgyud): dpa' dpal sbyor bas// rta rnams thams cad zhon na ni// rta rnams nad med sos pa dang // nyam phye mthar zhing mgyogs par 'gyur// dpal rta mchog gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas// glang po kun la zhon na ni// glang po thams cad nad
351a4(rnying rgyud): med sos// nya ma skye spro ldan mos par 'gyur// shrI badz+ra sa twak+taM si ho// 'di ni rnam par bzlas pa'i mchog/ bya rnams nad med 'tsho ba dang // mi yi skad du smra bar 'gyur// bya gso ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas// 'byor pa kun la rjes chags
351a5(rnying rgyud): na// shing rnams nad mi mi bskams shing // rtag tu me tog 'bras bur ldan// shing rnams bskyed pa'i gtsug lag las// sbyor ba'i cho ga gang bshad pa// phyag rgya 'di yis thams cad ni// yid la bsams pa bzhin du 'grub// shing bskyed pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o//
351a6(rnying rgyud): 'phrul 'khor gyis 'phangs ma 'phangs dang // de bzhin lag pas 'phangs pa dang // 'phangs nas skad du bzung ba dang // stobs su 'gyed pa lnga yin te// rang byung rnams kyi dgra cha'i dpyad// phyag tu lnga la rab tu gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyis bshad// dam
351a7(rnying rgyud): pa de dag bshad par bya// dbyibs dang bde blag sbyor ba dang // kun tu sbyor dang 'dren dang myur// 'gengs dang 'phen dang gsal ba'o// rkang pa gshibs pas sa mnan cing // rkang pa 'gyed pas saganon te// dkyil 'khor dag kyang mnan par bya// bdung bskur gyi
351b1(rnying rgyud): gnas gsum gnon// dbyibs kyi phyag rgya'o// me lhod pa dang sran gzugs dang // mnyan zhing yan lag bstan pa dang // rgya cher 'grengs shing rnam par dag/ lus kyi phyag rgya bde blag can// 'di yis lus pa gnan pa dang // rims dang dug dang dbyig
351b2(rnying rgyud): dug dang // mkha' 'gros gtso dang gdon rnams kyis// nams kyang tshugs par yong mi 'gyur// rgya cher 'gengs pa'i phyag rgya'o// rang gi snying gar 'dren tshul du// bde blag can gyis gzhu bzung nas// g.yas pa rab tu gar byed cing // mda' 'phangs na ni
351b3(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// dpral khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i'o// lag pa g.yon pa legs bsrang la// skyon med pa yis g.yas pa dgug/ gzhu rgyud dal bus drangs nas ni// 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya// thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o// rna rdung bar du
351b4(rnying rgyud): por ni// dri ltar rigs par legs bklung la// yi ge ma~M \u0f7fma dung g+h+ri bAr// bzung na 'gro ba 'dzin par 'gyur// 'don pa'i zug rgya'o// de N+Di rigs pas ngas nas ni// chog bzhin du bzung nas kyang // der ni drung zid bye 'duH// 'gengs pas pa
351b5(rnying rgyud): cad 'grub par 'gyur// 'gengs pa'i phyag rgya'o// chang pas 'ben ni 'grib par bya// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta// lta ba chad pa la gtad nas// rgya re du 'phangs na dam pa 'grub// mda' gzhus rgyal bar bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gru bzhi pa la rno ba dang /
351b6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin kun nas bskor bar bya// g.yas phyogs nas ni mda' bskor nas// skad de de bzhin bstod pa dang // rkang pas minanA d+hing rmig pas gnon// 'bigs pa bcu yi rgya mchog gis// khams gsum rgyal sring chen po dag// bde bar thub das te 'du d+he
351b7(rnying rgyud): dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'o// rab tu 'phangs dang mnyam par 'phangs// de bzhin klog ltar 'phangs pa dang // glog ltar 'khrug pa de bzhin te// phyag rgya thabs rnams sgrub pa'o// thabs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// nyam nga lag dang bde phyogs pa
352a1(rnying rgyud): // zad kA de bzhin gyen du 'debs// 'di dag bzlog pa'i phyag rgya ste// gnas gsum dag ni bzlog par bya// nges par bzlog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// thams cad 'debs dang nges par 'bebs// kun 'debs gyen du 'debs pa'i gar// 'di dag
352a2(rnying rgyud): 'phrog pa'i phyag rgya ste// gnas ga snam dag kyang 'phrog par byed// 'brog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// kun tu kun nas thams cad kyi// rtag tu bdag nyid rnam pa kun// mda' gzhu'i dpyad kyi phyag rgya'i mchog/ mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// dgra cha
352a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// srin lag gnyis kyi nang du ni// mthe bo legs par gzhag par bya// de nas khu tshur bcangs nas ni// mdzub mo legs par dgug par bya// rdo rje khu tshur dpal gyi chu// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal la gnas// las kyi dngos kla
352a4(rnying rgyud): rab 'byam rnams// ma lus par ni myur du 'grub// dpal rdo rje khA tshud kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur legs bcangs la// bdag gis mtho bo'i nang du gzhug/ zhi ba'i las rnams rab bslabs pas// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
352a5(rnying rgyud): khu tshur do// rdo rje khu tshur legs bcangs la// mthe'u chang gnyis ni rab brkyang nas// mkha' 'gro'i las rnams thams cad ni// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o// brdeg pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa las// mthe bo dag la gyur
352a6(rnying rgyud): mo bzhag/ dpal pa d+ma'i khu tshur grub pa ste// thams cad dag pa'i lus la sbyar// dpal pad+mo'i khu tshur ro// khu tshor rdo rje rin zin mchog/ 'bebs pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// rang don las rnams bslab pa ni// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dpal rdo rje
352a7(rnying rgyud): po che'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur dpal bcangs la// sor mo thams cad yongs su bzung // rtul pod las rnams thams cad ni// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// las thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// rkang sa brkyang dang gnon pa dang // bsum nas
352b1(rnying rgyud): shes pa'i stabs dag dang // g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// gzugs rnams thams cad gnon par bya// sdig med skyobs kyis ngo 'thon du// rnam par snang mdzad dpal mnan nas// kun tu byang chub yongs bkug ste// bdag gi spyad par de spyod do//
352b2(rnying rgyud): sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal mnan nas// kun tu grub pa yongs bkug ste// bdag gi spyad par de sprod do// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// spyan ras gzigs dbang dpal mnan nas// kun tu dpal mo yongs bkug ste// bdag
352b3(rnying rgyud): skye par de skyong ngo // sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// rdo rje nyi ma dpal mnan nas// kun tu longs spyod yongs bkrug ste// bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'dzin du// rta mchog dam pa dpal mnan nas// thams cad dbang phyug rong/
352b4(rnying rgyud): bkug ste// bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// byang chub pha rol phyin pa dang // grub dang gzungs dang sa rnams dang // rig dang phyag rgya rnams mnan nas// bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// sdig med skyobs kyis ngo 'thon du// dbang phyug dam pa mnan nas ni// mig
352b5(rnying rgyud): gsum pa las gsum grub bkug/ bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// mthu bo che yang mnan nas ni// snying las dpa' mo yongs bkug ste// bdag gi skyed par de spyod do// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// skye dgu'i bdag po mnan
352b6(rnying rgyud): nas ni// myos pas grol ma yongs bkug nas// bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// rab dga'i dbang phyug mnan nas ni// kun gyi bdag las dga' bar bkug/ bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// 'jigs la sogs pa'i lha mo
352b7(rnying rgyud): dang // ma mo byang ma'i ma mo dang // mkha' 'gro ma rnams mnan nas ni// bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// de bzhin ku be ra la sogs// rig pa 'grub pa spyod pa dang // mi yi rgyal po la sogs kyang // mnan nas bdag gi spyad pa spyod // 'gro ba dang ni mi 'a
353a1(rnying rgyud): // pa'i// dbang po thams cad ma lus pa'ang // rnal 'byor bdag nyid des mnan nas// bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// dpal rdo rje gnon pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// khu tshur snying gar bcangs pa ni// bud med phyag rgyar de bshad de// bud med spong ba ma lus pa//
353a2(rnying rgyud): lus pa med pa'ang thams cad 'grub// g.yon pa 'gying ba'i tshul byas nas// lag g.yas bdag gi snying gar ni// gyen du drang ba'i tshul byas nas// bud med thams cad dbang du 'gyur// dpal rdo rje 'gying ba'o// dpal ldan sna tshogs pad+mo 'dzin// g.yon pa brje
353a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i khu tshur dang // g.yas par ldang bar gyur pa dang // sangs rgyas dbang phyug ting 'dzin bya// sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 'phar ba'o// g.yon pa dril bu'i sgra sgrogs shing // g.yas pa yi ni lag pa yis// rdo rje gyen du gsor zhing bskor// l+h+wa ma thams cad 'byung
353a4(rnying rgyud): par bya// dpal rdo rje sgyu ma'i dbang phyug ma'o// g.yon pa g.yon pa'i brla lnga bzhag/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo yi// rtse mos pad+ma dam pa 'dzin// g.yas pa'i brla la lag ngar bzhag/ mi dga' ba thams cad sel ba'i phyag rgya'o// bdag gi snying par 'don
353a5(rnying rgyud): tshul du// g.yon pa nor bya rin chen 'dzin// g.yas pa re ba kun rdzogs pa'i// bud med la sogs rin chen 'dzin// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// bdag gi snying gar 'dren tshul du/ pad+ma sna tshogs dam pa 'dzin// g.yas pa rdo rje 'gying ba
353a6(rnying rgyud): yis// dbang phyug dam pa thob par 'gyur// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya shes pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las kun tu rnam pa sla
353a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rtog pa ste dgu pa'o// // de nas kun tu sna tshogs 'di// phyag rgya shes pa'i sgrub pa ni// kun tu sna tshogs sbyor ba yis// kun tu sna tshogs bshad par bya// smin ma mig dang so dang mchu// khaM dang lus dang rkang lag gis// cha phugs
353b1(rnying rgyud): ca/ mas / sa// / ga/ / gas su / ga sarnam nam
353b2(rnying rgyud): legs par byin gyis brlabs nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pas na// sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 'grub// rdo rje sems
353b3(rnying rgyud): dpal sbyor ba'i// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// so so dag nas grub pa ste// blta bas mi ngoms pa yi sgra// thams cad bdag nyid kon par mdzod// legs so legs so zhes grub pa'i// dam pa dag kyang rab tu rtsol//
353b4(rnying rgyud): bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i// grub pa kun mchog nyams dga' ba// ji ltar 'dod pa'i longs spyod du// thams cad kyi ni bdag nyid stsol// dang po kun las byung ba yi// mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi// bkod pa rab 'byam tshogs rnams kyis/
353b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad bdag nyid mchod pa mdzad// dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying dang bzlas// dpal ldan lag pa g.yas pa yi// pad+mo khu tshur dpral bar bzhag/ bdug gi mig ni gyen du blta// 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi// phyag rgya thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// gyen du 'phyar
353b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dngos grub dang // rab 'byam las rnams myur du 'grub// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ri// khams gsum pa dag ma lus pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so//
353b7(rnying rgyud): kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// dpal rdo rje pad+ma gyen du 'phar ba'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis// rtag tu dpag med tshe dang ldan// nam mkha'i dbyings
354a1(rnying rgyud): // thu mas pa dang tha / sa// byung ngan gas pa smra la/ du ga sa nas/ nga dgags pa// na na sa// sas das
354a2(rnying rgyud): 'di ni gsad mchog mchog gi mchog/ sems can byi 'is rnams thong ba dang // rnam par byor bskal ba yang mi mang// 'di la bgegs med 'dud kyang mod ma ngon/ rtog pas mi 'thab ba bar yong mi dras// mi brtan pa dang bdud dung mi 'gyur// bdun par bya ba'i phyir yang mi 'dims/ ga
354a3(rnying rgyud): khrig radagi bde byas par bslab pa// dngos grub mchog gis ni brtan par mdzad// kun tu tshogs pas ni de skad gsungs// bcom can de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tung gyis// rdo ji sems dpa' dab la bris legs gsungs la// mngon par brtod cing btu thos par gyur// kran tu snga tshogs skal ba nga
354a4(rnying rgyud): po mchog gi rtog pa ste le'u bcupa'o// // rnam mang rjes chags dga' ba'i bad+ma rnam dag mchod pa dang // rta mchoganal 'byor bde bas gsal bar rjes su mdzod na ni// rab tu bde ba'i rnal 'byor dam pa skal bzung dga' ba'i mchog/ rab mchog bde ba'i dang bzhin dmachog padapes rjes grub 'gyur//
354a5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sbram bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rtog pa/ rtog pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chen po bde ba chen po'i sku'i rgyud sangs rgyas mnyam spyor rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi
354a6(rnying rgyud): mkhan po badz+ra ha s+ya dang / klu 'phrul gyilo tsA ba rma rin chen mchog gis 'grel pa bzhi'i gzhung dang bstan tezhu chen gyis gtan la ba batho// wa 'a dang kun da bya'o/
